40001001	Okutonda obuzaale bwa Yesu Kristo, omwijukuru wa Daudi, omwijukuru wa Abburahamu.
40001002	Abburahamu akazaara, Isaaka, Isaaka yazaara Yakobbo, Yakobbo yazaara Yuda n'abagenzi be.
40001003	Yuda yazaara Perezi na Zeera, nyinabo nuwe Taamali; Perezi akazaara Hezirooni, Hezirooni yazaara Ramu.
40001004	Ramu akazaara Aminadabbu, Aminadabbu yazaara Nahasooni, Nahasooni yazaara Salumoni.
40001005	Salumoni akazaara Bowazi, nyina nuwe Rahabbu; Bowazi yazaara Obedi, nyina nuwe Lusi; Obedi yazaara Yese,
40001006	Yese yazaara Daudi Omukama. Daudi yazaara Solomoni hali ogu ow'akaba ali muka Uriya.
40001007	Solomoni akazaara Rehobbowamu, Rehobbowamu yazaara Abiya, Abiya yazaara Asa.
40001008	Asa yazaara Yehosafaati, Yehosafaati yazaara Yoramu, Yoramu akazaara Uziya.
40001009	Uziya yazaara Yotaamu, Yotaamu yazaara Ahazi, Ahazi yazaara Hezekiya,
40001010	Hezekiya yazaara Manaase, Manaase yazaara Amosi, Amosi yazaara Yosiya.
40001011	Yosiya akazaara Yekoniya n'abagenzi be, omu biro baanyagiirwemu okutwarwa Bbabbulooni.
40001012	Obu baamazire kutwarwa Bbabbulooni, Yekoniya akazaara Seyalityeri, Seyalityeri yazaara Zerubaabeli,
40001013	Zerubaabeli yazaara Abiyudi, Abiyudi yazaara Eliyakimu, Eliyakimu yazaara Azoori.
40001014	Azoori akazaara Zadoki, Zadoki yazaara Akimu, Akimu yazaara Eliyudi.
40001015	Eliyudi akazaara Eryeza, Eryeza yazaara Mataani, Mataani yazaara Yakobbo.
40001016	Yakobbo ogu nuwe yazaire Yosefu iba Mariya, nyina Yesu arukwetwa Kristo.
40001017	Nahabweki okuruga hali Abburahamu okuhika hali Daudi haroho bwijukuru ikumi na bbuna; okuruga hali Daudi okuhika ha kutwarwa Bbabbulooni naho haroho obwijukuru ikumi na bbuna; kandi okuruga ha kutwarwa Bbabbulooni okuhika ha kuzaarwa kwa Kristo, nabwo bwijukuru bundi ikumi na bbuna.
40001018	Eby'okuzaarwa kwa Yesu Kristo bikaba biti: Mariya nyina, obu akaba ajumbiirwe Yosefu, akazooka aina enda ya Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
40001019	Yosefu iba, habw'okusangwa ali musaija ahikiriire, atagonze kumuhemura omu bantu, baitu yacwamu kumuleka omu nsita.
40001020	Obu akaba naakyateekereza ebi, malaika wa Mukana yamubonekera omu kirooto naagamba ati: “Yosefu, mwijukuru wa Daudi, otatiina kugabura Mariya mukazi waawe, habwokuba atwaire enda habw'amaani ga Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
40001021	Alizaara omwana omwojo, olimuruka ibara lye Yesu, habwokuba nuwe alijuna abantu be ebibi byabu.”
40001022	Ebi byona bikabaho nukwo bihikirize MUKAMA ebi yagambiire omu kanwa k'omurangi ati:
40001023	“Omwisiki empikirre alitwara enda, azaale omwana omwojo, kandi alyetwa ibara Emanueli.” (Amakuru gaalyo: Ruhanga ali na itwe.)
40001024	Yosefu obu yasisiimukire, yakora malaika wa MUKAMA eki yamugambiire, yagabura Mariya;
40001025	kandi atamumanye atakazaire omwana omwojo. Yosefu yamuruka ibara lye Yesu.
40002001	Yesu obu yazairwe omu Betelehemu orwa Buyudaaya, omu businge bwa Herode Omukama, abasaija abanyamagezi bakaija Yerusaalemu nibaruga Burugaizooba, baakaguza bati:
40002002	“Omukama w'Abayudaaya anyakuzairwe araha? Habwokuba tukarora enyunyuuzi ye Burugaizooba, hati twizire kumuramya.”
40002003	Omukama Herode obu yahuliire eki, yatuntura hamu n'aba Yerusaalemu boona.
40002004	Nubwo yasoroize banyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro yabakaguliriza nambere Kristo ali w'okuzaarwa.
40002005	Baamugarukamu bati: “Omu Betelehemu orwa Buyudaaya; habwokuba nukwo kyahandiikirwe omurangi kiti:
40002006	‘Iwe Betelehemu orw'omu nsi ya Yuda, toli muke omu balemi baayo; habwokuba omuli iwe nuho haliruga omulemi ow'alirema abantu bange Abaisirairi’.”
40002007	Nubwo Herode yayesire abanyamagezi kumurora omunsita, yabakaguza muno bamumanyise akasumi konyini aka baaroliiremu enyunyuuzi.
40002008	Yabatuma Betelehemu ati: “Mugende muserre muno omwana, obu muraamuzoora, mwije mummanyise, nukwo na nyowe ngende mmuramye.”
40002009	Obu baamazire kuhurra omukama ebi yabaragiire, baagenda; kandi enyunyuuzi eri ei baaroliire Burugaizooba yabeebembera kuhika obu yayemeriire omwana nambere akaba ali.
40002010	Obu baarozire enyunyuuzi, baakyanganuka muno.
40002011	Kandi obu baataahire omunju, baarora omwana na Mariya nyina, baajumara, baamuramya, baasumurra ensaho zaabo, baamurabuka ebisembo: ezaabbu, obubbani, n'emigaju.
40002012	Kandi obu baahabwirwe Ruhanga omu kirooto okutagaruka hali Herode, bakatwarwa omuhanda gundi kugarukayo owabu bo.
40002013	Abanyamagezi obu baamazire kugenda, malaika wa MUKAMA yabonekera Yosefu omu kirooto, naagamba ati: “Imuka, otwale omwana na nyina, osingirwe Misiri, oikaleyo okuhika obu ndikugambira; habwokuba Herode ayeteekaniize kuseera omwana n'okumwita.”
40002014	Nubwo Yosefu yaimukire ekiro, yatwara omwana na nyina, baagenda Misiri;
40002015	baikarayo kuhikya Herode obu yafiire. Nukwo MUKAMA eki yagambisize omurangi kihikirre ngu: “Nkeeta omwana wange aruge Misiri.”
40002016	Herode obu yayetegeriize abanyamagezi nkooku baamugobiize, yakwatwa ekiniga kingi muno. Yaragira kwita abaana aboojo boona abakaba bali omu Betelehemu n'omu byaro ebiherraineho, abakaba bahikize emyaka ebiri n'abatakagihikize, naihirra ha kasumi abanyamagezi aka baamugambiire.
40002017	Aho omurangi Yeremiya eki yarangire kyahikirra ngu:
40002018	“Iraka likahulirwa omu Rama, ery'okutaabaana n'okuteera empamo; Rakeeli naalirirra abaana be, atarukwenda kuhuu muzibwa, habwokuba boona bahoireho.”
40002019	Herode obu yamazire kufa, malaika wa MUKAMA yabonekera Yosefu omu kirooto ali Misiri,
40002020	naagamba ati: “Imuka, otwale omwana na nyina, mugaruke omunsi ya Isirairi; habwokuba abaaserraga kwita omwana bafiire.”
40002021	Nubwo yaimukire, yatwara omwana na nyina, baagarukayo omunsi ya Isirairi.
40002022	Baitu Yosefu obu yahuliire Akiraho nkooku nuwe atiire engoma ya Herode ise, yatiina kugyayo. Obu yahabwirwe Ruhanga omu kirooto, yarugayo yagenda omu isaza lya Galiraaya.
40002023	Yagenda yaikara omu rubuga orurukwetwa Nazareeti, nukwo ekyagambirwe abarangi kihikirre kiti: “Alyetwa Munyanazareeti.”
40003001	Omu biro ebi, Yohaana Omubatiza akaija naarangirra omwirungu lya Buyudaaya,
40003002	naagamba ati: “Mwegarukemu, habwokuba obukama bw'omwiguru buli haihi.”
40003003	Nuwe ogu omurangi Isaaya ou yagambireho ati: “Iraka ly'ogu arukwamiira omwirungu ati: Muteekanirize MUKAMA omuhanda, mutereekereze obuhanda bwe.”
40003004	Yohaana ogu yajwaraga ekijwaro ky'ebyoya by'engamiya, yayeteegesaaga orukoba rw'oruhu; kandi yalyaga enzige n'obwoki bw'enjoki ez'omwirungu.
40003005	Abantu baarugaga Yerusaalemu n'omu isaza lyona erya Buyudaaya n'omunsi eziheriire ekisaaru Yorudaani, nibaija nambere ali.
40003006	Yababatirizaaga omu kisaaru Yorudaani nibaatura ebibi byabu.
40003007	Yohaana obu yarozire Abafalisaayo baingi n'Abasadukaayo nibaija kubatizibwa, yabagambira ati: “Inywe abaana b'enjoka! Nooha ayabahabwire kwiruka obukaya bwa Ruhanga obutagarukirra?
40003008	Mukole ebikorwa ebirukwoleka nkooku mwegarukiremu.
40003009	Muleke kwesigura muti: ‘Twina isenkuru itwe Abburahamu’; baitu nimbagambira nti: Amabaale ganu, Ruhanga asobora kugaihiramu Abburahamu abaijukuru.
40003010	Nangwa na hati endemu etairwe ha bikoro by'emiti. Omuti gwona ogutarukwana bijuma ebirungi nigwija kutemwa, gunagwe omu murro.
40003011	“Nyowe nimbabatiza n'amaizi habw'okwegarukamu, baitu ogu arukwija enyuma, nankiza obusobozi, kandi tinsemeriire n'okumukwatiraho enkaito ze; uwe alibabatiza na Mwoyo Ahikiriire n'omurro;
40003012	kandi akwasire orugali rwe kuhehemukya, naija kusingorra orubuga rwe, nukwo ahunike oburo omu nguli ye, kandi ebisunga abyokye omu murro ogutaraara.”
40003013	Nubwo Yesu yarugire Galiraaya, yagenda Yorudaani kubatizibwa Yohaana.
40003014	Baitu Yohaana yagonza kumwangirra naagamba ati: “Nyowe ninyetaaga ombatize, kandi iwe noija hali nyowe?”
40003015	Baitu Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Hati iwe ikiriza tukole tuti, nukwo tuhikirize byona Ruhanga ebi arukutugondeza.” Aho Yohaana yaikiriza.
40003016	Yesu obu yamazire kubatizibwa, ahonaaho yaruga omu maizi, iguru lyakinguka, yarora Mwoyo wa Ruhanga naamusirimukaho omu kisisani ky'eriiba, naamwijaho;
40003017	n'iraka lyaruga omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Ogu nuwe Mwana wange omugonzibwa ou nsiima muno.”
40004001	Nubwo Yesu yatwarwa Mwoyo omu irungu okwohebwa Sitaani.
40004002	Obu yamazire ebiro makumi ana nyamusana n'ekiro atarukulya kantu, enjara yamuruma.
40004003	Aho omwohi yamwizira yamwohya ati: “Obu oraaba oli Mwana wa Ruhanga, ragira amabaale ganu gafooke byokulya.”
40004004	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Omuntu taba mwomeezi habw'ebyokulya byonka, baitu aba mwomeezi habw'ekigambo kyona ekiruga omu kanwa ka Ruhanga.’ ”
40004005	Aho Sitaani yamutwara omu rubuga orurukwera, yamuta ha kasu k'Enju ya Ruhanga,
40004006	yamugambira ati: “Obu oraaba oli Mwana wa Ruhanga, wesimbe hansi; habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Alikukwasa bamalaika be’, kandi kiti: ‘Bakukwatirre omu mikono yabo, oleke kuteera ekigere kyawe ha ibaale’.”
40004007	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kandi kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Otalyohya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe’.”
40004008	Sitaani yayongera yamutwara ha rusozi oruraihire muno, yamwoleka obukama bwona obw'omu nsi n'ekitiinisa kyabwo.
40004009	Yamugambira ati: “Binu byona ndaabikuha kakuba oteeza amaju okandamya.”
40004010	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Rugaho Sitaani! Habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Oramyege MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, kandi nuwe oheerezeege wenka’.”
40004011	Nubwo Sitaani yamurugaho, bamalaika baija baamuheereza.
40004012	Yesu obu yahuliire Yohaana nkooku akwasirwe, yarugayo yagaruka Galiraaya.
40004013	Obu yarugire Nazareeti, akagenda yaikara Kafaranaumu, orubuga oruli ha musa gw'enyanja, omu nsi ya Zebbuluuni na Nafutaali.
40004014	Nukwo ekyagambirwe omurangi Isaaya kihikirre kiti:
40004015	“Ensi ya Zebbuluuni n'eya Nafutaali, ha bukiizi bw'enyanja, nseeri ya Yorudaani, omu Galiraaya y'Abanyamahanga,
40004016	abantu abakaba bali omu mwirima, bakajwerwa omusana mwingi, nabo abaikaraga omunsi y'ekiituuru ky'okufa emamba ekabasarra.”
40004017	Kuruga omu kasumi ako, Yesu yatandika kwegesa naagamba ati: “Mwegarukemu, habwokuba obukama bw'omu iguru bwiriire haihi.”
40004018	Yesu obu akaba naaraba ha musa gw'enyanja ya Galiraaya, yarora nyineemu babiri, Simooni arukwetwa Petero n'owanyina Andereya, nibanaga akatimba omu nyanja; habwokuba bakaba bali basohi.
40004019	Yabagambira ati: “Mumpondere, ndibafoora basohi b'abantu.”
40004020	Ahonaaho baasiga obutimba bwabo baamuhondera.
40004021	Obu yagenzireho omumaiso kake, yarora banyineemu abandi babiri, Yakobbo na Yohaana, batabani ba Zebedaayo, bali omu bwato hamu na isebo Zebedaayo nibasumiikaniza obutimba bwabo. Nabo Yesu yabeeta.
40004022	Ahonaaho baasiga obwato bwabo na isebo, baamuhondera.
40004023	Yesu akagendagenda omu Galiraaya yoona, naayegesa omu masorrokaniro gaabo, naarangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'obukama bwa Ruhanga, kandi naakiza buli ndwara n'obusaasi bwona obw'abantu.
40004024	Yaranganwa omu Siriya yoona, baamuleetera abarwaire boona abakaba bakwasirwe endwara n'obusaasi obutali bumu, abakwasirwe emyoyo emibi, abagu b'ensimbo, n'abazingamire; yabakiza.
40004025	Ebitebe by'abantu baingi bakamuhondera nibaruga Galiraaya, n'omu Mbuga Ikumi ezeeteraine, Yerusaalemu, Buyudaaya, na nseeri ya Yorudaani.
40005001	Yesu obu yarozire ebitebe by'abantu, yatemba orusozi, yaikarra hansi, nukwo abeegesebwa be kwija nambere ali,
40005002	yatandika kubeegesa ati:
40005003	“Baina omugisa abeemanya nkooku bali banaku omu mwoyo, habwokuba obukama bw'omwiguru bwabo.
40005004	Baina omugisa abarukuganya, habwokuba Ruhanga alibahuumuza.
40005005	Baina omugisa abaculeezi, habwokuba baligweterwa ensi.
40005006	Baina omugisa abarukurumwa enjara bakakwatwa n'iroho habw'obuhikiriire, habwokuba baliiguta.
40005007	Baina omugisa ab'embabazi, habwokuba baligirirwa embabazi.
40005008	Baina omugisa ab'emitima esemiire, habwokuba balirora Ruhanga.
40005009	Baina omugisa abanyakuteeraniza abantu omu businge, habwokuba balyetwa baana ba Ruhanga.
40005010	Baina omugisa abahiiganizibwa habw'obuhikiriire, habwokuba obukama bw'omwiguru bwabo.
40005011	Inywe mwina omugisa abantu obu baraabajumaga, obu baraabahiiganizaaga kandi bakabahangirra ebintu ebibi byona habwange.
40005012	Musemererwe, mukyanganuke, habwokuba empeera yanyu nyingi omu iguru; nukwo baahiiganiize bati abarangi abaabandize inywe.”
40005013	“Inywe muli kisura ky'ensi; kakuba ekisura kihoibwamu orusa, orusa oru ruligarurwamu ruta? Kiba kitakyagasa, kisigaliire kunagwa n'okurubaatirirwa abantu.
40005014	“Inywe muli kyererezi ky'ensi. Orubuga orwombekerwe ha rusozi tirusobora kuserekwa.
40005015	Busaho muntu ahemba etaara akagijuumikira ekigega, baitu bagita ha kikondo, nukwo emulikire abantu boona abali omu nju.
40005016	Ekyererezi kyanyu nukwo kimulikire kiti abantu, barole ebikorwa byanyu ebirungi, bakugize Isiinywe ow'omu iguru.”
40005017	“Mutateekereza ngu, nkaija kwihaho Ebiragiro n'abarangi. Ebi ntaije kubiihaho, baitu nkaija kubihikiriza.
40005018	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Iguru n'ensi bitakahoireho, busaho enyuguta n'emu ey'omu Biragiro noobu kaakuba kacweka kaayo akaliihwamu, okuhika byona obu birikahikirra.
40005019	Nahabweki weena anyakucwa ekimu ha biragiro binu ebike, kandi akeegesa abandi kubicwa, alyetwa muto omu bukama bw'omwiguru; kandi weena anyakubikwata akabyegesa abandi, alyetwa mukuru omu bukama bw'omwiguru.
40005020	Baitu nimbagambira nti: Obuhikiriire bwanyu obu butalikira obw'abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'obw'Abafalisaayo timulitaaha omu bukama bw'omwiguru.”
40005021	“Mukahurra aba ira nkooku baagambiirwe bati: ‘Otaliita; weena anyakwita w'okusingwa omusango’.
40005022	Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nti: Weena anyakubiihirirwa mugenzi we ali w'okusingwa omusango; weena anyakujuma mugenzi we alitwarwa omu rukurato; kandi weena anyakweta mugenzi we ati: ‘Kidoma we!’ ogu alinagwa omu kiinongoro ky'omurro.
40005023	Habweki, kakuba oba noohayo ekisembo kyawe ha itambiro, okaijuka nkooku mugenzi waawe aina eki arukukujunaana,
40005024	siga aho ekisembo kyawe omu maiso g'itambiro, genda obanze ogarukanganemu nawe, nubwo ogaruke ohonge ekisembo kyawe.
40005025	“Garukanganamu bwango n'ogu arukujunaana, atakakuhikize omu bulemi; nukwo aleke kukunyegerra hali omucwi w'emisango, n'omucwi w'emisango akakukwasa omuserikale, kandi omuserikale akakuta omu nkomo.
40005026	Mazimakwo nyowe ninkugambira nti: Tolirugamu okuhika obu olikasasurra kimu akasente koona.”
40005027	“Mukahurra nkooku kyagambirwe kiti: ‘Otalisiihana’.
40005028	Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nit: Weena ogu arora omukazi akamwegomba, buli omu mutima gwe aba asiihaine nawe.
40005029	Eriiso lyawe ery'obulyo kakuba nirikuleetereza kusiisa, liihemu olinage; haakire ofeerwe orugingo rumu orw'omubiri gwawe, kukira omubiri gwona kunagwa omu kiinongoro ky'omurro.
40005030	Kandi omukono gwawe ogw'obulyo kakuba gukuleetereza kusiisa, gutemeho ogunage; haakire ofeerwe orugingo rumu orw'omubiri gwawe, kukira iwe weena kugenda omu kiinongoro ky'omurro.”
40005031	“Kandi kikagambwa kiti: ‘Omuntu weena obu abingira kimu mukazi we, amuhe ebbaruha erukwoleka nkooku amubingire.’
40005032	Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nti: Omusaija kakuba abingira kimu mukazi we, atarukusigikira ha busiihani, nuwe aba amuleeteriize kusiihana obu aswerwa handi; n'omusaija anyakuswera omukazi ayabingirwe, nawe aba asiihaine.”
40005033	“Mukagaruka mwahurra nkooku abantu ba ira bagambiirwe bati: ‘Otalirahirra busa, baitu eki orahiriire MUKAMA okihikirizeege!’
40005034	Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nti: Mutalirahira naakake konka, noobu lyakuba iguru, habwokuba nikyo kitebe kya Ruhanga;
40005035	rundi ensi, habwokuba nuko akatebe k'ebigere bye; rundi Yerusaalemu, habwokuba nurwo orubuga rw'Omukama omukuru.
40005036	Noobu kwakuba okurahira omutwe gwawe, habwokuba tosobora kuhindura akasoke kamu kuba akarukwera rundi akarukwiragura.
40005037	Leka ekigambo kyawe ‘Ego’ kiikale kiri ‘Ego’, rundi ‘Nangwa’ kiikale kiri ‘Nangwa?’; ebirukukira hali ebi biruga hali Omubi.”
40005038	“Mukahurra nkooku kyagambirwe kiti: ‘Eriiso lirehwe eriiso, n'eriino lirehwe eriino.’
40005039	Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nti: mutalyeholerra enzigu. Omuntu obu araakuteeraga oruhi ha rusaya rw'obulyo, omuhindurre n'orundi.
40005040	Omuntu kakuba nakunyegerra habw'esaati, leka atwale n'ekooti.
40005041	Kakuba omuntu naakuhambiriza kugenda nawe kilomita emu, genda nawe n'eya kabiri.
40005042	Omuntu kakuba akusaba, omuhe; kakuba akwohoza, otalimwangirra.”
40005043	“Mukahurra nkooku kyagambirwe kiti: ‘Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe kandi onobege omunyanzigwa waawe’.
40005044	Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nti: Mugonzeege abanyanzigwa banyu, kandi musabirege abarukubahiiganiza,
40005045	nukwo mube baana ba Isiinywe ali omu iguru, habwokuba ajwisiza omusana ababi n'abarungi, kandi anagira enjura abahikiriire n'abatali bahikiriire.
40005046	Obu muraaba nimugonza abarukubagonza, mulitunga mpeera ki? N'abasorooza b'omusoro tinukwo bakora bati?
40005047	Obu muraaba nimuramukya bagenzi banyu bonka, abandi nimubakizaaho ki? N'Abanyamahanga tinukwo bakora bati?
40005048	Habweki mube bahikiriire nka Isiinywe ow'omu iguru oku ahikiriire.”
40006001	“Mwerinde, muleke kukora ebikorwa byanyu ebirungi omu maiso g'abantu ngu, babarole. Obu muraakora muti, Isiinywe ow'omwiguru talibaha mpeera.
40006002	“Habweki obu oraagabiraga omuseege, leka kukirangaaniza nk'abagobya oku bakora omu masorrokaniro n'omu mihanda, nukwo abantu babanyumize. Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abo bamazire ira kutunga empeera yabu.
40006003	Baitu obu oraagabiraga omuseege, omukono gwawe ogw'emoso guleke kumanya omukono gw'obulyo eki gurukukora.
40006004	Okugaba kwawe kubege kw'ensita; kandi So anyakurora ensita alikuha empeera.”
40006005	“Obu muraabaga nimusaba Ruhanga, mulekege kuba nk'abagobya; habwokuba bbo bagonza kusaba beemeriire omu masorrokaniro n'omu ntangatangano z'emihanda, nukwo abantu babarole. Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abo baamazire ira kutunga empeera yabo.
40006006	Baitu obu oraabaga noosaba, otaahege omu kisiika kyawe, oyekingiremu, nukwo osabe Sso atarukurorwa; kandi Uwe anyakurora ensita alikuha eky'osabire.
40006007	“Obu muraabaga nimusaba muleke kukanyisa ebigambo nkooku Abanyamahanga bakora, nibateekereza ngu, Ruhanga araabahurra habw'ebigambo byabo ebingi.
40006008	Muleke kusisana nk'abo, habwokuba Isiinywe amanyire ebi mwetaaga noobu muba mutakamusabire.
40006009	Nahabweki musabege muti: Isiitwe ali omwiguru, ibara lyawe litiinwe,
40006010	obukama bwawe bwije, ebi ogonza bikorwe omunsi nkooku bikorwa omwiguru.
40006011	Otuhe hati ebyokulya byaitu ebya buli kiro;
40006012	otuganyire ebibi byaitu nka itwe oku tuganyira abatukora kubi;
40006013	otatuleka tukoohebwa baitu otujune omu bubi.
40006014	Obu muraaganyiraga abantu ensobi zaabo, na inywe Isiinywe ow'omwiguru alibaganyira;
40006015	baitu obu mutaganyira abantu ensobi zaabo, na inywe Isiinywe talibaganyira ezanyu.”
40006016	“Obu muraabaga nimusiiba, muleke kwoleka obujune ha maiso nk'abagobya oku bakora, nukwo abantu babamanyirre nkooku barukusiiba. Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abo bamazire kutunga empeera yabo.
40006017	Baitu inywe obu muraabaga nimusiiba, munaabege ha maiso, mwesiige amagita,
40006018	nukwo abantu baleke kubamanyirra nkooku murukusiiba; baitu mumanywe Isiinywe wenka atarukurorwa. Kandi Isiinywe anyakurora eby'ensita alibaha empeera.”
40006019	“Mutalyeyahurra itungo omunsi, erirukusiiswa enkugutu n'obumomi, kandi abasuma nambere barukucwa bakaiba.
40006020	Baitu mweyahurrege itungo omwiguru, nambere litasobora kusiiswa enkugutu n'obumomi, kandi abasuma nambere batarukucwa bakaiba.
40006021	Habwokuba itungo lyanyu nambere liri, oku nuho emitima yanyu eraikaraga.”
40006022	“Eriiso niyo taara y'omubiri. Habweki eriiso lyawe obu liraaba nirihweza kurungi, omubiri gwawe gwona guhwereza kimu;
40006023	baitu eriiso lyawe obu liba litarukuhweza, omubiri gwawe gwona guswekwa omwirima. Okuhweza okuli omuli iwe kakuba kufooka mwirima, omwirima ogu guraingana ha!”
40006024	“Tiharoho anyakusobora kuheereza abakama babiri. Alinobaho omu agonze ondi, rundi aligumira hali omu agaye ondi. Timusobora kuheereza Ruhanga n'okwemarra ha itungo ly'ensi.
40006025	“Nikyo ndukubagambirra nti: Mutalitunturra obwomeezi bwanyu eki muraalyaga rundi eki muraanywaga rundi omubiri gwanyu eki muraajwaraga. Obwomeezi tibuli bw'omuhendo kukira ebyokulya? N'omubiri tiguli gw'omuhendo kukira ebyokujwara?
40006026	Murole enyonyi ez'omu mwanya; tizisiga, tizigesa, kandi tizihunika, baitu Isiinywe ow'omu iguru aziriisa. Inywe timuli b'omuhendo okukira enyonyi ezi?
40006027	Nooha omuli inywe, noobu atuntura ata, arukusobora kwongera akasumi kake ha bwomeezi bwe?
40006028	“Habwaki nimutunturra ebyokujwara? Murorre ha byakyo by'omu kisaka nkooku bikura, tibikora mulimo kandi tibyongosa.
40006029	Baitu nimbagambira nti: Noobwakubaire Solomoni omu kitiinisa kye kyona, atajwale kurungi okwingana ekimu ha byakyo binu.
40006030	Ruhanga obu araaba ajweka ati obunyansi bw'omu kisaka oburoho hati, nyenkya bukanagwa omu kikoomi, talikiraho muno kujweka inywe abaina okwikiriza kuke?
40006031	Habweki muleke kutuntura ngu: ‘Turaalya ki?’ Rundi ‘Turaanywa ki?’ Rundi ‘Turaajwara ki?’
40006032	Habwokuba ebintu nk'ebi Abanyamahanga nibyo baitanira. Isiinywe ow'omwiguru amanyire binu byona nkooku murukubyetaaga.
40006033	Baitu mubanze muserre obukama bwe n'obuhikiriire bwe, n'ebi byona biribongerwaho.
40006034	“Nahabweki, mulekege kutunturra ebya ijo; ekiro kya ijo kiryetunturra kyonka. Leka buli kiro kihwe n'omutalibano gwakyo.”
40007001	“Mutalicwa emisango, na inywe timuligicwerwa;
40007002	habwokuba nkooku mucwera abandi emisango, na inywe nukwo muligicwerwa; n'endengo ei mulengesa, na inywe niyo mulirengerwamu.
40007003	Habwaki noorora akahoiga akali omu liiso lya mugenzi waawe, otarukurora empinju enyakuli omu liiso lyawe?
40007004	Kandi noosobora ota kugambira mugenzi waawe oti: ‘Kankutokoole akahoiga akakuli omu liiso.’ kandi kunu empinju eri omu lyawe?
40007005	Ngobya iwe, banza oihe empinju enyakuli omu liiso lyawe, nukwo osobole kuhweza n'okutokoora mugenzi waawe akahoiga akamuli omu liiso.
40007006	“Mutaliha embwa ekintu ekirukwera; kandi mutalinagira empunu eruuru zanyu z'omuhendo, zikazirubatirra; hanyuma zikabahindukira kubarwanisa.”
40007007	“Musabe muraaheebwa; muserre muraazoora; mwerange muraakingulirwa.
40007008	Habwokuba weena anyakusaba aheebwa, anyakuserra azoora, anyakweranga akingulirwa.
40007009	Muzaire ki omuli inywe, kakuba omwana we amusaba omugaati amuha ibaale?
40007010	Kakuba amusaba encu amuha enjoka?
40007011	Inywe ababi, obu muraaba nimumanya kuha abaana banyu ebisembo ebirungi, Isiinywe ow'omwiguru talikiraho kuha ebirungi abo abarukumusaba:
40007012	Ebi mwenda abantu babakorre, na inywe nibyo mubakorrege. Egi niyo nyegesa yoona ey'Ebiragiro n'abarangi.”
40007013	“Murabe omu irembo erifunzire, habwokuba irembo erigalihire n'omuhanda ogurukwanguha nibyo bitwara omu kuhwerekerra, kandi ababirahamu baingi.
40007014	Ningira irembo erifunzire n'omuhanda ogw'obulemeezi nibyo bitwara omu bwomeezi, kandi ababizoora bake.”
40007015	“Mwerinde abarangi b'ebisuba abaija nambere muli nibeesisaniza nk'entaama, kandi kunu omu nda myaga emikatuzi.
40007016	Mulibamanyira ha bikorwa byabo. Emizaabbibbu baginoga ha makerre rundi emitini ha ngando?
40007017	Omuti omurungi gwana ebijuma ebirungi, kandi omuti omubi gwana ebijuma ebibi.
40007018	Omuti omurungi tigusobora kwana ebijuma ebibi, kandi omuti omubi tigusobora kwana ebijuma ebirungi,
40007019	baitu gutemwa, gunagwa omu murro.
40007020	Nahabweki mulibamanyira ha bikorwa byabo.”
40007021	“Omuntu weena anyakungambira ati: ‘MUKAMA wange, MUKAMA wange,’ tinuwe alitaaha omu bukama bw'omu iguru; baitu ogu anyakukora Isenyowe ow'omwiguru ebi agonza.
40007022	Ha kiro eki, baingi balingambira bati: ‘MUKAMA waitu, MUKAMA waitu, titwarangaga omu ibara lyawe? Titwabingaga emyoyo emibi omu ibara lyawe? Titwakoraga ebyamahano bingi omu ibara lyawe?’
40007023	Obu nubwo ndibaaturra bbwa nti: ‘Tinkabamanyaga. Mundugeho, inywe enkozi z'ebibi!’ ”
40007024	“Omuntu weena anyakuhurra ebigambo byange binu, akabihikiriza, naasisana nk'omuntu omwetegereza ayayombekere enju ye ha mwandara.
40007025	Enjura ekagwa, emigezi yatenta, n'ekiyaga kyateera enju egi, baitu etagwe, habwokuba ekaba eyombekerwe ha mwandara.
40007026	Kandi omuntu weena anyakuhurra ebi ndukugamba atarukubihikiriza, alisisana nk'omuntu omudoma ayayombekere enju ye ha musenyi.
40007027	Enjura ekagwa, emigezi yatenta, n'ekiyaga kyateera enju egi; yagwa, yasingookera kimu!”
40007028	Yesu obu yamazire kugamba ebigambo ebi, ebitebe by'abantu bikahunirizibwa omulingo yabeegesezeemu,
40007029	habwokuba akabeegesa nk' anyakwina obusobozi, atarukusisana nk'abeegesa baabu ab'ebiragiro.
40008001	Yesu obu yasirimukire orusozi, ebitebe bingi bikamuhondera.
40008002	Omugenge akaija nambere ali, yateeza amaju omu maiso ge naagamba ati: “MUKAMA wange, obu oraaba noogonza, noosobora kunkiza.”
40008003	Yesu yagorra omukono, yamukwataho naagamba ati: “Ego, ningonza, kira.” Ahonaaho ebigenge bye byakira.
40008004	Yesu yamugambira ati: “Otakisura okagambiraho muntu n'omu; baitu genda oyeyoleke nyakatagara, ohonge ekihongwa Musa eki yaragiire, bube bwakaiso hali abantu nkooku okiziibwe.”
40008005	Yesu obu yataahire omu Kafaranaumu, omukuru w'ekihanda ky'ab'amahe, Omuroma, yaija nambere ali, yamwesengereza
40008006	naagamba ati: “Waitu, omuheereza wange abyamire omu ka azingamire, naasaasa muno.”
40008007	Yesu yamugambira ati: “Ka nyije, mmukize.”
40008008	Baitu mukuru w'ekihanda ky'abamahe yamugarukamu ati: “MUKAMA wange, tinsemeriire kukutaahya omwange; baitu gamba ekigambo kyonka, omuheereza wange araakira.
40008009	Habwokuba na nyowe ndi muntu arukulemwa; nyina n'abaserikale aba ndukulema. Obu ndagira omu nti: ‘Genda’, agenda; n'ondi nti: ‘Ija’, aija; n'obu ndagira omuheereza wange nti: ‘kora kinu’, akikora.”
40008010	Yesu obu yamuhuliire, yahunirra, yagambira abakaba bamuhondiire ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Tinkaroraga muntu n'omu omu Isirairi anyakwina okwikiriza nk'oku.
40008011	Nimbagambira nti: Baingi baliruga Burugaizooba na Bugwaizooba, baikarre kulya hamu na Abbrahamu, Isaaka, na Yakobbo omu bukama bw'omu iguru
40008012	baitu abaana b'obukama balibingirwa aheeru omu mwirima, nambere abantu baliririrra kandi bakanena ensaya.”
40008013	Yesu nubwo yagambiire mukuru w'ekihanda ky'ab'amahe ati: “Genda; kikukolerwe nkooku oikiriize.” Kandi omu kasumi ako konyini omuheereza we yakira.
40008014	Yesu obu yataahire omunju ya Petero, yasanga nyinazaara abyamire, arwaire omuswija;
40008015	yamukwata ha mukono, omuswija gwakira, yaimuka, yatandika kumuheereza.
40008016	Rwebagyo, izooba obu lyagwire, bakaleetera Yesu abantu baingi abakaba bakwasirwe emyoyo emibi; yagibinga n'ekigambo kye, kandi yakiza boona abakaba barwaire.
40008017	Kinu kikahikiriza omurangi Isaaya eki yagambire ati: “Akeetaho obuceke bwaitu kandi yayetweka endwara zaitu.”
40008018	Yesu obu yarozire ekitebe kingi kimwehinguliriize, yaragira abeegesebwa kwambuka kugenda nseeri y'enyanja.
40008019	Omwegesa w'ebiragiro yaija, yamugambira ati: “Mwegesa, ndaakuhonderaga hoona h'oraakagendaga.”
40008020	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Eboha ziina ebiina n'enyonyi ez'omu mwanya ziina ebiju; baitu Omwana w'omuntu taina h'okuta omutwe.”
40008021	Ondi ha beegesebwa yagamba ati: “Waitu, kambanze ngende nziike taata.”
40008022	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Iwe mpondera, leka abakafiiri baziike abafu baabu.”
40008023	Yesu obu yataahire omu bwato, abeegesebwa be baagenda nawe.
40008024	Nubwo haimukire ihunga ly'amaani lyateera ha nyanja, ebigonzi byaseeseka omu bwato; baitu Yesu akaba agwijagiire.
40008025	Abeegesebwa baagenda baamusisiimura bati: “Waitu, tujune, twafa!”
40008026	Yabagarukamu ati: “Nimutiina ki inywe abaina okwikiriza okuke?” Nubwo yaimuka, yacoomera omuyaga n'enyanja, byateeka.
40008027	Abantu baahunirra, nibagamba bati: “Mara onu muntu ki arukuragira ihunga n'enyanja bikamuhurra?”
40008028	Yesu obu yahikire nseeri y'enyanja, omu nsi y'Abagadarene, akatangaana abasaija babiri nibaruga omu bituuro, abakaba baroho emyoyo emibi. Bakaba bali b'akabi, hataroho n'omu ayasoboraga kuraba omuhanda ogu.
40008029	Baatokera haiguru nibagamba bati: “Nootwenza ki, iwe Mwana wa Ruhanga? Oizire hanu kutucanza akasumi katakahikire?”
40008030	Haihi aho hakaba haroho igana ly'empunu nizirya.
40008031	Emyoyo emibi yamwesengereza neegamba ati: “Obu oraaba nootubinga, otusindike omu igana ly'empunu.”
40008032	Yagigambira ati: “Mugende”. Nubwo emyoyo emibi yabarugamu, yagenda yataaha omu mpunu. Igana lyona ery'empunu lyajumbuutuka, lyakonkomoka enengo y'orusozi, zaagwa omu nyanja, zaafeeramu.
40008033	Abasaija abakaba nibaziriisa bairuka, baagenda omu rubuga baasubirra buli kintu, n'ebyabaireho abasaija abakaba baina emyoyo emibi.
40008034	Nubwo abantu boona ab'omu rubuga baaturukire okutangaana Yesu. Obu baamurozire, baamwesengereza aruge omu mitaano yabu.
40009001	Yesu akataaha omu bwato, yayambuka enyanja, yahika omu rubuga rw'owaabu.
40009002	Baamuleetera omusaija anyakuzingamire, abyamire ha katabu. Yesu obu yarozire okwikiriza kwabu, yagambira anyakuzingamire ati: “Mwana wange, guma! Ebibi byawe bikuganyirwe.”
40009003	Nubwo abamu ha beegesa b'ebiragiro baagambirangana bati: “Omuntu onu ka naajuma Ruhanga!”
40009004	Baitu Yesu habw'okumanya ebiteekerezo byabu, yabagambira ati: “Nimuteekerereza ki kubi omu mitima yanyu?
40009005	Ekirukukira kurahuka kiraha, kugamba nti: ‘Ebibi byawe bikuganyirwe’, rundi kugamba nti: ‘Imuka ogende’?

40009007	Yaimuka, yataaha omuka.
40009008	Ekitebe ky'abantu obu baarozire eki, baatiina, baakugiza Ruhanga ayahaire abantu obusobozi oburukwingana aho.
40009009	Yesu obu akaba naarugayo, yarora omuntu, ibara lye Matayo, aikaliire omu isoroolerezo ly'omusoro, yamugambira ati: “Mpondera.” Matayo yaimuka, yamuhondera.
40009010	Yesu obu akaba aikaliire mba Matayo naalya, abasorooza b'omusoro n'abasiisi baija, baikaara nawe ha meeza hamu n'abeegesebwa be.
40009011	Abafalisaayo obu baakirozire, baakaguza abeegesebwa be bati: “Habwaki omwegesa wanyu alya n'abasorooza b'omusoro n'abasiisi?”
40009012	Yesu obu yahuliire eki, yagarukamu ati: “Aboomeezi tibeetaaga mufumu, baitu ayetaagwa abarwaire.
40009013	Mugende mwetegereza amakuru g'ekigambo kinu: ‘Ningonza mukole ebikorwa by'embabazi kukira kuntambira ebyonzira.’ Habwokuba ntaizirre kweta abahikiriire, baitu abasiisi.”
40009014	Nubwo abeegesebwa ba Yohaana baija hali Yesu baamukaguza bati: “Habwaki itwe n'Abafalisaayo tusiiba emirundi nyingi, kunu abeegesebwa baawe batarukusiiba?”
40009015	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Abagenyi basobora bata kuganya, omuswezi obu aba ainabo? Akasumi kalihika kigabura obu alibaihwaho, nubwo balitandika kusiiba.
40009016	Tiharoho muntu abazirra ekikoba kihyaka ha kijwaro kikuru; habwokuba ekikoba eki kitaagukira kimu ha kijwaro kikuru n'ekihuru kigaliha.
40009017	Kandi tiharoho muntu anyakuta eviini ey'ehiira omu ndyanga enkuru. Kakuba akorakwo, endyanga ebbaruka, eviini eseeseka, kandi endyanga esiisikarra kimu; baitu eviini ey'ehiira bagita omu ndyanga empyaka, kandi byombi biikaraho.”
40009018	Yesu obu akaba naakyabaza nabo, haija omunyoro, yateeza amaju omumaiso ge, naagamba ati: “Muhara wange afiire. Ija omukwateho, ayomeere.”
40009019	Yesu yaimuka yamuhondera aina n'abeegesebwa be.
40009020	Nubwo omukazi ow'akaba arwaire akeejwiso kumara emyaka ikumi n'ebiri yaleesirwe enyuma ya Yesu, yakwata ha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye;
