40010001	Yesu akeeta abeegesebwa be ikumi na babiri, yabaha obusobozi obw'okubinga emyoyo emibi, n'okukiza endwara zoona n'obusaasi bwona.
40010002	Amabara g'abakwenda ikumi na babiri nugo ganu: ow'okubanza Simooni arukwetwa Petero, na mugenzi we Andereya; Yakobbo mutabani wa Zebedaayo na Yohaana owanyina;
40010003	Filipo na Batolomayo; Tomasi na Matayo, omusorooza w'omusoro; Yakobbo mutabani w'Alifaayo, na Tadeo;
40010004	Simooni omurwanirizi w'ihanga lye na Yuda Isikalyota ayamugobiize.
40010005	Ikumi na babiri abo, Yesu akabatuma naabaragira ati: “Mutaligenda hoona mu Banyamahanga, kandi mutalitaaha omu rubuga rwona orw'Abasamaliya.
40010006	Haakire mugende omu bantu ba Isirairi abarukusisana entaama ezaabuzire.
40010007	Obu muraabaga nimugenda, murangirre muti: ‘Obukama bw'omu iguru bwiriire haihi.’
40010008	Mukize abarwaire, muhumbuule abafiire, mukize abagenge, mubinge emyoyo emibi. Mukaheerwa busa, na inywe muheere busa.
40010009	Mutalitwara ezaabbu n'efeeza, noobu zaakuba sente omu ndyanga zanyu;
40010010	mutalitwara ensaho omu rugendo rwanyu, rundi esaati ibiri, rundi enkaito, noobu gwakuba omwigo. Habwokuba omukozi naasemerra kuheebwa empeera ye.
40010011	“Orubuga rwona rundi ekyaro ha muraataahaga, muserremuga omuntu anyakusemeriire, mwikale nawe okuhika obu mulirugayo.
40010012	Obu muraabaga nimutaaha omunju, abarumu mubagondeze obusinge.
40010013	Enju egi obu eraaba esemeriire, obusinge bwanyu buligiikaraho; baitu obu eraaba etasemeriire, obusinge bwanyu bulibagarukira.
40010014	Kakuba omuntu weena atabatangirra rundi akanga kuhuliiriza ebigambo byanyu, muruge omunju egi rundi omu rubuga oru nimuteeraterra ecuucu y'omu bigere byanyu.
40010015	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, ensi ya Sodomu na Gomora eriganyirwa kukira abantu b'omu rubuga oru.”
40010016	“Dora nimbatuma nk'entaama ezirukugenda omu myaaga hagati; nahabweki mube b'amagezi nk'enjoka, kandi abataina kabi nk'amaiba.
40010017	“Mwerindege abantu; habwokuba balibahayo omu nkurato, balibateeza enkoba omu masorrokaniro gaabu,
40010018	Kandi balibatwara kubatonganiza omu maiso g'abalemi abakuru n'ag'abakama habwange, mube bakaiso bange hali bo na hali Abanyamahanga.
40010019	Obu baraabahayoga, mutalitunturra ebi muligamba, rundi nkooku mulitongana; baitu omu kasumi ako muliheebwa ebi muligamba.
40010020	Habwokuba tibali inywe abalyetonganirra, baitu Mwoyo wa Isiinywe nuwe aligambira omuli inywe.
40010021	“Omuntu alihayo owanyina aitwe, na isemwana alihayo omwana we, kandi abaana baliimukirra abazaire baabo babaise;
40010022	na inywe mulinobwa boona habwange. Baitu ogu aligumiisiriza okuhika ha mpero, nuwe alijunwa.
40010023	Obu balibahiiganiza omu rubuga orumu, mwirukire omu rundi. Mazima nimbagambira nti: Timulimarayo embuga zoona eza Isirairi, Omwana w'omuntu atakaizire.
40010024	“Omwegesebwa takira mwegesa we, n'omuheereza takira mukama we;
40010025	nikihika omwegesebwa okusisana nk'omwegesa we, n'omuheereza kusisana nka mukama we. Nyineeka obu baraaba bamwesire mukuru w'emyoyo emibi, balisura ki hali ab'omu ka ye?”
40010026	“Nahabweki muleke kubatiina, habwokuba busaho ekiswekeriirwe ekitalisuukurwa, rundi ekiserekerwe ekitalimanywa.
40010027	Eki ndukubagambira omu nsita, mukigambe bbwa; kandi eki muhurra omu bihwa, mukyamirirre ha mutwe gw'enju.
40010028	Muleke kutiina abo abaita omubiri, abatasobora kwita omwoyo; haakire mutiine Ogu anyakuhwerekereza byombi: omubiri n'omwoyo omu murro ogutaraara.
40010029	Ebisirya bibiri tibigurwa sente ikumi? Busaho na kimu halibyo ekigwa hansi Isiinywe ow'omwiguru ataikiriize.
40010030	Nangwa n'isoke erya ha mitwe yanyu libazirwe.
40010031	Nahabweki muleke kutiina; inywe muli b'omuhendo kukira ebisirya bingi.”
40010032	“Weena alinyatura omumaiso g'abantu, na nyowe ndimwatura omumaiso ga Isenyowe anyakuli omwiguru;
40010033	baitu weena alinyehakana omumaiso g'abantu, na nyowe ndimwehakana omu maiso ga Isenyowe anyakuli omwiguru.
40010034	“Mutateekereza ngu, nkaija kuleeta obusinge omu nsi. Ntaije kuleeta obusinge, baitu empirima.
40010035	Nkaija kwahukaniza omwana na ise, omwisiki na nyina, mukamwana na nyinazaara;
40010036	habwokuba abanyanzigwa b'omuntu nubo ab'omu ka ye.
40010037	Anyakugonza ise rundi nyina okukira nyowe, tansemeriire; n'ogu anyakugonza mutabani we rundi muhara we okukira nyowe, tansemeriire;
40010038	n'ogu ateetweka musaraba gwe akampondera, tansemeriire.
40010039	Weena anyakutaatira obwomeezi bwe, alibufeerwa; baitu weena alihayo obwomeezi bwe habwange, alibutunga.”
40010040	“Weena anyakujwahukirra inywe, buli ajwahukiriire nyowe; kandi anyakujwahukirra nyowe, buli ajwahukiriire Ogu ayantumire.
40010041	Weena anyakujwahukirra omurangi habwokuba murangi, ogu aliheebwa empeera y'omurangi; kandi weena anyakujwahukirra omuhikiriire habwokuba muhikiriire, ogu aliheebwa empeera y'omuhikiriire.
40010042	Weena anyakuha omu ha bato abo ekikopo ky'amaizi agarukufuka habwokuba mwegesebwa wange, mazimakwo talisubwa mpeera ye.”
40011001	Yesu obu yamazire kwegesa abeegesebwa be ikumi na babiri, yarugayo yagenda kwegesa n'okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi omu mbuga zaabu.
40011002	Yohaana ow'akaba ali omu nkomo, obu yahuliire Kristo ebi arukukora, yatuma abeegesebwa be
40011003	okumukaguza buti: “Niiwe ogu arukugenda kwija, rundi tutegereze ondi?”
40011004	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Mugarukeyo, mugambire Yohaana ebi murukuhurra n'ebi murukurora:
40011005	abafu b'amaiso nibarora, abalema nibarubata, abagenge nibakizibwa, abafu b'amatu nibahurra, abafiire nibahumbuurwa, abaseege nibarangirirwa Amakuru Amarungi.
40011006	W'omugisa ogu atarukunyesiitaraho!”
40011007	Abeegesebwa ba Yohaana obu baamazire kurugayo, Yesu yakaguza ebitebe by'abantu hali Yohaana ati: “Omwirungu mukagenda kurorayo ki? Orubingo orurukutengesebwa omuyaga?
40011008	Obu, mukagenderayo ki? Kurora omuntu ajwaire engoye ezirukunekaneka? Abo abajwara engoye ezirukunekaneka baikara omu bikaali by'abakama.
40011009	Obu, mukagenderayo ki? Kurora omurangi? Ego, nimbagambira nti: Naakira n'omurangi.
40011010	Nuwe ogu ou kyahandiikirweho kiti: “‘Dora, nintuma omukwenda wange akwebembere, nuwe akusemereze omuhanda.’
40011011	Mazima nimbagambira nti: Omu bantu abaazairwe abakazi, busamu n'omu arukukira Yohaana Omubatiza ekitiinisa; baitu omuto omu bukama bw'omwiguru nuwe arukumukira.
40011012	Okuruga omu biro bya Yohaana Omubatiza n'okuhika hati, obukama bw'omwiguru burwanirirwa n'amaani, kandi ababurwanirra babunyaga n'amaani.
40011013	Habwokuba Ebiragiro n'abarangi, boona bakaranga ebirukwija kubaho okuhika ha biro bya Yohaana;
40011014	obu muraaba nimwikiriza ebyarangirwe ebi, Yohaana ogu nuwe Eriya ayanihirwaga kwija.
40011015	Anyakwina amatu, ahurre.
40011016	“Abantu ab'obusinge bunu ndabalengesaniza na ki? Nibasisana nk'abaana abaikaliire omu butale, nibeetangana bati:
40011017	“‘Tukabaterra endere, timwazina; twabaterra empamo, timwarra.’
40011018	Yohaana obu yaizire atarukulya byokulya kandi atarukunywa marwa, baagamba ngu: ‘Aroho omwoyo mubi’,
40011019	kandi Omwana w'omuntu obu yaizire naalya kandi naanywa, baagamba bati: ‘Dora omukoizi kandi omutamiizi, enganjani y'abasorooza b'omusoro n'abasiisi!’ Amagezi ga Ruhanga gamanyirwa ha bikorwa byago.”
40011020	Nubwo Yesu yatandika kujunaana embuga nambere yakoliire ebyamahano ebirukukira obwingi, habwokuba bateegarukemu.
40011021	“Olikibona iwe Korazini! Olikibona iwe Betisaida! Ebyamahano ebyakoliirwe omuli inywe, kakuba byakoliirwe Taya na Sidooni, baakubaire beegarukiremu ira, bajwaire ebiguniya, beesiigire n'iju!
40011022	Baitu nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, Tiiro na Sidooni ziriganyirwa okukira inywe.
40011023	Na iwe Kafaranaumu olinyumizibwa ohike haiguru? Nangwa, oligarurwa hansi okuzimu. Omanye ebyamahano ebyakoliirwe omuli iwe, kakuba byakoliirwe omu Sodomu, yakwikaireho okuhika hati.
40011024	Baitu nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, ensi ya Sodomu eriganyirwa kukira iwe.”
40011025	Omu kasumi ako, Yesu yagamba ati: “Taata, MUKAMA w'iguru n'ensi ninkusiima, habwokuba ebintu binu okabisereka ab'amagezi n'abarukwetegereza, wabisuukurra abaana bato.
40011026	Ego Taata, eki nikyo wasiimire.
40011027	Isenyowe akankwasa ebintu byona, kandi busaho n'omu amanyire Mwana okwihaho Ise, kandi busaho n'omu amanyire Ise okwihaho Mwana, na weena Mwana ou agonza kumusuukurra.
40011028	Mwije nambere ndi inywena abajwahire n'abalemeriirwe mbahuumuze.
40011029	Muhimbe ekikoligo kyange, mwegere hali nyowe; habwokuba ndi muculeezi kandi ninyebundaaza omu mutima, na inywe mulitungira emyoyo yanyu ekihuumuro.
40011030	Habwokuba ekikoligo kyange tikirukulemeera, kandi n'omutumba gwange nigwanguhirra.”
40012001	Omu kasumi ako Yesu akaba naaraba omu misiri y'engano ha kiro kya Sabbato; abeegesebwa be bakaba nibarumwa enjara, baatandika kucwa entwe z'engano nibazijungirra omu ngaro, nibalya.
40012002	Baitu Abafalisaayo obu baarozire eki, baamugambira bati: “Dora abeegesebwa baawe nibakora ekitarukwikirizibwa ha Sabbato.”
40012003	Nawe yabagarukamu ati: Timukasomaga Daudi eki yakozire obu yarumirwe enjara, hamu n'abo aba akaba ainabo;
40012004	nkooku yataahire omunju ya Ruhanga yalya emigaati enyakuhongerwe etaraikirizibwaga kuliibwa muntu weena kwihaho abanyakatagara bonka?
40012005	Rundi timukasomaga omu Biragiro bya Musa nkooku banyakatagara baasiisaga Sabbato nibakora omu Nju ya Ruhanga, kandi nkooku batarajunaanwaga musango?
40012006	Nimbagambira nti: Hanu haroho arukukira Enju ya Ruhanga.
40012007	Kakuba mubaire mumanyire amakuru g'ekigambo kinu ngu: “Ningonza mukole ebikorwa by'embabazi kukira kuntambira ebyonzira., timwakuhenderiire abataina musango.
40012008	Habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu nuwe MUKAMA wa Sabbato.”
40012009	Yesu yarugayo, yataaha omu isorrokaniro lyabo.
40012010	Hakaba harumu omuntu akabire omukono. Baakaguza Yesu bati: “Nikiikirizibwa okukiza ha Sabbato?” Nukwo babone ekyokumunyegerra.
40012011	Yabagarukamu ati: “Nooha omuli inywe kakuba aba aina entaama ye, ekagwa omu kiina ha Sabbato, atagiihamu?
40012012	Baitu omuntu tali w'omuhendo kukira entaama? Nahabweki nikiikirizibwa kukora ebirungi ha Sabbato.”
40012013	Aho yagambira omusaija ati: “Gorra omukono gwawe.” Yagugorra, gwakira, gwaba nk'ogundi.
40012014	Nubwo Abafalisaayo baaturuka aheeru kuhanuura nkooku baraamwita.
40012015	Yesu obu yamanyire eki, yarugayo, abantu baingi baamuhondera, kandi boona yabakiza.
40012016	Yabateererra kutamuranganiza.
40012017	Kinu kikabaho okuhikiriza ekyagambirwe omurangi Isaaya ati:
40012018	“Onu nuwe muheereza wange ou nkomere, omugonzibwa wange omwoyo gwange ou gusiimira kimu. Ndimutaho Mwoyo wange, amanyise Abanyamahanga emicwere y'obulyo.
40012019	Taliteera mpaka, talitoka, kandi tihalibaho alihurra iraka lye omu makuute;
40012020	orubingo oruhendekere talirucwa, n'ekibugo ekirukucucuuka talikiraaza, okuhikya eby'obulyo obu birisingura;
40012021	kandi Abanyamahanga nuwe balyesiga.”
40012022	Nubwo baaleesire omuntu akwasirwe omwoyo omubi, afiire amaiso n'omunwa. Yesu yamukiza, kateta yabaza, n'amaiso ge gaiguka.
40012023	Abantu boona baahunirra, baakaguza bati: “Onu taakuba Mwana wa Daudi?”
40012024	Baitu Abafalisaayo obu baahuliire eki, baagamba bati: “Ogu abinga emyoyo emibi habwa Beelizebuli, mukuru wayo.”
40012025	Yesu obu yakengere ebiteekerezo byabo, yabagambira ati: “Obukama bwona obu bwecwamu kurwanisangana, buhwerekerra; kandi busaho rubuga rundi eka, obu byebaganizaamu, ebisobora kwikaraho.
40012026	Sitaani nawe obu araaba naabinga Sitaani mutaahi we, ayebaganiizeemu kwerwanisa wenka; obukama bwe buliikaraho buta?
40012027	Nyowe obu ndaaba nimbinga emyoyo emibi habwa mukuru wayo, abeegesebwa banyu bagibinga habw'oha? Nahabweki nubo balibacwera omusango.
40012028	Baitu Omwoyo wa Ruhanga obu araaba ali nuwe ambingisa emyoyo emibi, buli obukama bwa Ruhanga bubahikireho.
40012029	“Rundi omuntu asobora ata kutaahirra omusaija ow'amaani akanyaga ebintu bye, atabandize kumukwata akamuboha? Obu nubwo asobora kunyaga eby'omu nju ye.
40012030	“Atali habwange, buli nampakaniza; kandi atasorooza na nyowe, ararangya.
40012031	Nahabweki nimbagambira nti: Abantu baliganyirwa ebibi byona n'ebijumo byona; baitu anyakujuma Mwoyo Ahikiriire taliganyirwa.
40012032	Kandi weena aligamba kubi Omwana w'omuntu aliganyirwa; baitu alijuma Mwoyo Ahikiriire taliganyirwa omu businge bunu, noobu bwakuba omu businge obuliija.”
40012033	“Semeza omuti, n'ebijuma biraasemera; rundi guleke gusiisikale, n'ebijuma byagwo biraabiiha; habwokuba omuti gumanyirwa ha bijuma byagwo.
40012034	Baana b'encwera inywe! Musobora muta kubaza ebigambo ebirungi, kunu muli babi? Habwokuba ebiijura omutima, nibyo akanwa kagamba.
40012035	Omuntu omurungi aiha ebirungi omu lyahurro lye erirungi; n'omuntu omubi aiha ebibi omu lyahurro lye eribi.
40012036	Nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango abantu balyesoborra ha buli kigambo ekibi eki baabalize;
40012037	habwokuba ebigambo byawe nibyo birikwihisaaho omusango, kandi nibyo birigukusingisa.”
40012038	Abeegesa abamu ab'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo baasaba Yesu bati: “Mwegesa, nitugonza otuhe akarorwaho.”
40012039	Yabagarukamu ati: “Abantu ab'obusinge bunu obubi kandi obutarukwesigwa nibasaba akarorwaho; baitu tibaliheebwa karorwaho koona kwihaho aka Yona omurangi.
40012040	Yona nkooku yamazire omu nda y'encu emisana esatu n'ebiro bisatu, n'Omwana w'omuntu nukwo alimara ati okuzimu ebiro bisatu n'emisana esatu.
40012041	Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, abantu aba Nineve balyemerra n'abantu ab'obusinge bunu, babasingise omusango; habwokuba Yona obu yabarangiriire, bakeegarukamu; kandi hanu haroho arukukira Yona.
40012042	Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, Omukamakati owa Bukiizi obw'obulyo alyemerra, asingise omusango abantu ab'ebiro binu; habwokuba akaruga ha mpero y'ensi, yaija okuhurra amagezi ga Solomooni; kandi hanu haroho arukukira Solomooni.”
40012043	“Omwoyo omubi obu guruga omu muntu, gugenda niguraba omu biikaro ebitarumu maizi niguserra h'okuhumurra, baitu tiguzooraho.
40012044	Nubwo gugamba guti: ‘Kangaruke owange nambere narugire.’ Obu gugaruka, gusanga enju eri kwonka, esingoliirwe, eteekaniziibwe.
40012045	Gugenda guleeta emyoyo emibi endi musanju erukugukira obubi, ija ikara omu; obwomeezi bw'omuntu ogu obwa hanyuma buba bubi kukira obw'okubanza. Ab'ebiro binu nabo nukwo baliba bati.”
40012046	Yesu obu akaba naakyabaza n'abantu, aho nyina n'abagenzi be baija, baayemerra aheeru, nibagonza kubaza nawe.
40012047	Omuntu omu nukwo kumugambira ati: “Nyoko n'abagenzi baawe beemeriire aheeru nibagonza kubaza na iwe.”
40012048	Baitu Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Mau nooha? Kandi bagenzi bange nubo baha?”
40012049	Nubwo yamuragirra abeegesebwa be naagamba ati: “Mau n'abagenzi bange nubo banu!
40012050	Weena anyakukora Isenyowe ow'omwiguru ebi agonza, nuwe mugenzi wange, nuwe munyaanya nyowe, kandi nuwe mau.”
40013001	Ha kiro eki Yesu akaruga omunju, yagenda yaikarra ha musa gw' enyanja.
40013002	Ebitebe bingi byamwesoroolezaaho; nukwo kutemba omu bwato, yabwikarramu, kandi ekitebe kyona kyayemerra ha musa gw'enyanja.
40013003	Aho yabagambira ebintu bingi omu nfumo ati: Omusigi akatura okusiga.
40013004	Obu akaba naasiga, embibo ezimu zaaragara ha muhanda rubaju, enyonyi zaija, zaazisoma.
40013005	Ezindi zaagwa ha mwandara, nambere hakaba hatali itaka lingi; ahonaaho zaamera. Baitu habw'itaka kutahama,
40013006	omusana obu gwajwire, gwazookya, kandi habw'okutagira mihama zaahotoka.
40013007	N'ezindi zaagwa omu nahwa, amahwa obu gaakuzire, gaazinyoroza.
40013008	Embibo ezindi zaagwa omwitaka erirungi, zaayana; ezimu zaayana kikumi, ezindi nkaaga, n'ezindi makumi asatu.
40013009	Nukwo Yesu kugamba ati: “Anyakwina amatu, ahurre!”
40013010	Nubwo abeegesebwa baija baamukaguza bati: “Habwaki oikara noobaliza abantu omu nfumo?”
40013011	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Inywe mukaheebwa okumanya ensita z'obukama bw'omwiguru, baitu bbo eki batakiheebwe.
40013012	Habwokuba weena anyakwina alyongerwaho, atunge bingi; baitu anyakwina ebike, n'ebi ainabyo birimwihwaho.
40013013	Kinu nikyo mbagambirirra omu nfumo: habwokuba obu barora, tibahweza; n'obu bahurra, basisa abatahulire; kandi n'okwetegereza tibeetegereza.
40013014	Mazimakwo Isaaya eki yarangire nikihikirra hali bo obu yagambire ati: ‘Mazimakwo okuhurra mulihurra, baitu timuhwituka, okurora mulirora, baitu timulihweza.
40013015	Habwokuba emitima y'abantu banu egaraihire, n'amatu gaabo nigahurra kubi, n'amaiso gaabo bagazibiriize. Habw'amaiso gaabo okutarora, n'amatu gaabo okutahurra, n'emitima yabo okuteetegereza, nikyo bayangiire okumpindukira mbakize.’
40013016	Amaiso ganyu g'omugisa habwokuba nigarora, n'amatu ganyu habwokuba nigahurra.
40013017	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abarangi baingi n'abahikiriire bakeegomba kurora ebi murukurora, baitu batabirole, n'okuhurra ebi murukuhurra, baitu batabihurre.”
40013018	Muhurre nu orufumo rw'omusigi:
40013019	Omuntu weena obu ahurra ekigambo ky'obukama bwa Ruhanga atakyetegeriize, omubi aija asahura ekigambo ekisigirwe omu mutima gwe; egi niyo mbibo eyaragaire omu muhanda.
40013020	Kandi eyaragaire ha itaka erya ha mwandara, nuwe muntu anyakuhurra ekigambo, ahonaaho akiikiriza n'okusemererwa;
40013021	baitu yo habw'okutahama omu mutima gwe, agumiisiriza akasumi kake; obu habaho emihito rundi okuhiiganizibwa habw'ekigambo eki, ahonaaho agwa.
40013022	Kandi egi eyaragaire omu mahwa, nuwe ogu anyakuhurra ekigambo, baitu habw'okumaliza omutima ha by'ensi, n'okutwalirizibwa obuguuda, binyoroza ekigambo eki, tikyaana bijuma.
40013023	Kandi embibo eyasigirwe omwitaka erirungi, nuwe muntu anyakuhurra ekigambo akakikenga; hanyuma akakora ebikorwa ebirungi: omu kukira ha kikumi, ondi nkaaga, n'ondi makumi asatu.
40013024	Yesu akabaganikiza oruganikyo orundi ati: “Obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisanizibwa nk'omuntu ayasigire embibo nungi omu musiri gwe.
40013025	Ekiro, abantu obu bakaba bagwijagiire, omunyanzigwa akaija yasiga emberya omu buro, yayegendera.
40013026	Oburo obu bwakuzire butandikire kutungurra, emberya nayo yazookamu.
40013027	Abakozi ba nyineeka nukwo kwija baamukaguza bati: ‘Waitu, omu musiri gwawe otasigemu embibo nungi? Kandi emberya iziremu eta?’
40013028	Yabagarukamu ati: ‘Omunyanzigwa nuwe yakozire kinu.’ Nubwo abakozi baamukagwize bati: ‘Noogonza tugende tugyomberemu?’
40013029	Nandiki nyineeka ati: ‘Nangwa, habwokuba obu muraaba nimwomberamu emberya, timwikara kutwarranizaamu oburo.
40013030	Muleke byombi bikurre hamu okuhika ha igesa; omu kasumi k'igesa, ndigambira abagesi nti: Mubanze musorooze emberya, mugibohe enganda, eyokebwe; baitu oburo bwo mubuhunike omu nguli yange.’ ”
40013031	Yesu akabacwera orufumo orundi ati: “Obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisanizibwa nk'akasigo ka karadaali, omuntu aka yatwaire yasiga omu musiri gwe;
40013032	ko kaba katoito okukira embibo zoona, baitu obu kakura, kanyeeta okukira ebisaka byona, kafooka muti, kandi enyonyi ziija zoombeka ebiju omu mataagi gaagwo.”
40013033	Akabacwera orufumo orundi ati: “Obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisanizibwa nk'ekitumbisa omukazi eki yatwaire yajwanganiza omu bihi bisatu by'ensaano, okuhika ensaano yoona obu yatumbire.”
40013034	Ebigambo ebi byona Yesu yabigambiraga ebitebe by'abantu nabirabya omu nfumo; busaho kigambo kyona eki yabagambiraga atacwire rufumo.
40013035	Kinu kikahikiriza omurangi eki yagambire ati: “Ndaabaza omu nfumo, nyatule ebyaserekerwe kuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi.”
40013036	Hanyuma Yesu yaruga omu kitebe yataaha omu nju. Abeegesebwa be baija nambere ali nibasaba bati: “Tusoborre orufumo rw'emberya y'omu musiri.”
40013037	Yabagarukamu ati: “Ogu anyakusiga embibo enungi, nuwe Mwana w'omuntu;
40013038	omusiri niyo ensi; embibo enungi nubo baana b'engoma y'omwiguru; emberya nubo baana b'Omubi;
40013039	kandi omunyanzigwa ayagisigire omu musiri nuwe Sitaani. Igesa niyo mpero y'ensi, kandi abagesi nubo bamalaika.
40013040	Emberya nkooku esoroozibwa kwokebwa omu murro, nukwo kiriba kiti ha mpero y'ensi.
40013041	Omwana w'omuntu alituma bamalaika be, baihe omu bukama bwe byona ebirukwesiitaza n'enkozi z'ebibi zoona,
40013042	babanage omu kikoomi ky'omurro; oku nuho abantu balirirra banene ensaya.
40013043	Obu nubwo abahikiriire balyangasana nk'izooba omu bukama bwa Isebo. Anyakwina amatu, ahurre.”
40013044	“Obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisana nk'itungo eryaserekerwe omu musiri, omuntu eri yagwireho; nawe yaliswekerra. Habw'okusemererwa yagenda yatunda byona ebi akaba ainabyo, yagura omusiri ogu.”
40013045	“Kandi obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisana nk'omusuubuzi arukuserra amabaale amarungi ag'omuhendo.
40013046	Obu yazoireho limu ery'omuhendo mwingi, akagenda yatunda byona ebi akaba ainabyo, yaligura.”
40013047	“Kandi obukama bw'omu iguru nibusisanizibwa nk'akatimba akaategerwe omu nyanja, kaakwata encu eza buli mulingo;
40013048	obu kaijwire, abantu baakacundamu, baakata ha bwerre, baikarra, baakomorramu encu enungi, baazita omu bigega byabo, baitu embi baazinaga.
40013049	Nukwo kiriba kiti ha mpero y'ensi. Abamalaika baliija baihe abantu ababi omu bahikiriire,
40013050	nukwo ababi babanage omu kikoomi ky'omurro; oku nuho abantu balirirra kandi bakanena ensaya.
40013051	“Ebigambo binu byona mubyetegeriize?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Ego.”
40013052	Uwe yabagambira ati: “Nahabweki buli mwegesa w'ebiragiro anyakutendekerwe habw'obukama bw'omwiguru, naasisana nyineeka anyakwiha omu lyahurro lye ebintu ebihyaka n'ebikuru.”
40013053	Yesu obu yamazire kubacwera enfumo ezi, yarugayo,
40013054	kandi obu yahikire omunsi y'owaabu, yabeegesa omu isorrokaniro lyabo. Abaamuhuliire bakahunirra nibakaguzangana bati: “Omuntu onu, amagezi ganu n'ebyamahano binu, akabiiha nkaha?
40013055	Onu tinuwe mutabani w'omubaizi? Nyina tinuwe Mariya? Kandi Yakobbo, Yosefu, Simooni na Yuda tinubo bagenzi be?
40013056	Banyaanya boona tibali owaitu hanu? Binu byona akabiiha nkaha?”
40013057	Nukwo kumwanga. Baitu Yesu yabagambira ati: “Omurangi aheebwa ekitiinisa hoona hoona, okwihaho omunsi y'owaabu n'omu ka ye.”
40013058	Oku, Yesu atakorreyo byamahano bingi habw'okutaikiriza kwabo.
40014001	Omu kasumi ako, ow'isaza Herode akahurra okurangaanwa kwa Yesu;
40014002	yagambira abagaragara be ati: “Ogu nuwe Yohaana Omubatiza ahumbuukire omu bafu; nikyo arukukorra eby'amaani ebi.”
40014003	Herode akaba akwasire Yohaana, yamuboha, yamuta omu nkomo habwa Herodiya, muka Filipo mugenzi we.
40014004	Habwokuba Yohaana akahana Herode ati: “Ebiragiro bya Musa tibirukukwikiriza kuswera muramu waawe!”
40014005	Herode noobu araaba yagondeze kumwita, baitu akatiina abantu, habwokuba Yohaana baamwetaga murangi.
40014006	Ekiro ky'okuzaarwa kwa Herode obu kyahikire, muhara wa Herodiya akacekeca omumaiso g'abagenyi boona, Herode nawe yasemererwa,
40014007	yaraganiza naarahira kumuha eki arakasaba kyona.
40014008	Omwisiki habw' okuhanulirwa nyina, yagamba ati: “Mpeera ha sahaani hanu omutwe gwa Yohaana Omubatiza.”
40014009	Ow'isaza yasaalirwa; baitu habw'okusangwa arahiire omu maiso g'abagenyi be, yaragira bagumuhe.
40014010	Yatuma bagende omu nkomo batemeho Yohaana omutwe.
40014011	Baaguleetera ha sahaani, baaguha omwisiki, nawe yagutwarra nyina.
40014012	Abeegesebwa ba Yohaana bakaija baatwara omutumbi, baaguziika; nubwo baagenzire kugambira Yesu.
40014013	Yesu obu yahuliire amakuru ago, yarugayo ali omu bwato, yagenda omu irungu. Abantu obu baamanyire eki, baaruga omu mbuga, baamuhondera nibarubata.
40014014	Obu yarugire omu bwato, yarora ekitebe kikooto ky'abantu, yabakwatirwa embabazi, yakiza abarwaire baabo.
40014015	Izooba obu lyagoroobere, abeegesebwa bakaija baamugambira bati: “Hanu tuli omwirungu, kandi n'obwire bwaira; raga abantu bagende omu byaro beegurre ebyokulya.”
40014016	Yesu yagamba ati: “Tibasemeriire kugenda; inywe mubahe ebyokulya.”
40014017	Baamugambira bati: “Hanu twinaho emigaati etaano yonka n'encu ibiri.”
40014018	Uwe yagamba ati: “Mubindeetere hanu.”
40014019	Yaragira abantu kwikarra ha bunyansi; yakwata emigaati etaano n'encu ibiri, yararamira haiguru, yasiima, yabicwamu, emigaati yagiha abeegesebwa be, bagigabire abantu.
40014020	Boona baalya, baiguta. Abeegesebwa obu baasoroize oburagalika obwasaagireho, bwaijuza ebigega ikumi na bibiri.
40014021	Abasaija abaaliire baahikaga nk'enkumi itaano, otabaliiremu abakazi n'abaana.
40014022	Yesu yaragira abeegesebwa be kugwerra omu bwato, bamubanze kwambuka nseeri y'enyanja, uwe abe naakyaraga abantu.
40014023	Obu yamazire kubaraga, yatemba orusozi ali wenka kubaza na Ruhanga. Obwire bwaira akyaliyo wenka,
40014024	baitu omu kasumi ako obwato bukaba buhikire omu nyanja hagati, nibuzongazonga habw'ebigonzi, habwokuba omuyaga gukaba gubaturukire omu maiso.
40014025	Ha nkoko y'okubanza, Yesu yaija nambere bali naarubatira ha maizi.
40014026	Abeegesebwa obu baamurozire naarubatira ha maizi baayekanga muno nibagamba bati: “Muzimu!” Baatoka habw'obutiini.
40014027	Ahonaaho Yesu yabahuumuza ati: “Muhuumule, ninyowe; mutatiina.”
40014028	Nukwo Petero kumugarukamu ati: “MUKAMA wange obu araaba ali iwe, ndagira nyije nambere oli nindubatira ha maizi.”
40014029	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Rugayo.” Nubwo Petero yarugire omu bwato, yarubatira ha maizi ahike hali Yesu;
40014030	baitu obu yarozire omuyaga gwaba mwingi, yatiina, yatandika kudikira omu maizi yayamirra ati: “MUKAMA wange, njuna!”
40014031	Ahonaaho Yesu yagorra omukono gwe, yamukwata naagamba ati: “Iwe ow'okwikiriza kuke, habwaki noogurukyagurukya?”
40014032	Obu baataahire omu bwato, omuyaga gwaculeera.
40014033	Abakaba bali omu bwato baamuramya nibagamba bati: “Mazimakwo oli Mwana wa Ruhanga.”
40014034	Obu baamazire kwambuka enyanja, baahika omu nsi ya Genesareeti.
40014035	Abantu ab'omu kiikaro eki obu baamumanyiriire, baatuma hoona hoona omu kicweka eki, baamuleetera boona abarwaire.
40014036	Baamwesengereza ngu, haakire abarwaire bakwate ha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye; kandi boona abaakwasireho bakakira.
40015001	Abafalisaayo n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro bakaruga Yerusaalemu baija hali Yesu baamukaguza bati:
40015002	“Habwaki abeegesebwa baawe batakuraatira migenzo y'abaisenkuruitwe? Bbo balya batabandize kunaaba omu ngaro.”
40015003	Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Habwaki na inywe mucwa Ekiragiro kya Ruhanga nimuhondera emigenzo yanyu inywenka?
40015004	Ningira Ruhanga akaragira ati: ‘Otiinege sso na nyoko’; kandi ati: ‘Weena araajumaga ise rundi nyina mazimakwo aitwege.’
40015005	Baitu inywe mugamba muti: ‘Omuntu kakuba agambira ise rundi nyina ati: Eki naakukuhaire, hati nkihongiire Ruhanga; ogu aba aganyirwe Ekiragiro ky'okutiina ise.’
40015006	Nahabweki habw'okuhondera emigenzo yanyu, nikyo mudibiza Ekiragiro kya Ruhanga.
40015007	Ngobya inywe! Isaaya akahikya obu yabarangireho naagamba ati:
40015008	‘Abantu banu bantamu ekitiinisa kya ha minwa, baitu emitima yabu tendoho;
40015009	bandamiza busa, nibeegesa ebyatairweho abantu ngu, niyo nyegesa ya Ruhanga’.”
40015010	Aho Yesu akeeta abantu kumwirra haihi, yabagambira ati: “Mumpurre kandi mwetegereze:
40015011	ekitaaha omu kanwa k'omuntu, tikiri nikyo ekimusiisa; baitu ekiruga omu kanwa, nikyo kimusiisa.”
40015012	Nubwo abeegesebwa baija bamugambira bati: “Omanyire Abafalisaayo nkooku babiihiirwe obu baahuliire orufumo obacweriire?”
40015013	Yesu yagarukamu ati: “Ekimera kyona Isenyowe ow'omu iguru eki atarabyaire, kiriihwa.
40015014	Mubaleke abo, beebembezi abafiire amaiso. Omufu w'amaiso obu ayebembera omufu w'amaiso mugenzi we, bombi bagwa omu kiina.”
40015015	Baitu Petero yamusaba ati: “Otusoborre amakuru g'orufumo runu'”
40015016	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Obu na inywe timukeetegeriize?
40015017	Timurukumanya ngu, ekintu kyona ekitaaha omu kanwa, kiraba omu nda, kandi kituruka aheeru?
40015018	Baitu ekireetwa omu kanwa kiba kirugire omu mutima; eki nikyo kisiisa omuntu.
40015019	Habwokuba omu mutima nuho haruga ebiteekerezo ebibi, obwisi, obusiihani, orwanju, obusuma, okuhangirra, n'okugeya.
40015020	Ebi nibyo bisiisa omuntu; baitu okulya otanaabire omu ngaro tikisiisa muntu.”
40015021	Yesu yarugayo, yagenda omunsi ya Taya na Sidooni.
40015022	Omukazi enzaarwa ya Kanaani, akaija naayamirra ati: “MUKAMA wange, Mwijukuru wa Daudi, ongirre embabazi; muhara wange akwasirwe omwoyo mubi, gumuli kubi muno.”
40015023	Baitu Yesu atamugarukemu kantu. Abeegesebwa be baija baamwesengereza bati: “Mubinge, naatutokerra.”
40015024	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nyowe ntatumwe handi kwihaho omu ntaama ezaabuzire ez'omu ruganda rwa Isirairi.”
40015025	Nubwo mukazi yaija yamuteereza amaju, naagamba ati: “MUKAMA wange, nkoonyera.”
40015026	Yesu yagarukamu ati: “Tikirukuhika kwaka abaana ebyokulya okabinagira embwa.”
40015027	Nandiki omukazi ati: “Ego, MUKAMA wange, baitu embwa nazo zirya oburagalika oburuga ha meeza ya mukama wazo.”
40015028	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Mukazi iwe, okwikiriza kwawe ka kwingi! Kikukolerwe nkooku orukugonza.” Ahonaaho muhara we yakira.
40015029	Yesu obu yarugire oku, yaraba ha musa gw'enyanja ya Galiraaya. Yatemba omu nsozi, yaikarayo.
40015030	Ebitebe bingi byaija nambere ali, baamuleetera abalema, abazingamire, abafu b'amaiso, abafu b'eminwa n'abandi baingi. Baabahikya omumaiso ge, yabakiza.
40015031	Abantu bakahunirra obu baarozire abafu b'eminwa nibabaza, abazingamire nibakira, abaramaire nibarubata, n'abafu b'amaiso nibarora; baahaisaniza Ruhanga wa Isirairi.
40015032	Yesu akeeta abeegesebwa be nambere ali yabagambira ati: “Abantu banu nibankwasa embabazi habwokuba baamazire na nyowe hanu ebiro bisatu bataina eki barukulya; tindukwenda kubaraga bakagenda njara, tibaikara kugwa ensazi omu muhanda.”
40015033	Abeegesebwa be baamukaguza bati: “Omwirungu munu turaiha nkaha emigaati eraamara kuliisa abantu abarukwingana aho?”
40015034	Yesu nukwo kubakaguza ati: “Mwinaho emigaati ingaha?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Musanju n'obucu buke.”
40015035	Aho yaragira ekitebe ky'abantu baikarre hansi,
40015036	yakwata emigaati musanju n'encu, obu yamazire kusiima, yabicwamu, yabiha abeegesebwa be, nabo baabigabira abantu.
40015037	Boona baalya, baiguta; nukwo abeegesebwa kusorooza oburagalika obwasigaireho, bwaijuza ebigega musanju.
40015038	Boona abaaliire baahikaga enkumi ina, otabaliiremu abakazi n'abaana.
40015039	Yesu yaraga abantu, yagwerra omu bwato, yagenda omu kicweka kya Magadani.
40016001	Abafalisaayo n'Abasadukaayo bakaija hali Yesu kumulenga nibamusaba abooleke akokurorraho akarukuruga omwiguru.
40016002	Yabagarukamu ati: “Omu bwire bwa rwebagyo mugamba muti: ‘Obwire buraaba burungi; habwokuba iguru niritukura.’
40016003	Nyenkya kara mugamba muti: ‘Harabaho enjura y'ekiyaga, habwokuba iguru niritukura kandi libiihire.’ Mumanyire kukenga iguru nkooku lirukusisana, baitu timusobora kukenga ebihuniriza eby'obusumi bunu obunyakuroho.
40016004	Abantu ab'obusinge obubi kandi obuhabire, nubo barukuserra ekihuniriza; baitu tibaliheebwa kihuniriza kwihaho kya Yona.” Nubwo yabarugireho, yagenda.
40016005	Abeegesebwa be obu baahikire nseeri y'enyanja, baarora nkooku beeberwe kutwara emigaati.
40016006	Yesu yabagambira ati: “Mwerinde kandi mwegendereze ekitumbisa ky'Abafalisaayo n'Abasadukaayo.”
40016007	Baatandika kukaguzangana bati: “Ekirukumugambisa kiti, habwokuba titwina migaati.”
40016008	Yesu obu yayetegeriize eki, nubwo yabagambiire ati: “Inywe ab'okwikiriza okuke! Eby'okutaba n'emigaati nimukibalizaho ki?
40016009	Timukeetegeriize? Timurukwijuka nkooku naliisize abantu enkumi itaano emigaati etaano yonka? Mukasorooza ebigega bingaha eby'oburagalika?
40016010	Rundi obu naaliisize abantu enkumi ina n'emigaati musanju, mukasorooza ebigega bingaha?
40016011	Habwaki mulemerwe kwetegereza nkooku ntabagambire ha by'emigaati? Mwerinde nu ekitumbisa ky'Abafalisaayo n'Abasadukaayo.”
40016012	Nubwo baayetegeriize nkooku atabagambire okwerinda ekitumbisa ky'Emigaati, baitu okwerinda enyegesa y'Abafalisaayo n'Abasadukaayo.
40016013	Yesu yahika omu kicweka kya Kaisaariya orwa Filipi, yakaguza abeegesebwa be ati: “Omwana w'omuntu abantu bamweta bata?”
40016014	Baamugarukamu bati: “Abamu bagamba ngu: Nuwe Yohaana Omubatiza; abandi ngu: Nuwe Eriya; abandi ngu: Nuwe Yeremiya rundi omu hali abarangi.”
40016015	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Baitu inywe munyeta muta?”
40016016	Simooni Petero yamugarukamu ati: “Niiwe Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga Atafa.”
40016017	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Oli w'omugisa Simooni, mutabani wa Yona, habwokuba amazima ganu togamanyisiibwe muntu kwonka, baitu ogasuukuliirwe Isenyowe anyakuli omu iguru.
40016018	Kandi ninkugambira nti: Niiwe Petero, kandi ha mwandara gunu nuho ndyombeka ekitebe ky'abeeserwe bange, n'amaani g'okuzima tigalikisingura.
40016019	Ndikuha ebisumuruzo by'obukama bw'omu iguru. Kyona kyona eki oliboha omu nsi, kiribohwa n'omu iguru; kandi kyona eki olisumurra omu nsi, kirisumururwa n'omu iguru.”
40016020	Nubwo yateererra muno abeegesebwa be kutagambiraho muntu n'omu nkooku ali Kristo.
40016021	Okuruga obu Yesu yatandika kumanyisa abeegesebwa be nkooku ali w'okugenda Yerusaalemu kubonabonesibwa muno bakuru b'abantu, abanyakatagara abakuru, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro; n'okwitwa kandi ahumbuurwe haahingwireho ebiro bisatu.
40016022	Petero yamugarra ha rubaju, yatandika kumuhana ati: “MUKAMA wange, eki nikikafuuhe! Tikirukwija kukubaho.”
40016023	Baitu Yesu yahinduka, yagambira Petero ati: “Ngaruka enyuma iwe Sitaani! Onfookiire muhingo, habwokuba ebi orukuteekereza tibiri bya Ruhanga, baitu by'abantu.”
40016024	Nubwo Yesu yagambiire abeegesebwa be ati: “Weena anyakugonza kumpondera, ayehwemu wenka, ahimbe omusaraba gwe, ampondere.
40016025	Weena anyakutaatira obwomeezi bwe, alibufeerwa; kandi weena anyakuhayo obwomeezi bwe habwange, alibutunga.
40016026	Omuntu kirimugasira ki okulya ensi yoona, baitu akafeerwa obwomeezi bwe? Rundi kintu ki omuntu eki alihayo kucungura obwomeezi bwe?
40016027	Omwana w'omuntu aliija n'abamalaika be omu kitiinisa kya Ise, nubwo alisasura buli muntu naasigikira ha bikorwa bye.
40016028	Mali mali nimbagambira nti: Haroho abeemeriire hanu abatalihikwaho rufu batakarozire Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu bukama bwe.”
40017001	Obu haahingwireho ebiro mukaaga, Yesu yatwara Petero, Yakobbo na Yohaana mugenzi we, yabatembya ha rusozi oruraihire bali bonka.
40017002	Yahinduka omumaiso gaabo, amaiso ge gaayangasana nk'izooba, n'ebijwaro bye byayera tiitiiti.
40017003	Nubwo Musa na Eriya baazooka nibabaza nawe.
40017004	Petero yagambire Yesu ati; “MUKAMA wange, kibaire kirungi itwe kusangwa hanu; obu oraaba nogonza, kanyombeke hanu obusiisira busatu: akamu kaawe, akandi ka Musa, n'akandi ka Eriya.”
40017005	Obu akaba naakyabaza, haija ekicu ekirukwangasana, kyabasiikiriza; kandi iraka lyaruga omu kicu, nirigamba liti: “Onu nuwe Mwana wange omugonzibwa ou nsiima; mumuhurre.”
40017006	Abeegesebwa obu baahuliire eki, baagwa bajuumaire, bakwasirwe obutiini bwingi.
40017007	Yesu yaija yabakwataho naagamba ati: “Mwimuke, muleke kutiina,”
40017008	Obu bainunwire amaiso gaabo, batarole muntu, kwihaho Yesu wenka.
40017009	Obu bakaba nibasirimuka orusozi, Yesu yabateererra ati: “Eki mwolekerwe, mutakigambiraho muntu weena, okuhikya Omwana w'omuntu obu alikamara kuhumbuuka omu bafu.”
40017010	Abeegesebwa be nukwo kumukaguza bati: “Habwaki abeegesa b'ebiragiro bagamba ngu: Eriya nuwe alibanza kwija?”
40017011	Yabagarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo Eriya nuwe alibanza kwija, nukwo atereekereze byona.
40017012	Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Eriya akaija ira, abantu batamumanye, baitu bakamukora kyona eki baagondeze. Omwana w'omuntu nawe nukwo balimubonabonesa bati.”
40017013	Aho nuho abeegesebwa be baayetegereriize nkooku arukubagambira ebyo Yohaana Omubatiza.
40017014	Obu baahikire ha kitebe ky'abantu, omusaija akaija yamutereza amaju, naagamba ati:
40017015	“MUKAMA wange, girra mutabani wange embabazi, habwokuba agwa ensimbo kandi zimubonabonesa muno; emirundi nyingi zimunaga omu murro n'omu maizi.
40017016	Nkamuleetera abeegesebwa baawe, baitu batasobole kumukiza.”
40017017	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Haa! Inywe ab'akasumi kanu ak'obutaikiriza kandi abahabire, ndihikya nkaha okwikara na inywe nti? Ndibagumiisiriza kuhikya di? Mumundeetere hanu.”
40017018	Yesu yacoomera omwoyo omubi, gwamurugamu, omwojo yakira ahonaaho.
40017019	Ebi obu byahoire nubwo abeegesebwa baizire hali Yesu baamukaguza omu nsita bati: “Habwaki itwe tukalemwa kugubinga?”
40017020	Uwe yabagarukamu ati: Habw'okwikiriza kwanyu okuke. Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Obu muraaba mwina okwikiriza okurukwingana nk'akasigo ka karadaali, muligambira orusozi oru muti: “Sinduka hanu, ogende hali' kandi rulirugaho; busaho kintu kyona ekiribalema.” (
40017021	Omwoyo omubi ogwa mulingo gunu tigubingwa kindi, kwihaho okusaba n'okusiiba.)
40017022	Yesu n'abeegesebwa be obu bakaba bakyali Galiraaya, nubwo yabagambiire ati: “Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abantu,
40017023	balimwita, kandi obu halihinguraho ebiro bisatu alihumbuurwa.” Aho bbo baatuntura muno.
40017024	Obu baahikire Kafaranaumu, abasorooza b'omusoro gw'Enju ya Ruhanga baizira Petero baamukaguza bati: “Omwegesa wanyu taha musoro?”
40017025	Yabagarukamu ati: “Aguha.” Petero obu yataahire omu ka, Yesu yabanza kumukaguza ati: “Simooni nooteekereza ki? Abakama ab'omunsi, omusoro n'obusuuru babiihaho bantu ki? Babiihaho abaana baabo rundi abantu abandi?”
40017026	Petero obu yamugarukiremu ati: “Abantu abandi”, nubwo Yesu yamugambira ati: “Nahabweki abaana baabu, ebi tibirukubakwataho.
40017027	Baitu habw'okutabeesiitaza, genda ha nyanja, onagemu irobo, encu ei orabanza kukwasa, ogiihemu; obu orayesamya akanwa kaayo, orasangamu sente; ogibasasule, gube musoro gwange n'ogwawe.” ky'efeeza ekirukwingana siringi nka ina.
40018001	Omu kasumi ako, abeegesebwa bakaija hali Yesu baamukaguza bati: “Arukukira obukuru omu bukama bw'omu iguru, nooha?”
40018002	Yesu yayeta omwana omuto, yamwemereza hagati yabu,
40018003	yagamba ati: “Mazima nimbagambira nti: Obu mutalihinduka, mukaba nk'abaana abato, timulitaaha omu bukama bw'omwiguru.
40018004	Weena anyakwebundaaza nk'omwana omuto onu, nuwe arukukira obukuru omu bukama bw'omwiguru.”
40018005	“Weena anyakujwahukirra omwana omuto nk'onu omu ibara lyange, buli ajwahukiriire nyowe.
40018006	Baitu weena alyesiitaza omu ha baana abato banu abarukunyikiriza, haakire abohwe omu bikya orubengo, anagwe omu nziha y'enyanja.
40018007	“Ensi erikibona habw'ebyesiitazo! Mazima ebyesiitazo tibiri by'okuburaho, baitu alikibona ogu anyakubireeta!
40018008	Kakuba omukono gwawe rundi okuguru kwawe bikuleetereza kusiisa, bitemeho obinage hara; haakire otaahe omu bwomeezi oramaire rundi ogookere, kukira kunagwa omu murro ogutahwaho oina emikono ebiri rundi amaguru abiri.
40018009	Kandi eriiso lyawe obu liraaba nirikuleetereza kusiisa, liihemu, olinage hara; haakire otaahe omu bwomeezi oina eriiso limu, okukira kunagwa omu murro ogutaraara oina amaiso abiri.
40018010	“Mwerinde, muleke kugaya omu ha bato banu, habwokuba nimbagambira nti: Omwiguru bamalaika baabo baikara nibarora amaiso ga Isenyowe anyakuli omu iguru. (
40018011	Ningira Omwana w'omuntu akaija kugarra ekyabuzire.)”
40018012	Nimuteekereza muta? Omuntu kakuba aba aina entaama kikumi, emu hali zo ekabura, tasiga kyenda na mwenda ha nsozi akagenda kuserra enyakubuzire?
40018013	Kakuba agizoora, mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: “Agisemererwa okukira ziri kyenda na mwenda ezitarabuzire.
40018014	Na Isenyowe ow'omu iguru nukwo atagonza omu ha bato abo ahwerekerre.”
40018015	“Mugenzi waawe obu araakusiisiraga, genda omugambire eki asobeze muli inywenka. Kakuba akuhuliriza, buli mugenzi waawe omwegaruliire.
40018016	Baitu kakuba atakuhuliriza, genda n'omuntu omu rundi babiri, nukwo kyona eki muraagamba kigumibwe baakaiso babiri rundi basatu.
40018017	Kakuba ayanga kubahuliriza, kigambire ekitebe ky'abaikiriza; kandi kakuba nabo ayanga kubahuliriza, omusisanize Omunyaihanga rundi omusorooza w'omusoro.
40018018	“Mazima nimbagambira nti: Kyona kyona eki muliboha omunsi, kiribohwa n'omwiguru; kandi kyona eki mulisumurra omunsi, kirisumururwa n'omwiguru.
40018019	Ninyongera kubagambira nti: Kakuba babiri hali inywe muraikirraniza omunsi ha kintu kyona eki murukusaba, Isenyowe ow'omwiguru alikibaha.
40018020	Nambere ababiri rundi abasatu beesorooleza omu ibara lyange, ndaabaga hagati yabo.”
40018021	Nubwo Petero yaizire yamukaguza ati: “Waitu, mugenzi wange obu aransiisiraga, ndamuganyiraga emirundi ingaha? Okuhika emirundi musanju?”
40018022	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Tindukukugambira ngu okuhika emirundi musanju; baitu ohikyege nsanju emirundi musanju.”
40018023	“Nahabweki obukama bw'omu iguru nibulengesanizibwa nk'omukama ayagondeze abaheereza be bamubarre ebintu bye.
40018024	Obu yatandikire kubara nabo, baamuleetera omu anyakwina ibanja lye ly'obukaikuru bwa siringi;
40018025	kandi habw'okutasobora kusasura, mukama we yaragira kumutunda hamu na mukazi we, n'abaana be, na byona ebi akaba ainabyo, nukwo amale ibanja.
40018026	Omuheereza yateeza amaju yamwesengereza ati; ‘Mukama wange, ngumiisiriza, ndaakusasura zoona.’
40018027	Mukama we yamugirra embabazi, yamulekera, kandi yamuganyira ibanja eri.
40018028	“Baitu omuheereza ogu obu yaturukire aheeru, yatangaana omu ha baheereza bataahi be, ow'akaba amuliireho ibanja erya sente nke muno; yamukwata, yamuniga naagamba ati: ‘Nsasura.’
40018029	Omuheereza mutaahi we yagwa hansi, yamwesengereza ati: ‘Ngumiisiriza, ndaakusasura.’
40018030	Baitu uwe yayanga, yagenda yamuta omu nkomo okuhika obu alikamara ibanja.
40018031	Abaheereza bataahi be obu baarozire ebibaireho, baasaalirwa muno, baagenda baagambira mukama wabu byona ebibaireho.
40018032	Nubwo mukama we yamweta yamugambira ati: ‘Iwe omuheereza omubi! Nkuganyiirege ibanja eri lyona habw'okunyesengereza;
40018033	na iwe tokuganyiire omuheereza mutaahi waawe, nkooku nyowe nkuganyiire?’
40018034	Mukama we yabiihirwa, yamukwasa abalinzi b'enkomo okuhika obu alikasasura ibanja lyona.
40018035	Isenyowe ow'omu iguru nukwo alibakora ati, obu muraaba mutarukuganyirangana n'omutima gumu.”
40019001	Yesu obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yaruga Galiraaya yagenda omu kicweka kya Buyudaaya nseeri y'ekisaaru Yorudaani;
40019002	ebitebe by'abantu baingi byamuhonderayo, yabakiza endwara.
40019003	Abafalisaayo baija nambere ali, baamulenga nibamukaguza bati: “Ebiragiro bya Musa nibiikiriza omusaija kubinga mukazi we naamujunaana ensonga yoona?”
40019004	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Timukasomaga ngu, Ogu ayabahangire kuruga omu kubanza, akahanga omusaija n'omukazi?
40019005	Yayongera ati: ‘Nikyo omusaija araalekeraga ise na nyina agumire hali mukazi we, kandi ababiri abo bafooke mubiri gumu.’
40019006	Nahabweki baba batakyali babiri, baitu omu Ruhanga eki yateeraniize, hatalibaho muntu akyahukaniza.”
40019007	Abafalisaayo baagaruka baamukaguza bati: “Kandi habwaki Musa yaikiriize omuntu kuha mukazi we ebbaruha y'okwahukana, nukwo amubinge?”
40019008	Yabagarukamu ati: “Habw'okugumangana kw'emitima yanyu nikyo Musa yabaikiriize okubinga bakazi banyu, baitu okuruga kara koona kikaba kitalikwo.
40019009	Kandi nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena anyakubinga mukazi we atamutuzire obusiihani, akaswera ondi, buli asiihaine; kandi weena aliswera omukazi anyakubingirwe, buli nawe asiihaine.”
40019010	Abeegesebwa be baamugambira bati: “Eby'omusaija n'omukazi obu biraaba biri biti, haakire omuntu okutaswera.”
40019011	Baitu uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Tibali boona abasobora kuhondera eki ngambire, kwihaho abo bonka Ruhanga aba akihaire.
40019012	Habwokuba haroho abakonwa abaazairwe kwo, kandi haroho abaakonerwe abantu, kandi haroho abaayekonere bonka habw'obukama bw'omwiguru. Arukusobora kukwata kinu, akikwate.”
40019013	Nubwo baamuleetiire abaana abato abakwateho, abasabire. Abeegesebwa be baacoomera ababalesire;
40019014	baitu Yesu yabagambira ati: “Muleke abaana bato baije nambere ndi, mutabatanga; habwokuba abali nk'abo, obukama bw'omwiguru bwabo.”
40019015	Nubwo yabataho emikono, yarugayo.
40019016	Omuntu akaija hali Yesu, yamukaguza ati: “Mwegesa, kikorwa ki ekirungi eki nsemeriire kukora, nukwo ntunge obwomeezi obutahwaho?”
40019017	Yamugarukamu ati: “Nonkaguliza ki ha kintu ekirungi? Haroho omurungi omu wenka. Obu oraaba noogonza kutaaha omu bwomeezi, okwatege Ebiragiro.”
40019018	Uwe yamukaguza ati: “Biragiro ki?” Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Otaliita. Otalisiihana. Otaliiba. Otalihangirra.
40019019	Otiinege sso na nyoko. Ogonzeege mutaahi wawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.”
40019020	Omusigazi ogu yamugarukamu ati: “Ebi byona nkabikwata, ninkuyaburwaho kiha?”
40019021	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Obu oraaba noogonza kuhikirra, genda otunde ebyawe byona, sente eziraarugamu ozigabire abaseege, nubwo olitunga itungo omwiguru; nukwo oije onkuraatire.”
40019022	Omusigazi obu yahuliire eki, yagenda agwerirwe, habwokuba akaba aina itungo lingi.
40019023	Yesu yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Ka nikiremeera omuguuda kutaaha omu bukama bw'omwiguru.
40019024	Ninyongera kubagambira nti: Nikirahuka engamiya kuraba omu nyindo y'enkinzo, kukira omuguuda kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.”
40019025	Abeegesebwa be obu baahuliire kinu, baahunirra muno, baagamba bati: “Mara nooha alisobora kujunwa?”
40019026	Baitu Yesu yabarolerra naabagambira ati: “Kinu abantu tibarukukisobora, baitu Ruhanga naasobora byona.”
40019027	Nubwo Petero yamukaguza ati: “Dora itwe tukasiga byona twakuhondera; obu, tulitunga ki?”
40019028	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Omu bwomeezi oburukwija, Omwana w'omuntu obu aliikarra ha kitebe kye eky'ekitiinisa, na inywe abampondiire mulikarra ha bitebe ikumi na bibiri, mucwere emisango enganda ikumi na ibiri eza Isirairi.
40019029	Omuntu weena ayasigire amaju ge, rundi bagenzi be, rundi banyaanya, rundi ise, rundi nyina, rundi abaana be, rundi ebibanja bye habwange, aliheebwa emirundi kikumi, kandi atunge n'obwomeezi obutahwaho.
40019030	Baitu baingi ab'okubanza baliba b'enyuma, kandi ab'enyuma baliba b'okubanza.”
40020001	“Obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisana nyineeka ayazindukire nyenkya kara kugulirra abakozi b'okulima omu rugonjo rwe rw'emizaabbibbu.
40020002	Obu yamazire kwikirraniza nabo empeera y'ekiro kimu, yaboohereza omu rugonjo rwe orw'emizaabbibbu.
40020003	Obu yaturukire nka ha saaha isatu, yarora abandi beemeriire omu katale bataina eki barukukora;
40020004	yabagambira ati: ‘Na inywe mugende omu rugonjo rwange mukole, ninyija kubaha ekibasemeriire.’ Baagenda.
40020005	Yayongera yaturuka nka ha saaha mukaaga na ha saaha mwenda, nabwo yakora ati.
40020006	Kandi ha saaha ikumi n'emu yaturuka aheeru, yasanga abandi beemeriire, yabakaguza ati: ‘Habwaki musiibire hanu ekiro kyona mutaina eki murukukora?’
40020007	Baamugarukamu bati: ‘Habwokuba busaho muntu atwesire.’ Yabagambira ati: ‘Na inywe mugende omu rugonjo rwange mukole.’
40020008	“Izooba obu lyagoroobere, mukama w'orugonjo rw'emizaabbibbu yagambira omukeeto we ati: ‘Yeta abakozi, obahe empeera yabo, obandize ha b'enyuma, omalirirre ha b'okubanza.’
40020009	Abaatandikire ha saaha nka ikumi n'emu obu baizire, buli omu yatunga empeera y'ekiro kimu.
40020010	Ab'okubanza obu baizire, baanihira ngu nibaija kusasurwa kukiraho; baitu buli omu omuli bo nawe akasasurwa empeera y'ekiro kimu.
40020011	Obu bakaba nibakyagiheebwa, baahyemera nyineeka,
40020012	nibakaguza bati: ‘Abaizire hanyuma bakozire esaaha emu yonka, kandi obainganiize na itwe abakozire ekiro kyona tutiirwe n'omusana?’
40020013	Uwe yagarukamu omu hali bo ati: ‘Mugenzi wange, tinkukozire kubi. Tituragainege empeera y'ekiro kimu?
40020014	Twara eyawe, ogende; ngondeze kusasura owa hanyuma nkooku nkusaswire.
40020015	Haroho arukuntanga kukozesa ebyange nkooku ndukugonza? Rundi nondora eriiso libi habw'obwenda bwange?’
40020016	Nahabweki ab'enyuma baliba b'okubanza, kandi ab'okubanza baliba b'enyuma.”
40020017	Yesu obu akaba naagenda Yerusaalemu, akagarra abeegesebwa be ikumi na babiri ha rubaju. Obu bakaba nibakyagenda yabagambira ati:
40020018	“Hati nu, nitugenda Yerusaalemu; Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo hali abanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, balimucwera omusango gw'okumwita,
40020019	kandi balimuhayo hali Abanyamahanga kumusekeereza, okumuteera enkoba, n'okumubamba ha musaraba; baitu alihumburwa hahingwireho ebiro bisatu.”
40020020	Nubwo nyina batabani ba Zebedaayo yaija nabo hali Yesu, yateeza amaju omumaiso ge aina eki arukumusaba.
40020021	Yesu yamukaguza ati: “Noyenda ki?” Yamugarukamu ati: “Ikiriza abaana bange banu baikarre, omu ha mukono gwawe ogw'obulyo ondi ha gw'emoso omu bukama bwawe.”
40020022	Baitu Yesu yagarukamu ati: “Timurukumanya eki murukusaba. Nimusobora kubagana ha mabone aga ndukwija kubonabona?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Nitusobora.”
40020023	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Amabone aga ndukwija kubonabona na inywe muligabona, baitu okwikarra ha mukono gwange ogw'obulyo n'ogw'emoso, tali nyowe arukukigaba, baitu ky'abo aba kiteekaniriziibwe Isenyowe.”
40020024	Kandi ikumi obu baahuliire eki, babiihirirwa banyineemu abo ababiri.
40020025	Baitu Yesu yayeta boona, yabagambira ati: “Mumanyire abalemi b'Abanyamahanga nkooku babalemesa itwale, kandi n'abakuru baabo nkooku babaragiza obusobozi.
40020026	Tikiriba kiti omuli inywe; baitu arukwenda kuba mukuru omuli inywe, naasemerra kuba muheereza wanyu;
40020027	kandi arukwenda kuba w'okubanza omuli inywe, naasemerra kuba muheereza wanyu,
40020028	nkooku Omwana w'omuntu ataraiziire kuheerezibwa baitu okuheereza, n'okuhayo obwomeezi bwe okucungura baingi.”
40020029	Obu bakaba nibaruga Yeriko, ekitebe kikooto ky'abantu kyahondera Yesu.
40020030	Kandi abafu b'amaiso babiri abakaba baikaliire ha muhanda rubaju, obu baahuliire ngu, Yesu naahingura, baayamirra nibagamba bati: “Omwana wa Daudi, tugirre embabazi!”
40020031	Ekitebe ky'abantu kyabacoomera nikibaigaliriza ngu baculeere; baitu bbo baatokera haiguru okukiraho bati: “Waitu, Omwana wa Daudi, tugirre embabazi!”
40020032	Yesu yayemerra, yabeeta, yabakaguza ati: “Nimugonza mbakorre ki?”
40020033	Baamugarukamu bati: “Waitu, nitugonza amaiso gaitu gaiguke.”
40020034	Yesu yabakwatirwa embabazi, yabakora ha maiso, ahonaaho baarora, kandi baamuhondera.
40021001	Obu bairiire haihi na Yerusaalemu, baahika Betifage, ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva. Nubwo Yesu yatumire babiri ha beegesebwa be,
40021002	naabagambira ati: “Mugende omu kyaro eki muroleriire, nimwija kusangayo endogoyi esibikirwe, ina omwana gwayo; muzisibule, muzindeetere.
40021003	Obu haraabaho omuntu arukubakaguza, mumugarukemu muti: ‘Mukama waitu naazeetaaga’; naija kuzigarra bwango.”
40021004	Kinu kikabaho kuhikiriza ekyagambirwe omurangi ati:
40021005	“Mugambire abantu ba Siyoni muti: Dora, omukama waawe naija nambere oli, ayebundaize, atembere endogoyi, endogoyi ento, omwana gw'endogoyi.”
40021006	Abeegesebwa baagenda, baakora nkooku Yesu yabaragiriire;
40021007	baaleeta endogoyi n'omwana gwayo, baazitaho ebijwaro byabo, Yesu yaikarraho.
40021008	Abantu baingi baayarra ebijwaro byabo omu muhanda, abandi baacwa amataagi g'emiti, baagarra omu muhanda.
40021009	Ebitebe by'abantu ebikaba bimwebembiire n'ebyamukuraatiire baakatoka nibagamba bati: “Hangiriza Omwana wa Daudi! Ahaisanizibwe arukwija omu ibara lya Atahwaho! Hangiriza anyakusinga haiguru muno!”
40021010	Obu yataahire Yerusaalemu, orubuga rwona rwayooka, abantu baakaguzangana bati: “Ogu nooha?”
40021011	Ebitebe by'abantu baagarukamu nibagamba bati: “Onu nuwe Yesu, omurangi anyakurugire Nazareeti orwa Galiraaya.”
40021012	Yesu akataaha omu Nju ya Ruhanga, yatandika kubinga boona abakaba nibatundiramu n'abakaba nibagurramu, yajuumika emeeza ez'abakaba nibahingisa sente, n'entebe z'abo abakaba nibatunda amaiba.
40021013	Yabagambira ati: “Kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Enju yange eraayetwaga nju y'okusabiramu’; baitu inywe mugifoire bwingira bw'abanyagi.”
40021014	Abafu b'amaiso n'abalema baija nambere ali omu Nju ya Ruhanga, yabakiza.
40021015	Baanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro obu baarozire ebyamahano ebi yakozire, kandi n'abaana nibatokera omu Nju ya Ruhanga bati: “Hangiriza Omwana wa Daudi!” baabiihirwa muno;
40021016	baamukaguza bati: “Noohurra abo ebi barukugamba?” Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Ego, mbihuliire; inywe timukasomaga muti: ‘Omu kanwa k'abaana abato n'enkerembe numwo watungire okukugizibwa okuhikire?’ ”
40021017	Nubwo yabarugireho, yaturuka orubuga, yagenda Betaniya kugonyayo.
40021018	Nyenkya, Yesu obu akaba naagaruka omu rubuga, yarumwa enjara.
40021019	Obu yarozire omuti omutini ha muhanda rubaju, yaguhikaho, baitu tiyasangaho kantu okwihaho ebikoora byonka. Yagugambira ati: “Otaligarukira kwana ebijuma ebiro byona!” Ahonaaho omutini ogu gwahotoka.
40021020	Abeegesebwa be obu baakirozire baahunirra muno, nibagamba bati: “Omutini gunu gwahotoka guta bwango?”
40021021	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Obu muraaba mwina okwikiriza mutarukugurukyagurukya, timulikora nk'ekyakorwa ha muti gunu kyonka, baitu noobu muligambira orusozi oru muti: ‘Sinduka ogwe omu nyanja’, nukwo kiriba.
40021022	Obu muraaba mwina okwikiriza, kyona eki muraasabaga nimwesengereza, muraakiheebwaga.”
40021023	Yesu obu yataahire omunju ya Ruhanga, banyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu baija nambere ali nakyayegesa, baamukaguza bati: “Busobozi ki oburukukukoza binu, kandi okabuheebwa oha?”
40021024	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Na nyowe ka mbakaguze ekikaguzo kinu; obu murangarukamu, nubwo ndabagambira obusobozi oburukunkoza binu.
40021025	Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaruga nkaha? Kukaruga hali Ruhanga rundi omu bantu?” Bbo baatandika kuhakanizangana bati: “Obu turaagamba ngu: ‘Kukaruga hali Ruhanga’, naija kutukaguza ati: ‘Habwaki mutaramwikiriize?’
40021026	Baitu obu turaagamba ngu: ‘Kukaruga omu bantu’, nitutiina ekitebe ky'abantu, habwokuba boona bananukire Yohaana nkooku akaba ali murangi.”
40021027	Nukwo baagarukamu Yesu bati: “Titumanyire.” Uwe yabagambira ati: “Na nyowe tindukwija kubagambira obusobozi oburukunkoza binu.”
40021028	“Nimuteekereza muta? Omusaija akaba aina abatabani be babiri; akagenda yagambira omukuru ati: ‘Mwana wange, hati genda okole omu rugonjo rw'emizaabbibbu.’
40021029	Omwana yamugarukamu ati: ‘Tindukugyayo’, baitu hanyuma yayegarukamu, yagenda.
40021030	Isebo yagenda hali omuto yamugambira nk'ebi yagambiire omukuru. Nandiki uwe ati: ‘Ego taata,’ ka ngende; baitu tiyagyayo.
40021031	Hali abo ababiri, nooha ayakozire ise eki akaba naagonza?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Omukuru.” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abasorooza b'omusoro n'abamalaaya nibaija kubabanza kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
40021032	Habwokuba Yohaana Omubatiza akaija hali inywe naabooleka omuhanda ogu musemeriire kurabamu, mutamwikirize; baitu abasorooza b'omusoro n'abamalaaya bbo bakamwikiriza. Inywe noobu mwarozire eki, nabwo muteegarukemu mukamwikiriza.”
40021033	Yesu yabagambira ati: “Muhurre oruganikyo orundi. Hakaba haroho nyineeka ayabyaire orugonjo rw'emizaabbibbu, yaruzitirra, yalimamu endeeba, yayombekamu endindiro, yarusigira abapangisa, yagenda omu ihanga erindi.
40021034	Obusumi bw'okunoga emizaabbibbu obu bwahikire, yatuma abaheereza be hali abapangisa abo, bamutwekere ha bijuma by'emizaabbibbu ye;
40021035	abapangisa baakwata abaheereza be, omu baamuteera, owa kabiri baamwita, owa kasatu baamuteera amabaale.
40021036	Yagaruka yatumayo abaheereza abandi baingi okukiraho ab'okubanza; nabo nukwo baabakozire.
40021037	Hanyuma yabatumira mutabani we naateekereza ati: ‘Omwana wange baraamugayuka.’
40021038	Baitu abapangisa abo obu baarozire omutabani, baagambirangana bati: ‘Onu nuwe mugwetwa, leka tumwite, obugwetwa bube bwaitu.’
40021039	Baamukwata, baamuturukya aheeru y'orugonjo, baamwita.
40021040	Boojo, mukama w'orugonjo obu aliija, abapangisa abo alibakoraki?”
40021041	Baamugarukamu bati: “Abapangisa abo ababi alibahwerekereza, bafe kubi, kandi orugonjo rwe arukwase abakozi abandi abaraamuha ebijuma omu kasumi kaabyo.”
40021042	Yesu yabagambira ati: “Timukasomaga Ekyahandiikirwe ekirukugamba kiti: ‘Ibaale lyonyini aboombeki eri baayangire niryo lyafookere bugumizo bw'enju; kinu nikyo Ruhanga yakozire, kandi nituhunirra kukirora’?
40021043	Nahabweki nimbagambira nti: Obukama bwa Ruhanga bulibaihwaho buheebwe ihanga erirukukora ebikorwa ebirungi. [
40021044	Omuntu weena anyakugwa ha ibaale eri, alicwacwanuka; baitu ibaale ou lirigwera, lirimusasangura.]”
40021045	Baanyakatagara abakuru n'Abafalisaayo obu baahuliire enganikyo ze, baamanya nkooku bali nubo arukugambaho.
40021046	Baitu obu baagondeze kumukwata, baatiina enkuyanja y'abantu, habwokuba baamwetaga murangi.
40022001	Yesu yayongera kubaganikiza oruganikyo orundi ati:
40022002	“Obukama bw'omwiguru nibulengesanizibwa nk'omukama ayakoliire mutabani we obugenyi bw'okuswera.
40022003	Yatuma abaheereza be kweta abo abakaba baraaliziibwe kwija ha bugenyi; baitu bbo batagonze kwija.
40022004	Yagaruka yatuma abaheereza abandi naagamba ati: ‘Mugende mugambire abo abaraaliziibwe muti: Nteekaniize obugenyi bwange, nyisire enimi y'esajwa, kandi nteekaniize buli kintu, mwije mutaahe obugenyi.’
40022005	Baitu abagenyi abaraaliziibwe batakifeeho, baayegendera, omu yagenda ha musiri gwe, ondi omu busubuzi bwe,
40022006	abasigaireho baakwata abaheereza be, baabaswaza, baabaita.
40022007	Omukama yabiihirwa muno, yatuma amahe ge, gaahwerekereza abaisi abo, gaayokya n'orubuga rwabo.
40022008	Nubwo yagambiire abaheereza be ati: ‘Obugenyi buteekaniziibwe, baitu abaraaliziibwe tibabusemeriire.
40022009	Hati nu, mugende omu ntangatangano z'emihanda, abantu baingi aba muraasangayo mubeete, baije ha bugenyi.’
40022010	Abaheereza baagenda omu mihanda, baasorooza boona abaakasangirweyo, ababi n'abarungi; enju yaijura abagenyi.
40022011	“Baitu omukama obu yaizire kurora abagenyi, yasangamu omusaija atajwaire kijwaro ky'obugenyi;

40022013	Nubwo omukama yaragiire abaheereza be ati: ‘Mumubohe emikono n'amaguru, mumunage aheeru omu mwirima nambere abantu baliririrra kandi banene ensaya.’
40022014	Habwokuba abeetwa baingi, baitu abakomwamu bake.”
40022015	Abafalisaayo baagenda, baahanuura nkooku baraatega Yesu omu bigambo.
40022016	Baamutumaho abeegesebwa baabo hamu n'ab'ekitebe kya Herode, baamugambira bati: “Mwegesa, tumanyire nkooku oli w'amazima, oyegesa omuhanda gwa Ruhanga omu mazima otaina n'omu ou orukutiina kandi tororra ha kitiinisa ky'abantu.
40022017	Tugambire eki orukuteekereza. Kihikire kuha Kaisaali omusoro, rundi nangwa?”
40022018	Baitu Yesu yakenga obugobya bwabo, yagamba ati: “Nimuntegera ki, bagobya inywe?
40022019	Munyoleke siringi ei muha omusoro.” Baamuleetera siringi.
40022020	Yesu yabakaguza ati: “Ekisisani kinu n'ebihandiikirweho by'oha?”
40022021	Baamugarukamu bati: “Bya Kaisaali.” Yesu yabagambira ati: “Ebya Kaisaali mubihe Kaisaali, n'ebya Ruhanga mubihe Ruhanga.”
40022022	Obu bahuliire eki, baahunirra, baamurugaho, baagenda.
40022023	Ha kiro eki, Abasadukaayo abagamba ngu, tiharoho okuhumbuuka kw'abafu, bakaija hali Yesu baamukaguza bati:
40022024	“Mwegesa, Musa akagamba ati: ‘Kakuba omuntu afa atazaire baana, mugenzi we aswere omufaakati ogu, nukwo bazaare kifa abaana.’
40022025	Owaitu oku, hakaba haliyo banyineemu musanju: Mukuru waabo akaswera omukazi, baitu yafa atakamuzaireho baana, yamugwetera mugenzi we.
40022026	Owa kabiri n'owa kasatu nabo nukwo bati, okuhikiza kimu ha wa musanju, boona batazaale.
40022027	Abo boona obu baahoireho omukazi nawe yafa.
40022028	Ha kuhumbuuka kw'abafu, omukazi ogu aliba muk'oha hali abo omusanju? Habwokuba boona bakamuswera.”
40022029	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Muhabire habw'okutamanya ebyahandiikirwe noobu bwakuba obusobozi bwa Ruhanga.
40022030	Habwokuba ha kuhumbuuka, tibaliswera kandi tibaliswerwa, baitu baliba bali nk'abamalaika omwiguru.
40022031	Kandi ha by'okuhumbuuka kw'abafu, timukasomaga Ruhanga eki yabagambiire ati:
40022032	‘Ninyowe Ruhanga owa Abburahamu, Ruhanga wa Isaaka, kandi Ruhanga wa Yakobbo?’ Tali Ruhanga w'abafiire, baitu w'aboomeezi.”
40022033	Abantu obu baahuliire eki, baahunirra habw'okwegesa kwe.
40022034	Baitu Abafalisaayo obu baahuliire Yesu nkooku aculiize Abasadukaayo abatiire ibumbakanwa, baayesorooza hamu.
40022035	Omu hali bo, akaba ali looya, yamukaguza naamutega ati:
40022036	“Mwegesa, kiragiro ki ekikuru omu Biragiro?”
40022037	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Ogonzeege MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona, n'omwoyo gwawe gwona, n'amagezi gaawe goona.
40022038	Eki nikyo kiragiro ekikuru ekirukubanza.
40022039	Kandi ekya kabiri ekirukusisana n'eki, nikyo kinu: Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.
40022040	Omu biragiro binu ebibiri, ebindi byona n'eby'abarangi numwo bisigikira.”
40022041	Abafalisaayo obu bakaba beesoroize hamu, Yesu yabakaguza ati:
40022042	“Kristo nimumuteekerezaaho muta? Mwijukuru w'oha?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Mwijukuru wa Daudi.”
40022043	Yesu yagaruka yabakaguza ati: “Daudi, obu yagambisiibwe Mwoyo Ahikiriire, habwaki yamwesire MUKAMA we ati:
40022044	‘MUKAMA akagambira MUKAMA wange ati: Ikarra ha mukono gwange ogw'obulyo okuhika obu ndifoora abanyazigwa baawe akatebe k'ebigere byawe’?
40022045	Daudi obu araaba yayesire Kristo MUKAMA we, kandi obu, aba ata mwijukuru we?”
40022046	Busaho n'omu ayasoboire kumugarukamu; kandi okuruga ha kiro eki, hatabeho n'omu ayalengereho kumukaguza ebikaguzo ebindi.
40023001	Nubwo Yesu yagambiire ebitebe by'abantu n'abeegesebwa be ati:
40023002	“Abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo balema omu kiikaro kya Musa;
40023003	nahabweki muhurrege kandi mukuraatire byona ebi baraabagambiraga, baitu muleke kukora nka bo, habwokuba ebi bagamba, tibiri nibyo bakora.
40023004	Baboha emigugu erukulemeera, etarukusobora kwetwekwa, bagyetwekesa abandi ha mitwe; baitu bbo bonka tibagonza kugitengesaaho n'orukumo rwabo.
40023005	Bakora ebikorwa byabo byona nibagonza kurorwa abantu. Banyeesa ebihuuta byabo ebyahurwamu Ebiragiro, baraihya ebitutu by'ebijwaro byabo,
40023006	bagonza ebiikaro by'omu maiso omu magenyi, n'entebe ez'ekitiinisa omu masorrokaniro,
40023007	n'okuramukibwa omu butale, n'abantu okubeeta: Mwegesa.
40023008	Baitu inywe mutalyetwa Mwegesa, habwokuba mwina omwegesa omu, kandi inywena muli iseemu.
40023009	Mutalyeta muntu weena ow'omunsi isiinywe, habwokuba mwina Isiinywe omu, anyakuli omu iguru.
40023010	Kandi mutalyetwa bakama, habwokuba mwina Mukama omu, nuwe Kristo.
40023011	Arukukira obukuru omuli inywe, araabaga muheereza wanyu;
40023012	weena anyakwenyumiza, alibundaazibwa; kandi weena anyakwebundaaza, alinyumizibwa.”
40023013	“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba mukingira abantu obukama bw'omu iguru na inywe timubutaahamu, kandi n'abarukugonza kubutaahamu timubaikiriza. [
40023014	Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba munyaga ebintu eby'omu maju g'abafaakati, kandi musaba endanda abantu babarole; nikyo mulicwererwa omusango ogurukukira obukooto.]
40023015	“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba mwambuka amayanja mugendagenda omu mahanga habw'okuhindura omuntu omu. Obu mumara kumuhindura, mumufoora muntu w'okunagwa omu kiinongoro ky'omurro, mubi okukira inywe emirundi ebiri.
40023016	“Mulikibona inywe abeebembezi abafu b'amaiso abagamba muti: ‘Kakuba omuntu naarahira Enju ya Ruhanga, tikiri kigambo; baitu kakuba naarahira ezaabbu y'omu Nju ya Ruhanga, kimusemeriire kuhikiriza endahiro ye.’
40023017	Badoma inywe abafu b'amaiso! Ekirukukira obukuru nikiha, zaabbu rundi Enju ya Ruhanga enyakweza zaabbu egi?
40023018	Kandi mugamba muti: ‘Kakuba omuntu naarahira itambiro, tikiri kigambo; baitu kakuba arahira ebinyakuli ha itambiro, kimusemeriire kuhikiriza endahiro ye.’
40023019	Inywe abafu b'amaiso! Ekirukukiraho obukuru nikiha, ekihongwa rundi itambiro erirukweza ekihongwa?
40023020	Nahabweki ogu nanyakurahira itambiro, aba alirahire na byona ebinyakuliroho.
40023021	Kandi na weena anyakurahira Enju ya Ruhanga aba agirahiire, kandi arahiire n'Ogu anyakugiikaramu.
40023022	N'anyakurahira iguru, aba arahiire ekitebe kya Ruhanga n'Ogu anyakukiikaliireho.
40023023	“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba muha ekicweka kya ikumi eky'omubwiga, n'eyobyo, n'emikubi endi; kandi timutaho mutima ebigambo ebikuru ebiri omu Biragiro: obwinganiza, embabazi n'okwikiriza. Binu nibyo mwakukozire, kandi ebindi nabyo muleke kubinagaija.
40023024	Inywe abeebembezi abafu b'amaiso, musengiija ebyokunywa kubiihamu omubu, kandi mumira engamiya!
40023025	“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba mwogya ekikopo n'esahaani haruguru, kandi kunu omu nda mwijwire obunyagi n'obubi.

40023027	“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba musisana nk'ebituuro ebisiigirwe inoni, ebizooka kurungi aheeru, kandi kunu omu nda bijwire amagufa g'abafu n'oburofu bwona.
40023028	Na inywe haruguru muzooka nk'abahikiriire omumaiso g'abantu, baitu omu nda mwijwire obugobya n'obubi.
40023029	“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba mwombekera abarangi ebituuro, musemeza n'ebiijukyo by'abahikiriire,

40023035	nukwo esagama y'abahikiriire boona eyasesirwe omunsi ebaimukirre: okurugirra ha sagama y'Abberi ayaitiirwe busa, okuhika ha sagama ya Zakaliya mutabani wa Barakiya, ou mwaitiire hagati y'ekiikaro ekirukwera n'itambiro.

40023038	Dora, enju yaawe neija kusigara eri kifurukwa.

40024001	Yesu obu akaba naaruga omu Nju ya Ruhanga, nubwo abeegesebwa be baizire kumuragirra enyombeka yayo.
40024002	Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Ebi byona timurukubirora? Mazima nimbagambira nti: Hanu tihalisigaraho ibaale eriri ha lindi, eritalinagwa hansi.”
40024003	Yesu obu akaba aikaliire ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva, abeegesebwa be baija nambere ali baamukaguza omu nsita bati: “Tugambire, binu biribaho di, kandi karorwaho ki akalyoleka okwija kwawe n'okuhwaho kw'ensi?”
40024004	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Mwerinde, hatalibaho muntu weena arukubahabisa.
40024005	Habwokuba baingi abaliija omu ibara lyange, nibagamba bati: ‘Ninyowe Kristo’, kandi balihabisa baingi.
40024006	Mulihurra obulemu n'engambo zabwo; mwerinde mutalyekanga; habwokuba ebi by'okubaho, baitu empero eriba etakahikire.

40024008	Ebi byona eriba ntandiko y'emihito.
40024009	“Nubwo balibahayo okubonabonesibwa n'okwitwa; amahanga goona galibanoba habwange.
40024010	Abaingi balinaga okwikiriza, bagobezangane, kandi banobangane.
40024011	Haliimuka abarangi baingi ab'ebisuba kandi balihabisa baingi.
40024012	Habw'obubi kuhingurana buti, okugonza okwa baingi kulifuka.
40024013	Baitu ogu aligumiisiriza kuhika ha mpero, nuwe alijunwa.
40024014	Kandi Amakuru Amarungi ganu ag'obukama bwa Ruhanga galirangirirwa omunsi yoona, gabe bwakaiso ha mahanga goona; obu nubwo empero erihika.”
40024015	“Obu mulirora ekintu ekirukunugwa kandi ekirukuhwerekereza, ekyagambirweho Daneeri omurangi, kitairwe omu kiikaro ekirukwera (arukusoma binu abyetegereze),
40024016	abo abaliba bali omu Buyudaaya bairukire ha nsozi;
40024017	alisangwa hanju eruguru, atalisirimuka kwiha ekintu omunju ye;
40024018	n'alisangwa ali omu musiri, ataligaruka omu ka kutabarra omwenagiro gwe.
40024019	Kandi bambi, abaliba baina enda n'abarukwonkya omu biro ebi balikibona!
40024020	Musabe muleke kusingwa omu biro by'obutiti rundi ha Sabbato.
40024021	Habwokuba omu biro ebi halibaho omuhito mwingi ogutakabahoga okuruga Ruhanga ahanga ensi n'okuhika hati, kandi ogutaligaruka kubaho.
40024022	Kakuba ebiro ebi bitarakeehiibweho, tihaakujunirwe muntu n'omu; baitu habw'abakomerwemu be, ebiro ebi Ruhanga akabikeehyaho.
40024023	Omuntu weena obu alibagambira ati: ‘Dora Kristo ngunu!’ Rundi: ‘Ngugwo!’ Mutalimwikiriza.
40024024	Habwokuba halizooka abarangi ab'ebisuba n'abarukweyeta Kristo, booleke ebihuniriza bingi n'ebyamahano, nukwo bahabise noobu baakubaire abakomerwemu.
40024025	Binu mbibagambiire bitakabaireho.
40024026	Nahabweki obu balibagambira bati: ‘Darawe ali omwirungu,’ mutaligyayo. Rundi: ‘Ngunu ali omu kisiika’, mutaliikiriza.
40024027	Omurabyo nkooku gumulikya niguruga Burugaizooba kuhika Bugwaizooba, n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu nukwo kuliba kuti.
40024028	Nambere hali omutumbi, nuho esega zeesorooleza.”
40024029	“Emihito y'ebiro ebi obu erihwa, ahonaaho izooba lirisiikirizibwa omwirima, n'okwezi tikulijwa, n'enyunyuuzi zirigwa hansi, kandi amaani ag'omwiguru galitengesebwa.
40024030	Nubwo akarorwaho k'Omwana w'omuntu kalizooka omu iguru, kandi enganda zoona ez'omunsi ziriganya. Aho balirora Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu bicu by'omwiguru, aina obusobozi n'ekitiinisa kingi.
40024031	Nubwo alituma bamalaika be nibateera engwara ezirukugamba muno, basorooze abakomerwemu be nibabaiha omu mbaju ina, okuruga ha mpero emu y'iguru okuhika hali endi.”
40024032	“Mwegere ha muti omutini, itaagi lyagwo obu lirokera, likanjurra amababi, mumanya nkooku ekyanda kiri haihi.
40024033	Na inywe obu mulirora ebi byona, mumanye nkooku ali haihi, ahikiire kimu ha irembo.
40024034	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Ab'obusinge bunu tibalihwaho, ebi byona bitakabaireho.
40024035	Iguru n'ensi birihwaho, baitu ebigambo byange tibirihwaho.”
40024036	“Baitu ekiro eki n'esaaha egi busaho n'omu abimanyire, noobu baakuba bamalaika ab'omu iguru, noobu yakuba Omwana w'omuntu, kwihaho Isenyowe wenka.
40024037	Nkooku kyabaire omu biro bya Noha, n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu nukwo kuliba kuti.
40024038	Omu biro ebyayebembiire okusandaara kw'amaizi, abantu baalyaaga, baanywaga, basweranganaga, okuhika ha kiro Noha eki yataahiireho omu lyato erikooto,
40024039	kandi batakimanye okuhika okusandaara kw'amaizi obu kwaizire kwabahwerekereza boona; n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu nukwo kuliba kuti.
40024040	Abasaija babiri obu balisangwa omu musiri: omu alitwarwa, ondi asigale.
40024041	Abakazi babiri obu baliba nibasa hamu: omu alitwarwa, ondi asigale.
40024042	Nahabweki mwikale nimurora, habwokuba timumanyire kiro MUKAMA eki aliiziramu.
40024043	Baitu kinu mukimanye, kakuba nyineeka yamanyire akasumi omusuma ak'arukwiziramu omu bwire bw'ekiro, yaakwikaire naarora, taakulekere enju ye kucwibwa.
40024044	Nahabweki na inywe musemeriire kwikara mweteekaniize; habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu aliija ha saaha ei mutarukumunihirranu.”
40024045	“Nooha omuheereza ogu omwesigwa kandi ow'amagezi, mukama we ou yasigiire kurolerra ab'omu ka ye, abahe ebyokulya omu kasumi akahikire?
40024046	W'omugisa omuheereza ogu, mukama we obu aligaruka, akamusanga naakora ati!
40024047	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Alimukwasa okurolerra ebintu bye byona.
40024048	Baitu omuheereza omubi kakuba ateekereza ati: ‘Mukama wange aikaireyo’,
40024049	kandi akatandika kuteera abaheereza bataahi be, akeeta ha kulya n'okunywa n'abatamiizi.
40024050	Mukama w'omuheereza ogu obu aligaruka ha kiro eki atarukumunihirramu na ha saaha ei atarukumanya,
40024051	alimufubira, amubarre omuli abo abatarukwesigwa; oku nuho abantu baliririrra kandi banene ensaya.”
40025001	“Omu kasumi ako, obukama bw'omwiguru bulirengesanizibwa n'abaisiki ikumi abatwaire etaara zaabo baagenda kutangirra omuswezi.
40025002	Abataano bakaba bali badoma, kandi bataano b'amagezi.
40025003	Habwokuba abadoma obu baatwaire etaara zaabo, batatwale magita ag'okwerinza;
40025004	baitu ab'amagezi bakatwara amagita omu cupa n'omu taara zaabu.
40025005	Omuswezi obu yakeererirwe okwija, boona baatandika kuhungira, baagwijagira.
40025006	“Baitu ekiro omu itumbi bakahurra etoko ngu: ‘Dara kigabura aizire! Muturuke aheeru mumutangirre.’
40025007	Abaisiki bali boona nubwo baimukire, baasemeza etaara zaabo.
40025008	Abadoma baasaba ab'amagezi bati: ‘Mutuheho amagita, habwokuba etaara zaitu zaagya kuraara.’
40025009	Baitu ab'amagezi baabagarukamu bati: ‘Tigarukwija kutumara itwena; haakire inywe mugende hali abasuubuzi mwegurreyo.’
40025010	Obu bakaba bagenzire kugura amagita, omuswazi yaija; abo abakaba beeteekaniize baataaha nawe omu nju ey'obugenyi, n'orwigi rwakingwaho.
40025011	Hanyuma abaisiki abandi nabo baija nibagamba bati: ‘Waitu, waitu, tukingurreho!’
40025012	Baitu omuswezi yagarukamu ati: ‘Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Timbamanyire.’
40025013	Nahabweki mwikalege nimurora, habwokuba timurukumanya kiro noobwekuba saaha.”
40025014	“Obukama bw'omwiguru bulisisana nk'omuntu ow'akaba naija kwimukya orugendo; akeeta abaheereza be yabakwasa ebintu bye.
40025015	Akaha buli omu narorra ha bwekambi bwe. Omu akamuha siringi omutwaro, gumu, ondi yamuha enkumi itaano, n'ondi yamuha rukumi rumu, hanyuma yagenda.
40025016	Ogu ayatungire siringi omutwaro gumu, ahonaaho yagenda yaisuubuza; yatunga amagoba omutwaro gumu ogundi.
40025017	N'ayatungire siringi enkumi itaano, nawe yagobamu siringi enkumi itaano zindi.
40025018	Baitu ogu ayatungire siringi rukumi rumu, akagenda yalima ekiina omu itaka, yaserekayo sente za mukama we.
40025019	“Obu haahingwireho omwanya mukooto, mukama w'abaheereza abo yagaruka, yabara nabo ebi yabasigiire.
40025020	Ogu ayahairwe siringi omutwaro gumu yaija, yaleeta siringi omutwaro gumu ogundi naagamba ati: ‘Mukama wange okansigira siringi omutwaro gumu, na nyowe nkagobamu omutwaro gumu ogundi.’
40025021	Mukama we yamugambira ati: ‘Webale omuheereza murungi kandi omwesigwa; oyesigirwe omu bike, ninyija kukukwasa bingi; ija osemererwe na mukama waawe.’
40025022	N'oli ayatungire siringi enkumi itaano yaija, naagamba ati: ‘Mukama wange, okansigira siringi enkumi itaano, hati ngoberemu enkumi itaano ezindi.’
40025023	Mukama we yamugambira ati: ‘Webale omuheereza murungi kandi omwesigwa; oyesigirwe omu bike, ninyija kukukwasa bingi; ija osemererwe na mukama waawe.’
40025024	N'oli ayatungire siringi orukumi rumu yaija naagamba ati: ‘Waitu, nkakumanya nkooku oli muntu ngumangani. Ogesa ebi otarasigire, ohunika ebi otarasigire;
40025025	nahabweki nkatiina, naagenda naasereka siringi zaawe omu itaka. Darazo, ozitwale.’
40025026	Baitu mukama we yamugarukamu ati: ‘Muheereza iwe omubi kandi omugara! Okamanya nkooku ngesa ebi ntarasasigire, kandi mpunika ebi ntarasigire.
40025027	Siringi zange waakubaire ozitaire omu banka, obu naakugarukire naakuzitungire n'amagoba gaazo.
40025028	Nahabweki mumwiheho siringi zange, muzihe ogu anyakwina omutwaro gumu.
40025029	Habwokuba weena anyakwina alyongerwaho ebindi bingi; baitu anyakwina ebike, n'ebi ainabyo birimwihwaho.
40025030	Omuheereza ataina mugaso ogu, mumunage aheeru omu mwirima. Oku nuho abantu baliririrra, kandi banene ensaya.’”
40025031	“Omwana w'omuntu obu aliizira omu kitiinisa kye aina n'abamalaika be boona, alisinga ha kitebe kye eky'ekitiinisa.
40025032	Amahanga goona galyesorooleza omumaiso ge, alibabaganizaamu nk'omuliisa okw'asoroora entaama omu mbuzi.
40025033	Entaama alizita ha mukono gwe ogw'obulyo, baitu embuzi alizita ha gw'emoso.
40025034	Nubwo Mukama aligambira aba ha mukono gw'obulyo ati: ‘Mwije inywe Isenyowe aba yahaire omugisa, mugwetwe obukama obwabateekaniriziibwe okuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi;
40025035	habwokuba obu nkaba nindumwa enjara, mukampa ebyokulya; obu nkaba nyina iroho, mukampa ekyokunywa; obu naizire ndi mugenyi mukankunira;
40025036	nkaba ndi busa, mukanjweka; obu nkaba ndwaire, mukaija mwandora; nkaba ndi omu nkomo, mukaija mwansuura.’
40025037	Nubwo abahikiriire balimugarukamu bati: ‘MUKAMA waitu, tukakurora di norumwa enjara, twakuha ebyokulya; rundi oina iroho, twakuha ekyokunywa?
40025038	Kandi tukakurora di oli mugenyi twakukunira; rundi oli busa, twakujweka?
40025039	Tukakurora di orwaire, rundi oli mu nkomo, twaija kukusuura?’
40025040	Mukama alibagarukamu ati: ‘Mazima nimbagambira nti: Eki mwakoliire omu hali abo abarukukira obuto omu bagenzi bange banu, buli mukakikorra nyowe.’
40025041	“Nubwo aligambira abo abaliba bali ha mukono ogw'emoso ati: ‘Mundugeho inywe abakyenwa, mugende omu murro ogutaraara ogwateekaniriziibwe Sitaani n'abamalaika be;
40025042	habwokuba nkaba nindumwa enjara, timwampa byokulya; nkaba nyina iroho, timwampa kyokunywa;
40025043	obunaizire ndi mugenyi, timwankunira; nkaba ndi busa, timwanjweka; nkaba ndwaire, ndi n'omu nkomo, timwaija kunsuura.’
40025044	Nabo balimugarukamu bati: ‘MUKAMA waitu, tukakurora di norumwa enjara, rundi oina iroho, rundi oli mugenyi, rundi oli busa, rundi orwaire, rundi oli omu nkomo, twayanga kukukoonyera?’
40025045	Nubwo alibagarukamu ati: ‘Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Nkooku mutarakikoliire omu hali abo abarukukira obuto, buli mutakikorre nyowe.’
40025046	Abo baligenda omu kubonabonesibwa okutalihwaho, baitu abahikiriire balitaaha omu bwomeezi obutalihwaho.”
40026001	Yesu obu yamazire kwegesa ebi byona, yagambira abeegesebwa be ati:
40026002	“Nimumanya nkooku hasigaire ebiro bibiri okuhika ha kiro kikuru eky'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho, kandi Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo kubambwa ha musaraba.”
40026003	Nubwo banyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu baayesorooliize omu kizigati kya mukuru w'abanyakatagara, ibara lye Kaayafa,
40026004	baahanuura nkooku baraakwata Yesu omu magezi, bamwite.
40026005	Baitu baagamba bati: “Kitakorwa omu biro bikuru, tihaikara kubaho epumpu omu bantu.”
40026006	Yesu obu akaba ali Betaniya omunju ya Simooni omugenge,
40026007	hakaija omukazi aina ihembe ly'amagita ag'omuhendo mwingi, yagaseesa ha mutwe gwa Yesu, obu akaba aikaliire naalya.
40026008	Baitu abeegesebwa obu baarozire eki, baabiihirwa nibagamba bati: “Amagita ganu gafiire ki?
40026009	Gaakutunzirwemu siringi nyingi, zigabirwa abanaku.”
40026010	Baitu Yesu obu yakyetegeriize, yabagambira ati: “Omukazi onu mumutuzire ki? Habwokuba ankoliire ekintu kirungi.
40026011	Abanaku obutoosa mwikara nabo, baitu timurukwija kwikara na nyowe obutoosa.
40026012	Okuseesa amagita ganu ha mubiri gwange, eki akikozire naanteekaniriza okuziikwa.
40026013	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Hoona hoona omunsi nambere Amakuru Amarungi ganu garaarangirirwaga, omukazi onu eki akozire kiraagambwahoga okumwijuka.”
40026014	Nubwo Yuda Isikalyota, omu hali ikumi na babiri, yagenzire hali baanyakatagara abakuru,
40026015	yabakaguza ati: “Murampa ki obu ndaamubahikyaho?” Baamusasura ebicweka by'efeeza makumi asatu.
40026016	Okuruga obu, yaserra akasumi ak'araamugoberezamu.
40026017	Ha kiro ky'okubanza eky'obugenyi bw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe, abeegesebwa bakaija hali Yesu baamukaguza bati: “Noogonza tukuteekanirize nkaha nambere oraaliira obugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho?”
40026018	Yesu nukwo kubagarukamu ati: “Mugende omu rubuga mb'omuntu nanka, mumugambire muti: ‘Omwegesa naagamba ati: Akasumi kange kali haihi kuhika kandi omunju yaawe nuho ndaaliira obugenyi obw'Okuhingurwaho hamu n'abeegesebwa bange.’ ”
40026019	Abeegesebwa baakora Yesu nkooku yabaragiire, baateekaniza obugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho.
40026020	Omu rwiririzi Yesu yaija yaikarra ha meeza hamu n'abeegesebwa be ikumi na babiri.
40026021	Obu bakaba nibalya, yagamba ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Omu omuli inywe naija kungobeza.”
40026022	Bbo baatandika kusaalirwa n'okumukaguza omu omu bati: “MUKAMA wange, ninyowe?”
40026023	Yabagarukamu ati: “Ogu arukukoza na nyowe omu bbakuli, nuwe arukwija kungobeza.
40026024	Omwana w'omuntu naagenda kuba nkooku kyamuhandiikirweho; baitu ogu arukumugobeza alikibona! Kyakubaire kirungi omuntu ogu kakuba atarazairwe.”
40026025	Yuda ayamugobiize yamukaguza ati: “Mwegesa, ninyowe?” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Niiwe anyakukigambire.”
40026026	Obu bakaba nibalya, Yesu yakwata omugaati, yasiima, yagucwamu, yaguha abeegesebwa be naagamba ati: “Mukwate mulye; gunu nugwo mubiri gwange.”
40026027	Kandi yakwata ekikopo, obu yamazire kusiima, yakibaha naagamba ati: “Munyweho inywena,
40026028	enu niyo sagama yange ey'ekiragaano ekihyaka, eraaseeswa habwa baingi okubaganyiza ebibi.
40026029	Nimbagambira nti: Tindigaruka kunywa ha nsande y'ebijuma by'emizaabbibbu okuhika ha kiro kiri obu ndiginywa na inywe eri mpyaka omu bukama bwa Isenyowe.”
40026030	Obu baamazire kuzina ekizina, baaturuka, baagenda ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva.
