40026032	Baitu obu ndimara kuhumbuurwa, ndibabanza kuhika Galiraaya.”
40026033	Petero yahaya naagamba ati: “Abandi boona noobu baraakurugaho, baitu nyowe nikikafuuhe!”
40026034	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mazima ninkugambira nti: Kiro kinu kyonyini, enkoko etakakookere, oraaba onyehoogere emirundi esatu.”
40026035	Petero nukwo kumugarukamu ati: “Noobu ndaaba ndi w'okufa na iwe, baitu tindukwija kukwehooga.” N'abeegesebwa abandi boona nukwo baagambire bati.
40026036	Hanyuma Yesu yagenda nabo omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa Getesemaane, yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Mwikarre hanu, nyowe ka ngende kuli nsabe.”
40026037	Yatwara Petero n'abatabani ba Zebedaayo bombi, yabanza kusaalirwa n'okutuntura.
40026038	Nubwo yabagambira ati: “Omutima gwange gwina obujune bwingi, buraaliire kunyita. Mwikale hanu nimurora hamu na nyowe.”
40026039	Obu, yagendaho kake omumaiso, yajuumara, yayesengereza ati: “Taata, obu kiraaba nikisoboka, amabone ganu gandugeho; kitaba nka nyowe oku ndukugonza, baitu kibe Iwe nkooku orukugonza.”
40026040	Yagaruka hali abeegesebwa yabasanga bagwijagiire; nukwo kukaguza Petero ati: “Timusoboire kwikara nimurora hamu na nyowe esaha emu?
40026041	Murole kandi musabe, muleke kwohebwa. Omutima nigugonza mali, baitu omubiri muceke.”
40026042	Yagenda obwa kabiri yayesengereza naagamba ati: “Taata, amabone ganu obu garaaba gatarukusobora kundugaho ntakagaboine, kikorwe Iwe nkooku orukugonza.”
40026043	Yagaruka yaija, nabwo yabasanga bagwijagiire, habwokuba amaiso gaabo gakaba gaina oturo twingi.
40026044	Yabarugaho, yagenda kwesengereza obwa kasatu, naagamba ebigambo nka biri.
40026045	Hanyuma yagaruka hali abeegesebwa yabagambira ati; “Na hati mukyagwijagiire, muhumwire? Kale nu esaaha ehikire, Omwana w'omuntu aheebweyo omu mikono y'abasiisi.
40026046	Mwimuke tugende. Arukungobeza ngugwo, airiire haihi.”
40026047	Obu akaba naakyabaza ebi, Yuda, omu hali ikumi na babiri, yaija aina ekitebe ky'abantu baingi bakwasire empirima n'ebiduuma, nibaruga hali banyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu.
40026048	Ogu ayamugobiize, akaba abahaire ira akarorwaho, naabagambira ati: “Ou ndaagwa omu kifuba buli nuwe ogu; mumukwate.”
40026049	Ahonaaho yaija hali Yesu, yamuramukya ati: “Mirembe Mwegesa!” Yamugwa omu kifuba.
40026050	Yesu nukwo kumukaguza ati: “Munywani wange, oiziriire ki?” Nubwo bali baizire, baagwera Yesu, baamukwata.
40026051	Omu hali abo abakaba bali na Yesu, yasomorayo empirima ye, yagorra omukono, yatema okutu kw'omwiru w'omukuru w'abanyakatagara, yakucwaho.
40026052	Baitu Yesu yamugambira ati; “Empirima yaawe gigarre omu kiraaro kyayo; habwokuba boona abakwata empirima, baliitwa empirima.
40026053	Nimuteekereza tindukusobora kusaba Isenyowe, akantwekera ahonaaho ihe ly'abamalaika abarukukira ha bihanda ikumi na bibiri?
40026054	Kakuba kitabaire kiti, Ebyahandiikirwe byakuhikiriire bita?”

40026056	Baitu binu byona bibaireho, nukwo ebyahandiikirwe abarangi bihikiriziibwe.” Okuruga aho abeegesebwa be boona baamusigaho bairuka.
40026057	Omu kasumi ako, abo abaakwasire Yesu bakamutwara mba Kaayafa, omukuru w'abanyakatagara, nambere abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'abakuru b'abantu bakaba beesorooliize.
40026058	Baitu Petero yamuhondera haraho okuhikira kimu omu kizigati ky'omukuru w'abanyakatagara. Obu yataahiremu, yaikarra n'abalinzi kurora nambere biraahwera.
40026059	Baanyakatagara abakuru n'ab'orukurato boona baasera obwakaiso bw'ebisuba, bahangirre Yesu, nukwo bamwite.

40026061	baagamba bait: “Omuntu onu akagamba ati: ‘Ninsobora kuseesa Enju ya Ruhanga, n'okugaruka kugyombekera ebiro bisatu’.”

40026063	Baitu Yesu yaculeera. Mukuru w'abanyakatagara nukwo kumugambira ati: “Ninkurahiza Ruhanga omwomeezi, tugambire obu oraaba oli Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga.”
40026064	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Niiwe okigambire. Baitu nimbagambira nti: Okuruga hati mulirora Omwana w'omuntu aikaliire ha mukono gw'obulyo ogw'Ow'obusobozi bwona, kandi naizira omu bicu by'omwiguru.”

40026066	Inywe nimucwamu muta?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Asemeriire kufa.”

40027022	Nandiki Pilaato ati: “Kandi Yesu arukwetwa Kristo, mmukole ki?” Nukwo boona kugarukamu bati; “Abambwe ha musaraba!”

40027024	Pilaato obu yarozire nayejwahiza busa, kandi nkooku harukwija kubaho akajagarro, yakwata amaizi, yanaaba omu ngaro boona nibarora, naagamba ati: “Nyowe tindukujunaanwa sagama y'omuntu onu ahikiriire, ebi bigambo byanyu.”

40027027	Nubwo abaserikale b'omulemi omukuru baatwaire Yesu omunju erukwetwa kibbira, ekihanda kyabu kyona kyamwesoroolezaaho.
40027028	Baamujuura ebijwaro bye, baamujweka orugoye orurukugaajuka.
40027029	Baaruka ekondo y'amahwa, baagimuta ha mutwe, baamukwasa orubingo omu mukono gw'obulyo. Baateeza amaju omumaiso ge nibamuteerra enaku bati? “Hangiriza, Omukama w'Abayudaaya!”
40027030	Baamucwera ebicwanta, baamwihaho orubingo, baarumuteeza ha mutwe.
40027031	Obu baamazire kumuterra enaku, baamujuura orugoye orurukugaajuka, baamujweka ebijwaro bye, baamutwara kumubamba ha musaraba.
40027032	Obu bakaba nibagenda, baatangana omusaija owa Kireene, ibara lye Simooni, baamuhambiriza okwetwekeraho Yesu omusaraba.
40027033	Obu baahikire omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa Gologota (ekirukumanyisa ngu: kiikaro ky'oruhanga),
40027034	baaha Yesu eviini etabwirwemu omubazi, aginywe; baitu obu yarolezeeho, yayanga kuginywa.
40027035	Abaserikale obu baamazire kumubamba, baabagana ebijwaro bye nibabitera itomo;
40027036	baikarra hansi bamuroleriire.
40027037	Kandi haruguru y'omutwe gwe, bakataho ekihandiiko ky'omusango gwe ekirukugamba kiti: “Onu nuwe Yesu, Omukama w'Abayudaaya.”
40027038	Akabambwa hamu n'abahuura babiri, omu ha mukono gwe ogw'obulyo, n'ondi ha gw'emoso.
40027039	Kandi abo abakaba nibahingura baamujuma, nibacwa emitwe yabo,
40027040	nibagamba bati; “Iwe ayagondeze kuseesa Enju ya Ruhanga, okagaruka kugyombekera ebiro bisatu wejune wenka! Obu oraaba oli Mwana wa Ruhanga, wehanuule ha musaraba.”
40027041	Baanyakatagara abakuru, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, hamu n'abakuru b'abantu, nabo nukwo baamujumire bati:
40027042	“Akajuna abandi, baitu tasobora kwejuna wenka, kunu nuwe Omukama wa Isirairi. Hati ayehanuule ha musaraba, nukwo na itwe tumwikirize.
40027043	Ayesiga Ruhanga, leka Ruhanga amujune hati, obu araaba naamugonza; habwokuba akagamba ati: ‘Ndi Mwana wa Ruhanga.’”
40027044	Kandi abahuura abaabambirwe nawe, nabo nukwo baamujumire bati.
40027045	Okuruga esaaha mukaaga okuhika esaaha mwenda ensi yoona ekaswekwa omwirima.
40027046	Kandi ha saaha nka mwenda, Yesu yayamuza n'iraka likooto ati: “Eli, Eli lama sabakatani?” Amakuru gaakyo ngu: “Ruhanga wange, Ruhanga wange, ondugiireho ki?”
40027047	Abamu ha basungi, obu baahuliire eki, nukwo kugamba bati: “Omusaija onu naayeta Eriya.”
40027048	Ahonaaho omu halibo yairuka yaleeta ekijumankuba yakiibika omu marwa agasaaliire, yakita ha rubingo, yamuha anyunyuguze.
40027049	Baitu abandi baagamba bati; “Ka turole Eriya nkooku araija kumujuna.”
40027050	Baitu Yesu yagaruka yayamuliza haiguru, yacwekana.
40027051	Ahonaaho enyigamo y'omunju ya Ruhanga yatemukamu habiri, okuruga eruguru okuhika hansi; ensi yatengeeta, n'emyandara yayatika;
40027052	ebituuro byayesama, emitumbi nyingi ey'abahikiriire abakaba bagwijagire yahumbuurwa.

40027055	Hakaba haroho n'abakazi baingi abaarugire Galiraaya bahondiire Yesu nibamuheereza, beemeriire haraho nibarora;
40027056	omuli bo hakaba harumu Mariya Magadaleena, Mariya nyina Yakobbo na Yosefu, kandi na nyina batabani ba Zebedaayo.
40027057	Obwire obu bwahikire rwebagyo, hakaija omusaija omuguuda owa Alimateya, ibara lye Yosefu, nawe akaba ali mwegesebwa wa Yesu.
40027058	Akagenda hali Pilaato, yamusaba omutumbi gwa Yesu. Pilaato yaragira bagumuhe.
40027059	Yosefu yatwara omutumbi, yaguzinga omu rugoye rwa bafuta,
40027060	yaguta omu kituuro ekihyaka eki akaba ayebaiziire omu mwandara; yakumbya ibaale likooto, yaigara omunwa gw'ekituuro, yagenda.

40027063	baagamba bati; “Waitu, nitwijuka omubiihi w'ebisuba ogu, obwakaba akyali mwomeezi, akagamba ati: ‘Obu halihinguraho ebiro bisatu, ndihumbuuka.’
40027064	Nahabweki, ragira balindire kimu ekituuro okuhika ha kiro kya kasatu, obw'olyaho abeegesebwa be tibaikara kwija bakaiba omutumbi gwe, hanyuma bakagambira abantu bati: ‘Ahumbuukire omu bafu’, kandi okuhaba okwa hanyuma nikwija kukira okw'okubanza obubi.”
40027065	Pilaato yabagarukamu ati; “Mwina abalinzi, mugende mukirinde nkooku murukusobora.”
40027066	Baagenda, baagumya ekituuro; ibaale balitaho emanyikirizo, baataho n'abalinzi.
40028001	Sabbato ekahwaho, kandi nyenkya omu rukyakya, ha Sande, Mariya Magadaleena na Mariya ondi bakagenda ha kituuro.
40028002	Hakabaho omusisa gw'amaani, habwokuba malaika wa Ruhanga akasirimuka yaruga omu iguru, yaija yakumbya ibaale lya ha munwa gw'ekituuro, yaliikarraho.
40028003	Amaiso ge gakaba nigangasana nk'omurabyo kandi ebijwaro bye bikaba nibyeera nk'ebirika.

40028007	Hati mugende bwango, mugambire abeegesebwa be nkooku ahumbuukire kandi naija kubabanza kuhika Galiraaya; oku nuho mulimurorra. Hati mmazire kubagambira.”

40028014	Kandi kinu omulemi omukuru obu araakihurra, nitwija kumunanura, nukwo na inywe tubaihe omu kabi.”

41003031	Nyina Yesu na bagenzi be bakaija, baayemerra aheeru baamutumaho nibamweta.
41003032	Ekitebe ky'abantu kikaba kiikaliire kimwehinguliriize; abatumirwe nukwo kumugambira bati: “Nyoko na bagenzi baawe bali aheeru nibakweta.”
41003033	Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Mau nuwe oha, na bagenzi bange nubo baha?”
41003034	Yabungyamu amaiso abo abakaba bamwehinguliriize, yagamba ati: “Mau na bagenzi bange nubo banu!
41003035	Weena anyakukora Ruhanga eki agonza, nuwe mugenzi wange, nuwe munyaanya nyowe, kandi nuwe mau.”
41004001	Yesu yayongera yatandika kwegesa ha musa gw'enyanja. Ekitebe ky'abantu baingi muno kyamwesorolezaaho, nukwo kutemba omu bwato yabwikarramu buli ha nyanja, kandi n'ekitebe kyona ky'abantu kikaba kiri ha musa gw'enyanja.
41004002	Yabeegesa ebintu bingi omu nganikyo; omu kwegesa kwe akabagambira ati:
41004003	“Mutege amatu! Omusigi akatura okusiga.
41004004	Obu akaba naasiga, embibo ezimu zaaragara ha muhanda rubaju, enyonyi zaija, zaazisoma.
41004005	Embibo ezindi zaagwa ha itaka erya ha mwandara nambere hakaba hatali itaka lingi, ahonaaho zaamera; baitu habw'itaka kutahama,
41004006	omusana obu gwajwire gwazookya, kandi habw'okutagira mihama zaahotoka.
41004007	N'ezindi zikagwa omu mahwa, amahwa obu gaakuzire, gaazinyoroza, tizaayana.
41004008	Embibo ezindi zaagwa omu itaka erirungi, zaakura, zaakanya, ezimu zaayana makumi asatu, ezindi nkaaga, n'ezindi kikumi.”
41004009	Yayongera yabagambira ati: “Anyakwina amatu, ahurre.”
41004010	Baitu obu akaba ali wenka, ikumi na babiri hamu n'abo abakaba bamwehinguliriize baamukaguza amakuru ag'enganikyo ezi.
41004011	Yabagambira ati: “Inywe mukasuukulirwa ensita ez'obukama bwa Ruhanga, baitu ab'aheeru, bbo byona bibaganikizibwa omu nganikyo;
41004012	nukwo kurora barora, baitu batahweza; kandi kuhurra bahurra, baitu batahwituka; tibaikara kuhinduka bakaganyirwa.”
41004013	Kandi yabakaguza ati: “Orufumo oru timurwetegeriize? Kandi enganikyo ezindi zoona mulizeetegereza muta?
41004014	Omusigi eki asiga nikyo kigambo kya Ruhanga.
41004015	Embibo eza ha muhanda rubaju nambere ekigambo kisigirwe, nubo abarukuruga kuhurra bati, ahonaaho Sitaani aija abaihamu ekigambo ekibabairwenu.
41004016	Kandi omu mulingo nugwo gumu, ezi ezabyairwe ha itaka erya ha mwandara, nubo abo abahurra ekigambo, bakakiikiriza n'okusemerewa;
41004017	baitu habw'okutahama, bagumiisiriza akasumi kake, kandi obu habaho emihito rundi okuhiiganizibwa habw'ekigambo eki, ahonaaho bagwa.
41004018	N'ezindi nizo ezaagwire omu mahwa; nubo abo abahurra ekigambo,
41004019	baitu habw'okumaliza omutima ha by'ensi, n'okutwalirizibwa obuguuda, n'okururuukira ebintu ebindi, bibataahamu, binyoroza ekigambo eki, tikyaana bijuma.
41004020	Baitu ezi ezaasigirwe omu itaka erirungi, nubo abo abahurra ekigambo, bakakiikiriza, bakakora ebikorwa ebirungi, abamu kukira ha makumi asatu, abandi nkaaga, n'abandi kikumi.”
41004021	Yesu yayongera yabagambira ati: “Etaara ereeterwa kujuumikirwa ekigega rundi kugita omu madaara g'ekitabu? Tereeterwa kuhanikwa ha kikondo kyayo?
41004022	Habwokuba busaho na kimu ekiserekerwe ekitalizonzoorwa; rundi eky'ensita ekitalimanywa burole.
41004023	Weena anyakwina amatu, ahurre.”
41004024	Kandi yabagambira ati: “Mwegendereze eki muhurra, endengo ei mulengesa, na inywe niyo mulirengerwa, kandi n'okwongerwaho mulyongerwaho.
41004025	Habwokuba anyakwina ebingi, alyongerwaho; baitu anyakwina ebike, nabyo birimwihwaho.”
41004026	Yayongera yagamba ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga nibusisana nk'omuntu ayasigire embibo omu itaka,
41004027	akagwijagira kandi akasisiimuka, ekiro na nyamusana embibo ikamera, ikakura, atamanyire mimerre n'emikurre yazo
41004028	Itaka niryo lizimeza lyonka; habanza obukoora, hataho entwe, hakurataho enjuma ha ntwe.
41004029	Baitu enjuma obu zimara kwera, ahonaaho aleeta omuhyo, agesa, habwokuba igesa lihikire.”
41004030	Yayongera yagamba ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga turabulengesaniza na ki? Rundi turabusoboroza rufumo ki?
41004031	Nibusisana nk'akasigo ka karadaali; nambere kasigirwa omu itaka, kaba kali kajuma katoito okukira embibo zoona eziri omu nsi;
41004032	baitu obu kasigwa, kakura, kafooka kisaka kikooto ekirukukira ebisaka ebindi byona, kinaga amataagi makooto, nukwo n'enyonyi zoombeka ebiju omu kiituuru ky'amataagi gaakyo.”
41004033	Akabagambira ekigambo kya Ruhanga naakirabya omu nganikyo nyingi nk'ezi, nkooku bakaba nibasobora kukihurra;
41004034	atasobole kubagambira kintu kyona atakirabize omu ruganikyo; baitu abeegesebwa be bonka, nubo yasoborraga byona ha rubaju.
41004035	Ha kiro eki orwebagyo, omu kasweko k'obwire, akabagamba ati: “Twambuke nseeri.”
41004036	Baasiga aho ekitebe ky'abantu, baamutwarra omu bwato buli, obu akaba arumu; kandi amaato agandi gaagenda nawe.
41004037	Haimuka ihunga lingi n'ebigonzi byaseeseka omu bwato, bukaba buli haihi kwijura.
41004038	Baitu uwe akaba ali ha kiso ky'enyuma, ayesagwire ekisago, agwijagire. Baamusisiimura, nibamugambira bati: “Mwegesa, torukutufaaho? Ka twafa!”
41004039	Yasisiimuka, yacoomera omuyaga, kandi yagambira enyanja ati: “Teeka! Culeera!” Omuyaga gwagwa n'enyanja yaculeera, haabaho okuteekana kwingi.
41004040	Yabakaguza ati: “Mutiiniire ki? Timwina kwikiriza?”
41004041	Baitu bbo baatiina muno, nukwo kukaguzangana bati: “Mara onu muntu ki arukuragira ihunga n'enyanja, bikamuhurra?”
41005001	Baahika nseeri y'enyanja, omunsi y'Abageraseene.
41005002	Yesu obu yarugire omu bwato, yatangaana omusaija akwasirwe omwoyo mubi, ow'akaba naaruga omu bituuro
41005003	nambere yaikaraga. Busaho n'omu ow'akaba naasobora kumuboha noobwakubaire kumubohesa orujegere;
41005004	habwokuba emirundi nyingi baamubohesaaga empingo n'enjegere, baitu enjegere yaicwaaga, kandi n'empingo azicwacwana; hataroho ow'akaba aina amaani ag'okumuculeeza.
41005005	Ekiro na nyamusana yaikaraga naayamuliza omu bituuro na ha nsozi, naayehutaaza n'amabaale.
41005006	Obu yalengiire Yesu, yairuka, yamuteereza amaju;
41005007	yayamuza n'iraka likooto ati: “Yesu, Omwana wa Ruhanga anyakuli haiguru muno, noontura ki? Ninkurahira omu ibara lya Ruhanga, otancanza.”
41005008	Habwokuba Yesu akaba agugambiire ati: “Murugeho, iwe omwoyo omubi!”
41005009	Yesu nukwo kugukaguza ati: “Ibara Iyawe niryo liha?” Gwagarukamu guti: “Ibara lyange ninyowe Ihe; habwokuba tuli baingi.”
41005010	Gwamwesengereza muno aleke kugubinga omunsi omu.
41005011	Haihi aho ha mbanda y'orusozi hakaba haroho igana lingi ly'empunu nizirya;
41005012	emyoyo emibi yamwesengereza eti: “Tusindike omu mpunu ezi, nizo tutaahemu.”
41005013	Yagiikiriza. Emyoyo emibi yaruga omu muntu ogu, yataaha omu mpunu; kandi igana ly'empunu ezirukuhika nk'enkumi ibiri, zaajumbutuka, zaakonkomoka enengo, zaagwa omu nyanja, zaafeeramu.
41005014	Abaliisa bairuka baakisubirra ab'omu rubuga n'ab'omu byaro. Abantu baija kurora ekibaireho.
41005015	Baahika hali Yesu, baasanga omuntu ogu ow'akaba akwasirwe omwoyo omubi aikaliire, ajwaire, kandi ateekaine nuwe ogu ow'akaba akwasirwe ihe ery'emyoyo emibi; baayekanga.
41005016	Abaakirozire baabasoborra ekibaireho omuntu ogu ow'akaba aroho emyoyo emibi, n'ebibaireho empunu.
41005017	Kandi bbo baatandika kwesengereza Yesu aruge omu mitaano yabo.
41005018	Uwe obu akaba naataaha omu bwato, omusaija ow'akaba akwasirwe emyoyo emibi yaija, yamwesengereza amwikirize kwikara nawe.
41005019	Baitu Yesu yayanga, yamugambira ati: “Taaha owaanyu omu bagenzi baawe, obagambire ebikuru MUKAMA ebi akukoliire, kandi n'embabazi ezi akugiriire.”
41005020	Yagenda yatandika kurangirra ab'omu kicweka ky'Embuga Ikumi byona Yesu ebi yamukoliire; abantu boona baatangaara.
41005021	Yesu obu yayambukiire omu bwato, yagaruka nseeri y'enyanja, kandi ekitebe ky'abantu baingi kyamwesoroolezaaho; yaikara ha musa gw'enyanja.
41005022	Aho haija omu ha bakuru b'isorrokaniro, ibara lye Yairo. Obu yarozire Yesu, yagwa ha bigere bye,
41005023	yamwesengereza naagamba ati: “Muhara wange ali haihi kufa. Ija omuteho emikono yaawe, nukwo akire, kandi ayomeere.”
41005024	Yesu yagenda nawe. Ekitebe ky'abantu baingi kyamuhondera kimugoteriire.
41005025	Hakaba haroho omukazi ayamazire emyaka ikumi n'ebiri arwaire akejwiso.
41005026	Abafumu baingi bakaba balengereho kumutambira, kandi akaba amaliizeyo ebye byona, ataraarwe naakake baitu akeeyongera kuba kubi.
41005027	Akaba ahuliire ebi baagambahoga Yesu, yamuruga enyuma naaraba omu kitebe ky'abantu, yamwirra haihi, yakwata ha kijwaro kye.
41005028	Akagumya ati: “Noobu ndakwataho kwonka ekijwaro kye ndaakira.”
41005029	Ahonaaho akejwiso ke kaayoma; kandi yayehurra omu mubiri gwe nkooku akiziibwe endwara ye.
41005030	Yesu obu yamanyire amaani agamurugiremu, ahonaaho yahindukira ekitebe ky'abantu yakaguza ati: “Nooha akwasire ha bijwaro byange?”
41005031	Abeegesebwa be baamugarukamu bati: “Noorora ekitebe ky'abantu nkooku kirukukufunza, kandi nookaguza ngu: ‘Nooha ankwasireho?’ ”
41005032	Baitu uwe yamagamaga kurora ow'amukwasireho.
41005033	Omukazi habw'okumanya ekimukozirweho, yaija naatiina kandi naatukumira, yajuumara hansi omu maiso ge, yamugambirra kimu amazima goona.
41005034	Nukwo Yesu kumugambira ati: “Mwisiki wange, okwikiriza kwawe nukwo kukukirize; genda n'obusinge, okirre kimu endwara yaawe.”
41005035	Yesu obu akaba naakyabaza, haija abarukuruga mb'omukuru w'isorrokaniro, baamubikira bati: “Muhara waawe afiire. Omwegesa nokyamujwahiza ki?”
41005036	Baitu Yesu eki tiyakitaho mutima, yagambira omukuru w'isorrokaniro ati: “Otatiina, ikiriza kwonka.”
41005037	Kandi ataikirize muntu weena kugenda nawe, kwihaho Petero, Yakobbo, na Yohaana owanyina Yakobbo.
41005038	Obu baahikire ha nju y'omukuru w'isorrokaniro, Yesu yarora abantu abarukurabanganamu, abamu nibarra kandi nibateera empamo.
41005039	Obu yataahiremu yabakaguza ati: “Nimurabanganiramu ki kandi nimulizibwa ki? Omwana tafiire, baitu agwijagiire.”
41005040	Bbo baamusekeereza. Baitu boona yabaturukya aheeru, yatwara ise omwana na nyina, n'abo aba yaizire nabo, yahingura omu kisiika omwana nambere akaba ali.
41005041	Yamukwata ha mukono, yamugambira ati: “Talita kuumi;” amakuru gaakyo ngu: “Kaisiki iwe, ninkugambira nti: Imuka.”
41005042	Ahonaaho omwisiki yaimuka, yatandika kurubata; akaba ali w'emyaka ikumi n'ebiri y'obukuru. Abantu obu baarozire eki, baahuniira.
41005043	Yabateererra kutamanyisa muntu weena, kandi yaragira bahe omwisiki ekyokulya.
41006001	Oku yarugayo, yagenda omunsi y'owaabu; abeegesebwa be baagenda nawe.
41006002	Ha Sabbato yatandika kwegesa omu isorrokaniro; kandi abaingi abaamuhuliire baahunirra nibagamba bati: “Omusaija onu, binu byona akabiiha nkaha? Magezi ki aga yahairwe? Ebi arukukora ka nibihuniriza!
41006003	Onu tinuwe mubaizi, mutabani wa Mariya, mugenzi wa Yakobbo na Yose na Yuda na Simooni; kandi banyaanya titwombekere nabo owaitu?” Nukwo kumwanga.
41006004	Baitu Yesu yabagambira ati: “Omurangi aheebwa ekitiinisa hoona hoona, okwihaho omunsi y'owaabu, omu ruganda rwe, n'omuka ye.”
41006005	Oku atasobole kukorayo kyamahano na kimu, kwihaho kuta emikono ye ha barwaire bake, yabakiza.
41006006	Yahunirra habw'okutaikiriza kwabo. Kandi yagendagendaga omu byaro naayegesa.
41006007	Yayeta ikumi na babiri, yatandika kubatuma babiri babiri, kandi yabaha obusobozi bw'okubinga emyoyo emibi.
41006008	Yabateererra kutatwara kintu kyona omu rugendo rwabo, kwihaho omwigo; kutatwara ntanda, rundi ensaho, noobu zaakuba sente omu nsaho z'enkoba zaabo;
41006009	baitu bagende bajwaire enkaito, kandi batatwara kanzu ya kabiri.
41006010	Yayongera yabagambira ati: “Enju ei murataahamuga, niyo mwikalemu okuhika obu mulirugayo.
41006011	Nambere bataabajwahukirrege kandi bakanga kuhurra ebi murukugamba, obu muraabaga nimurugayo, muteerateere ecuucu y'omu bigere byanyu, bubege bwakaiso obw'okubasingisa omusango.”
41006012	Bbo baagenda nibatebeza abantu nkooku basemeriire kwegarukamu.
41006013	Bakabinga emyoyo emibi nyingi, kandi baasiiga amagita abarwaire baingi, baabakiza.
41006014	Omukama Herode ebi yabihurra, habwokuba ibara lya Yesu likaba limazire kurangaanwa. Abamu bakagamba bati: “Yohaana Omubatiza ahumbuukire omu bafu, nikyo arukukorra eby'amaani binu.”
41006015	Baitu abandi bakagamba bati: “N'Eriya.” N'abandi bagira bati: “Murangi, nk'omu ha barangi aba ira.”
41006016	Baitu Herode obu yahuliire ebi, yagamba ati: “Yohaana ou naacwireho omutwe, ahumbuukire.”
41006017	Herode akaba amazire kutuma abantu bakwate Yohaana, bamubohe, bamute omu nkomo habwa Herodiya muka Filipo mugenzi we; habwokuba Herode akaba amuswire.
41006018	Nukwo Yohaana kuhana Herode ati: “Ebiragiro bya Musa tibirukukwikiriza kuswera muka mugenzi waawe.”
41006019	Herodiya nikyo yamurwaliize enzigu, kandi yagonza kumwita; baitu atasobole,
41006020	habwokuba Herode akaba naatiina Yohaana, naamanya nkooku ali muntu ahikiriire kandi arukwera; yamulinda kurungi. Obu yahuliire Yohaana ebi yamuhanire, yasoberwa muno; baitu nabwo yamutamuga ekitiinisa.
41006021	Akasumi akasemeriire kaahikira ha kiro ky'okwijukiraho okuzaarwa kwa Herode, yacumbira abakurasi be, n'abakuru b'abaserikale, n'abantu abakuru aba Galiraaya obugenyi.
41006022	Muhara wa Herodiya obu yaizire, yacekeca, yasiimwa Herode n'abagenyi be. Omukama nukwo kugambira omwisiki ati: “Nsaba kyona eki orakagonza, ndaakikuha.”
41006023	Yamurahira ati: “Kyona kyona eki oransaba, ndaakikuha, noobu kiraaba ekicweka ky'obukama bwange.”
41006024	Omwisiki yaturuka aheeru, yakaguza nyina ati: “Nsabe ki?” Nyina yamugarukamu ati: “Saba omutwe gwa Yohaana Omubatiza.”
41006025	Omwisiki atabandaale yagaruka hali omukama, yamusaba naagamba ati: “Ningonza bwango ompeere ha sahaani hanu omutwe gwa Yohaana Omubatiza.”
41006026	Omukama yasaalirwa muno; baitu habw'okusangwa yarahira, n'okutiina kuswara hali abagenyi be, atagonze kucwa eki yarahiire omwisiki.
41006027	Nukwo omukama kutuma ahonaaho omu ha baserikale be abalinzi, yamuragira aleete omutwe gwa Yohaana. Omuserikale yagenda omu nkomo, yamutemaho omutwe,
41006028	yaguleetera ha sahaani, yaguha omwisiki; kandi omwisiki yagutwarra nyina.
41006029	Abeegesebwa ba Yohaana obu baahuliire eki, baija baatwara omutumbi gwe, baaguziika omu kituuro.
41006030	Abakwenda bakagaruka hali Yesu baamugambira byona ebi baakozire n'ebi baayegeseze.
41006031	Uwe yabagambira ati: “Mwije inywenka tugende ha rubaju, muhuumuleho”; habwokuba abantu baingi bakaba nibaija, abandi nibagenda; habweki abeegesebwa batatunge noobu kaakuba akaanya ak'okulya.
41006032	Baagwerra bonka omu bwato, baagenda ha rubaju.
41006033	Baitu abantu baingi baabarora nibagenda, baabamanyirra; baaruga omu byaro byona nibairuka baababanzaayo.
41006034	Yesu obu yarugire omu bwato yarora ekitebe ky'abantu baingi, yabakwatirwa embabazi, habwokuba bakaba nibasisana entaama ezitaina muliisa; yatandika kubeegesa ebintu bingi.
41006035	Obwire obu bukaba buli haihi kwira, abeegesebwa be baamwizira nibagamba bati: “Linu irungu, kandi n'obwire bwasa kwira;
41006036	raga abantu, bagende omu maka n'omu byaro ebiri haihi, beegurreyo ebyokulya.”
41006037	Baitu uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Inywe mubahe ebyokulya.” Nabo baamukaguza bati: “Tugende tugule emigaati ya edinaali, niyo tubahe balye?”
41006038	Nandiki uwe ati: “Mwinaho emigaati ingaha? Mugende murole.” Obu baamazire kwetegereza, baamugarukamu bati: “Twinaho emigaati etaano n'encu ibiri.”
41006039	Nubwo yaragiire boona kwegaba omu bitebe, baikarre hansi ha bunyansi obubisi.
41006040	Baikarra omu bitebe bya kikumi-kikumi n'ebya makumi ataano-ataano.
41006041	Yakwata emigaati etaano n'encu ibiri, yararamira ha iguru, yasiima; emigaati yagicwamu, yagiha abeegesebwa be bagigabire abantu; kandi n'encu ibiri yaigabira boona.
41006042	Boona baalya, baiguta.
41006043	Hanyuma baasorooza oburagalika bw'emigaati n'obw'encu bwaijuza ebigega ikumi na bibiri.
41006044	Abo abaaliire emigaati baahikaga basaija enkumi itaano.
41006045	Ahonaaho Yesu yaragira abeegesebwa be okugwerra omu bwato, bumabanze kwambuka nseeri Betisaida, uwe nakyaraga abantu.
41006046	Obu yamazire kubaraga, yatemba omu busozi kubaza na Ruhanga.
41006047	Obwire obu bwaizire, obwato bwasangwa buli omu nyanja hagati, uwe asigaire wenka ha bwerre.
41006048	Yarora nkooku bakaba nibalemesibwa kugoya obwato habwokuba omuyaga gukaba gubaturukire omu maiso. Ha saaha nka ikumi z'ekiro yabaizira naarubatira ha maizi. Yasisana kubahinguraho,
41006049	baitu obu baamurozire naarubatira ha maizi, baatekereza ngu muzimu, baayamuza;
41006050	habwokuba boona bakamurora, baayekanga. Ahonaaho yabahuumuza ati: “Muhuumule, ninyowe; mutatiina.”
41006051	Yatemba omu bwato nambere bakaba bali; omuyaga gwaculeera. Kandi baatangaara muno;
41006052	habwokuba batasoborokerwe eby'emigaati habw'okutahwituka.
41006053	Obu baamazire kwambuka, baahika omu nsi ya Genesareeti; obwato bwabu baabusibika ha musa.
41006054	Obu baarugire omu bwato, ahonaaho abantu baamanyirra Yesu,
41006055	baatandika kurabangana omu byaro ebiherraineho, baaleeta abarwaire, babahimbiire ha butabu bwabu, nibabamusangisa hoona ha baahurraga ali.
41006056	Hoona nambere yahikaga, omu byaro rundi omu mbuga rundi omu masamba baabyamyaga abarwaire omu ntangatangano, nibamwesengereza ngu, haakire bakwate ha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye; kandi boona abaakwasireho bakakira.
41007001	Abafalisaayo obu baamwesoroliizeho n'abandi ha beegesa b'ebiragiro abakaba barugire Yerusaalemu,
41007002	bakarora abamu ha beegesebwa ba Yesu nibalya batanaabire engaro.
41007003	(Habwokuba Abafalisaayo n'Abayudaaya boona tibalya batanaabire omu ngaro, nibalinda emigenzo y'abaisenkurubo;
41007004	obu baarugaga omu katale, tibalyaaga batakoogere; kandi baina emigenzo endi nyingi ei baalindaga: Nk'okwogya ebikopo, ebinaga, n'ebibindi eby'omulinga.)
41007005	Abafalisaayo n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro nukwo kumukaguza bati: “Habwaki abeegesebwa baawe batahondera emigenzo y'abaisenkuruitwe, baitu balya batanaabire engaro?”
41007006	Yabagarukamu ati: “Bagobya inywe, Isaaya ebi yarangire hali inywe bikahika nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: ‘Ab'ihanga linu bampaisaniza n'ebigambo byabo, baitu emitima yabo tendoho;
41007007	bandamiza busa, nibeegesa ebyatairweho abantu ngu niyo nyegesa ya Ruhanga.’
41007008	“Muleka Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga, mugumira ha migenzo y'abantu.”
41007009	Yayongera yabagambira ati: “Ka mwina amagezi maingi ag'okwanga Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga, nukwo mugumire ha migenzo yanyu!
41007010	Ningira Musa akagamba ati: ‘Otiinege sso na nyoko;’ kandi ati: ‘Anyakujuma ise rundi nyina, mazimakwo aitwege’;
41007011	baitu inywe mugamba muti: ‘Omuntu kakuba agambira ise rundi nyina ati: Eki naakuhaire niyo Korbaani’ (amakuru gaakyo ngu: kihongiirwe Ruhanga)
41007012	muba mutakyamwikiriza kukorra ise na nyina ekirungi kyona.
41007013	Nukwo mudibya ekigambo kya Ruhanga habw'emigenzo yanyu ei mugweterangana. Kandi mukora n'ebindi bingi nk'ebi.”
41007014	Akagaruka yayeta abantu, yabagambira ati: “Inywena mumpurre kandi mwetegereze;
41007015	busaho kintu ekiruga aheeru y'omuntu ekisobora kumusiisa; baitu ekimuruga omu nda nikyo kimusiisa.
41007016	Anyakwina amatu, ahurre.”
41007017	Obu yarugire omu bantu, amazire n'okutaaha omu nju, abeegesebwa be baamukaguza amakuru g'orufumo oru.
41007018	Yabagarukamu ati: “Na inywe timukeetegeriize? Timurukumanya ngu, ekintu kyona ekiruga aheeru kikataaha omu muntu tikisobora kumusiisa?
41007019	Habwokuba tikitaaha omu mutima gwe, baitu kitaaha omu nda ye, kirabamu, kituruka aheeru.” (Nukwo yagumize ati ebyokulya byona nkooku biri birungi.)
41007020	Yayongera ati: “Ekiruga omu muntu nikyo kimusiisa;
41007021	habwokuba omu mutima gw'omuntu omunda nuho haaruga ebiteekerezo ebibi, obusiihani bw'abahuuru, obusuma, obwisi, n'obusiihani bw'abaswire n'abaswirwe,
41007022	okwegomba kubi, itima, obucwangya, orwanju, ihali, okuhangirra, okwehaisa, n'obudoma.
41007023	Ebibi ebi byona biruga omu muntu omu nda, kandi nibyo bimusiisa.”
41007024	Yesu yaimuka yarugayo, yagenda omunsi ya Taya na Sidooni. Obu yahikireyo, yataaha omu nju, atagonze muntu weena amanye nambere ali; baitu nabwo atasobole kwesereka.
41007025	Ahonaaho omukazi ow'akaba aina muhara we aroho omwoyo omubi, obu yamuhuliireho, yaija, yagwa ha bigere bye.
41007026	Kandi omukazi ogu akaba ali Mugiriiki, nzaarwa ya Fonisiya. Yamwesengereza abinge omwoyo omubi guruge ha muhara we.
41007027	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Leka abaana bonyini babanze balye, baigute, habwokuba tikirukuhika kwaka abaana ebyokulya, okabinagira embwa.”
41007028	Baitu omukazi yamugambira ati: “Ego, Waitu, baitu embwa ezibunda hansi y'emeeza nazo zirya oburagalika bw'ebyokulya by'abaana.”
41007029	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Habw'okugarukamu oti, ogende n'obusinge; muhara waawe, omwoyo omubi gumurugireho.”
41007030	Omukazi yataaha omuka, yasanga omwana abyamire omu kitabu, omwoyo omubi gumurugireho.
41007031	Yesu yagaruka naaruga omu kicweka kya Taya, yaraba Sidooni, yahika ha nyanja ya Galiraaya naaraba omu isaza ly'Embuga Ikumi.
41007032	Nuho baamuleetiire omusaija kiigaramatu kandi arukuhebebera; baamwesengereza amuteho emikono.
41007033	Obu yamwihire omu kitebe ky'abantu, amutwaire ha rubaju, yata enkumu ze omu matu ga kiigara, kandi yacwa amacwanta, yamukora ha rulimi;
41007034	obu yarozire haiguru, yasinda, yamugambira ati: “Efata,” amakuru gaakyo ngu: “Iguka.”
41007035	Amatu ge gaiguka, orulimi rwe rwabohorroka, yabaza kurungi.
41007036	kandi Yesu yabateererra kutagambiraho muntu n'omu; baitu nambere yahikize kubateererra, bbo bakakizaaho kukirangaaniza.
41007037	Kandi bakahunirra muno nibagamba bati: “Ebintu byona abikozire kurungi, naahuliza abafu b'amatu kandi naagambisa abafu b'eminwa.”
41008001	Omu biro ebi, ekitebe ky'abantu obu kyagarukire kwesorooza, kandi bataina kyokulya, Yesu yayeta abeegesebwa be, yabagambira ati:
41008002	“Ninganyira abantu banu, habwokuba bamazire na nyowe ebiro bisatu, bataina eki barukulya;
41008003	obu ndabaraga kugaruka owaabubo bataliire, nibaija kugwa ensazi omu muhanda; kandi abamu omuli bo barugire hara.”
41008004	Abeegesebwa be baamugarukamu bati: “Nikisoboka kita omuntu kutungira abantu banu boona ebyokulya omuirungu munu?”
41008005	Nawe nukwo kubakaguza ati: “Mwinaho emigaati ingaha?” Nandiki bbo bati: “Musanju.”
41008006	Yaragira ekitebe ky'abantu kwikarra hansi; yakwata emigaati musanju, obu yamazire kusiima, yagicwamu, yagiha abeegesebwa be kugigabira abantu; baagibagabira.
41008007	Kandi bakaba bainaho obucu buke; nabwo yabusiimira, yaragira babugabire abantu.
41008008	Baalya, baiguta. Baasorooza oburagalika obwasigaireho, bwaijuza ebigega musanju.
41008009	Abaaliire baahikaga nk'enkumi ina.
41008010	Yabaraga; ahonaaho yagwerra omu bwato hamu n'abeegesebwa be, yagenda omu nsi ya Dalmanuta.
41008011	Abafalisaayo bakaija baatandika kumuteeza empaka, nibamusaba ekihuniriza ekirukuruga hali Ruhanga, nibamulenga.
41008012	Uwe yasinda n'agamba ati: “Habwaki ab'ebiro binu nibasaba ekihuniriza? Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Busaho kihuniriza ekiriheebwa ab'ebiro binu.”
41008013	Yabasigaho, yagaruka yagwerra omu bwato, yayambuka nseeri.
41008014	Abeegesebwa bakaba beeberwe kutwara entanda, kyonka omu bwato bakaba bainamu omugaati gumu gwonka.
41008015	Uwe yabahabura ati: “Barungi bange, mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafalisaayo n'ekya Herode.”
41008016	Nukwo bbo kutandika kukaguzangana bati: “Ekirukumugambisa kiti, habwokuba titwina mugaati.”
41008017	Yesu obu yakyetegeriize, yabakaguza ati: “Eky'okutaba na mugaati nimukibalizaho ki? Timukamanyire rundi timukeetegeriize? Emitima yanyu tekahwitukire?
41008018	Ka mwina amaiso, timurukurora? Ka mwina amatu, timurukuhurra? Rundi timurukwijuka?
41008019	Obu naacwire emigaati etaano nagiriisa abantu enkumi itaano, oburagalika obu mwasoroize bukaijuza ebigega bingaha?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Ikumi na bibiri.”
41008020	“Kandi obu nacwire emigaati musanju nagiriisa abantu enkumi ina, oburagalika obu mwasoroize bukaijuza ebigega bingaha?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Musanju.”
41008021	Yabakaguza ati: “Nabwo timukeetegeriize?”
41008022	Baahika Betisaida. Abantu abamu baamuleetera omufu w'amaiso, baamwesengereza amukwateho.
41008023	Yakwata omufu w'amaiso ha mukono, yamwiha omu kyaro eki; obu yamazire kumucwa amacwanta ha maiso, amutaireho n'emikono, yamukaguza ati: “Oina eki orukurora?”
41008024	Omusaija ogu yainunuka, yagarukamu ati: “Nindora abantu; baitu nibasisana nk'emiti erukugenda.”
41008025	Yesu yayongera yamuta engaro ha maiso. Uwe yahweza, yakira, yarora kurungi ebintu byona.
41008026	Yamwohereza kutaaha owaabu, naamugambira ati: “Otahunguka noobu haakuba omu kyaro kinu.”
41008027	Yesu yayongera kugenda omu byaro bya Kaisaariya Filipi aina abeegesebwa be; obu bakaba nibagenda, yabakaguza ati: “Abantu baanyeta bata?”
41008028	Baamugarukamu bati: “Abamu bagamba ngu: Yohaana Omubatiza; abandi ngu: Eriya; n'abandi ngu: Omu ha barangi.”
41008029	Nandiki uwe ati: “Baitu inywe munyeta muta?” Petero yamugarukamu ati: “Niiwe Kristo.”
41008030	Yabateererra ati: “Eki mummanyireho, mutakigambira muntu.”
41008031	Akatandika kubamanyisa Omwana w'omuntu nkooku asemeriire kubonabonesibwa omu bintu bingi n'okwangwa abakuru b'abantu, n'abanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, n'okwitwa kandi ahumburwe haahingwireho ebiro bisatu.
41008032	Ebi byona akabigamba bbwa. Nubwo Petero yatwaire Yesu ha rubaju, yatandika kumuhana.
41008033	Baitu Yesu obu yahindukire, arozire abeegesebwa be, yacoomera Petero ati: “Ngaruka enyuma iwe Sitaani! Habwokuba ebi orukuteekereza tibiri bya Ruhanga, baitu by'abantu.”
41008034	Yayeta ekitebe ky'abantu hamu n'abeegesebwa be, yabagambira ati: “Weena anyakugonza kumpondera, ayehwemu wenka, ahimbe omusaraba gwe, ampondere.
41008035	Habwokuba weena anyakutaatira obwomeezi bwe, alibufeerwa; kandi weena anyakuhayo obwomeezi bwe habwange na habw'Amakuru Amarungi, alibujuna.
41008036	Baitu omuntu nikimugasa ki okutunga ensi yoona, kandi akafeerwa obwomeezi bwe?
41008037	Kintu ki omuntu eki asobora kuhayo okucungura obwomeezi bwe?
41008038	Baitu weena arukunkwatirwa ensoni rundi akaikwatirwa ebigambo byange omu businge bunu obuhabire kandi obubi, Omwana w'omuntu nawe alimukwatirwa ensoni obu aliija aina ekitiinisa kya Ise, asendekeriziibwe abamalaika be abahikiriire.”
41009001	Yesu yayongera ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Haroho abamu abeemeriire hanu abatalihikwaho rufu batakarozire bukama bwa Ruhanga nibwija n'obusobozi.”
41009002	Obu haahingwireho ebiro mukaaga, Yesu yatwara Petero, Yakobbo na Yohaana, yabatembya ha rusozi oruraihire bali bonka, yahinduka omu maiso gaabu,
41009003	ebyokujwara bye byayangasana, byayera tiitiiti; kandi busaho mwogi w'engoye omu nsi ayaakusoboire kubyezaakwo.
41009004	Eriya na Musa baababonekera, nibabaza na Yesu.
41009005	Petero nukwo kugambira Yesu ati: “Mwegesa, kirungi itwe kusangwa hanu. Katwombeke obusiisira busatu: akamu kaawe, akamu ka Musa, n'akandi k'Eriya.”
41009006	Baitu atamanye eki arukugamba, habwokuba bbo bakaba nibatiina muno.
41009007	Ekicu kyaija kyabasiikiriza, iraka lyaruga omu kicu nirigamba liti: “Onu nuwe Mwana wange omugonzibwa, mumuhurre.”
41009008	Ahonaaho obu bamagamagire, tibarora muntu n'omu kwihaho Yesu wenka.
41009009	Obu bakaba nibasirimuka orusozi, Yesu yabateererra okutagambiraho muntu weena ebi baarozire, okuhika Omwana w'omuntu obu alikamara kuhumbuuka omu bafu.
41009010	Ekigambo eki baakiculerra, nibakaguzangana ngu: Okuhumbuuka omu bafu nikimanyisa ki?
41009011	Nubwo baamukagwize bati: “Habwaki abeegesa b'ebiragiro bagamba ngu, Eriya nuwe alibanza kwija?”
41009012	Yabagarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo Eriya nuwe alibanza kwija, nukwo atereekereze byona; baitu kitahandiikwe kiti hali Omwana w'omuntu ngu: asemeriire kubonabonesibwa omu bintu bingi n'okugaywa?
41009013	Kyonka nyowe nimbagambira nti: Eriya akaija ira, kandi bakamukora kyona eki baagondeze, nkooku kyamuhandiikirweho.”
41009014	Obu baahikire hali abeegesebwa abandi, baarora ekitebe kingi ky'abantu kibeehinguliriize kandi abeegesa b'ebiragiro nibabateeza empaka.
41009015	Ahonaaho ekitebe ky'abantu obu baamurozire, baahunirra muno, bairuka baagenda nambere ali kumutangirra.
41009016	Nawe nukwo kubakaguza ati: “Nimubateereza ki empaka?”
41009017	Omu hali bo yamugarukamu ati: “Mwegesa, nkuleetiire mutabani wange, aina omwoyo omubi ogurukumutanga kubaza.
41009018	Nambere gukamukwatira hoona, gumuteera hansi; aleeta ifuro, kandi anena amaino, ayomangana. Nkasaba abeegesebwa baawe kugubinga, baalemwa.”
41009019	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Inywe ab'obusinge obutarukwikiriza, ndiikara na inywe kuhikya di? Ndibagumiisiriza kuhikya di? Mumundeetere.”
41009020	Baamuleetera omwojo. Omwoyo omubi obu gwamurozire, ahonaaho gwakankaniza omwojo, yagwa hansi, yayekulingura yaleeta ifuro omu kanwa.
41009021	Yesu yakaguza ise omwana ati: “Amazire kasumi ki arwaire endwara enu?” Yamugarukamu ati: “Kuruga omu buto bwe.
41009022	Emirundi nyingi gumunaga omu murro n'omu maizi kumwita; baitu obu oraaba oina eki orukusobora kukora, otugirre embabazi kandi otukonyere.”
41009023	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Ogambire oti: obu oraaba oina eki orukusobora? Omuntu anyakwikiriza asobora ebintu byona.”
41009024	Ahonaaho ise omwana yatokera haigura naagamba ati: “Ego ninyikiriza; baitu nganyira habw'okwikiriza kwange okuke!”
41009025	Yesu obu yarozire ikitebe ky'abantu nibeeseesa nambere ali, yacoomera omwoyo omubi ati: “Iwe omwoyo ogutarukugamba kandi ogufiire amatu, ninkuragira omurugeho, kandi otalimugarukaho obundi.”
41009026	Omwoyo omubi obu gwamazire kutoka, gwamukankaniza muno, gwamurugaho, kandi omwojo yasisana nk'omutumbi. Nikyo abantu abarukukira obwingi omuli bo baagambiire bati: “Omwojo afiire.”
41009027	Baitu Yesu yamukwata ha mukono, yamwimukya, omwojo yayemerra.
41009028	Kandi Yesu obu yamazire kutaaha omu nju, abeegesebwa be baamukaguza omu nsita bati: “Habwaki itwe twalemerwe kugubinga?”
41009029	Yabagarukamu ati: “Omwoyo omubi ogw'omulingo gunu, tigusobora kubingwa ekintu kindi kyona kwihaho okusaba n'okusiiba.”
41009030	Obu baarugire aho, baaraba omu Galiraaya. kandi atagonze muntu n'omu akimanye;
41009031	habwokuba akaba naayegesa abeegesebwa be naabagambira ati: “Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abantu, bamwite; obu alimara kwitwa, hakahinguraho ebiro bisatu alihumbuuka.”
41009032	Baitu bateetegereze eki agambire kandi baatiina kumukaguza.
41009033	Baahika Kafaranaumu; kandi Yesu obu yamazire kutaaha omu nju yabakaguza ati: “Mubaire nimubazaaho ki omu muhanda?”
41009034	Baitu bbo baaculeera kwonka, habwokuba obu babaire omu muhanda bakakaguzangana ngu, Omukuru omulibo nooha?
41009035	Nawe nukwo kwikarra, yayeta ikumi na babiri, yabagambira ati: “Weena arukugonza kuba w'okubanza naasemerra kuba w'okumalirrayo omu boona, kandi muheereza wa boona.”
41009036	Yakwata omwana yamuleeta hagati yabo, yamukiikira omu mikono ye, naabagambira ati:
41009037	“Weena araajwahukirraga omwana nk'onu omu ibara lyange, buli ajwahukiriire nyowe; kandi weena araanjwahukirraga, buli tajwahukiriire nyowe baitu ajwahukiriire Ogu ayantumiire.”
41009038	Yohaana yamugambira ati: “Mwegesa, tukarora omuntu naabinga emyoyo emibi omu ibara lyawe; twamutanga, habwokuba akaba atarukukwataniza na itwe.”
41009039	Baitu Yesu yagamba ati: “Muleke kumutanga. Busaho muntu akora eky'amaani omu ibara lyange nukwo hanyuma akanguha kumbazaaho kubi.
41009040	Weena atarukutuhakaniza, buli ali habwaitu.
41009041	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Weena abaha ekikopo ky'amaizi kunywa, habwokuba muli bange, taliburwa mpeera ye.”
41009042	“Weena alyesiitaza omu ha bato banu abarukunyikiriza akagwa omu kibi, haakire abohwe orubengo rukooto omu bikya, anagwe omu nyanja.
41009043	Kandi omukono gwawe obu guraaba nigukuleetereza okusiisa, gutemeho; haakire otaahe omu bwomeezi ogookere, kukira kugenda omu kiinongoro ky'omurro oina emikono ebiri.[
41009044	Oku nambere hali enzito ezitafwa n'omurro ogutaraara.]
41009045	Okuguru kwawe obu kuraaba nikukuleetereza kusiisa, kutemeho; haakire otaahe omu bwomeezi oli mulema, kukira kunagwa omu murro ogutahwaho oina amaguru abiri. [
41009046	Oku nambere hali enzito ezitafwa n'omurro ogutaraara.]
41009047	Kandi eriiso lyawe obu liraaba nirikuleetereza kusiisa, liihemu; haakire otaahe omu bukama bwa Ruhanga oina eriiso limu, kukira kunagwa omu murro ogutahwaho oina amaiso abiri.
41009048	Oku nambere hali enzito ezitafwa n'omurro ogutaraara.
41009049	Habwokuba buli muntu alisemezibwa omurro nk'ekisura oku kisemeza ebyokulya.
41009050	Ekisura kirungi; baitu kakuba kihoibwamu orusa, mulirugarramu muta? Enyikara yanyu ikalege neenulirra nk'ekisura, kandi mwikarane n'obusinge.”
41010001	Yesu obu yarugireyo, yagenda omu kicweka kya Buyudaaya ekiri nseeri y'ekisaaru Yorudaani. Ebitebe by'abantu byagaruka kumwesoroolezaaho, nawe yayongera kubeegesa, nkooku engeso ye ekaba eri.
41010002	Abafalisaayo baija nambere ali, baamukaguza nibamulenga bati: “Ebiragiro bya Musa nibiikiriza omusaija kubinga mukazi we?”
41010003	Nawe yabakaguza ati: “Musa akabaragira ki?”
41010004	Baamugarukamu bati: “Musa akaikiriza omuntu kuhandiika ebbaruha y'okwahukana na mukazi we, nukwo amubinge.”
41010005	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Habw'okugumangana kw'emitima yanyu, nikyo yabahandiikiriire ekiragiro eki.
41010006	Habwokuba okuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi: ‘Rubanga akahanga omusaija n'omukazi.’
41010007	‘Nikyo omusaija araalekeraga ise na nyina, agumire hali mukazi we,
41010008	kandi ababiri abo bafooke mubiri gumu.’ Habweki baba batakyali babiri baitu omu.
41010009	Nababweki Ruhanga eki yateeraniize hatalibaho muntu akyahukaniza.”
41010010	Obu baahikire omunju, abeegesebwa be baayongera kumukaguza ha kigambo eki.
41010011	Uwe yabagambira ati: “Weena anyakubinga mukazi we, akaswera ondi, buli asiihaine;
41010012	kandi n'omukazi anyakwahukana na iba, akaswerwa ondi, buli nawe asiihaine.”
41010013	Abantu bakamuleetera abaana, abakwateho; baitu abeegesebwa be baacoomera ababaleesire.
41010014	Yesu obu yarozire eki yabiihirwa, kandi yabagambira ati: “Muleke abaana baije nambere ndi, mutabatanga habwokuba abali nk'abo, obukama bw'omu iguru bwabo.
41010015	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena ataikiriza bukama bwa Ruhanga nk'omwana, talibutaahamu.”
41010016	Yabakiikira, yabaha omugisa, abataireho emikono ye.
41010017	Yesu obu akaba naimukya orugendo, haija omusigazi nairuka, yateeza amaju omu maiso ge, yamukaguza ati: “Mwegesa omurungi, nsemeriire kukora ki okugwetwa omu bwomeezi obutahwaho?”
41010018	Yesu nawe yamukaguza ati: “Habwaki nonyeta murungi? Busaho murungi kwihaho Ruhanga wenka.
41010019	Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga obimanyire. Otaliita. Otalisiihana. Otaliiba. Otalihangirra. Otaligobya. Otiinege sso na nyoko.”
41010020	Nandiki oli ati: “Mwegesa, ebi byona nkabikwata okuruga omu buto bwange.”
41010021	Yesu nukwo kumurolerra, yamugonza, yamugambira ati: “Nooburwaho ekintu kimu; genda otunde ebi oinabyo, sente eziraarugamu ozigabire abanaku, nubwo olitunga itungo omu iguru; nukwo oije onkuraatire.”
41010022	Omusigazi obu yahuliire ekigambo eki, yagwerwa, yagenda aina obujune, habwokuba akaba aina itungo lingi.
41010023	Yesu nukwo kubabungyamu amaiso, yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Ka nikiremeera abaguuda kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga!”
41010024	Abeegesebwa be baahunirra habw'ebigambo bye. Baitu Yesu yayongera kubasoborra ati: “Baana inywe, ka nikiremeera abarukwesiga itungo okutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga!
41010025	Nikirahuka engamiya kuraba omu nyindo y'enkinzo, okukira omuguuda kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.”
41010026	Bbo bakahunirra muno, baakaguzangana bati: “Mara nooha alisobora kujunwa?”
41010027	Yesu nukwo kubarolerra yagamba ati: “Kinu abantu tibakisobora, baitu Ruhanga akisobora; habwokuba Ruhanga naasobora byona.”
41010028	Nubwo Petero yamugambiire ati: “Dora itwe, tukaleka byona, twakuhondera.”
41010029	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Busaho muntu n'omu ayasigire enju ye, rundi bagenzi be, rundi banyaanya, rundi nyina, rundi ise, rundi abaana be, rundi ebibanja bye habwange na habw'Amakuru Amarugni,
41010030	atatunga emirundi kikumi omu kasumi kanu: amaju, bagenzi be, banyaanya, nyina, abaana n'ebibanja, nukwo oteho okuhiiganizibwa; kandi omu busumi oburukwija alitunga obwomeezi obutahwaho.
41010031	Baitu baingi ab'okubanza baliba b'enyuma, kandi ab'enyuma baliba b'okubanza.”
41010032	Obu bakaba bali omu muhanda nibagenda Yerusaalemu Yesu abeebembiire, abeegesebwa be baahunirra n'abandi abakaba bamuhondiire baatiina. Yagaruka yagarra ha rubaju ikumi na babiri, yatandika kubagambira ebirukwija kumubaho,
41010033	naagamba ati: “Dora nitugenda Yerusaalemu; Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo hali ba nyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro; balimucwera omusango gw'okufa, kandi balimuhayo hali Abanyamahanga;
41010034	balimujuma, bamucwere amacwanta, bamuteere enkoba, bamwite; kandi obu halihinguraho ebiro bisatu alihumbuuka.”
41010035	Yakobbo na Yohaana batabani ba Zebedaayo baamwirra haihi, baamugambira bati: “Mwegesa, nitugonza otukorre eki turaakusaba kyona.”
41010036	Yabakaguza ati: “Nimugonza mbakorre ki?”
41010037	Nandiki bbo bati: “Otwikirize omu akwikarre ha mukono gwawe ogw'obulyo n'ondi ha gw'emoso omu kitiinisa kyawe.”
41010038	Baitu Yesu yabagambira ati: “Timurukumanya eki murukusaba. Nimusobora kubagana ha mabone aga ndukwija kubonabona rundi ha mulingo ogw'okufa ogu ndukwija kufamu?”
41010039	Baamugarukamu bati: “Nitusobora.” Yesu yabagambira ati: “Ego, amabone aga ndukwija kubonabona na inywe muligabona, n'okufa, mulifa nkooku ndukwija kufa;
41010040	baitu okwikarra ha mukono gwange ogw'obulyo rundi ha gw'emoso tali nyowe arukukugaba, baitu kw'abo abaakuteekaniriziibwe.”
41010041	Abasigaireho ikumi, obu baahuliire eki, baabiihirirwa Yakobbo na Yohaana.
41010042	Yesu nukwo kubeeta yabagambira ati: “Mumanyire abo abeetwa abalemi b'Abanyamahanga nkooku babalemesa itwale, n'abakuru baabo babatwaza obusobozi.
41010043	Tikiriba kiti omuli inywe; baitu arukwenda kuba mukuru omuli inywe, abe muheereza wanyu,
41010044	kandi arukwenda kuba w'okubanza, abe mwiru wa boona.
41010045	Habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu nawe ataije kuheerezibwa, baitu okuheereza n'okuhayo obwomeezi bwe kucungura baingi.”
41010046	Bakataaha Yeriko; kandi obu akaba naarugayo aina abeegesebwa be n'ekitebe ky'abantu baingi, baasanga Batimaayo, mutabani wa Timaayo, omusabiirizi omufu w'amaiso, aikaliire ha muhanda rubaju.
41010047	Obu yahuliire ngu, ni Yesu owa Nazareeti, yatandika kutokera haiguru naagamba ati: “Yesu, Omwana wa Daudi, ongirre embabazi!”
41010048	Baingi baamucoomera ngu, aculeere; baitu yakizaaho kutokera haiguru ati: “Omwana wa Daudi ongirre embabazi.”
41010049	Yesu yayemerra, yagamba ati: “Mumwete, aije.” Baayeta omufu w'amaiso nibamugambira bati: “Huumura, imuka, naakweta.”
41010050	Yanaga omwenagiro gwe, yamatuka, yahika hali Yesu.
41010051	Yesu yamukaguza ati: “Nogonza nkukorre ki?” Nandiki omufu w'amaiso ati: “Mwegesa, ningonza ndole.”
41010052	Yesu yamugambira ati: “Wegendere; okwikiriza kwawe kukukirize.” Ahonaaho yarora, yagenda na Yesu.
41011001	Obu bairiire haihi na Yerusaalemu, bahikire Betifage na Betaniya haihi n'orusozi rw'emiti Oliva, nubwo Yesu yatumire babiri ha beegesebwa be,
41011002	yabagambira ati: “Mugende omu kyaro kiri eki muroleriire; obu muraaba nimutaahamu muti, murarora omwana gw'endogoyi ogutakatembwaga muntu; mugusibule, muguleete.
41011003	Obu haraabaho arukubakaguza ati: ‘Nimusibura gwaki?’ Mumugarukemu muti: ‘Mukama waitu nagwetaaga, kandi naija kugugarra bwango.’”
41011004	Baagenda, baasanga omwana gw'endogoyi gusibikirwe haihi n'irembo ha ruguudo rubaju; baagusibura.
41011005	Abantu abakaba beemeriireho nukwo kubakaguza bati: “Omwana gw'endogoyi nimusibura gwaki?”
41011006	Baabagarukamu Yesu eki yabagambiire, nabo baabaleka baagenda.
41011007	Baaleetera Yesu omwana gw'endogoyi, baagutaho ebijwaro byabu, yagwikarraho.
41011008	Abantu baingi baayarra ebijwaro byabu omu muhanda, abandi baayarra amataagi g'emiti aga bacwire omu ngonjo.
41011009	Boona abakaba babeebembiire n'abakaba babahondiire bakatoka bati: “Hangiriza! Ahaisanizibwe ogu arukwija omu ibara ly'Atahwaho!
41011010	Bw'omugisa obukama bwa isenkuru-itwe Daudi oburukwija! Hangiriza anyakusinga haiguru muno!”
41011011	Yesu yataaha Yerusaalemu, yagenda omu Nju ya Ruhanga obu yamazire kurora ebintu byona, kandi obwire buli haihi kwira, yaturuka mu rubuga yagenda Betaniya hamu na ikumi na babiri.
41011012	Obu bwakiire nyenkya, bakaba nibaruga Betaniya, yarumwa enjara.
41011013	Obu yalengera omuti omutini ogujumbire, yagenda kurora obu araaba nasobora kugusangaho ekijuma. Baitu obu yaguhikireho, atasangeho kantu kwihaho ebikoora byonka, habwokuba kakaba katali kasumi k'emitini kwaniramu.
41011014	Yagugambira ati: “Okuruga hati hatalibaho n'omu agaruka kukulyaho ekijuma.” Abeegesebwa be eki bakakihurra.
41011015	Baahika Yerusaalemu. Yataaha omu Nju ya Ruhanga, yatandika kubingamu abakaba nibatundiramu n'abakaba nibagurramu; kandi yajuumika emeeza ez'abakaba nibahingisa sente, n'entebe ez'abakaba nibatunda amaiba;
41011016	kandi ataikirize muntu weena kurabya ekintu omu Nju ya Ruhanga.
41011017	Yayegesa naabakaguza ati: “Kitahandiikwe kiti: ‘Enju yange eraayetwaaga Nju y'okusabiramu, ey'amahanga goona’? Baitu inywe mugifoire bwingira bw'abanyagi.”
41011018	Baanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro obu bahuliire eki baaserra omuhanda ogw'okumwita. Baitu bakamutiina, habwokuba enyegesa ye ekahuniriza abantu boona.
41011019	Obwire obu bukaba nibusweka, Yesu yaruga omu rubuga.
41011020	Nyenkya kara Yesu n'abeegesebwa be obu bakaba nibahingura, baarora omuti omutini gwomiire kimu okuhika ha mihama.
41011021	Petero yaijuka ekyabaireho, yagambira Yesu ati: “Mwegesa, dora! Omutini ogu wakyenere, hati gwomere.”
41011022	Yesu yagarukamu ati: “Inywe mwesigege Ruhanga.
41011023	Mazima nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena aligambira orusozi runu ati: ‘Sinduka, ogwe omu nyanja’ kandi atarukugurukyagurukya, baitu naikiriza ngu, eki arukugamba nikiija kubakwo, kirimukolerwa.
41011024	Nikyo ndukubagambirra nti: kyona eki muraasabaga nimwesengereza, nimwikiriza nkooku muraakitunga, mazimakwo muraakiheebwaga.
41011025	Obu muraabaga mwemeriire nimusaba, mwina ekigambo kyona ha muntu, mubanzege mumuganyire; na Isiinywe anyakuli omu iguru nukwo abaganyire ebibi byanyu.
41011026	[Baitu kakuba mutaganyira, na Isiinywe anyakuli omu iguru talibaganyira bibi byanyu.]”
41011027	Baayongera baahika Yerusaalemu. Yesu obu akaba naagendagenda omu Nju ya Ruhanga, abanyakatagara abakuru abeegesa b'ebiragiro, n'abakuru b'abantu baija nambere ali,
41011028	baamukaguza bati: “Busobozi ki oburukukukoza ebintu binu, kandi nooha yabukuhaire kubikora?”
41011029	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Na nyowe kambakaguze ekekaguzo kinu; obu murangarukamu, numwo ndabagambira obusobozi oburukunkoza ebi byona.
41011030	Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaruga hali Ruhanga rundi omu bantu? Mungarukemu.”
41011031	Baitu bbo baahakanizangana bonka bati: “Obu turagarukamu ngu: ‘Kukaruga hali Ruhanga,’ naija kutukaguza ati: ‘Habwaki mutaramwikiriize?’
41011032	Boojo tugarukemu tuti: ‘Kukaruga omu bantu?’ ” Baitu bakatiina abantu, habwokuba boona bananukire Yohaana nkooku akaba ali murangi mali.
41011033	Nahabweki baagarukamu Yesu bati: “Titumanyire.” Yesu nubwo yabagambiire ati: “Na nyowe tindukwija kubagambira obusobozi oburukunkoza binu.”
41012001	Yesu akatandika kubabaliza omu nfumo ati: “Omusaija akabyara orugonjo rwe rw'emizabbibbu, yaruzitirra orukoroba, yalimamu endeeba, yayombekamu endindiro, yarusigira abapangisa okururolerra; uwe yagenda omu ihanga erindi.
41012002	Obusumi bw'okunoga obu bwahikire, yatuma omuheereza hali abapangisa abo, bamutwekereho ebijuma by'emizaabbibbu.
41012003	Baitu abapangisa abo baakwata omuheereza, baamuteera, baamubinga yarugayo ngaro-nsa.
41012004	Yagaruka yabatumira omuheereza ondi; ogu baamuteera orubaale, baamuswaza.
41012005	Yatumayo ondi, ogu baamwita; n'abandi baingi nukwo baabagizire bati. Abamu baabateera, abandi baabaita.
41012006	Akaba akyasigaizeeho omuntu omu, nuwe mutabani we omugonzibwa ou yabatumiire ha kumalirra, naateekereza ati: ‘Mutabani wange baraamugayuka.’
41012007	Baitu abapangisa abo obu baamurozire, baagambirangana bati: ‘Onu nuwe mugwetwa. Muleke tumwite, obugwetwa bube bwaitu.’
41012008	Baamukwata, baamwita, baamunaga aheeru y'orugonjo.
41012009	Hati nu Mukama w'orugonjo oru alikora ki? Aliija, ahwerekereze abapangisa abo, kandi orugonjo arukwase abandi.
41012010	Timukasomaga ekyahandiikirwe kinu ekirukugamba kiti: ‘Ibaale lyonyini abombeki eri baayangire, niryo lyafookere bugumizo bw'enju;
41012011	kinu nikyo Atahwaho yakozire, kandi nikituhuniriza?’ ”
41012012	Baaserra okumukwata, baitu baatiina akanyanya k'abantu, kandi nibamanya orufumo oru nkooku arugambiire bbo; baamuleka baayegendera.
41012013	Bakamutumira abamu ha Bafalisaayo n'ab'ekitebe kya Herode bamutege omu bigambo bye.
41012014	Baija baamugambira bati: “Mwegesa nitumanya nkooku oli w'amazima, kandi tosoroora mu bantu; habwokuba tororra ha kitiinisa ky'abantu, baitu oyegesaakwo omuhanda gwa Ruhanga. Kihikire kuha Kaisaali omusoro rundi nangwa?
41012015	Tuhe omusoro rundi tuguleke?” Baitu uwe obu yamanyire obugobya bwabo, yabakaguza ati: “Nimuntegera ki? Mundeetere siringi, ngirole.”
41012016	Baagimuleetera. Uwe yabakaguza ati: “Ekisisani kinu n'ebihandiikirweho by'oha?” Nandiki bbo bati: “Bya Kaisaali.”
41012017	Yesu yabagambira ati: “Ebya Kaisaali mubihe Kaisaali, n'ebya Ruhanga mubihe Ruhanga.” Eki kikabahuniriza muno.
41012018	Abasadukaayo abahakana ngu, busaho kuhumbuuka, bakaija hali Yesu, baamukaguza bati:
41012019	“Mwegesa, Musa akatuhandiikira ati: Mukuru w'omuntu obu araafaaga akasiga omukazi atazaire baana, mugenzi wa kifa aswere omufaakati ogu, nukwo bazarre kifa abaana.
41012020	Aho nu hakaba haroho nyineemu musanju. Mukuru wabu yaswera omukazi, baitu yafa atasigire baana;
41012021	n'owa kabiri yamuswera, nawe yafa atasigire baana n'owa kasatu nukwo ati.
41012022	Okuhika boona musanju, obu baafiire batasigire baana. Abo boona obu bahoireho omukazi nawe yafa.
41012023	Ha kiro ky'okuhumbuuka aliba muk'oha? Habwokuba boona musanju bakamuswera.”
41012024	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Aho tinuho muhabira okutamanya Ebyahandiikirwe, noobu bwakuba obusobozi bwa Ruhanga?
41012025	Habwokuba abafiire obu balihumbuuka, tibaliswera kandi tibaliswerwa; baitu baliba nk'abamalaika ab'omwiguru.
41012026	Kandi ebirukukwata ha kuhumbuuka kw'abafu, timukasomaga omu kitabu kya Musa, omu kicweka ekirukugamba ha by'orusaka orurukwaka, Ruhanga nkooku yamugambiire ati: ‘Ninyowe Ruhanga owa Abburahamu, Ruhanga owa Isaaka, kandi Ruhanga owa Yakobbo?’
41012027	Tali Ruhanga ow'abafiire, baitu ow'aboomeezi; inywe muhabiire kimu.”
41012028	Kandi omu ha beegesa b'ebiragiro yaija, yahurra nibateezangana empaka, obu yamazire kwetegereza nkooku Yesu abagarukiremu kurungi, yamukaguza ati: “Ekiragiro ky'okubanza omu byona nikiha?”
41012029	Uwe yamugarukamu ati: “Eky'okubanza nikyo kinu: ‘Iwe Isirairi hurra, MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu nuwe MUKAMA wenka;
41012030	ogonzeege MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona, n'omwoyo gwawe gwona, n'amagezi gaawe goona, n'amaani gaawe goona.’
41012031	Ekya kabiri nkinu: ‘Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.’ Busaho kiragiro ekindi ekirukukira ebi.”
41012032	Omwegesa w'ebiragiro yamugambira ati: “Mwegesa ohikize. Ogambire ngu, Ruhanga ali omu, kandi busaho ondi, kwihaho Uwe wenka.
41012033	Kandi okumugonza n'omutima gwona, n'amagezi goona, n'amaani goona, kandi n'okugonza mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka, ebi nibikirra kimu ebyonzira ebyokiibwe n'ebitambirwe.”
41012034	Yesu obu yarozire nkooku agarukiremu n'amagezi, nubwo yamugambiire ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga tobuli hara.” Okuruga obu busaho n'omu ayagumire okumukaguza.
41012035	Yesu obu akaba naayegesa omunju ya Ruhanga akakaguza ati: “Abeegesa b'ebiragiro basobora bata kugamba ngu, Kristo aba mwijukuru wa Daudi?
41012036	Kandi kunu Daudi wenka akagambisibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire ati: ‘Atahwaho akagambira MUKAMA wange ati: Ikarra ha mukono gwange ogw' obulyo, okuhika abanya nzigwa baawe obu ndibafoora akatebe k'ebigere byawe.’
41012037	“Daudi wenka ayeta Kristo MUKAMA we; kandi obu, aba ata mwijukuru we?” Ekitebe kyona eky'abantu kyamuhurra n'okusemererwa.
41012038	Yesu obu akaba naayegesa, akagamba ati: “Mwerinde abeegesa b'ebiragiro abagonza kugendagenda bajwaire ekanzu ezirukwekweya, n'okuramukibwa n'ekitiinisa omu butale.
41012039	Bagonza kwikarra ha ntebe z'ekitiinisa omu masorrokaniro, n'ebiikaro ebirukukira oburungi omu magenyi.
41012040	Nubo abo abanyaga amaju g'abafaakati, hanyuma beezokesa nibarandagatana omu kusaba. Abo balicwerwa omusango ogurukukira ogw'abandi.”
41012041	Yesu akaba aikaliire aroleriire eryahurro lya sente. Yarora abantu baingi nibalitamu sente. Abaguuda baingi bakanagamu omuhendo mukooto.
41012042	Omufaakati omunaku yaija, yanagamu obusente bubiri bw'ebyoma.
41012043	Nukwo Yesu kweta abeegesebwa be, yabagambira ati: “Mazima nimbagambira nti: Omufaakati omunaku onu anagiremu nyingi okukira abandi boona abanagire omu lyahurro.
41012044	Habwokuba bbo banagiremu ebi basaagiriire; baitu uwe omu bunaku bwe ahaireyo byona ebi ainabyo.”
41013001	Yesu obu akaba naakyaruga omu Nju ya Ruhanga, omu ha beegesebwa be yamugambira ati: “Mwegesa, dora amabaale ganu n'ebyombeko binu, ka bikasemera!”
41013002	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Ebyombeko ebi ebikooto obiboine? Tihalisigara ibaale na limu eriri ha lindi, eritalinagwa hansi.”
41013003	Yesu obu akaba aikaliire ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva, aroleriire Enju ya Ruhanga, nubwo Petero, Yakobbo, Yohaana na Andereya baamukagwize omu nsita bati:
41013004	“Tugambire, binu biribaho di? Kandi karorwaho ki akalyoleka nkooku biri by'okuhikirra?”
41013005	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mwerinde hatalibaho muntu weena arukubahabisa.
41013006	Baingi abaliija omu ibara lyange nibagamba bati: ‘Ninyowe ogu!’ Kandi balihabisa baingi.
41013007	Obu mulihurra obulemu n'orugambo rw'obulemu, mutalitiina; ebi by'okubaho, baitu empero eriba etakahikire.
41013008	Ihanga liriimukirra erindi, n'obukama bulirwanisa obundi; halibaho emisisa omu biikaro bingi kandi haligwa ekiihe; baitu egi niyo ntandiko y'emihito.
41013009	“Inywe mwerinde, habwokuba balibahayo omu nkurato, balibaterra omu masorrokaniro; mulyemerra omumaiso g'abalemi n'ag'abakama habwange, mube bakaiso bange hali bo.
41013010	Amakuru Amarungi gabanze garangirirwe omu mahanga goona.
41013011	Obu balibatwara, bakabahayo kutongana emisango, mutalitunturra ebi muligamba, baitu mugambe kyona eki muliheebwa omu kasumi ako; habwokuba tibali inywe abalyetonganirra, baitu mulitonganirirwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
41013012	Omuntu alihayo owanyina aitwe, na ise mwana alihayo omwana we, n'abaana baliimukirra abazaire baabo babaise;
41013013	na inywe mulinobwa boona habwange. Baitu ogu aligumisiriza okuhika ha mpero, nuwe alijunwa.”
41013014	“Baitu obu mulirora ekintu ekibi, ekirukunugwa kandi ekirukuhwerekereza, kitairwe nambere kitasemeriire kuba (arukusoma binu ayetegereza); obu, abo abaliba bali omu Buyudaaya bairukire ha nsozi.
41013015	Alisangwa ali ha nju eruguru atalisirimuka, kandi atalitaaha omunju ye kwihamu ekintu kyona;
41013016	n'ow'alisangwa ali omu musiri ataligaruka omuka kutabarra omwenagiro gwe.
41013017	Kandi bambi abaliba baina enda n'abarukwonkya omu biro ebi balikibona!
41013018	Musabe, ebi bireke kubaho omu biro by'obutiti.
41013019	Habwokuba omu biro ebi halibaho omuhito ogutakabahoga okuruga Ruhanga yakaba kuhanga ensi n'okuhika hati, kandi ogutaligaruka kubaho.
41013020	Kakuba MUKAMA atarakeeheze ha biro ebi, tihaakujunirwe muntu n'omu; baitu habw'abakomerwemu be, ebiro ebi Ruhanga akabikeehya.
41013021	Omuntu weena obu alibagambira ati: ‘Dora, Kristo ngunu!’ Rundi ‘Ngugwo!’ mutalikiikiriza.
41013022	Halizooka abarangi b'ebisuba n'abarukweyeta Kristo. Balikora ebyamahano n'ebirukuhuniriza, nukwo bahabise noobu baakubaire abakomerwemu.
41013023	Baitu inywe mwerinde; ebi byona mbibagambiire bitakabaireho.”
41013024	“Baitu emihito y'ebiro ebi obu erihwa, izooba lirisiikirizibwa omwirima, n'okwezi tikulijwa,
41013025	n'enyunyuuzi ez'omu iguru ziryeseesa hansi, n'amaani ag'omwiguru galitengesebwa.
41013026	Obu nubwo balirora Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu bicu by' omwiguru aina obusobozi bwingi n'ekitiinisa.
41013027	Nubwo alituma bamalaika basorooze abakomerwemu be, nibabaiha omu mbaju ina ez'ensi, okuruga iguru n'ensi nambere bitandikira okuhika nambere bigarukira.”
41013028	“Mwegere ha muti omutini, itaagi lyagwo obu lirokera, likanjurra amababi, mumanya nkooku ekyanda kiri haihi.
41013029	Na inywe obu mulirora binu nibibaho, mumanye Omwana w'omuntu nkooku ali haihi, ahikiire kimu ha irembo.
41013030	Mazima nimbagambira nti: Ab'obusinge bunu tibalihwaho ebi byona bitakabaireho.
41013031	Iguru n'ensi birihwaho, baitu ebigambo byange tibirihwaho.”
41013032	“Baitu ekiro eki n'esaaha egi busaho n'omu abimanyire, noobu baakuba bamalaika ab'omwiguru, noobu yakuba Mwana wonyini, kwihaho Isenyowe wenka.
41013033	Mwerinde, mwikale nimurora kandi musabe, habwokuba titumanyire akasumi ako nambere kalihikira.
41013034	Nikisisana nk'omuntu arukugenda orugendo; obu aba naaruga omu ka asiga akwasize abaheereza be, buli omu omulimo ogu araakora; kandi aragira omukumirizi kwikara naalinda.
41013035	Nahabweki, mwikale nimurora, habwokuba timumanyire kasumi nyineeka akaliiziramu: asobora kwija omu kairirizi rundi omu itumbi rundi enkoko niikooka, rundi omu rukyakya.
41013036	Kakuba aija aleke kubagwamu akasanga mugwijagiire.
41013037	Ekindukubagambira, nikyo ngambira n'abandi boona nti: Mwikale nimurora.”
41014001	Hakaba hasigaire ebiro bibiri okuhika ha bugenyi bw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho n'obw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe. Baanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro bakaba nibaserra amagezi nkooku baraakwata Yesu abantu batamanyire, nukwo bamwite;
41014002	baitu bakagamba bati: “Tutamukwata ha kiro kikuru, tihaikara kubaho epumpu omu bantu.”
41014003	Yesu obu akaba ali Betaniya, omunju ya Simooni omugenge, aikaliire naalya, hakaija omukazi aina ihembe ly'amagita agarukuboya kurungi ag'omuhendo mwingi, yafundukura ihembe, amagita yagamuseesa ha mutwe.
41014004	Baitu hakabaho abamu abagambirangaine babiihirwe bati: “Amagita ganu gafiire ki?
41014005	Amagita ganu gaakusoboire kuguzibwa habwa edinaali bikumi bisatu, zigabirwa abaseege.” Omukazi ogu baamuhyemera.
41014006	Baitu Yesu yabagambira ati: “Omukazi mumuleke; mumutuntuliize ki? Ankoliire ekintu kirungi.
41014007	Habwokuba abanaku obutoosa mwikara nabo. Obu muraagonzaaga bwona, musobora kubakorra ebirungi; baitu timurukwija kwikara na nyowe butoosa.
41014008	Onu akozire eki asoboire; omubiri gwange agusiigire kara gutakaziikirwe.
41014009	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Hoona hoona omunsi nambere Amakuru Amarungi ganu garaarangirirwaga, omukazi onu eki akozire kiraagambwahoga okumwijuka.”
41014010	Nubwo Yuda Isikalyota, omu ha ikumi na babiri yagenzire hali banyakatagara abakuru agobeze Yesu abamukwase.
41014011	Obu baakihuliire baasemererwa, baamunihiza kumuha sente. Nawe yaserra akasumi ak'okumubakwasa.
41014012	Ha kiro eky'okubanza eky'obugenyi bw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe, eki baatambirahoga omwana gw'entaama ogw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho, abeegesebwa be bakamukaguza bati: “Noogonza tugende tukuteekanirize nkaha, nambere oraliira obugenyi obw'Okuhingurwaho?”
41014013	Nubwo yatuma babiri ha beegesebwa be, nabagambira ati: “Mugende omu rubuga, muraatangaana omusaija ayetwekere ensoha y'amaizi; mumuhondere.
41014014	Nambere araataaha hoona, mugambire nyineeka muti: ‘Omwegesa naakukaguza ati: Ekisiika kyange eky'abagenyi kiraha nambere ndaaliira obugenyi obw'Okuhingurwaho hamu n'abeegesebwa bange?’
41014015	Uwe araabooleka ekisiika kikooto omu kainaabiri ekiteekaniziibwe, kirumu byona ebirukwetaagwa; oku nuho mututeekanirize.”
41014016	Abeegesebwa baimukya, baataaha omu rubuga, baasanga byona biri nkooku yabagambiire; baateekaniza obugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho.
41014017	Omu rwiririzi Yesu akaija hamu na ikumi na babiri.
41014018	Obu bakaba bali ha meeza nibalya, yagamba ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Omu omuli inywe naija kungobeza, kandi nuwe ogu arukulya na nyowe.”
41014019	Bbo baabanza kusaalirwa n'okumukaguza omu omu bati: “Ninyowe?”
41014020	Yabagarukamu ati: “Nuwe omu omuli inywe ikumi na babiri arukukoza na nyowe omu bbakuli.
41014021	Habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu naagenda nkooku kyamuhandiikirweho, baitu alikibona omuntu ogu arukugobeza Omwana w'omuntu! Kyakubaire kirungi omuntu ogu kakuba atarazairwe.”
41014022	Obu bakaba nibalya, Yesu yakwata omugaati yasiima, yagucwamu, kandi yaguha abeegesebwa be naagamba ati: “Mukwate, mulye, gunu nugwo mubiri gwange.”
41014023	Kandi yakwata ekikopo, obu yamazire kusiima, yakibaha; boona baanywaho.
41014024	Yabagambira ati: “Enu niyo sagama yange ey'ekiragaano ekihyaka, eraaseeswa habwa baingi.
41014025	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Tindigaruka kunywa ha nsande ey'ebijuma by'emizaabbibbu okuhika ha kiro eki, obu ndiginywa na inywe eri mpyaka omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.”
41014026	Obu baamazire kuzina ekizina baaturuka, baagenda ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva.
41014027	Nubwo Yesu yabagambiire ati: “Inywena nimwija kumpemukaho; habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Nditeera omuliisa, entaama zirarange.’
41014028	Kyonka obu ndimara kuhumburwa, ndibabanza okuhika Galiraaya.”
41014029	Baitu Petero yahaya naagamba ati: “Abandi boona noobu baraakuhemukaho, baitu nyowe ninkifuuhya!”
41014030	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mazima ninkugambira nti: Kiro kinu kyonyini, enkoko etakakookere kabiri, oraaba onyehoogere emirundi esatu.”
41014031	Baitu Petero yayongera kukigumiza kimu ati: “Noobu ndaaba ndi w'okufa na iwe, baitu tindukwija kukwehooga.” Kandi abandi boona nukwo baagambire bati.
41014032	Bakahika omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa Getesemaane. Yesu yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Mwikarre hanu, nyowe kangende nsabe.”
41014033	Yatwara Petero, Yakobbo, na Yohaana; yabanza kusaalirwa muno n'okutuntura.
41014034	Nubwo yabagambiire ati: “Omutima gwange gwina obujune bwingi, buraaliire kunyita. Mwikale hanu nimurora.”
41014035	Yagendaho kake omu maiso, yajuumara hansi, yayesengereza ngu, obu kiraaba nikisoboka, esaaha egi emuhinguleho.
41014036	Yagamba ati: “Abba”, amakuru ngu, Taata. “Ebintu byona noobisobora; onyiheho amabone ganu; nabwo kitaba nyowe nkooku ndukugonza, baitu kibe Iwe nkooku orukugonza.”
41014037	Yagaruka yabasanga bagwijagiire, yakaguza Petero ati: “Simooni ogwijagiire? Tosoboire kurora esaaha emu?
41014038	Murole kandi musabe, nukwo muleke kwohebwa; omutima nigugonza mali, baitu omubiri muceke.”
41014039	Yagarukayo yayesengereza naagamba ebigambo bimu na biri.
41014040	Baitu obu yagarukire, nabwo yabasanga bagwijagiire, habwokuba amaiso gaabo gakaba nigakamba. Kandi bbo baaburwa eki baramugarukamu.
41014041	Yagaruka omurundi gwa kasatu, yabagambira ati: “Na hati mukyagwijagiire, muhumwire? Kihoire; esaaha ehikire; Omwana w'omuntu aheebweyo omu mikono y'abasiisi.
41014042	Mwimuke tugende; arukungobeza ngugwo, airiire haihi.”
41014043	Ahonaaho obu akaba naakyabaza, Yuda, omu hali ikumi na babiri, yaija n'ekitebe ky'abantu baina empirima n'ebiduuma, batumirwe baanyakatagara abakuru, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'abakuru b'abantu.
41014044	Ogu ayagobiize Yesu akaba abahaire akarorwaho naagamba ati: “Ou ndaagwa omu kifuba, buli nuwe ogu; mumukwate, mumutwale nimumulindira kimu ataikara kucwa.”
41014045	Yuda obu yaizire, ahonaaho yamwirra haihi, yamuramukya ati: “Mwegesa!” Yamugwa omu kifuba.
41014046	Bali baamugwera, baamukwata.
41014047	Kandi omu hali abo abakaba beemeriire aho, yasomorayo empirima ye, yatema omwiru w'omukuru w'abanyakatagara, yamucwaho okutu.
41014048	Yesu yabakaguza ati: “Mwizire kunkwata n'empirima n'ebiduuma nk'abaiziriire kukwata omunyagi?
41014049	Buli kiro naikaraga na inywe ninyegesa omu Nju ya Ruhanga, ka mutarankwasire. Baitu leka Ebyahandiikirwe bihikirizibwe.”
41014050	Abeegesebwa boona baamusigaho, bairuka.
41014051	Omusigazi omu yamuhondera ajwaire esuuka erukwera yonka; nawe bamukwata;
41014052	baitu uwe yabasigira esuuka egi, yairuka ali busa.
41014053	Baatwara Yesu hali mukuru w'abanyakatagara. Abanyakatagara abakuru, abakuru b'abantu, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro bakeesoroolezaayo.
41014054	Kandi Petero akaba amuhondiire haraho, okuhika obu baataahire omu kizigati kya mukuru w'abanyakatagara; yaikarra n'abalinzi nayota omurro.
41014055	Baanyakatagara abakuru n'orukurato rwona baaserra obwakaiso hali Yesu nukwo bamwite; baitu batabuzoole.
41014056	Baingi bakaleeta obwakaiso bw'ebisuba hali uwe, baitu obwakaiso bwabo butaikirranize.
41014057	Abamu bakeemerra nibamuhangirra bati:
41014058	“Tukamuhurra naagamba ati: ‘Ndiseesa Enju ya Ruhanga enu eyayombekerwe emikono y'abantu.’ ”
41014059	Noobu baraaba baagambire bati, baitu obwakaiso bwabo butaikirranize.
41014060	Mukuru w'abanyakatagara yayemerra hagati, yakaguza Yesu ati: “Toina kyona eki orukugarukamu? Banu kiki eki barukukurumiriza?”
41014061	Baitu uwe yaculeera, tiyagarukamu kantu. Mukuru w'abanyakatagara yagaruka yamukaguza ati: “Niiwe Kristo, Omwana w'Ogu Anyakuhaisanizibwa?”
41014062	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Ninyowe; kandi muligaruka kurora Omwana w'omuntu aikaliire ha mukono gw'obulyo ogw'Ow'Obusobozi bwona, naizira omu bicu by'omu iguru.”
41014063	Nubwo Mukuru w'abanyakatagara yataagwire omwenagiro gwe naagamba ati: “Nitukyayetaagira ki abakaiso?
41014064	Mumwehuliriire nkooku ajumire Ruhanga. Inywe nimucwamu muta?” Boona baamucwera omusango ngu, asemeriire okufa.
41014065	Abamu baatandika kumucwera ebicwanta, n'okumuswekerra ha maiso, n'okumuteera empi nibagamba bati: “Toma, nooha akutiire!” Abaserikale abalinzi nabo baamutangiriza empi.
41014066	Petero obu akaba ali ifo omu kizigati, omu ha bazaana b'omukuru w'abanyakatagara yaija.
41014067	Obu yarozire Petero naayota, yamugumyaho amaiso yagamba ati: “Na iwe obairege hamu na Yesu Omunazareeti.”
41014068	Baitu uwe yayehooga naagamba ati: “Eki orukugamba tindukukimanya kandi tindukukyetegereza.” Yagenda yayemerra ha kiti ky'irembo, kandi enkoko yakooka.
41014069	Omuzaana ogu yayongera kumutaho eriiso, yagaruka kugambira abakaba beemeriireho ati: “Omusaija onu nuwe omu hali bo.”
41014070	Baitu Petero yagaruka yayehooga. Obu haahingwireho akaanya kake, abakaba beemeriire aho baagaruka baagambira Petero bati: “Mazimakwo na iwe oli omu hali bo, habwokuba oli Mugaliraaya.”
41014071	Baitu uwe yatandika kwekyena n'okurahira ati: “Omuntu ogu ou murukubazaaho, timmumanyire.”
41014072	Ahonaaho enkoko yakooka omurundi gwa kabiri. Nubwo Petero yaijukire Yesu eki yamugambiire ati: “Enkoko etakakookere kabiri, oraaba onyehoogere kasatu.” Obu yaijukire eki, yasaalirwa muno, yarra.
41015001	Obwire obu bukaba nibukya buti, baanyakatagara abakuru, hamu n'abakuru b'abantu, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, n'orukurato rwona baikarra kuhanuura; hanyuma baaboha Yesu baamutwara, baamukwasa Pilaato.
41015002	Pilaato yamukaguza ati: “Niiwe Mukama w'Abayudaaya?” Uwe yamugarukamu ati: “Nukwo ogambire.”
41015003	Baanyakatagara abakuru bakamunyegerra ebintu bingi.
41015004	Pilaato yagaruka yamukaguza ati: “Toina kyona eki orukugarukamu? Dora, ebi barukukunyegerra nkooku biri bingi.”
41015005	Baitu Yesu tiyamugarukamu kindi; habweki Pilaato yahunirra.
41015006	Ha bugenyi obukuru nk'obu Pilaato yabalekerraga omunyankomo omu ou baasiimaga.
41015007	Omu beemi abakaba bali omu nkomo abaakwasirwe habw'okwita abantu omu kajagarro, hakaba harumu omusaija ibara lye Baraaba.
41015008	Ekitebe ky'abantu kyaija kyasaba Pilaato akole nkooku abakorra bwona.
41015009	Uwe yabakaguza ati: “Nimwenda mbalekerre Omukama w'Abayudaaya?”
41015010	Habwokuba akamanya ngu, banyakatagara abakuru bamuhaireyo habw'ihali.
41015011	Baitu banyakatagara abakuru nukwo kwimukiriza ekitebe ky'abantu ngu, haakire abalekerre Baraaba.
41015012	Pilaato yagaruka yabakaguza ati: “Kandi omusaija ou murukweta Mukama w'Abayudaaya, mmukole ki?”
41015013	Baitu bbo baatokera haiguru bati: “Mubambe ha musaraba.”
41015014	Nandiki Pilaato ati: “Habwaki? Kibi ki eki akozire?” Nukwo bbo kutokera haiguru okukiraho bati: “Mubambe ha musaraba.”
41015015	Aho Pilaato habw'okugonza kusiimwa ekitebe ky'abantu, yabalekerra Baraaba. Obu baamazire kuteera Yesu enkoba, yamuhayo kubambwa ha musaraba.
41015016	Abaserikale baihaho Yesu baamutwara omu kikaali omunju enyakwetwa kibbira; baasorooza ekihanda kyona ky'abaserikale.
41015017	Baamujweka orugoye orurukugaajuka, baazinga ekondo y'amahwa baagimuta ha mutwe.
41015018	Baatandika kumuramya bati: “Hangiriza, Omukama w'Abayudaaya!”
41015019	Baamuteeza orubingo omu mutwe, baamucwera ebicwanta, baateeza amaju nibamuramya.
41015020	Obu baamazire kumuterra enaku, baamujuura orugoye orurukugaajuka, baamujweka engoye ze, baamwebembeza kugenda kumubamba ha musaraba.
41015021	Kandi bakahambiriza omuhinguzi, Simooni owa Kireene, ise Alekisanda na Rufo, ow'akaba naaruga omu kyaro, ayetweke omusaraba gwa Yesu.
41015022	Baahikya Yesu omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa Gologota (ekirukumanyisa ngu, kiikaro ky'oruhanga).
41015023	Baamuha eviini etabwirwemu omubazi; baitu ataginywe.
41015024	Baamubamba ha musaraba; baabagana ebyokujwara bye nibabiterra itomo, okucwamu buli omu eki araatwara.
41015025	Obu baamubambire ha musaraba zikaba ziri saaha isatu.
41015026	Ekihandiiko ekirukumanyisa omusango gwe kikaba nikigamba kiti: “Omukama w'Abayudaaya.”
41015027	Bakamubamba n'abanyagi babiri, omu ha mukono ogw'obulyo, ondi ha gwemoso.
41015028	(Ekyahandiikirwe kyahikirra ekirukugamba kiti: “Akabalirwa hamu n'enkozi z'ebibi.”)
41015029	Abo abakaba nibahingura baamujuma, nibacwa emitwe yabo, nibagamba bati: “Ahaa! Iwe ayagondeze kuseesa Enju ya Ruhanga okagaruka kugyombekera ebiro bisatu,
41015030	wejune wenka, oyehanuule ha musaraba!”
41015031	N'abanyakatagara abakuru nabo bakamujuma bali hamu n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro nibagambirangana bati; “Akajuna abandi, baitu tasobora kwejuna wenka.
41015032	Leka Kristo, Omukama wa Isirairi, hati ayehanuule ha musaraba, nukwo na itwe turole, twikirize.” Kandi abo abakaba babambirwe nawe, nabo baamujuma.
41015033	Esaaha ya mukaaga obu yahikire, omwirima gwasweka ensi yoona okuhika ha saaha ya mwenda.
41015034	kandi ha saaha ya mwenda Yesu yayamuza n'iraka likooto ati: “Eli, Eli, lama sabakatani?” amakuru gaakyo ngu: “Ruhanga wange, Ruhanga wange, ondugiireho ki?”
41015035	Abamu ha basungi obu baahuuliire eki baagamba bati: “Muhurre, naayeta Eriya.”
41015036	Omu hali bo yairuka yaibika ekijumankuba omu marwa agasaliire, yakita ha rubingo, yakimuha anyunyuguze, yagamba ati: “Ka turole Eriya obu araija kumuhanuura ha musaraba.”
41015037	Yesu yayamuza n'iraka likooto, yacwekana.
41015038	Enyigamo y'omu Nju ya Ruhanga yatemukamu habiri, okuruga eruguru okuhika hansi.
41015039	Omukuru w'abaserikale ow'akaba ayemeriire aho amuroleriire, obu yaboine nkooku acwekaine, yagamba ati: “Mazimakwo, omusaija onu abaire ali Mwana wa Ruhanga!”
41015040	Kandi hakaba haroho abakazi beemeriire hara baroleriire. Omuli bo hakaba harumu Mariya Magadaleena, na Mariya nyina Yakobbo omuto, na Yose, hamu na Salome.
41015041	Abo nubo abaamuhonderaga nibamuheereza obu akaba ali omu Galiraaya; kandi hakaba haroho abakazi abandi baingi abaizire nawe Yerusaalemu.
41015042	Eki kikaba kiri kiro eky'Okweteekanirizaamu, nikyo kiro ekyebembera Sabbato. Nahabweki omu rusweko rw'obwire,
41015043	Yosefu owa Arimateya, omukurasi ow'ekitiinisa omu rukurato, nawe akaba naategereza obukama bwa Ruhanga, yagenda hali Pilaato atarukutiina, yasaba omutumbi gwa Yesu.
41015044	Pilaato, kyamuhuniriza okuhurra nkooku afire ira, nukwo kweta mukuru w'abaserikale, yamukaguza obu araaba afiirekwo.
41015045	Omukuru w'abaserikale obu yamazire kumumanyisa nkooku afiire, yaikiriza Yosefu atwale omutumbi.
41015046	Yagura orugoye rwa bafuta, yahanuura omutumbi, yaguzinga omu rugoye oru, yaguta omu kituuro ekikaba kibaizirwe omu mwandara. Hanyuma yakumbya ibaale, yaigarra omunwa gw'ekituuro.
41015047	Mariya Magadaleena na Mariya nyina Yose bakarora nambere bataire Yesu.
41016001	Sabbato obu yahoireho, Mariya Magadaleena, na Mariya nyina Yakobbo, na Salome bakagura amagita agarukuboya nukwo bagende basiige omutumbi gwa Yesu.
41016002	Nyenkya kara, ha Sande, ekiro ekibanza omu wiiki, bakagenda ha kituuro izooba liturukire.
41016003	Bakaba nibakaguzangana bati: “Nooha aratukumbiza ibaale kuliiha ha munwa gw'ekituuro? ”
41016004	Obu baimukize amaiso, baarora ibaale liri erikooto muno likumbiibwe.
41016005	Obu bataahire omu kituuro, baarora omusigazi aikaliire ha rubaju rw'obulyo, ajwaire orugoye orurukwera; baahunirra.
41016006	Uwe yabagambira ati: “Muleke kuhunirra; mmanyire nimuserra Yesu owa Nazareeti ayabambirwe ha musaraba. Hanu taroho, ahumbuukire; mwije murole nambere bakaba bamutaire.
41016007	Hati nu, mugende mugambire abeegesebwa be na Petero ngu, naija kubabanza kuhika Galiraaya, oku nuho mulimurorra nkooku yabagambiire.”
41016008	Bbo baaturuka omu kituuro, bairuka bakwasirwe akatukumo kandi nibahunirra; baitu habw'obutiini batagambireho muntu n'omu.
41016009	[Yesu obu yahumbuukire, omu rukyakya ha kiro kya Sande, akabanza kubonekera Mariya Magadaleena ou yabingireho emyoyo emibi musanju.
41016010	Uwe yagenda yagambira abaikaraga hamu na Yesu, abakaba nibaganya kandi nibarra.
41016011	Baitu obu baahuliire nkooku ayomiire, kandi Mariya nkooku amurozire, batabiikirize.
41016012	Eki obu kyahoire, akabonekera abandi babiri ali omu nsisana endi, obu bakaba nibagenda omu kyaro.
41016013	Nabo baagarukayo baabigambira abandi, baitu batabaikirize.
41016014	Hanyuma akabonekera ikumi n'omu obu bakaba nibalya; yabahana habw'okutaikiriza kwabu n'okugumangana kw'emitima yabo, habwokuba bataikirize ebi baagambiirwe abo abaamurozire amazire kuhumbuuka.
41016015	Yabagambira ati: “Mugende omunsi yoona, murangirre abantu boona Amakuru Amarungi.
41016016	Ogu aliikiriza akabatizibwa nuwe alijunwa; baitu ataliikiriza, omusango gulimusinga.
41016017	Bunu nubwo oburorwaho obulyoleka abaliikiriza: habw'obusobozi bwange balibinga emyoyo emibi, balibaza endimi empyaka;
41016018	noobu balikwata enjoka, rundi bakanywa ekirukwita kyona, tibiribakoraho kabi; balita emikono yabo ha barwaire, bakire.”
41016019	MUKAMA Yesu obu yamazire kubaza nabo, yatwarwa omwiguru, yaikarra ha mukono ogw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga.
41016020	Abeegesebwa baagenda baabirangirra hoona hoona; MUKAMA naakora hamu nabo kandi naagumya ebigambo byabo n'ebihuniriza ebyabikuraataga. Amiina.
42001001	Omugonzibwa Teyofilo: Abantu baingi bakakora ebi barukusobora okuhandiika ebintu ebyabaireho omuli itwe.
42001002	Bakahandiika ebi twagambiirwe abo abaabirozire kuruga ha kubanza, nubo abo abaatumirwe kubitugambira.
42001003	Na nyowe obu namazire kubyetegereza kurungi okuruga ha byabandiize, nkasiima okubikuhandiikira mbikurataniize.
42001004	Kinu nkikozire nukwo omanye amazima g'ebintu ebi byona ebi wayegesiibwe.
42001005	Omu kasumi ka Herode, omukama wa Bayudaaya, hakaba haroho nyakatagara, ibara lye Zakaliya, ow'omu kihanda ky'abanyakatagara ekya Abiya. Akaba aswire omukazi ow'omu baijukuru ba Arooni, ibara lye Elizabbeti.
42001006	Bombi bakaba bali bahikiriire omumaiso ga Ruhanga bataina eki barukujunaanwa, nibahikiriza kurungi Ebiragiro bya MUKAMA n'emirwa ei yataireho.
42001007	Bakaba bataina mwana, habwokuba Elizabbeti akaba ali ngumba, kandi bombi bakaba bakuzire muno.
42001008	Kiro kimu Zakaliya akaba naakora omulimo gwe ogw'obunyakatagara omumaiso ga Ruhanga, ab'ekihanda kye obu bakaba bali b'okukora omulimo ogu.
