42001009	Engeso y'abanyakatagara nkooku ekaba eri, nuwe akaba akomerwe akaruuru kutaaha omunju ya Ruhanga kwotera omugaju.
42001010	Omu kasumi ak'okwotera omugaju, ekitebe kyona eky'abantu kikaba kiri aheeru nibasaba Ruhanga.
42001011	Malaika wa Mukama yamubonekera, ayemeriire ha rubaju rw'obulyo rw'ekiswa nambere baayoterraga omugaju.
42001012	Zakaliya obu yamurozire yayekanga, yatiina muno.
42001013	Baitu malaika yamugambira ati: “Zakaliya, leka kutiina. Okusaba kwawe Ruhanga akuhuliire; mukazi waawe Elizabbeti alikuzarra omwana w'obwojo, olimuruka ibara lye Yohaana.
42001014	Mulikyanganuka muno kandi mulisemererwa, n'abandi baingi balisemererwa habw'okuzaarwa kwe;
42001015	habwokuba aliba mukuru omumaiso ga MUKAMA. Talinywa marwa noobu kyakuba ekitamiiza kyona. Alizaarwa aijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
42001016	Aligarra Abaisirairi baingi hali MUKAMA Ruhanga wabo;
42001017	alimwebembera aina amaani n'obusobozi nk'obwa Eriya, aligarra emitima y'abazaire ha baana baabo, aligarra abeereme omumuhanda gw'abahikiriire, nukwo ateekanirize MUKAMA abantu abamusemeriire.”
42001018	Nubwo Zakaliya yakagwize malaika ati: “Kinu nsobora nta kukinanukira? Nyowe ngurusire, na mukazi wange akaikwire.”
42001019	Malaika yamugarukamu ati: “Ninyowe Gabulyeri anyakwemerra omumaiso ga Ruhanga. Ntumirwe kubaza na iwe n'okukumanyisa amakuru ganu amarungi.
42001020	Hurra nu, habw'okutaikiriza obukwenda bwange obulihikirra omu kasumi kabwo, oraafa omunwa, oikale otarukubaza okuhika ha kiro ebi byona obu birihikirra.”
42001021	Omu kasumi ako abantu bakaba bategeriize Zakaliya nibahunirra kandi nibeekaguza ekimukereriize omunju ya Ruhanga.
42001022	Obu yaturukire aheeru atasobole kubaza nabo, nubwo baamanya nkooku abonekiirwe omunju egi; kandi uwe habw'okulemwa kugamba, akabeesa engaro.
42001023	Obusumi bwe obw'okuheereza obu bwahoire, yagaruka omuka ye.
42001024	Obu haahingwireho ebiro, mukazi we Elizabbeti yatwara enda, kandi yayesereka omunju kumara ameezi ataano, naagamba ati:
42001025	“MUKAMA nukwo ankozire ati, obu yasiimire kunyihaho ensoni omu bantu.”
42001026	Elizabbeti obu akaba aina enda y'ameezi mukaaga, nubwo Ruhanga yatumire malaika Gabulyeri omu rubuga rwa Galiraaya orwetwa Nazareeti,
42001027	hali omwisiki empikirre, ow'akaba ajumbiirwe omusaija, ibara lye Yosefu, ow'omu ruganda rwa Daudi; ibara ly'omwisiki ogu nuwe Mariya.
42001028	Malaika akaija nambere ali yamuramukya ati: “Mirembe, iwe aijwire emigisa, MUKAMA ali na iwe!”
42001029	Mariya, ebigambo ebi bikamukanga muno, nukwo kwekaguza amakuru g'okuramukya oku.
42001030	Nubwo malaika yamugambiire ati: “Mariya, leka kutiina, habwokuba Ruhanga akusiimire.
42001031	Hati noija kutwara enda, olizaara omwana w'obwojo, olimuruka ibara lye Yesu.
42001032	Aliba mukuru kandi alyetwa Omwana w'Anyakuli haiguru muno; MUKAMA Ruhanga alimwikaliza ha kitebe kya isenkuru Daudi,
42001033	kandi alirema abaijukuru ba Yakobbo ebiro byona, n'obukama bwe tibulihwaho.”
42001034	Baitu Mariya yakaguza malaika ati: “Eki kisoboka kita? Nyowe kantamanyire musaija.”
42001035	Malaika yamugarukamu ati: “Mwoyo Ahikiriire alikwizira, kandi n'amaani g'Ogu Anyakuli haiguru muno galikuswekerra. Omwana ow'alizaarwa nikyo alyeterwa ahikiriire, kandi Omwana wa Ruhanga.
42001036	Dora, mwenekati wanyu Elizabbeti, ou baayeetaga ngumba, hati aina enda y'ameezi mukaaga, kandi kunu mukaikuru;
42001037	habwokuba busaho ekirema Ruhanga.”
42001038	Nubwo Mariya yagambire ati: “Nyowe ndi hanu, omuzaana wa MUKAMA; kinkolerwe nkooku ogambire.” Aho malaika yamuburaho.
42001039	Omu biro ebi Mariya akaimukya, yagenda bwango omunsi y'ensozi, omu kyaro kya Buyudaaya.
42001040	Yataaha omunju ya Zakaliya, yaramukya Elizabbeti.
42001041	Kandi Elizabbeti obu yahuliire okuramukya kwa Mariya, omwana yazaana omu ndi ye. Elizabbeti yaijura Mwoyo Ahikiriire,
42001042	nukwo kugamba n'iraka likooto ati: “Oli w'omugisa omu bakazi boona! N'omwana omunda yawe aina omugisa!
42001043	Kyandugira nkaha nyowe kubungirwa nyina MUKAMA wange?
42001044	Habwokuba obu mpuliire okuramukya kwawe, omwana yazaana omunda yange habw'omuhimbo.
42001045	W'omugisa onu ayaikiriize ekigambo kya MUKAMA nkooku kirihikirra hali uwe!”
42001046	Mariya yagamba ati: “Omutima gwange nigukugiza MUKAMA,
42001047	n'omwoyo gwange nigusemerererwa Ruhanga Omujuni wange,
42001048	habwokuba arozire okwebundaaza kw'omuzaana we! Dora, okuruga hati abantu ab'obusinge bwona baraanyetaga w'omugisa;
42001049	habwokuba Omusobozi wa byona akankorra ebikuru, n'ibara lye niryera.
42001050	Obusinge n'obusinge agirra embabazi boona abamutiina.
42001051	Omukono gwe akagukozesa eby'amaani, ararangize ab'emyehembo omu biteekerezo by'emitima yabo,
42001052	abingire ab'obusobozi ha bitebe byabo, yanyumiza abaculeezi;
42001053	abajara abaigusize ebirungi, abaguuda ababingire ngaro nsa.
42001054	Akonyiire Isirairi omwiru we, obu yaijukire kwoleka embabazi ze
42001055	nkooku yaraganiize Abburahamu na baijukuru be ebiro byona.”
42001056	Mariya akamara omwa Elizabbeti ameezi nk'asatu, hanyuma yagarukayo owaabu.
42001057	Akasumi k'Elizabbeti ak'okuzaara kaahika, yazaara omwana w'obwojo.
42001058	Abataahi na beene baabo obu baahuliire nkooku MUKAMA yamugiriire embabazi, boona baasemererwa hamu nawe.
42001059	Omwana obu yahikize ebiro munaana, baija kumusara; bakaba nibagaonza kumuruka Zakaliya, nk'ibara lya ise;
42001060	baitu nyina yabagambira ati: “Nangwa, naija kurukwa Yohaana.”
42001061	Baamugarukamu bati: “Omu beene banyu busamu n'omu arukwetwa ibara eri.”
42001062	Baakozesa oburorwaho kukaguza Zakaliya abamanyise ibara eri arukwenda kuruka omwana.
42001063	Uwe yasaba eky'okuhandiikaho; yahandiika ati: “Ibara lye nuwe Yohaana.” Boona baahunirra.
42001064	Ahonaaho akanwa ke kaiguka n'orulimi rwe rwabohorroka, yatandika kubaza naakugiza Ruhanga.
42001065	Abataahi boona baatiina. Amakuru ago gaararanga omu nsi yoona ey'ensozi eya Buyudaaya.
42001066	Boona abaagahuliire baagata ha mutima nibeekaguza bati: “Mara omwana ogu aliba ata?” Habwokuba omukono gwa MUKAMA gukaba gumuroho.
42001067	Zakaliya ise, akaijura Mwoyo Ahikiriire yaranga ati:
42001068	“Akugizibwe MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Isirairi; habwokuba aizire kucungura abantu be.
42001069	Atwimukiize omujuni ow'obusobozi, omu ruganda rwa Daudi omwiru we,
42001070	nkooku yagambiire omu barangi be abarukwera okuruga ira lyona:
42001071	kutujuna abanyazigwa baitu, n'okutwiha omu mikono y'abo boona abarukutunoba.
42001072	Nukwo ayoleke embabazi ezi yaraganiize baisenkuruitwe, naijuka ekiragaano kye ekirukwera,
42001073	nikyo ekirahiro eki yarahiire isenkuru-itwe Abburahamu ngu,
42001074	obu tulikajunwa omu mikono y'abanyanzigwa baitu, tumuheerezeege tutarukutiina,
42001075	nitwera kandi tuhikiriire omumaiso ge ebiro byaitu byona.
42001076	Na iwe mwana, olyetwa murangi w'Ogu Anyakuli haiguru muno; habwokuba olyebembera MUKAMA okuteekaniza emihanda ye,
42001077	n'okumanyisa abantu be okujunwa oku batunga okubaganyiza ebibi byabo.
42001078	Kandi habw'embabazi nyingi eza MUKAMA waitu, emamba enyakuruga omwiguru, obu erisara habwaitu,
42001079	erimulikira abo abaikara omu mwirima n'omu kiituuru ky'okufa, kandi eriteerekereza ebigere byaitu omu muhanda gw'obusinge.”
42001080	Omwana akakura, yaba w'amaani omu mutima, kandi akaikara omu irungu okuhika obu yayeyolekiire Abaisirairi.
42002001	Omu biro ebi, ekiragiro kikaruga hali Kaisaali Agusito ekirukuragira abantu ab'omunsi ye yoona beehandiikise, babarwe.
42002002	Kunu nukwo kwabaire okwehandiikisa okw'okubanza, Kwirino obu akaba ali mulemi mukuru wa Siriya.
42002003	Boona bakagenda kwehandiikisa, buli omu omu rubuga rw'owaabu.
42002004	Yosefu nawe akaruga Nazareeti, orubuga rwa Galiraaya, yagenda Buyudaaya omu rubuga rwa Daudi orurukwetwa Betelehemu, habwokuba nawe akaba ali mwijukuru ow'ekitabu kya Daudi,
42002005	nukwo nawe ayehandiikise hamu na Mariya ou akaba ajumbiire; kandi Mariya akaba aina enda.
42002006	Obu bakaba bakyali Betelehemu, ebiro bye by'okuzaara byahika.
42002007	Yazaara omwana, omuzigaijo ow'obwojo. Yamusweka omu bugoye, yamubyamya omu kyato ekiriirwamu ente, habw'okuburwa omwanya omu nju y'abagenyi.
42002008	Omunsi egi hakaba harumu abaliisa abaikaraga omu bwerre nibalinda amagana gaabo ekiro.
42002009	Malaika wa MUKAMA akababonekera, ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kyamuliikana nikibeehinguliriza, baatiina muno.
42002010	Malaika yabagambira ati: “Mutatiina, habwokuba mbaleetiire amakuru amarungi ag'omuhimbo mwingi oguraakwata abantu boona.
42002011	Kiro kinu omu rubuga rwa Daudi, habazaliirwe Omujuni, nuwe Kristo MUKAMA.
42002012	Kanu nuko karorwaho aka muraamumanyiraho: Nimwija kusanga omwana enkerembe aswekerwe omu bugoye, abyamire omu kyato ekiriirwamu ente.”
42002013	Ahonaaho ihe lingi ery'abamalaika ab'omu iguru bakaija baateerana hamu na malaika ogu, baakugiza Ruhanga nibazina bati:
42002014	“Ekitiinisa kibe hali Ruhanga omu iguru, n'obusinge bube omunsi ha bantu Ruhanga aba arukusiima!”
42002015	Bamalaika obu baabarugireho, bagarukire omwiguru, abaliisa nukwo kugambirangana bati: “Katugende Betelehemu, turole ekibaireho MUKAMA eki atumanyisize.”
42002016	Baagenda nibarahuka, baasanga Mariya na Yosefu n'omwana w'enkerembe abyamire omu kyato ekiriirwamu ente.
42002017	Obu baamurozire, baasubirra byona malaika ebi yabagambiire ha mwana ogu;
42002018	kandi boona abaabihuliire bakahunirizibwa ebi abaliisa baabagambiire.
42002019	Baitu Mariya, ebintu ebi byona akabita ha mutima gwe, yaikara naabiteekerezaaho.
42002020	Abaliisa bakagarukayo nibahaisaniza kandi nibakugiza Ruhanga habwa byona ebi baahuliire n'ebi baarozire. Bikaba birikwo nkooku baabigambiirwe.
42002021	Ekiro kya munaana obu kyahikire, omwana akasarwa, baamuruka ibara Yesu. Niryo malaika yamwesire atakatondekere omu nda.
42002022	Akasumi obu kaahikire okukora omukoro gw'okwezibwa kwabo, Ebiragiro bya Musa nkooku byaragiraga, Yosefu na Mariya bakatwara omwana Yerusaalemu kumuhongera MUKAMA.
42002023	(nibahondera ekyahandiikirwe omu Biragiro bya MUKAMA ngu: “Omuzigaijo weena ow'obwojo araahongerwaga MUKAMA.”)
42002024	Bakagenda n'okuhayo ekihongwa nkooku kiri omu Biragiro bya MUKAMA, nugo: “Amaiba abiri rundi obwana bw'amaiba bubiri.”
42002025	Omu kasumi ako, omu Yerusaalemu hakaba haliyo omusaija, ibara lye Simyoni, omuntu ahikiriire, anyakutiina Ruhanga, kandi ayategerezaaga okucungurwa kwa Isirairi, Mwoyo Ahikiriire akaba amuroho.
42002026	Nuwe ayamusuukuliire nkooku atalifa atakarozire Kristo, MUKAMA ou yanihiize.
42002027	Akeebemberwa Mwoyo kwija omu Nju ya Ruhanga, abazaire b'omwana Yesu obu baamutaahizeemu okumukora omurwa gwabu nkooku gukaba guli.
42002028	Nubwo Simyoni yakikiira omwana, yakugiza Ruhanga naagamba ati:
42002029	“MUKAMA wange, hati leka omuheereza waawe afe n'obusinge, nkooku waraganiize;
42002030	habwokuba amaiso gange garozire okujuna kwawe,
42002031	oku wateekaniriize omu maiso g'amahanga goona,
42002032	gube musana ogumulikira Abanyamahanga, kandi guleetere ekitiinisa abantu baawe Abaisirairi.”
42002033	Ise na nyina bakahunirizibwa ebyamugambirweho.
42002034	Simyoni yabasabira omugisa, yayongera yagambira Mariya nyina ati: “Hurra, Ruhanga ataireho omwana onu nukwo baingi bagwe kandi baimuke omu Isirairi, kandi abe karorwaho abantu baingi aka bataliikiriza.
42002035	Nukwo ebiteekerezo by'abaingi bisuukurwe, (na iwe empirima erikucumita omutima).”
42002036	Kandi hakaba haroho omurangikati, ibara lye Anna, muhara wa Fanueli ow'omu ruganda rwa Aseeri. Akaba akaikwire muno. Obu yaswirwe, akamara na iba emyaka musanju yonka;
42002037	akaikara ali mufaakati okuhika ha myaka kinaana n'ena y'obukuru. Tiyarugaga omu Nju ya Ruhanga. Yaikaramuga naaramya, naasiiba kandi naasaba nyamusana n'ekiro.
42002038	Omu kasumi ako obu yaizire yatandika kusiima Ruhanga, kandi boona abakaba bategeriize okucungurwa kwa Yerusaalemu, yabagambira ha mwana ogu.
42002039	Abazaire be obu baamazire kuhikiriza byona ebiragiro bya MUKAMA nkooku byaragiraga, baagarukayo Galiraaya omu rubuga rw'owaabu Nazareeti.
42002040	Omwana akakura, yagira amaani, aijwire amagezi; n'emigisa ya Ruhanga yaikaraga hali uwe.
42002041	Buli mwaka abazaire ba Yesu baagendaga Yerusaalemu habw'ebiro bikuru by'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho.
42002042	Yesu obu yahikize emyaka ikumi n'ebiri, bakagenda nawe habw'ebiro bikuru engeso yaabo nkooku ekaba eri.
42002043	Ebiro bikuru obu byahoire baimukya kugarukayo owaabu, baitu omwana Yesu yasigara Yerusaalemu abazaire be batamanyire.
42002044	Bakaba nibateekereza ngu, agenzire n'ekitebe ky'abantu abakaba nibagarukayo. Obu baamazire kugenda orugendo rw'ekiro kyona, nubwo baatandika kumuserurra omu banyabuzaale n'omu bataahi.
42002045	Obu baalemerwe kumuzoora, baagarukayo Yerusaalemu nibakyamuserra.
42002046	Obu haahingwireho ebiro bisatu, bakamuzoora omunju ya Ruhanga, aikaliiire hagati y'abeegesa bakuru naabahuliriza kandi naabakaguza.
42002047	Boona abaamuhuliire bakahunirizibwa amagezi ge n'okugarukamu kwe.
42002048	Abazaire be obu baamurozire, baahunirra muno; nukwo nyina kumukaguza ati: “Mwana wange, habwaki otukozire oti? Dora sso na nyowe tukuserwire muno tutuntwire.”
42002049	Nawe yabagarukamu ati: “Munseruliire ki? Timumanyire nkooku nsemeriire kwekambisa ha bya Isenyowe?”
42002050	Baitu bbo batasobole kwetegereza amakuru g'eki yabagambiire.
42002051	Nubwo Yesu yagenda nabo baahika Nazareeti, kandi yaikara naabahurra. Ebigambo ebi byona, nyina akabirinda ha mutima.
42002052	Yesu yayeyongera kukura omu magezi n'omu mubiri, naasiimwa Ruhanga n'abantu.
42003001	Omu mwaka gwa ikumi n'etaano ogw'obulemi bwa Tiberiyo Kaisaali, Ponsiyo Pilaato obu akaba ali mulemi mukuru wa Buyudaaya, Herode ali w'isaza lya Galiraaya, na Filipo mugenzi we ali w'isaza ly'ekicweka kikooto kya Ituraaya na Turakoni, na Lisaniya ali w'isaza lya Abileene,
42003002	kandi Annasi na Kaayafa bali bakuru ba banyakatagara, nubwo ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyaiziire Yohaana, omwana wa Zakaliya ali omwirungu.
42003003	Aho Yohaana yagenda omu bicweka byona ebiheriire ekisaaru Yorudaani, naarangirra abantu beegarukemu, babatizibwe, nukwo baganyirwe ebibi.
42003004	Nkooku kyahandiirirwe omu kitabu ky'omurangi Isaaya kiti: “Nuwe ogu arukwamirra omwirungu ati: Muteekanirize MUKAMA omuhanda, mutereekereze obuhanda bwe.
42003005	Ebihanga byona biijuzibwe, orusozi rwona n'emigongo yoona bingangainganizibwe. Emihanda eramaire etereekerezibwe, n'obuhanda obubi busemezibwe;
42003006	nukwo abantu boona barole okujuna kwa Ruhanga.”
42003007	Abantu baingi bakaija hali Yohaana okubatizibwa. Nukwo uwe kubagambira ati: “Inywe baana b'encwera! Nooha ayabahabwire kwiruka ekifubiro ekirukwija?
42003008	Mukole ebikorwa ebirukwoleka nkooku mwegarukiremu. Muleke kwesigura muti: ‘Twina Abburahamu isenkuru itwe.’ Nimbagambira nti: Amabaale ganu Ruhanga asobora kugaihiramu Abburahamu abaijukuru.
42003009	Nangwa na hati endemu etairwe ha bikoro by'emiti. Nahabweki omuti gwona ogutarukwana ebijuma ebirungi nigwija kutemwa, gunagwe omu murro.”
42003010	Nubwo abantu baamukagwize bati: “Hati itwe tukole ki?”
42003011	Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Anyakwina esaati ibiri, aheho ataina; n'anyakwina ebyokulya, nawe nukwo akole ati.”
42003012	Abasorooza b'omusoro abaizire kubatizibwa nabo baamukaguza bati: “Mwegesa, tukole ki?”
42003013	Yabagarukamu ati: “Mutalisorooza okuhinguraniza hali ebi muragiirwe.”
42003014	Abaserikale nabo baamukaguza bati: “Kandi itwe, tukole ki?” Yabagarukamu ati: “Mutalinyaga muntu weena ebintu bye, noobu kwakuba kumutiinisiriza; kandi omusaara gwanyu gubamalege.”
42003015	Okunihira kw'abantu kukeeyongera, baatandika kuteekereza ngu, Yohaana yaakuba Kristo.
42003016	Yohaana yagambira boona ati: “Nyowe nimbabatiza n'amaizi; baitu arukunkiza obusobozi naija, kandi tinsemeriire n'okusumurra orukoba rw'enkaito ze. Uwe alibabatiza na Mwoyo Ahikiriire n'omurro.
42003017	Akwasire orugali rwe kuhehemukya, naija kusingorra orubuga rwe nukwo ahunike oburo omu nguli, kandi ebisunga abyokye omu murro ogutaraara.”
42003018	Haroho n'ebindi bingi Yohaana ebi yateereriire abantu obu yabaga nabarangirra Amakuru Amarungi.
42003019	Kandi akahana Herode ow'isaza habw'okuhambura Herodiya muka mugenzi we, na habw'ebibi ebindi ebi akaba akozire.
42003020	Nubwo Herode yayongera yakora ekibi ekindi, nikyo eky'okukwata Yohaana omu nkomo.
42003021	Abantu boona obu baamazire kubatizibwa, Yesu nawe yabatizibwa kandi akyali aho naasaba, iguru lyakinguka,
42003022	Mwoyo Ahikiriire yamusirimukaho ali omu kisisani ky'eriba, n'iraka lyaruga omu iguru nirigamba liti. “Niiwe mwana wange omugonzibwa, ou nsiima muno.”
42003023	Yesu ha yatandikire emirimo ye, akaba aina emyaka nka makumi asatu ey'obukuru. Kandi abantu baateekerezaaga ngu: akaba ali mwana wa Yosefu, mutabani wa Heeli,

42003029	Eri mutabani wa Yoswa, Yoswa mutabani wa Eryezeeri, Eryezeeri mutabani wa Yolimu, Yolimu mutabani wa Mataati, Mataati mutabani wa Leevi,
42003030	Leevi mutabani wa Simyoni, Simyoni mutabani wa Yuda, Yuda mutabani wa Yosefu, Yosefu mutabani wa Yonamu, Yonamu mutabani wa Eriyakimu,

42003032	Daudi mutabani wa Yese, Yese mutabani wa Obedi, Obedi mutabani wa Bowazi, Bowazi mutabani wa Sala, Sala mutabani wa Nahasooni,
42003033	Nahasooni mutabani wa Aminadabbu, Aminadabbu mutabani wa Adimini, Adimini mutabani wa Aram, Aram mutabani wa Hezirooni, Hezirooni mutabani wa Perezi, Perezi mutabani wa Yuda,
42003034	Yuda mutabani wa Yakobbo, Yakobbo mutabani wa Isaaka, Isaaka mutabani wa Abburahamu, Abburahamu mutabani wa Teera, Teera mutabani wa Nahora,

42004001	Yesu akaruga ha kisaaru Yorudaani aijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire. Mwoyo ogu yamutwara omwirungu,
42004002	nambere yamazire ebiro makumi ana naayohebwa Sitaani. Omu biro ebi tiyalyaga kantu; obu byahoire, yarumwa enjara.
42004003	Nubwo omwohi yamugambiire ati: “Obu oraaba oli Mwana wa Ruhanga, ragira ibaale line lifooke byokulya.”
42004004	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Omuntu taba mwomeezi habw'ebyokulya byonka.’ ”
42004005	Aho omwohi yamutembya nambere hatungamire muno. Omu kasumi kake yamwoleka obukama bwona obw'omunsi,
42004006	yamugambira ati: “Ndaakuha obusobozi n'ekitiinisa kyabwo kyona; habwokuba bwona nkabuheebwa kandi mbuha weena ou ndukwenda.
42004007	Obu bwona ndaabukuha obu orandamya.”
42004008	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Oramyege MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, kandi nuwe oheerezeege wenka!’ ”
42004009	Omwohi yamutwara Yerusaalemu, yamuta ha kasu k'Enju ya Ruhanga, yamugambira ati: “Obu oraaba oli Mwana wa Ruhanga, ruga hanu oyesimbe hansi;
42004010	habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Ruhanga alikukwasa bamalaika be’.
42004011	Kandi kiti: ‘Bakukwatirre n'emikono yabo, oleke kuteera ekigere kyawe ha ibaale.’ ”
42004012	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Otalyohya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.’ ”
42004013	Omwohi, obu yamazire kumwohya omu miringo egi yoona, yamurugaho okuhikya obu alitunga omwanya ogundi.
42004014	Nubwo Yesu yagarukire Galiraaya aijwire amaani ga Mwoyo Ahikiriire. Okurangaanwa kwe kwahika omu kicweka eki kyona.
42004015	Yayegesa omu masorrokaniro gaabo, boona baamuhaisaniza.
42004016	Yesu akaija Nazareeti nambere yakuliire, yataaha omu isorrokaniro ha Sabbato, engeso ye nkooku ekaba eri. Yaimuka kusoma,
42004017	baamuha ekitabu kya Isaaya omurangi. Obu yakisuukwire, yazoora nambere hahandiikirwe hati:
42004018	“Omwoyo wa MUKAMA ali hali nyowe, habwokuba akanseesaho amagita kutebeza abanaku amakuru amarungi. Akantuma kurangirra okulekerwa kw'abanyankomo. n'abafu b'amaiso nkooku baraahweza, kugarurra obusinge abarukubonabonesibwa,
42004019	n'okurangirra omwaka MUKAMA aligiirramu embabazi.”
42004020	Yesu yakuba ekitabu, yakigarurra omuheereza, yaikarra. Boona abakaba bali omu isorrokaniro baamuhanga amaiso.
42004021	Yatandika kubeegesa ati: “Hati ekyahandiikirwe kinu kyahikirra nkooku mwakihurra.”
42004022	Boona baamusiima nibahunirra habw'ebigambo by'embabazi ebyarugire omu kanwa ke nibakaguzangana bati: “Onu tali nuwe mutabani wa Yosefu?”
42004023	Baitu uwe yabagambira ati: “Nkimanyire, nimwija kuncwera orufumo muti: ‘Mufumu, wetambire wenka!’ N'okungambira muti: ‘Tukahurra byona ebi wakoliire Kafaranaumu, bikorre na hanu omunsi y'owaanyu.’ ”
42004024	Uwe yabagambira ati: “Mali mali omurangi taheebwa kitiinisa omunsi y'owaabu.
42004025	Mazimakwo omu biro bya Eriya hakaba haroho abafaakati baingi omu Isirairi, iguru obu lyayebohere, enjura yamara emyaka esatu n'ameezi mukaaga etarukugwa, hakabaho kiihe omu nsi yoona.
42004026	Baitu Eriya atatumwe hali omuntu ondi weena, kwihaho omufaakati ow'omu rubuga Zalefasi, omunsi ya Sidooni.
42004027	Kandi omu Isirairi hakaba haliyo abagenge baingi omu biro by'omurangi Erisa; naho hatakizibweyo n'omu, kwihaho Naamani Omusiriya wenka.”
42004028	Abantu boona ab'omu isorrokaniro obu baahuliire ebi, baakwatwa ekiniga kingi.
42004029	Baimuka, baamuturukya omu rubuga rwabo, baamutwara ha mutwe gw'orusozi nambere bakaba beyombekiire orubuga, nukwo bamunage omu kihanga.
42004030	Baitu uwe yabarabamu hagati, yagenda.
42004031	Yesu akagenda Kaferanaumu, orubuga rwa Galiraaya. Ha kiro kya Sabbato yabeegesa.
42004032	Boona baahunirizibwa omulingo yabeegesezeemu, habwokuba ebigambo bye bikaba biri by'amaani.
42004033	Omu isorrokaniro hakaba harumu omusaija akwasirwe omwoyo omubi. Omwoyo ogu gwatoka n'iraka likooto guti:
42004034	“Mawe, nootwenza ki iwe Yesu owa Nazareeti? Oizire kutuhwerekereza? Nkumanyire, niiwe Ahikiriire wa Ruhanga.”
42004035	Yesu yagucoomera ati: “Culeera, omurugeho!” Omwoyo omubi obu gwamazire kumunaga hansi omumaiso g'abantu boona, gwamurugaho gutamukozire kabi kandi.
42004036	Boona baahunirra, baagambirangana bati: “Kintu ki kinu, naabinga emyoyo mibi n'obusobozi n'amaani, kandi neeruga omu bantu?”
42004037	Okurangaanwa kwe kwahika omunsi zoona eziherraineho.
42004038	Yesu akaruga omu isorrokaniro, yataaha omwa Simooni, Nyinazaara Simooni akaba akwasirwe omuswija mwingi; baayesengereza Yesu amukize.
42004039	Obu yamwinamireho, yaragira omuswija, gwamurugaho. Ahonaaho omurwaire yaimuka, yatandika kubaheereza.
42004040	Izooba obu likaba nirigorooba, boona abakaba baina abarwaire baabo ab'endwara ezitali zimu, bakabaleetera Yesu, yabataho emikono omu omu, yabakiza.
42004041	Emyoyo emibi nayo ekaruga omu bantu baingi neetoka eti: “Oli Mwana wa Ruhanga!” Yesu yagicoomera, tiyagiikiriza kugamba, habwokuba ekamanya nkooku ali Kristo.
42004042	Obwire obu bwakiire, Yesu akaimuka, yagenda omu kiikaro ekitarumu bantu. Baitu abantu baatandika kumuserra, baija nambere ali baagonza kumutanga aleke kubarugaho.
42004043	Uwe yabagambira ati: “Nyowe ndi w'okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'obukama bwa Ruhanga n'omu mbuga ezindi, habwokuba eki nikyo naatumiirwe.”
42004044	Kandi yayegesaaga omu masorrokaniro ga Bayudaaya.
42005001	Yesu obu akaba ayemeriire ha musa gw'enyanja ya Genesareeti, abantu bakaba nibasindikangana bamwirre haihi, nukwo bahurre ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
42005002	Yarora amaato abiri gali ha musa gw'enyanja; baitu abasohi bakaba bagarugiremu niboogya obutimba bwabo.
42005003	Yataaha omu bwato obumu obwa Simooni, yamusaba abwirizeeyo kake, abwihe ha musa. Yayegesa abantu aikaliire omu bwato.
42005004	Obu yamazire kwegesa, yagambira Simooni ati: “Irizaayo obwato omu nziha, munagemu obutimba bwanyu, nukwo mukwase.”
42005005	Simooni yamugarukamu ati: “Mwegesa, tutalibaine okukiisa obwire, titukwasize kantu! Baitu habw'ekigambo kyawe kantege obutimba.”
42005006	Baatega obutimba, baakwasa encu nyingi muno, n'obutimba bwatandika kutemuka.
42005007	Baasima bataahi baabo abakaba bali omu bwato obundi, baije babakonyere. Baija, baijuza amaato gombi, kake konka gadikire.
42005008	Simooni Petero obu yarozire eki, yajuumara ha bigere bya Yesu naagamba ati: “Ndeka MUKAMA wange, habwokuba ndi musiisi!”
42005009	Uwe na boona aba akaba ainabo bakahunirra habw'encu nyingi ezi baakwasize.
42005010	Yakobbo na Yohaana, batabani ba Zebedaayo abaakoraga na Simooni, nabo nukwo baahuniriire bati. Yesu nukwo kugambira Simooni ati: “Otatiina, okuruga hati oraasohaga abantu.”
42005011	Baasika amaato, baagagarra ha musa, baasiga byona, baamukuratira.
42005012	Yesu obu akaba ali omu rubuga orumu, hakaija omusaija agengere weena. Obu yarozire Yesu, yajuumara omumaiso ge, namwesengereza ati: “MUKAMA wange, obu oraaba noogonza, noosobora kunkiza.”
42005013	Yesu yagorra omukono gwe, yamukwataho, naagamba ati: “Ego ningonza, kira!” Ahonaaho ebigenge byamurugaho.
42005014	Yesu yamuteererra okutagambiraho muntu weena, baitu yamugira ati: “Genda oyeyoleke nyakatagara, kandi oheyo ekihongwa Musa eki yaragiire bube bwakaiso hali abantu nkooku okiziibwe.”
42005015	Okurangaanwa kwa Yesu kukagenda nikweyongera hoona hoona, n'ebitebe by'abantu baingi bakeesorooza kumuhurra n'okukizibwa endwara zaabo.
42005016	Baitu Yesu obundi n'obundi yabasigahoga, agenda omu irungu kusaba.
42005017	Kiro kimu Yesu obu akaba naayegesa, omu kitebe ky'abantu hakaba harumu Abafalisaayo n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro abakaba barugire omu byaro byona ebya Galiraaya, Buyudaaya, na Yerusaalemu. Yesu akaba aina obusobozi bwa MUKAMA obw'okukiza abarwaire.
42005018	Aho nubwo haizireho abasaija bahimbiire ha katabu omuntu anyakuzingamire. Baalengaho kumutaahya omunju bamute omumaiso ga Yesu.
42005019	Baitu obu baalemerwe h'okumurabya habw'obwingi bw'abantu, baamutembya ha rusu rw'enju, baasakurra amategura, baafumura ekihuru, baamusirimurra ha katabu ke, baamuhikya hagati y'abantu omumaiso ga Yesu.
42005020	Obu yarozire okwikiriza kwabu, yagamba ati: “Muntu iwe, ebibi byawe bikuganyirwe.”
42005021	Abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo baatandika kukaguzangana bati: “Onu muntu ki arukujuma Ruhanga? Nooha asobora kuganyira ebibi atali Ruhanga wenka?”
42005022	Yesu obu yamanyire ebiteekerezo byabo, yabagambira ati: “Nimwekaguliza ki omu mitima yanyu?
42005023	Ekirukukira kurahuka nikiha? Okugamba nti: ‘Ebibi byawe bikunganyirwe,’ rundi kugamba nti: ‘Imuka ogende.’
42005024	Hati kamboleke Omwana w'omuntu nkooku aina obusobozi omunsi obw'okuganyira ebibi.” Nubwo yagambiire anyakuzingamire ati: “Ninkuragira: Imuka, himba akatabu kaawe, otaahe!”
42005025	Ahonaaho omusaija yamatuka, boona nibarora, yahimba akatabu aka akaba abyamireho, yataaha owaabu naakugiza Ruhanga.
42005026	Boona baahunirra, baakugiza Ruhanga nibagamba bati: “Ka turozire ebyamahano kiro kinu!”
42005027	Eki obu kyahoire, Yesu yaturuka aheeru, yarora omusooroza w'omusoro arukwetwa Leevi, aikaliire omu isoroolezo ly'omusoro; yamugambira ati: “Mpondera.”
42005028	Uwe yaimuka, yasiga byona yamuhondera.
42005029	Leevi ogu yacumbira Yesu obugenyi bwingi omunju ye, kandi ha bugenyi obu, hakaba haroho ekitebe kingi eky'abasorooza b'omusoro, n'abantu abandi abaikaliire nabo nibalya.
42005030	Baitu Abafalisaayo abamu n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro ab'omu kitebe kyabu bakahyemera abeegesebwa ba Yesu nibagamba bati: “Kiki ekirukubaliisa kandi ekirukubanywisa n'abasooroza b'omusoro n'abasiisi?”
42005031	Kandi Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Aboomeezi tibeetaaga mufumu, baitu ayetaagwa abarwaire.
42005032	Nyowe ntaizirre kweta abahikiriire, baitu nkaizirra abasiisi, beegarukemu.”
42005033	Abantu bakakaguza Yesu bati: “Habwaki abeegesebwa ba Yohaana basiiba emirundi nyingi kandi basaba, n'abeegesebwa b'Abafalisaayo nabo nukwo bakora; kandi kunu abaawe baikara nibalya kandi nibanywa?”
42005034	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nimusobora kusiibya abagenyi enjara, kunu na kigabura ali nabo?
42005035	Baitu akasumi kalihika kigabura obu alibaihwaho; obu nubwo balitandika kusiiba.”
42005036	Kandi Yesu yabacwera enfumo zinu ati: “Busaho ataagura ekikoba eky'orugoye ruhyaka akakibazira ha rukuru; kakuba akora ati, aba asiisire oruhyaka, kandi n'ekikoba kitemura orugoye orukuru.
42005037	“Kandi busaho anyakuta eviini ey'ehiira omu ndyanga enkuru. Kakuba akora ati, eviini ey'ehiira ebbarura endyanga, eviini eseeseka, n'endyanga esiisikara.
42005038	Baitu eviini empyaka bagita omu ndyanga empyaka.
42005039	Kandi busaho muntu agonza eviini ey'ehiira amazire kunywaho enkuru; baitu agamba ati: ‘Enkuru niyo nungi.’ ”
42006001	Yesu akaba naaraba omu misiri y'engano ha Sabbato; abeegesebwa be baacwa entwe z'engano, baazijungirra, baalya.
42006002	Nukwo Abafalisaayo abamu kubakaguza bati: “Kiki ekirukubakoza ekitaikirizibwa ha Sabbato?”
42006003	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Timukasomaga Daudi eki yakozire obu yarumirwe enjara, hamu n'abo aba akaba ainabo?
42006004	Nkooku yataahire omu Nju ya Ruhanga, yaihamu emigaati enyakuhongerwe, yagirya kandi yaha n'aba akaba ainabo?” Niyo emigaati etaraikirizibwaga kuliibwa muntu ondi, kwihaho abanyakatagara bonka.
42006005	Nubwo yabagambiire ati: “Omwana w'omuntu nuwe MUKAMA wa Sabbato.”
42006006	Ha Sabbato endi, Yesu obu yataahire omu isorrokaniro kwegesa, hakaba harumu omusaija akabire omukono ogw'obulyo.
42006007	Abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo nukwo kuhanga Yesu amaiso, barole obu arakiza omuntu ha Sabbato, nukwo babone h'okumunyegererra.
42006008	Baitu Yesu yamanya ebiteekerezo byabo, nukwo kugambira omusaija anyakukabire omukono ati: “Ija oyemerre hanu.” Omusaija yaimuka, yayemerraho.
42006009	Nubwo Yesu yabagambiire ati: “Kambakaguze kinu: Ha kiro kya Sabbato, Ebiragiro byaitu bitwikiriza kukora ebirungi rundi kukora ebibi? Kujuna obwomeezi rundi kubuhwerekereza?”
42006010	Boona yababungyamu amaiso, nubwo yagambiire omusaija ogu ati: “Gorra omukono gwawe.” Yagugorra, omukono gwe gwakira.
42006011	Baitu bbo baakwatwa ekiniga, baatandika kuhanuura bonka na bonka eki baraakora Yesu.
42006012	Omu biro ebi Yesu akagenda ha nsozi kusaba, yakiisa obwire naasaba Ruhanga.
42006013	Obwire obu bwakiire, yayeta abeegesebwa be, yakomamu ikumi na babiri, yabeeta abakwenda. Nubo banu:
42006014	Simooni ou yarukire Petero, na mugenzi we Andereya, Yakobbo na Yohaana, Filipo na Batolomayo,
42006015	Matayo na Tomasi, Yakobbo mutabani w'Alifaayo na Simooni ayayetwaga omurwanirizi w'ihanga lye,
42006016	Yuda mutabani wa Yakobbo na Yuda Isikalyota ayamugobiize.
42006017	Yesu yasirimuka nabo, yayemerra omu kyeya nambere yasangire ekitebe kingi ky'abeegesebwa be, n'abantu baingi abakaba barugire Buyudaaya yoona na Yerusaalemu, n'abaarugire omu mbuga Tiiro na Sidooni eziheriire enyanja. Bantu abaaizire kumuhuliriza n'okukizibwa endwara zaabo.
42006018	Abaatalibanizibwaga emyoyo emibi nabo bakakizibwa.
42006019	Abantu boona baaserraga kumukwataho, habwokuba amaani gaamurugamuga gabakiza boona.
42006020	Yesu akahindukira abeegesebwa be, yagamba ati: “Mwina omugisa inywe abanaku, habwokuba obukama bwa Ruhanga bwanyu,
42006021	Mwina omugisa inywe abarukurumwa enjara hati, habwokuba muliiguta. Mwina omugisa inywe abarukurra hati, habwokuba muliseka.
42006022	Muliba b'omugisa inywe abantu obu baraabanoba, bakababinga mu masorrokaniro, bakabajuma, kandi bakabeeta babi nibabatura Omwana w'omuntu!
42006023	Musemererwe ha kiro eki, kandi muguruke habw'omuhimbo, habwokuba empeera yanyu nyingi omwiguru. Ningira baisenkurubo nukwo baakozire bati abarangi.
42006024	Baitu mulikibona inywe abaguuda, habwokuba okusemererwa kwanyu mumazire kukutunga.
42006025	Mulikibona inywe abarukwiguta hati, habwokuba mulirumwa enjara. Mulikibona inywe abarukuseka hati, habwokuba muliganya kandi mulirra.
42006026	Mulikibona inywe, abantu boona obu baraababazaho kurungi, habwokuba na baisenkurubo nukwo baakozire bati abarangi ab'ebisuba.”
42006027	Baitu nimbagambira inywe abarukumpuliriza nti: Mugonzeege abanyanzigwa banyu, mukole kurungi abanyakubanoba,
42006028	mugondeze omugisa abanyakubakyena, kandi musabire abanyakubajuma.
42006029	Omuntu obu araakuteera oruhi ha rusaya orumu, omuhindurre n'orundi. Omuntu obu araatwara ekooti yaawe, otamwima n'esaati.
42006030	Weena araakusaba omuhe, n'araatwara ekyawe otalikimugaruza.
42006031	Eki mwenda abantu babakorre, na inywe nikyo mubakorrege.
42006032	“Obu muraaba nimugonza abanyakubagonza, muraasiimirwa kiraha? Nangwa n'abasiisi nabo baagonza abanyakubagonza.
42006033	Obu muraaba nimukora kurungi abanyakubakora kurungi, muraasiimirwa kiraha? Nangwa n'abasiisi nabo nukwo baakora.
42006034	Obu muraaba nimwohoza abo aba murukunihira kubasasura, muraasiimirwa kiraha? Abasiisi nabo boohoza bataahi baabo, nibagumya ngu, baraasasurwa omuhendo gwona.
42006035	Baitu inywe mugonzeege abanyanzigwa banyu, mubakorre ebirungi, kandi mwohoze mutarukunihira kusasurwa kantu; nubwo mulitunga empeera nkooto, kandi muliba baana b'Ogu Anyakuli haiguru muno; habwokuba agirra embabazi abantu entasiima n'enkozi z'ebibi.
42006036	Mubege b'embabazi nka Isiinywe oku ali w'embabazi.”
42006037	“Mutalicwa emisango, na inywe timuligicwerwa; mutalihenderra, na inywe timulihendererwa; muganyire, na inywe muliganyirwa.
42006038	Mugabe, na inywe muliheebwa. Endengo nungi, ehikire, erukumwaga niyo muliheebwa. Endengo ei mulengesa, na inywe niyo mulirengerwamu.”
42006039	Yesu akabacwera orufumo runu ati: “Omufu w'amaiso asobora kunanata omufu w'amaiso mutaahi we? Bombi tibaligwa omu kiina?
42006040	Omwegesebwa takira omwegesa we; baitu omwegesebwa weena obu amara kutendekwa kurungi, aba nk'omwegesa we.
42006041	Habwaki noorora akahoiga akali omu liiso lya mugenzi waawe, otarukurora empinju enyakuli omu liiso lyawe?
42006042	Rundi noosobora ota kugambira mugenzi wawe oti: Mugenzi wange kankutokoole akahoiga akakuli omu liiso; kandi kunu torukurora empinju enyakuli omu lyawe? Ngobya iwe, banza oihe empinju omu liiso lyawe osobole kuhweza n'okutokoora mugenzi waawe akahoiga akamuli omu liiso.”
42006043	“Tiharoho muti omurungi ogwana ebijuma bibi, rundi omuti omubi ogwana ebijuma birungi.
42006044	Buli muti gumanyirwa ha bijuma byagwo; habwokuba ha mwera-maino tibanogaho bijuma by'omukunyu, kandi ha makerre tibanogaho mizaabbibbu.
42006045	Omuntu omurungi aiha ha birungi ebi agira omu mutima gwe; n'omuntu omubi aiha ha bibi ebi agira omu mutima gwe; habwokuba ebisaaga omu mutima nibyo akanwa kagamba.”
42006046	“Munyetera ki: ‘MUKAMA wange, MUKAMA wange’, kunu mutarukukora ebi mbagambira?
42006047	Omuntu weena anyakwija hali nyowe, akahuliriza ebi ndukugamba nabihikiriza, kambooleke nkooku arukusisana.
42006048	Naasisana nk'omuntu arukwombeka. Akalima omusingi, gwahama, enju ye yagyombeka ha mwandara. Ekisaaru obu kyaboogere, empaya y'amaizi yateera enju egi; baitu etasobole kugitengesa, habwokuba ekaba eyombekerwe kurungi.
42006049	Kandi weena obu ahurra ebi ndukugamba, atarukubihikiriza, naasisana nk'omuntu ayayombekere enju ye ha itaka kwonka, atalimire musingi. Enjura obu yagwire ekisaaru kyabooga, empaya y'amaizi yateera enju egi, ahonaaho yasingooka, n'okusingooka kwayo kwali kw'amaani.”
42007001	Yesu obu yamazire kugambira abantu ebi byona, yagenda Kafaranaumu.
42007002	Hakaba haroho omukuru w'ab'amahe ow'akaba aina omuheereza we omwesigwa muno. Ogu akaba arwaire, ali haihi n'okufa.
42007003	Omukuru w'ab'amahe obu yahuliire nibabazaaho Yesu, yamutumira abakuru b'Abayudaaya, naamusaba aije akize omuheereza we.
42007004	Obu baahikire hali Yesu baamwesengereza muno bati: “Omuntu ogu osemeriire kumukoonyera,
42007005	habwokuba agonza ihanga lyaitu, kandi akatwombekera isorrokaniro.”
42007006	Nukwo Yesu kugenda nabo. Obu akaba alihaihi kuhika ha nju, mukuru w'ab'amahe yatuma banywani be bamugambe bati: “MUKAMA wange, leka kwejwahiza busa, habwokuba tinsemeriire kukutaahya omwange;
42007007	kandi nyerozire nkooku ntasemeriire kwija nambere oli. Gamba ekigambo kyonka, omuheereza wange araakira.
42007008	Habwokuba na nyowe ndi muntu arukulemwa, kandi nyina abaserikale aba ndukulema. Obu ngambira omu nti: ‘Genda’, agenda; n'ondi nti: ‘Ija’ aija; n'omuheereza wange nti: ‘Kora kinu’, akikora.”
42007009	Yesu obu yahuliire ebigambo ebi yahunirra, yahinduka yagambira ekitebe ky'abantu abamuhondiire ati: “Nimbagambira nti: Tinkabonaga okwikiriza nka kunu, noobu haakubaire omu Isirairi”.
42007010	Abakaba batumirwe, obu bagarukire omu ka, bakasanga omuheereza akizire.
42007011	Obu haahingwireho akasumi kake, Yesu yagenda omu rubuga Naini aina abeegesebwa be n'ekitebe ky'abantu baingi.
42007012	Obu akaba nairirra irembo ly'orubuga, yatangaana abahimbire omutumbi gw'omutabani w'omufaakati, kandi nuwe mwana we omu wenka. Abantu baingi ab'omu rubuga bakaba nibagenda nawe.
42007013	MUKAMA Yesu obu yamurozire, yamukwatirwa embabazi, yamugambira ati: “Leka kurra.”
42007014	Yairra haihi, yakwata ha ruhinyo, abakaba bahimbire omutumbi baayemerra. Yagamba ati: Musigazi iwe, ninkugamba nti: “Imuka.”
42007015	Ow'akaba afiire yaikarra, yatandika kubaza. Yesu yamugarurra nyina.
42007016	Aho boona baakwatwa obutiini, kandi baakugiza Ruhanga nibagamba bati: “Omuli itwe haimukiremu omurangi mukuru!” Kandi bati: “Ruhanga aizire kujuna abantu be!”
42007017	Amakuru ganu hali Yesu gaararanga omu Buyudaaya yoona n'ensi eziherraineho.
42007018	Abeegesebwa ba Yohaana bakamusubirra ebi byona. Nawe nukwo kweta babiri hali bo, yabatuma hali MUKAMA Yesu
42007019	bamukaguze bati: “Niiwe arukugenda kwija, rundi tutegereze ondi?”
42007020	Obu baahikire hali Yesu baamugambira bati: “Yohaana Omubatiza atutumire okukukaguza ngu: ‘Niiwe ogu arukugenda kwija, rundi tutegereze ondi?’”
42007021	Omu kasumi ako Yesu akakiza endwara za buli mulingo nk'ebidanda, emyoyo emibi, kandi abafu b'amaiso yabaigura amaiso.
42007022	Nukwo kugarukamu abeegesebwa ba Yohaana ati: “Mugarukeyo, mugambire Yohaana ebi murozire n'ebi muhuliire ngu, abafu b'amaiso nibarora, abalema nibarubata, abagenge bakiziibwe, abafu b'amatu nibahurra, abaafiire nibahumbuurwa, n'abaseege nibarangirirwa Amakuru Amarungi.
42007023	W'omugisa ogu atarukunyesiitaraho.”
42007024	Abaatumirwe Yohaana obu baagarukireyo, Yesu yatandika kusoborra ebitebe by'abantu hali Yohaana ati: “Omu irungu mukagenda kurorayo ki? Orubingo orurukutengesebwa omuyaga?
42007025	Obu, mukagenda kurorayoki? Omuntu ajwaire engoye ezirukunekaneka? Ningira abo abajwara bati kandi abaikara nibasemererwa, basangwa omu bikaali by'abakama!
42007026	Obu, mukagenda kurorayoki? Omurangi? Ego, nimbagambira nti: Naakira n'omurangi.
42007027	Habwokuba Yohaana ogu nuwe ayahandiikirweho ngu: ‘Dora nintuma omukwenda wange akwebembere, nuwe akusemereze omuhanda.’
42007028	Nimbagambira nti: Omu bantu abaazairwe abakazi, busamu n'omu arukukira Yohaana ekitiinisa; baitu omuto omu bukama bwa Ruhanga naamukira.”
42007029	(Abantu boona, hamu n'abasorooza b'omusoro abakaba babatiziibwe Yohaana, obu baahuliire ebigambo ebi, baakugiza Ruhanga habw'entegeka ye.
42007030	Baitu Abafalisaayo n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro abataraikirize bukatizibwa Yohaana, bakanga entegeka Ruhanga ei yabategekiire.)
42007031	“Hati nu, abantu ab'ebiro binu ndabalengesaniza na ki? Kandi nibasisana bata?
42007032	Nibasisana abaana abaikaliire omu katale nibeetangana bati: ‘Tukabaterra endere, timwazina! Twateera empamo, timwarra!’
42007033	Yohaana Omubatiza akaija atarukulya byokulya kandi atarukunywa marwa; inywe mwagamba ngu: ‘Aroho omwoyo omubi!’
42007034	Baitu Omwana w'omuntu, uwe akaija naalya kandi naanywa; mwagamba ngu: ‘Dora omukoizi kandi omutamiizi, nganjani y'abasorooza b'omusoro n'abasiisi!’
42007035	Baitu amagezi ga Ruhanga gamanyirwa ha bikorwa byago.”
42007036	Omu ha Bafalisaayo akeeta Yesu okulya nawe. Yesu yataaha omunju ye, yaikarra kulya.
42007037	Omu rubuga oru hakaba harumu omukazi omusiisi. Obu yamanyire Yesu nkooku arukulya omunju y'Omufalisaayo, yaleeta orusale rw'amagita agarukuboya kurungi.
42007038	Yamwemerra enyuma narra. Amaizi ag'omu maiso ge gaajubya ebigere bya Yesu, yabiragaza n'isoke rye, yabinywegera, yabisiiga amagita ago.
42007039	Omufalisaayo ow'akaba araaliize Yesu obu yakirozire, yateekereza omunda ye ati “Omuntu onu kakuba abaire ali murangi, yakumanyire omukazi onu arukumukwataho nkooku ali musiisi!”
42007040	Yesu nukwo kumugarukamu ati: “Simooni, nyina eki ndukugonza kukugambira.” Nawe yagarukamu ati: “Mwegesa, kingambire.”
42007041	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Hakaba haroho abanyamabanja babiri abaatongwaga omuntu. Omu akaba naatongwa siringi rukumi, ondi siringi kikumi.
42007042	Obu baabuzirwe eky'okusasura, bombi yabaganyira. Hali abo bombi nooha alikira kumugonza?”
42007043	Simooni yamugarukamu ati: “Ninteekereza oli ou yaganyiire enyingi.” Yesu yagamba ati: “Ocwiremu kurungi.”
42007044	Nubwo yahindukira omukazi, yagambira Simooni ati: “Omukazi ogu omuboine? Obu ntaahire omunju yaawe, tompaire amaizi g'okunaba ebigere, baitu onu ajubize ebigere byange n'amaizi ag'omu maiso ge, yabiragaza n'isoke rye.
42007045	Kandi obu ontangiriire tonnywegiirege, baitu omwanya gwona ogu nakamara hanu, omukazi onu takalekiire kunywegera ebigere byange.
42007046	Iwe tonseesire amagita ha mutwe, baitu uwe asiigire ebigere byange amagita agarukuboya kurungi.
42007047	Nahabweki ninkugambira nti: Habw'okugonza kwe okwingi, ebibi bye ebingi bimuganyiirwe; baitu anyakuganyirwa ebike, agonza kake.”
42007048	Nubwo Yesu yagambira omukazi ati: “Oganyirwe ebibi byawe.”
42007049	Abo abakaba baikaliire nibalya nawe baatandika kukaguzangana bati: “Onu nuwe oha arukuganyira ebibi?”
42007050	Baitu Yesu yagambira omukazi ati: “Okwikiriza kwawe kukujunire; genda n'obusinge.”
42008001	Ebi obu byahoire, Yesu yagenda naaraba omu mbuga n'omu byaro naayegesa kandi naarangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'obukama bwa Ruhanga. Ikumi na babiri bakagenda nawe,
42008002	hamu n'abakazi abamu abakaba bakiziibwe emyoyo emibi n'endwara. Nubo banu: Mariya arukwetwa Magadaleena ayarugirweho emyoyo emibi musanju,
42008003	na Yoana muka Kuuza omukeeto wa Herode, kandi Susaana n'abandi baingi abahaireyo ebyabo okubakoonyera.
42008004	Abantu baingi obu baayesoroize Yesu nambere akaba ali, nibaruga omu mbuga ezitali zimu, yabaganikiza oruganikyo ati:
42008005	“Omusigi akatura kusiga. Obu akaba naasiga, embibo ezimu zaagwa ha muhanda rubaju, abantu baazirubatirra, n'enyonyi zaazisoma.
42008006	Ezindi zaagwa ha itaka erya ha mwandara, obu zaayarukire, zaahotoka habw'okuburwa amaizi.
42008007	Embibo ezindi zaagwa omu mahwa; zaakura nago, gaazinyoroza.
42008008	N'ezindi zaagwa omu itaaka erirungi, zaayaruka, zaakura, zaayana obujuma kikumi, kikumi.” Obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yakangura iraka naagamba ati: “Anyakwina amatu, ahurre!”
42008009	Abeegesebwa be obu bamukagwize amakuru g'oruganikyo oru,
42008010	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Inywe mukaheebwa okumanya ensita z'obukama bwa Ruhanga; baitu abandi bazigambirwa omu nganikyo, nukwo barole nk'abatarukurora, kandi bahurre nk'abatarukwetegereza.”
42008011	Amakuru g'oruganikyo oru nganu: Embibo nikyo kigambo kya Ruhanga.
42008012	Ezi ezaagwire ha muhanda rubaju nubo abo abahurra ekigambo; hanyuma omwohi aija, ekigambo akiiha omu mitima yabo, nukwo baleke kwikiriza bakajunwa.
42008013	Kandi ezi ezaagwire ha mwandara nubo abo abahurra ekigambo bakakiikiriza n'okusemererwa; baitu tikihama omu mitima yabo. Baikiriza okumara akasumi kake, baitu omu kasumi k'okwohebwa bagwa.
42008014	Kandi embibo ezaagwire omu mahwa nubo abo abahurra ekigambo, baitu obu bagenda, banyorozibwa emitalibano, obuguuda, n'okusemerererwa eby'obwomeezi bunu; kandi ebikorwa byabo ebirungi tibyeyongera.
42008015	Embibo ezaagwire omu itaka erirungi nubo abo abahurra ekigambo bakakikwata n'omutima gumu, kandi bakora ekikorwa ebirungi nibagumiisiriza.
42008016	“Busaho anyakuhemba etaara, akagijuumikira ekigega, rundi akagita omu madaara g'ekitabu; baitu agihanika ha kikondo kyayo, nukwo emulikire abarukutaaha omu nju.
42008017	Habwokuba busaho ekiserekerwe ekitalyolekwa, noobu kyakuba eky'ensita ekitalimanywa kandi kikazooka burole.
42008018	Nahabweki mwetegereze ebi murukuhurra, kabwokuba anyakwina bingi nuwe alyongerwaho, baitu anyakwina ebike n'ebi ainabyo birimwihwaho.”
42008019	Nyina Yesu n'abagenzi be bakaija nibamuserra, baitu batasobole kumuhika haihi habw'obwingi bw'abantu.
42008020	Nukwo kumutumaho bati: “Nyoko n'abagenzi baawe beemeriire aheeru nibagonza kukurora.”

42008039	“Garukayo, ogambire ab'omu ka yaawe ebikuru Ruhanga ebi akukoliire.” Omusaija yagenda naarangaaniza omu rubuga rwona byona Yesu ebi amukoliire.

42009016	Aho Yesu yakwata emigaati etaano n'encu ibiri, yararamira haiguru, yasiima, yabicwamu, yabiha abeegesebwa be kubigabira abantu.
42009017	Boona baalya baiguta. Obu baasoroize oburagalika obwasaagireho, bwaijuza ebigega ikumi na bibiri.
42009018	Kiro kimu Yesu obu akaba ali wenka naasaba, abeegesebwa be baija nambere ali, nukwo kubakaguza ati: “Abantu bannyeta bata?”
42009019	Baamugarukamu bati: “Baakweta Yohaana Omubatiza; abandi baagamba ngu: Niiwe Eriya; kandi abandi ngu: Niiwe omu ha barangi aba ira ahumbuukire.”
42009020	Yagaruka yabakaguza ati: “Baitu inywe nimunnyeta muta?” Petero yamugarukamu ati: “Niiwe Kristo owa Ruhanga!”
42009021	Yesu yabateererra okutakigambiraho muntu n'omu,
42009022	naagamba ati: “Omwana w'omuntu naasemerra kubonabonesibwa muno, n'okwangwa abakuru b'orukurato, n'abanyakatagara abakuru, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, n'okwitwa; kandi ahumburwe haahingwireho ebiro bisatu.”
42009023	Yesu yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Weena anyakugonza kumpondera, ayehwemu wenka, ahimbe omusaraba gwe buli kiro, ampondere.
42009024	Habwokuba weena arukutaatira obwomeezi bwe alibufeerwa; baitu weena anyakuhayo obwomeezi bwe habwange alibujuna.
42009025	Omuntu kuraamugasira ki okulya ensi yoona, baitu akeehwerekereza wenka rundi akafeerwa obwomeezi bwe?
42009026	Weena anyakunkwatirwa ensoni kandi akazikwatirwa ebigambi byange, nawe Omwana w'omuntu alimukwatirwa ensoni abu aliizira omu kitiinisa kye n'omu kitiinisa kya Ise n'eky'abamalaika abahikiire.
42009027	Malimali nimbagambira nti: Haroho abeemeriire hanu abatalihikwaho rufu batakarozire obukama bwa Ruhanga.”
42009028	Obu haahingwireho ebiro nka munaana Yesu amazire kugamba ebigambo ebi, yatwara Petero, Yohaana, na Yakobbo, yabatembya ha rusozi kusaba.
42009029	Obu akaba naakyasaba, enzooka y'amaiso ge yahinduka, engoye ze zaayera tiitiiti.
42009030	Ahonaaho haazooka abantu babiri nibabaza nawe, nubo Musa na Eriya
42009031	abaabonekere omu kitiinisa, baabaza nawe ha kufa oku akaba naija kuhikiriza Yerusaalemu
42009032	Petero n'abataahi be bakaba baina oturo twingi, baitu obu baahamantukire baarora ekitiinisa kye n'abasaija babiri abakaba beemeriire nawe.
42009033	Abasaija abo obu bakaba nibakyamurugaho, Petero yagambira Yesu ati: “Mwegesa, kibaire kirungi itwe kusangwa hanu. Katwombeke obusiisira busatu: akamu kaawe, akamu ka Musa, n'akandi k'Eriya.” Obu, akaba atarukumanya eki arukugamba.
42009034	Obu akaba naakyagamba ebi, ekicu kyaija kyabasiikiriza. Obu kyabasiikiriize baatiina.
42009035	Iraka lyaruga omu kicu nirigamba liti: “Onu nuwe Mwana wange ou nyekomiire, mumuhurre!”
42009036	Iraka obu lyaculiire, baasanga Yesu ali wenka. Binu byona abeegesebwa bakabiculerra, kandi omu biro ebi batagambireho muntu n'omu ekigambo kyona hali ebi baaboine.
42009037	Ekiro ekyakurasireho obu baasirimukire orusozi, abantu baingi bakaitirana Yesu.
42009038	Omusaija ow'akaba ali omu kitebe yatokera haiguru ati: “Mwegesa, ninkwesengereza ondorre mutabani wange, nuwe wenka ou nyina.
42009039	Omwoyo omubi gwikara nigumukwata, ahonaaho ayamuza, gumunaga ensimbo, aleeta ifuro, gumumara amaani, kandi tigumulekera.
42009040	Nkeesengereza abeegesebwa baawe kugubinga, baitu batasobole.”
42009041	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Inywe abataina okwikiriza kandi ab'obusinge obuhabire, ndihikya nkaha okwikara na inywe n'okubagumiisiriza? Omwana waawe muleete hanu.”
42009042	Omwojo obu akaba nakyaija, omwoyo omubi gwamuteera hansi, gwamunaga ensimbo. Baitu Yesu yacoomera omwoyo mubi, yakiza omwojo, yamugarurra ise.
42009043	Abantu boona baahunirra habw'obusobozi obwa Ruhanga. Abantu obu bakaba nibakyahunirirra ebintu byona Yesu ebi yakozire, uwe yagambira abeegesebwa be ati:
42009044	“Ebigambo binu mubiteho omutima; habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abantu.”
42009045	Baitu ebigambo ebi bateetegereze amakuru gaabyo. Bikaba bibaserekerwe, nukwo baleke kubyetegereza; kandi bakatiina kubimukaguzaaho.
42009046	Hakaimukaho empaka omu beegesebwa, nibeekaguza arukukira obukuru omuli bo.
42009047	Baitu Yesu obu yamanyire ebiteekerezo byabo, yakwata omwana muto, yamwemereza ha rubaju rwe,
42009048	yabagambira ati: “Weena anyakujwahukirra omwana muto nk'onu habwange, buli ajwahukiriire nyowe; kandi anyakujwahukirra nyowe, buli ajwahukiriire Ogu ayantumiire; habwokuba anyakukira obuto omuli inywe, nuwe mukuru.”
42009049	Nubwo Yohaana yamugambiire ati: “Mwegesa, turozire omuntu naabinga emyoyo emibi omu ibara lyawe, twamutanga habwokuba tali w'ekitebe kyaitu.”
42009050	Nukwo Yesu kumugambira ati: “Muleke kumutanga, habwokuba weena atarukubahakaniza, ali habwanyu.”
42009051	Akasumi ka Yesu ak'okutwarwa omwiguru obu kairiire haihi, akamalirra kugenda Yerusaalemu.
42009052	Yatuma abakwenda kumwebembera. Bbo baagenda baataaha omu kyaro ky'Abasamaliya kumuteekaniriza.
42009053	Baitu abantu baayo baayanga kumutangirra, habwokuba akaba naahingura kugenda Yerusaalemu.
42009054	Abeegesebwa be Yakobbo na Yohaana obu baarozire kunu baamukaguza bati: “MUKAMA waitu, noogonza turagire omurro guruge omwiguru, gubahwerekereze?”
42009055	Baitu Yesu yabahindukira yabahana ati: [“Timurukumanya omwoyo ogu musemeriire kuba nagwo, habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu ataije kuhwerekereza obwomeezi bw'abantu, baitu okubujuna.”]
42009056	Nubwo bayeyongera kugenda omu kyaro ekindi.
42009057	Obu bakaba nibakyagenda, baitirana omuntu ayagambiire Yesu ati: “Ndaakuhonderaga hoona nambere oraakagendaga.”
42009058	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Eboha ziina ebiina byazo, n'enyonyi ziina ebiju byazo; baitu Omwana w'omuntu taina h'okuta omutwe.”
42009059	Yesu yagambira omuntu ondi ati: “Mpondera.” Baitu uwe yamugarukamu ati: “Mukama wange, kambanze ngende nziike taata.”
42009060	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Leka abakafiiri baziike abafu baabo, baitu iwe genda orangirre obukama bwa Ruhanga.”
42009061	N'omuntu ondi yagamba ati: “Mukama wange, nyowe ninyija kukuhondera, baitu kambanze ngende ndage ab'owaitu.”
42009062	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Busaho n'omu arukulimisa ekyoma, akarora enyuma, asemeriire obukama bwa Ruhanga.”
42010001	Ebi obu byahoire, MUKAMA Yesu akakoma abandi nsanju na babiri yabatuma babiri babiri, bamwebebembere omu mbuga n'omu mbuga n'omu biikaro nambere akaba naija kubunga.
42010002	Yabagambira ati: “Eby'okugesa bingi, baitu abagesi nubo bake; habweki musabe MUKAMA w'eby'okugesa ayongere abakozi omu musiri gwe.
42010003	Irooko mugende, hati nimbatuma nk'ebyaana by'entaama ebirukugenda omu myaaga hagati.
42010004	Mutatwara ensahu ya sente, n'ey'ebyokulya, noobu zaakuba enkaito; mutaramukyaramukya omu muhanda.
42010005	Enju yoona ei muraataahamuga, mubanze mugambe muti: ‘Obusinge bube omunju enu!’
42010006	Obu haraaba harumu omuntu arukugonza obusinge, obusinge bwanyu buraikaraga nawe; baitu obu ataasangwemu, buraabagarukiraga.
42010007	Enju egi niyo mwikalemu nimunywa ebi baraabahaga, habwokuba omukozi asemerra kuheebwa empeera ye; kandi mutalijeerajeera.
42010008	Obu muraataahaga omu rubuga mukajwahukirirwa, mulye ebi baraabasemberezaaga,
42010009	mukize abarwaire baamwo, kandi mubagambire muti: ‘Obukama bwa Ruhanga bubairiire haihi.’
42010010	Baitu obu muraataahaga omu rubuga nambere baayanga kubajwahukirra, mugende omu makuute gaarwo, muganbe muti:
42010011	‘Nangwa n'ecuucu ey'orubuga rwanyu enyakuli ha bigere byaitu twagibateerateerra; baitu mumanye obukama bwa Ruhanga nkooku bubairiire haihi.’
42010012	Nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, Sodomu eriganyirwa kukira orubuga oru!”
42010013	“Olikibona iwe Korazini! Olikibona iwe Betisaida! Habwokuba ebyamahano ebyakoliirwe omuli inywe kakuba byakoliirwe omu Tiiro na Sidooni, baakubaire beegarukiremu ira bajwaire ebiguniya kandi baikaliire omu iju.
42010014	Baitu ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango Tiiro na Sidooni ziriganyirwa okukira inywe.
42010015	Kandi iwe Kafaranaumu olinyumizibwa ohike haiguru? Nangwa, oligarurwa hansi okuzimu!
42010016	“Weena anyakubahurra buli ahuliire nyowe; kandi weena arukunyanga buli ayangire Ogu ayantumiire.”
42010017	Nsanju na babiri bakagaruka basemeriirwe muno, nibagamba bati: “Waitu, emyoyo emibi nayo ekatuhurra habwawe!”
42010018	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nkarora Sitaani naagwa nk'omurabyo ogurukuruga omwiguru.
42010019	Hati mbahaire obusobozi bw'okurubatirra enjoka n'enge, n'okurubatirra amaani goona ag'omunyanzigwa; kandi busaho kintu ekiribakora kubi.
42010020	Kyonka muleke kusemererwa habw'emyoyo emibi kubahurra; baitu musemererwe habwokuba amabara ganyu gahandiikirwe omwiguru.”
42010021	Kandi omu kasumi ako Mwoyo Ahikiriire akaijuza Yesu okusemererwa, nukwo uwe kugamba ati: “Ninkusiima Taata, iwe MUKAMA w'iguru n'ensi, habwokuba ebintu ebi, okabisereka ab'amagezi n'abarukwetegereza, wabisuukurra abaana bato. Ego Taata, habwokuba eki nikyo wasiimire.
42010022	Isenyowe akankwasa ebintu byona; kandi busaho n'omu amanyire Mwana okwihaho Ise, kandi busaho amanyire Ise okwihaho Mwana, na weena Mwana ou agonza kumusuukurra.”
42010023	Nubwo Yesu yahindukiire abeegesebwa be, yabagambira omu bihwa ati: “G'omugisa amaiso agarukurora inywe ebi murukurora!
42010024	Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Abarangi baingi n'abakama bakeegomba kurora ebi murukurora, baitu batabirole, n'okuhurra ebi murukuhurra, baitu batabihurre.”
42010025	Nubwo haimukire omwegesa w'ebiragiro kumulenga naakaguza ati: “Mwegesa, nkole ki okugwetwa omu bwomeezi obutahwaho?”
42010026	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Omu Biragiro kikahandiikwa kita? Osomamu ota?”
42010027	Nandiki uwe ati: “Ogonzeege MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona, n'omwoyo gwawe gwona, n'amaani gaawe goona, n'amagezi gaawe goona; kandi ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.”
42010028	Yesu yamugambira ati: “Ogarukiremu kurungi; kora oti, kandi olyomeera.”
42010029	Baitu omwegesa w'ebiragiro, habw'okugonza kwerunga, yakaguza Yesu ati: “Kandi mutaahi wange nooha?”
42010030	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kiro kimu omusaija akaba naaruga Yerusaalemu naagenda Yeriko, yagwa omu banyagi abaamujwiremu engoye ze, baamuteera, baagenda baamusiga nahoijahoija.
42010031	Omu kasumi ako haabaho nyakatagara ow'akaba naaraba omu muhanda ogu. Obu yarozire omusaija ogu yamurabaho, yagenda.
42010032	Omuleevi nawe obu yahikireho yamurora, yamurabaho nka nyakatagara oli.
42010033	Baitu Omusamaliya ow'akaba naagenda omu muhanda ogu, yahika nambere ali. Obu yamurozire, yakwatwa embabazi,
42010034	yamwirra haihi, yaseesa amagita n'eviini omu bihuta bye, yabisemba. Hanyuma yamuta ha nsoro ye, yamuleeta omunju y'abagoonyi, nambere yamurwaliize.
42010035	Obwire obu bwakiire yakwata siringi ina, yaziha omulinzi w'enju y'abagoonyi, naagamba ati: ‘Omurwaze, obu ndigaruka kyona eki oliba oyongiireho, ndikikusasura.’
42010036	Hali abo abasatu, nooha ou orukurora ow'akaba ali mutaahi w'omusaija ogu ayagwire omu banyagi?”
42010037	Omwegesa w'ebiragiro yamugarukamu ati: “Ogu ayamugiriire embabazi.” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Na iwe genda okole oti.”
42010038	Obu bakaba nibagenda, Yesu yahika omu kyaro ekimu; omukazi arukwetwa Malita yamujwahukirra, yamutaahya omunju ye.
42010039	Malita akaba aina owanyina, ibara lye Mariya. Mariya ogu yaikarra haihi n'ebigere bya MUKAMA Yesu naahuliriza ebi akaba naayegesa.
42010040	Baitu Malita akaba naatalibanizibwa emirimo nyingi; nukwo kugenda hali Yesu naagamba ati: “MUKAMA wange, torukurora owanyina nyowe nkooku andekiire kuheereza nyenka? Mugambe, aije ankonyere!”
42010041	Baitu MUKAMA yamugarukamu ati: “Malita, Malita nootunturra kandi nootalibanizibwa ebintu bingi.
42010042	Ekirukwetaagwa kiri kimu kyonka. Mariya ayegomboize omugabo murungi ogutalimwihwaho.”
42011001	Yesu akaba ali mu kiikaro kimu naasaba; obu yamazire, omu ha beegesebwa be yamugambira ati: “MUKAMA waitu, twegese okusaba nka Yohaana oku yayegeseze abeegesebwa be.”
42011002	Nukwo Yesu kubagambira ati: “Obu muraabaga nimusaba, mugambege muti: ‘Isiitwe, ibara lyawe litiinwe, obukama bwawe bwije;
42011003	otuhe hati ebyokulya byaitu ebya buli kiro;
42011004	otuganyire ebibi byaitu, habwokuba na itwe tuganyira boona abatukora kubi; otatuleka tukoohebwa.’ ”
42011005	Kandi Yesu akabagambira ati: “Omuli inywe anyakwina munywani we, kakuba agenda owe omu itumbi akamusaba ati: ‘Munywani wange, nyohozaayo emigaati esatu;
42011006	habwokuba naizirwa omugenyi arugire hara, kandi tinyina kyokulya ky'okumuha!’
42011007	Baitu nyineeka akamugarukamu ati: ‘Leka kuntalibaniza; nkingire ira, nyowe n'abaana bange tubyamire. Tinsobora kwimuka kukuha eki orukwenda.’
42011008	Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Noobu araaba atarukugonza kwimuka kumuha eki arukusaba habw'obuganjani, baitu habw'okwongera kumujwahya naamwesengereza, naija kwimuka amuhe kyona eki arukwetaaga.
42011009	“Nikyo na nyowe ndukubagambirra nti: Musabe, muraaheebwa; muserre, muraazoora; mwerange, muraakingulirwa.
42011010	Habwokuba weena anyakusaba, aheebwa; anyakuserra, azoora; kandi anyakweranga, akingulirwa.
42011011	Muzaire ki omuli inywe anyakuha omwana we enjoka, kunu amusabire encu?
42011012	Rundi anyakuha omwana we enge, kunu amusabire ihuli?
42011013	Nukwo inywe ababi, obu muraaba nimusobora kuha abaana banyu ebirungi, Isiinywe ow'omwiguru talikiraho okuha Mwoyo Ahikiriire abo abarukumusaba?”
42011014	Yesu akaba naabinga ha muntu omwoyo omubi ogwamufoire kateta; omwoyo omubi obu gwamazire kumurugaho, omusaija yabaza. Nukwo abantu kuhunirra;
42011015	baitu abamu omuli bo baagamba bati: “Ogu abinga emyoyo emibi habwa Beelizebuli mukuru wayo.”
42011016	Aho abandi baamutega nibamusaba akarorwaho akarukuruga omu iguru.
42011017	Baitu Yesu habw'okumanya ebiteekerezo byabo yabagambira ati: “Obukama bwona obwebaganizaamu okurwanisangana, buhwerekerra. Kandi eka enyakwebaganizaamu nayo ehwerekerra.
42011018	Sitaani obu araaba ayebaganiizeemu kwerwanisa wenka, obukama bwe buliikaraho buta? Inywe mugamba ngu, obusobozi bwa Beelizebuli nubwo bunbingisa emyoyo emibi.
42011019	Obu kiraaba kiri kiti, kandi abaana banyu baagibingisa obusobozi bw'oha? Nahabweki nubo abalibacwera omusango.
42011020	Baitu obusobozi bwa Ruhanga obu buraaba buli nubwo obunbingisa emyoyo emibi, mumanye obukama bwa Ruhanga nkooku bubahikireho.
42011021	“Omuntu w'amaani obu aba aina ebyokurwanisa ebirukumara, alinda eka ye, nukwo ebintu bye biikara omu businge.
42011022	Baitu arukumukira amaani obu amuseesira, akamusingura, amunyagaho ebyokurwanisa bye byona ebi abaire naayesiga, kandi agaba ebi amunyagireho.
42011023	Atali habwange buli nampakaniza; kandi atasorooza na nyowe, ararangya.”
42011024	“Omwoyo omubi obu guba gumazire kuruga omu muntu, gugendagenda omu biikaro ebitarumu maizi niguserra h'okuhuumura. Obu gutazooraho, gugamba guti: ‘Kangarukeyo owange nambere naarugire.’
42011025	Obu gugaruka gusanga enju esingoliirwe kandi eteekaniziibwe kurungi.
42011026	Nubwo gugenda, guleeta endi musanju erukugukira obubi, ija ikara omu. Kandi omuntu ogu obwomeezi bwe bwa hanyuma buba bubi okukira obw'okubanza.”
42011027	Yesu obu akaba nakyagamba ebi, omukazi ow'akaba ali omu kitebe yaimukya iraka lye naagamba ati: “Y'omugisa enda eyakuzaire n'amabeere aga wayonkere!”
42011028	Baitu Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Abarukukira kuba b'omugisa nubo abahurra ekigambo kya Ruhanga bakakikwata!”
42011029	Ebitebe by'abantu obu byayeyongiire kukanya, Yesu yabagambira ati: “Abantu ab'ebiro binu, bantu babi! Nibasaba akarorwaho, baitu tibaliheebwa karorwaho okwihaho aka Yona.
42011030	Yona nkooku yabaire karorwaho ha bantu ba Nineve, n'Omwana w'omuntu nukwo aliba ha bantu ab'obusinge bunu.
42011031	Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, Omukamakati ow'Obukiizi bw'obulyo alyemerra n'abantu ab'ebiro binu abasingise omusango, habwokuba akaruga ha mpero y'ensi yaija okuhurra amagezi ya Solomooni; kandi hati arukukira Solomooni ali hanu.
42011032	Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, abantu ba Nineve balyemerra basingise ab'obusinge bunu omusango; habwokuba bakeegarukamu obu baahuliire Yona ebi yabarangiriire; kandi hati arukukira Yona ali hanu!”
42011033	“Busaho muntu anyakumara kuhemba etaara akagisereka omu kisiika rundi akagijuumikira ekigega; baitu agihanika ha kikondo kyayo, nukwo abarukutaaha omu nju bahweze.
42011034	Eriiso lyawe niyo taara ey'omubiri; eriiso lyawe obu liba nirihweza, omubiri gwona guhwereza kimu; baitu eriiso obu liba litarukuhweza, omubiri gwawe nagwo guswekwa omwirima.
42011035	Habweki werinde, ekyererezi eki oinakyo kitaikara kufooka mwirima.
42011036	Omubiri gwona obu guraaba niguhwereza kimu, gutarumu ekyetwa omwirima, gwangasanira kimu, gubamulikira nkooku mwakumuliikirwe etaara.”
42011037	Yesu obu yamazire kubaza, Omufalisaayo akamweta kulya owe; yagenda yataaha omunju, yaikarra kulya.
42011038	Omufalisaayo yahunirra okurora Yesu naalya atabandize kunaaba.
42011039	Nukwo MUKAMA Yesu kumugambira ati: “Inywe Abafalisaayo, mwogya ebikopo n'esahaani haruguru, baitu omu nda mwijwire obunyagi n'obubi.
42011040	Ha, badoma inywe! Ayahangire ebya haruguru tinuwe ayahangire n'eby'omu nda?
42011041	Haakire ebintu ebi mwinabyo mubigabirege abanaku, nukwo ebindi byona birisemerezebwa habwanyu.
42011042	“Baitu mulikibona inywe Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba muha Ruhanga ekicweka kya ikumi eky'omubwiga n'eyobyo n'emikubi endi, baitu obwinganiza n'okugonza Ruhanga timubifaaho. Ebi nibyo mwakufiireho, kandi ebindi nabyo muleke kubinagaija.
42011043	“Mulikibona inywe Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba mugonza ebiikaro eby'ekitiinisa omu masorrokaniro, n'okuramukibwa omu butale.
42011044	Mulikibona inywe! Habwokuba muli nk'ebituuro ebitarukurorwa, abantu ebi barubataho batamanyire.”
42011045	Nubwo omu ha beegesa b'ebiragiro yamugambiire ati: “Mwegesa, obu orukugamba oti, buli na itwe otujumire!”
42011046	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Mulikibona na inywe abeegesa b'ebiragiro! Mutweka abantu ebintu ebiremiire muno, kandi kunu inywe mutarukutaho n'orukumo kubakoonyera kubyetweka.
42011047	Mulikibona inywe abombekera abarangi ebituuro, kandi kunu nubo abaisirwe abaisenkuru inywe.
42011048	Nukwo na inywe muli bakaiso kandi nimugumya baisenkuru inywe ebi baakozire. Bbo bakabaita, kandi inywe nimwombeka ebituuro byabo.
42011049	“Nikyo Ruhanga yagambiire omu Magezi ge ati: ‘Ndibatumira abarangi n'abakwenda; abamu omuli bo balibaita kandi abandi balibahiiganiza.’
42011050	Nukwo ab'ebiro binu bajunaanwe esagama y'abarangi boona eyaseesekere kuruga hakuhangwa kw'ensi.
42011051	Okuruga ha sagama y'Abberi okuhika ha ya Zakaliya ou baitiire hagati y'itambiro n'ekiikaro ekirukwera. Mazima nimbagambira nti: Abantu ab'ebiro binu balijunaanwa esagama yabo.
42011052	Mulikibona inywe abeegesa b'ebiragiro! Habwokuba mukaihaho ekisumuruzo eky'orwigi orw'okumanya. Inywe inywenka timwataahamu, kandi n'abandi abakaba nibenda kutaahamu mwabatanga.”
42011053	Yesu obu akaba naaruga omunju egi, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo baatandika kumuteeza muno empaka, baamukaguliriza ha bintu bingi,
42011054	bakaba nibamutega emitego nukwo bamukwasize ha bigambo ebi araabagarukamu.
42012001	Omu kasumi ako, abantu enkumi n'enkumi obu baayesoroize hamu, bakaba nibasindikangana, Yesu yabanza kugambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafalisaayo, nubwo obugobya bwabu.
42012002	Busaho ekiswekeriirwe ekitalisuukurwa, rundi ekiserekerwe ekitalimanywa.
42012003	Kyona kyona eki mwagambiire omu mwirima kirihulirwa omusana nigujwa; n'eki mwahwehweteriire omu bisiika ebya ha rubaju kirirangirirwa ha rusu rw'enju.”
42012004	“Banywani bange kambagambire nti: Muleke kutiina abo abaita omubiri kunu bataina kindi eki basobora kukora ekirukukira aho.
42012005	Kambagambire ow'okutiina. Mutiine Ogu anyakumara kwita, akagira n'obusobozi obw'okunaga omu murro ogutaraara. Mazimakwo Ogu nuwe mutiinege!
42012006	“Ebisirya bitaano tibigurwa sente abiri? Kandi kunu busaho na kimu halibyo ekyeba omu maiso ga Ruhanga.
42012007	Isoke lya ha mitwe yanyu nalyo libazirwe lyona. Nahabweki muleke kutiina. Inywe muli b'omuhendo mwingi kukira ebisirya bingi!”
42012008	“Nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena alinnyatura omumaiso g'abantu, Omwana w'omuntu nawe alimwatura omumaiso ga bamalaika ba Ruhanga;
42012009	kandi weena alinyehakana omumaiso g'abantu, Omwana w'omuntu alimwehakana omumaiso ga bamalaika ba Ruhanga.
42012010	Weena anyakugamba kubi ha Mwana w'omuntu aliganyirwa; baitu anyakujuma Mwoyo Ahikiriire taliganyirwa.
42012011	Obu baraabaleeta omu masorrokaniro, rundi hali ab'obusobozi, rundi hali abalemi kubanyegerra, muleke kutuntura nkooku muraagarukamu nimwetonganirra, rundi eki muraagamba;
42012012	habwokuba Mwoyo Ahikiriire alibeegesa omu kasumi ako eki musemeriire kugamba.”

42012016	Nukwo kubacwera orufumo runu ati: “Hakaba haroho omuguuda anyakwina itaka lye eryayereze ebirimwa bingi.
42012017	Kandi uwe yabanza kwekaguza ati: ‘Nkole ki? Tinyina h'okuhunika ebirimwa byange byona.’
42012018	Yagamba ati: ‘Kinu nikyo ndaakora. Ndaaseesa enguli zange, nyombekemu enkooto nambere ndihunika oburo bwange hamu n'ebintu byange ebindi.
42012019	Obu nubwo ndyehuuma nti Nyeyahuliire ebintu ebirimmazaaho emyaka nyingi erukwija. Kampuumule, ndye, nywe, nyegonze.’
42012020	Baitu Ruhanga yamugambira ati: ‘Mudoma iwe! Kiro kya hati oraihwaho obwomeezi bwawe. Ebintu byona ebi wayeyahuliire biriba by'oha?’
42012021	Nukwo kiba kiti hali ogu ayeyahurra itungo lingi omu nsi, kunu munaku omu maiso ga Ruhanga.”
42012022	Nubwo Yesu yagambiire abeegesebwa be ati: “Nikyo ndukubagambirra nti: Mutalitunturra obwomeezi bwanyu eki muraalyaga rundi, omubiri gwanyu eki muraajwaraga.
42012023	Habwokuba obwomeezi bw'omuhendo kukira ebyokulya, n'omubiri gw'omuhendo kukira ebyokujwara.
42012024	Murole ebingoora: tibisiga, tibigesa, tibigira nguli noobu haakuba ahandi h'okuhunika; baitu nabwo Ruhanga abiriisa. Inywe ka nimukirra kimu enyonyi!
42012025	Nooha omuli inywe, noobu atuntura ata, akusobora kwongeraho akasumikake ha bwomeezi bwe?
42012026	Obu muraaba mutarukusobora kukora akantu kake nk'ako, ebindi nibibatuntuliza ki?
42012027	Murorre ha byakyo nkooku bikura: tibiruka kandi tibyongosa; baitu nimbagambira nti: Nangwa na Solomooni omu kitiinisa kye kyona atajwale kurungi okwingana ekimu hali byo.
42012028	Ruhanga obu araaba ajweka ati ebinyansi ebiroho hati, nyenkya bikanagwa ha kikoomi, talikiraho muno kujweka inywe abaina okwikiriza kuke?
42012029	Mulekege okumaliza omutima ha ki muraalyaga n'eki muraanywaga, noobu kwakuba kubitunturra.
42012030	Habwokuba ebi byona Abanyamahanga b'omunsi munu nibyo baitanira. Baitu Isiinywe amanyire nkooku murukubyetaaga.
42012031	Ekirikukira, inywe mubanze muserre obukama bwe, n'ebi byona biribongerwaho.”
42012032	“Mutatiina inywe igana erike! Habwokuba Isiinywe akasiima kubaha obukama.
42012033	Mutunde ebi mwinabyo, mugabire abaseege; mwetungire ensahu za sente ezitarukukura, kandi mwahule itungo eritahwaho omwiguru, omusuma nambere atalisobora kulihikaho kandi enkugutu nambere italisobora kulisisa.
42012034	Habwokuba itungo lyanyu nambere liri, oku nuho n'emitima yanyu eraikaraga.”
42012035	“Mwikale mweteekaniize, mweteegere emyeko, n'etaara zanyu nizaaka.
42012036	Mube nk'abantu abarukulindirra mukama wabo arukugaruka naaruga ha bugenyi bw'obugole. Obu aija akateera ha rwigi, bamukingurra bwango.
42012037	B'omugisa abaheereza abo mukama wabu aba alisanga nibarora. Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Alyeteega omweko, abaikalize, abaheereze.
42012038	Kakuba agaruka omu kisisiimuko ekyakabiri rundi ha nkoko y'okubanza akabasanga nibarora, baina omugisa abaheereza abo!
42012039	“Kinu mukimanye, kakuba nyineeka yamanyire esaaha omusuma ei arukwiziramu, yakwikaire naarora, nukwo omusuma aleke kucwa enju ye.
42012040	Na inywe mwikale mweteekaniize, habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu aliija omu kasumi aka mutarukumunihirramu.”
42012041	Nubwo Petero yamukagwize ati: “MUKAMA wange, orufumo runu orucweriire itwe, nandiki abantu boona?”
42012042	MUKAMA yamugarukamu ati: “Muheereza ki omwesigwa kandi ow'amagezi, mukama we ou akwasa ebintu bye, kurolerra eka ye n'okuha abantu be ebyokulya byabo omu kasumi kaabyo?
42012043	Omuheereza ogu ahiirirwe mukama we obu aliija akamusanga naakora ati.
42012044	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Mukama we alimukwasa kurolerra ebintu bye byona.
42012045	Kyonka omuheereza ogu kakuba ateekereza omu mutima gwe ati: ‘Mukama wange aikaireyo, tarukwija bwango,’ akatandika kuteera abaheereza bataahi be abasaija n'abakazi, akeeta ha kulya, kunywa, n'okutamiira,
42012046	mukama we obu aligaruka ha kiro eki atarukumunihirramu na ha kasumi ak'atamanyire, alimufubira muno, kandi amubarre omuli abo abatarukwesigwa.
42012047	“Omuheereza ogu ayamanyire mukama we eki arukwenda, kandi tiyataho mutima kukikora, aliteerwa muno;
42012048	baitu omuheereza ataramanyire mukama we eki yayenzire, kandi yakora ekisemeriire kumufubiza, ogu aliteerwa kake. Anyakuheebwa bingi, alikaguzibwa bingi; n'anyakukwasibwa bingi muno, alisabwa bingi muno.”
42012049	“Nkaija kuhemba omurro omunsi; haa, kakuba gubaire gwakire!
42012050	Nkyaina omulingo ogw'okufa ogu ndukwija kufaamu; kandi nintuntura okuhika obu kulikahikirra!
42012051	Nimuteekereza ngu, nkaija okuleeta obusinge, omu nsi? Nangwa, nimbagambira nti: Ntaije kuleeta obusinge baitu nkaija kuleeta okwebaganizaamu.
42012052	Okuruga hati enju enyakurumu abantu bataano eraayebaganizaamu: abasatu bahakanize ababiri, n'ababiri bahakanize abasatu.
42012053	Ise omwana alyebaganiza ha mutabani we, n'omutabani hali ise; omukazi alyebaganiza na muhara we na muhara we hali nyina; nyinazaara alyebaganiza ha mukamwana, na mukamwana hali nyinazaara.”
42012054	Yesu akongera kugambira ebitebe by'abantu ati: “Obu murora ekicu nikiimuka Bugwa-izooba, ahonaaho mugamba muti: ‘Enjura niija kugwa’, kandi egwakwo.
42012055	N'obu murora omuyaga niguteera nigwiha Bukiizi bw'obulyo, mugamba muti: ‘Nihaija kujwa omusana mwingi’, kandi gujwakwo.
42012056	Bagobya inywe! Obusumi bw'omusana n'enjura mubukengera ha kurora ensi n'iguru; habwaki mutakenga amakuru ag'obusumi bunu?”
42012057	“Kiki ekirukubalemesa kucwamu ekihikire?
42012058	Obu oraaba noogenda omukooti, lengaho kwikirraniza na kinyegerra mukyali omu muhanda; nukwo aleke kukutwara hali omucwi w'emisango, omucwi w'emisango akakukwasa omuserikale, n'omuserikale akakuta omu nkomo.
42012059	Ninkugambira nti: Toliruga omu nkomo okuhikya obu olikasasurra kimu akasente koona akasigaireyo.”
42013001	Omu kasumi ako hakabaho abantu abamu abamanyisize Yesu ha by'Abagaliraaya abaisirwe Pilato obu yabasangire nibatamba ebyonzira.
42013002	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nimuteekereza Abagaliraaya banu nubo bakaba bali basiisi okukira Abagaliraaya abandi, nikyo baabonaboniire bati?
42013003	Nangwa, nimbagambira nti: Na inywe obu mutalyegarukamu, nukwo mulihwerekerra muti.
42013004	Rundi nimuteekereza abantu ikumi na munaana bali, abaatiirwe omunaara gwa Silohamu gwabaita, nubo bakaba baina omusango ogurukukira ogw'abantu abandi abaikaraga Yerusaalemu?
42013005	Nangwa, nimbagambira nti: Na inywe obu mutalyegarukamu, nukwo mulihwerekerra muti.”

42013007	Yagambira omulimi w'emizaabbibbu ati: ‘Hati nakamara emyaka esatu ninyija kuserra ebijuma ha muti gunu omutini, ntarukusangaho kantu. Guteme! Nigusiisira ki itaka?’
42013008	Baitu omulimi yamugarukamu ati: ‘Waitu, haakire guleke gumale omwaka gunu. Mbanze ngulimirre, nguteho n'ebyokuguleetera orwezo.
42013009	Omwaka ogurukwija obu gulyana, kiriba kirungi, obu gutalyana nubwo tuligutema.’ ”
42013010	Ha kiro kya Sabbato, Yesu akaba naayegesa omu isorrokaniro erimu.
42013011	Hakaba haroho omukazi ow'akaba aina omwoyo omubi ogwamucekeze kumara emyaka ikumi na munaana; akaba ayegemere, atarukusobora kwegorra.

42013014	Omukuru w'isorrokaniro yabiihirwa habw'okurora Yesu akirize omuntu ha Sabbato. Nukwo kugambira abali aho ati: “Abantu baina ebiro mukaaga ebi basemeriire kukorramu emirimo. Nahabweki mwijege omu biro ebi, mukiziibwe; baitu hatali ha Sabbato!”
42013015	Nubwo MUKAMA Yesu yamugarukiremu ati: “Bagobya inywe! Haroho omuli inywe atasibura ente ye rundi endogoyi ha Sabbato akagitwara kugyesera amaizi?
42013016	Omukazi ogu, omwijukuru wa Abburahamu, Sitaani ou yazingazingire okumara emyaka ikumi na munaana; nawe tasemeriire okuzingururwa ha kiro kya Sabbato?”
42013017	Obu yabalize ebigambo ebi, abanyanzigwa be boona baakwatwa ensoni; baitu ekitebe ky'abantu baasemererwa habw'ebyamahano byona ebi yakozire.
42013018	Yesu yagamba ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga nibusisana buta? Ndabulengesaniza na ki?
42013019	Nibusisana akasigo ka karadaali omuntu aka yatwaire yabyara omu musiri gwe, kakakura, kaafooka kisaka kikooto, n'enyonyi zaayombeka ebiju byazo omu mataagi gaakyo.”
42013020	Yesu yayongera yagamba ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga ndabulengesaniza na ki?
42013021	Nibusisana ekitumbisa omukazi eki yajwanganiize omu bihi bisatu eby'ensaano okuhika yoona obu yatumbire.”
42013022	Yesu akagenda naayegesa omu mbuga n'omu byaro, akwasire omuhanda oguraamuhikya Yerusaalemu.
42013023	Nubwo omuntu omu yamukagwize ati: “Mukama wange, abo abalijunwa baliba bake?” Yesu yamugarukamu ati:
42013024	“Mwekambe kutaaha nimuraba omu irembo erifunzire. Nimbagambira nti: Abantu baingi balirengaho okulirabamu, baitu tibalisobora.
42013025	“Nyineeka obu alikamara kukinga orwigi, mulyemerra aheeru nimweranga muti: ‘Waitu, tukingurre!’ Uwe alibagarukamu ati: ‘Tindukumanya nambere murukuruga.’
42013026	Nubwo mulitandika kwetonda muti: ‘Twalyaaga na iwe twanywaga na iwe, kandi wayegesaaga omu makuute g'owaitu.’
