42013029	Abantu baliruga Burugaizooba na Bugwaizooba, ha Bukiizi obw'emoso na Bukiizi bw'obulyo baikarre ha bugenyi omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
42013030	Mumanye nkooku abamu ab'enyuma baliba b'okubanza, kandi abamu ha b'okubanza baliba b'enyuma.”
42013031	Omu kasumi ako konyini, Abafalisaayo abamu bakaija baagambira Yesu bati: “Ruga hanu ogende, habwokuba Herode nagonza kukwita.”
42013032	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Eboha egi, mugende mugigambire muti: ‘Hati na ijo nimbinga emyoyo emibi, ninkiza n'abarwaire, kandi ha kiro kya kasatu nubwo ndimalirra omulimo gwange.’
42013033	Baitu hati na ijo na ijweri ndi w'okweyongera omu maiso. Tikihikire omurangi okwitirwa aheeru y'orubuga Yerusaalemu.
42013034	“Yerusaalemu, Yerusaalemu iwe anyakwita abarangi kandi anyakuteeza amabaale abakwenda abakutumiirwe! Kaingaha obu nagondeze kusorooza abaana baawe nk'enkoko oku ebumbatira obwana bwayo omu mapapa gaayo, baitu mwayanga!
42013035	Hati murole: Enju yanyu neija kusigara eri kifurukwa. Kandi nyowe nimbagambira nti: Timulindora okuhikya obu muligamba muti: ‘W'omugisa ogu arukwija omu ibara lya MUKAMA.’ ”
42014001	Ha kiro kya Sabbato, Yesu obu yagenzire kulya omunju y'omu ha bakuru b'Abafalisaayo, abantu boona baamuhanga amaiso.
42014002	Omu kitebe hagati hakaba haroho omusaija ow'akaba azimbire emikono n'amaguru.
42014003	Nukwo Yesu kukaguza abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo ati: “Ebiragiro nibitwikiriza kukiza ha Sabbato rundi nangwa?”
42014004	Bbo baahuna kwonka. Nukwo Yesu kukwataho omusaija yamukiza, yamwohereza agende.
42014005	Hanyuma yabagambira ati: “Nooha omuli inywe anyakwina endogoyi rundi ente, kakuba egwa omu iziba ha Sabbato, ataakugiihiremu ahonaaho ha kiro eki?”
42014006	Eki nakyo batasobole kukigarukamu.
42014007	Yesu obu yarozire abagenyi abamu nkooku beekomiire ebiikaro eby'ekitiinisa, nubwo yabacweriire orufumo runu ati:
42014008	“Obu baraakuraaliza ha bugenyi bw'obugole, leka kwikarra omu kiikaro ky'ekitiinisa, tihaikara kubaho omuntu arukukukiza ekitiinisa ayaraaliziibwe;
42014009	kandi ayabaraaliize inywembi akaija akakugamba ati: ‘Rugiza omuntu onu.’ Nukwo okagenda n'ensoni kwikarra omu kiikaro eky'enyuma.
42014010	Kakuba oraalizibwa, genda oikarre omu kiikaro ekitali ky'ekitiinisa, kikuraaliza obu aija hali iwe akugambire ati: ‘Munywani wange, ija oikarre omumaiso.’ Kinu kirikuhaisa ekitiinisa omu maiso g'abagenyi abandi boona.
42014011	Habwokuba weena anyakwenyumiza, alibundaaziba; kandi anyakwebundaaza, alinyumizibwa.”
42014012	Kandi Yesu yagambira ayamuraaliize ati: “Obu oraabaga ocumbiire abantu ebyokulya ebya nyamusana rundi otaralizaaga bagenzi baawe, rundi beene banyu, rundi abaguuda bataahi baawe, tibaikara kukuraaliza nkooku wabaraaliize, kandi buli osaswirwe.
42014013	Baitu obu oraateekaga obugenyi, oraalizeege abanaku, ebizingo, abalema n'abafu b'amaiso.
42014014	Nubwo oliheebwa omugisa, habwokuba bbo, tibaina eki basobora kukugarurra, kandi iwe olisasurwa ha kuhumbuuka kw'abahikiriire.”
42014015	Omu ha bantu abakaba baikaliire nibalya nawe, obu yahuliire eki, yagambira Yesu ati: “Aina omugisa ogu ow'alirya ebyokulya omu bugenyi bw'omu bukama bwa Ruhunga!”
42014016	Baitu Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Hakaba haroho omusaija ayateekere obugenyi bwingi, yaraaliza abantu baingi.
42014017	Akasumi k'obugenyi obu kaahikire, yatuma omuheereza we kugambira abaaraaliziibwe ati: ‘Mwije, byona biteekaniziibwe.’
42014018	Baitu boona baatandika kwekasa omu-omu. Ow'okubanza yagambira omuheereza ati: ‘Nguzire ekibanja, kimpikiriire kugenda kukirora. Nkesengeriize onganyire.’
42014019	Ondi yagamba ati: ‘Nguzire ente ikumi, hati ningenda kwirengesa. Nkwesengeriize, onganyire.’
42014020	Ondi yagamba ati: ‘Nubwo ndugire kugabura, nikyo kintangire kwija.’
42014021	“Omuheereza yagarukayo, ebi byona yabigambira mukama we. Nubwo nyineeka yakwasirwe ekiniga, yaragira omuheereza we ati: ‘Rahuka, ogende omu nguudo z'omu rubuga n'omu mihanda yarwo, oleete abanaku, ebizingo, abafu b'amaiso, n'abalema.’
42014022	Omu kasumi kake omuheereza yagaruka kumugambira ati: ‘Waitu, eki oragiire, kikozirwe; baitu nabwo hakyaroho omwanya.’
42014023	Nubwo mukama we yamuragiire ati: ‘Irooko ogende omu nguudo enkooto n'omu mihanda y'omu byaro, ohambirize abantu baije, nukwo enju yange ijule.
42014024	Baitu nimbagambira nti: Busaho n'omu ha bantu abo abaaraaliziibwe alirya ha bugenyi bwange.’ ”
42014025	Ebitebe by'abantu baingi bikaba nibihondera Yesu mbere arukugenda. Uwe yahinduka yabagambira ati:
42014026	“Weena anyakwija nambere ndi, ateerekeseze ise na nyina, mukazi we n'abaana, bagenzi be n'abanyaanya, nangwa n'obwomeezi bwe, ogu tasobora kuba mwegesebwa wange.
42014027	Weena ateetweka musaraba gwe akampondera, tasobora kuba mwegesebwa wange.
42014028	“Nooha omuli inywe anyakugonza kwombeka omunaara, atabanza kwikarra akabalirra ebiragwombeka; akamanya ngu, aina sente ezirukumara omulimo?
42014029	Kakuba atabalirra, obu aliba amazire kulima omusingi, kandi akasangwa atarukusobora kumara omulimo gwona, nubwo boona abaligurora balitandika kumusekeereza,
42014030	nibagamba bati: ‘Omuntu onu akatandika kwombeka, baitu tiyasobora kumaliriza!’
42014031	“Rundi mukama ki anyakugonza kuramagira omukama ondi, atabanza kwikarra akahanuura nkooku araasobora n'abaserikale be omutwaro gumu kurwanisa omukama ondi anyakwina abaserikale emitwaro ebiri?
42014032	Kakuba arora nkooku atarukusobora, atuma abakwenda okutangatangana omukama ogu akyali hara, naasaba obusinge.
42014033	Na inywe nukwo kiba kiti, tiharoho n'omu anyakusobora kuba mwegesebwa wange, ateerekeseze byona ebi ainabyo.”
42014034	“Ekisura kirungi, baitu obu kihoibwamu orusa ruligarurwamu ruta?
42014035	Tikiina mugaso ha itaka noobu haakuba ha rubungo. Kisigarra kunagwa abantu. Anyakwina amatu, ahurre!”
42015001	Kiro kimu abasorooza b'omusoro n'abantu abateekerezebwaga kuba babi, boona bakeesorooleza hali Yesu kumuhuliriiza.
42015002	Abafalisaayo n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro obu baarozire eki, baatontoroma nibagamba bati: “Ntamanya omuntu onu ajwahukirra abantu babi, n'okulya alya nabo!”
42015003	Nubwo Yesu yabaganikiize oruganikyo runu ati:
42015004	“Muntu ki omuli inywe anyakwina entaama kikumi, emu kakuba emuburaho, ataleka kyenda na mwenda omu kisaka akagenda kuserra enyakubuzire, okuhikya obu agizoora?
42015005	Obu amara kugizoora, agita ha mabega aijwire omuhimbo.
42015006	Obu ahika omuka ayeta banywani be n'abataahi, abagambira ati: ‘Bagenzi bange, katusemererwe hamu habwokuba entaama yange ey'abaire ebuzire ngizoire.’
42015007	Nikyo ndukubagambira nti: Halibaho okusemererwa kwingi omwiguru habw'omusiisi omu anyakwegarukamu, kukira abantu ab'engeso nungi kyenda na mwenda abatarukwetaaga kwegarukamu.”
42015008	“Rundi mukazi ki anyakwina siringi ikumi, emu kakuba emuburaho atahemba etaara, akasingorra enju, akaserra hoona hoona okuhikya obu agizoora?
42015009	Obu amara kugizoora, ayeta banywani be n'abataahi nabagambira ati: ‘Bagenzi bange, katusemererwe hamu, habwokuba siringi yange ey'ebaire ebuzire ngizoire.’
42015010	Nikyo ndukubagambira nti: Abamalaika ba Ruhanga nukwo basemererwa bati habw'omusiisi omu anyakwegarukamu.”
42015011	Aho Yesu yagamba ati: “Hakaba haroho omusaija ow'akaba aina abatabani babiri.
42015012	Omuto akasaba ise ati: ‘Taata, mpa omugabo gw'obugwetwa bwange.’ Nubwo isebo yabaganizeemu itungo, yalibaha.
42015013	Obu haahingwireho ebiro bike, omuto yasorooza ebintu bye byona, yagenda omunsi ya hara. Oku nuho yabisiisire omu ngeso mbi.
42015014	“Obu yayemaliireho kimu buli kantu, nubwo haagwire kiihe omunsi egi. Omusigazi yatandika kutaaga habw'okutaa n'akantu.
42015015	Aho yagenda kukorra omusi w'ensi egi. Omuntu ogu yamusindika kuliisa empunu omu iriisizo lye.
42015016	Obu akaba naaliisa yayegomba kulya ebisusu empunu ebi zaalyaga, baitu busaho muntu ayamuhaire akookulya.
42015017	Obu, yayetiire, yagamba ati: Abakozi baingaha aba isenyowe abarukulya nibaiguta, bikabalema n'okubalema; baitu nyowe hanu, enjara y'okunyita!
42015018	Kanyimuke ngende hali isenyowe mmugambire nti: ‘Taata, nkasiisa hali Ruhanga na hali iwe.
42015019	Tinkyasemerra n'okwetwa mwana waawe; haakire onfoole nk'omu ha bakozi baawe.’
42015020	Nubwo yaimukire yakwata ogw'okumugarra hali ise. “Obu akaba akyali haraho, ise yamumanyirra, yamukwatirwa embabazi. Nubwo yairukire, yamugwa omu kifuba.
42015021	Baitu omwana yagamba ati: ‘Taata nkasiisa hali Ruhanga na hali iwe. Tinkyasemerra n'okwetwa mwana waawe.’
42015022	Ise yayeta abaheereza be nagamba ati: ‘Nyabura inywe mundahukize ekijwaro nyaburungi, mukimujweke. Mumute empeta omu rukumu n'enkaito omu bigere.
42015023	Muleete esajwa, mugiite, tucumbe obugenyi; tulye tusemererwe.
42015024	Omwana wange onu ow'akaba afiire, hati mwomeezi: akaba azaahire, hati azaahukire.’ Baatandika kusemererwa.
42015025	“Omu kasumi ako, omutabani omukuru akaba ali ha musiri. Obu akaba naagaruka, ali haihi kutaaha, yahurra engoma n'ebizina.
42015026	Yayeta omu ha baheereza, yamukaguza ekinyakuroho omu ka.
42015027	Nandiki omuheereza ati: ‘Muto waawe agarukire, kandi isiinywe amwitiire esajwa habwokuba agarukire n'obusinge kandi mwomeezi.’
42015028	Omukuru nukwo kukwatwa ekiniga yayanga okutaaha omunju. Ise yaturuka aheeru yamwesengereza ataahe.
42015029	Yagarukamu ise ati: ‘Nyowe mmazire emyaka enu yoona ninkuheereza. Tinkakweremeraga omurundi na gumu. Baitu tokampaga nangwa n'akabuzi nkasemererwaho n'abanywani bange.
42015030	Baitu mutabani waawe ogu ayasiisire itungo lye omu bamalaaya, obu agarukire, omwitiire esajwa!’
42015031	Ise yamugarukamu ati: ‘Mwana wange, obutoosa otaaha na nyowe, kandi ebyange byona byawe.
42015032	Baitu kihikire okukora obugenyi bunu n'okusemererwa, habwokuba muto waawe ow'akaba afiire, hati mwomeezi; akaba azaahire, hati azaahukire.’ ”
42016001	Yesu akagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Hakaba haroho omusaija muguuda ow'akaba aina omukeeto we. Baamumunyegerraho nkooku akaba naasiisasiisa ebintu bye.
42016002	Nukwo kumweta yamukaguza ati: ‘Kiki kinu eki ndukuhurra hali iwe? Mbarra eby'obukeeto bwawe, habwokuba tokyagaruka kuba mukeeto wange.’
42016003	Omukeeto nukwo kwekaguza ati: ‘Nyowe ndagira nta? Mukama wange naija kunyihaho obukeeto! Tinyina maani g'okulima, n'okusabiiriza nikunkwasa ensoni.
42016004	Otyo, hati naacwamu eki ndaakora ekirintaahya omu maka gaabo obu ndiba mbingirwe omu bukeeto.’
42016005	Nubwo yakeesire abanyamabanja ba mukama we omu-omu, yakaguza ow'okubanza ati: ‘MUKAMA wange naakutonga ki?’
42016006	Yamugarukamu ati: ‘Naatonga encundiro z'amagita kikumi.’ Omukeeto yamugambira ati: ‘Kwata orupapura oruroho ibanja lyawe, ikarra bwango, ohandiike makumi ataano.’
42016007	Yakaguza ondi ati: ‘Kandi iwe naakutonga ki?’ Yamugarukamu ati: ‘Naatonga ebigega by'engano kikumi.’ Omukeeto yamugambira ati: ‘Kwata orupapura oruroho ibanja, ohandiike ebigega kinaana.’
42016008	Mukama w'omukeeto onu enkurungutaniza akamusiima habw'amagezi ge; habwokuba abantu b'ensi enu baina amagezi ag'okukorrana n'abagenzi baabu okukira abantu b'omusana.
42016009	“Nikyo ndukubagambira nti: Itungo ly'obugobya libakonyere kwetungira enganjani. Hanyuma obu lirihwaho nubwo balibatangirra babataahye omu bwikaro obutalihwaho.”
42016010	“Weena anyakwesigwa omu bintu bike, ayesigwa n'omu bingi; kandi ataba mwesigwa omu bintu bike, n'omu bingi tayesigwa.
42016011	Obu muraaba mutarabaire beesigwa omu itungo ly'ensi, nooha alibakwasa itungo ery'amazima?
42016012	Obu muraaba mutarabaire beesigwa omu kurolerra eby'abandi, nooha alibaha ekyanyu kukirolerra?
42016013	“Tiharoho muheereza anyakusobora kuheereza abakama babiri. Alinobaho omu, agonze ondi; rundi aligumira hali omu, agaye ondi. Timusobora kuheereza Ruhanga n'okwemarra ha itungo ly'ensi.”
42016014	Abafalisaayo abagonzaaga itungo ly'ensi obu baahuliire ebi byona, baamusekeereza.
42016015	Nukwo Yesu kubagambira ati: “Inywe mweyoleka nk'abarungi omu maiso g'abantu, baitu Ruhanga amanyire emitima yanyu. Habwokuba abantu eki banyumiza, Ruhanga akinuga.
42016016	“Ebiragiro n'eby'Abarangi bikaba nibikora okuhika omu biro bya Yohaana Omubatiza; okurugirra obu, Amakuru Amarungi ag'obukama bwa Ruhanga gaikara nigarangirirwa, kandi buli omu ataho omutima okubutaahamu.
42016017	Nikirahuka iguru n'ensi kuhwaho, okukira akacweka kamu ak'enyuguta kudiba omu Biragiro.”
42016018	“Omuntu weena anyakubinga mukazi we akaswera ondi aba asiihaine; kandi n'omusaija anyakuswera omukazi abingirwe, nawe aba asiihaine.”
42016019	“Hakaba haroho omusaija omuguuda ayajwaraga engoye eza kahukya n'ezindi ezirukunekaneka. Buli kiro yalyaga kandi yanywaga kurungi, ataina ekimuburaho.
42016020	Kandi ha irembo lye habyamahoga omusaija omunaku, ibara lye Lazaaro, ow'akaba acwekacwekere ebihooya.
42016021	Yayegombaga kulya oburagalika obwarugaga ha meeza y'omuguuda; kandi embwa zaijaga nizikomba ebihooya bye.
42016022	“Hanyuma omunaku ogu yafa, abamalaika baamutwara baamuhikya Abburahamu nambere aikara. Omuguuda nawe yafa, yaziikwa.
42016023	Obu akaba ali okuzimu omu busaalizi bwingi, yaimukya amaiso yarora Abburahamu ali hara, na Lazaaro amuheriire.
42016024	Yayamirra naagamba ati: ‘Taata Abburahamu, ngirra embabazi! Otume Lazaaro aibike ensonga y'orukumo rwe omu maizi, aije anfukirize orulimi, habwokuba nimbabirirwa muno omu murro gunu!’
42016025	Baitu Abburahamu yamugarukamu ati: ‘Mwana wange, ijuka nkooku watungire ebirungi bingi obu okaba okyali omu nsi; Lazaaro we akabona enaku; baitu hati ahuumizibwe hanu, kandi iwe oli omu busaalizi bwingi.
42016026	Tikiri eki kyonka; hagati yaitu na inywe haroho omwanya mukooto ogurukutanga boona abagonza kuruga hanu kwija oku, rundi okuruga oku kwija kunu.’
42016027	“Omuguuda yagamba ati: ‘Hati nu Taata, ninkwesengereza otume Lazaaro omu ka ya Isenyowe,
42016028	habwokuba nyinayo bagenzi bange bataano. Abahabule bataliikara kwija omu kiikaro kinu eky'amabone.’
42016029	Abburahamu yamugarukamu ati: ‘Bagenzi baawe baina ebyahandiikirwe Musa n'abarangi, leka bahondere ebi.’
42016030	Omuguuda yagarukamu ati: ‘Nangwa, Taata Abburahamu! Kakuba habaho omuntu ayahumbuukire omu bafu, akabahikaho, baakwegarukiremu.’
42016031	Nandiki Abburahamu ati: ‘Obu baraaba batarukuhurra Musa n'abarangi, tibarukwija kunanuka, noobu haraabaho anyakuhumbuukire omu bafu.’”
42017001	Yesu akagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Ebyesiitazo tibiri by'okuburaho; baitu alikibona ogu anyakubireeta!
42017002	Haakire abohwe orubengo omu bikya anagwe omu nyanja, okukira kwesiitaza omuha baana abato banu.”
42017003	“Na inywe mwerinde! Mugenzi waawe obu araasiisaga, omuhanege. Obu araayegarukamuga, omuganyirege.
42017004	Kakuba naakusobeza emirundi musanju omu kiro kimu, kandi naakwizira buli murundi naagamba ati: ‘Nzizire’, na iwe omuganyirege.”
42017005	Abakwenda baasaba MUKAMA Yesu bati: “Twongereho okwikiriza!”
42017006	Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Kakuba mwina okwikiriza okurukwingana akasigo ka karadaali, mwakuragiire omutoma ogu muti: ‘Sinduka, oyebyale omu nyanja!’ Gwakubahuliire.”
42017007	“Nooha omuli inywe anyakwina omuheereza arukumulimira rundi arukuliisa entaama ze, obu aba nakyaija naaruga ha musiri, mukama we aramugambiire ati: ‘Rahuka bwango, oikarre, olye ebyokulya byawe’?
42017008	Taakumugambire ati: ‘Ihura ebyokulya byange, ojwale kurungi, ompeereze okuhika obu ndakamara kulya n'okunywa. Obu na iwe noija kulya n'okunywa’?
42017009	Nimugira ngu, mukama we aramusiima habw'okukora ebi amuragiire?
42017010	Na inywe nikyo kimu, obu muraabaga mumazire kukora byona ebi muragiirwe, mugambege muti: ‘Tuli baheereza abatarukugasa; tukozire ebi twaba nituragirwa kukora.’ ”
42017011	Yesu obu akaba naagenda Yerusaalemu, akaraba ha mutaano gwa Samaliya na Galiraaya.
42017012	Obu yahikire omu kyaro kimu, yaitirana abagenge ikumi. Baayemerra haraho,
42017013	baayamirra bati: “Yesu Omwegesa, otugirre embabazi!”
42017014	Obu yabeetegeriize, yabagambira ati: “Mugende mweyoleke banyakatagara.” Obu bakaba nibakyagenda, baakira.
42017015	Omu hali bo, obu yarozire nkooku akizire, yagaruka naahaisaniza Ruhanga n'iraka likooto.
42017016	Yajuumara ha bigere bya Yesu, yamusiima. Omusaija onu akaba ali Musamaliya.
42017017	Yesu nukwo kukaguza ati: “Abatambirwe tibabairege ikumi? Omwenda guraha?
42017018	Busaho ondi anyakugarukire kuhaisaniza Ruhanga kwihaho omunyaihanga onu wenka?”
42017019	Nukwo Yesu kumugambira ati: “Imuka oyegendere, okwikiriza kwawe kwakukiza.”
42017020	Abafalisaayo obu baakagwize Yesu ngu, obukama bwa Ruhanga nibwija di? Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga tibwija niburorwa,
42017021	kandi tiharoho muntu aligamba ati: ‘Ka mbunu hanu!’ Rundi: ‘Mbuli hali.’ Habwokuba obukama bwa Ruhanga buli omuli inywe.”
42017022	Nubwo Yesu yagambiire abeegesebwa be ati: “Akasumi kalihika obu mulyegomba okurora ekimu ha biro by'Omwana w'omuntu, baitu timulikirora.
42017023	Balibagambira bati: ‘Darawe ali hanu!’ Rundi: ‘Ngugwo ali hali!’ Baitu mutaligyayo, kandi mutalibahondera.
42017024	Omurabyo nkooku gumulikiza haiguru kuruga ha rubaju rumu okuhika ha rundi, Omwana w'omuntu nawe nukwo aliba ati ha kiro ky'okwija kwe.
42017025	Baitu alibanza kubonabonesibwa omu bintu bingi, n'okwangwa abantu ab'ebiro binu.
42017026	“Nkooku kyabaire omu biro bya Noha, nukwo kiriba kiti n'omu biro by'Omwana w'omuntu.
42017027	Abantu baalyaga, baanywaga, kandi baasweranganaga okuhika ha kiro Noha eki yataahiiremu omu lyato erikooto, okusandaara kw'amaizi kukaija kwahwerekereza abantu boona.
42017028	“Kandi nukwo kyabaire n'omu biro bya Loti. Abantu baalyaga, baanywaga, baaguraga, baatundaga, baabyaraga, kandi baayombekaga.
42017029	Baitu ha kiro Loti eki yarugiremu Sodomu, omurro n'obuganga bikaruga omwiguru byagwa, byahwerekereza abantu boona.
42017030	Nukwo kiriba kiti na ha kiro Omwana w'omuntu eki alibonekeramu.
42017031	“Ha kiro eki alisangwa ha nju eruguru kandi ebintu bye biri omunju, atalisirimuka kubiihamu; kandi n'ow'alisangwa omu musiri, ataligaruka omu ka.
42017032	Mwijuke muka Loti!
42017033	“Weena anyakugonza kujuna obwomeezi bwe, alibufeerwa; kandi anyakufeerwa obwomeezi bwe, alibujuna.
42017034	Nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro eki ababiri abaliba babyamire omu kitabu kimu: omu alitwarwa, ondi alisigara.
42017035	Abakazi babiri abaliba nibasa hamu: omu alitwarwa, ondi alisigara.” [
42017036	N'abasaija ababiri abaliba bali omu musiri: omu alitwarwa, ondi alisigara.]
42017037	Abeegesebwa baamukaguza bati: “Waitu, ebi biriba nkaha?” Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nambere hali omutumbi, oku nuho esega zeesorooleza.”
42018001	Nubwo Yesu yabaganikiize oruganikyo runu okubeegesa nkooku basemeriire kusaba batarukuhwa masiko.

42018004	Omucwi w'emisango akamara omwanya akyayangire kumuramura; baitu hanyuma yayeteekerereza wenka ati: ‘Noobu ndaaba ntarukutiina Ruhanga rundi kufaaho abantu,
42018005	baitu habw'omufaakati onu kuntalibaniza muno, kammuramule n'omunyanzigwa we. Hatali eki naija kunjwahya habw'okwikara nagaruka!’”
42018006	MUKAMA Yesu nukwo kubagambira ati: “Mwetegereze omucwi w'emisango atali mwinganiza eki agambire.
42018007	Lero si, Ruhanga taliramura kurungi abantu be aba yakomeremu abamutaagira nyamusana n'ekiro? Alibaikazaho kubakoonyera?
42018008	Nimbagambira nti: Alibaramura bwango. Baitu Omwana w'omuntu obu aliija, alisanga okwikiriza kukyali omunsi?”

42018014	Nimbagambira nti: Omusaija onu akagaruka owe aganyirwe okukira oli; habwokuba weena anyakwenyumiza, alibundaazibwa; kandi anyakwebundaaza, alinyumizibwa.”
42018015	Abantu bakaleetera Yesu abaana enkerembe abakwateho; baitu abeegesebwa obu baarozire eki baabacoomera.

42018020	Ebiragiro obimanyire: ‘Otalisiihana, otaliita, otaliiba, otalihangirra, otiinege sso na nyoko.’”

42018031	Yesu akatwara ikumi na babiri ha rubaju yabagambira ati: “Hati nu, nitugenda Yerusaalemu, kandi byona ebyahandiikirwe abarangi ha Mwana w'omuntu nibiija kuhikira.
42018032	Aliheebwayo hali Abanyamahanga, balimusekeereza, balimukora kubi, kandi balimucwera ebicwanta.
42018033	Balimuteera enkoba, kandi balimwita; baitu obu halihinguraho ebiro bisatu alihumbuuka.”

42018035	Obu akaba nairirra orubuga Yeriko, Yesu yasanga omufu w'amaiso aikaliire ha muhanda rubaju naasabiiriza.
42018036	Obu yahuliire ekitebe kingi ky'abantu nikihingura, yakaguza ekinyakuroho.
42018037	Baamugambira bati: “Yesu owa Nazareeti nuwe arukuhingura.”

42018039	Abantu abakaba beebembiire baamucoomera aculeere. Baitu uwe yatokera kimu ati: “Mwijukuru wa Daudi, ongirre embabazi!”
42018040	Yesu yayemerra, yaragira bamumuleetere. Obu yahikire haihi, Yesu yamukaguza ati:
42018041	“Noogonza nkukorre ki?” Yamagarukamu ati: “Mukama wange, ningonza ndole!”
42018042	Yesu yamugambira ati: “Rora! Okwikiriza kwawe nukwo kwakukiza.”
42018043	Ahonaaho amaiso ge gaiguka, yahondera Yesu naahaisaniza Ruhanga. Abantu boona obu baarozire eki baakugiza Ruhanga.
42019001	Yesu akataaha omu rubuga Yeriko, kandi akaba ali w'okururabamu.
42019002	Hakaba haliyo omusaija omuguuda, omukuru w'abasorooza b'omusoro, ibara lye Zakayo.
42019003	Akagonza muno kurora Yesu ogu nkooku arukusisana, baitu atasobole, habw'ekitebe kingi ky'abantu, habwokuba akaba ali mugufu.
42019004	Nubwo yairukire yayebembera ekitebe kyona, yatemba omutoma, nukwo arole Yesu, habwokuba ogu nugwo muhanda ogu akaba naarabamu.
42019005	Yesu obu yahikireho yararamira haiguru, yamugambira ati: “Zakayo, sirimuka bwango, habwokuba kiro kya hati ndi w'okusiiba owaawe.”

43001001	Kara na kara hakaba haroho Kigambo; Kigambo akaba ali hamu na Ruhanga kandi Kigambo akaba ali Ruhanga.
43001002	Okurugirra kimu ha kubanza akaba ali hamu na Ruhanga.
43001003	Ebintu byona bikahangwa nibiraba omuli uwe, kandi uwe haatali busaho kintu kyona ekyahangirwe.
43001004	Omuli uwe obwomeezi numwo bukaba buli; kandi obwomeezi obu nugwo gwali musana gw'abantu.
43001005	Omusana ogu gujwera omu mwirima, kandi omwirima tigukaguraazaaga.
43001006	Hakaba haroho omuntu ayatumirwe Ruhanga, ibara lye nuwe Yohaana.
43001007	Ogu akaija kuba kaiso ow'okumanyisa eby'omusana, abantu boona nukwo baikirize habwe.
43001008	Uwe akaba atali musana, baitu akaija kuba kaiso w'eby' omusana.
43001009	Omusana ogw'amazima ogujwera abantu boona, gukaba nigwija omunsi.
43001010	Akaba ali omunsi, kandi ensi ekahangirwa omuli uwe, baitu nabwo etamumanyirre.
43001011	Akaija owaabu, kyonka abantu be batamutangirre.
43001012	Baitu boona abaamutangiriire, baamwikiriza akabaha obusobozi obw'okufooka abaana ba Ruhanga.
43001013	Abo nubo abatarazairwe omu buzarranwa bw'omuntu, rundi omu kwegomba kw'omubiri; baitu abaazairwe Ruhanga.
43001014	Kigambo akafooka muntu, yaikara omuli itwe aijwire obwomeezi n'amazima; tukarora ekitiinisa kye, ekitiinisa ekiheebwa Omwana omu wenka owa Isiitwe.
43001015	Yohaana akamumanyisa obu yarangiriire haiguru ati: “Onu nuwe ou nagambireho nti: ‘Arukwija ankuraatiire, nankira ekitiinisa, habwokuba akabaho nyowe ntakabaireho.’”
43001016	Itwena tukatunga ha mbabazi ze, nituheebwa emigisa etarukubarwa.
43001017	Habwokuba Ebiragiro bikaija nibiraba omuli Musa; obwomeezi n'amazima bikaija nibiraba omuli Yesu Kristo.
43001018	Busaho n'omu ararozire Ruhanga, kwihaho Omwana omu wenka anyakumwigamiire, nuwe yamumanyisize abantu.
43001019	Bunu nubwo bwakaiso bwa Yohaana, Abayudaaya obu baamutumireho banyakatagara n'Abaleevi abaarugire Yerusaalemu kumukaguza bati: “Niiwe oha?”
43001020	Akaatura, ataculeere, baitu akaatura bbwa ati: “Nyowe tindi Kristo.”
43001021	Baamukaguza bati: “Kandi si niiwe oha? Niiwe Eriya?” Yabagarukamu ati: “Tindi ogu.” Nandiki bbo bati: “Niiwe murangi oli? ” Yabagarukamu ati: “Nangwa.”
43001022	Baayongera kumukaguza bati: “Niiwe oha? Tugarukemu, otugambire eki turaamanyisa abo abatutumire. Nooyeyeta oha?”
43001023	Nukwo Yohaana kubagarukamu ati: “Ninyowe ogu arukwamirra omwirungu nti: ‘Muterekereze omuhanda gwa MUKAMA’, omurangi Isaaya nkooku yarangire.”
43001024	Abo abakaba batumirwe Abafalisaayo,
43001025	baamukaguza bati: “Kandi habwaki noobatiza obu oraaba otali Kristo, rundi Eriya, rundi omurangi oli?”
43001026	Yohaana yabagarukamu ati: “Nyowe nimbatiza n'amaizi, baitu omuli inywe heemeriiremu ou mutarukumanya;
43001027	nuwe ogu arukunnyija enyuma, kandi tinsemeriire kusuumurra orukoba rw'enkaito ze.”
43001028	Ebi bikabaho Betaniya, nseeri y'ekisaaru Yorudaani, nambere Yohaana akaba naabatiriza.
43001029	Ha kiro ekyakurasireho, Yohaana akarora Yesu namwizira, yagamba ati: “Murole Omwana gw'entaama wa Ruhanga, murole anyakwihaho abantu ebibi!
43001030	Ogu nuwe ou nagambireho nti: ‘Haroho arukunnyija enyuma, arukunkira ekitiinisa, habwokuba akabaho nyowe ntakabaireho.’
43001031	Na nyowe nyenka nkaba ntamumanyire; baitu nikyo naiziire nimbatiza n'amaizi, nukwo amanyisibwe Isirairi.”
43001032	Yohaana akagumya naagamba ati: “Nkarora Mwoyo Ahikiriire naasirimuka naaruga omwiguru omu kisisani ky'eriiba, yamwikaraho.
43001033	Na nyowe nyenka nkaba ntarukumumanya; baitu Ogu ayantumire kubatiza n'amaizi, nuwe yangambiire ati: ‘Ogu ou oraarora Mwoyo naamusirimukaho naamwikaraho, nuwe abatiza na Mwoyo Ahikiriire.’
43001034	Eki nkakirora kandi naagumya nti: Ogu nuwe Mwana wa Ruhanga.”
43001035	Ha kiro ekyakurasireho, Yohaana akaba ayemeriire na babiri ha beegesebwa be;
43001036	obu yarozire Yesu naahingura, yabagambira ati: “Murole Omwana gw'entaama wa Ruhanga!”
43001037	Abeegesebwa ababiri bakamuhurra naagamba eki, nukwo kuhondera Yesu.
43001038	Uwe yakubutuka, yabarora bamuhondiire, yabakaguza ati: “Nimuserra ki?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Rabbi” (amakuru gaakyo ngu, Mwegesa). “Nooraara nkaha?”
43001039	Yabagarukamu ati: “Mwije muroleyo.” Baagenda baarora nambere yaraaraga, baraara nawe ekiro eki, habwokuba esaaha zikaba ziri nka ikumi eza rwebagyo.
43001040	Omu ha babiri abaahuliire Yohaana ebi yagambire kandi bahondera Yesu, nuwe Andereya, mugenzi wa Simooni Petero.
43001041	Andereya akabanza kuhikaho mukuru we Simooni, yamugambira ati: “Turozire Mesiya” (amakuru gaakyo ngu, Kristo.)
43001042	Yamuhikya hali Yesu. Yesu yamugumyaho amaiso, yagamba ati: “Niiwe Simooni mutabani wa Yohaana? Oraayetwaga Keefa” (amakuru gaakyo ngu, Petero rundi mwandara).
43001043	Ekiro ekyakurasireho, Yesu obu yamazire kucwamu kugenda Galiraaya, yatangaana Filipo, yamugambira ati: “Mpondera.”
43001044	Filipo akaba ali wa Betisaida, ekyaro ky'owaabu Andereya na Petero.
43001045	Filipo yatangaana Nasanairi yamugambira ati: “Turozire ogu Musa ou yahandiikireho omu Biragiro, kandi abarangi ou baarangire. Nuwe Yesu owa Nazareeti, mutabani wa Yosefu.”
43001046	Nukwo Nasanairi kumukaguza ati: “Nazareeti esobora kurugwamu ekintu ekirungi?” Filipo yamugarukamu ati: “Ija oyerorre.”
43001047	Yesu obu yarozire Nasanairi naija nambere ali, yamugambaho ati: “Dora Omunyaisirairi mali ataina bugobya!”
43001048	Nasanairi yamukaguza ati: “Wammanya ota?” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Filipo obu abaire atakakwesire, nkurozirege oli hansi y'omutini.”
43001049	Nasanairi yamugarukamu ati: “Mwegesa, niiwe Mwana wa Ruhanga! Niiwe Mukama wa Isirairi!”
43001050	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Habw'okukugambira nti: Nkurozirege hansi y'omutini, nikyo oikiririize? Baitu olirora ebikuru ebirukukira binu.”
43001051	Kandi yayongera ati: “Mazimakwo ninkugambira nti: Olirora iguru likingwirwe na bamalaika ba Ruhanga nibatembera kandi nibasirimukira ha Mwana w'omuntu.”
43002001	Obu haahingwireho ebiro bisatu, hakabaho obugenyi bw'obugole omu Kana orwa Galiraaya; na nyina Yesu akabutaaha.
43002002	Yesu nawe akaraalizibwa ha bugenyi hamu n'abeegesebwa be.
43002003	Eviini obu yahoire, nyina Yesu yamugambira ati: “Eviini ebahoireho.”
43002004	Yesu nukwo kumugarukamu ati: “Mukazi, okwetaaga kwawe tinukwo kwange akasumi kange tikakahikire.”
43002005	Baitu nyina yagambira abaheereza ati: “Kyona eki arakabagambira, mukikole.”
43002006	Kandi hakaba haroho entugiro z'amabaale mukaaga ezi baataireho habw'omurwa gw'Abayudaaya ogw'okunaaba; buli emu yarugwamuga engemeko makumi abiri rundi makumi asatu.
43002007	Yesu nukwo kugambira abaheereza ati: “Entugiro ezi muziijuze amaizi.” Baaziijuliza kimu okuhika ha migoma.
43002008	Yabagambira ati: “Hati mutaheho, mutwarre mukuru w'obugenyi.” Baamutwarra.
43002009	Mukuru w'obugenyi obu yarolezeeho amaizi agafookere viini, kandi atamanyire nambere yarugire (baitu abaheereza abaatahire amaizi bbo bakamanya), nukwo kweta kigabura,
43002010	yamugambira ati: “Omuntu weena abanza kuteeka eviini enungi; abantu obu bamara kuhaaguka, nubwo abaha kaizi; baitu iwe okyaina empotole okuhika hati!”
43002011	Eki nikyo ekyamahano eky'okubanza Yesu eki yakozire. Akakikorra omu Kana orwa Galiraaya, yayoleka ekitiinisa kye; n'abeegesebwa be baamwikiriza.
43002012	Ebi obu byahoire, Yesu yagenda Kafaranaumu, hamu na nyina n'abagenzi be n'abeegesebwa be; baamarayo ebiro bike.
43002013	Ekiro eky'obugenyi bw'Abayudaaya obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho kikaba kiri haihi kuhika, Yesu nukwo kugenda Yerusaalemu.
43002014	Obu yataahire omunju ya Ruhanga yasangamu abantu abakaba nibatunda ente, entaama, n'amaiba, hamu n'abarukuhingisa sente nibakora emirimo yabo.
43002015	Uwe yayongosa omuguha, boona yababinga omunju ya Ruhanga, hamu n'ente n'entaama zaabo. Sente z'abarukuhingisa yaziseesa hansi, yajuumika emeeza zaabo.
43002016	Yagambira abo abakaba nibatunda amaiba ati: “Ebi byona mubiihe hanu. Enju ya Taata muleke kugifoora nju y'obusuubuzi.”
43002017	Abeegesebwa nubwo baijukire nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ihali ry'enju yaawe likammaramu omutima.”
43002018	Aho Abayudaaya baamukaguza bati: “Oratwoleka karorwaho ki akarukukukoza binu?”
43002019	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Museese Enju ya Ruhanga enu, nyowe ndagaruka ngyemereze omu biro bisatu.”
43002020	Nukwo Abayudaaya kumugambira bati: “Enju ya Ruhanga enu ekatwara emyaka makumi ana na mukaaga kugyombeka, kandi iwe oraagyemerereza omu biro bisatu?”
43002021	Baitu uwe, Enju ya Ruhanga yabalizeeho, nugwo mubiri gwe.
43002022	kandi obu yamazire kuhumbuuka omu bafu, abeegesebwa be nubwo baijukire nkooku yakibalizeeho; baikiriza Ebyahandiikirwe n'ebigambo Yesu ebi yagambire.
43002023	Obu akaba ali Yerusaalemu ha bugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho, baingi bakamwikiriza, bamazire kurora ebirukuhuniriza ebi yakozire;
43002024	baitu Yesu atabahwereyo,
43002025	habwokuba akaba naamanya abantu boona, kandi akaba atarukwetaaga muntu n'omu amumanyise ebya mugenzi we. Ningira uwe wenka akaba naamanya ebiri omu mutima gw'omuntu.
43003001	Omu Bafalisaayo hakaba harumu omuntu omu, ibara lye Nikodemo, ow'akaba ali mulemi mu Bayudaaya.
43003002	Omusaija ogu akaija hali Yesu ekiro, yamugambira ati: “Rabbi, nitumanya nkooku oli mwegesa ayarugire hali Ruhanga; habwokuba busaho muntu n'omu asobora kukora ebihuniriza nk'ebi okora, rundi buli Ruhanga ali nawe.”
43003003	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Mali mali ninkugambira nti: Omuntu obu atazaarwa buhyaka, tasobora kurora obukama bwa Ruhanga.”
43003004	Nukwo Nikodemo kumukaguza ati: “Omuntu asobora ata kuzaarwa, kandi kunu akuzire? Asobora kugaruka omu nda ya nyina, nukwo azaarwe?”
43003005	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo ninkugambira nti: Omuntu obu atazaarwa omu maizi n'omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire, tasobora kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
43003006	Eki ekizaarwa omubiri guba mubiri, kandi eki ekizaarwa Omwoyo guba mwoyo.
43003007	Baitu oleke kuhunirizibwa eki nkugambiire nti: ‘Nimusemerra okuzaarwa buhyaka.’
43003008	Omuyaga guteera, nigutwara nambere gurukugonza, kandi iwe oguhurra nkooku gurukuteera; baitu tomanya nambere gurukuruga rundi nambere gurukugenda. Nukwo kiba kiti na hali abo abazairwe Mwoyo.”
43003009	Nikodemo yamukaguza ati: “Mara eki nikisoboka kita?”
43003010	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Ebi iwe torukubimanya, kandi kunu oli mwegesa w'Abaisirairi?
43003011	Mazimakwo ninkugambira nti: Nyowe ngamba ebi ndukumanya, kandi ngumya ebi ndozire; baitu inywe timwikiriza obwakaiso bwange.
43003012	Obu ndaaba mbagambiire eby'omunsi, timwabiikiriza; muraasobora muta kwikiriza obu ndabagambira eby'omwiguru?
43003013	Busaho n'omu aratembere omwiguru, kwihaho ogu ayarugireyo, nuwe Mwana w'omuntu.
43003014	Kandi Musa nkooku yahanikire enjoka omwirungu, n'Omwana w'omuntu nukwo asemeriire kuhanikwa ati;
43003015	weena arukumwikiriza atunge obwomeezi obutahwaho.”
43003016	Kumanya Ruhanga yagondeze ensi, akahayo Omwana we omu wenka, nukwo weena arukumwikiriza aleke kuhwerekerra, baitu atunge obwomeezi obutahwaho.
43003017	Ningira Ruhanga atatume Omwana we omunsi kugisingisa omusango; baitu akamutuma agijune.
43003018	Anyakumwikiriza tasingwa musango; baitu atamwikiriza gumazire ira kumusinga, habwokuba taikiriize Omwana omu wenka owa Ruhanga.
43003019	Ha gurukumusingira nuho hanu: omusana gukaija omunsi, baitu abantu baagonza omwirima kukira omusana, habwokuba ebikorwa byabo byali bibi.
43003020	Weena anyakukora kubi anoba omusana kandi agwetantara, nukwo ebikorwa bye bireke kurorwa.
43003021	Baitu weena anyakukora eby'amazima ayehikye ha musana, nukwo ebikorwa bye birorwe bwerebwere, habwokuba bikozirwe nkooku Ruhanga agonza.
43003022	Ebi obu byahoire, Yesu yagenda n'abeegesebwa be omwisaza lya Buyudaaya; yaikarayo nabo naabatiza.
43003023	Yohaana nawe akaba naabatiriza Ainoni haihi na Saliimu, habwokuba hakaba haliyo amaizi maingi. Abantu baijaga nibabatizibwa.
43003024	Obu, Yohaana akaba atakatairwe omu nkomo.
43003025	Aho hakaimukaho empaka hagati y'abeegesebwa ba Yohaana n'Omuyudaaya omu, ha by'okwezibwa.
43003026	Nukwo boona kwija hali Yohaana baamugambira bati: “Mwegesa, omusaija ow'akaba ali na iwe nseeri ya Yorudaani, omuntu ou watubalizeeho, ngunu ali hanu naabatiza; kandi abantu boona nibagenda nambere ali.”
43003027	Yohaana yabagarukamu ati: “Omuntu tasobora kutunga kintu kyona atakihairwe Ruhanga.
43003028	Inywe inywenka nimugumya nkooku nagambire nti: Nyowe tindi Kristo, baitu nkatumwa kumwebembera.
43003029	Anyakuba n'omugole nuwe muswezi; enganjani y'omuswezi anyakumwikara haihi naamuhuliriza, uwe asemererwa muno okuhurra iraka ly'omuswezi. Okusemererwa nk'oku nukwo nyinakwo, kandi kwijwire.
43003030	Uwe naasemerra kweyongera omu kitiinisa, baitu nyowe ninsemerra kugarukirra.”
43003031	Anyakuruga haiguru akira boona; baitu anyakuruga omunsi aikara ali w'ensi, kandi agamba eby'ensi. Anyakuruga omwiguru akira boona,
43003032	kandi agumya ebi yarozire n'ebi yahuliire; baitu busaho n'omu anyakwikiriza obwakaiso bwe.
43003033	Anyakwikiriza obwakaiso bwe aba agumiize kimu Ruhanga nkooku ali w'amazima.
43003034	Ningira Ruhanga ou yatumire, ayegesa ebigambo bya Ruhanga, habwokuba akamuha Mwoyo atarukubalirra.
43003035	Ruhanga Ise agonza Mwana, kandi ebintu byona akabimukwasa.
43003036	Anyakwikiriza Mwana, aina obwomeezi obutahwaho; baitu atarukworobera Mwana, talitunga bwomeezi; kandi obukaya bwa Ruhanga obutagarukirra bumwikaraho.
43004001	MUKAMA Yesu obu yamanyire nkooku Abafalisaayo bahuliire naatendeka abeegesebwa kandi naabatiza baingi kukira Yohaana
43004002	(Yesu wenka noobu araaba atarabatiize, baitu abeegesebwa be nubo baabatiize),
43004003	yaruga Buyudaaya yagaruka Galiraaya.
43004004	Eki kikamuhambiriza kuraba ogwa Samaliya.
43004005	Nukwo yahikire ati omu rubuga rwa Samaliya orurukwetwa Siikari, haihi n'ekibanja Yakobbo eki akaba ahaire mutabani we Yosefu.
43004006	Omu kiikaro eki hakaba harumu iziba lya Yakobbo. Kandi Yesu habw'okujwahibwa orugendo yaikarra ha rubaju rw'iziba. Zikaba ziri nka saaha mukaaga omu ihangwe.
43004007	Hakaija omukazi Omusamaliya kutaha amaizi. Yesu yamusaba ati: “Mpa amaizi nnyweho.”
43004008	Obu, abeegesebwa be bakaba bagenzire omu rubuga kugura ebyokulya.
43004009	Omukazi Omusamaliya yamukaguza ati: “Kisoboka kita iwe Omuyudaaya kunsaba eky'okunywa, kunu nyowe ndi Musamaliya?” Habwokuba Abayudaaya tibateerana n'Abasamaliya.
43004010	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kakuba omanyire ekisembo kya Ruhanga n'ogu arukukusaba ati: ‘Mpa amaizi nnyweho’, na iwe waakumusabire akuhe amaizi g'obwomeezi.”
43004011	Nukwo omukazi kumukaguza ati: “Waitu k'otaina eky'okutahisa, kandi n'iziba lihamire; amaizi ago ag'obwomeezi noija kugaiha nkaha?
43004012	Iwe nookira isenkuru itwe Yakobbo ayatuhaire iziba linu, uwe wenka eri yanywahoga n'abaana be, akeeseraho n'ente ze?”
43004013	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Weena anyakunywa ha maizi ganu, aligaruka kukwatwa iroho;
43004014	baitu weena alinywa ha maizi aga ndimuha, ogu taligaruka kukwatwa iroho ebiro byona. Amaizi aga ndimuha galifooka omuli uwe nsoro y'amaizi agarukugera okumuhikya omu bwomeezi obutahwaho.”
43004015	Omukazi yamugambira ati: “Waitu mpaho amaizi ago, nukwo ndeke kukwatwaga iroho n'okugaruka hanu kuleeta amaizi.”
43004016	Yesu yamugambira ati: “Genda oyete baro, ogaruke hanu.”
43004017	Nandiki omukazi ati: “Tinyina iba nyowe.” Yesu yamugambira ati: “Obalize ekihikire kugamba oti: ‘Tinyina iba nyowe’;
43004018	habwokuba okaswerwa abasaija bataano, kandi n'ow'oinawe hati, na uwe tali baro. Eki obalize ky'amazima.”
43004019	Omukazi yamugambira ati: “Waitu, nyetegeriize nkooku oli murangi.
43004020	Baisenkuru itwe baaramizaaga ha rusozi runu; baitu inywe mugamba ngu, Yerusaalemu nikyo kiikaro abantu eki basemeriire kuramizamu.”
43004021	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Mukazi iwe, onyikirize, habwokuba akasumi nikaija kuhika aka mutaliramizaamu Isenyowe ha rusozi runu, noobu haakuba omu Yerusaalemu.
43004022	Inywe muramya eki mutarukumanya; baitu itwe turamya eki turukumanya, habwokuba okujunwa kuruga omu Bayudaaya.
43004023	Baitu akasumi kali haihi, kandi nuko kanu, abaramya omu mazima aka baliramizaamu Isenyowe omu mwoyo n'omu mazima; abaramya bati, nubo Ruhanga asiima.
43004024	Ruhanga aba mwoyo, kandi abo abamuramya nibasemerra okumuramya omu mwoyo n'omu mazima.”
43004025	Nukwo omukazi kumugambira ati: “Mmanyire Mesiya (nuwe ogu Mukama ou yakomere namuseesaho amagita) nkooku ali w'okwija kandi obu aliija alitumanyisa ebintu byona.”
43004026	Yesu yamugambira ati: “Nyowe arukubaza na iwe, ninyowe ogu.”
43004027	Omu kasumi ako abeegesebwa be baagaruka, baahunirra habw'okumusanga naabaza n'omukazi, baitu busaho n'omu ayamukagwize ati: “Obaire noomugonzaaho ki?” Rundi ati: “Habwaki obaire noobaza na uwe?”
43004028	Omukazi yasigaho ensoha ye, yagaruka omu rubuga, yagambira abantu ati:
43004029	“Mwije murole omusaija angambiire byona ebi nakozire. Ogu taakuba Kristo?”
43004030	Bbo baaruga omu rubuga, baija nambere Yesu ali.
43004031	Omu kasumi ako, abeegesebwa be baamwesengereza bati: “Mwegesa, ebyokulya mbinu, lyaaho.”
43004032	Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Nyowe nyina ebyokulya inywe ebi mutarukumanya.”
43004033	Nukwo abeegesebwa be kukaguzangana bati: “Haroho anyakumuleetiire ebyokulya?”
43004034	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Ebyokulya byange nukwo kukora Ogu ayantumire ebi agonza, n'okuhikiriza omulimo gwe.
43004035	Inywe timurukugamba ngu: ‘Hakyasigaire ameezi ana, igesa lihike’? Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Mwimukye amaiso ganyu, murole emisiri nkooku eyezire, ehikire kugeswa.
43004036	Ogu anyakugesa aheebwa empeera kandi asorooza ebijuma eby'okumuhikya omu bwomeezi obutahwaho, nukwo omusigi n'omugesi basemererwe hamu.
43004037	Nikyo orufumo ruhikira orurukugamba ruti: ‘Omu asiga, ondi agesa.’
43004038	Nkabatuma kugesa eki mutaratalibaniire; abandi bakatalibana, baitu inywe mwaija, mwabagana ha kutalibana kwabo.”
43004039	Abasamaliya baingi ab'omu rubuga oru bakamwikiriza habw'ebi omukazi yababaliize ati: “Angambiire byona ebi nakakozire.”
43004040	Abasamaliya obu baamuhikireho, baamwesengereza aikale nabo; nawe nukwo kumarayo ebiro bibiri.
43004041	Kandi ebigambo bye bikaleetera abandi baingi okwikiriza.
43004042	Baagambira omukazi oli bati: “Titukyaikiriza habw'ebi watugambiire byonka, baitu twehuliriire itwenka, twamanya ngu, onu nuwe Mujuni w'ensi mali.”
43004043	Ebiro bibiri obu byahingwireho, yarugayo yagenda Galiraaya.
43004044	Yesu wenka akakigumya ngu, Omurangi tagira kitiinisa omunsi y'owaabu.
43004045	Baitu obu yahikireyo, Abagaliraaya bakamutangirra habw'okurora byona ebi yakoliire Yerusaalemu. Nabo bakaba bagenzireyo habw'obugenyi bukuru.
43004046	Yairrayo yahika Kana orw'omu Galiraaya, nambere yahinduliire amaizi yagafoora viini. Kandi Kafaranaumu hakaba haliyo omunyoro ow'akaba aina mutabani we arwaire.
43004047	Obu yahuliire Yesu nkooku arugire Buyudaaya aizire Galiraaya, yagenda yamusaba aije akize mutabani we, habwokuba akaba ali haihi n'okufa.
43004048	Nubwo Yesu yamugambira ati: “Obu mutarora ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano, timwikiriza.”
43004049	Omunyoro yamwesengereza ati: “Waitu, hikayo omwana wange atakacwekaine.”
43004050	Yesu yamugambira ati: “Irooko otaahe, omwana waawe akizire.” Omusaija yaikiriza Yesu eki yamugambiire, yagenda.
43004051	Obu akaba naagarukayo, abaheereza be baamutangaana baamugambira omwana we nkooku akizire.
43004052	Yabakaguza esaaha yatandikiireho kuba kurungi. Nandiki bbo bati: “Ijo ha saaha musanju nubwo omuswija gwamurugireho.”
43004053	Ise omwana yamanya ngu, niyo saaha Yesu yamugambiiremu ati: “Omwana waawe akizire.” Na uwe wenka yaikiriza n'ab'omuka ye boona.
43004054	Eki nikyo ekirukuhuniriza ekya kabiri Yesu yakozire obu yarugire Buyudaaya agarukire Galiraaya.
43005001	Ebi obu byahoire, hakabaho ekiro kikuru eky'obugenyi bw'Abayudaaya, na Yesu yagenda Yerusaalemu.
43005002	Kandi Yerusaalemu, haihi n'Irembo ly'Entaama, hakaba haliyo ekidiba eki baayetaga omu Ruhebburaayo: Beetizata. Kikaba kiroho empuumuro itaano.
43005003	Omu numwo haabyamaga abarwaire baingi: abafu b'amaiso, abalema, n'abazingamire, (bategeriize okucambaituka kw'amaizi.
43005004	Obundi n'obundi malaika wa MUKAMA yasirimukaga omu kidiba eki, nukwo acambaitule amaizi. Omurwaire weena ayabanzaaga kwenagamu, amaizi gamazire kucambaituka, nuwe yakiraga endwara yoona ei yabaga arwaire.)
43005005	Omu kiikaro eki hakaba harumu omusaija arwaliire emyaka asatu na munaana.
43005006	Nukwo Yesu kumukaguza ati: “Noogonza kukira?”
43005007	Omurwaire yamugarukamu ati: “Waitu tinyina muntu ow'okunta omu kidiba, amaizi obu gacambaituka. Nyowe obu mba ninkyagenda, nsanga ondi ambandizeemu ira.”
43005008	Yesu yamugambira ati: “Imuka, ohimbe akarago kaawe, ogende.”
43005009	Ahonaaho omusaija yakira, yahimba akarago ke, yagenda. Kandi ekiro eki kikaba kiri Sabbato.
43005010	Nukwo Abayudaaya kugambira omusaija ayakiziibwe bati: “Hati kiro kya Sabbato, Ebiragiro tibirukukwikiriza kwetweka karago kaawe.”
43005011	Baitu uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Omusaija anyakunkirize nuwe angambiire ati: ‘Himba akarago kaawe, ogende.’ ”
43005012	Nabo baamukaguza bati: “Ogu nuwe oha akugambiire ati: ‘Himba akarago kaawe, ogende’?”
43005013	Baitu omusaija ayakiziibwe akaba atamumanyire ibara, habwokuba Yesu akaba arugire omu kitebe kyabantu baingi abakaba baijwire aho.
43005014	Obu hahingwireho akacu kake, Yesu yamusanga omunju ya Ruhanga, yamugambira ati: “Oboine, hati wakira! Otaligaruka kusiisa, okagwerwa akabi akarukukira aho.”
43005015	Omusaija yagenda, yagambira Abayudaaya nkooku Yesu nuwe amukirize.
43005016	Nikyo Abayudaaya bahiiganiriize Yesu, habwokuba eki akakikora ha Sabbato.
43005017	Baitu Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Isenyowe nakyakora na hati hoona, kandi na nyowe ninkora.”
43005018	Eki nikyo Abayudaaya baaseruliire muno okwita Yesu, habwokuba atacwe kiragiro kya Sabbato kyonka, baitu n'okweta Ruhanga Ise, naayeyinganiza nawe.
43005019	Yesu nukwo kubagarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Mwana tasobora kukora ekintu kyona habwe wenka, rundi eki kyonka eki arora Ise naakora; habwokuba byona Ise ebi akora, Mwana nawe nibyo akora.
43005020	Ningira Ise agonza Mwana, kandi amwoleka byona ebi akora; kandi alimwoleka ebirukukira ebi, nukwo inywe muhunirre.
43005021	Ise nkooku ahumbuura abafu akaboomeeza, Mwana nawe nukwo aha obwomeezi abaagonza kubuha.
43005022	Isenyowe tacwera muntu weena omusango, baitu okucwa omusango kwona akakulekera Mwana,
43005023	nukwo boona bahe Mwana ekitiinisa nkooku bakiha Ise. Ogu anyakwanga kuha Mwana ekitiinisa, takiha na Ise ayamutumire.
43005024	Mananukwo nimbagambira nti: Anyakuhurra ebigambo byange akaikiriza n'ayantumire, uwe aina obwomeezi butahwaho; kandi takyacwerwa musango; baitu aba amazire kuruga omu rufu, ataahire omu bwomeezi.
43005025	“Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Akasumi nikaija, kandi kahikire, abafu obu balihurra iraka ly'Omwana wa Ruhanga, kandi abalirihurra balyomeera.
43005026	Isenyowe nkooku ali ndugirro y'obwomeezi, nukwo yahaire Mwana nawe abe ndugirro y'obwomeezi;
43005027	kandi akamuha obusobozi obw'okucwa emisango, habwokuba nuwe Mwana w'omuntu.
43005028	Eki kitabahuniriza, ningira akasumi nikaija, abali omu bituuro boona obu balihurra iraka lye,
43005029	bakarugamu. Abo abaakozire ebirungi bakahumbuukira obwomeezi; kandi abo abaakozire ebibi bakahumbuukira okucwerwa omusango.
43005030	“Nyowe tinsobora kukora kintu kyona habwange, Isenyowe nkooku andagiire, nukwo ncwa omusango; kandi encwa yange y'obwinganiza, habwokuba tinserra eki ndukugonza, baitu nserra ayantumire ebi agonza.
43005031	Kakuba ninyehaisa nyenka, buli obwakaiso bwange tibuli bw'amazima.
43005032	Haroho ondi arukumpeera obwakaiso, kandi nimmanya obwakaiso obu arukumpeera nkooku buli bw'amazima.
43005033	Inywe mukatuma abantu hali Yohaana, na uwe yaha obwakaiso ha mazima.
43005034	Obwakaiso obu naatungire butagumibwe muntu; baitu eki nkigambire nukwo inywe mujunwe.
43005035	Yohaana akaba ali taara erukwaka kandi erukumulika, na inywe mukaikiriza kandi mukasiima abamulikire kumara akasumi kake.
43005036	Baitu nyowe nyina obwakaiso oburukukira obwa Yohaana; habwokuba emirimo Isenyowe yampaire kuhikiriza, emirimo egi ei ndukukora, niyo yonyini erukungumya nkooku naatumirwe Isenyowe.
43005037	Kandi Isenyowe ayantumire nuwe wonyini yamperiire obwakaiso. Iraka lye timukalihurraga, n'ensisana ye timukagiroraga;
43005038	ekigambo kye tikiri omu myoyo yanyu habwokuba timurukwikiriza ogu ou yatumire.
43005039	“Muserra muno omu Byahandiikirwe, nimuteekereza ngu, omuli byo numwo muliiha obwomeezi obutahwaho; kandi kunu ninyowe mbiheera obwakaiso;
43005040	baitu inywe mwanga kwija hali nyowe, nukwo mutunge obwomeezi.
43005041	Nyowe tinserra kitiinisa omu bantu;
43005042	baitu nimbamanya nkooku mutarukugonza Ruhanga.
43005043	Nkaija omwibara lya Isenyowe, timwantangirra; kakuba ondi naija omu ibara lye wenka, ogu nimwija kumutangirra.
43005044	Nimusobora muta okwikiriza, inywe abarukuhangana ekitiinisa kandi mutarukuserra kitiinisa ekiruga hali Ruhanga omu wenka?
43005045	Muleke kuteekereza ngu, ninyija kubarumiriza kubasingisa omusango hali Isenyowe; kyonka Musa ou murukwesiga, nuwe akubarumiriza omusango.
43005046	Kakuba mwaikiriize Musa, na nyowe mwakunyikiriize, habwokuba ninyowe yahandiikireho;
43005047	baitu obu muraaba mutarukwikiriza ebi yahandiikire, muraikiriza muta ebi ndukugamba?”
43006001	Ebi obu byahoire, Yesu yarugayo yayambuka nseeri y'Enyanja ya Galiraaya, niyo Enyanja ya Tiberiya.
43006002	Ekitebe ky'abantu baingi kyamuhondera, habw'okurora ebihuniriza ebi yakozire naakiza abarwaire.
43006003	Yesu yatemba omu nsozi, yaikarra hansi hamu n'abeegesebwa be.
43006004	Obu, ekiro kikuru ky'Abayudaaya eky'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho kikaba kiri haihi kuhika.
43006005	Yesu obu yaimukize amaiso, yarora ekitebe ky'abantu baingi nikiija nambere ali, yakaguza Filipo ati: “Turaagura nkaha emigaati abantu banu ei baraalya?”
43006006	Eki akakimukaguza naamulenga, habwokuba uwe wenka akaba naamanya eki araakora.
43006007	Filipo yamugarukamu ati: “Edinali bikumi bibiri tizisobora kugura migaati erukumara nukwo buli omu alyeho akacweka.”
43006008	Omu ha beegesebwa be, Andereya, mugenzi wa Simooni Petero, yamugambira ati:
43006009	“Hanu haroho omwojo anyakwina emigaati etaano n'encu ibiri; baitu ebi biragasa ki ha bantu abarukwingana aho?”
43006010	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mwikalize abantu.” Aho hakaba haroho obunyansi bwingi; abasaija abakaba nibahika nk'enkumi itaano baikarra hansi.
43006011	Aho Yesu yakwata emigaati, obu yamazire kusiima, yagigabira abakaba baikaliire; yabaha n'encu balya nkooku barukugonza.
43006012	Obu baigusire, yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Oburagalika obusigaireho mubusorooze, hataburaho na kamu.”
43006013	Baabusorooza, baijuza ebigega ikumi na bibiri oburagalika obwasaagire ha migaati etaano ey'engano ei baaliire.
43006014	Abantu obu baarozire ekintu ekirukuhuniriza eki akozire, baagamba bati: “Mananukwo onu nuwe murangi ow'okwija omunsi!”
43006015	Yesu obu yakengere nkooku barukwija kumukwata n'amaani bamufoole omukama wabo, yabarugamu, yagaruka wenka omu nsozi.
43006016	Obu bwahikire rwebagyo, abeegesebwa be baasirimuka, baahika ha nyanja,
43006017	baagwerra omu bwato, baatandika kwambuka enyanja nibagenda Kafaranaumu. Obwire bukaba bwaira, kandi na Yesu akaba atakabahikireho.
43006018	Enyanja yasikuka habw'omuyaga mwingi ogukaba niguteera.
43006019	Obu baagoyereho nka kilomita ina rundi itaano, baarora Yesu naarubatira ha maizi nairirra obwato, baatandika kutiina.
43006020	Baitu uwe yabahuumuza ati: “Ninyowe, muleke kutiina.”
43006021	Obu, baasemererwa kumutaahya omu bwato, kandi ahonaaho obwato bwahika ha bwerre nambere bakaba nibagenda.
43006022	Ha kiro ekyakurasireho, abantu abakaba basigaire nseeri y'enyanja barora nkooku hakaba haroho obwato bumu bwonka, kandi Yesu nkooku atabugweriiremu n'abeegesebwa be, baitu bbo bakaba bagenzire bonka.
43006023	Nubwo amato agandi agaarugire Tiberiya gairra haihi n'ekiikaro nambere baliriire emigaati, MUKAMA obu yamazire kusiima.
43006024	Abantu obu baayetegeriize Yesu nkooku ataliyo, noobu baakubaire abeegesebwa be, baagwerra omu maato ago, baagenda Kafaranaumu nibamuserra.
43006025	Obu baamusangire nseeri y'enyanja, baamukaguza bati: “Mwegesa, kunu oizireyo di?”
43006026	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Timunserwire habw'okurora ebihuniriza, baitu munserwire habwokuba mukalya emigaati, mwaiguta.
43006027	Muleke kutalibanira ebyokulya ebirukuhwaho, baitu mwekambire ebirukwikaraho, ebiribahikya omu bwomeezi obutahwaho. Ebi nibyo Omwana w'omuntu alibaha, habwokuba Ruhanga Ise akamutaho emanyikirizo ey'obusobozi bwe.”
43006028	Baamukaguza bati: “Tuli b'okukora ki okuhikiriza emirimo Ruhanga ei asiima?”
43006029	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Omulimo Ruhanga ogu asiima nugwo gunu: inywe kwikiriza ogu ou yatumire.”
43006030	Baamukaguza bati: “Kihuniriza ki eki osobora kutwoleka nukwo tukakwikiriza? Waakukora ki?
43006031	Baisenkuru itwe bakalya maanu omwirungu nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: ‘Akabaha ebyokulya ebyarugire omwiguru, baalye.’ ”
43006032	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Mananukwo nimbagambira nti: Musa ti nuwe yabahaire ebyokulya ebyarugire omwiguru; baitu Isenyowe akabaha ebyokulya eby'amazima ebiruga omwiguru.
43006033	Habwokuba ebyokulya bya Ruhanga nibyo ebi ebiruga omwiguru kandi ebyomeeza ab'omunsi.”
43006034	Nandiki bbo bati: “Waitu ebyokulya ebi obituhege butoosa.”
43006035	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Ninyowe by'okulya by'obwomeezi. Anyakwija nambere ndi, talirumwa njara; kandi anyakunyikiriza, taligaruka kukwatwa iroho.
43006036	Naruga kubagambira nti: Okurora mukandora, baitu mutaikirize.
43006037	Boona Isenyowe aba ampa, baliija nambere ndi; kandi anyakwija nambere ndi, tindimubinga.
43006038	Habwokuba ntaruge omwiguru kukora ebi ndukugonza, baitu kukora ayantumire ebi agonza;
43006039	kandi ayantumire eki agonza nukwo kutaburwaho n'omu hali abo aba yampaire, baitu mbahumbuule ha kiro kya ha mpero.
43006040	Habwokuba Isenyowe eki agonza nikyo kinu: weena anyakurora Mwana, akamwikiriza, atunge obwomeezi obutahwaho; kandi ndimuhumbuura ha kiro kya hampero.”
43006041	Nubwo Abayudaaya baamuhyemiire, habwokuba akagamba ati: “Ninyowe byokulya ebyarugire omwiguru.”
43006042	Bbo baakaguzangana bati: “Onu ti nuwe Yesu mutabani wa Yosefu, ise na nyina aba turukumanya? Kandi hati naagamba ata, ngu: ‘Nkaruga omwiguru?’ ”
43006043	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Muleke kutontoroma inywenka.
43006044	Busaho n'omu asobora kwija nambere ndi, ataleesirwe Isenyowe ayantumire; kandi ogu ndimuhumbuura ha kiro kya ha mpero.
43006045	Kikahandiikwa omu bitabu by'abarangi kiti: ‘Boona balyegesebwa Ruhanga.’ Omuntu weena ayahuliire kandi ayayegesiibwe Isenyowe, nuwe anyakwija nambere ndi.
43006046	Tikuli kugamba ngu, haroho ararozire Isenyowe, kwihaho ogu ayarugire hali Ruhanga, nuwe yamurozire.
43006047	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Anyakwikiriza, nuwe atunga obwomeezi obutahwaho.
43006048	Ninyowe byokulya by'obwomeezi.
43006049	Baisenkuru inywe bakalya maanu omwirungu, baafa.
43006050	Baitu binu nibyo byokulya ebiruga omwiguru, ebyokulya omuntu ebyasobora kulyaho nukwo aleke kufa.
43006051	Ninyowe byokulya eby'obwomeezi ebyarugire omwiguru. Weena anyakulya ha byokulya binu alyomeera ebiro byona; kandi ebyokulya ebindiha ab'omunsi kuboomeeza nugwo mubiri gwange.”
43006052	Nubwo Abayudaaya baatandikire kuteera empaka bonka na bonka nibakaguzangana bati: “Onu naasobora ata kutuha omubiri gwe kugulya?”
43006053	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Obu muraaba mutaliire omubiri gw'Omwana w'omuntu, mukanywa n'esagama ye, timulyomeera.
43006054	Anyakulya omubiri gwange, akanywa n'esagama yange, aba n'obwomeezi obutahwaho kandi ndimuhumbuura ha kiro kya ha mpero.
43006055	Habwokuba omubiri gwange nikyo kyokulya mali, n'esagama yange nikyo kyokunywa mali.
43006056	Anyakulya omubiri gwange akanywa n'esagama yange, aikara omuli nyowe na nyowe nyikara omuli uwe.
43006057	Isenyowe omwomeezi nkooku yantumire, na nyowe nyomeera habwe, nukwo na weena anyakundya araayomeera habwange.
43006058	Binu nibyo byokulya ebyarugire omwiguru, tibiri nk'ebi baisenkuru inywe baaliire, baafa. Anyakulya ebyokulya binu alyomeera ebiro byona.”
43006059	Ebi akabigambira omu isorrokaniro ly'Abayudaaya, obu akaba naayegesa omu Kafaranaumu.
43006060	Baingi omu beegesebwa be obu baahuliire ebi, baagamba bati: “Ebigambo binu ka bigumire. Nooha asobora kubihuliriza?”
43006061	Baitu Yesu obu yamanyire abeegesebwa nkooku babihyemiire, yabakaguza ati: “Eki kibeesitaize?
43006062	Kandi kyakubaire kita kakuba murozire Omwana w'omuntu naatemba naagaruka nambere yarugire?
43006063	Omwoyo, nugwo gwomeeza omuntu; omubiri tigwina mugaso. Ebigambo ebi mbagambiire nibyo by'omwoyo n'obwomeezi.
43006064	Baitu haroho abamu omuli inywe abatarukwikiriza.” Okuruga omu kubanza Yesu akamanya abo abataramwikiriize, yamanya n'ogu arukwija kumugobeza.
43006065	Yayongera yagira ati: “Nikyo mbagambiriirege nti: Busaho n'omu asobora kwija nambere ndi rundi buli aikiriziibwe Isenyowe.”
43006066	Okuruga obu baingi ha beegesebwa be baamurugaho, batagaruke kugenda na uwe.
43006067	Nubwo Yesu yakagwize ikumi na babiri ati: “Na inywe nimugonza kundugaho?”
43006068	Simooni Petero yamugarukamu ati: “MUKAMA wange, turaagenda hali oha? Ka niiwe oina ebigambo by'obwomeezi obutahwaho.
43006069	Itwe tukaikiriza kandi twamanya nkooku oli Ahikiriire wa Ruhanga.”
43006070	Nukwo Yesu kubagarukamu ati: “Tali nyowe ayabakomere inywe ikumi na babiri? Baitu omu omuli inywe, wa Sitaani.”
43006071	Obu, akaba naabazaaho Yuda mutabani wa Simooni wa Kalyota, habwokuba omu ikumi na babiri nuwe ow'akaba naija kumugobeza.
43007001	Ebi obu byahoire, Yesu yatandika kugendagenda omu isaza Galiraaya; atagonze kuraba omu Buyudaaya, habwokuba Abayudaaya bakaba nibaserra kumwita.
43007002	Kandi obugenyi bw'Abayudaaya obw'Ensiisira bukaba buli haihi kuhika.
43007003	Nukwo bagenzi be kumugambira bati: “Ruga hanu, ogende Buyudaaya, abeegesebwa baawe barole ebi orukukora.
43007004	Omuntu obu aserra kumanywa burole, ebye tabikora omu nsita. Kandi iwe nkooku orukukora ebi byona, obyoleke abantu boona, babirole.”
43007005	Nangwa n'abagenzi be bakaba batakamwikiriize.
43007006	Nukwo Yesu kubagarukamu ati: “Akasumi kange tikakahikire, baitu akasumi kanyu kaikaraho butoosa.
43007007	Inywe abantu tibasobora kubanoba, baitu banobere nyowe, habwokuba nimbooleka ebikorwa byabo nkooku biri bibi.
43007008	Inywe nu, mugende ha bugenyi; nyowe tindukwija kugendayo habwokuba akasumi kange tikakahikiire kimu.”
43007009	Obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yaikara Galiraaya.
43007010	Bagenzi be obu baamazire kugenda ha bugenyi, nawe yagendayo. Atagende abantu nibamurora, baitu omu nsereko.
43007011	Abayudaaya bakaba nibamuserra ha bugenyi, nibeekaguza bati: “Ali nkaha?”
43007012	Hakabaho okuhwehweterrangana kwingi omu bantu hali uwe. Abamu baagamba bati: “Muntu murungi”; abandi bati: “Nangwa, naahabisa abantu”.
43007013	Baitu habw'okutiina Abayudaaya, busaho n'omu ayamubalizeeho bbwa.
43007014	Obugenyi obu bwahikire hagati, Yesu yaimuka, yagenda omunju ya Ruhanga, yatandika kwegesa.
43007015	Abayudaaya baahunirra nibagamba bati: “Omuntu onu, amagezi ganu akagaiha nkaha kandi kunu takeegesebwaga?”
43007016	Yesu nukwo kubagarukamu ati: “Ebi ndukwegesa tibiri byange, baitu by'Ogu ayantumire.
43007017	Omuntu weena obu agonza kukora Ruhanga ebi asiima, naija kumanya ebi ndukwegesa obu biraaba nibiruga hali Ruhanga, rundi byange habwange.
43007018	Anyakwegesa ebye habwe, aba naayeserurra ekitiinisa baitu arukuserra ekitiinisa ky'Ogu ayamutumire, nuwe w'amazima kandi ataina bugobya.
43007019	Musa atabahe Biragiro? Baitu omuli inywe busamu n'omu arukubikwata. Nimuserurra ki kunyita?”
43007020	Nukwo abantu kumugarukamu bati: “K'oina Sitaani! Nooha arukuserra kukwita?”
43007021	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Nyowe nkakora ekintu ekyabahuniriize inywena.
43007022	Musa akabaragira okusarwa (tinukwo kugamba ngu: okusarwa kunu kukatandikira hali Musa, nangwa; baitu kukarugirirra kimu hali baisenkuru inywe kuruga ira); kandi na inywe musara omuntu ha Sabbato.
43007023	Omuntu obu araaba naasarwa ha Sabbato, nukwo Ebiragiro bya Musa bireke kucwibwa, habwaki nimumbiihirirwa habw'okukiza omubiri gwona gw'omuntu ha kiro kya Sabbato?
43007024	Muleke kucwa emisango nimurorra ha nzooka y'omuntu, baitu mucwege emisango omu bwinganiza.”
43007025	Abantu abamu aba Yerusaalemu baakaguzangana bati: “Omusaija onu tinuwe barukuserra kwita?
43007026	Darawe naabaza bbwa, kandi tibaina eki bamugambiire! Rundi abalemi bananukire kwo onu nkooku ali Kristo?
43007027	Ningira itwe nitumanya onu nambere aruga; baitu Kristo obu aliija, busaho n'omu alimanya nambere arukuruga.”
43007028	Nubwo Yesu, ow'akaba naayegesa omunju ya Ruhanga, yagambire n'iraka likooto ati: “Ego, nyowe mummanyire, kandi nimumanya nambere naarugire. Ntaije habwange nyenka baitu haroho ayantumire, Ogu w'amazima, kandi inywe timurukumumanya.
43007029	Nyowe mmumanyire, habwokuba nkaruga hali Uwe, kandi nuwe yantumire.”
43007030	Aho baaserra kumukwata; baitu busaho n'omu ayamutaireho engaro, habwokuba akasumi ke kakaba katakahikire.
43007031	Obu, abantu baingi bakamwikiriza nibagamba bati: “Mara Kristo obu aliija, alikora ebyamahano ebirukukira eby'onu?”
43007032	Abafalisaayo bakahurra abantu nkooku barukumubazaaho obuntamantama. Ekyarugiremu: banyakatagara abakuru n'Abafalisaayo nukwo kutuma abalinzi b'Enju ya Ruhanga bamukwate.
43007033	Nubwo Yesu yagambire ati: “Nkyali na inywe okumara akasumi kake; nukwo ngaruke hali Ogu ayantumire.
43007034	Mulinserra, timulinzoora; kandi nambere ndi timulisobora kuhikayo.”
43007035	Abayudaaya nukwo kukaguzangana bati: “Onu naagonza kugenda nkaha nambere tutalimuzoora? Naayenda kugenda omu Bayudaaya abaararangiire omu Bagiriiki nukwo ayegese Abagiriiki?
43007036	Naaba naamanyisa ki obu arukugamba ati: ‘Mulinserra, timulinzoora’; kandi ati: ‘Nambere ndi timulisobora kuhikayo’?”
43007037	Ha kiro kikuru eky'okumalirra obugenyi, Yesu akeemerra mu bantu naagamba n'iraka likooto ati: “Obu haraaba haroho anyakwina iroho, aije nambere ndi, anywe.
43007038	Anyakunyikiriza, nk'Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera oku bigamba: ‘Obwambu bw'amaizi g'obwomeezi buligera niburuga omunda ye.’”
43007039	Eki akakigamba ha Mwoyo Ahikiriire, abarukumwikiriza ou bakaba bali b'okutunga. Omu kasumi ako Mwoyo akaba atakagabirwe, habwokuba Yesu akaba atakanyumiziibwe.
43007040	Obu baahuliire ebigambo ebi, abamu muli bo baagamba bati: “Onu nuwe kwo murangi oli,”
43007041	Abandi bati: “Onu nuwe Kristo.” Baitu abandi baakaguza bati: “Mara Kristo w'okuruga Galiraaya?
43007042	Ebyahandiikirwe tibirukugamba ngu, Kristo ali w'okuruga omu ruganda rwa Daudi, kandi omu Betelehemu, ekyaro Daudi eki yaikairemu?”
43007043	Nahabweki haabaho okwebaganiza omu bantu hali uwe.
43007044	Abamu bakagonza kumukwata, baitu busaho n'omu ayamutaireho engaro.
43007045	Nubwo abakuru b'abalinzi baagarukire hali baanyakatagara abakuru n'Abafalisaayo; abo baabakaguza bati: “Ekibatangire kumuleeta kiki?”
43007046	Abakuru b'abalinzi baabagarukamu bati: “Busaho n'omu arabalize nk'omuntu ogu!”
43007047	Abafalisaayo nukwo kubakaguza bati: “Kandi na inywe muhabisiibwe?
43007048	Omu balemi rundi omu Bafalisaayo harumu abaramwikiriize?
43007049	Ekitebe kinu ky'abantu ekitamanyire Biragiro, ky'okukyenwa.”
43007050	Baitu omu omuli bo, nuwe Nikodemo ayaizire hali Yesu kara, yabakaguza ati:
43007051	“Ebiragiro byaitu bisingisa omuntu omusango batabandize kumutonganiza n'okumanya eki yakozire?”
43007052	Baamugarukamu bati: “Ntamanya na iwe oli Mugaliraaya? Serra, oraarora Galiraaya nkooku etali y'okurugwamu omurangi.”
43007053	Bbo baagenda, buli muntu yakwata ogw'owaabu.
43008001	Yesu akatemba ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva.
43008002	Omu rukyakya yagaruka omunju ya Ruhanga; abantu boona baija nambere ali, yaikarra yabeegesa.
43008003	Abeegesa b'ebiragiro baaleeta omukazi ou baakwasire naasiihana. Baamwemereza hagati y'abantu,
43008004	baagambira Yesu bati: “Mwegesa, omukazi onu akwasirwe naasiihana.
43008005	kandi omu Biragiro, Musa akaturagira omuntu nk'ogu kumuteeza amabaale, afe. Hati iwe noomugambaho ki?”
43008006	Eki bakakikaguza nibamutega, nukwo batunge eki baraamujunaana. Baitu Yesu yainama hansi, yahandiika n'orukumu rwe ha itaka.
43008007	obu baayeyongiire kumukaguza, yainunuka yabagarukamu ati: “Omuli inywe atakasiisaga, nuwe abanze kumuhungurra ibaale,”
43008008	Yagaruka yainama, yayongera kuhandiikisa orukumu ha itaka.
43008009	Bbo obu baahuliire eki, baakwomoka omu omu, abakuru nubo baabandize, okuhika Yesu obu yasigaire wenka n'omukazi ayemeriire omu maiso ge.
43008010	Yesu yainunuka yamukaguza ati: “Mukazi iwe, bali nkaha? Busaho n'omu anyakukusingisize omusango?”
43008011	Omukazi yamugarukamu ati: “Taroho, Mukama wange.” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Na nyowe tindukukusingisa musango. Irooko ogende, kyonka otaligarukira kusiisa obundi.”
43008012	Yesu yayongera yabagambira ati: “Ninyowe kyererezi ky'ensi. Anyakumpondera taligendera omu mwirima, baitu alitunga ekyererezi ky'obwomeezi.”
43008013	Nubwo Abafalisaayo baamugambiire bati: “Iwe nooyebazaaho wenka ebirungi, nikyo ebi orukwebalizaaho bitarukubeera by'amazima.”
43008014	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Noobu ndaaba ninyebazaaho nyenka, ebi ndukwebazaaho by'amazima, habwokuba nimmanya nambere naarugire kandi nambere ndukugenda; baitu inywe timurukumanya nambere naarugire noobu haakuba nambere ndukugenda.
43008015	Inywe mucwa emisango nimurorra ha nsisana y'omuntu, baitu nyowe tinyina ou ncwera omusango.
43008016	Noobu ndaaba nincwa, encwa yange eba y'amazima, habwokuba tali nyowe nyenka anyakucwa; baitu ndi hamu n'Oli ayantumire.
43008017	Omu Biragiro byanyu kikahandiikwa kiti: Obwakaiso bw'abantu babiri buba bw'amazima.
43008018	Nsobora kuba ninyebazaaho nyenka, baitu Isenyowe ayantumire nawe ampaho obwakaiso.”
43008019	Nukwo bbo kumukaguza bati: “Sso ali nkaha?” Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nyowe timurukummanya, kandi na Isenyowe timumumanyire. Kakuba mummanyire, na Isenyowe mwakumumanyire.”
43008020	Ebi akabigamba ali omu kikeeto, obu akaba naayegesa omunju ya Ruhanga; baitu busaho n'omu ayamukwasire, habwokuba akasumi ke kakaba katakahikire.
43008021	Yesu yagaruka kubagambira ati: “Nyowe ninyija kugenda; inywe mulinserra, baitu mulifeera omu bibi byanyu; habwokuba nambere ndukugenda timusobora kwijayo.”
43008022	Nubwo Abayudaaya baakaguzangana bati: “Naija kweita? Nikyo arukugambira ati: ‘Nambere ndukugenda timusobora kwijayo’?”
43008023	Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Inywe muli b'ensi enu, nyowe ndi w'omwiguru. Inywe muli b'ensi, baitu nyowe tindi w'omunsi munu.
43008024	Nikyo mbagambiriire nti: Mulifeera omu bibi byanyu. Mazimakwo obu muraaba mutarukunyikiriza nkooku ninyowe ogu, mulifeera kwo omu bibi byanyu.”
43008025	Nabo nukwo kumukaguza bati: “Baitu si niiwe oha?” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Eki nkakibasoborra okuruga kara.
43008026	Na hati nyina bingi eby'okubagambaho n'eby'okubasingisa omusango; hati Ogu ayantumire w'amazima, kandi ebi yanyegeseze nibyo ndangirra ensi yoona.”
43008027	Bbo bateetegereze nkooku arukubagambira hali Ise.
43008028	Yesu nukwo kubagambira ati: “Obu mulimara kuhanika Omwana w'omuntu, nubwo mulimanya nkooku ninyowe ogu; kandi nkooku ntarukukora ebyange habwange, baitu ndangirra Isenyowe ebi yanyegeseze.
43008029	Ogu ayantumire aikara na nyowe; atansige nyenka, habwokuba butoosa nkora ebi asiima.”
43008030	Obu akaba naabaza ebigambo ebi, baingi baamwikiriza.
43008031	Nubwo Yesu yagambiire Abayudaaya abaamwikiriize ati: “Obu muraagumiraga ha kigambo kyange, muliba beegesebwa bange mali.
43008032	Mulimanya amazima, kandi amazima galibafoora b'obugabe.”
43008033	Bbo nukwo kumugarukamu bati: “Itwe tuli baijukuru ba Abburahamu, titukatungwaga muntu weena. Noogenderra ki kugamba oti: ‘Muliba b'obugabe’?”
43008034	Aho Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Weena anyakukora ekibi, aba mwiru rubaale w'ekibi.
43008035	Kandi omwiru taikara omuka ebiro byona. Omwana nuwe aikarra kimu omuka.
43008036	nahabweki Mwana wonyini obu araaba naabafoora b'obugabe, muliba b'obugabe mali.
43008037	Ninkimanya nkooku muli baijukuru ba Abburahamu; baitu nabwo nimuserra kunyita, habwokuba timurukwikiriza bigambo byange.
43008038	Nyowe ninyegesa ebi naarozire hali Isenyowe, kandi na inywe mukora ebi mwayegere hali isiinywe.”
43008039	Nukwo bbo kumugarukamu bati: “Abburahamu nuwe isiitwe.” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Kakuba mubaire baana ba Abburahamu, mwakukozire Abburahamu nkooku yakozire;
43008040	baitu hati nimuserra kunyita, nyowe anyakubagambiire amazima aga nahuliire hali Ruhanga. Abburahamu atakole ati.
43008041	Inywe nimukora isiinywe nkooku yakozire.” Baamugarukamu bati: “Itwe tituli bitwekano; twina Isiitwe omu, nuwe Ruhanga.”
43008042	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Kakuba Ruhanga abaire ali Isiinywe, mwakungondeze, habwokuba nkaija ninduga hali Ruhanga. Ntaije habwange nyenka, baitu nuwe yantumire.
43008043	Habwaki mutarukwetegereza ebi ndukugamba? Habwokuba timwina mutima ogw'okworobera ebigambo byange.
43008044	Inywe, isiinywe nuwe Sitaani, nikyo mugondeza kukora isiinywe ebi agonza. uwe akaba mwisi okuruga kara na kara, amazima tagaroho, habwokuba omuli uwe tihabamu mazima. Obu abiiha ebisuba, aba naayeyoleka nkooku ali; habwokuba mubiihi w'ebisuba, kandi nuwe ndugirro y'ebisuba.
43008045	Nyowe mbaza amazima, nikyo kibatanga kunyikiriza.
43008046	Nooha omuli inywe arukunyomereza ekibi? Obu ndaaba nimbaza amazima, habwaki mutanyikiriza?
43008047	Owa Ruhanga ahurra ebigambo bya Ruhanga. Inywe, eki mutarukubihulirra, habwokuba timuli ba Ruhanga.”
43008048	Abayudaaya baamugarukamu bati: “Tinikyo tugambire tuti: Oli Musamaliya, kandi oina omwoyo mubi?”
43008049	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Nangwa, tinyina mwoyo mubi, baitu ntamu Isenyowe ekitiinisa; kandi inywe nimungaya.
43008050	Nyowe tinyeserurra kitiinisa. Haroho omu anyakukinserurra kandi nuwe alicwa emisango.
43008051	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Weena anyakukwata ekigambo kyange, talifa ebiro byona.”
43008052	Abayudaaya nukwo kumugambira bati: “Hati, twamanya nkooku oina omwoyo mubi. Abburahamu akafa n'abarangi baafa, kandi iwe noogamba oti: ‘Weena anyakukwata ekigambo kyange talifa ebiro byona.’
43008053	Iwe nookira isenkuru itwe Abburahamu ayafiire? Abarangi nabo ka bakafa. Baitu nooyeyeta oha?”
43008054	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Obu ndaaba ninyeha nyenka ekitiinisa, ekitiinisa kyange kya busa. Isenyowe ou mweta Ruhanga wanyu, nuwe ampa ekitiinisa.
43008055	Baitu inywe timumumanyire; ninyowe arukumumanya. Kandi obu ndagamba nti: Timmumanyire, ninyija kuba mubiihi w'ebisuba nka inywe; baitu nyowe mmumanyire, kandi nkwata ebigambo bye.
43008056	Isiinywe Abburahamu akasemererwa okumanya nkooku alirora ekiro kyange. Akakirora kandi yakyanganuka.”
43008057	Nubwo Abayudaaya baamukagwize bati: “Tokahikize emyaka ataano y'obukuru, kandi niiwe warozire Abburahamu?”
43008058	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abburahamu atakabaireho, nyowe nkaba ndoho.”
43008059	Nubwo baakomere amabaale kugamuhungurra; baitu Yesu yayesereka, yaturuka omunju ya Ruhanga.
43009001	Yesu obu akaba naahingura, yarora omuntu ayazairwe ali mufu w'amaiso.
43009002	Nukwo abeegesebwa be kumukaguza bati: “Mwegesa, onu kuzaarwa afiire amaiso, ayasiisire nooha? Nuwe rundi abazaire be?”
43009003	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Onu atasiise, noobu baakubaire abazaire be; baitu kinu kikabaho nukwo entegeka ya Ruhanga eyolekerwe omuli uwe.
43009004	Nyowe kimpikirirre kuhikiriza entegeka y'Ogu ayantumire bukyali nyamusana; obwire nibwija kwira, omuntu obw'atasobora kukorramu.
43009005	Akasumi koona aka nkyali omunsi, ndi musana gwayo.”
43009006	Obu yamazire kugamba eki, yacwa amacwanta hansi, yatuga itaka, yalimusiiga ha maiso,
43009007	yamugambira ati: “Genda onaabe omu kiyanja kya Silohamu” (amakuru gaakyo ngu, Atumirwe). Yagenda yanaaba, yagaruka naarora.
43009008	Nukwo abataahi be n'abandi abaamuroraga naasabiiriza kukaguza bati: “Onu tinuwe muntu ayaikarraga naasabiiriza?”
43009009	Abamu baagarukamu bati: “Ego, nuwe”; n'abandi bati: “Nangwa, naamusisana kwonka.” Nukwo omusaija kubagambira ati: “Ninyowe.”
43009010	Bbo baamukaguza bati: “Amaiso gaawe gaigukire gata?”
43009011	Nandiki uwe ati: “Omuntu arukwetwa Yesu atugire itaka, yalinsiiga ha maiso, yandagira ati: ‘Genda onabe omu kiyanja kya Silohamu’; nagenda, nanaaba, narora.”
43009012	Baamukaguza bati: “Ali nkaha ogu?” Yabagarukamu ati: “Timmanyire.”
43009013	Omusaija ow'akaba afiire amaiso bamutwarra Abafalisaayo.
43009014	Kikaba kiri kiro kya Sabbato, Yesu obu yatugire itaka, yaigura amaiso ge.
43009015	Abafalisaayo baagaruka baamukaguza nkooku amaiso ge gaigukire. Yabagarukamu ati: “Ansiigire itaka ha maiso, nagenda, nanaaba, narora.”
43009016	Abamu omu Bafalisaayo nukwo kugamba bati: “Omuntu onu tatumirwe Ruhanga, habwokuba tafaaho Sabbato.” Abandi baakaguza bati: “Omuntu omusiisi naasobora ata kukora ebirukuhuniriza nka binu?” Boona tibaasobora kwikirraniza.
43009017	Baagaruka baakaguza ow'akaba afiire amaiso bati: “Ogu akwigwire amaiso, iwe noomugambaho ki?” Yabagarukamu ati: “Murangi.”
43009018	Abayudaaya bataikirize nkooku akaba afiire amaiso kandi gaiguka, okuhika obu baayesire abazaire be,
43009019	baabakaguza bati: “Onu nuwe mutabani wanyu, ou murukugamba ngu, akazaarwa afiire amaiso? Hati naarora ata?”
43009020	Abazaire be baabagarukamu bati: “Tumanyire onu nkooku ali mwana waitu, kandi akazaarwa afiire amaiso;
43009021	baitu hati nkooku arukurora, titurukukimanya; kandi n'ogu amwigwire amaiso titurukumumanya. Mumukaguze; muntu mukuru, ayegambirre wenka.”
43009022	Abazaire be ekyabagambisize kiti, nukwo kutiina Abayudaaya, habwokuba bakaba baikirraniize ngu, weena araayatura Yesu nkooku ali Kristo, w'okubingwa omu isorrokaniro lyabo.
43009023	Nikyo abazaire be bagambiire bati: “Muntu mukuru, mumwekagulize.”
43009024	Abayudaaya baagaruka baayeta omusaija ow'akaba afiire amaiso, baamugambira bati: “Kugiza Ruhanga! Itwe nitumanya omusaija ogu nkooku ali musiisi.”
43009025	uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Nyowe tindukumanya obu araaba ali musiisi. Kinu nikyo ndukumanya: nkaba nfiire amaiso, hati nindora.”
43009026	Baamukaguza bati: “Akukozireho ki? Amaiso gaawe agaigwire ata?”
43009027	Yabagarukamu ati: “Mbagambiire ira, baitu mwayanga kuhurra. Nimugondeza ki kukihurra obwa kabiri? Na inywe nimwenda kufooka beegesebwa be?”
43009028	Bbo baatandika kumujuma nibagamba bati: “Niiwe mwegesebwa we, itwe tuli ba Musa.
43009029	Nitumanya Ruhanga nkooku yabalize na Musa, baitu omuntu ogu titurukumanya nambere yarugire.”
43009030	Nandiki omusaija ati: “Ka kyamahano inywe okutamanya nambere yarugire, kandi kunu anyigwire amaiso!
43009031	Tumanyire Ruhanga nkooku atahurra basiisi; baitu weena anyakumuramya, akakora ebi agonza, nuwe Ruhanga ahurra.
43009032	Ensi yakaba kubaho tikikahulirwaga nkooku haroho ayaigwire amaiso g'omuntu ayazairwe ali mufu w'amaiso.
43009033	Omuntu ogu kakuba atararugire hali Ruhanga, busaho eki yakusoboire kukora.”
43009034	Bbo baamugarukamu bati: “Iwe ayazaalirwe omu bibi bisa, waija kutwegesa?” Baamubingira aheeru.
43009035	Yesu akahurra nkooku bamubingire. Obu yamuzoire, yamukaguza ati: “Noikiriza Omwana w'omuntu?”
43009036	Uwe yamugarukamu ati: “Waitu nuwe oha, nukwo mmwikirize?”
43009037	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Omurozire, nuwe ogu arukubaza na iwe.”
43009038	Yagamba ati: “MUKAMA wange, ninyikiriza.” Yamuramya.
43009039	Yesu nukwo kugambira ekitebe ky'abantu ati: “Ekyandeesire omunsi nukwo kucwa emisango. Nukwo abatarukurora barole, kandi abarukurora bafooke bafu b'amaiso.”
43009040	Abamu ha Bafalisaayo abakaba bamuli haihi, obu baahuliire eki, nubwo bamukagwize bati: “Na itwe tuli bafu b'amaiso?”
43009041	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Kakuba mubaire muli bafu b'amaiso, timwakubaire na musango; baitu hati habw'okugamba muti: ‘Niturora’, nikyo omusango gwanyu gurukwikarraho.”
43010001	“Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Ataraba omu mulyango kutaaha omu isibiko ly'entaama, baitu akatembera handi, ogu aba musuma kandi munyagi.
43010002	Anyakuraba omu mulyango nuwe muliisa w'entaama.
43010003	Omukumirizi amukingurraho kandi entaama zihurra iraka lye; entaama ze azeeta amabara gaazo, aziturukya aheeru.
43010004	Eze zoona obu amara kwiturukya aheeru, azeebembera, nazo zimuhondera, habwokuba zimanyire iraka lye.
43010005	Ogu ou zitarukumanya tizimuhondera, baitu zimwiruka habwokuba tizirukumanya maraka g'abandi.”
43010006	Yesu akabacwera orufumo oru, baitu bbo batakenge eki abagambiire.
43010007	Yesu yagaruka yabagira ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Ninyowe mulyango gw'entaama.
43010008	Abandi boona abaambandiize bakaba bali basuma kandi banyagi, n'entaama itabahurre.
43010009	Ninyowe mulyango; weena anyakuraba omuli nyowe alijunwa. Araataahaga, naaturuka kandi abone iriisizo.
43010010	Omusuma taizira kindi kwihaho kwiba, kwita, n'okuhwerekereza. Nyowe nkaija zibe n'obwomeezi, kandi bube bwingi muno.
43010011	Ninyowe omuliisa murungi. Omuliisa omurungi ahayo obwomeezi bwe habw'entaama ze.
43010012	Anyakuliisiza empeera tali muliisa mali, kandi entaama tiziri ze. Obu arora omwaga nigwija, asigaho entaama, airuka; omwaga gugwera entaama, guzirarangya.
43010013	Uwe airuka habwokuba naakorra empeera, kandi entaama tazitaho mutima.
43010014	Ninyowe omuliisa omurungi; mmanyire ezange, kandi n'ezange niziimmanya:
43010015	Nka Isenyowe oku ammanyire, na nyowe mmumanyire; kandi mpayo obwomeezi bwange habw'entaama zange.
43010016	Nyina entaama ezindi ezitali z'omu isibiko linu; nazo ninsemerra kuzireeta, zihurre iraka lyange. Nukwo habeho igana limu eriina omuliisa omu.
43010017	Nikyo Isenyowe angondeza, habwokuba mpayo obwomeezi bwange, nukwo ngaruke mbwegarurre.
43010018	Busaho n'omu anyakubunyihaho, baitu nyowe mbweheerayo nyenka. Nyina obusobozi bw'okubuhayo n'obw'okubwegarurra; obusobozi obu nkabuheebwa Isenyowe.”
43010019	Abayudaaya bakagaruka kwebaganizaamu habw'ebigambo ebi.
43010020	Abaingi omulibo baagamba bati: “Aina omwoyo mubi, kandi agwire iraro; nimumuhulirra ki?”
43010021	Baitu abandi bati: “Ebigambo ebi tibigambwa omuntu anyakwina omwoyo omubi. Omwoyo omubi nigusobora kwigura amaiso ga kihimbaara?”
43010022	Omu bwire obu, omu rubuga Yerusaalemu, bakaba nibakuza ekiro kikuru eky'okwijuka okwezibwa kw'Enju ya Ruhanga.
43010023	Bukaba buli bwire bw'obutiti, kandi Yesu akaba naarubatarubata omunju ya Ruhanga, omu kisasi ky'omulyango gwa Solomooni.
43010024	Abayudaaya baamwehinguliriza baamukaguza bati: “Olihikya nkaha kutwehanikisa emitima? Obu oraaba oli Kristo, tugambire bbwa.”
43010025	Yesu nukwo kubagarukamu ati: “Nkabagambira ira, baitu timwaikiriza. Emirimo ei ndukukora omu ibara lya Isenyowe, niyo erukungumya;
43010026	baitu inywe timurukwikiriza, habwokuba timuli ntaama zange.
43010027	Entaama zange zihurra iraka lyange. Nzimanyire, nazo zimpondera;
43010028	kandi nziha obwomeezi obutahwaho, tizirihwerekerra ebiro byona. Busaho n'omu alizinsahuraho.
43010029	Isenyowe ayazimpaire naakira boona amaani kandi busaho n'omu asobora kuzimusahuraho.
43010030	Nyowe na Isenyowe tuli omu.”
43010031	Abayudaaya baagaruka baakoma amabaale kugamuteera.
43010032	Yesu nukwo kubagambira ati: “Nkabooleka ebirungi bingi ebyarugire hali Isenyowe. Nikiha hali ebi ekirukubanteeza amabaale?”
43010033	Abayudaaya baamugarukamu bati: “Titurukukuteera amabaale habw'okukora ebirungi, baitu habw'okujuma Ruhanga. iwe nooyeyeta Ruhanga, kandi kunu oli muntu.”
43010034	Nandiki Yesu ati: “‘Muli baaruhanga’?
43010035	Abo abaiziirwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga obu aliba yabeesire baaruhanga (kandi Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera tibisobora kucwibwa),
43010036	ogu Isenyowe ou yayereze kandi yatuma omunsi, inywe nimumugambaho muta: ‘Noojuma Ruhanga’, habw'okugamba ngu: ‘Ndi Mwana wa Ruhanga?’
43010037	Obu ndaaba ntarukukora bukwenda bwa Isenyowe, muleke kunyikiriza;
43010038	baitu obu ndaaba nimbukora, inywe noobu muraaba mutarukunyikiriza, haakire mwikirize ebikorwa ebi ndukukora. Nukwo mumanye kandi mwetegereze Isenyowe nkooku ali omuli nyowe, na nyowe nkooku ndi omuli Uwe.”
43010039	Bakalengaho kugaruka kumukwata, baitu yabeecwamu.
43010040	Yagaruka yayambuka ekisaaru Yorudaani omu kiikaro nambere Yohaana yabandize kubatiriza, yaikara oku.
43010041	Baingi bakaija hali uwe, baagamba bati: “Yohaana atakole kintu ekirukuhuniriza na kimu, baitu byona Yohaana ebi yagambireho omusaija onu, bikaba biri by'amazima.”
43010042	Oku baingi baamwikiriza.
43011001	Betaniya hakaba haliyo omurwaire ayayetwaga Lazaaro. Kandi Betaniya nikyo kyaro Mariya na Malita owanyina, nambere baikaraga.
43011002	Mariya ogu, munyaanya Lazaaro ow'akaba arwaire, nuwe yasiigire Yesu amagita g'obwotere kandi yamuragaza ebigere n'isoke rye.
43011003	Nubwo banyaanya baatumireho Yesu bati: “Waitu, enganjani yawe arwaire.”
43011004	Baitu Yesu obu yahuliire eki, yagamba ati: “Endwara egi teri y'okumwita, baitu y'okuhaisa Ruhanga ekitiinisa, n'okuhaisaniza Omwana wa Ruhanga.”
43011005	Yesu yagonzaaga Malita na Mariya owanyina, na Lazaaro;
43011006	baitu obu yahuliire Lazaaro nkooku arwaire, yamara ebiro ebindi bibiri nambere akaba ali.
43011007	Ebiro ebi obu byahoire, yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Ka tugaruke Buyudaaya.”
43011008	Abeegesebwa nukwo kumukaguza bati: “Mwegesa, biro binu Abayudaaya babaire nibakuserra kukuteera amabaale, kandi nooyenda kugarukayo?”
43011009	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Omwizooba limu tiharumu saaha ikumi na ibiri? Omuntu obu agenda nyamusana tateerwa nkonge, habwokuba naamulikirwa omusana gw'ensi enu.
43011010	Baitu omuntu obu agenda ekiro ateerwa enkonge, habwokuba aba ataina musana ogw'okumumulikira.”
43011011	Obu yamazire kugamba ebi yayongera ati: “Munywani waitu Lazaaro agwijagiire, kandi ningenda kumusisiimura.”
43011012	Nukwo abeegesebwa be kumugambira bati: “Waitu obu araaba agwijagiire, araakira.”
43011013	Yesu akaba naabaza ha kufa kwa Lazaaro, baitu bbo baatekereza ngu, naagamba ha kugwijagira okw'oturo.
43011014	Nubwo Yesu yabaatuliire bbwa ati: “Lazaaro afiire;
43011015	kandi nyowe kinsemiize okutasangwayo. Kinu nikiija kubagasa n'okubongeraho okwikiriza. Hati nu tugende nambere ali.”
43011016	Tomasi, arukwetwa Omurongo, yagambira abeegesebwa bagenzi be ati: “Naitwe tugende, tufe hamu nawe.”
43011017	Yesu obu yahikireyo, yasanga Lazaaro amazire ebiro bbina omu kituuro.
43011018	Betaniya ekaba eri kilomita nka isatu okuruga Yerusaalemu.
43011019	Abayudaaya baingi bakaba baizire kuhumuuza Malita na Mariya habwa munyaanyabo.
43011020	Malita obu yahuliire Yesu nkooku arukwija, yagenda kumutangaana. Mariya yasigara aikaliire omunju.
43011021	Nubwo Malita yagambiire Yesu ati; “MUKAMA wange, kakuba wasangirwe hanu, munyaanya nyowe taakufiire.
43011022	Na hati nimmanya ngu, kyona eki oraasaba Ruhanga, naija kukikuha.”
43011023	Yesu yamugarukamu ati; “Munyaanyoko naija kuhumbuuka.”
43011024	Nandiki Malita ati: “Mmanyire nkooku alihumbuuka ha kuhumbuuka okwa ha kiro kya ha mpero.”
43011025	Yesu yamugambira ati: “Ninyowe kuhumbuuka, ninyowe bwomeezi; arukunyikiriza noobu alifa, baitu alyomeera;
43011026	kandi omuntu weena omwomeezi arukunyikiriza, talifa. Eki nookiikiriza?”
43011027	Malita yamugarukamu ati: “Ego, MUKAMA wange; ninyikiriza nkooku oli Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga niiwe ogu ow'okwija omunsi.”
43011028	Obu yamazire kugamba eki, yagenda yayeta owanyina Mariya, yamugambira ebihwa ati: “Omwegesa ali hanu, naakweta.”
43011029	Mariya obu yahuliire eki, yabandaatuka, yagenda nambere ali.
