43011030	Yesu akaba atakahikire omu kyaro Betaniya, baitu akaba akyali omu kiikaro Malita nambere yamusangire.
43011031	Abayudaaya abakaba bali omunju nibahuumuza Mariya, obu baarozire yaimuka bwango, yaturuka aheeru, baamuhondera nibateekereza ngu, naagenda ha kituuro kulirirrayo.
43011032	Mariya, obu yahikire nambere Yesu ali, yamurora, yagwa ha bigere bye, naagamba ati: “MUKAMA wange, kakuba wasangirwe hanu, munyaanya nyowe taakufiire.”
43011033	Yesu obu yarozire Mariya narra, n'Abayudaaya abamuhondiire nabo nibarra, yatuntura omu mutima, yasaalirwa muno.
43011034	Nukwo kubakaguza ati: “Mukamuziika nkaha?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Waitu, ija orole.”
43011035	Yesu nawe yarra.
43011036	Nubwo Abayudaaya baagambire bati: “Murole nkooku yamugondeze!”
43011037	Abamu omuli bo baakaguza bati: “Onu ayaigwire amaiso ga kihimbaara, taakusoboire kutanga omuntu onu kufa?”
43011038	Yesu yahika ha kituuro, aijwire obusaalizi. Kikaba kiri bwingira obukingirweho ibaale.
43011039	Nukwo kubaragira ati: “Mwiheho ibaale.” Malita, munyaanya omufu, yamugambira ati: “MUKAMA wange, hati naanunka, habwokuba amazire ebiro bbina afiire.”
43011040	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Tinkugambiire nti: Obu oraikiriza, noija kurora ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga?”
43011041	Aho baihaho ibaale. Yesu yararamira haiguru yagamba ati: “Taata, ninkusiima habw'okumpurra.
43011042	Mmanyire nkooku ompurra butoosa, baitu kinu nkigambire habwa banu abanyehinguliriize, baikirize nkooku wantumire.”
43011043	Obu yamazire kugamba eki, yayamirra n'iraka likooto ati: “Lazaaro, turuka!”
43011044	Ow'akaba afiire yaturuka aheeru, emikono ye n'amaguru biboherwe n'ebikoba, amaiso ge gasemberwe ekitambaara. Yesu nukwo kubaragira ati: “Mumubohorre, mumuleke agende.”
43011045	Abayudaaya baingi abakaba bahondiire Mariya, obu baarozire Yesu eki akozire, baamwikiriza;
43011046	baitu abamu omuli bo baagenda kugambira Abafalisaayo ekyabaireho.
43011047	Nukwo abanyakatagara abakuru hamu n'abafalisaayo kusorooza orukurato. Baakaguzangana bati: “Tukole ki? Dora omusaija ogu naakora ebirukuhuniriza bingi.
43011048	Obu turaamuleka akongera kukora ati, boona nibaija kumwikiriza; kandi Abarooma baliija bahwerekereze ekiikaro kyaitu ekirukwera kinu n'ihanga lyaitu.”
43011049	Omu omuli bo, Kaayafa, ow'akaba ali mukuru w'abanyakatagara omu mwaka ogu, yabagambira ati: “Timwina eki murukumanya.
43011050	Timurukwetegereza nkooku kihikire omuntu omu kufeera boona, okukira ihanga lyona kuhwerekerra.”
43011051	Eki atakigambe habwe wenka, baitu habw'okuba mukuru w'abanyakatagara omu mwaka ogu. Akaragura Yesu nkooku asemeriire kufeera ihanga lyona;
43011052	kandi tarukufa habw'ihanga lyonka, baitu na habw'okusorooleza hamu abaana ba Ruhanga abaararangiire omu mahanga.
43011053	Okuruga ha kiro eki, baamalirra kumwita.
43011054	Nahabweki Yesu atagaruke kugendagenda bwerebwere omu Bayudaaya; baitu yarugayo, yagenda omu kicweka ekiheriire irungu, omu kyaro ekirukwetwa Efuraimu; oku nuho yaikaire aina n'abeegesebwa be.
43011055	Obugenyi obw'Abayudaaya obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho bukaba buli haihi kuhika, abantu baingi baaruga omu byaro, baagenda Yerusaalemu kweyeza, obugenyi obu butakahikire.
43011056	Bakaba nibaserra Yesu beemeriire omunju ya Ruhanga, nibakaguzangana bati: “Nimuteekereza muta? Mara, tarukwija ha kiro kikuru?”
43011057	Baanyakatagara abakuru n'Abafalisaayo bakaba baragiire ngu, obu haraaba haroho anyakumanyire nambere ali, aije abamayise, bamukwate.
43012001	Obu hakaba hasigaire ebiro mukaaga obugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho buhike, Yesu yaija Betaniya, Lazaaro ou yahumbwire omu bafu nambere akaba ali.
43012002	Oku bakamucumbirayo ekyekiro. Malita yabaheereza kandi Lazaaro akaba ali omu hali abo abakaba baikaliire na Yesu nibalya.
43012003	Mariya yaleeta kimu kyakabiri kya lita ky'amagita ag'omuhendo agarukuboya kurungi, yagasiiga ebigere bya Yesu kandi yabiragaza n'isoke rye. Enju yoona yaijura okuboya kw'amagita ago.
43012004	Omu ha beegesebwa be, Yuda Isikalyota ow'akaba naija kumugobeza, nukwo kukaguza ati:
43012005	“Habwaki amagita ago gatatunzirwemu dinaali, bikumi bisatu, zikagabirwa abaseege?”
43012006	Ekyamugambisize eki, tikuli kuganyira abaseege, baitu habwokuba akaba ali musuma, kandi nuwe yakwataga ensahu, yaikaraga naasomoraho ebi baatamuga.
43012007	Nukwo Yesu kumugarukamu ati: “Omukazi mumuleke, amagita agaahurre ekiro eky'okuziikwa kwange.
43012008	Abaseege mwikara nabo butoosa, baitu timuliikara na nyowe obutoosa.”
43012009	Abayudaaya baingi obu baahuliire nkooku ali oku, baija. Bataizirre Yesu wenka, baitu n'okurora Lazaaro ou yahumbwire omu bafu.
43012010	Nubwo abanyakatagara abakuru baahanwire n'okwita Lazaaro,
43012011	habwokuba baingi omu Bayudaaya bakaba nibabarugaho habwe, nibaikiriza Yesu.
43012012	Ha kiro ekyakurasireho, ekitebe kikooto eky'abantu abakaba baizire ha kiro kikuru bakahurra Yesu nkooku arukwija Yerusaalemu.
43012013	Baagenda kumutangirra bakwasire amataagi g'emikindo, nibaswagirra bati: “Ahaisanizibwe! W'omugisa Omukama wa Isirairi, ogu arukwija omwibara ly'Atahwaho.”
43012014	Aho Yesu yarora omwana gw'endogoyi, yagwikarraho nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti:
43012015	“Otatiina iwe muhara wa Siyoni. Omukama wawe nguli naija, atembere omwana gw'endogoyi!”
43012016	Okubanza abeegesebwa be, eki batakyetegereze; baitu Yesu obu yamazire kunyumizibwa, nubwo baijukire ebi nkooku byamuhandiikirweho kandi byamukozirweho.
43012017	Kandi abo boona abakaba baroho obu yayesire Lazaaro kuruga omu kituuro, yamuhumbuura omu bafu, nabo baaha obwakaiso.
43012018	Eki nikyo kyatwaire ekitebe ky'abantu kugenda kumutangirra, habwokuba bakaba bahuliire nkooku akozire ekirukuhuniriza eki.
43012019	Abafalisaayo nukwo kugambirangana bati: “Murole nkooku tutakyaina eky'okukora; dora, ensi yoona emuhondiire.”
43012020	Kandi omuli abo abaizire ha bugenyi kuramya, hakaba harumu Abagiriiki.
43012021	Abo bakaija hali Filipo owa Betisaida orw'omu Galiraaya, baamusaba bati: “Waitu, nitugonza kurora Yesu.”
43012022	Filipo yagambira Andereya; kandi Andereya yagenda nawe, bamanyise Yesu.
43012023	Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Akasumi kahikire Omwana w'omuntu okunyumizibwa.
43012024	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: akajuma k'engano obu katagwa omu itaka kakafa, kaikara konka; baitu kakuba kafa, kaana ebyana bingi.
43012025	Weena anyakugonza obwomeezi bwe omunsi munu abuferwa, baitu anyakunoba obwomeezi bwe nuwe aliikara nabwo okuhika omu bwomeezi obutahwaho.
43012026	Weena anyakumpeereza asemeriire kunkuraatira; kandi nyowe nambere ndi, n'omuheereza wange nuho aliba. Weena anyakumpeereza, Isenyowe alimuha ekitiinisa.”
43012027	“Hati omutima gwange gutuntwire. Kandi ndaagamba ki? ‘Taata onjune, akasumi kanu kaleke kumpikaho’? Nangwa, habwokuba ekyandeesire nukwo kuhikwaho akasumi kanu.
43012028	Taata, nyumizibwa.” Omu kasumi ako iraka lyaruga omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Nkanyumizibwa ira kandi ndigaruka okunyumizibwa.”
43012029	Ekitebe ky'abantu abakaba beemeriire aho baahurra iraka eri, baagira ngu nkuba niyo ebbwatukire. Abandi bati: “Malaika nuwe abalize nawe.”
43012030	Baitu Yesu yabagambira ati: “Iraka eri liizire habwanyu, tihali habwange.
43012031	Kanu nuko kasumi ensi enu aka eraacwererwamu omusango, kandi omulemi w'ensi enu naija kubingwa.
43012032	Nyowe obu ndikamara kuhanikwa, ndiiriza boona nambere ndi.”
43012033	Eki akakigamba kwoleka emifeere ye.
43012034	Nukwo abantu kumukaguza bati: “Tukasoma omu Biragiro ngu, Kristo aliikaraho ebiro byona. Osobora ota kugamba ngu, Omwana w'omuntu alihanikwa? Omwana w'omuntu ogu nooha?”
43012035	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Omusana gukyali na inywe akasumi kake. Murubate mukyaina omusana, obwire buleke kubairirra omu muhanda; ogu anyakugenda omu mwirima, tamanya nambere arukugenda.
43012036	Obu muraaba mukyaina omusana, mugwikirize nukwo mufooke baana b'omusana.” Yesu obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yarugaho, yabeesereka.
43012037	Noobu araaba yakozire ebihuniriza bingi omumaiso gaabo, nabwo batamwikirize.
43012038	Eki kikahikiriza ekigambo omurangi Isaaya eki yagambire ati: “Ai MUKAMA, nooha ayaikiriize ebi twamurangiire, kandi nooha ayasuukulirwe amaani ga MUKAMA?”
43012039	Nikyo balemiirwe okwikiriza, habwokuba Isaaya akagaruka yagamba ati:
43012040	“Akabaigara amaiso, yabagumanganiza emitima, nukwo amaiso gaabo galeke kuhweza n'emitima yabo ereke kwetegereza, bakampindukira, nkabakiza.”
43012041	Eki Isaaya akakigamba habw'okurora ekitiinisa kya Kristo, kandi nuwe yabalizeho.
43012042	Baingi, noobu baakuba omu balemi babo, bakamwikiriza; baitu batakyatule habw'okutiina Abafalisaayo, tibaikara kubingwa omu isorrokaniro;
43012043	habwokuba bbo bakagonza okusiimwa abantu kukira kusiimwa Ruhanga.
43012044	Yesu yagambira haiguru ati: “Weena arukunyikiriza, tarukwikiriza nyowe, baitu naikiriza Oli ayantumire.
43012045	Kandi weena arukundora, buli arozire ayantumire.
43012046	Nyowe nkaija omunsi ndi musana, nukwo weena arukunyikiriza aleke kwikara omu mwirima.
43012047	Weena anyakuhurra ebigambo byange atabikwasire, nyowe timmusingisa musango. Habwokuba ntaije kusingisa ab'omunsi omusango, baitu nkaija kubajuna.
43012048	Arukunyanga, akanga n'okukwata ebigambo byange, haroho arukumucwera omusango. Ebigambo ebi nagambire nibyo birimusingisa omusango ha kiro kya ha mpero.
43012049	Habwokuba ntabigambe habwange, baitu Isenyowe ayantumire nuwe yandagiire eby'okugamba n'eby'okwegesa.
43012050	Kandi mmanyire Ebiragiro bye nkooku bireeta obwomeezi obutahwaho. Nahabweki ebi ngamba, mbigamba isenyowe nkooku yadagiire.”
43013001	Ekiro kikuru eky'obugenyi Obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho kikaba kitakahikire; kandi Yesu yamanya akasumi ke ak'okuruga omunsi munu n'okugaruka hali Ise nkooku kahikire. Okumanya yagondeze abe abakaba bali omunsi, akabagondeza kimu okuhika ha mpero.
43013002	Obu bakaba nibalya ekyekiro, Sitaani amazire kutaahya omu mutima gwa Yuda Isikalyota mutabani wa Simooni, ekiteekerezo ky'okumugobeza,
43013003	Yesu akaba naamanya Ise nkooku yamukwasize byona kandi nkooku yarugire hali Ruhanga naija n'okugaruka hali Ruhanga;
43013004	yaimuka, yaruga ha meeza, yajuura omwegereko gwe, yayeteega etaulo omunda.
43013005	Yaseesa amaizi omu bbeseni, yatandika kunaabisa abeegesebwa be ebigere, n'okubisusuza taulo ei akaba ayeteegere.
43013006	Aho yahika hali Simooni Petero, kandi Petero yamukaguza ati: “MUKAMA wange, noonaabisa nyowe ebigere?”
43013007	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Eki ndukukora torukukimanya hati, baitu olikimanya hanyuma.”
43013008	Petero yamugambira ati: “Toliinaabisa bigere naakake.” Nukwo Yesu kumugarukamu ati: “Obu ndaaba ntarukukunaabisa, tokyateerana na nyowe.”
43013009	Simooni Petero yamugambira ati: “MUKAMA wange, otannabisa ebigere byonka, baitu onnabise engaro n'omutwe!”
43013010	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Anyakwogere, tayetaaga kindi rundi okunaaba ebigere byonka, habwokuba weena aba naayera. Na inywe nimwera, baitu timuli inywena.”
43013011	Habwokuba akamanya araamugobeza; nikyo yagambira ati: “Timurukwera inywena.”
43013012	Obu yamazire kubanaabisa ebigere, yajwara omwegereko gwe, yagaruka ha meeza, yabakaguza ati: “Mwetegeriize eki mbakozire?
43013013	Inywena munyeta Mwegesa kandi MUKAMA wanyu; muhikya, habwokuba nukwo ndi.
43013014	Hati nu, nyowe MUKAMA kandi Omwegesa wanyu, obu ndaaba mbanaabisize ebigere, na inywe nukwo musemeriire muti okunaabisangana ebigere.
43013015	Mbahaire ekyokurorraho, na inywe mukolege nkooku mbakozire.
43013016	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Omuheereza takira mukama we; kandi omukwenda takira ogu ayamutumire.
43013017	Ebintu binu obu muraaba nimubikenga, muli b'omugisa kakuba mubikora.
43013018	Tindukubagambaho inywena; habwokuba nimmanya aba naakomere, nukwo Ekyahandiikirwe kihikirre ekirukugamba kiti: ‘Ogu ayaliire ha byokulya byange, nuwe anyehindukiriire.’
43013019	Eki nkibagambiire kitakabaireho; obu kiribaho, nukwo mwikirize ngu, ninyowe ogu.
43013020	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Weena anyakujwahukirra ou ntuma, aba ajwahukiriire nyowe; kandi anyakujwahukirra nyowe, aba ajwahukiriire Oli ayantumire.”
43013021	Yesu obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yakwatwa obujune, yayatura ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Omu omuli inywe naija kungobeza.”
43013022	Abeegesebwa be nukwo kurorangana batarukumanya ou agambireho.
43013023	Omwegesebwa Yesu ou yagonzaaga, akaba amwigamiire ha kifuba.
43013024	Nukwo Simooni Petero kumusima naagamba ati: “Mukaguza ou arukubazaaho.”
43013025	Ogu ow'akaba aigamiire Yesu ha kifuba yamukaguza ati: “MUKAMA wange, nooha ogu?”
43013026	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Nuwe ogu ou ndakoleza entonge nkagimuha.” Obu yakoleze entonge, yagiha Yuda, mutabani wa Simooni owa Isikalyota.
43013027	Obu yamazire kulya entonge egi, Sitaani yamutaahamu. Nukwo Yesu kumugambira ati: “Eki orukugenda kukora, kikole bwango.”
43013028	Omuli abo abakaba baikaliire ha kiihuro, busaho n'omu ayamanyire eki yamugambiire ati.
43013029	Baitu abamu mulibo, habw'okumanya Yuda nkooku yakwataga ensaho ya sente, nikyo batekeriize ngu, Yesu amutumire agule ebi barukwetaaga habw'obugenyi; rundi ngu, ahe abaseege akantu.
43013030	Yuda obu yamazire kulya entonge, ahonaaho yaturuka aheeru. Obwire bukaba bwizire.
43013031	Obu yamazire kugenda, Yesu yagamba ati: “Hati Omwana w'omuntu anyumiziibwe, na Ruhanga anyumiriziibwe omuli uwe.
43013032	Kandi Ruhanga obu araaba anyumiriziibwe omu Mwana we, na Mwana naija kunyumirizibwa omu Ruhanga, kandi araamunyumiza bwango. ”
43013033	“Baana bange, nkyali na inywe akacu kake. Nimwija kunserra; baitu nkooku naagambiire Abayudaaya, na inywe nukwo ndukubagambira nti: ‘Nambere ndukugenda, timulisobora kwijayo.’
43013034	Nimbaha Ekiragiro ekihyaka: Mugonzangane; nyowe nkooku nabagondeze, na inywe nukwo mugonzangane.
43013035	Obu muraaba nimugonzangana, aho nuho abantu boona balimanyira nkooku muli beegesebwa bange.”
43013036	Simooni Petero nukwo kumukaguza ati: “MUKAMA wange, noogenda nkaha?” Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Nambere ndukugenda tosobora kumpondera hati; baitu olimpondera hanyuma.”
43013037	Petero yayongera yamukaguza ati: “Waitu, habwaki ntakuhondera hati? Nyeteekaniize kuhayo obwomeezi bwange habwawe.”
43013038	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Oyeteekanize kuhayo obwomeezi bwawe habwange? Mazimakwo ninkugambira nti: Enkoko tekooke, iwe otakanyehoogere emirundi esatu.”
43014001	“Emitima yanyu ereke kutuntura. Mwikirize Ruhanga, na nyowe munyikirize.
43014002	Omwa isenyowe harumu ebiikaro bingi; kakuba kitali kyo, tinakubagambiire nti: Ningenda kubateekaniriza ekiikaro.
43014003	Kandi obu ndigenda nkabateekaniriza ekiikaro, ndigaruka mbatwale nambere ndi, oku na inywe nuho mwikale.
43014004	Kandi omuhanda ogurukutwara nambere ndukugenda, mugumanyire.”
43014005	Nukwo Tomasi kumukaguza ati; “MUKAMA wange, titurukumanya nambere orukugenda; omuhanda turaagumanya tuta?”
43014006	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Ninyowe muhanda, ninyowe mazima, ninyowe bwomeezi. Tiharoho anyakuhika hali Isenyowe atarabire omuli nyowe.
43014007	Kakuba mwammanyire, na Isenyowe mwakumumanyire; okuruga hati nimumumanya kandi mumuboine.”
43014008	Filipo yamugambira ati: “MUKAMA wange otwoleke Sso, eki kiraatumara.”
43014009	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Filipo, nambere nakaba kwikara na inywe tokammanyaga? Ogu anyakundora, buli aba arozire Isenyowe. Habwaki ogamba oti: ‘Twoleke Sso?’
43014010	Timurukwikiriza nkooku ndi omuli Isenyowe, na Isenyowe nkooku ali omuli nyowe? Ebigambo ebi mbagambira, timbigamba habwange; baitu Isenyowe anyakwikara omuli nyowe, nuwe akora emirimo ye.
43014011	Munyikirize nkooku ndi omuli Isenyowe, na Isenyowe nkooku ali omuli nyowe; kitali eki, munyikirize habw'ebikorwa ebi nkora.
43014012	“Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Arukunyikiriza, nawe alikora ebi ndukukora, kandi alikora ebirukukiraho; habwokuba nyowe ningenda owa Isenyowe.
43014013	Kyona eki muraasabaga omu ibara lyange, ndikikora, nukwo Isenyowe anyumirizibwe omu Mwana we.
43014014	Kyona eki murakasabaga omu ibara lyange ndikikora.”
43014015	“Obu muraaba nimungonza, muraakwataga ebiragiro byange.
43014016	Na nyowe ndisaba Isenyowe abahe Omuhabuzi ondi, aikalege na inywe ebiro byona.
43014017	Ogu nuwe Mwoyo ow'amazima, abantu ou batarukusobora kujwahukirra, baitu inywe mumumanyire, habwokuba aikara na inywe kandi aliba omuli inywe.
43014018	“Tindukwija kubasiga muli nfuuzi; ndigaruka hali inywe.
43014019	Hasigaire akasumi kake abantu tibaligaruka kundora, baitu inywe mulindora; habwokuba nyowe ndi mwomeezi, na inywe mulyomeera.
43014020	Ha kiro eki mulimanya nkooku ndi omuli Isenyowe, na inywe nkooku muli omuli nyowe, na nyowe omuli inywe.
43014021	Anyakwikiriza ebiragiro byange akabikwata, ogu nuwe angonza; kandi arukungonza, aligonzibwa Isenyowe, na nyowe ndimugonza kandi ndimweyoleka.”
43014022	Yuda (atali Isikalyota) yamukaguza ati: “MUKAMA wange, kiri kita iwe okutweyoleka, kunu oteeyolekere abantu boona?”
43014023	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Omuntu obu aba nangonza, alikwata ebigambo byange, na Isenyowe alimugonza; tuliija nambere ali, twikale nawe.
43014024	Atangonza takwata bigambo byange; kandi kunu ebigambo ebi murukuhuura tibiri byange, baitu bya Isenyowe ayantumire.
43014025	“Ebi mbibagambiire nkyali na inywe.
43014026	Baitu Omuhabuzi, nuwe Mwoyo Ahikiriire, Isenyowe ou alituma omu ibara lyange, nuwe alibeegesa byona, kandi alibaijukya byona ebi nakabagambiire.
43014027	Nimbasigira obusinge, obusinge bwange nimbubaha; baitu tindukubuha ensi nkooku ebuha. Emitima yaanyu ereke kutuntura, noobu kwakuba kutiina.
43014028	Mwampurra nimbagambira nti: ‘Ningenda, kandi ndigaruka nambere muli.’ Obu mwakubaire nimungonza, mwakusemeriirwe, habwokuba ningenda hali Isenyowe; kandi Isenyowe nankira obukuru.
43014029	Eki, nakibagambira kitakahikire; obu kirihika nukwo mwikirize.
43014030	Tindukwongera kubabaliza bingi, habwokuba omulemi w'ensi enu naija. Uwe tannyinaho busobozi;
43014031	baitu nyowe nkora Isenyowe nkooku yandagiire, nukwo abantu bamanye nkooku mmugonza. Mwimuke, turuge hanu.”
43015001	Ninyowe muzaabbibbu nyakabara, kandi Isenyowe nuwe mulimi.
43015002	itaagi lyange lyona eritarukwana bijuma, alitemaho; kandi buli itaagi erirukwana ebijuma alikonera, nukwo lyane ebirukukiraho.
43015003	Inywe mumazire kusemezibwa habw'ebigambo ebi nabagambiire.
43015004	Mwikale omuli nyowe, nka nyowe oku nyikara omuli inywe. Itaagi nkooku litasobora kwana ebijuma habwalyo lyonka, litali ha mizaabbibbu, nukwo na inywe mutasobora kukora ebikorwa ebirungi, rundi buli mugumiire hali nyowe.
43015005	Ninyowe muzaabbibbu, inywe muli mataagi. Ogu anyakwikara omuli nyowe, na nyowe omuli uwe, nuwe akora ebirungi bingi; habwokuba timwina eki musobora kukora mutali na nyowe.
43015006	Weena ataikara omuli nyowe anagwa nk'itaagi eritemerwe ha muti kandi ayoma. Amataagi nk'ago gasoroozebwa, ganagwa omu murro, gahya.
43015007	Obu muraikaraga omuli nyowe, n'ebigambo byange bikaikara omuli inywe, muraasobora kusaba kyona eki murukugonza, kandi kiribakolerwa.
43015008	Ekirukuhaisa Isenyowe ekitiinisa nukwo inywe kukora ebirungi bingi, nimwoleka nkooku muli beegesebwa bange mali.
43015009	Nka nyowe oku yangondeze, nukwo na nyowe nabagondeze; na inywe mwikale omu ngonzi zange.
43015010	Obu muraakwataga ebiragiro byange nyowe nkooku nakwasire ebya Isenyowe, muliikara omu ngonzi zange nyowe nkooku naikaire omu ngonzi ze.
43015011	Ebi mbibagambiire nukwo okusemererwa kwange kwikale omuli inywe, kandi okusemererwa oku kwijurre kimu.
43015012	“Kinu nikyo ndukubaragira: Mugonzangane nka nyowe oku nabagondeze.
43015013	Tiharoho anyakwina engonzi ezirukukira zinu, ezihambiriza omuntu kufeera enganjani ze.
43015014	Inywe muli nganjani zange obu muraaba nimukora ebi ndukubaragira.
43015015	Tinkyabeeta bairu, habwokuba omwiru tamanya mukama we ebi akora; baitu mbeesire nganjani, habwokuba nkabamanyisa byona Isenyowe ebi yangambiire.
43015016	Tibali inywe abankomere, baitu ninyowe nabakomere, nabataho nukwo mukole ebirungi, kandi ebikorwa byanyu biikaleho. Nahabweki kyona eki musaba Isenyowe omu ibara lyange, akibahe.
43015017	Eki ndukubaragira nkinu: Mugonzangane.”
43015018	“Abantu obu balibanoba, mumanye nkooku baabandize kunoba nyowe.
43015019	Kakuba mubaire muli b'ensi enu, ensi yakubagondeze nk'abaayo; baitu timuli b'ensi habwokuba nkabakoma nabaiha omunsi, nikyo ensi erukubanobera.
43015020	Mwijuke eki nabagambiire nti: ‘Omuheereza takira mukama we’. Obu baraaba nibampiiganiza, na inywe balibahiiganiza. Obu baraaba baahuliire ebi nabagambiire, n'ebyanyu balibihurra.
43015021	Baitu ebi byona balibibakora nibabatura nyowe, habwokuba tibarukumanya Ogu ayantumire.
43015022	Kakuba ntaraizire nkabagambira, tibaakubaire na kibi; baitu hati tibaina ky'okwekwasa habw'ekibi kyabo.
43015023	Ogu anyakunnoba, anoba na Isenyowe.
43015024	kakuba ntarakozire omuli bo ebikorwa ebitakakorwaga ondi weena, tibaakubaire na kibi; baitu hati babirozire kandi baanoba nyowe hamu na Isenyowe.
43015025	Eki kikabaho kihikirize ekyahandiikirwe omu Biragiro byabo kiti: ‘Bakannobera busa’.
43015026	Baitu Omuhabuzi ou ndibatwekera, naaruga hali Isenyowe, nuwe Mwoyo ow'amazima anyakuruga hali Isenyowe, Ogu obu aliija aliba kaiso wange.
43015027	Na inywe muli bakaiso, habwokuba okuruga ha kubanza twikaire hamu.”
43016001	“Ebi byona mbibagambiire muleke kugarukirra.
43016002	Balibabinga omu masorrokaniro; kandi akasumi kalihika omuntu weena arukubaita mbere aliteekerereza ngu, naaheereza Ruhanga.
43016003	Ekiribakoza eki nukwo kutamanya Isenyowe noobwakuba nyowe.
43016004	Baitu akasumi obu kalihika, muliijuka nkooku nabibamanyisize.” “Ebigambo binu ntabibagambire kuruga ha kubanza, habwokuba tukaba tukyali hamu.
43016005	Hati nu ningenda hali Ogu ayantumire, kandi busaho n'omu omuli inywe arukunkaguza ati: ‘Noogenda nkaha?’
43016006	Baitu habw'okubibagambira, emitima yanyu ijwire obujune.
43016007	Nabwo nimbagambira amazima nti: Okugenda kwange nikubagasira. Kakuba ntagenda, Omuhabuzi talibaizira; baitu obu ndigenda ndimubatumira.
43016008	Uwe obu aliija alirumiriza abantu habw'ekibi, habw'obuhikiriire na habw'okucwerwa omusango.
43016009	Alibarumiriza ekibi habw'okutanyikiriza.
43016010	Aligumya obuhikiriire bwange, habwokuba ningaruka hali Isenyowe kandi timulyongera kundora.
43016011	Alinanura abantu nkooku balicwerwa omusango, habwokuba omulemi w'ensi enu amazire kusingwa omusango.
43016012	“Nkyaina bingi eby'okubagambira, baitu timurukwija kubisobora hati.
43016013	Mwoyo w'amazima obu aliija, alibeebembera abooleke amazima goona. Uwe talibaza habw'obusobozi bwe, baitu kyona eki alihurra, nikyo aligamba; kandi alibamanyisa n'ebirukwija kubaho.
43016014	Aliinyumiza habwokuba araihaga ha byange, naabibamanyisa.
43016015	Byona Isenyowe ebi ainabyo, byange; nikyo mbagambiriire nti: Mwoyo, ebyange nibyo araabamanyisaaga.”
43016016	“Hasigaire akacu kake muliba mutakyandora, kandi halihinguraho akacu kake mulindora.”
43016017	Abamu ha beegesebwa be nukwo kukaguzangana bati: “Kinu kiki eki atugambiire ati: ‘Hasigaire akacu kake, muliba mutakyandora’; kandi ati: ‘Halihinguraho akacu kake, mulindora’? Kandi ati: ‘Ningenda hali Isenyowe’?”
43016018	Baayongera kukaguzangana bati: “Naamanyisa ki obu arukugamba ati: ‘Hasigaire akacu kake’? Titurukwetegereza eki arukugamba.”
43016019	Yesu yakenga nkooku barukugonza kumukaguza, nukwo kubagambira ati: “Kinu tinikyo murukukaguzangana: Nyowe eki ngenderiire obu ngambire nti: ‘Hasigaire akacu kake muliba mutakyandora’?
43016020	Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Inywe mulirra, muliganya; baitu ensi, yo erisemererwa. Mulisaalirwa, baitu okusaalirwa kwanyu kulirugwamu okusemererwa.
43016021	Omukazi obu aba naarumwa kuzaara, asaalirwa, habwokuba akasumi ke kaba kahikire; baitu obu amara kuzaara, obusaalizi aba atakyabwijuka habw'okusemererwa, habwokuba omwana azairwe omunsi.
43016022	Inywe nimusaalirwa hati, baitu ndigaruka mbasuule, nukwo emitima yanyu erisemererwa, kandi okusemererwa kwanyu oku busaho n'omu alikubaihaho.
43016023	Ha kiro eki timulinkaguza kantu. Mali mali nimbagambira nti: kyona eki mulisaba Isenyowe omu ibara lyange, alikibaha.
43016024	Mwakaba kuba, timukasabaga kantu omu ibara lyange. Musabe, muliheebwa, nukwo okusemererwa kwanyu kuhikirre.
43016025	“Ebi mbibagambiire omu nfumo; akasumi kalihika obu ntalibagambira omu nfumo, baitu ebya Isenyowe ndibibagambira bbwa.
43016026	Ha kiro eki mulisaba omu ibara lyange, kandi tindukubagambira nti: Nyowe ndibasabira hali Isenyowe;
43016027	ningira Isenyowe nawe abagonza, habwokuba inywe mukangonza mwaikiriza nkooku narugire hali Uwe.
43016028	Nkaruga hali Isenyowe, naija omunsi; hati ensi ningirugamu, ningaruka owa Isenyowe.”
43016029	Abeegesebwa be baagamba bati: “Weza! hati noogamba bbwa, tokyagamba omu nfumo!
43016030	Twetegeriize nkooku omanyire ebintu byona, kandi torukulindirra muntu n'omu kukukaguza; nikyo turukwikiririza nkooku warugire hali Ruhanga.”
43016031	Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Hati mwaikiriza?
43016032	Akasumi nikaija, na hati kahikire, aka mulirarangiramu, buli muntu akwate ogwe, nimunsigaho nyenka; baitu nabwo tindi nyenka, habwokuba nyina Isenyowe.
43016033	Ebi mbibagambiire nukwo muzoole obusinge omuli nyowe. Omunsi mwina obujune, baitu mugume. Nyowe, ensi ngisingwire.”
43017001	Yesu obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yararamira haiguru nagamba ati: “Taata, akasumi kahikire; nyumiza Omwana waawe, nukwo nawe akunyumize.
43017002	Habwokuba okamuha obusobozi ha bantu boona, nukwo ahe boona aba wamukwasize obwomeezi obutahwaho.
43017003	Kandi obwomeezi obutahwaho nubwo bunu: abantu bamanye iwe Ruhanga omu, ow'amazima, na Yesu Kristo ou watumire.
43017004	Nyowe nkakunyumiza omunsi, mmazire kuhikiriza omulimo wampaire kukora.
43017005	Hati nu Taata, onnyumiririze nambere oli nongarurra ekitiinisa eki nkaba nyinakyo ndi hamu na iwe ensi etakahangirwe.
43017006	“Nkakumanyisa abantu aba wansoroliire omunsi. Bakaba bali baawe, okabampa, kandi bakwasire ekigambo kyawe.
43017007	Hati bamanyire byona ebi wampaire nkooku biruga nambere oli;
43017008	habwokuba byona ebi wangambiire nkabibamanyisa, baabiikiriza, baamanyira kimu nkooku narugire hali Iwe, kandi baikiriza ngu, niiwe wantumire.
43017009	Abo nubo ndukusabira. Tindukusabira ab'ensi, kyonka ninsabira abo aba wampaire, habwokuba baawe.
43017010	Abange boona, baawe; n'abaawe boona, bange. Ninyumiririzibwa omuli bo.
43017011	Hati tinkyali omunsi, baitu bbo bagirumu. Nyowe ninyija nambere oli. Taata Ahikiriire, abo aba wampaire obalinde habw'obusobozi bwawe obu wampaire babe bamu nka itwe oku tuli bamu.
43017012	Obu nkaba nkyaina abo aba wampaire, nkabalinda habw'obusobozi bwawe obu wampaire. Nkabalinda, tihabuzireho n'omu kwihaho ogu ou akaba ali w'okuhwerekerra, nukwo Ebyahandiikirwe bihikirre.
43017013	Baitu hati ninyija nambere oli. Binu nimbigamba nkyali omunsi, nukwo baijurre kimu okusemererwa kwange.
43017014	Mbahikizeho ekigambo kyawe; kandi abantu babanobere habwokuba tibali b'ensi enu, nka nyowe oku ntali wayo.
43017015	Tindukukusaba kubaiha omunsi, baitu obalinde hali Omubi.
43017016	Tibali b'ensi nka nyowe oku ntali w'ensi.
43017017	Obeeze omu mazima. Ekigambo kyawe nugo amazima.
43017018	Nkooku wantumire omunsi, na nyowe nukwo ngibatumiremu.
43017019	Nyowe ninyehayo habwabu, nukwo bbo beezibwe mali.”
43017020	“Tindukusabira banu bonka, baitu n'abandi abalinyikiriza habw'ebigambo byabo,
43017021	nukwo boona babe bamu nka Iwe Taata oku oli omuli nyowe, na nyowe omuli Iwe. Nabo babe omuli itwe, nukwo abantu bamanye nkooku niiwe wantumire.
43017022	Ekitiinisa eki wampaire, nikyo mbahaire. Babe bamu nka itwe oku tuli bamu,
43017023	nyowe omuli bo na Iwe omuli nyowe. Bafooke bamu, nukwo abantu bamanye nkooku wantumire, kandi wabagonza nkooku wangondeze.
43017024	Taata, aba wampaire, ningonza baikale nambere ndi, barole ekitiinisa eki wampaire, habwokuba okangonza ensi etakahangirwe.
43017025	Taata Ahikiriire, abantu batakumanye, baitu nyowe nkakumanya; kandi na banu nibamanya nkooku niiwe wantumire.
43017026	Nkabakumanyisa, kandi ndibakumanyisa, nukwo okugonza oku wangondezeemu kwikale omuli bo, na nyowe nyikale omuli bo.”
43018001	Yesu obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yaturuka n'abeegesebwa be baacwanganiza ekihanga eky'akasaaru Kederooni. Oku hakaba haliyo orugonjo oru yataahiremu aina abeegesebwa be.
43018002	Yuda, ayamugobiize, akaba naamanya ekiikaro eki. Obundi n'obundi Yesu yagendayoga hamu n'abeegesebwa be.
43018003	Nukwo Yuda kugendayo aina ekihanda ky'abaserikale n'abakuru baabo eki yahairwe banyakatagara abakuru n'Abafalisaayo, baina etaara n'ebimuli, hamu n'eby'okurwanisa.
43018004	Yesu habw'okumanya byona ebirukugenda kumubaho, yarugayo naabakaguza ati: “Nimuserra oha?”
43018005	Bbo baamugarukamu bati: “Yesu owa Nazareeti.” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Dara nyowe.” Yuda, ayamugobiize, akaba ayemeriire nabo.
43018006	Yesu obu yabagambiire ati: “Dara nyowe”, baayekanga, baagwa hansi.
43018007	Yagaruka yabakaguza ati: “Nimuserra oha?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Yesu owa Nazareeti.”
43018008	Nandiki uwe ati: “Mbagambiire ira nti; Ninyowe ogu. Obu muraaba nimuserra nyowe, abasaija banu mubaleke bagende.”
43018009	Kinu kikabaho kiikirize eki yagambire ira ati: “Hali abo aba wampaire, busaho n'omu ayabuzireho.”
43018010	Simooni Petero ow'akaba aina empirima, nubwo yagisomoire, yatema omwiru w'omukuru w'abanyakatagara, yamucwaho okutu kw'obulyo. Ibara ly'omwiru ogu, nuwe Malikusi.
43018011	Yesu yagambira Petero ati: “Empirima yawe gigarre omu kiraaro kyayo; tindukwija kubonabona Isenyowe nkooku yandagiire?”
43018012	Nubwo ekihanda ky'abaserikale n'omukuru waabo hamu n'abalinzi b'Abayudaaya baakwasire Yesu baamuboha.
43018013	Baabanza kumutwara hali Annasi, habwokuba akaba ali isezaara Kaayafa, ow'akaba ali mukuru w'abanyakatagara omu mwaka ogu.
43018014	Kaayafa ogu, nuwe yahaire Abayudaaya amagezi ati: Kihikire omuntu omu kufeera boona.
43018015	Simooni Petero hamu n'omwegesebwa ondi, baahondera Yesu. Omwegesebwa oli, habw'okumanywa mukuru w'abanyakatagara, yataaha hamu na Yesu omu kizigati kya mukuru w'abanyakatagara;
43018016	Petero akyayemeriire ha irembo. Nahabweki omwegesebwa oli, ow'akaba naamanywa mukuru w'abanyakatagara, yaturuka, yagambira omuzaana ayalindaga irembo, ataahye Petero.
43018017	Omuzaana ogu nubwo yakagwize Petero ati: “Na iwe toli omu ha beegesebwa b'omuntu ogu?” Yamugarukamu ati: “Tindi mwegesebwa we.”
43018018	Hakaba haroho embeho kandi abaheereza n'abakuru b'abaserikale bakaba bahembere omurro gw'amakara, beemeriire niboota, na Petero abarumu.
43018019	Mukuru w'abanyakatagara yakaguza Yesu ha beegesebwa be na ha nyegesa ye.
43018020	Nukwo Yesu kumugarukamu ati: “Abantu boona nabagambiraga bbwa. Butoosa naayegesaaga omu masorrokaniro n'omunju ya Ruhanga, nambere Abayudaaya boona beesorooleza. Tinkabazaaga kintu kyona omunsita.
43018021	Hati nyowe nonkaguliza ki? Kaguza abo abaampurraga ninyegesa; ebi nabagambiire nibabimanya.”
43018022	Obu yagambire eki, omu ha bakuru b'abaserikale abakaba beemeriire aho, yateera Yesu oruhi naagamba ati: “Noogarukamu oti mukuru w'abanyakatagara?”
43018023	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Obu ndaaba mbalize kubi, ndumiriza ekibi eki ngambire. Obu ndaaba mbalize kurungi, onteeriire ki?”
43018024	Nubwo Annasi yamutwekere hali Kaayafa, mukuru w'abanyakatagara aboherwe.
43018025	Simooni Petero akaba ayemeriire naayota. Baamukaguza bati: “Na iwe toli omu ha beegesebwa be?” Yayehooga naagamba ati: “Nangwa, tindi mwegesebwa we.”
43018026	Omu ha baheereza ba mukuru w'abanyakatagara, anyakwina obuzaale n'omuntu Petero ou yacwireho okutu, yamukaguza ati: “Timbarozirege muli hamu omu rugonjo?”
43018027	Petero yayehooga; ahonaaho enkoko yakooka.
43018028	Nubwo baihire Yesu omwa Kaayafa, baamutwara omunju ei baacweramuga emisango. Obwire bukaba nibukyanganuka. Bbo bonka batataahe omunju y'emisango habw'okuziza, batakamazire kulya obugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho.
43018029	Pilaato nukwo kuturuka yabasanga aheeru, yabakaguza ati: “Omuntu onu nimumujunaana musango ki?”
43018030	Baamugarukamu bati: “Omuntu onu kakuba atabaire mucwi w'Ebiragiro, titwakumukuleetiire.”
43018031	Pilaato yabagambira ati: “Mumwetwarre, mumucwere omusango nimuhondera Ebiragiro byanyu.” Nandiki Abayudaaya bati: “Ebiragiro byaitu tibirukutwikiriza kwita omuntu n'omu.”
43018032	Eki kikabaho kihikirize ekigambo Yesu eki yagambire kwoleka emifeere ye.
43018033	Pilaato yagaruka yataaha omunju ey'okucweramu emisango, yayeta Yesu yamukaguza ati: “Niiwe Mukama w'Abayudaaya?”
43018034	Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Ekikaguzo eki kyawe habwawe, rundi abandi nubo bakikugambiire hali nyowe?”
43018035	Pilaato yamungarukamu ati: “Nyowe ndi Muyudaaya? Ab'ihanga lyawe n'abanyakatagara abakuru nubo bakundeetiire. Okozire ki?”
43018036	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Obukama bwange tibuli bw'omunsi munu; obu bwakubaire buli bw'omunsi munu, abaheereza bange bakurwaine, ndeke kuheebwayo hali Abayudaaya; baitu obukama bwange tibuli bw'omunsi munu.”
43018037	Pilaato yamukaguza ati: “Nukwo kugamba oli mukama?” Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Niiwe orukugamba nkooku ndi mukama. Ningira eki nikyo nazaalirwe, kandi nikyo naiziire omunsi, okumanyisa amazima. Ow'amazima weena akwata ebigambo byange.”
43018038	Pilaato yamukaguza ati: “Amazima kimanyisa ki?” Obu yamazire kugamba eki, Pilaato yaturuka, yagaruka hali Abayudaaya, yabagambira ati: “Timurozireho musango.
43018039	Baitu mwina engeso y'okubalekerra omunyankomo omu ha kiro kikuru eky'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho. Nimwenda mbalekerre Omukama w'Abayudaaya?”
43018040	Nubwo baatokiire haiguru bati: “Atali ogu, baitu otulekerre Baraaba!” Baaraba ogu akaba ali munyagi.
43019001	Nubwo Pilaato yaragiire batwale Yesu, bamuteere enkoba.
43019002	Abaserikale baaruka ekondo y'amahwa, baagimuta ha mutwe, baamujweka orugoye rwa kahuukya;
43019003	baatandika kwija omu omu nibagamba bati: “Mirembe, Omukama w'Abayudaaya!” Baamuteera empi.
43019004	Pilaato yayongera yaturuka aheeru yabagambira ati: “Hati kammubaleetere, nukwo mumanye nkooku ntamuzoireho musango.”
43019005	Yesu nukwo kuturuka aheeru, ajwaire ekondo y'amahwa n'orugoye rwa kahuukya. Pilaato yabagambira ati: “Omuntu ngugwo!”
43019006	Baanyakatagara abakuru hamu n'abakuru b'abaserikale obu baamurozire, baatokera haiguru bati: “Mubambe! Mubambe ha musaraba!” Pilaato yabagambira ati: “Inywe inywenka mumutwale, mumubambe, habwokuba nyowe timmuzoireho musango.”
43019007	Abayudaaya baamugarukamu bati: “Twina ekiragiro, kandi ekiragiro eki nkooku kirukugamba, uwe asemeriire kufa, habwokuba akeeyeta Mwana wa Ruhanga.”
43019008	Pilaato obu yahuliire ebigambo ebi yayongera kutiina.
43019009	Yagaruka yataaha omunju ey'okucweramu emisango, yakaguza Yesu ati: “Okaruga nkaha?” Baitu Yesu tiyamugarukamu.
43019010	Pilaato nukwo kumukaguza ati: “Torukwenda kungarukamu? Tomanyire nkooku nyina obusobozi obw'okukulekera rundi obw'okukubamba ha musaraba?”
43019011	Nandiki Yesu ati: “Tokubaire n'obusobozi bwona hali nyowe, kakuba butarakuhairwe kuruga omwiguru; nahabweki anyakundiraine yampikya hanu, nuwe aina ekibi ekirukukira ekyawe.”
43019012	Okuruga obu Pilaato yaserra amagezi ag'okumulekera, baitu Abayudaaya baatokera haiguru bati: “Omuntu onu obu oraamulekera, buli toli nganjani ya Kaisaali; habwokuba weena anyakwefoora mukama, aba naarwanisa Kaisaali.”
43019013	Pilaato obu yahuliire ebigambo ebi, yaragira baturukye Yesu aheeru, yaikarra ha kitebe ky'okucweraho emisango, omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa Amabaale Agaaliriirwe, kandi omu Ruhebburaayo: Gabbata.
43019014	Ekiro eki kikaba kiri ky'Okwetekaniriza ekiro kikuru eky'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho; kandi zikaba ziri saaha nka mukaaga. Nubwo Pilaato yagambiire Abayudaaya ati: “Mukama wanyu ngugwo!”
43019015	Baatokera haiguru muno bati: “Mwiheho! Mwiheho! Mubambe ha musaraba!” Pilaato yabakaguza ati: “Ndabamba mukama wanyu?” Nandiki abanyakatagara abakuru bati: “Titwina mukama ondi kwihaho Kaisaali.”
43019016	Aho Pilaato yamubakwasa, bamubambe ha musaraba.
43019017	Nubwo baatwaire Yesu, yagenda ahimbire omusaraba gwe, baahika omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa eky'Oruhanga, kandi omu Ruhebburaayo: Gologota.
43019018	Oku nuho baamubambire hamu n'abandi babiri, omu ha rubaju rw'obulyo ondi ha rubaju rw'emoso, Yesu abali hagati.
43019019	Pilaato yahandiika ekirango, yakita ha musaraba. Kihandiikirweho kiti: “Yesu owa Nazareeti, Omukama w'Abayudaaya.”
43019020	Ekirango eki kikasomwa Abayudaaya baingi, habwokuba ekiikaro nambere akaba abambirwe kikaba kiri haihi n'orubuga; kandi kikaba kihandiikirwe omu Ruhebburaayo, omu Rulatini, n'omu Rugiriiki.
43019021	Baanyakatagara abakuru b'Abayudaaya nukwo kugambira Pilaato bati: “Otahandiika oti: ‘Omukama w'Abayudaaya’; baitu handiika oti: ‘Omuntu onu akeeyeta Omukama w'Abayudaaya.’ ”
43019022	Pilaato yabagarukamu ati: “Eki mpandiikire, nikyo mpandiikire.”
43019023	Abaserikale obu baamazire kubamba Yesu, baatwara ebyokujwara bye, baabiteeka emiteeko ena, buli muserikale yabagana omuteeko gumu. Baitu ekanzu ye ekaba etaina rubaziiro, ekaba erukirwe yoona kuruga ha bikya kuhika ha mukugiro.
43019024	Nukwo bbo kugambirangana bati: “Tutagitaagura, baitu tugiterre itomo, turole ow'aragitwara.” Eki kikabaho okuhikiriza ekyahandiikirwe kiti: “Bakabagana ebijwaro byange, ekanzu yange bakagiterra itomo.”
43019025	Kandi abaserikale abo nukwo baakozire bati. Haihi n'omusaraba gwa Yesu hakaba heemeriireho nyina, na nyinento, na Mariya muka Kileyopa, na Mariya Magadaleena.
43019026	Yesu obu yarozire nyina n'omwegesebwa ou yagonzaaga beemeriire haihi, yagambira nyina ati: “Mukazi, omwana waawe ngugwo!”
43019027	Kandi yagambira omwegesebwa ogu ati: “Nyoko ngugwo!” Okuruga obu omwegesebwa yamutwara omuka ye.
43019028	Ebi obu byahoire, Yesu amazire kumanyire kimu byona nkooku bihoire (kandi okuhikiriza Ebyahandiikirwe), yagamba ati: “Iroho lindi kubi.”
43019029	Aho hakaba hateekerweho ebbakuli ijwire amarwa agasaaliire, baibikamu ekijumankuba, baakita ha rubingo, baakihikya ha kanwa ke.
43019030	Yesu obu yamazire kunyunyuguza amarwa agasaaliire, yagamba ati; “Kihoire”; yainamya omutwe, yacwekana.
43019031	Ekiro eki kikaba kiri ky'Okweteekaniriza ebiro bikuru. Habw'okutagonza emitumbi ikale ha misaraba ha kiro kya Sabbato (habwokuba Sabbato egi ekaba eri nkuru), Abayudaaya nukwo kusaba Pilaato abaserikale ab'okuhenda amaguru g'abaabambirwe, nukwo bahanuule emitumbi.
43019032	Abaserikale baija, baahenda amaguru g'ow'okubanza, n'ag'ondi abakaba babambirwe nawe.
43019033	Obu baahikire hali Yesu, baasanga afiire ira, tibaamuhenda maguru.
43019034	Baitu omu ha baserikale yamucumita icumu omu rubaju, ahonaaho haarugamu esagama n'amaizi.
43019035	Ogu ayarozire kinu, akakigumya-kandi eki yagumize ky'amazima, naamanya nkooku arukubaza amananu-nukwo na inywe mwikirize.
43019036	Ebi bikabaho bihikirize ekyahandiikirwe kiti: “Talihendwa igufa na limu.”
43019037	Kandi ekyahandiikirwe ekindi ekirukugamba kiti: “Balimurora ou baacumisire.”
43019038	Ebi obu byahoire, Yosefu owa Arimateya, ow'akaba ali mwegesebwa wa Yesu, hatali bwerebwere habw'okutiina Abayudaaya, yasaba Pilaato amwikirize kutwara omutumbi gwa Yesu. Pilaato yamwikiriza. Yosefu yaija, yahanuura omutumbi, yagutwara.
43019039	Nikodemo, ogu ayaizire hali Yesu ekiro, nawe yaija yaleeta ekitabe ky'emigaju n'eseeta, ebirukuhika kilo nka makumi ana na itano.
43019040	Baatwara omutumbi gwa Yesu, baaguzinga omu ngoye za bafuta, batairemu ebirukuboya, engeso z'Abayudaaya ez'okuziika nkooku zikaba ziri.
43019041	Haihi n'ekiikaro eki yabambirwemu, hakaba haroho orugonjo orunyakurumu ekituuro ekihyaka ekitakaziikwamuga muntu.
43019042	Omu nuho baaziikire Yesu, habwokuba kikaba kiri kiro ky'Abayudaaya eky'okweteekaniriza Sabbato, kandi ekituuro eki kikaba kiri haihi.
43020001	Ha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki, Mariya Magadaleena akaija ha kituuro nyenkya kara, obwire butakakiire. Yasanga ibaale liihirwe ha munwa gw'ekituuro.
43020002	nukwo kwiruka yagenda hali Simooni Petero n'omwegesebwa oli, Yesu ou yagonzaaga. Yabagambira ati: “MUKAMA, omukituuro bamwihiremu, kandi titurukumanya nambere bamutaire.”
43020003	Aho Petero n'omwegesebwa oli baaturuka, baagenda ha kituuro.

43020005	Obu yainamire kulinguzaamu, yarora engoye eza bafuta zitairwe aho, baitu uwe atataahemu.

43020012	yarora bamalaika babiri bajwaire ebirukwera, baikaliire nambere omutumbi gwa Yesu gukaba gutairwe, omu ha musego, ondi ha mirambi.
43020013	Nukwo bbo kumukaguza bati: “Mukazi iwe, noolizibwa ki?” Yabagarukamu ati; “Habwokuba MUKAMA wange bamutwaire, kandi tindukumanya nambere bamutaire.”
43020014	Obu yagambire eki yahinduka, yarora Yesu ayemeriire aho, baitu atamanye nkooku ali nuwe.
43020015	Nukwo Yesu kumukaguza ati: “Mukazi iwe, noolizibwa ki? Nooserra oha?” Kandi Mariya habw'okugira ngu nuwe omulimi w'orugonjo oru, yamugarukamu ati: “Waitu, obu araaba ali niiwe omutwaire, ngambira nambere omutaire, ngende mmwiheyo.”
43020016	Nubwo Yesu yamwesire ati: “Mariya.” Uwe yakubuutuka, yamwetebuka omu Ruhebburaayo ati: “Rabboni!” (amakuru gaakyo: Mwegesa).
43020017	Yesu yamugambira ati: “Otankwataho, habwokuba tinkatembere hali Isenyowe, baitu genda hali bagenzi bange obagambire oti: nintemba hali Isenyowe kandi Isiinywe, hali Ruhanga wange kandi Ruhanga wanyu.”
43020018	Mariya Magadeleena yagenda, yagambira abeegesebwa ati: “Ndozire MUKAMA waitu”; kandi yabamanyisa ebigambo ebi yamuragiire.
43020019	Ha kiro eki omu kairirizi, ekiro eky'okubanza omu wiiki, abeegesebwa bakaba beekingiire omu nju habw'okutiina Abayudaaya. Yesu akaija yabeemerra hagati, yabaramukya ati: “Obusinge bube na inywe.”
43020020	Obu yamazire kugamba eki, yabooleka ebiganja bye n'orubaju rwe. Aho abeegesebwa baasemererwa habw'okurora MUKAMA.

43020023	Aba muliganyira ebibi biribaganyirwa; kandi aba mutaliganyira ebibi, tibiribaganyirwa.”
43020024	Baitu Tomasi, arukwetwa Omurongo, omu ha ikumi na babiri, akaba atali nabo Yesu obu yaizire.
43020025	Nukwo abeegesebwa abandi kumugambira bati: “Turozire MUKAMA.” Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Obu ntaarole bihuta by'emisumaali omu biganja bye nkabitamu orukumu rwange, ntakakwasire n'engaro zange omu rubaju rwe, tindukwija kwikiriza.”
43020026	Obu haahingwireho ebiro munaana, abeegesebwa be nabwo bakaba bali omunju, na Tomasi abarumu. Enyigi zikaba zikingirwe, baitu Yesu yaija yabeemerra hagati, yabaramukya ati: “Obusinge bube na inywe”.

43021002	Simooni Petero, na Tomasi arukwetwa Omurongo, Nasanairi owa Kana orwa Galiraaya, na batabani ba Zebedaayo, n'abeegesebwa abandi babiri bakaba bali hamu.

44001001	Omu kitabu eky'okubanza eki nakuhandiikiire, Teofilo, nkahandiikamu byona Yesu ebi yakozire n'ebi yayegeseze okuruga ha kubanza
44001002	okuhika ha kiro eki yatwaliirweho omwiguru, amazire kuraganiza abakwenda aba yayekomiire kubatwekera Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
44001003	Obu yamazire kufa ha musaraba, akabeeyoleka ayomiire, naakigumya n'ebirukuhuniriza bingi. Kandi akamara ebiro makumi ana naababonekera, naabagambira eby'Obukama bwa Ruhanga.
44001004	Obu akaba akyali nabo ha meeza, akabaragira kutaruga Yerusaalemu, baitu baikaleyo bategeriize Ise eki yaraganiize. Eki nikyo mwahuliire nimbazaaho nti:

44001006	Abakwenda obu bakaba beesoroize hamu, bakakaguza Yesu bati: “Mukama, kanu nuko kasumi oraagarurramu Isirairi obukama?”
44001007	Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Tikiri kyanyu kumanya akasumi rundi ebiro Isenyowe ebi yataireho habw'obusobozi bwe.
44001008	Baitu muliheebwa amaani, Mwoyo Ahikiriire obu alibaijaho; kandi muliba bakaiso bange omu Yerusaalemu, n'omu Buyudaaya yoona, n'omu Samaliya, n'okuhika ha mpero y'ensi.”
44001009	Amazire kugamba ebi, yatwarwa omwiguru bamuroleriire, ekicu kyaija kyamubasiikirizaaho.
44001010	Obu bakaba bakyaroleriire haiguru, uwe naagenda, haazooka abasaija babiri babeemeriire haihi, bajwaire engoye ezirukwera.
44001011	Baabakaguza bati: “Inywe basaija ba Galiraaya, kiki ekibeemeriize muroleriire haiguru? Yesu onu, anyakubaihirweho yatwarwa omwiguru, nukwo aligaruka ati, nkooku mwamurora naagenda.”
44001012	Nubwo Abakwenda baagarukire Yerusaalemu nibaruga ha rusozi orw'emiti Oliva, oruli haihi na Yerusaalemu, nk'orugendo orwarubatwaga ha Sabbato;
44001013	Obu baahikireyo, baatemba omu kainabiri, nambere banu boona baikaire: Petero na Yohaana, Yakobbo na Andereya, Filipo na Tomasi, Batolomayo na Matayo, Yakobbo mutabani w'Alifaayo na Simooni Omurwanirizi w'ihanga Iye, hamu na Yuda mutabani wa Yakobbo.
44001014	Abo boona bakaikara hamu bataireho muno omutima ha kusaba, baina na Mariya nyina Yesu hamu n'aboruganda rwe.
44001015	Omu biro ebi, Petero akeemerra hagati y'abagenzi be (abakaba nibahika nka kikumi n'abiri), yabagambira ati:
44001016	“Bagenzi bange, Ebyahandiikirwe bisemeriire kuhikirizibwa. Nibyo Mwoyo Ahikiriire ebi yagambisize Daudi, naaranga hali Yuda ayayebembiire abo abaakwasire Yesu.
44001017	Ningira uwe akaba naabalirwa omuli itwe, kandi akaba ahairwe omugabo gwe omu buheereza bwaitu bunu. (
44001018	Baitu omusaija ogu, sente ezi yasaswirwe habw'ekibi kye, akaiguramu omusiri. Hanyuma yayekenya hansi, yahuulika enda, amara goona gaseeseka.
44001019	Eki kikamanywa boona abaikaraga Yerusaalemu; nikyo omusiri ogu, omu ngambo yabo, gwayetiirwe Akelidama, amakuru gaakyo: Omusiri gw'Esagama.)
44001020	Nkooku kyahandiikirwe omu Kitabu kya Zabbuli kiti: ‘Eka ye, leka efooke kifurukwa, hatalibaho n'omu agiikaramu.’ Kandi kiti: ‘Omulimo gwe gutwarwe ondi.’
44001021	“Nahabweki tusemeriire kukoma omu ha basaija aba twagendaga nabo ebiro byona MUKAMA Yesu ebi yamazire na itwe,
44001022	okurugirra Yohaana obu akaba naabatiza, okuhika ha kiro Yesu eki yatwihiirweho yatwarwa omu iguru. Leka omuntu ogu afooke kaiso hamu na itwe, agumye eby'okuhumbuuka kwa Yesu.”
44001023	Nubwo baaleeta amabara abiri: Yosefu arukwetwa Barasaba, abamu ou baayetaga Yusito, hamu n'ondi arukwetwa Matiya.
44001024	Nukwo boona kusaba nibagamba bati: “Ai MUKAMA, iwe arukumanya emitima y'abantu boona, hali banu bombi otwoleke ou okomere,
44001025	kutwara obuheereza bunu n'obukwenda Yuda obu yanagire yayegendera.”
44001026	Baabaterra itomo, lyakwata Matiya; yabalirwa omu bakwenda ikumi n'omu.
44002001	Ekiro kya Pentikooti obu kyahikire, boona bakaba beesoroliize omu kiikaro kimu.
44002002	Ahonaaho okuhirra kukaruga omu iguru, kwaija nk'ekiyaga ky'amaani, kwaijuliza kimu enju nambere bakaba baikaliire.
44002003	Haazooka endimi nk'ez'omurro, zayebaganiizemu, nizaakira ha mutwe gwa buli omu omuli bo.
44002004	Boona baijura Mwoyo Ahikiriire, baatandika kubaza endimi ezindi, nkooku Mwoyo yabahaire kuzibaza.
44002005	Kasumi ako, omu Yerusaalemu, hakaba harumu Abayudaaya, abantu abeekambiire ediini, abakaba barugire omu mahanga goona agali omu nsi.
44002006	Ekitebe ky'abantu obu kyahuliire okuhirra oku, baayesorooleza hamu nibatangaara, habwokuba buli muntu akahurra abakwenda nibabaza omu rulimi rw'owaabu.
44002007	Boona baahunirra kandi baatangaara, nibeekaguza bati; “Banu boona abarukubaza tibali Bagaliraaya?
44002008	Hati kinu kiri kita, buli omu omuli itwe kubahurra nibabaza orulimi rw'owaitu nambere twazaalirwe?
44002009	Omuli itwe haroho Abapaati, Abameedi n'Abeeramiiti, hamu n'abantu abaikara Mesopotamiya, Buyudaaya na Kapadokiya, Ponto na Asiya,
44002010	Firigiya na Panfiliya, Misiri n'ebicweka bya Libbiya haihi na Kirene. Otaireho n'abagenyi abaarugire Rooma, nubo Abayudaaya n'abandi abahindukire bataaha omu diini y'Ekiyudaaya,
44002011	Abakureete n'Abaharabu. Itwena nitubahurra nibabaza omu ndimi zaitu ebikuru Ruhanga ebi yakozire.”
44002012	Boona baahunirra kandi baasoberwa, nukwo kukaguzangana bati: “Mara kinu nikimanyisa ki?”
44002013	Baitu abandi baasekereza abakwenda nibagamba bati: “Batamiire amarwa g'omutararra.”
44002014	Nubwo Petero yayemeriire hamu na ikumi n'omu, yabaliza haiguru naagamba ati: “Inywe bantu ba Buyudaaya, na boona abaikara Yerusaalemu, kinu mukyetegereze kandi mutege amatu kuhurra eki ndukwija kubagambira.
44002015	Abasaija banu tibatamiire, nkooku murukuteekereza; habwokuba hati saaha isatu za nyenkya.
44002016	Baitu kinu nikyo ekyarangirwe omurangi Yoweri ati:
44002017	‘Omu biro bya ha mpero abantu boona ndibaseesaho Mwoyo wange.’ Nukwo Ruhanga arukugamba. ‘Batabani banyu na bahara banyu baliranga ebya Ruhanga, abasigazi banyu balibonekerwa, n'abagurusi banyu baliroota ebirooto.
44002018	Ego, kandi omu biro ebi ndiseesa Mwoyo wange ha bairu bange na ha bazaana bange; nabo baliranga.
44002019	Ndyoleka ebyamahano omwiguru n'ebihuniriza omunsi: esagama, omurro, n'okucuuka kw'omwika.
44002020	Izooba liriraara n'okwezi kulinanata nk'esagama, ekiro kya MUKAMA kitakahikire, ekiro kikuru kandi ky'ekitiinisa kitakabaireho.
44002021	Kandi omuntu weena alyamirra ibara lya MUKAMA nubwo alijunwa.’
44002022	“Inywe basaija ba Isirairi, muhurre eki ndukwija kubagambira: Yesu owa Nazareeti, omuntu Ruhanga ou yabamanyisize n'eby'amaani, n'ebyamahano, n'ebihuniriza ebi yamukoleze hagati yanyu, inywena nkooku murukumanya
44002023	Yesu ogu obu yamazire kuheebwayo, entegeka ya Ruhanga nkooku ekaba eri kara koona ebintu binu bitakabaireho, mukamubamba ha musaraba, mwamwisa emikono y'abantu abatalemwa Biragiro byaitu.
44002024	Baitu Ruhanga akamuhumbuura, yamwiha omu busaalizi bw'orufu, habwokuba kikaba kitarukusoboka uwe kwikara omumaino garwo.
44002025	Kandi Daudi akamugambaho ati: ‘Obutoosa nyikaza Atahwaho mu maiso gange, habwokuba andi haihi na nyowe tinditengesebwa.
44002026	Nikyo omutima gwange gurukusemerererwa, nimbaza ebigambo by'omuhimbo kandi obu nkyali mwomeezi ndaikaraga nimwesiga.
44002027	Habwokuba tolindekera nkagenda Okuzimu, toliikiriza Enganzi yawe kujunda.
44002028	Ondagirra omuhanda gw'okumpikya ha kujunwa; okwikara omumaiso gaawe kulinyijuza okusemererwa kwona.’
44002029	“Bagenzi bange, busaho kugurukyagurukya: isenkuru itwe Daudi nawe akafa, yaziikwa, n'okuhika hati ekituuro kye kiri owaitu hanu.
44002030	Habw'okusangwa ali murangi, na habw'okumanya Ruhanga nkooku yamurahiire ati: Omu ha baijukuru be alimwikaliza ha kitebe ky'obukama bwe,
44002031	Daudi akamanya kara kandi yabaza ha kuhumbuuka kwa Kristo, nkooku atarasingirwe Kuzimu, kandi n'omubiri gwe nkooku gutarajunzire.
44002032	Yesu ogu, Ruhanga akamuhumbuura; kandi eki itwena nitukijurra.
44002033	Obu yamazire kunyumizibwa ali ha mukono gw'obulyo gwa Ruhanga kandi amazire kuheebwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, Ise ou yamuraganiize, nuwe akozire ekihuniriza kinu eki murukurora kandi eki murukuhurra.
44002034	Mazimakwo Daudi atatembe omu iguru; baitu nuwe ayagambire ati: ‘Atahwaho akangambira MUKAMA wange ati: Ikarra ha mukono gwange ogw'obulyo,
44002035	okuhika abanyanzigwa baawe obu ndibafoora akatebe ak'ebigere byawe.’
44002036	“Ab'enju ya Isirairi boona leka bamanyire kimu Yesu ou mwabambire ha musaraba nkooku Ruhanga yamuhindwire, yamufoora MUKAMA kandi Kristo.”
44002037	Abantu obu baahuliire ebi, omutima gwabasarra, baakaguza Petero n'abakwenda abandi bati; “Bagenzi baitu, turaakora ki?”
44002038	Petero yabagarukamu ati; “Mwegarukemu. Buli omu omuli inywe abatizibwe omu ibara lya Yesu Kristo, nukwo muganyirwe ebibi byanyu. Kandi muliheebwa ekisembo kya Ruhanga, nuwe Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
44002039	Habwokuba okuraganizibwa oku: kwanyu, n'okw'abaana banyu, kandi kw'abandi boona abakyali, boona MUKAMA Ruhanga aba araayetaga.”
44002040	Petero akabasoborra n'ebindi bingi naabateererra ati: “Mwejune, muruge omu bantu b'obusinge bunu obuhabire.”
44002041	Abo abaikiriize ebigambo bye bakabatizibwa. Ha kiro eki, ha muhendo gw'abaikiriza hakongerwaho abantu nk'enkumi isatu.
44002042	Abaikiriza abo boona bakaikara nibeekambira enyegesa z'abakwenda, nibateerana nabo omu kucwa omugaati n'omu kusaba.
44002043	Abantu boona bakatiina habw'ebyamahano bingi n'ebihuniriza ebyakozirwe abakwenda.
44002044	Abaikiriize boona baikaraga hamu, kandi n'ebintu byabo byona baabibaganaga hamu.
44002045	Baatundaga ebintu byabo hamu n'itungo lyabo. Ebyarugamuga babibagana, baha buli muntu nkooku yayetaagaga.
44002046	Buli kiro baayesoroolezaaga omunju ya Ruhanga kandi baateeraniraga mu maka gaabo kucwamu omugaati. Baalyaaga ebyokulya byabo n'okusemererwa, baina omutima murungi,
44002047	nibakugiza Ruhanga kandi nibasiimwa abantu boona. Buli kiro MUKAMA yayongerahoga omuhendo gw'abo abarukujunwa.
44003001	Kiro kimu Petero na Yohaana bakaba nibagenda omunju ya Ruhanga ha saaha y'okusaba, niyo saaha ya mwenda.
44003002	Baarora abahimbire omuntu nibamurabyaho. Omuntu ogu akaba azairwe ali mulema. Buli kiro baamuhimbaga, baamuta ha irembo ly'Enju ya Ruhanga erirukwetwa Erirungi, asabirize abo abataahamuga.
44003003	Omusaija ogu obu yarozire Petero na Yohaana nibaija kutaaha omunju ya Ruhanga, yabasaba bamuhe akantu.
44003004	Petero ow'akaba ali na Yohaana yamugumyaho amaiso, yamugambira ati: “Turolerre.”
44003005	Nawe yabataho amaiso, naanihira ngu, baramuha akantu.
44003006	Baitu Petero yagamba ati: “Efeeza n'ezaabbu tinyinabyo, baitu ninkuha eki nyinakyo. Omu ibara lya Yesu Kristo owa Nazareeti, imuka orubate.”
44003007	Petero yamukwata omukono gw'obulyo, yamwimukya. Ahonaaho amaguru ge n'ebigere bye byatunga amaani.
44003008	Yabandaatuka, yayemerra, yatandika kurubata, yataaha nabo omunju ya Ruhanga naarubata, naaguruka, kandi naakugiza Ruhanga.
44003009	Abantu boona obu baamurozire naarubata kandi naakugiza Ruhanga,
44003010	baamumanyirra nkooku nuwe ayaikaraga naasabiiriza ha Irembo Erirungi ery'Enju ya Ruhanga, baahunirra muno kandi baatangaara habw'eki ekimubaireho.
44003011	Omusaija ogu, obu akaba akyagumiireho Petero na Yohaana, abantu boona babaizira nibairuka, bali omu kisasi ky'omulyango ekirukwetwa ekya Solomooni, nibahunirra muno.
44003012	Petero obu yarozire eki, yatandika kubeegesa ati: “Inywe basaija ba Isirairi, kinu nikibahunirizaho ki? Habwaki nimutuhanga amaiso nk'abarukuteekereza ngu, obusobozi rundi oburungi bwaitu nibyo byarubasa omusaija onu?
44003013	Ruhanga owa Abburahamu, Isaaka na Yakobbo, Ruhanga ow'abaisenkuru itwe, nuwe yanyumiize omuheereza we Yesu, ou mwahaireyo mwamwehakanira omu maiso ga Pilaato, obu akaba amaliriire kumulekera.
44003014	Baitu inywe mukeehakana ogu Arukwera kandi Ahikiriire, mwasaba okuheebwa omwisi w'abantu,
44003015	kandi mwaita ou turukweta endugirro y'obwomeezi. Nuwe ogu Ruhanga ou yahumbwire omu bafu, kandi niitwe bakaiso b'ekintu eki.
44003016	Okwikiriza ibara lya Yesu n'obusobozi bwe nibyo byagarurra amaani omusaija onu, ou murukurora kandi ou murukumanya. Okwikiriza Yesu nukwo kwamukiriza kimu inywena nkooku murukurora.
44003017	“Hati nu bagenzi bange, nimmanya ngu, inywe n'abeebembezi banyu eki mukakikora habw'obutamanya.
44003018	Baitu Ruhanga nukwo yahikiriize ati eki yarangisize abarangi boona ngu, Kristo we alibonabonesibwa.
44003019	Nahabweki mwegarukemu, muhindukire Ruhanga, ebibi byanyu biihweho. Obu nubwo MUKAMA araabaha ebiro eby'okuhuumuzibwamu,
44003020	kandi abatumire Kristo ou yabategekiire.
44003021	Nuwe Yesu anyakwikara omwiguru okuhika akasumi k'okugarurramu buhyaka ebintu byona, Ruhanga nkooku yarangisize abarangi be abahikiriire okuruga kara.
44003022	Mazimakwo Musa akagamba ati: ‘Omu bagenzi banyu, MUKAMA Ruhanga naija kubaimukizamu omurangi ondi, nka nyowe oku yanyimukize. Byona ebi araakabagambiraga, mubihikirize.
44003023	Omuntu weena atalihurra murangi ogu, alihwerekerezibwa, aihwe omu bantu ba Ruhanga.’
44003024	Kandi abarangi boona abaarangire ebya Ruhanga, okuruga hali Samwiri n'abo abaamuhondiire, nukwo baarangire bati ha biro binu.
44003025	Inywe muli baijukuru b'abarangi kandi bagwetwa b'endagaano Ruhanga ei yaraganiize baisenkuru inywe, naagambira Abburahamu ati: ‘Omu ruzaaro rwawe, enganda zoona ez'ensi numwo ziriheerwa omugisa.’
44003026	Ruhanga obu yahumbwire omwana we, akabanza kumutuma hali inywe Abayudaaya, abahe omugisa naiha buli omu omuli inywe omu ngeso ze ezitahikire.”
44004001	Petero na Yohaana obu bakaba nibakyabaza n'abantu, banyakatagara baabaizira baina omulinzi omukuru w'Enju ya Ruhanga hamu n'Abasadukaayo.
44004002	Bbo babihiirwe habw'okuhurra Petero na Yohaana nibeegesa kandi nibarangirra okuhumbuuka kw'abafu okwatandikire na Yesu.
44004003	Baabakwata, baabalindira omu nkomo okuhika nyenkya, habwokuba bukaba bwizire.
44004004	Baitu baingi omuli abo abaahuliire enyegesa yabu bakaikiriza; n'omuhendo gw'abaikiriza gwayeyongera, gwahika nk'enkumi itaano.
44004005	Obu bwakiire nyenkya, abalemi baabo hamu n'abakuru b'enganda n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro bakeesorooleza Yerusaalemu,
44004006	baina Annasi mukuru w' abanyakatagara, Kaayafa, Yohaana, Alekizanda, n'abandi boona ab'oruganda rw'omukuru wa banyakatagara.
44004007	Obu baayemeriize abanyankomo hagati, baatandika kubakaguza bati: “Busobozi ki obubakoleze binu, rundi mubikozire omu ibara ly'oha?”
44004008	Petero, aijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire, yabagarukamu ati: “Inywe abalemi b'abantu n'abakuru b'enganda,
44004009	obu muraaba nimutukaguza hati habw'ekikorwa ky'embabazi eki tukoliire omuntu ogu omulema kandi nkooku akiziibwe,
44004010	inywe inywena hamu n'abantu ba Isirairi boona mumanye ngu, omu ibara lya Yesu Kristo owa Nazareeti ou mwabambire hamusaraba, Ruhanga ou yahumbwire omu bafu, habw'Ogu, omusaija onu nikyo ayemereriire omu maiso ganyu akizire.
44004011	Yesu ogu niryo ibaale inywe abombeki eri mwayangire, baitu niryo lyafookere bugumizo bw'enju.
44004012	Tiharoho ondi asobora kutujuna, habwokuba busaho ibara lindi hansi y'iguru eryahairwe abantu erisobora kutujuna.”
44004013	Ab'orukurato obu baarozire obumanzi bwa Petero na Yohaana, kandi baabamanya nkooku bali bantu kwonka abateegesiibwe, baahunirra. Baabamanya nkooku bali nubo abakaba nibaikara na Yesu.
44004014	Obu baarozire omusaija ayakiziibwe abeemeriire ha rubaju, baaburwa eki baraabahakaniza.
44004015	Nukwo kubaragira kuturuka aheeru, bbo bahanule bonka,
44004016	nibakaguzangana bati: “Abasaija banu tubakole ki? Habwokuba baakozire ekyamahano ekirangainwe kandi ekimanyirwe abantu boona abaikara Yerusaalemu, titukyasobora kukyehakana.
44004017	Kyonka habw'okukiculeeza kireke kweyongera kurangaanwa hoona omu bantu ka tubakange; balekere aho kugambira omuntu weena omu ibara eri.”
44004018	Nukwo kweta abakwenda, baabateererra kutagaruka kugamba rundi kwegesa omu ibara lya Yesu.
44004019	Baitu Petero na Yohaana baabagarukamu bati: “Na inywe mukicwemu, obu kiraaba kihikire omu maiso ga Ruhanga itwe okubahurra okukira Ruhanga.
44004020	Kyonka, ebi twarozire n'ebi twahuliire titusobora kubiculerra.”
44004021	Ab'orukurato baayongera kubakanga, hanyuma baabalekera, habw'okuburwa obulyo obu baraabafubirraho. Kandi abantu boona bakaba nibakugiza Ruhanga habw'eki ekyabaireho.
44004022	Bakamanya omusaija ogu ayakozirweho ekyamahano eki eky'okukizibwa, nkooku akaba ahingwize emyaka makumi ana ey'obukuru.
44004023	Petero na Yohaana obu baalekiirwe, baagenda hali ab'ekitebe kyabu, baabamanyisa byona banyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'enganda ebi baabagambiire.
44004024	Obu baabihuliire, boona baimukiza Ruhanga amaraka nibamusaba bati: “Ai Mukama Rutakirwa, niiwe ayahangire iguru n'ensi, n'enyanja, n'ebinyakubirumu byona,
44004025	niiwe ayayekonyiize Mwoyo Ahikiriire kugambisa isenkuru-itwe Daudi omuheereza waawe oti: ‘Habwaki amahanga geekoba kukora kubi, habwaki abantu bahanurra busa ebitarumu?
44004026	Abakama b'ensi nibeetekaniriza obulemu, n'abalemi bakeesorooza hamu kurwanisa Atahwaho n'okurwanisa MUKAMA we ou yayekomiire.’
44004027	Kyamazima omu rubuga runu, Herode na Ponsio Pilaato bakeeteeraniza n'Abanyamahanga n'abantu ba Isirairi kurwanisa omwana waawe ahikiriire Yesu ou wayekomiire abe Mukama.
44004028	Nukwo bahikiriize bati ebi wategekere ira omu magezi gaawe n'omu busobozi bwawe ngu kibeho.
44004029	Hati nu, Ai MUKAMA, rora nkooku barukutukangisa, okoonyere abaheereza baawe kubaza ekigambo kyawe n'obumanzi bwona.
44004030	Gorra omukono gwawe, okize; kandi oikirize ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano bikorwe omu ibara ly'omwana waawe ahikiriire Yesu.”
44004031	Obu baamazire kusaba, ekiikaro ha bakaba beesoroliize kyatengeeta; boona baijura Mwoyo Ahikiriire, baatandika kubaza ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'obumanzi.
44004032	Ekitebe kyona eky'abaikiriza bakaba baina omutima gumu n'omwoyo gumu. Hakaba hataroho n'omu omuli bo ayagizire ngu, byona ebi yatungire bye wenka; baitu byona bikaba biri by'abo boona.
44004033	Abakwenda bakongera kujurra okuhumbuuka kwa MUKAMA Yesu n'obumanzi bwingi, kandi embabazi za MUKAMA zaikaraga hali bo.
44004034	Omuli bo hakaba hatarumu n'omu ayaburwahoga ekintu, habwokuba boona abakaba baina ebibanja rundi amaju bakabitunda, baaleeta sente ezi baihiremu,
44004035	baaziha abakwenda. Bbo baazigabira buli omu nkooku yayetaagaga.
44004036	Hakaba haroho omusaija ow'oruganda rwa Leevi, enzaarwa ya Kipuro, arukwetwa Yosefu, abakwenda ou baayesire Baranaba (amakuru gaalyo: Mwekambisa).
44004037	Uwe akatunda ekibanja eki akaba ainakyo, yaleeta sente, yaziha abakwenda.
44005001	Hakaba haroho omusaija arukwetwa Ananiya. Uwe hamu na mukazi we Safiira bakatunda ekimu ha bibanja byabo.
44005002	Baitu Ananiya yasigaza ekicweka kya sente ezaarugiremu, amazire kwikirraniza na mukazi we. Yaleetaho ekicweka ekisigaireho, yakikwasa abakwenda.
44005003	Petero nukwo kumukaguza ati: “Ananiya, Sitaani ataahire ata omu mutima gwawe kubiiha Mwoyo Ahikiriire, okasigaza ekicweka kya sente ez'otunzire omu kibanja?
44005004	Obu okaba otakakitunzire, kikaba kitali kyawe bweremera? Kandi obu wamazire kukitunda, sente zaakyo okaba otarukusobora kwikoza nkooku orukwenda? Ekiteekerezo eki kikaija kita omu mutima gwawe? Tobiihire bantu, baitu obiihire Ruhanga.”
44005005	Ananiya obu yahuliire ebigambo ebi, yagwa hansi, yakanguka. Kandi eki kyatiinisa muno boona abaakihuliire.
44005006	Abasigazi baimuka, baazinga omutumbi gwe omu rugoye, baaguturukya, baaguziika.
44005007	Obu haahingwireho esaaha nka isatu, mukazi we yaija atamanyire ekibaireho.
44005008	Nukwo Petero kumukaguza ati: “Ngambira, omuhendo gunu nugwo mwatunzire omu kibanja?” Nandiki mukazi ati: “Ego, nugwo ogu.”
44005009	Nubwo Petero yamukagwize ati: “Habwaki mwikirraniize kwohya Mwoyo wa Ruhanga. Emirindi egi noogihurra? Y'abantu abarukuruga kuziika baro, bali ha irembo; na iwe nibaija kukuturukya.”
44005010	Ahonaaho omukazi ogu yagwa hansi ha bigere bya Petero, yakanguka. Abasigazi obu baataahiremu, baasanga afiire ira; baamuturukya, baamuziika ha rubaju rwa iba.
44005011	Obutiini bwakwata ekitebe kyona eky'abaikiriza n'abandi boona abaahuliire ebigambo ebi.
44005012	Omu kasumi ako abakwenda bakaba nibakora ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano bingi omu bantu. Abaikiriza boona baayesoroolezaaga omu kisasi ky'omulyango gwa Solomooni, baina omutima gumu.
44005013	Baitu abandi abatali b'ekitebe kyabo, busaho n'omu ayayehoiremu kuteerana nabo, noobu baraaba basiimirwe abantu boona.
44005014	Kandi omuhendo gw'abasaija n'abakazi abaikiriize MUKAMA gukeeyongera muno kukira kara.
44005015	Baatwaraaga abarwaire baabo, baabata ha nguudo, baababyamya ha butabu na ha mikeeka, nukwo ekiituuru kya Petero kibahikeho obu araaba naahingura.
44005016	Abantu baaruga omu byaro ebiherraine Yerusaalemu, baayesorooleza aho, baleesire abarwaire n'abakwasirwe emyoyo emibi, boona baakizibwa.
44005017	Omu kasumi ako, omukuru w'abanyakatagara akaimuka, hamu n'ab'ekitebe ky'Abasadukaayo aba akaba ainabo. Boona baijwire ihali,
44005018	baakwata abakwenda, baabata omu nkomo ei baatamuga abantu boona.
44005019	Baitu ekiro, malaika wa MUKAMA yakingura enyigi z'enkomo, yabaturukya aheeru, yagamba ati:
44005020	“Mugende, mwemerre omunju ya Ruhanga, mugambire abantu ebigambo byona eby'obwomeezi bunu obuhyaka.”
44005021	Obu baahuliire eki, baataaha omunju ya Ruhanga obwire nibukyanganyka, baatandika kwegesa. Nubwo mukuru w'abanyakatagara yaizire n'abakonyezi be, yasorooza orukurato rukuru n'abakuru boona aba Isirairi, yatuma omu nkomo, abalinzi baleete abakwenda.
44005022	Baitu abakuru b'abaserikale obu baahikire omu nkomo, baasanga batarumu, nubwo baagarukire baamanyisa orukurato bati:
44005023	“Twasanga enkomo ekingirwe kurungi mali, n'abalinzi beemeriire ha miryango; baitu obu tukingwireho, omunda titwasangamu muntu.”
44005024	Omukuru w'abalinzi b'Enju ya Ruhanga hamu n'abanyakatagara abakuru, obu baahuliire amakuru ago, baatuntura muno, batarukumanya ebigambo ebi nambere biraagarukira.
44005025	Nubwo haizire omuntu ayabaleetiire amakuru naagamba ati: “Abasaija aba mwataire omu nkomo, hati beemeriire omunju ya Ruhanga nibeegesa abantu.”
44005026	Omukuru w'abalinzi b'Enju ya Ruhanga n'abakuru b'abaserikale baagenda, baabaihayo mpora, nibatiina kubakwasa amaani, nukwo abantu batabateera amabaale.
44005027	Obu baabaleesire, baabeemereza omu rukurato hagati, mukuru w'abanyakatagara yabakaguza ati:
44005028	“Tukabateererra kutagaruka kwegesa omu ibara ly'omuntu ogu, baitu hati Yerusaalemu mugiijwize enyegesa yanyu, kandi mwegesa nk'abarukugenderra kutukwasa omusango ogw'esagama y'omuntu ogu!”
44005029	Petero n'abakwenda abandi baamugarukamu bati: “Itwe tusemeriire kworobera Ruhanga kukira kworobera abantu.
44005030	Ruhanga wa baisenkuruitwe akahumbuura Yesu, inywe ou mwaisire nimumuhanika ha muti.
44005031	Baitu Ruhanga akamunyumiza, yamuta ha mukono gwe ogw'obulyo abe Omwebembezi kandi Omujuni, habw'okwegarukisamu Abaisirairi n'okubaganyiza ebibi.
44005032	Itwe tuli bakaiso b'ebi byona, hamu na Mwoyo Ahikiriire, Ruhanga ou yahaire abo abamworobera.”
44005033	Ab'orukurato obu baahuliire ebi, baabihirwa muno, baagonza kubaita.
44005034	Baitu omu rukurato, hakaba harumu Omufalisaayo arukwetwa Gamalyeri, omwegesa w'ebiragiro, abantu boona ou baatamuga ekitiinisa. Uwe akeemerra, yabasaba abasaija abo babaturukyeho aheeru.
44005035	Hanyuma, ab'orukurato yabagambira ati: “Inywe basaija ba Isirairi, mwegendereze eki murukukora abantu banu.
44005036	Omu biro ebyahingwire, Tehuda, omusaija omubi, akaimuka yayeyeta mwebembezi omukuru, kandi abantu nk'ebikumi bbina bakamukuraatira. Baitu omusaija ogu obu yaisirwe, abaamuhondiire boona baararanga, n'ebyabo byagarukira aho.
44005037	Ogu obu yahoireho, hakaimuka Yuda Omugaliraaya, omu biro by'okubara abantu, yayemesa baingi; baitu nawe akaitwa, na boona abamukuraatiire baararanga.
44005038	Hati amagezi ndukubaha nugo ganu: Abantu abo mubagendeho mpora, mubaleke; habwokuba enyegesa enu n'ebikorwa binu obu biraaba birugire omu bantu, birihwaho.
44005039	Baitu obu biraaba biri bya Ruhanga, timulisobora kubihwerekereza. Mwerinde mutaikara kuba nimurwana na Ruhanga!”
44005040	Ab'orukurato baikiriza amagezi aga yabahaire. Obu bataahize abakwenda, baaragira babateere enkoba, kandi baabateererra kutagaruka kwegesa omu ibara lya Yesu. Hanyuma baabalekera.
44005041	Abakwenda baaruga omu rukurato baina omuhimbo habw'okugaywa nibaturwa ibara lya Yesu.
44005042	Kandi buli kiro baayegesaaga omunju ya Ruhanga n'omu maka g'abantu nibarangirra abantu Yesu nkooku ali Kristo.
44006001	Omu biro ebi, abeegesebwa obu baayeyongiire kukanya, Abayudaaya abaabazaaga Orugiriiki baahyemera Abayudaaya abaabazaaga Oruhebburaayo, habwokuba abafaakati baabo bakaba batarukufibwaho omu kugabirwa ebintu okw'obutoosa.
44006002	Nubwo ikumi na babiri baayesire ekitebe ky'abeegesebwa boona, baabagambira bati: “Tikihikire itwe okuleka kurangirra ekigambo kya Ruhanga tukagenda ha kugaba ebyokulya.
44006003	Nahabweki bagenzi baitu, mukome omuli inywe abasaija musanju abarukusiimwa abantu, abaijwire Mwoyo wa Ruhanga n'amagezi, tubakwase omulimo gunu.
44006004	Baitu itwe nitwija kwekambira kusaba n'okwegesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga.”
44006005	Ekihanuuro eki kyasiimwa ekitebe kyona, baakoma Sitefano, omusaija anyakwina okwikiriza kwingi kandi anyakwijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire, baakoma Filipo na Porokooro, Nikanoori na Timooni, Paamena na Nikola owa Antyokiya ayahindukire yataaha omu diini y'ekiyudaaya.
44006006	Abo baabaleeta omumaiso g'abakwenda, baabasabira, abakwenda baabataho emikono.
44006007	Ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyayeyongera, n'omuhendo gw'abeegesebwa gwakanya muno omu Yerusaalemu, kandi banyakatagara baingi baikiriza kuhondera enyikiriza egi.
44006008	Sitefano, Ruhanga ou yahaire emigisa nyingi n'amaani, akatandika kukora ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano omu bantu.
44006009	Nukwo abantu kwimuka kumuteeza empaka, abamu nibaruga omu isorrokaniro ly'Abaalekiirwe (nkooku lyayetwaga) n'Abakirene n'Aba Alekizanderiya, kandi n'abandi abaarugire Kilikiya na Asiya.
44006010	Bbo batasobole kumusingura habw'amagezi yahairwe hamu n'ebi Mwoyo wa Ruhanga ebi yamugambisize.
44006011	Nukwo kugulirra abantu ab'okumuhangirra bati: “Tukahurra naagamba eby'okujuma Musa na Ruhanga.”
44006012	Obu baamazire kwimukiriza abantu n'abakuru baabo hamu n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, baamwizira, baamukwata, baamuleeta omu rukurato.
44006013	Baayemereza aho bakaiso b'ebisuba abaagizire bati: “Omusaija onu tayosa kugamba kubi ha kiikaro kinu ekirukwera na ha Biragiro byaitu.
44006014	Tukamuhurra naayegesa ati: Yesu owa Nazareeti alihwerekereza ekiikaro kinu, kandi alihindura engeso Musa ezi yatusigiire.”
44006015	Boona abakaba baikaliire omu rukurato obu bahangire Sitefano amaiso, baarora amaiso ge nigangasana nk'aga malaika.
44007001	Mukuru wa banyakatagara akakaguza Sitefano ati: “Ebigambo binu by'amazima?”
44007002	Uwe yamugarukamu ati: “Bagenzi bange na bataata, mumpuliirize! Ruhanga ow'ekitiinisa akabonekera isenkuru-itwe Abburahamu, obu akaba akyali Mesopotamiya, atakagenzire kwikara Haraani,
44007003	yamugambira ati: ‘Ruga omu nsi y'owanyu n'omu beene banyu, ogende omunsi ei ndikwoleka.’
44007004	Nawe nukwo kuruga omunsi y'Abakalidaaya, yagenda kwikara Haraani. Ise obu yamazire kufa, Ruhanga yamwihayo, yamuleeta omunsi enu ei murumu hati.
44007005	Baitu atamuhemu bugwetwa, nangwa, noobu haakuba h'okuta ekigere; kyonka akaraganiza kumuha ensi, ebe butaka bwe n'abaijukuru be, noobu aliba yabaire ataina mwana omu kasumi ako.
44007006	Ruhanga yayongeraho binu ati: Abaijukuru baawe balisuhuukira omu nsi endi mbere abantu balibafoora bairu rubaale kandi balibakora kubi kumara emyaka bikumi bbina.
44007007	Ruhanga yayongera ati: ‘Ihanga eriribaikaza liti, ndiricwera omusango, nukwo hanyuma barugeyo, bandamize omu kiikaro kinu.’
44007008	Nubwo yamuhaire endagaano y'omugenzo gw'okusarwa. Kandi omutabani we Isaaka obu yazairwe, Abburahamu yamusara ha kiro kya munaana. Isaaka nawe nukwo yasazire Yakobbo; na Yakobbo yasara ati baisenkuruitwe ikumi na babiri.
44007009	“Baisenkuru itwe abo habw'okukwatirwa Yosefu ihali, baamutunza abantu abaamutwaire Misiri. Baitu Ruhanga yaikara nawe,
44007010	yamwiha omu mihito ye, yamuha amagezi agamukonyiire kusiimwa Faraaho, omukama wa Misiri. Faraaho akamufoora mulemi mukuru wa Misiri kandi omuroleerezi w'ekikaali kye kyona.
44007011	Hanyuma hakagwa kiihe omunsi Misiri yoona n'eya Kanaani, haabaho omuhito mwingi. Baisenkuru itwe baaburwa ebyokulya.
44007012	Baitu Yakobbo obu yahuliire nkooku Misiri haliyo engano erukutundwa, yatumayo baisenkuruitwe omurundi gw'okubanza.
44007013	Kandi ha murundi gwa kabiri, Yosefu yayetondera bakuru be, nukwo Faraaho kumanya oruganda rwe.
44007014	Aho Yosefu yatuma bamwetere Yakobbo ise n'ab'oruganda rwe boona, abantu nsanju na bataano.
44007015	Yakobbo yagenda Misiri, kandi oku nuho yagwire hamu n'abaisenkuruitwe,
44007016	emitumbi yaabu yatwarwa Sekemu, yaziikwa omu kituuro Abburahamu eki akaba aguzireho batabani ba Hamori owa Sekemu.
44007017	“Baitu akasumi ak'okuhikiriza endagaano Ruhanga ei yaraganiize Abburahamu obu kairiire haihi, abantu bakakanya baahingurana omunsi Misiri,
44007018	okuhika engoma obu yaliirwe omukama ondi ow'akaba atamanyire Yosefu.
44007019	Ogu yacwera ihanga lyaitu amagezi, yahambiriza baisenkuruitwe kunaga abaana baabo enkerembe, bafe.
44007020	Omu kasumi ako Musa nubwo yazairwe, ali mwana murungi anyakusiimwa Ruhanga. Akoororwa omunju ya ise kumara ameezi asatu.
44007021	Baitu uwe obu yanagirwe, muhara wa Faraaho yamuzoora, yamutwara, yamworoora nk'omwana we nyabwe.
44007022	Musa akatendekwa amagezi goona ag'Abamisiri, kandi akaba ali w'amaani omu bigambo n'omu bikorwa bye.
44007023	“Musa obu yahikize emyaka makumi ana ey'obukuru, yaizirwa ekiteekerezo eky'okubungira ab'ihanga lye Abaisirairi.
44007024	Obu yarozire omu hali bo naakorwa kubi, yamurwanirra, yamuhorra enzigu, naateera Omumisiri.
44007025	Akanihira ngu bagenzi be bakengere nkooku nuwe Ruhanga yatumire kubaiha mu bwiru rubaale, baitu bbo batakimanye.
44007026	Ha kiro ekyakurasireho, yasanga babiri mulibo nibarwana, yagonza abaramule abateeranize, nukwo kubagambira ati: ‘Basaija inywe, habwaki nimukorangana kubi, kunu muli iseemu?’
44007027	Ogu ayabaire naakora kubi mugenzi we yamusindika kuli naagamba ati: ‘Nooha ayakuhaire obusobozi obw'okutulema n'okutucwera emisango?
44007028	Nooyenda kuunyita nkooku waisire Omumisiri ijo?’
44007029	Musa obu yahuliire eki, yairuka, yasuhuukira omunsi ya Midiyani. Oku nuho yazaaliire abatabani babiri.
44007030	“Obu haahingwireho emyaka makumi ana, malaika yamubonekera omu ndimi z'omurro, ogukaba nigwakira omu rusaka, omwirungu erinyakuheriire Orusozi Sinai.
44007031	Musa, obu yarozire omurro ogu, yahunirra. Obu yairiire haihi kwetegereza, yahurra iraka lya MUKAMA nirigamba liti:
44007032	‘Ninyowe Ruhanga w'abaswenkuru. Ruhanga wa Abburahamu, Isaaka n'owa Yakobbo.’ Musa yatukumira, yatiina n'okugumyaho amaiso.
44007033	MUKAMA yamugambira ati: ‘Juuramu enkaito zaawe, habwokuba ekiikaro nambere oyemeriire nikyera.
44007034	Mazimakwo ndozire abantu bange abali omu Misiri nkooku barukukorwa kubi, kandi mpuliire okusinda kwabo; nyizire kubaiha mu bwiru bwabo. Hati nu ija, nkutume Misiri.’
44007035	“Nahabweki Musa ogu, abantu ou baayangire nibagamba bati: ‘Nooha yakuhaire obusobozi obw'okutulema n'okutucwera emisango?’ nuwe ogu Ruhanga ou yatumire abe mwebembezi kandi mucunguzi waabo, naabajunisa obusobozi bwa malaika ayamubonekiire omu rusaka.
44007036	Musa obu yamazire kukora ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano omu Misiri, akabaihayo nabarabya omu Nyanja Erukutukura, n'omu irungu nambere baamazire emyaka makumi ana.
44007037	Ogu nuwe Musa ayagambiire Abaisirairi ati: ‘Omu bagenzi banyu Ruhanga naija kubaimukizaamu omurangi ondi, nka nyowe oku yanyimukize.’
44007038	Musa ogu nuwe akaba aina ekitebe kyona ky'abantu omu irungu, aina na malaika ayabalize nawe ha rusozi Sinai, kandi Musa nuwe ogu ayabalize n'abaisenkuru itwe bwire obu bwona. Nuwe yakwasiibwe ebigambo by'obwomeezi kubituhikyaho.
44007039	“Baisenkuru itwe bakanga kumuhurra, baamucuma kuli; kandi omu mitima yabu bakagonza kugaruka Misiri,
44007040	baagambira Arooni bati: ‘Tukorre baruhanga ab'okutwebembera; habwokuba Musa ogu ayatwihire omunsi ya Misiri, titurukumanya nkooku abaire.’
44007041	Nukwo kuheesa ekisisani ky'enyana, baakihongera ekyonzira, baasemerererwa ekintu ki baayekoliire.
44007042	Ruhanga akabahwamu, yabaleka baramye ihe ery'enyunyuuzi ez'omu iguru, nkooku kyahandiikirwe omu kitabu ky'abarangi kiti: ‘Inywe ab'omu ruganda rwa Isirairi, omu irungu mukampongera ebisoro ebinyakwisirwe n'ebyonzira kumara emyaka makumi ana.
44007043	Baitu mwarugayo mwayetwekaga eheema ya Moloki n'enyunyuuzi z'omucwezi Refani, nibyo ebisisani ebi mwayekoliire kuramya; nikyo ndibazaahiza mbahinguze Bbabbulooni.’
44007044	“Baisenkuru itwe bakaba baina Eheema omu irungu erukugumya Ruhanga nkooku yaikaraga nabo, niyo egi Ruhanga ei yaragiire Musa kukora narorra ha kisisani eki yamwolekere.
44007045	Eheema egi niyo baisenkuruitwe basigiirwe baisebo, bakagenda nayo okuhika Yoswa obu yagihikize omunsi egi ei baanyagireho abantu Ruhanga aba yabingiremu, baisenkuruitwe nibahikamu bati. Eheema yaikarayo okuhika omu businge bwa Daudi,
44007046	Ruhanga ou yagiriire embabazi. Daudi akasaba aikirizibwe kwombekera Ruhanga wa Yakobbo Enju.
44007047	Baitu Solomooni nuwe yamwombekiire Enju egi.
44007048	Kunu Rutakirwa taikara omu maju agombekerwe n'emikono y'abantu, omurangi nkooku yagambire ati:
44007049	‘Iguru nikyo kitebe kyange eky'obukama, kandi ensi nuko katebe k'ebigere byange. MUKAMA yayongera yakaguza ati: Nju ya mulingo ki ei mulinyombekera? Rundi kiikaro ki eki ndihumurramu?
44007050	Ebintu ebi byona bitakorwe mukono gwange?’
44007051	“Ntahurra inywe, ab'emitima egangaire n'amatu agatarukuhurra nk'ag'Abanyamahanga, butoosa mwangirra Mwoyo Ahikiriire. Baisenkuru inywe nkooku babaire nibakora, na inywe nukwo murukukora.
44007052	Murangi ki baisenkuru inywe ou batarahiiganiize? Bakaita abo abaarangire okwija kw'Omuhikiriire Ogu, ou mwagobiize kandi mwamwita.
44007053	Inywe abaahairwe Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga ebyaleesiirwe bamalaika, mwayanga kubikwata.”
44007054	Ab'orukurato obu baahuliire ebigambo ebi, baakwatwa ekiniga kingi, baamunenera ensaya.
44007055	Baitu Sitefano, aijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire, amaiso yagahanga ha lguru, yarora ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga, na Yesu amwemeriire ha mukono gw'obulyo.
44007056	Yagamba ati: “Nindora iguru likingwirwe n'Omwana w'omuntu ayemeriire ha mukono gw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga.”
44007057	Baitu bbo baatoka muno, baigara amatu gaabo, baamweseesaho.
44007058	Baamusindikiriza aheeru y'orubuga, baamuteeza amabaale. Kandi abakaiso abo ab'ebisuba baanaga ebijwaro byabo ha bigere by'omusigazi arukwetwa Saulo.
44007059	Sitefano, obu bakaba nibamuteeza amabale, yayesengereza ati: “MUKAMA Yesu, twara omwoyo gwange.”
44007060	Yateeza amaju, yayamirra n'iraka likooto ati: “Ai MUKAMA, ekibi kinu otakibajunaana.” Obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yakaba. Kandi Saulo akasiima okwitwa kwa Sitefano.
44008001	Ha kiro eki, abaikiriza aba Yerusaalemu bakatandika kuhiiganizibwa muno; kandi boona baararangira omu byaro bya Buyudaaya na Samaliya, kwihaho abakwenda bonka.
44008002	Abasaija abamu abaatiinaga Ruhanga bakaziika Sitefano, baamulirirra muno.
44008003	Baitu Saulo yaikara naahiiganiza abaikiriza Ruhanga naataaha omu buli nju, naakwata abasaija n'abakazi, naabata omu nkomo.
44008004	Abo abaararangire, bakagenda hoona nibeegesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
44008005	Filipo akagenda omu rubuga rwa Samaliya yabarangirra Kristo.
44008006	Ebitebe bingi by'abantu, obu baahuliire Filipo ebi arukwegesa, baarora ebihuniriza ebi arukukora, baabiikiriza n'omutima gumu.
44008007	Kandi baingi abakaba bakwasirwe emyoyo emibi, ekabarugamu neeyamuza. Baingi abakaba bazingamire n'abaramaire baakizibwa.
44008008	Haabaho okusemererwa kwingi omu rubuga oru.
44008009	Baitu omu rubuga oru hakaba haroho omusaija arukwetwa Simooni, ayakoraga eby'amasano, naahuniriza Abasamaliya, naayeyeta muntu mukuru.
44008010	Abantu boona ab'orulengo orwa hansi n'orwa haiguru baamutiinaga nibagamba bati: “Omusaija onu nuwe maani ga Ruhanga arukwetwa Rutakirwa.”
44008011	Kandi baamutiinaga, habwokuba akaba amazire omwanya mukooto naabahuniriza n'amasano ge.
44008012	Baitu obu baikiriize Amakuru Amarungi, Filipo aga yabarangiriire ha bukama bwa Ruhanga na ha ibara lya Yesu Kristo, baabatizibwa, abasaija n'abakazi.
44008013	Simooni nawe yaikiriza, kandi obu yamazire kubatizibwa, yaikaraga naagenda na Filipo. Obu yarozire ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano bikuru Filipo ebi yakozire, yahunirra muno.
44008014	Abakwenda abakaba bali Yerusaalemu obu baahuliire Abasamaliya nabo nkooku baikiriize ekigambo kya Ruhanga, baabatumaho Petero na Yohaana.
44008015	Obu baahikireyo baabasabira nukwo batunge Mwoyo Ahikiriire;
44008016	habwokuba busaho n'omu omuli bo ow'akaba atungire Mwoyo ogu, kwihaho kubatizibwa kwonka omu ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu.
44008017	Aho Petero na Yohaana baabataho emikono, baaheebwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
44008018	Simooni obu yarozire baatunga Mwoyo Ahikiriire habw'abakwenda kubataho emikono, yabaha sente,
44008019	naagamba ati: “Obusobozi obu na nyowe mubumpe, weena ou ndaatahoga emikono, atungege Mwoyo Ahikiriire.”
44008020	Baitu Petero yamugarukamu ati: “Kabule nazo sente zaawe, iwe anyakutekeriize kugura ekisembo kya Ruhanga na sente!
44008021	Ekintu kinu leka kukyetabamu, toinaho mugabo, habwokuba omutima gwawe tigusemiire omu maiso ga Ruhanga.
44008022	Nahabweki zira ekibi kyawe, osabe MUKAMA akuganyire ekiteekerezo eki.
44008023	Nyowe mmazire kwetegereza nkooku oijwire ihali kandi oboherwe ekibi.”
44008024	Nandiki Simooni ati: “Munsabire hali MUKAMA, byona ebi mwagamba haleke kubaho na kimu ekyampikaho.”
44008025	Abakwenda obu baamazire kuha obwakaiso n'okwegesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga, baagaruka Yerusaalemu nibarangirra Amakuru Amarungi omu byaro bingi eby'Abasamaliya.
44008026	Malaika wa MUKAMA akagambira Filipo ati: “Imuka ogende, okwate omuhanda ogw'obukiizi bw'obulyo, ogw'irungu, ogurukuruga Yerusaalemu nigugenda Gaaza.”
44008027	Yaimuka, yagenda. Omusaija wa Esiyopiya omukonwa, omuheereza wa Kandaake Omukamakati wa Esiyopiya, ow'akaba ali mukeeto w'ebintu bye byona, akaba aizire Yerusaalemu kuramya.
44008028	Omu kasumi ako akaba naagaruka owaabu, aikaliire omu kigaali kye, kandi naasoma Ekitabu kya Isaaya omurangi.
44008029	Mwoyo wa Ruhanga yagambira Filipo ati: “Irirra ekigaali eki, ogende nakyo.”
