44008030	Filipo yairuka, yamuhikaho, yamuhurra naasoma Ekitabu kya Isaaya omurangi, nukwo kumukaguza ati: “Ebi orukusoma ebi, noobyetegereza?”
44008031	Oli yamugarukamu ati: “Ndabyetegereza nta, hataroho ansoboroliire?” Yasaba Filipo atembe omu kigaali kye, aikarre nawe.
44008032	Ekicweka eky'omu Byahandiikirwe eki akaba naasoma nkinu: “Akaba nk'entaama erukutwarwa omu ibaagiro; rundi nk'akataama akali omumaiso g'omusazi w'ebyoya. Nawe nukwo atarayesamize kanwa ke.
44008033	Akeebundaaza kandi tiyacwerwa omu mazima. Busaho n'omu alibaza ha baijukuru be, habwokuba omunsi obwomeezi bwe bukacwibwaho!”
44008034	Nubwo omukonwa yakagwize Filipo ati: “Ninkusaba onsoborre: omurangi ogu, akabazaaho oha? Akeebazaaho wenka rundi akabazaaho omuntu ondi?”
44008035	Filipo yabandiza ha kyahandiikirwe eki, yamusoborra Amakuru Amarungi aga Yesu.
44008036	Obu bakaba nibakyagenda, baahika ha maizi agarukugera, omukonwa yagamba ati: “Dora amaizi nganu! Hati ekirukuntanga kubatizibwa kiraha?” [
44008037	Filipo yamugarukamu ati: “Obu oraaba noikiriza n'omutima gwawe gwona, nikisoboka.” Nandiki omukonwa ati: “Ninyikiriza Yesu Kristo nkooku ali Mwana wa Ruhanga.”]
44008038	Yaragira kwemereza ekigaali, bombi baaragara omu maizi, Filipo yamubatiza.
44008039	Obu baarugire omu maizi, Mwoyo wa MUKAMA yahwangura Filipo naamutwara handi, omukonwa tiyagaruka kumurora; yakwata omuhanda gwe yagenda n'omuhimbo.
44008040	Filipo akaija kurora, yayesanga ali Azooto, yayongera orugendo rwe naaraba omu mbuga zoona naarangirra Amakuru Amarungi okuhika obu yataahire Kaisaariya.
44009001	Omu biro ebi, Saulo obu akaba naakyakangisiriza kandi naahaya kwita abeegesebwa ba MUKAMA, yagenda hali omukuru w'abanyakatagara,
44009002	yamusaba ahandiikire amasorrokaniro ga Damasiko ebbaruha ezirukumwikiriza kukwata n'okutwara Yerusaalemu abasaija rundi abakazi abarukuhondera Omuhanda gwa MUKAMA kakuba abasangayo.
44009003	Obu akaba naakyagenda, ali haihi kuhika Damasiko, ahonaaho ekyererezi kyaruga omwiguru, kyamwehinguliriza.
44009004	Yagwa hansi, yahurra iraka nirimugamba liti: “Saulo, Saulo, nompiiganiriza ki?”
44009005	Nawe yakaguza ati; “Niiwe oha, Waitu?” Iraka lyamugarukamu liti: “Ninyowe Yesu ou orukuhiiganiza.
44009006	Hati imuka, otaahe omu rubuga, oraamanyisibwa eki oraakora.”
44009007	Abasaija abakaba nibagenda nawe baayemerra babuzirwe eky'okugamba. Bakahurra iraka, baitu batarole muntu.
44009008	Saulo yaimuka hansi; obu yaburwire amaiso, tiyahweza kantu. Baamunanata, baamutaahya Damasiko.
44009009	Akamara ebiro bisatu atarukurora kandi atarukulya noobwakuba kunywa kantu.
44009010	Damasiko hakaba haliyo omwegesebwa, ibara lye Ananiya. MUKAMA akamubonekera yamweta ati: “Ananiya.” Uwe yayetebuka ati: “Ndi hanu, Taata.”
44009011	Nandiki MUKAMA ati: “Imuka, ogende omu ruguudo orurukwetwa Oruterekeriire, okaguliirize omunju ya Yuda, omuntu arukwetwa Saulo owa Taruso. Mu kasumi kanu naasaba,
44009012	kandi abonekiirwe naarora omusaija arukwetwa Ananiya naija kumutaho emikono nukwo ahweze.”
44009013	Ananiya yamugarukamu ati: “MUKAMA wange, baingi bakambalizaaho omusaija ogu, na ha bubi obu abaire naakora abantu baawe omu Yerusaalemu.
44009014	Na hanu aizire aina obusobozi abanyakatagara bakuru obu baamuhaire obw'okuboha boona abarukwamirra ibara lyawe.”
44009015	Baitu MUKAMA yamugarukamu ati: “Genda, habwokuba omusaija ogu nikyo kikwato kyange eki nakomere kumanyisa ibara lyange omu Banyamahanga, n'omu bakama baabo, n'omu bantu boona aba Isirairi.
44009016	Ndimwoleka nkooku asemeriire kubonabonesibwa muno habwange.”
44009017	Nubwo Ananiya yagenzire, yataaha omunju egi. Yataho Saulo emikono naagamba ati: “Mugenzi wange Saulo, ntumirwe MUKAMA Yesu ayakubonekiire omu muhanda, nukwo oiguke amaiso kandi oijule Mwoyo Ahikiriire.”
44009018	Ahonaaho ebintu ebirukusisa ebigaragamba by'encu byamuruga ha maiso, yarora. Saulo yayemerra, yabatizibwa.
44009019	Obu yamazire kulya ebyokulya, yagarukwamu amaani. Damasiko akamarayo ebiro bike, ali hamu n'abeegesebwa.
44009020	Ahonaaho yatandika kurangirra Yesu omu masorrokaniro gaayo naagamba ati: “Nuwe Mwana wa Ruhanga.”
44009021	Boona abaamuhuliire bakahunirra nibakaguza bati: “Omusaija onu, tinuwe ayahiiganizaaga aba Yerusaalemu abaayaturaga ibara eri? Kandi tinikyo aiziriire hanu, abatwale omu maiso g'abanyakatagara abakuru baboherwe?”
44009022	Baitu Saulo yayeyongera muno kwegesa n'amaani yakwasa ensoni Abayudaaya abaikaraga Damasiko, naagumiza kimu Yesu nkooku ali Kristo.
44009023	Ebiro nkooku byagenzire nibihinguraho, Abayudaaya baayekoba hamu kumwita;
44009024	baitu ensita zaabu Saulo yazimanya. Baikaraga nibalinda amalembo g'orubuga nyamusana n'ekiro nibaserra kumwita.
44009025	Baitu abaikiriza baamucwisa ekiro, baamusirimura ekisiika ali omu kisombera ekiteekerwe kiteeko.
44009026	Obu yahikire Yerusaalemu, yalengaho kwehikya abaikiriza; baitu boona bakamutiina, habw'okutaikiriza nkooku akaba ali kwo mwegesebwa.
44009027	Baranaba nuwe ayamutwaire, yamuhikya abakwenda, yabasoborra Saulo nkooku yarozire MUKAMA omu muhanda, yabaza nawe, kandi nkooku yarangiriire n'obumanzi ibara lya Yesu omu Damasiko
44009028	Saulo yatandika kugenda nabo, naabungira ab'omu Yerusaalemu,
44009029	naarangirra n'obumanzi omwibara lya MUKAMA. Kandi obu yamazire kugamba n'Abayudaaya abaabazaaga Orugiriiki n'okuhakaniza nabo, baamalirra kumwita.
44009030	Ab'oruganda obu baakimanyire, baamutwara Kaisaariya, nukwo baamwohereza agende Taruso.
44009031	Nahabweki ekitebe ky'abaikiriza boona ab'omu Buyudaaya, Galiraaya, na Samaliya baasigara baina obusinge kandi baayeyongera kukanya nibatiina Ruhanga kandi nibagumibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
44009032	Petero obu akaba naagenda hanu na hali okubungira abaikiriza boona, yahika n'omu baikiriza abaikaraga Liida.
44009033	Oku nuho yasangire omusaija, ibara lye Aineya, ayamazire emyaka munaana atarukuruga ha kitabu, azingamire.
44009034	Petero yamugambira ati: “Aineya, Yesu Kristo hati yakukiza; imuka oyale ekitabu kyawe.” Ahonaaho yaimuka.
44009035	Boona abaikaraga Liida na Sarooni obu baamurozire akizibwe, baahindukira MUKAMA.
44009036	Omu rubuga Yoppa hakaba harumu omwegesebwa, ibara lye Tabita, amakuru gaalyo: Dorokasi rundi Enjaza. Omukazi ogu yakoraga ebirungi bingi naagabira n'abanaku.
44009037	Omu biro ebi akarwara, yafa. Obu baamazire kwogya omutumbi gwe, baagubyamya omu kisiika ekiri omu kainaabiri.
44009038	Kandi Liida teri hara na Yoppa. Nahabweki abeegesebwa obu baahuliire Petero nkooku ali oku, baamutumaho abasaija babiri nibamwesengereza bati; “Waitu oije oturole, otabandaara.”
44009039	Petero yaimuka, yagenda nabo. Obu yahikireyo, baamutembya omu kainaabiri. Abafaakati boona baija bamwemerra haihi nibarra, nibamwoleka ebitetei n'ebijwaro ebindi Dorokasi ebi yabaziire obu akaba akyali nabo.
44009040	Nubwo Petero yabaturukize aheeru, yateza amaju, yasaba. Obu yamazire kusaba, yahindukira omukazi ogu ayafiire, yamugambira ati: “Tabita, imuka.” Omukazi yaziburra amaiso, yarolerra Petero, yaimuka, yaikarra.
44009041	Petero yamukwata ha mukono, yamwemereza. Nubwo yayesire abaikiriza n'abafakaati, yamubakwasa ali mwomeezi.
44009042	Ekyabaireho kyamanywa omu Yoppa hoona; baingi baikiriza MUKAMA.
44009043	Petero yayongera yamara ebiro Yoppa, naaraara omwa Simooni, omuhazi w'empu.
44010001	Omu rubuga Kaisaariya hakaba harumu omusaija, ibara lye Koroneeri, omukuru w'ab'amahe ab'omu kihanda ekyayetwaga ky'Abaitale.
44010002	Uwe n'ab'eka ye boona bakaba bali bantu abaayekambiraga ediini kandi abarukutiina Ruhanga. Yagabaga n'obwenda kukoonyera abanaku b'Abayudaaya, kandi yasabaga Ruhanga atarukulekerra.
44010003	Kiro kimu ha saaha nka mwenda ez'orwebagyo, akabonekerwa, yarora butunu malaika wa Ruhanga nataaha omunju nambere ali, naamweta ati: “Koroneeri.”
44010004	Kandi Koroneeri, anyakwijwire obutiini, yamuhanga amaiso nayetebuka ati: “Kiki Taata?” Malaika yamugambira ati: “Okusaba kwawe n'okugaba kwawe bitembere nk'ekiijukyo omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
44010005	Hati nu, tuma abantu Yoppa, beeteyo omuntu Simooni, arukwetwa Petero,
44010006	anyakuraara omwa Simooni omuhazi w'empu, enju ye eri ha musa gw'enyanja.”
44010007	Malaika ayabalize nawe obu yamazire kugenda, Koroneeri yayeta babiri ha baheereza be hamu n'omu ha baserikale abaamulindaga, omuntu ayayekambiraga muno ediini.
44010008	Obu yamazire kubasoborra byona ebibaireho, yabatuma Yoppa.
44010009	Ha kiro ekyakuraasireho, abaatumirwe obu bakaba nibakyagenda, bali haihi kuhika orubuga ha saaha nka mukaaga, nubwo Petero yatembere ha nju eruguru kusaba.
44010010	Omu kasumi ako enjara yamuruma kandi yagonza kulya akantu; baitu ab'omunju obu bakaba nibakyateekaniza ebyokulya, yabonekerwa.
44010011	Yarora iguru likingwirwe, kandi ekintu ekirukusisa esuuka nkooto nikisirimuka hansi, kikwasirwe ha nsonda ina.
44010012	Kikaba kirumu emiringo yoona ey'ebisoro n'ebirukwekurra n'enyonyi z'omu mwanya.
44010013	Yahurra iraka nirimugamba liti: “Petero imuka; obiite olye.”
44010014	Petero yagarukamu ati: “Nangwa, MUKAMA wange! Nyowe tinkalyaga kintu kyona ekirukuzira rundi ekitasemiire.”
44010015	Iraka lyagaruka nirimugambira liti: “Ruhanga eki yayeriize, otalikyeta ky'omuziro.”
44010016	Eki kikabaho emirundi esatu, hanyuma ekintu kyagarurwa omwiguru.
44010017	Petero obu akaba akyasobiirwe naagurukyagurukya amakuru g'okubonekerwa oku, nubwo haizire abasaija abatumirwe Koroneeri, bayemerra omu irembo ly'enju ya Simooni,
44010018	baayeranga nibakaguza Simooni arukwetwa Petero obu araaba naaraara aho.
44010019	Petero obu akaba naakyacumiitiriza amakuru g'okubonekerwa oku, Mwoyo Ahikiriire yamugambire ati: “Haizire abasaija basatu nibakuserra.
44010020	Rahuka osirimuke, ogende nabo otarukugurukyagurukya, habwokuba ninyowe mbatumire kwija hanu.”
44010021	Petero yasirimuka, yahikaho abasaija abo, yabakaguza ati: “Ou murukuserra ninyowe, muleesirwe ki?”
44010022	Bbo baamugarukamu bati: “Koroneeri, mukuru w'ab'amahe, omuntu ahikiriire, arukutiina Ruhanga kandi arukusiimwa Abayudaaya boona, ahabwirwe malaika wa Ruhanga kukweta oije owe, nukwo ahurre ebi oraagamba.”
44010023	Aho Petero yabataahya omunju, baaba bagenyi be. Obwire obu bwakiire, Petero yaimuka, yagenda nabo asendekeriziibwe abaikiriza abamu ba Yoppa.
44010024	Orubuga rwa Kaisaariya bakarutaaha ha kiro ekyakuraasireho. Baasanga Koroneeri abategeriize, amazire kweta ab'oruganda rwe n'abanywani be abandi babeho.
44010025	Petero obu yahikire ha nju, Koroneeri yaturuka aheeru, yagenda kumutangirra, yajuumara ha bigere bya Petero, yamuramya,
44010026	Baitu Petero yamwimukya naagamba ati: “Yemerra; na nyowe ndi muntu nka iwe.”
44010027	Baagenda nibabaza, baataaha omunju, baasangamu abantu baingi abaayesoroize.
44010028	Petero yatandika kubeegesa ati: “Inywena mumanyire Ebiragiro nkooku bitanga Abayudaaya okuteerana rundi okubungira abantu b'ihanga erindi; baitu nyowe, Ruhanga akaanyoleka nkooku ntasemerire kugaya omuntu weena rundi kumunuga.
44010029	Nahabweki obu baanyesire, tinyangire kwija. Kandi nikyo ndukukaguliza nti: Munyetiire ki?”
44010030	Koroneeri yamugarukamu ati: “Ebiro bbina ebihingwire, obu nkaba ninsaba omu kisiika kyange, ha saaha nk'enu ey'omwenda, nkarora omusaija anyemeriire omumaiso, ajwaire ebijwaro ebirukwangasana,
44010031	yangambira ati: ‘Koroneeri, Ruhanga ahuliire okusaba kwawe, kandi aijukire n'okugaba kwawe.
44010032	Hati nu, tuma abantu Yoppa, beeteyo omuntu Simooni arukwetwa Petero, anyakuraara omwa Simooni omuhazi w'empu, enju ye eri ha musa gw'enyanja.’
44010033	Nikyo nakutumiireho ahonaaho, kandi na iwe okozire kurungi kwija. Hati nu, itwena twesoroize hanu omumaiso ga Ruhanga, nukwo tuhurre byona MUKAMA ebi akuragiire kutugambira.”
44010034	Petero yatandika kwegesa naagamba ati: “Mazima mmanyire Ruhanga nkooku atasoroora mu bantu;
44010035	baitu omu buli ihanga, weena arukumutiina akakora ebihikire, Ruhanga amusiima.
44010036	Ruhanga akahikya ekigambo kye hali Abaisirairi barangirirwe Amakuru Amarungi ag'obusinge, nakirabya omu Yesu Kristo (MUKAMA w'abantu boona).
44010037	Na inywe mumanyire ebyabaireho omu Buyudaaya yoona, okubandiza Galiraaya nambere Yohaana yayegeseze ebyokubatiza.
44010038	Mumanyire Yesu owa Nazareeti nkooku Ruhanga yamuseesereho Mwoyo Ahikiriire, yamuha n'obusobozi. Kandi habw'okukonyerwa Ruhanga, Yesu yagendagendaga naakora ebirungi, kandi naakiza boona abakaba nibagadisibwa Sitaani.
44010039	Na itwe tuli bakaiso b'ebi byona ebi yakoliire omu Buyudaaya n'omu Yerusaalemu. Yesu ogu, abantu bakamwita nibamuhanika ha muti;
44010040	baitu Ruhanga akamuhumbuura obu haahingwireho ebiro bisatu, yamutwoleka.
44010041	Atamwoleke bantu boona, baitu akamwoleka itwe abakaiso Ruhanga aba yakomere kara, abaaliire na Yesu kandi baanywa nawe amazire kuhumbuuka omu bafu.
44010042	Akaturagira kwegesa n'okunanura abantu nkooku nuwe ogu Ruhanga ou yakomere kuba mucwi w'emisango y'abomiire n'abafiire.
44010043	Kandi nuwe abarangi boona baajuliire nibagumya ngu, weena arukumwikiriza naaganyirwa ebibi habw'ibara lye.”
44010044	Petero obu akaba naakyabaza ebi, Mwoyo Ahikiriire yasirimuka hali boona abakaba nibamuhuliriza.
44010045	Abaikiriza abasazirwe abaizire na Petero, bakahunirra habw'okurora abanyamahanga nabo nibaseeswaho ekisembo kya Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
44010046	Baitu nabo bakabahurra nibabaza endimi kandi nibahaisaniza Ruhanga. Nubwo Petero yakagwize ati:
44010047	“Abantu banu abatungire Mwoyo Ahikiriire nka itwe, haroho asobora kubaima amaizi ngu batabatizibwa?”
44010048	Yaragira babatizibwe omu ibara lya Yesu Kristo. Hanyuma baamusaba amale nabo ebiro bike.
44011001	Abakwenda n'ab'oruganda abakaba bali Buyudaaya bakahurra nkooku Abanyamahanga nabo baikiriize ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
44011002	Kandi Petero obu yagarukire Yerusaalemu, ab'omu kitebe ky'abasazirwe baamujunaana,
44011003	nibamukaguza bati: “Kiki ekyakutwaire omu bantu abatasazirwe kandi walya nabo?”
44011004	Petero yatandika kubasoborra byona nkooku byagenzire naagamba ati:
44011005	“Kiro kimu obu nkaba ndi omu rubuga Yoppa ninsaba, nubwo nabonekiirwe, narora ekintu ekirukusisa esuuka enkooto nikisirimuka hansi kikwasirwe ha nsonda ina, kyampikaho.
44011006	Obu nakyetegeriize, narora harumu ebisoro by'emiringo yoona, n'enyamaiswa, n'ebirukwekurra, hamu n'enyonyi z'omu mwanya.
44011007	Kandi nahurra iraka niringambira liti: ‘Petero imuka; obiite olye.’
44011008	Nyowe nagarukamu nti: ‘Nangwa, MUKAMA wange; habwokuba tinkalyaga kintu kyona ekirukuzirwa rundi ekitasemiire.’
44011009	Baitu iraka lyaruga omu iguru omurundi gwa kabiri, nirigamba liti: ‘Ruhanga eki yayeriize, otalikyeta ky'omuziro.’
44011010	Eki kikabaho emirundi esatu, hanyuma byona byagarurwa omu iguru.
44011011	“Omu kasumi ako konyini haija abasaija basatu, baahika ha nju ei tukaba turumu, batumirwe kuntabarra nibaruga Kaisaariya.
44011012	Mwoyo Ahikiriire yandagira kugenda nabo ntarukugurukyagurukya. N'ab'oruganda abo mukaaga nabo baagenda na nyowe, twataaha mb'omusaija ogu Koroneeri.
44011013	Kandi uwe yatusoborra nkooku yarozire malaika ayemeriire omu kisiika kye naagamba ati; ‘Tuma abantu Yoppa, beeteyo Simooni arukwetwa Petero;
44011014	ogu alikwegesa ebigambo ebirukwija kukujuna hamu n'eka yaawe yoona.’
44011015	Kandi nyowe obu natandikire kwegesa, Mwoyo Ahikiriire yabaijaho boona, nkooku yatwizireho itwe omu kubanza.
44011016	Na nyowe naijuka MUKAMA eki yagambire ati: ‘Yohaana akabatiza n'amaizi, baitu inywe mulibatizibwa na Mwoyo Ahikiriire.’
44011017	Hati Ruhanga obu araaba yabahaire ekisembo ekirukusisana n'eki yatuhaire obu twabandiize kwikiriza MUKAMA Yesu Kristo, nyowe ninyowe oha ayaakusoboire kutanga Ruhanga?”
44011018	Abakwenda obu baahuliire eki, baabireka. Baatandika kukugiza Ruhanga nibagamba bati: “Hati Abanyamahanga nabo Ruhanga abahaire okwegarukamu okurukutungisa obwomeezi obutahwaho.”
44011019	Abararangiibwe hanu na hali habw'okuhiiganizibwa okwabaireho habw'ebya Sitefano, bakagenda baahika Foinike na Kipuro na Antyokiya batarukutebeza muntu ondi weena Amakuru Amarungi kwihaho Abayudaaya bonka.
44011020	Omulibo hakaba harumu abasaija abamu, enzaarwa za Kipuro na Kirene. Obu baahikire Antyokiya baatandika kwegesa Abagiriiki, nibabarangirra Amakuru Amarungi ga MUKAMA Yesu.
44011021	Obusobozi bwa MUKAMA bwabaiziramu, kandi abantu baingi baikiriza, baahindukira Mukama.
44011022	Ekitebe ky'abaikiriza ab'omu Yerusaalemu obu baahuliire eki, nubwo baatumire Baranaba agenda Antyokiya.
44011023	Obuyahikireyo, yarora embabazi Ruhanga ezi yabagiriire, yasemererwa. Boona yabateererra kugumira hali MUKAMA n'omutima gumu.
44011024	Baranaba ogu akaba ali musaija murungi, anyakwijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire n'okwikiriza. Kandi Antyokiya oku, abantu baingi baahindukira MUKAMA.
44011025	Aho Baranaba yarugayo yagenda Taruso kuserra Saulo.
44011026	Obu yamuboine, yamuleeta Antyokiya. Bombi baamarayo omwaka gwona bali mu baikiriza baayo, nibeegesa abantu baingi. Kandi Antyokiya, nuho abeegesebwa baabandiize kwetwa Abakristo.
44011027	Obu bakaba bakyali oku, abarangi abamu bakaruga Yerusaalemu baahika Antyokiya.
44011028	Omu hali bo, omuntu anyakwetwa Agabo, yayemerra yarangisibwa Mwoyo nkooku harukwija kubaho kiihe omu nsi yoona. Niyo kiihe eyabaireho omu businge bwa Klahudiyo.
44011029	Abaikiriza bakacwamu buli muntu aheyo obukoonyezi nkooku arukusobora, ebintu babitwekere bagenzi baabo abaikara Buyudaaya.
44011030	Kandi nukwo baakozire. Ebintu baabitwekera abakuru ba Yerusaalemu, byatwarwa Baranaba na Saulo.
44012001	Omu biro ebi, Herode omukama akatandika kuhiiganiza abamu ab'omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza.
44012002	Yakobbo, mugenzi wa Yohaana, akamwisa empirima.
44012003	Kandi obu yarozire Abayudaaya nkooku bakisiimire, yaragira bakwate na Petero. Eki kikabaho omu biro eby'obugenyi obw'okwijuka Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe.
44012004	Herode obu yamazire kukwata Petero, yamuta omu nkomo, yamukwasa ebihanda bbina eby'abaserikale, bali bbana mu buli kihanda, nukwo bamulinde nibahonderangana, naagenderra kumuleeta omu maiso g'abantu ekiro kikuru eky'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho kimazire kuhwa.
44012005	Petero nukwo kulindirwa omu nkomo ebiro ebi byona; baitu ekitebe ky'abaikiriza bakeekamba kumusabira hali Ruhanga.
44012006	Ha kiro eki kyonyini Herode eki akaba araaliire kumuleeta omu rukurato, Petero akaba agwijagiire, ali hagati y'abaserikale babiri, aboherwe n'enjegere ibiri, kandi abalinzi abandi bali ha irembo nibalinda enkomo.
44012007	Aho malaika wa MUKAMA yamubonekera, kandi ekyererezi kyayaka omu kasiika ke. Malaika yateerateera Petero ha ibega, yamusisiimura ati: “Matuka bwango!” Enjegere zaamuruga ha mikono, zaaragara.
44012008	Malaika yamugambira ati: “Weteege orukoba rwawe, sabikira enkaito zaawe.” Petero nukwo yakozire, kandi malaika yayongera yamugira ati: “Wefubike omunagiro gwawe, onkurate.”
44012009	Petero yaruga mu kasiika, yamukurata; kyonka atarukugumya malaika nkooku arukumwiha kwo omu nkomo, baitu akateekereza ngu, abonekiirwe.
44012010	Obu baamazire kurabaho abalinzi ab'okubanza n'aba kabiri, baahika ha rwigi rw'ekyoma, orurukutaahya omu rubuga. Orwigi oru rwabeekingurra rwonka; baaturuka aheeru. Bairrayo omumaiso okuhika malaika obu yamurugireho.
44012011	Petero nubwo yagarukirwemu amagezi, yagamba ati: “Hati namanyira kimu MUKAMA nkooku atumire malaika we kunyiha omu mikono ya Herode, kandi yanjuna byona Abayudaaya ebi bakaba bategekere kunkora.”
44012012	Ebi obu yamazire kubyetegereza, yayongera yahika ha nju ya Mariya nyina Yohaana, abandi ou barukweta Mariko, nambere abaikiriza baingi bakaba beesoroliize hamu kumusabira.
44012013	Obu yayerangire ha rwigi rw'irembo, omwisiki arukwetwa Roda yaija kwetegereza.
44012014	Obu yamanyiriire iraka lya Petero, habw'omuhimbo, tiyakinguraho rwigi, baitu yairuka yagaruka omunju naabagambira ngu, Petero ayemeriire ha irembo.
44012015	Bbo baamugarukamu bati: “Ohungutukire.” Baitu omwisiki yagumiza kimu ngu, nukwo kiri. Kandi bbo bamugambira bati: “Rundi malaika we!”
44012016	Baitu Petero yayongera kwerangira ha rwigi, kandi obu bakingwireho baamurora, baahunirra muno.
44012017	Uwe yabaculeeza n'omukono gwe, yatandika kubasoborra MUKAMA nkooku amwihire omu nkomo. Yayongera yagamba ati: “Ebi byona mubimanyise Yakobbo n'abagenzi baitu.” Nubwo yabarugaho, yagenda handi.
44012018	Obu bwakiire nyenkya, abaserikale bakaba omu mwetunturo mwingi habw'okutamanya Petero nambere agiire.
44012019	Kandi Herode obu yaragiire kumuserra, baalemwa kumuzoora. Yakaguliriza muno abalinzi, nukwo hanyuma yaragira babaite. Nubwo Herode yaruga Buyudaaya, yagenda Kaisaariya, yaikarayo.
44012020	Herode akaba abiihirirwe muno abantu ba Tiiro na Sidooni; nukwo omuganda gw'abantu kwija nambere ali obu baamazire kusoonasoona Bulasito, omukuru wa bagaragara, baasaba obusinge, habwokuba abantu baabo baasakiraga muno ebyokulya omu nsi y'Omukama Herode.
44012021	Ha kiro eki yakomere, Herode yajwara ebijwaro by'obukama, yasinga ha kitebe kye, yababaliza orubazo.
44012022	Abantu nukwo kumuswagira nibagamba bati: “Arukugamba nuwe ruhanga, takyali muntu!”
44012023	Omu kasumi ako malaika wa Ruhanga yamuteera kandi yagwa hansi. Yajunaanwa okutaha Ruhanga ekitiinisa; yaliibwa enzito, yafa.
44012024	Baitu ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyayeyongera kandi kyararanga muno, baingi baakiikiriza.
44012025	Baranaba na Saulo obu baamazire obutumwa bwabo, baaruga Yerusaalemu, baagaruka Antyokiya baina Yohaana, abamu ou barukweta Mariko.
44013001	Omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza ekikaba kiri Antyokiya, hakaba harumu abarangi n'abeegesa, nubo banu: Baranaba, Simyoni anyakwetwa Kiiragura, Lusiyo owa Kireene, Manayeni ayayoroirwe hamu n'owiisaza Herode, na Saulo.
44013002	Kiro kimu obu bakaba nibasaba MUKAMA kandi nibasiiba, Mwoyo Ahikiriire yabagambira ati: “Munsororremu Baranaba na Saulo, bakole omulimo ogu mbeetiire.”
44013003	Boona obu baamazire kusiiba n'okusaba, baabataho emikono baabatuma.
44013004	Ababiri abo obu baamazire kutumwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, baimukya orugendo orwa Seleyukiya; kandi okurugayo, baagwerra omu meeri, baagenda Kipuro.
44013005	Obu baahikire orubuga Salamisi, baarangirra ekigambo kya Ruhanga omu masorrokaniro g'Abayudaaya, kandi bakaba baina Yohaana arukubakoonyera.
44013006	Obu baamazire kuraba omu kizinga kyona kya Kipuro, baahika orubuga Paafo. Oku baasangayo Omuyudaaya omu, omunyamasano kandi omurangi w'ebisuba arukwetwa Bar-yesu (amakuru ngu, mwana wa Yesu).
44013007	Akaba ali hamu n'omulemi mukuru w'ekicweka eki, omuntu anyakwetwa Serugiyo Paulo, omusaija omwetegereza. Nuwe yayesire Baranaba na Saulo yabasaba kumusoborra ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
44013008	Baitu Elima, arukwetwa omunyamasano (habwokuba nugo makuru g'ibara lye) yatandika kubahakaniza naagenderra kuhabisa omulemi mukuru, aleke kwikiriza.
44013009	Baitu Saulo, anyakwetwa Paulo, aijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire, yamugumyaho amaiso
44013010	nnagamba ati: “Iwe mwana wa Sitaani, iwe omunyanzigwa w'obuhikiriire bwona, iwe anyakwijwire obugobya n'obubi bwona, olireka di kuramaza emihanda ya MUKAMA enyakuterekeriire?
44013011	Lero hati, omukono gwa MUKAMA nigwija kukuteera nukwo ofe amaiso, omale akasumi otarukurora izooba.” Ahonaaho ekiho n'omwirima byamusweka, yahaamanga naaserra ow'okumunanata.
44013012	Omulemi mukuru obu yarozire ekibaireho, yaikiriza kandi yahunirizibwa ebi baayegeseze hali MUKAMA.
44013013	Paulo n'abagenzi be baagwerra nibaruga Paafo, baayambuka, baahika Peruga, orubuga orwa Panfiliya. Oku nuho Yohaana yabarugiireho, yagaruka Yerusaalemu;
44013014	baitu bbo bairrayo baaruga Peruga, baahika Antyokiya, narwo rubuga rwa Pisidiya. Kandi ha kiro kya Sabbato bakataaha omu isorrokaniro ly'Abayudaaya, baikarra.
44013015	Eby'Ebiragiro bya Musa n'eby'abarangi obu byamazire kusomwa, abakuru b'isorrokaniro baabatumaho nibabasaba bati: “Bagenzi baitu, obu muraaba mwina ekigambo ky'okugumya abantu banu, mukigambe.”
44013016	Paulo nukwo kwemerra, boona yabaculeeza n'omukono gwe, yatandika kwegesa ati: “Inywe bantu ba Isirairi, na inywena abarukutiina Ruhanga, muhurre.
44013017	Ruhanga w'ihanga lyaitu Isirairi akakoma baisenkuru itwe, yabakuza yabafoora ihanga ruranganwa obu bakaba bali omu nsi ya Misiri, nukwo hanyuma yabaihayo habw'amaani g'obusobozi bwe.
44013018	Akabagumiisiriza obu bakaba bali omu irungu kumara emyaka makumi ana.
44013019	Obu yamazire kuhwerekereza amahanga musanju ag'omu nsi ya Kanaani, ensi egi yagiha Abaisirairi ebe bugwetwa bwabu, baamarayo emyaka nka bikumi bbina mw'ataano.
44013020	Ebi obu byahoire, akabaha abacwi b'emisango babaleme okuhika ha businge bw'omurangi Samwiri.
44013021	Nubwo bamusabire abahe omukama, kandi Ruhanga yabaha Saulo mutabani wa Kisi ow'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini, yabalemera emyaka makumi ana.
44013022	Kandi Ruhanga obu yamwihire ha ngoma, yataho Daudi kuba omukama waabu, ou yagambireho ati: ‘Mmazire kukoma Daudi, mutabani wa Yese, nuwe muntu ndukusiima ow'alikora byona ebi ndukwenda.’
44013023	Omu baijukuru ba Daudi ogu, Ruhanga numwo yaihiire Isirairi Omujuni, nuwe Yesu, nkooku kyaraganiziibwe.
44013024	Kandi Yesu obu akaba atakaizire, Yohaana akarangirra Abaisirairi boona okubatiza okw'okwegarukamu.
44013025	Yohaana obu akaba naamaliriza omulimo gwe, akagamba ati: ‘Nyowe nimunteekerezaho ki? Tindi ogu ow'okwija, nangwa. Baitu haroho arukunyija enyuma kandi tinsemeriire kusumurra orukoba orw'enkaito ze.’
44013026	“Bagenzi bange, baijukuru ba Abburahamu, na inywena abarukutiina Ruhanga, obukwenda obu obw'okujunwa, niinyowe bwaiziire.
44013027	Baitu abantu ba Yerusaalemu n'abalemi baabo Yesu batamumanyirre noobu kwakuba okukenga ebyagambirwe abarangi, ebisomwa hanu buli Sabbato. Baitu Ebihandiiko bakabihikiriza obu baamusingisize omusango.
44013028	Noobu baraaba baabuzirwe eky'okumujunaana ekisemeriire kumwisa, nabwo bakasaba Pilaato amwite.
44013029	Kandi obu baamazire kuhikiriza byona ebyamuhandiikirweho, baamuhanuura ha muti, baamuziika omu kituuro.
44013030	Baitu Ruhanga akamuhumbuura omu bafu;
44013031	yamara ebiro bingi naabonekera abo abaarugire nawe Galiraaya baija Yerusaalemu. Hati nubo barukumuheera obwakaiso omu bantu.
44013032	Na itwe twizire nitubaleetera Amakuru Amarungi ag'ebi Ruhanga yaraganiize baisenkuruitwe,
44013033	nkooku yabihikiriize omuli itwe abaana baabo obu yahumbwire Yesu. Kandi nukwo kyahandiikirwe kiti omu zabbuli eya kabiri: ‘Iwe oli Mwana wange, nkuzaire kiro kya hati.’
44013034	Habw'okugumya nkooku yamuhumbwire omu bafu okutagaruka kujunda, Ruhanga akongera ati: ‘Ndikuha emigisa egumire kandi erukwera nk'ei nahaire Daudi.’
44013035	Nikyo yagambiire omu zabbuli endi ati: ‘Toliikiriza Ahikiriire wawe kujunda.’
44013036	Daudi obu yamazire kuhikiriza entegeka ya Ruhanga omu bantu b'obusinge bwe yafa, yaziikwa n'abaisenkuru, kandi yajunda;
44013037	baitu ogu Ruhanga ou yahumbwire, atajunde.
44013038	“Nahabweki bagenzi bange, mumanye okuganyirwa ebibi nkooku kubarangirirwa habw'omuntu ogu Yesu,
44013039	kandi habw'ogu, weena arukumwikiriza naganyirwa byona ebi Ebiragiro bya Musa bitarasoboire kumuganyira.
44013040	Nahabweki mwerinde, timwikara kuhikwaho abarangi ebi baarangire bati:
44013041	‘Inywe abasekeerezi mwetegereze, muhunirre kandi muhweho; habwokuba omu biro byanyu ninkora ekikorwa eki mutalisobora kwikiriza, noobu haakubaho arukukibasoborra.’”
44013042	Obu bakaba nibaruga omu isorrokaniro, abantu baasaba Paulo na Baranaba kugaruka kubasoborra ebigambo ebi ha Sabbato erukwija.
44013043	Orusorrokano obu rwarugirwemu, Abayudaaya baingi hamu n'abantu baayo abaahindukire kutaaha omu diini y'Ekiyudaaya, baakuratira Paulo na Baranaba, kandi bbo baabateererra kwikara nibeesiga embabazi za Ruhanga.
44013044	Ha Sabbato eyakurasireho, kutagirwa ab'omu rubuga boona bakeesorooza hamu kuhurra ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
44013045	Baitu Abayudaaya obu baarozire obwingi bw'abantu, bakwatwa ihali, baatandika kuhakaniza Paulo ebi yagambire, baamujuma.
44013046	Paulo na Baranaba baabagarukamu n'obumanzi bati: “Kikaba nikyetaagwa inywe mubanze murangirirwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga. Baitu obu mwakyangire, mukecwera inywenka omusango nkooku mutasemeriire kutunga obwomeezi obutahwaho; hati itwe nitwija kugenda omu Banyamahanga.
44013047	Nikyo MUKAMA yaturagiire naagamba ati: ‘Nkutaireho obe kyererezi hali Abanyamahanga, okujuna kwange okuhikye ha mpero y'ensi.’ ”
44013048	Abanyamahanga obu baahuliire eki, baasemererwa, baatandika kuhaisaniza ekigambo kya Ruhanga; kandi boona abaakomiirwe obwomeezi obutahwaho baikiriza.
44013049	Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyararanga omunsi egi yoona.
44013050	Baitu Abayudaaya baimukiriza abakazi ab'ekitiinisa abaayekambiraga ediini, hamu n'abasaija bakuru ab'omu rubuga, baatandika kuhiiganiza Paulo na Baranaba, baababinga omu nsi y'owaabu.
44013051	Nukwo bbo kubateerateera ecuucu y'omu bigere byabo, baagenda Ikoniyo.
44013052	Baitu abeegesebwa baijura omuhimbo na Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
44014001	Obu bakaba bali Ikoniyo, baataaha omu isorrokaniro ly'Abayudaaya, baayegesa ebigambo ebyagwire abantu ha njoka, byaleetera Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki baingi kwikiriza.
44014002	Baitu Abayudaaya abamu baayanga kwikiriza, baata omu Banyamahanga omutima mubi banobe abantu abaikiriize.
44014003	Oku Paulo na Baranaba baamarayo akasumi, nibeegesa ebya MUKAMA batarukutiina, nawe akagumya ebi baayegeseze ha kisembo kye ky'embabazi, naikiriza ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano bikorwe emikono yabo.
44014004	Baitu abantu ab'omu rubuga bakaba beebaganizeemu; abamu bali ha rubaju rw'Abayudaaya, abandi orw'abakwenda.
44014005	Ekyarugiremu, Abanyamahanga n'Abayudaaya baikirraniza n'abalemi baayo, baacwa amagezi kubakora kubi n'okubateeza amabaale.
44014006	Baitu abakwenda obu baakimanyire, bairukira Lisitura na Derube, embuga za Likaoniya, n'omunsi ezindi eziherraineho.
44014007	Oku nuho baarangiriire Amakuru Amarungi.
44014008	Omu rubuga Lisitura hakaba haliyo omusaija ayazairwe ali mulema; akaba atarukusobora n'okurubata.
44014009	Yaija kuhuliriza Paulo naayegesa; kandi Paulo obu yamurozire, yamanya nkooku aina okwikiriza okurukusobora kumukiza.
44014010	Yagamba n'iraka likooto ati; “Imuka, oyemerre toro.” Omusaija ayazairwe ali mulema yamatuka, yatandika kurubata.
44014011	Ekitebe ky'abantu obu kyarozire Paulo eki akozire, baatokera haiguru omu rulimi rwabu Orulikaoniya bati: “Abacwezi batwiziremu, bali omu bisisani by'abantu!”
44014012	Baranaba baamukubya Zeu, kandi Paulo ow'akaba naabaza muno, baamweta Herume.
44014013	Nubwo nyakatagara w'ibandiro ly'omucwezi Zeu erikaba liri omu maiso g'orubuga yaizire n'abantu be, yaleeta enimi zijwekerwe emiihura, boona baagonza kutamba ekyonzira ha irembo ly'orubuga.
44014014	Baitu abakwenda Baranaba na Paulo obu baakihuliire baatemura ebijwaro byabo, bajumbutuka nibaraba omu kitebe ky'abantu hagati nibabatanga n'iraka likooto bati:
44014015	“Basaija inywe, kiki ekirukubakoza binu? Na itwe tuli bantu nyabuntu nka inywe. Tubaleetiire Amakuru Amarungi, nukwo muleke abacwezi abo abataina mugaso, muhindukire Ruhanga omwomeezi, ayahangire iguru n'ensi, hamu n'enyanja, na byona ebigirumu.
44014016	Omu businge bwa ira Ruhanga akaikiriza buli ihanga kwekorra ebyalyo nkooku lirukwenda;
44014017	baitu nabwo ateebuzeeho obwakaiso obw'ebirungi abakorra naabanagira enjura enyakuruga omwiguru, naabeereza oburo bwanyu omu busumi bwabwo, naabaigusa ebyokulya kandi emitima yanyu naagiijuza okusemererwa.”
44014018	Paulo na Baranaba noobu baabaliize ebi byona, kake konka balemwe kutanga abantu kubatambira ekyonzira.
44014019	Nubwo haizire Abayudaaya abaarugire Antyokiya na Ikoniyo. Baatandika kusoonasoona abantu. Ekyarugiremu, Paulo bakamuteera amabaale, baamukurra, baamuturukya omu rubuga, nibagira ngu, afiire.
44014020	Baitu abaikiriza obu baamuhikireho, yaimuka, yagaruka omu rubuga. Ha kiro egyakurasireho, uwe na Baranaba baagenda Derube.
44014021	Obu baamazire kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi omu rubuga oru, baatungamu abeegesebwa baingi, baagaruka Antyokiya nibaraba Lisitura na Ikoniyo,
44014022	nibagumya emitima y'abaikiriza nibabateererra kweyongera omu kwikiriza, kandi nibabagambira itwena nkooku tuli b'okuhikwaho obulemeezi bwingi tutakataahire omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
44014023	Obu baamazire kukomera buli kitebe ky'abaikiriza abakuru b'okubarolerra, nibasaba kandi nibasiiba, boona baabakwasa MUKAMA ou baikiriize.
44014024	Nubwo Paulo na Baranaba baayongiire orugendo nibaraba Pisidiya, baahika Panfiliya.
44014025	Obu baamazire kurangirra ekigambo kya Ruhanga omu Perige, baayongera baagenda Ataliya.
44014026	Obu baarugire oku, baagwerra omu meeri, baahika Antyokiya nambere baabandiize kuheebwa obukonyezi bwa Ruhanga habw'omulimo ogu bahikiriize.
44014027	Obu baahikire Antyokiya, baasorooza ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, baabasoborra byona Ruhanga ebi yabakoleze, kandi nkooku yakinguliireho Abanyamahanga omuhanda gw'okwikiriza.
44014028	Bbo baikara n'abeegesebwa baayo okumara ebiro bingi.
44015001	Omu kasumi ako hakaijaho abantu abamu abaarugire Buyudaaya, baayegesa abaikiriza bati: “Kakuba mutasarwa, Ekiragiro kya Musa nkooku kirukuragira, timusobora kujunwa.”
44015002	Paulo na Baranaba bakabanza kuteera muno empaka n'abantu abo, okuhika bbo hamu n'abandi obu baakomerwe kugenda Yerusaalemu kuhanuura ekigambo eki hamu n'abakwenda n'abakuru abandi.
44015003	Ekitebe kyona ky'abaikiriza kyabaraga. Kandi obu bakaba nibaraba Foinike na Samaliya, baagambira abaikiriza baayo Abanyamahanga nkooku baahindukire. Amakuru ago gakakyanganura muno ab'oruganda boona.
44015004	Obu baahikire Yerusaalemu, baatangirirwa ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, hamu n'abakwenda n'abakuru abandi, baabamanyisa byona Ruhanga ebi yabakoleze.
44015005	Baitu abamu ab'omu kitebe ky'Abafalisaayo abakaba baikiriize, baatandika kuhakana nibagamba bati: “Abanyamahanga basemeriire kusarwa n'okwegesibwa kukuratira Ebiragiro bya Musa.”
44015006	Abakwenda n'abakuru bakeesorooza hamu kwetegereza ekigambo eki.
44015007	Obu baamazire omwanya mukooto nibahanuura, Petero yaimuka, yabagambira ati: “Bagenzi bange, nimumanya kurungi nkooku omu biro bya ira, nyowe kalimi kagamba, Ruhanga yankomere omuli inywe nukwo ndangirre Abanyamahanga enyegesa y'Amakuru Amarungi, bagihurre kandi baikirize.
44015008	Ruhanga, arukumanya emitima y'abantu, akabagumya, yabaha Mwoyo Ahikiriire nkooku yamutuhaire ira;
44015009	kandi atatwahukanizeemu nabo, baitu akeeza emitima yabu habw'okwikiriza oku bainakwo.
44015010	Hati Ruhanga nimumwoheza ki nimuta ekikoligo omu bikya by'abeegesebwa, ekikoligo baisenkuru itwe eki batarasoboire kuhimba noobwakuba itwe?
44015011	Baitu hati nitwesiga nkooku tulijunwa habw'embabazi za MUKAMA Yesu nk'abo oku balijunwa embabazi ze.”
44015012	Orukurato rwona rwaikara niruculeera, baahuliriza Baranaba na Paulo nibabasoborra ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano Ruhanga ebi yabakoleze omu Banyamahanga.
44015013	Bbo obu baamazire kusoborra ebyabo, Yakobbo yatandika kubaza ati: “Bagenzi bange, mumpulirize.
44015014	Simyoni arugire kutusoborra Ruhanga nkooku yabandize kuta omutima ha Banyamahanga n'okukoma abamu omuli bo abafoole bantu be.
44015015	Kandi eki nikiikirraniza n'ekyahandiikirwe abarangi kiti:
44015016	‘Ebiro ebi obu birihwa, ndigaruka nyombeke buhyaka enju ya Daudi eyagwire; nyombeke buhyaka ebikambuuro byayo, ngyemereze,
44015017	nubwo abantu abandi, hamu n'Abanyamahanga boona abarukwetwa habw'ibara lyange baligaruka kuserra MUKAMA.
44015018	MUKAMA ayatumanyisize ebintu ebi kuruga ira lyona, nukwo arukugamba ati.’
44015019	Nahabweki eki ncwiremu nikyo kinu: Itwe titusemeriire kutalibaniza abarukuruga omu Banyamahanga nibahindukira Ruhanga,
44015020	baitu kitusemeriire kubahandiikira nitubahabura beetantale ekintu kyona ekihongirwe abacwezi, beetantale obusiihani n'okulya ebisoro ebimyoirwe rundi enyama enyakurumu esagama.
44015021	Okuruga ira na ira omu buli rubuga habaho abantu abarukwegesa Ebyahandiikirwe Musa, habwokuba bisomwa buli Sabbato mu masorrokaniro gaabu.”
44015022	Nubwo abakwenda hamu n'abantu bakuru baacwiremu kukoma abamu omuli bo ab'okutuma Antyokiya bagende na Paulo na Baranaba. Ekitebe kyona ky'abaikiriza kyakisiima. Baakoma Yuda arukwetwa Barsaba na Siraasi. Nubo bantu abali beebembezi omu bagenzi baabo.
44015023	Baabakwasa ebbaruha erukugamba eti: “Bagenzi baitu, itwe abakwenda hamu n'abantu abakuru, tubahandiikire inywe ab'oruganda, Abanyamahanga abali Antyokiya na Siriya na Kilikiya, nitubaramukya.
44015024	Obu twahuliire nkooku haroho abamu abaarugire omuli itwe hanu abaabatalibaniize n'ebigambo byabo, baatabangura emitima yanyu, kandi kunu tutabaragiire,
44015025	tukeesorooza, twacwamu kukoma abasaija n'okubabatumira, hamu n'abagonzibwa Baranaba na Paulo,
44015026	abasaija abaayefubiire habwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
44015027	Nahabweki twabatumira Yuda na Siraasi. Bbo bonka baraabasoborra nibagumya ebi tuhandiikire omu bbaruha egi.
44015028	Kwali kucwamu kwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire na itwe kutabatweka omutumba mukooto kukira binu byonka ebirukwetaagwa:
44015029	musemeriire kwetantara ebihongiirwe abacwezi, n'enyama enyakurumu esagama rundi enyama y'ebisoro ebimyoirwe, hamu n'obusiihani. Obu muraayerindaga ebi, muliba mukozire kurungi. Mugoroobe.”
44015030	Abaatumirwe obu baamazire kuraga abantu ba Yerusaalemu, baimukya orugendo baagenda Antyokiya. Obu baahikireyo, baatandika kweta ab'ekitebe, baabakwasa ebbaruha.
44015031	Kandi bbo, obu baagisomere, baasemererwa muno habw'ebigambo ebirukuhuumuza ebi baagisangiremu.
44015032	Yuda na Siraasi abakaba bali barangi, bakeekambisa ab'oruganda boona babagambira ebigambo bingi eby'okubagumya.
44015033	Obu bakaba baamazireyo ebiro, ab'oruganda baabaraga n'obusinge, baagarukayo Yerusaalemu hali abo abaabatumire. [
44015034	Baitu Siraasi akagonza asigaleyo.]
44015035	Paulo na Baranaba bakaikara Antyokiya hamu n'abaikiriza abandi baingi, nibeegesa kandi nibarangirra abantu ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
44015036	Obu haahingwireho ebiro, Paulo akagambira Baranaba ati: “Ija tugarukeyo, tusuule bagenzi baitu ab'omu mbuga zoona nambere twarangiriire ekigambo kya MUKAMA, turole nkooku bali.”
44015037	Baranaba akaba naayenda kutwara Yohaana arukwetwa Mariko;
44015038	baitu Paulo tiyagonza kugenda n'omuntu ayabaahukaineho Panfiliya, atarasoboire kumaliriza nabo omulimo.
44015039	Hakabaho empaka nyingi. Ekyarugiremu bayaahukana: Baranaba yatwara Mariko, baagwerra omu meeri, baagenda Kipuro,
44015040	baitu Paulo yakoma Siraasi, yagenda nawe. Ab'oruganda boona bamugondeza emigisa ya MUKAMA.
44015041	Paulo yaraba Siriya na Kilikiya naagumya ebitebe by'abaikiriza.
44016001	Paulo obu yarugire Kilikiya, yahika Derube na Lisitura. Oku hakaba haliyo omwegesebwa omu, ibara lye Timoteo, mutabani w'omukazi Omuyudaaya ow'akaba aikiriize ira; baitu ise akaba ali Mugiriiki.
44016002	Ab'oruganda ba Lisitura na Ikoniyo baasiimaga muno Timoteho.
44016003	Paulo akagonza Timoteho kugenda nawe; nahabweki yamusara. Eki akakikora habwokuba Abayudaaya abakaba bali omu biikaro ebi, baamanyaga ise Timoteho nkooku ali Mugiriiki.
44016004	Obu bakaba nibaraba omu mbuga ezi, baasoborraga abantu ebiragiro ebyatairweho abakwenda n'abakuru abakaba bali Yerusaalemu, baabateererra kwikara nibabihikiriza.
44016005	Eki kyaleetera ebitebe by'abaikiriza kwongera kugumira omu kwikiriza, kandi abantu abaikiriize kyabaleetera kukanya buli kiro.
44016006	Bakaraba omu nsi ya Firigiya na Galatiya, Mwoyo Ahikiriire amazire kubatanga kurangirra ekigambo omu Asiya.
44016007	Obu baahikire ha mutaano gwa Misiya, baayenda kweyongera kuhika Bitiniya, baitu Mwoyo wa Yesu tiyabaikiriza;
44016008	nukwo kuraba Misiya, baahika Troa.
44016009	Ekiro eki Paulo yabonekerwa, yarora omusaija owa Makedoni ayemeriire aho naamwesengereza ati: “Yambuka enyanja, oije Makedoni, otukonyere.”
44016010	Obu yarugire kubonekerwa, ahonaaho twayeteekaniza kwambuka kugenda Makedoni, nitugumiza kimu Ruhanga nkooku atwesire okubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi.
44016011	Okuruga Troa twagwerra omu meeri, twayambuka, twahika Samoterake; kandi ha kiro ekyakurasireho twahika Neapoli.
44016012	Obu twarugayo, twahika Filipi, orubuga orukuru rwa Makedoni, orukaba rutembwirwe Abarooma. Omu rubuga oru tukamaramu ebiro bike;
44016013	ha kiro kya Sabbato twaruga omu rubuga nituraba omu irembo lyarwo, twahika ha rubaju rw'ekisaaru nambere twanihiire kusanga abarukusaba. Twaikarra hansi, twabaliza abakazi abakaba beesoroizeho.
44016014	Omuli abo abaatuhuliire hakaba harumu omu arukwetwa Lidiya, omukazi ayarugire omu rubuga rwa Tyatiiro, omusuubuzi w'engoye eza kahuukya, kandi omuntu ayayekambaga kuramya Ruhanga. Obu yahuliire Paulo ebi yayegeseze, MUKAMA yakingura omutima gwe, abiikirize.
44016015	Uwe n'ab'omu ka ye boona obu baamazire kubatizibwa, nubwo yatwesengeriize naagamba ati: “Obu muraaba munanukire nkooku ndukwikiriza kwo MUKAMA, mwije muraale owange.” Yatuhambiriza.
44016016	Ekiro kimu obu tukaba nitugenda omu kiikaro ky'okusabiramu, twatangaana omuzaana ow'akaba atemberwe omwoyo ogw'okuragura, kandi ayatungisaaga muno bakama be omu kuragura.
44016017	Omuzaana ogu yatandika kuhondera Paulo hamu na itwe, naayamuza ati: “Abasaija banu, baheereza ba Ruhanga anyakuli haiguru muno, baizire kubarangirra nkooku muraajunwa.”
44016018	Akaikara naakora ati buli kiro okuhika Paulo obu yabiihiirwe, yahinduka yacoomera omwoyo ogu ati: “Ninkuragira omu ibara lya Yesu Kristo, murugeho.” Gwamurugaho omu kasumi ako konyini.
44016019	Bakama be obu baarozire nkooku hatakyaroho okunihira kwona okw'okumutungamu amagoba, baakwata Paulo na Siraasi, baabacunda, baabatwara booma omumaiso g'abalemi.
44016020	Obu baabahikize hali abacwi b'emisango, baagamba bati: “Abasaija banu Bayudaaya, nibatalibaniza muno orubuga rwaitu,
44016021	nibeegesa engeso ezitarukwikirizibwa ebiragiro byaitu, itwe Abarooma.”
44016022	Ekitebe ky'abantu nakyo kyayetaba n'abakama b'omwisiki omu kubaimukirra, nukwo abacwi b'emisango kuragira babajuule n'amaani kandi babateere emiigo.
44016023	Obu baamazire kubateera emiigo nyingi, baabata omu nkomo, baaragira mukuru waayo kubalinda obutengyambone.
44016024	Obu yamazire kuragirwa ati, yabata omu kisiika ekya ha kaifo, kandi amaguru gaabo yagata mu nkomo z'ebiti.
44016025	Ekiro eki omu itumbi, Paulo na Siraasi bakaba nibasaba kandi nibazina eby'okukugiza Ruhanga, n'abanyankomo abandi bakaba nibabahuliriza.
44016026	Omu kasumi ako haabaho omusisa gw'amaani, emisingi y'enkomo yatengesebwa, enyigi zoona zaakinguka, kandi empingo ezikaba zibabohere zaasumurruka.
44016027	Omukuru w'enkomo obu yajumbutukire omu turo, yasanga enyigi zikingukire, nukwo kusomora empirima ye naayeteekaniza okweyita, naagira ngu, abanyankomo bacwire.
44016028	Baitu Paulo yamweta n'iraka likooto ati: “Oteekora akabi, habwokuba itwena turoho.”
44016029	Omukuru w'enkomo yatuma bamuleetere etaara, yataaha omu nkomo, yagwa omumaiso ga Paulo na Siraasi naatukumira.
44016030	Yabaturukya aheeru, naagamba ati: “Bakama bange, nyowe nkole ki okujunwa?”
44016031	Baamugarukamu bati: “Ikiriza MUKAMA Yesu, nubwo oraajunwa, iwe n'eka yaawe.”
44016032	Uwe hamu na boona abakaba bali omuka ye, Paulo na Siraasi baatandika kubeegesa ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
44016033	Ha saha egi yonyini yabatwara kuboogya ebihuta byabo; nubwo yabatiziibwe hamu n'ab'omuka ye boona.
44016034	Kandi obu yabahikize owe, yabaha ebyokulya. Omukuru w'enkomo n'ab'omu ka ye boona baasemererwa muno habw'okwikiriza Ruhanga.
44016035	Obwire obu bwakiire, abacwi b'emisango baaragira abakuru b'abalinzi nibagamba bati: “Abasaija abo balekere, bagende.”
44016036	Omukuru w'enkomo nukwo kubigambira Paulo ati: “Abacwi b'emisango bantumireho, nibandagira kubalekera; hati muturuke, mugende n'obusinge.”
44016037	Baitu Paulo yamugarukamu ati: “Mara itwe enzaarwa za Rooma batutiire abantu boona nibarora, kandi kunu tutacweriirwe musango gwona, baatuta n'omu nkomo. Obu si nibenda kutwihamu omu nsereko? Nangwa! Bbo bonka leka baije batwihemu.”
44016038	Abalinzi b'enkomo, ebigambo ebi baabigambira abacwi b'emisango. Nabo obu baahuliire banu nkooku bali nzaarwa za Rooma, baatandika kutiina;
44016039	baija babetondera. Babaiha omu nkomo kandi babeesengereza baruge omu rubuga rwabo.
44016040	Paulo na Siraasi nukwo kuruga omu nkomo, baagenda mba Lidiya nambere baasangire ab'oruganda. Obu baamazire kubahuumuza, baarugayo, baagenda.
44017001	Paulo na Siraasi obu baamazire kuraba Anfiipoli na Apolooniya, baahika Teesalonika nambere Abayudaaya bakaba baina isorrokaniro.
44017002	Paulo yataahamu, yatandika kubaza nabo, engeso ye nkooku ekaba eri. Yamara wiiki isatu naabahakaniza naajurra Ebihandiiko ebirukwera,
44017003	naasoborra kandi naagumya Kristo nkooku akaba ali w'okubonabonesibwa n'okuhumbuuka omu bafu, naagamba ati: “Yesu onu ou ndukubarangirra, nuwe Kristo.”
44017004	Abamu omuli bo baasikirizibwa ebi baahuliire, baayeteeraniza na Paulo na Siraasi. Kandi n'Abagiriiki baingi abaatiinaga Ruhanga bakeeteraniza nabo, hamu n'abakazi ab'ekitiinisa baingi.
44017005	Baitu Abayudaaya baakwatwa ihali, nukwo kusorooza abasaija ababi abaikaraga nibenjeera, baimukiiriza ekitebe kikooto ky'abantu, baacwa epuumpu omu rubuga. Baataaha enju ya Yasooni, nibanihira kuturukya Paulo na Siraasi babahikye nambere abantu baayesoroliize.
44017006	Obu baababuzire, baacunda Yasooni n'abamu ha bagenzi baitu, baabahikya omumaiso g'abalemi b'orubuga nibatoka bati: “Abasaija bali abaajumikire ensi, baizire na hanu.
44017007	Yasooni nuwe abaraize; kandi banu boona nibakora ebintu ebirukuhakaniza ebiragiro bya Kaisaali, nibagira ngu, haroho omukama ondi arukwetwa Yesu.”
44017008	Abanyarubuga n'abalemi barwo obu baabihuliire, baatandika kutuntura.
44017009	Yasooni na bagenzi be bakabanza kubaihaho omusimbo batakabalekiire.
44017010	Ekiro eki kyonyini ab'oruganda baacwisa Paulo na Siraasi, baakwata ogwa Beroya. Obu baahikireyo, baataaha omu isorrokaniro ly'Abayudaaya.
44017011	Abayudaaya baayo bakaba batali bantu abagumangana nk'aba Teesalonika. Bbo bakarahuka kwikiriza ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'omutima gumu, nibasoma buli kiro Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera, barole ebigambo binu obu biraaba biri by'amazima.
44017012	Nahabweki Abayudaaya baingi omuli bo bakaikiriza, hamu n'abakazi Abagiriiki baingi, abantu b'ekitiinisa, oteho n'abasaija.
44017013	Baitu Abayudaaya ba Teesalonika obu baahuliire Paulo nkooku arangiriire ekigambo kya Ruhanga omu Beroya, nukwo kwijayo, baatamu abantu epuumpu, baabaimukiriza.
44017014	Ahonaaho ab'oruganda baacwisa Paulo, atwarwe ogw'enyanja; baitu Siraasi na Timoteho baasigarayo.
44017015	Abo abaasendekeriize Paulo, bakamuhikya Ateena. Obu yamazire kubaha obukwenda obw'okugambira Siraasi na Timoteho barahuke bamusangeyo, bbo baakwata omuhanda, baagarukayo.
44017016	Paulo obu akaba akyabategeriize Ateena, omutima gwamusarra muno habw'okurora orubuga oru rwijwire ebisisani by'abacwezi barwo.
44017017	Buli kiro omu isorrokaniro yahakanizaaga Abayudaaya n'abanyamahanga abaatiinaga Ruhanga hamu na'bantu abandi aba yasangaga omu katale.
44017018	Kandi abanyamagezi abamu ab'ekitebe ky'Omugiriiki Epikuliyo n'ab'ekitebe ekindi ky'entabiganya nabo baamuhakaniza. Abamu baakaguza bati: “Hati enjaaliimi egi neegamba ki?” Abandi baagarukamu bati: “Nasisana arukwegesa baruhanga aba tutamanyire” habwokuba akaba naayegesa hali Yesu na ha kuhumbuuka.
44017019	Nukwo kumweta agende nabo, baamuhikya omu rukurato orurukwetwa Arehopago, baatandika kumukaguza bati: “Enyegesa enu empyaka, torukwija kutusoborra amakuru gaayo?
44017020	Habwokuba ebimu ebi otugambiire bituhuniriize. Nahabweki nitwenda kumanya amakuru gaabyo.”
44017021	Abantu boona b'Ateena n'abanyamahanga abakaba baliyo, bakaba bataina kindi eki baakoraga kwihaho kubaza n'okuhurra ebintu byona ebihyaka.
44017022	Paulo yayemerra omumaiso g'orukurato orwa Arehopago yatandika okubasoborra ati: “Inywe abasaija ba Ateena, mmazire kwetegereza nkooku muli bantu abarukutaho muno omutima ha diini mu buli kintu.
44017023	Habwokuba nambere nkarabire hoona, nsangire ebintu ebi murukuramya, kandi naasanga itambiro erimu erihandiikirweho liti: ‘Itambiro lya ruhanga atarukumanywa.’ Ningira ogu ou murukuramya mutamanyire, nuwe Ruhanga, nyowe ou ndukubarangirra.
44017024	“Ruhanga ayahangire ensi na byona ebirumu nkooku ali MUKAMA w'iguru n'ensi, taikara mu maramizo agombekerwe abantu,
44017025	kandi takonyerwa bantu nk'anyakwina eki abuzirwe, habwokuba nuwe wenka aha boona obwomeezi, n'okwikya orwoya, na buli kintu kyona.
44017026	Akahanga enganda zoona eza bantu, nabaiha omu muntu omu, yabaha ensi yoona bagiikalemu, amazire kutaho obusumi bw'emyaka baraamara, yataho n'emitaano nambere enganda ziraagarukiraga,
44017027	nukwo abantu baserre Ruhanga nibamanya nkooku basobora kumuzorra mu kuhamanga. Mazimakwo buli omu omuli itwe tamuli hara,
44017028	habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Omuli Uwe nuho tutunga obwomeezi, nuwe tugenderamu kandi nuwe atuha kubaho.’ Kandi abaisenkuru inywe abaabacweriire enfumo bakagamba bati: ‘Na itwe tuli baana be mali.’
44017029	Itwe nkooku tuli baana ba Ruhanga, tuleke kugira ngu, Ruhanga nasisana ekisisani ekyakozirwe amagezi g'abantu ekyaihirwe omu zaabbu, rundi efeeza, rundi amabaale agaasarwirwe.
44017030	Ebiro ebi mwamazire omu butamanya, Ruhanga atabiteho mutima; baitu hati naaragira abantu boona, hoona nambere bali, beegarukemu,
44017031	habwokuba akataho ekiro nambere ensi yoona ericwerwaho omusango omu mazima, nigucwibwa omuntu ou yataireho, kandi eki akakyoleka abantu boona obu yamuhumbwire omu bafu.”
44017032	Obu baahuliire ha by'okuhumbuuka kw'abafu, abamu baayesekera; baitu abandi baagamba bati: “Ekigambo eki nitwenda kukihurra kiro kindi.”
44017033	Nubwo Paulo yabarugiremu.
44017034	Baitu habaho abasaija abamu abaamugumiireho baafooka abaikiriza. Omuli bo hakaba harumu Diyonisiyo, omukurasi ow'orukurato orwa Arehopago n'omukazi arukwetwa Damali, hamu n'abantu abandi.
44018001	Ebi obu byahoire, Paulo yaruga Ateena yagenda Korinto.
44018002	Nuho yaitiraine Omuyudaaya arukwetwa Akwila, enzaarwa ya Ponto. Uwe na mukazi we Purisila nubwo bakaba bakyarugire Itale habwokuba Omukama omukuru Kilahudiyo akaba aragiire Abayudaaya boona baruge Rooma. Paulo yagenda kubabungira,
44018003	kandi obu yarozire bali bakozi b'amaheema, omulimo ogurukusisa nk'ogu yakozire, yatandika kwikara nabo, nibakora hamu.
44018004	Buli Sabbato yayegesaaga omu isorrokaniro lyayo kandi yalengahoga kusoonasoona Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki.
44018005	Siraasi na Timoteho obu baamazire kwija, nibaruga Makedoni, Paulo yayeheriireyo kimu ha mulimo ogw'okutebeza n'okusoborra Abayudaaya nkooku Yesu ali Kristo.
44018006	Obu baatandikire kumuhakaniza n'okumujuma, yakunkumura ekijwaro kye, naagamba ati: “Esagama yanyu ebe hali inywe. Nyowe tinyina musango. Okuruga hati ninyija kugenda omu Banyamahanga.”
44018007	Yaruga omu isorrokaniro lya Korinto, yagenda kwikara omunju y'omusaija arukwetwa Tito Yusto, omuntu ayatiinaga Ruhanga. Enju ye ekaba eri haihi n'isorrokaniro.
44018008	Kirisipo, omukuru w'isorrokaniro, hamu n'ab'omuka ye boona baikiriza MUKAMA. Abakorinto abandi baingi abaahuliire enyegesa za Paulo baikiriza kandi baabatizibwa.
44018009	Kiro kimu omu itumbi MUKAMA akabonekera Paulo yamugambira ati: “Otatiina, yegesa kandi otaculeera;
44018010	ndi hamu na iwe, kandi tiharoho muntu araakukora kubi habwokuba omu rubuga runu nyinamu abantu bange baingi.”
44018011	Paulo akamarayo omwaka gumu n'ameezi mukaaga, naabeegesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
44018012	Galiyo obu akaba ali mulemi mukuru wa Akaaya, Abayudaaya bakaikirraniza okukwata Paulo, baamutwara omu kooti,
44018013	nibagamba bati: “Omusaija onu naayohya abantu, baramye Ruhanga omu mulingo ogutarukwikirizibwa Ebiragiro bya Musa.”
44018014	Kandi Paulo obu akaba atakagarukiremu, nubwo Galiyo yagambiire Abayudaaya ati: “Inywe Abayudaaya, kakuba omuntu onu abaire aina eki asobeze, rundi acwire ekiragiro kikuru, naakubagumiisiriize mbahurra;
44018015	baitu empaka zanyu obu ziraaba ziri ha bigambo, rundi ha mabara, rundi ha biragiro byanyu, mubyemarre inywenka. Nyowe tindukwenda kucwa misango ey'ebintu nk'ebi.”
44018016	Yababinga omu kooti.
44018017	Aho boona baahinduka baagwera Soositene, mukuru w'isorrokaniro, baamuterra omu kooti. Baitu Galiyo ebi byona atabifeeho.
44018018	Ebi obu byahoire, Paulo yayongera kumarayo ebiro bingi, nubwo yaragire ab'oruganda, yagwerra omu meeri, yayambuka yagenda Siriya, aina Purisila na Akwila. Obu bakaba bali Kenkereya, Paulo yayemwa isoke nkooku akaba aragaine.
44018019	Kandi obu baahikire Efeeso, yabasigaho. Yataaha omu isorrokaniro wenka, yatandika kuhakana n'Abayudaaya.
44018020	Abaikiriza obu baamusabire ayongere kwikara nabo ebiro bindi, yayanga;
44018021	baitu yabaraga naagamba ati: “Ruhanga obu aliba agondeze, ndigaruka.” Yagwerra omu meeri, yaruga Efeeso.
44018022	Obu yasaabukire ahikire Kaisaariya, yagenda kuramukyaho ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, hanyuma yagenda Antyokiya.
44018023	Obu yamazireyo ebiro bike, yarugayo, yagenda naaraba omunsi yoona ya Galatiya na Firigiya, naagumya abaikiriza boona.
44018024	Omu biro ebi, Efeeso hakaijayo Omuyudaaya, ibara lye Apolo, enzaarwa ya Alekizanderiya. Apolo ogu akaba ali muntu arukubaza kurungi kandi anyakumanyire muno Ebihandiiko ebirukwera.
44018025	Omusaija ogu akaba ayegesiibwe Omuhanda gwa MUKAMA; yarangirra n'omuhimbo ebigambo ebirukukwata hali Yesu kandi yabyegesa kurungi, noobu araaba akaba naamanya okubatiza kwa Yohaana kwonka.
44018026	Yatandika kwegesa n'obumanzi omu isorrokaniro ly'Abayudaaya; baitu Purisila na Akwila obu baamuhuliire, baamutwara owaabu, baayongera kumwegesa kurungi Omuhanda gwa Ruhanga.
44018027	Apolo obu yagondeze kwambuka kugenda Akaaya, ab'oruganda baamusagika, baahandiikira abaikiriza baayo nibabasaba kumutangirra. Obu yahikireyo, yakonyerwa amaani ga Ruhanga kugumya abo abakaba baikiriize,
44018028	habwokuba yahakanizaaga muno Abayudaaya burole, naaboolekera omu Bihandiiko ebirukwera Yesu nkooku ali Kristo.
44019001	Apolo obu akaba akyali Korinto, Paulo akakwata omuhanda ogw' obwerre, yahika Efeeso nambere yasangire abaikiriza abamu.
44019002	Yabakaguza ati; “Mukaheebwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire obu mwaikiriize?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Nangwa, n'okuhurra titukahurrahoga nkooku haroho Mwoyo Ahikiriire.”
44019003	Yayongera yabakaguza ati: “Mukabatizibwa muta?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Tukabatizibwa omu kubatiza okwa Yohaana.”
44019004	Nandiki Paulo ati: “Yohaana akabatiza n'okubatiza kw'okwegarukamu, naateererra abantu kwikiriza ogu ow'akaba ali ow'okumwija enyuma, nuwe Yesu.”
44019005	Obu baahuliire eki, baabatizibwa omu ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu,
44019006	kandi Paulo obu yamazire kubataho emikono, Mwoyo Ahikiriire yabaijaho, baatandika kubaza endimi n'okuranga ebya Ruhanga.
44019007	Abo boona bakaba bali nka ikumi na babiri.
44019008	Paulo akataaha omu isorrokaniro ly'Abayudaaya, yabalizamu n'obumanzi kandi yahakaniramu n'amagezi okubaikirizisa eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga. Yamara ameezi asatu naakora ati,
44019009	okuhika abamu obu bakadadaire, bayanga kwikiriza, nibajuma Omuhanda gwa MUKAMA omumaiso ga boona. Nubwo Paulo yabarugireho, yatwara abaikiriize, kandi buli kiro baikaraga nibahanurra omu kisiika ky'okubalizaamu eky'omusaija arukwetwa Tiraano.
44019010	Paulo yaikara naakora ati kumara emyaka ebiri. Ekyarugiremu nukwo abantu boona abaikaraga Asiya: Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki, kuhurra ekigambo kya Mukama.
44019011	Emikono ya Paulo, Ruhanga akagikozesa ebyamahano ebitakabonwaga.
44019012	Abantu bakaba nibatwara ebitambara n'engoye ebi yakwasireho babikwasaho abarwaire, bakira endwara zaabo, n'emyoyo emibi yabarugaho.
44019013	Abayudaaya abamu, enjeezijeezi, abaagendaga nibabinga emyoyo emibi, nubwo baalengereho kugibinga hali abo abakaba bainayo, nibaatura ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu, nibagamba bati: “Ninkuragirra omuli Yesu, Paulo ou arangirra.”
44019014	Omuli abo abaakikozire hakaba harumu abasigazi musanju, batabani b'Omuyudaaya Sikewa, nyakatagara mukuru.
44019015	Baitu omwoyo omubi gwabagarukamu guti: “Yesu mmumanyire, na Paulo mmumanyire; baitu inywe, niinywe baha?”
44019016	Omusaija ow'akaba aroho omwoyo omubi yabagurukira, yabakiza amaani, yabasingura. Baaruga omunju egi bali busa kandi bahutaire muno.
44019017	Abantu boona abaikaraga Efeeso, Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki, obu baakihuliire baatiina muno kandi baanyumiza MUKAMA Yesu.
44019018	Baingi omuli abo abaikiriize, bakaija baayegarukamu nibaatura ebibi ebi baakozire.
44019019	Kandi baingi omuli abo abakaba nibakora eby'obufumu, bakasorooza hamu ebitabu byabo, baabyokeza omumaiso g'abantu. Obu babaliriire omuhendo gw'ebitabu ebi, baasanga niguhika ebicweka by'efeeza emitwaro etaano.
44019020	Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyayeyongera kuraranga muno kandi kyasingurra kimu.
44019021	Ebi byona obu byahoire, Paulo yacwamu kugaruka Yerusaalemu, naaraba Makedoni na Akaaya naagira ati: “Obu ndikamara kuhikayo, ninyija kugenda na Rooma.”
44019022	Nukwo yatuma ati babiri ha bakonyezi be, Timoteho na Erasito, bamwebembere kuhika Makedoni, uwe akyasigaire Asiya kumara ebiro bike.
44019023	Omu kasumi ako, hakaba haroho okwimukirra kwingi habw'Omuhanda gwa MUKAMA.
44019024	Habwokuba omusaija arukwetwa Demetiriyo, omuheesi w'eby'efeeza, ayaheesaga ebisisani by'ekirorro ky'embandwa enkazi Atemisi, yahaga abaheesi baingi omulimo.
44019025	Abo boona akabasorooza, hamu n'abandi abaakoraga omulimo ogu, yabagambira ati: “Basaija inywe, mumanyire omulimo gunu nkooku nugwo gubaire nigututungisa.
44019026	Hati mumazire kurora n'okuhurra, tihali Efeeso honka, baitu kutagirwa n'omu Asiya yoona, omusaija ogu Paulo nkooku asoonasoonere abantu baingi yabahindura, naagamba ngu, baruhanga abakozirwe engaro tibali baruhanga naakake.
44019027	Hati nu akabi kaija, tiharukwija kugaywa mulimo gwaitu gwonka, baitu n'ekirorro ky'embandwa enkuru Atemisi nikiija kudiba; kandi omucwezikati ogu arukuramibwa ab'omu Asiya n'ahandi hoona omunsi, naija kwihwaho ekitiinisa kye.”
44019028	Obu baahuliire eki, baakwatwa ekiniga kingi, baatandika kutoka muno nibagamba bati: “Atemisi ow'Abeefeso nuwe ruranganwa!”
44019029	Orubuga rwona rwaijwamu akambayaya, abantu bajumbutukira hamu, baagenda omu kizaaniro ky'orubuga nibacunda Abamakedoni babiri Gaayo na Arisitariko, abasaija abaagendaga na Paulo omu ngendo ze.
44019030	Paulo nawe yagonza kugenda omu kitebe eki eky'abantu babataisule, baitu abaikiriza baamutanga;
44019031	kandi abamu ha banyoro abakuru aba Asiya, abakaba bali banywani be, baamutumaho, nibamwesengereza aleke kugenda omu kizaaniro eki akeenaga omu kabi.
44019032	Omu kasumi ako buli omu akaba naatoka okwe; habwokuba bakaba batabatabukire, kandi abarukukira obwingi omuli bo batamanye eki bayesorooliize.
44019033	Abayudaaya baacumiriza Alekizanda omumaiso ga boona. Abamu ab'omu kitebe nukwo kuteekereza ngu, nuwe arukujunaanwa. Alekizanda yabaculeeza n'omukono gwe, nukwo ayetonganirre.
44019034	Baitu obu baayetegeriize nkooku ali Muyudaaya, boona baatokera hamu nibagamba bati: “Atemisi ow'Abeefeso nuwe ruranganwa!” Baakora bati okumara esaaha ibiri.
44019035	Omukuru w'orubuga obu yamazire kuculeeza abantu yabagambira ati: “Inywe abasaija ba Efeeso, nooha atamanyire orubuga rwa Efeeso nkooku nurwo rulinda iramizo lya Atemisi ruranganwa, rulinda n'ekisisani kye ekyarugire omu iguru?
44019036	Hati nu, nkooku hataroho muntu asobora kubihakaniza, nimusemerra kuculeera, mutakora kantu na kamu nimurahukiriza.
44019037	Habwokuba abasaija banu aba muleesire hanu, tibasiisire eby'omu birorro byanyu kandi tibajumire mucwezikati waitu.
44019038	Demetiriyo n'abaheesi bagenzi be obu baraaba baina eki barukunyegererra omuntu weena, ekooti ez'okucweramu emisango iroho, n'abalemi baroho; nuho bagende banyegerrangane.
44019039	Baitu obu muraaba mwina ekindi eki murukwenda, kiraacwerwa omu rukurato rwaitu orwa butoosa.
44019040	Habwokuba na itwe tuli omu kabi k'okunyegererwa habw'okuleeta akajagarro ak'ekiro kinu, kandi tiharoho bulyo bwona obu tusobora kutongana obw'okunanura ekireesire akajagarro kanu.”
44019041	Obu yamazire kugamba eki, yaraga ekitebe.
44020001	Akajagarro obu kahoire, Paulo yayeta abaikiriza yabagambira eby'okubagumya, yabaraga, yarugayo yagenda Makedoni.
44020002	Obu yamazire kuraba omu bicweka ebi, n'okubagambira bingi eby'okubagumya, yahika Bugiriiki.
44020003	Oku yamarayo ameezi asatu, kandi obu akaba naayeteekaniza okugwerra omu meeri kugenda Siriya, Abayudaaya baayekoba omu nsita okumwita. Baitu uwe yacwamu kugaruka enyuma arabe Makedoni ha bwerre.
44020004	Abaamusendekeriize kumuhikya Asiya nubo banu: Soopateri owa Beroya, mutabani wa Piiro; Arisitariko na Sekundo Abateesalonika; Gaayo owa Derube na Timoteho, hamu na Tikiko na Turofimo abantu ba Asiya.
44020005	Abo boona bakatwebembera, baatulindirirra Turoyi.
44020006	Ebiro bikuru eby'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe obu byamazire kuhwaho, na itwe twaruga Filipi tuli omu meeri. Emeeri egi twagimaramu ebiro bitaano, kandi bbo twabasanga Turoyi nambere twamazire ebiro musanju.
44020007	Ha kiro eky'okubanza omu wiiki, obu twayesoroize kulya hamu omugaati; Paulo, ow'akaba ali w'okurugayo nyenkya, yatandika kubaza nabo. Yaikaraho muno nayegesa okuhika omu itumbi.
44020008	Omu kisiika ekya haiguru nambere tukaba twesorooliize, hakaba nihaakiramu etaara nyingi.
44020009	Paulo obu yaikaire naabaza muno, omusigazi arukwetwa Eyutiko, ow'akaba aikaliire omu idirisa, yakwatwa oturo twingi, twamulemesa, yahanuuka omu kainaasatu, yagwa hansi. Baamwihaho afiire.
44020010	Paulo yasirimuka, yamwinamaho, yamubumbaatira naagamba ati: “Muleke kutiina, akyayomiire.”
44020011	Nukwo Paulo kugaruka omu kainaasatu, kandi obu yamazire kucwamu omugaati n'okulya, yayongera kubaza nabo omwanya mukooto okuhikya omu rukyakya nambere yabarugireho.
44020012	Omusigazi ogu bamutwara omuka ayomiire, emitima yabagwa omunda.
44020013	Itwe tukagwerra omu meeri, twayeyongera omumaiso, twahika Aso nambere twanihiire kugwerereza Paulo ow'akaba ategekere kuraba ha bwerre.
44020014	Obu yatuhikireho tuli Aso, twamuta omu meeri, twairrayo twahika Mitileene.
44020015	Obwire obu bwakiire, twarugayo tuli omu meeri, twarabaho ekizinga Kiiyo. Ha kiro kya kasatu ky'orugendo twahika Saamo, kandi ha kiro kya kana twahika Mileeto.
44020016	Paulo wenka akaba acwiremu kutaraba Efeeso, nukwo aleke kukerererwa Asiya; habwokuba akaba naarahukiriza, obu kiraaba nikisoboka, ekiro kikuru kya Pentikooti kimusange Yerusaalemu.
44020017	Obu akaba ali Mileeto, Paulo yatuma Efeeso kumweterayo abakuru ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza.
44020018	Obu baamuhikireho, yabagambira ati: “Nimumanya omulingo nabaikaramuga obutoosa, okuruga ha kiro eki naahikiireho omu Asiya.
44020019	Nimumanya nkooku nkaba nimpeereza MUKAMA n'okwebundaaza kwona, kandi nimumanya emihito n'obusaasi ebyangweriire habw'obucwangya bw'Abayudaaya.
44020020	Baitu tinkalekiire kubarangirra n'okubeegesa ekigambo kyona ekiraabagasira, ninkigamba omu rwanjale rw'abantu rundi omu maka ganyu,
44020021	ninteererra Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki kuhindukira Ruhanga n'okwikiriza MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
44020022	Hati nimurora nkooku ndukuhambirizibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire kugenda Yerusaalemu ntarukumanya ebirangwera obu ndaahikayo;
44020023	kyonka omu buli rubuga oru ndabiremu, Mwoyo Ahikiriire nuwe ammanyisa nkooku ndi w'okukwatwa omu nkomo n'okubonabonesibwa.
44020024	Baitu obwomeezi bwange tindukubweta bw'omugaso rundi bw'omuhendo hali nyowe. Eki ndukugonza nukwo kumaliiriza orugendo rwange n'okuhikiriza obuheereza obu nahairwe MUKAMA Yesu, nukwo okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'embabazi za Ruhanga.
44020025	“Hati nimmanya nkooku hataroho n'omu omuli inywe aba nahikireho nindangirra obukama bwa Ruhanga ow'aligaruka kundora.
44020026	Nahabweki hati nimbamanyisa nkooku ntarukujunaanwa obwomeezi bw'omuntu weena omuli inywe ow'aligwa,
44020027	habwokuba nkabooleka entegeka yoona eya Ruhanga ntarukutiina.
44020028	Hati nu mwerinde inywenka, kandi mulinde n'igana lyona Mwoyo Ahikiriire eri yabakwasize kurolerra, muliise ekitebe kya MUKAMA. Ekitebe eki yacungwize esagama ye.
44020029	Nimmanya ngu, obu ndaamara kubarugaho, emyaaga emikatuzi niija kubataahirra, kandi igana eri terukwija kuligirra mbabazi.
44020030	Nangwa n'omuli inywe halirugamu abantu abarukwegesa eby'okuhabisa abaikiriza, nukwo beetungire bati ab'okubahondera.
44020031	Nahabweki mwikale nimurora kandi mwijuke nkooku namazire na inywe emyaka esatu ntarukwosa kiro na nyamusana kuteererra buli omu, nindira.
44020032	Hati nu, nimbakwasa Ruhanga n'enyegesa ey'embabazi ze. Enyegesa enyakusobora kubagumya n'okubatungisa obugwetwa omuli abo abeeziibwe.
44020033	Tinkasabaga muntu n'omu kumpa feeza rundi ezaabbu, noobu kyakuba ekyokujwara.
44020034	Inywena nimumanya emikono yange nkooku niyo yantungisaaga byona ebi naayetagaaga, hamu n'abo aba nkaba nyinabo.
44020035	Ebi byona nkabikora kubooleka nkooku musemeriire kwehayo nukwo mukonyere enceke, nimwijuka ebigambo MUKAMA Yesu ebi yagambire ati: ‘Okugaba kwina omugisa okukira okuheebwa!’”
44020036	Obu yamazire kugamba ebi, Paulo yateeza amaju hamu nabo boona, baasaba.
44020037	Obu, boona bakaba nibarra, Paulo bamugwa omu kifuba nibamunywegera.
44020038	Ekyakizire muno kubasaaliza nikyo ekigambo eki yabaragisize ngu, tibaligaruka kumurora. Baamusendekereza, baamuhikya ha meeri.
44021001	Obu twamazire kubaraga, twagwerra omu meeri, twagenda tutarukukubutuka twahika ekizinga Koosi. Ekiro ekyakurasireho twahika Roodo. Obu twarugire Roodo, twahika Paatara,
44021002	nambere twasangire meeri erukugenda Foinike, twagitaahamu, twagenda.
44021003	Obu twalengiire ekizinga Kipuro, twagisiga ha bumoso, twagenda Siriya. Twahika ha bwerre omu rubuga Tiiro, habwokuba nuho bakaba nibagya kwihiramu ebintu omu meeri.
44021004	Obu twasangireyo abaikiriza, twamarayo ebiro musanju. Habw'okuhaburwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, abantu baayo baagambire Paulo eleke kugenda Yerusaalemu.
44021005	Baitu obwire bwaitu obu bwahikire, twarugayo, twayongera orugendo rwaitu. Abo boona, hamu n'abakazi n'abaana baabo baatusendekereza okuhika obu baatuturukize orubuga. Obu twahikire ha musa gw'enyanja twateeza amaju, twasaba. Hanyuma, obu twamazire kuragangana,
44021006	twagwerra omu meeri, nabo bakagaruka owaabu.
44021007	Orugendo rwaitu orw'okuruga Tiiro obu rwahoire, twahika Putolemai nambere twaramukiize ab'oruganda, kandi twamara nabo ekiro kimu.
44021008	Obu bwakiire twarugayo, twahika Kaisaariya; twataaha omunju ya Filipo omurangirizi w'Amakuru Amarungi, ow'akaba ali omu ha baheereza bali omusanju, twaikara owe.
44021009	Filipo akaba aina bahara be bbana abataswirwe, kandi abakaba baina ekisembo ky'okuranga ebya Ruhanga.
44021010	Obu twamazireyo ebiro, hakaijayo omurangi ayarugire Buyudaaya, ibara lye Agabo.
44021011	Obu yatuhikireho, yakwata omweko gwa Paulo, yagwebohesa amaguru n'emikono naagamba ati: “Kinu nikyo Mwoyo Ahikiriire arukugamba ngu: ‘Abayudaaya ba Yerusaalemu nukwo baliboha bati mukama w'omweko gunu, bamuheyo omu mikono y'Abanyamahanga.’ ”
44021012	Obu twahuliire eki, itwe n'abandi boona abakaba baliyo, twayesengereza Paulo aleke kugenda Yerusaalemu.
44021013	Baitu uwe yagarukamu ati: “Kiki eki murukukora kwija hamu nimurra kandi nimunsununura? Nyowe tinyeteekaniize kukwatwa kwonka baitu n'okufeera Yerusaalemu habw'ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu.”
44021014	Obu yayangire kutuhuliriza, twamuleka, nitugamba tuti: “MUKAMA eki araagonza, nikyo kikorwe.”
44021015	Ebiro byaitu Kaisaariya obu byahoireho, twaboha ebintu, twaimukya orugendo, twagenda Yerusaalemu.
44021016	Abamu ha baikiriza ba Kaisaariya baagenda na itwe, baatuhikya ha nju ya Minasooni, Omunyakipuro, omu ha baikiriza abaabandize kuhindukira MUKAMA. Nuho tukaba tuli b'okuraara.
44021017	Obu tukaba nitukyataaha Yerusaalemu, ab'oruganda batutangirra n'okusemererwa.
44021018	Kandi nyenkya, obwire obu bwakiire, Paulo yagenda na itwe kurora Yakobbo. Abakuru b'ekitebe boona bakaba baliyo.
44021019	Obu yamazire kubaramukya, Paulo yabasoborra naaherraniza ebintu byona Ruhanga ebi yamukoleze omu Banyamahanga.
44021020	Obu baahuliire ebi baatandika kukugiza Ruhanga. Kandi Paulo baamugarukamu nibasoborra bati: “Mugenzi waitu, na iwe orozire omu Buyudaaya nkooku harumu abantu enkumi n'enkumi abaikiriize; boona nibeekambira Ebiragiro bya Musa.
44021021	Na hati baahurra nkooku orukwegesa Abayudaaya boona abarukwikara omu Banyamahanga kuleka Ebiragiro bya Musa, kandi noobeegesa kutasara abaana baabo n'okutakwata engeso ez'ihanga lyaitu.
44021022	Hati tukole ki? Mazima nibaija kuhurra nkooku oizire kunu.
44021023	Nahabweki kora eki turukukuhabura. Hanu twinaho abasaija bbana abaarahiire;
44021024	obatwale, oyeyeze hamu nabo, osasule byona eby'okubamwa isoke, emikoro nkooku eri. Aho boona nuho baraamanyira ebyakugambirweho nkooku bitali by'amazima, kandi iwe wenka nkooku oyerinda kandi okwata Ebiragiro bya Musa.
44021025	Baitu Abanyamahanga abo abaikiriize, tukabahandiikira ebbaruha nitubasoborra eki twacwiremu, nkooku basemeriire kwetantara ebihongiirwe abacwezi, n'enyama enyakurumu esagama, n'ebisoro ebimyoirwe, hamu n'obusiihani.”
44021026	Ha kiro ekyakurasireho, Paulo yatwara abasaija abo, yayeyeza hamu nabo, yataaha omunju ya Ruhanga kumanyisa abakuru baayo ebiro eby'okwezebwa kwabu nambere birihweraho, nukwo ekihongwa ekya buli omu kiheebwayo.
44021027	Ebiro ebi musanju obu bikaba biri haihi kuhwa, Abayudaaya abamu abaarugire Asiya, baamurora omunju ya Ruhanga, baatandika kujagaraza abantu, baagenda baamukwata,
44021028	nibatoka bati: “Inywe basaija ba Isirairi, mutukoonyere! Omusaija onu nuwe arukugenda buli hantu naayegesa abantu kuhakaniza ihanga lyaitu, naagaya Ebiragiro ebi twahairwe Musa n'ekiikaro kinu ekirukwera. Kandi ihangamura ataahize Abagiriiki omunju ya Ruhanga, asiisire n'ekiikaro kinu ekirukwera.”
44021029	Eki bakakigamba habw'okumurora juba omu rubuga ali na Trofimo owa Efeeso. Baateekereza ngu, Paulo amutaahize omunju ya Ruhanga.
44021030	Nubwo orubuga rwona rwaimukiriire, abantu baayesorooza, baakwata Paulo, baamucunda, baamuturukya omunju ya Ruhanga; ahonaaho enyigi zaakingwa.
44021031	Kandi obu bakaba nibeetekaniza kumwita, amakuru gahika mukuru w'amahe ngu, Yerusaalemu yoona egwirwemu akambayaya.
44021032	Ahonaaho yatwara ab'amahe hamu n'abakuru baabo bagwera ekitebe ky'abantu. Nabo obu baarozire ab'amahe hamu n'omukuru wabu, baalekeraho kuteera Paulo.
44021033	Kandi mukuru w'amahe obu yahikire Paulo, yamukwata, yaragira bamubohese enjegere ibiri, yamukaguza ibara lye n'eki akozire.
44021034	Abamu ab'omu kitebe baatoka kundi n'abandi kundi. Obu yayetegeriize nkooku atarukusobora kumanya amazima habw'etoko yabu, yaragira kumutwara omu kigo ky'ab'amahe.
44021035	Obu baamuhikize ha matembero g'ekigo, ab'amahe baamuhimba habw'empaka z'abantu;
44021036	habwokuba ekitebe ky'abantu kikamukuratira nikitoka muno kiti: “Mumwite!”
44021037	Paulo obu akaba ali haihi kutaahibwa omu kigo, yakaguza mukuru w'amahe ati: “Nonyikiriza kukugambira ekigambo?” Nawe yamukaguza ati: “Mara iwe noomanya Orugiriiki?
44021038	Tiniiwe Omunyamisiri oli ayayemeseze abantu omu biro ebyahingwire, watwara omu irungu abasaija enkumi ina abaisi b'abantu?”
44021039	Nandiki Paulo ati: “Nyowe ndi Muyudaaya, nzaarwa ya Taruso orwa Kilikiya, orubuga orumanyirwe muno. Nkwesengeriize, nyikiriza mbalize abantu.”
44021040	Obu yamwikiriize, Paulo yayemerra ha matembero, yaculeeza abantu n'omukono gwe. Obu baamazire kuculeera, yabagambira omu Ruhebburaayo ati:
44022001	“Bagenzi bange kandi bataata, muhurre ekigambo eki ndukwetonganirra omu maiso ganyu.”
44022002	Obu baahuliire naabagambira omu Ruhebburaayo, baaculerra kimu cii. Paulo yagamba ati:
44022003	“Nyowe ndi Muyudaaya, nzaarwa ya Taruso orwa Kilikiya, baitu nkakurra omu rubuga runu, naatendekwa omwegesa Gamalyeli okukuraatira engeso z'Ebiragiro by'abaisenkuru itwe, nayekambiraga ebya Ruhanga inywena nkooku murukukora hati.
44022004	Nahiiganizaaga abantu abaahonderaga Omuhanda gunu, ntaireho n'okubaita, nimboha abasaija n'abakazi, nimbakwasa omu nkomo.
44022005	Omukuru wa banyakatagara n'abakurasi boona ab'orukurato nubo bakaiso bange, habwokuba bakampa ebbaruha ez'okutwarra bagenzi baabo ab'omu rubuga Damasiko. Nkagendayo nkwate na bali abakaba baliyo, mbaleete Yerusaalemu baboherwe, nukwo bafubirwe.
44022006	“Obu nkaba ninkyagenda, ndi haihi kuhika Damasiko, nk'omu ihangwe, ahonaaho ekyererezi eky'amaani kyaruga omwiguru, kyanyehinguliriza.
44022007	Naagwa hansi, naahurra iraka niringambira liti: ‘Saulo, Saulo nompiiganiriza ki?’
44022008	Na nyowe naagarukamu nti: ‘Niiwe oha, Waitu?’ Lyangarukamu liti: ‘Ninyowe Yesu owa Nazareeti ou orukuhiiganiza.’
44022009	Abantu abakaba bali na nyowe bakarora ekyererezi eki, baitu batahurre iraka ly'ogu ow'arukubaza na nyowe.
44022010	Naayongera naakaguza nti: ‘Nkole ki MUKAMA wange?’ Nawe yangarukamu ati: ‘Imuka, otaahe orubuga Damasiko. Nuho oraamanyisibwa eki oraakora.’
44022011	Obu naalemerwe kurora habw'okwangasana kw'ekyererezi eki, bagenzi bange nubwo baannanasire, bampikya Damasiko.
44022012	“Omusaija arukwetwa Ananiya, omuntu ayayekambiraga ebya Ruhanga, naahikiriza Ebiragiro bya Musa kandi naasiimwa Abayudaaya boona abaikaraga Damasiko,
44022013	yaija kundora. Yanyemerra ha rubaju, yangambira ati: ‘Mugenzi wange Saulo, iguka amaiso.’ Omu kasumi ako konyini amaiso gange gaiguka, naamurora.
44022014	Yayongera yagamba ati: ‘Ruhanga ow'abaisenkuruitwe akukomere omanye ebi arukugonza, orole Omuhikiriire ogu Yesu, kandi ohurre iraka lye;
44022015	habwokuba oliba kaiso we ha bantu boona, ow'okugumya ebi warozire n'ebi wahuliire.
44022016	Hati otegeriize ki? Imuka, obatizibwe, oyogebweho ebibi byawe, oyamirre ibara lye.’ ”
44022017	“Kiro kimu, obu namazire kugaruka Yerusaalemu, nkaba ninsaba omunju ya Ruhanga, ahonaaho nasisa nk'arukuroota.
44022018	Narora MUKAMA nangambira ati: ‘Rahuka, oruge bwango Yerusaalemu, habwokuba abantu banu tibarukwija kwikiriza ebi orukumbazaaho.’
44022019	Na nyowe nagarukamu nti: ‘MUKAMA wange, bbo bonka bamanyire nkooku nagendaga omu buli isorrokaniro ninta omu nkomo abarukukwikiriza kandi nimbateera.
44022020	Obu baaseesire esagama ya Sitefano, kaiso waawe, nkaba nyemeriireho nimpikirraniza n'abarukumwita, ndinzire ebijwaro byabo.’
44022021	Baitu MUKAMA yangambira ati: ‘Irooko ogende, ninyija kukutuma hara omu Banyamahanga.’ ”
44022022	Abantu bakaikara bamutegiire amatu okuhika obu yagambire ebigambo ebi; nubwo baatokiire haiguru nibagamba bati: “Omuntu ogu mumwite aruge omu nsi! Tasemeriire kwikaraho!”
44022023	Obu, bakaba nibatoka muno, nibanaga n'ebijwaro byabo, kandi nibamiisa ecuucu haiguru.
44022024	Nukwo mukuru w'amahe kuragira bamutaahye omu kigo, bamukagulirize nibamuteera n'enkoba, nukwo amanye ebi barukumujunaana.
44022025	Obu baamazire kumuboha ha nyomyo, Paulo yakaguza omukuru w'ekihanda ky'abaserikale ow'akaba ayemeriire haihi ati: “Omu Biragiro byanyu nimwikirizibwa kuteera enkoba omuntu anyakuli Omurooma kandi atakasingirwe musango?”
44022026	Mukuru w'ekihanda ky'abaserikale obu yahuliire eki, yagenda hali mukuru w'amahe yamukaguza ati: “Omanyire eki orukukora? Omusaija onu Murooma.”
44022027	Aho mukuru w'amahe yaija, yamukaguza ati: “Ngambira amazima, oli Murooma kwo?” Paulo yamugarukamu ati: “Ego.”
44022028	Mukuru w'amahe yamugambira ati: “Nyowe Oburooma nkabugura omuhendo mukooto.” Nandiki Paulo ati: “Baitu nyowe nkazaarwakwo.”
44022029	Ahonaaho abo abakaba nibagonza kumukaguliriza baamurugaho, kandi mukuru w'amahe obu yayetegeriize nkooku yabohere Omurooma, yatiina muno.
44022030	Nyenkya obu bwakiire, habw'okwenda kumanya Abayudaaya ebi barukumujunaana, omukuru w'amahe yabohorra Paulo kandi yaragira abanyakatagara abakuru n'orukurato rwona kwesorooza. Yaleeta Paulo yamwemereza omumaiso gaabo.
44023001	Paulo yagumyaho amaiso ab'orukurato, yatandika kwesoborra ati: “Bagenzi bange, obwomeezi bwange bwona naikaraga ninkora ebihikire omu maiso ga Ruhanga okuhika na hati, ntaina ekirukunjunanwa.”
44023002	Obu yagambire ati, Ananiya omukuru w'abanyakatagara, yaragira abo abakaba bamwemeriire haihi kumuteera oruhi.
44023003	Nukwo Paulo kumugambira ati: “Iwe ekisiika ekisiigirwe inoni! Na iwe Ruhanga alikuteera! Oikaliire kuncwera omusango noosigikira omu Biragiro bya Musa, kandi wabicwa nooragira kunteera?”
44023004	Abo abakaba bamwemeriire haihi baagamba bati: “Obu si noojuma nyakatagara omukuru owa Ruhanga?”
44023005	Nandiki Paulo ati: “Bagenzi bange, mbaire ntamanyire nkooku ali nyakatagara omukuru; ningira kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Otalijuma omukuru w'ihanga lyawe.’ ”
44023006	Hanyuma Paulo obu yayetegeriize omu bantu abeesoroize, ekicweka kimu nkooku kikaba kiri ky'Abasadukaayo kandi ekindi ky'Abafalisaayo, nubwo yagambiire Orukurato n'iraka likooto ati: “Bagenzi bange, nyowe ndi Mufalisaayo kandi mwana w'Abafalisaayo. Ninjunanwa hanu habw'okunihira oku twina ha kuhumbuuka kw'abafu.”
44023007	Obu yamazire kugamba eki, empaka zaimuka hagati y'Abafalisaayo n'Abasadukaayo; orukurato rwayebaganizaamu habiri.
44023008	Abasadukaayo nubo abaagambire ngu, tiharoho kuhumbuuka kw'abafu, kandi tiharoho malaika, noobu gwakubaire omuzimu; baitu Abafalisaayo ebi byona babiikiriza.
44023009	Aho haabaho etoko nyingi, abamu ha beegesa b'ebiragiro ab'omu kitebe ky'Abafalisaayo baayemerra, baahakana n'amaani nibagamba bati: “Titurukurora nsobi omuntu onu ei yakozire. Kiraaba kita kakuba aba agambiirwe malaika rundi omuzimu?”
44023010	Empaka zaabo obu zayeyongiire, omukuru w'amahe yatiina, naateekereza ngu, Paulo basobora kumutaagataagura, nukwo kuragira ab'amahe bagende bamubaihemu n'amaani, bamutwale omu kigo.
44023011	Kandi ha kiro eki omu itumbi, MUKAMA yamubonekera naagamba ati: “Guma omutima, nkooku wanjuliire Yerusaalemu, nukwo osemeriire kunjurra na Rooma.”
44023012	Nyenkya obu bwakiire, Abayudaaya baayesorooza hamu, baayekoba omu nsita nibarahira nkooku batarukwija kulya rundi kunywa okuhika obu barakamara kwita Paulo.
44023013	Abaayekobere omu nsita egi, bakaba nibakira ha makumi ana.
44023014	Baagenda hali bakuru b'abanyakatagara n'abakuru b'enganda baabagambira bati? “Turahiriire kimu okutaroza ha kookulya koona tutakaisire Paulo.
44023015	Hati nu inywe n'ab'orukurato, ekyanyu eki muraakora nukwo kusaba mukuru w'amahe amubagarurre nk'abarukugonza kwongera kwetegereza kurungi omusango gwe. Itwe tweteekaniize kumwita atakabahikireho.”
44023016	Baitu mwihwa wa Paulo yahurra ensita yabo ey'okumugwera; yagenda yataaha omu kigo, yagimanyisa Paulo.
44023017	Paulo yayeta omu ha bakuru b'abaserikale, yamugambira ati: “Omusigazi onu mutwale hali mukuru w'amahe; aina eki arukwenda kumugambira.”
44023018	Yamutwara, yamuhikya hali mukuru w'amahe nagamba ati: “Paulo omunyankomo anyesirege, yansaba kukuleetera omusigazi onu, aina eki arukwenda kukugambira.”
44023019	Omukuru w'amahe yamukwata ha mukono, yamugarra ha rubaju, yamukaguza mpora ati: “Nooyenda kungambira ki?”
44023020	Nandiki omusigazi ati: “Abayudaaya bacwire amagezi ag'okukusaba ngu, nyenkya ogarre Paulo omu rukurato, nibasisana nk'abarukwenda kwongera kwetegereza omusango gwe.
44023021	Baitu ebyabo otabiikiriza, habwokuba haroho abasaija abarukukira ha makumi ana abeetekaniize kumugwerra, kandi barahiire nkooku batarukwija kulya n'okunywa batakamwisire. Hati baliyo beeteekaniize, balinzire eki oraabagarukamu.”
44023022	Mukuru w'amahe nukwo kuraga omusigazi, yamuteererra ati: “Otagambiraho muntu n'omu nkooku wabimmanyisa.”
44023023	Omukuru w'amahe akeeta babiri ha bakuru b'abaserikale yabagambira ati: “Hati muteekanize abaserikale bikumi bibiri, hamu n'ab'embaraasi nsanju n'ab'amacumu bikumi bibiri, mugende Kaisaariya ha saaha isatu z'ekiro.
44023024	Kandi muteekanize embaraasi Paulo ezi aratemba, mumuhikye hali Feelikisi omulemi omukuru, atahikirweho kabi koona.”
44023025	Yahandiika ebbaruha erukugamba eti:
44023026	“Oweekitiinisa Omulemi Mukuru Feelikisi; nyowe Kilaudiyo Lisiya ninkuramukya.
44023027	Omusaija onu akakwatwa Abayudaaya, kandi baakumwisire kakuba ntaragenzireyo n'ab'amahe bange, namujuna obu namazire kwetegereza nkooku ali Murooma.
44023028	Obu nagondeze kumanya omusango barukumunyegerra, namutwara omu rukurato rwabo.
44023029	Nubwo nayetegeriize nkooku anyegeriirwe habw'ebintu ebinyakuli omu biragiro by'ihanga lyabu, baitu gutali musango ogw'okumwisa rundi kumukwasa omu nkomo.
44023030	Aho, obu namanyisiibwe nkooku beekobere kumwita, nikyo namukutwekerra bwango, kandi naragira abamunyegeriire basoborre omumaiso gaawe eki barukumutura. Orame!”
44023031	Abaserikale baatwara Paulo nkooku baaragiirwe, baamuhikya omu rubuga Antipatri ekiro.
44023032	Obwire obu bwakiire, abaingi baagaruka omu kigo, baitu baamusigira ab'embaraasi beeyongere kugenda nawe.
44023033	Banu, obu baahikire Kaisaariya, ebbaruha bagiha omulemi omukuru, kandi baayemereza Paulo omu maiso ge.
44023034	Omukuru obu yamazire kusoma ebbaruha, yamukaguza ihanga lye. Obu yamanyire nkooku yarugire Kilikiya,
