44023035	yagamba ati: “Omusango gwawe ndiguhurra abakunyegeriire obu balikamara kwija.” Yaragira bamulindire omu kikaali kya Herode.
44024001	Obu haahingwireho ebiro bitaano, Ananiya, omukuru w'abanyakatagara, yaija n'abakuru b'enganda abamu, hamu n'omusaija Terutulo ow'okubatonganirra. Banyegerra Paulo hali omulemi omukuru.
44024002	Obu baamwesire, Terutulo yatandika kumunyegerra naagamba ati: “Oweekitiinisa Feelikisi, ihanga linu nirikusiima habw'okulireetera obusinge, nirikusiima habw'ebindi orukutegeka kuligarra obuhyaka.
44024003	Hoona hoona kandi obutoosa tusiima entegeka yawe.
44024004	Ntakwikaizeho, ninkusaba habw'embabazi zaawe, otuhulirizeho kake.
44024005	Okukugambira amazima, turozire omusaija onu nkooku arukututalibaniza muno, naaleeta akatabanguko omu Bayudaaya abali omu nsi zoona, kandi nuwe mwebembezi w'ekitebe ky'Abanazareeni.
44024006	Ekindi, akalengaho okusiisa Enju ya Ruhanga, nukwo kumukwata. [Twagonza kumucwera omusango nituhondera Ebiragiro byaitu;
44024007	baitu Lisiya, mukuru w'amahe yabitaahamu, yamutwiha omu ngaro n'amaani,
44024008	naaragira abaamunyegeriire kwija hanu omu maiso gaawe.] Kandi na iwe obu oramukaguza noija kumanya kurungi buli kintu eki turukumunyegererra.”
44024009	Abayudaaya bakwataniza na Terutulo, baagumya ebi byona nkooku biri by'amazima.
44024010	Omulemi omukuru obu yamusimireho kubaza, Paulo yagamba ati; “Mmanyire omazire emyaka nyingi noocwera abantu b'ihanga linu emisango; nikyo ndukwetonganirirra ntarukutiina.
44024011	Obu orakaguza abantu, noija kumanya nkooku mmazire ebiro ikumi na bibiri byonka nakaba kwija Yerusaalemu kuramya.
44024012	Abantu banu batansange ninteera empaka n'omuntu weena, noobu kwakuba kutabatabura abantu omunju ya Ruhanga, rundi omu masorrokaniro, rundi omu rubuga.
44024013	Kandi ebi barukunnyegererra hati, tibaina obwakaiso bwabyo.
44024014	Baitu eki ndukwikiriza omu maiso gaawe nikyo kinu: Nyowe omu kuramya Ruhanga w'abaisenkuru itwe, ninkuratira Omuhanda bbo ogu barukweta akatebe akeecwireho. Obu, ninyikiriza byona ebiri omu Biragiro bya Musa n'ebyahandiikirwe abarangi.
44024015	Okunihira kwange hali Ruhanga kuli kumu n'okwabu nkooku halibaho okuhumbuuka kw'abahikiriire n'abatahikiriire.
44024016	Nikyo nyekambira obutoosa kwikara n'omutima ogutaina kamogo hali Ruhanga na hali abantu.
44024017	Hati nkaleeta ebisembo eby'okukoonyera abanaku ab'ihanga lyaitu, hamu n'eby'okuhonga, habwokuba mmazire emyaka ntaija Yerusaalemu.
44024018	Obu nkaba ninkyakora ebi, banu bansanga omunju ya Ruhanga, mmazire kwezibwa, ntaina kitebe ky'abantu kandi hataroho bwogo. Baitu hakaijaho Abayudaaya abamu abaarugire omu Asiya
44024019	nubo baakwizire hanu kunnyegerra, obu baraaba baina eki barukunjunaana.
44024020	Hatali eki, leka abantu abali hanu bagambe ekibi eki bandozireho obu baanyemeriize omumaiso g'orukurato.
44024021	Obu nkaba nyemeriire hagati yabu nkagamba bwa nti: ‘Ha kiro kinu nintonganizibwa omumaiso ganyu habw'okwikiriza okuhumbuuka kw'abafu.’ ”
44024022	Feelikisi ow'akaba naamanya kurungi eby'Omuhanda ogu, yakerereza omusango, yabaraganiza kiro kindi, yagambira Paulo ati: “Lisiya omukuru w'amahe obu aliija, nubwo ndicwa omusango gwawe.”
44024023	Yaragira omukuru w'abaserikale kumulindira omu nkomo, baitu bamuheho obugabe kandi batatanga banywani be kumukorra ebi arukwetaaga.
44024024	Obu haahingwireho ebiro, Feelikisi yaija na mukazi we Durusilla Omuyudaayakati. Yatuma baleete Paulo, ahurre ebi arukwegesa ha by'okwikiriza Kristo Yesu.
44024025	Baitu Paulo obu yatandikire kusoborra ha kuhikirra, ha kwetanga, na ha kucwerwa omusango okuliija, Feelikisi yatiina, yagamba ati: “Hati garukayo. Obu nditunga omwanya ndikweta.”
44024026	Omu kasumi ako koona akaikara nanihira ngu, Paulo naija kumugulirra, nikyo yamweteraga emirundi nyingi kubaza nawe.
44024027	Baitu obu haahingwireho emyaka ebiri, ekiikaro kya Feelikisi kyatwarwa Porukiyo Fesito; kandi Feelikisi habw'okugonza kusiimwa Abayudaaya, yasiga Paulo omu nkomo.
44025001	Fesito obu akaba amazire ebiro bisatu ahikire omu isaza lye, yaruga Kaisaariya, yagenda Yerusaalemu.
44025002	Abanyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'Abayudaaya baamulegera Paulo;
44025003	baamwesengereza n'embabazi abaleetere Paulo Yerusaalemu, nukwo basobole kumugwera, bamwitire omu muhanda.
44025004	Baitu Fesito yabasoborra Paulo nkooku arukulindirwa Kaisaariya, kandi uwe wenka nkooku ali w'okugarukayo bwango.
44025005	Yayongera yagamba ati: “Nahabweki, leka ab'obusobozi omuli inywe tugende hamu. Obu haraaba haroho ekibi kyona musaija ogu eki yakozire, bamunyegerre.”
44025006	Obu yamazire nabo ebiro ebindi nka munaana rundi ikumi, yagarukayo Kaisaariya. Ha kiro ekyakurasireho yaikarra ha kitebe ekicwerwaho emisango, yaragira baleete Paulo.
44025007	Obu baamuleesire, Abayudaaya abaarugire Yerusaalemu baamwehinguliriza nibamunyegerra ebintu bingi kandi eby'amaani, baitu ebikaba bitaina bwakaiso.
44025008	Paulo yatandika kwetonganirra naagamba ati: “Nyowe tinkakoraga kintu kyona ekirukucwa Ebiragiro by'Abayudaaya, rundi ekirukusiisa Enju ya Ruhanga, rundi ekirukusobya ebiragiro bya Kaisaali.”
44025009	Baitu Fesito, habw'okugonza kusiimwa Abayudaaya, yakaguza Paulo ati: “Noikiriza kugenda Yerusaalemu, nuho otonganire emisango egi omumaiso gange?”
44025010	Nandiki Paulo ati: “Nyowe nyemeriire omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'ekooti ya Kaisaali, nuho nsemeriire kucwererwa omusango. Na iwe nookimanya kurungi nkooku ntaina kibi kyona eki nakozire Abayudaaya.
44025011	Obu ndaaba nakozire kubi, rundi nakozire ekisemeriire kunnyisa, tindukucwa magezi ag'okwehugura kufa. Baitu ebi byona ebi barukunjunaana, obu biraaba bitaina bulyo, busaho n'omu anyakwina obusobozi okumpayo hali bo. Nyowe ninjurra hali Kaisaali.”
44025012	Fesito obu yamazire kwehanuuza ha bahabuzi be, yamugarukamu ati; “Ojuliire hali Kaisaali, owa Kaisaali nuho orukwija kugenda.”
44025013	Obu haahingwireho ebiro, Omukama Agiripa na Bereniike omukazi we baahika Kaisaariya kutangirra Fesito.
44025014	Baamarayo ebiro; nukwo Fesito kusubirra Omukama omusango gwa Paulo, naagamba ati; “Hanu haroho omusaija, Feelikisi ou yasigire omu nkomo;
44025015	na nyowe obu nkaba ndi Yerusaalemu, abanyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'Abayudaaya bakamunnyegerraho, nibasaba mmusingise omusango.
44025016	Baitu nabagarukamu nti: ‘Teri ngeso y'Abarooma kuhayo omuntu atakatongaine n'abamunyegeriire, kandi nawe atahairwe omwanya gw'okwetonganirra eki bamunyegereriire.’
44025017	Nahabweki abantu abo boona obu baizire hanu, ntabakerereze, baitu ha kiro ekyakurasireho naikarra ha kitebe ekicwerwaho emisango, naragira baleete omusaija ogu.
44025018	Baakinyegerra obu baayemeriire, batasobole kwoleka obubi obw'omusango ogu barukumujunaana nkooku nanihiire;
44025019	baitu baamunyegererra ebintu ebitali bimu ebirukukwata ha diini yabo, na ha muntu ayafiire arukwetwa Yesu; baitu Paulo ou arukugumya ngu, akyayomiire.
44025020	Obu nalemerwe kwetegereza kurungi ebigambo ebi, namukaguza obu araaba naikiriza kugenda Yerusaalemu, nuho abitonganire.
44025021	Nubwo Paulo yajuliire Omukama Omukuru Agusito ngu nuwe amucwere omusango; na nyowe nukwo kuragira bamulindire omu nkomo okuhika obu ndakasobora kumutweka hali Kaisaali.”
44025022	Agiripa yagambira Fesito ati: “Na nyowe, omusaija ogu naakugondeze kumwehulirra nyenka.” Nandiki Fesito ati: “Oramuhurra nyenkya.”
44025023	Obwire obu bwakiire, Agiripa na Bereniike baizira omu kitiinisa kingi, baataaha omunju nambere baacweraga emisango, bali hamu n'abakuru b'amahe n'abantu bakuru ab'omu rubuga. Aho Fesito yaragira baleete Paulo.
44025024	Fesito yatandika kubisoborra naagamba ati: “Rukirabasaija Agiripa, na inywe inywena abeesoroize hanu, murole omusaija onu Abayudaaya boona ab'omu Yerusaalemu n'aba hanu ou baansabire n'amaani ngu, asemeriire kufa.
44025025	Nyowe habwange ndozire nkooku ataina eki yakozire ekisemeriire kumwisa. Baitu uwe nkooku yajuliire hali Omukama Omukuru Agusito, nkacwamu kumumutwekera.
44025026	Hati nyowe tinyina bulyo obuhikire obu ndaasigikiraho kuhandiikira mukama wange hali uwe. Nikyo mmuleetiire omumaiso ganyu, n'okukira muno omumaiso gaawe, Rukirabasaija Agiripa. Obu turamara kwetegereza ebye, nubwo ndatunga eki ndaahandiika.
44025027	Na nyowe ndozire nkooku kitahikire kutweka omunyankomo, ntarukwoleka emisango erukumujunanwa.”
44026001	Rukirabasaija Agiripa yagambira Paulo ati: “Hati oikiriziibwe kwetonganirra.” Aho Paulo yaimukya omukono gwe, yatandika kwetonganirra ati:
44026002	“Omukama Agiripa, ninyeyeta w'omugisa kiro kya hati kwetonganira omumaiso gawe habw'ebi byona Abayudaaya ebi barukunjunaana.
44026003	Okukira muno habwokuba iwe omanyiire kimu engeso zoona n'empaka ez'Abayudaaya. Nahabweki ninkwesengereza ogumiisirize ompulirize.
44026004	“Abayudaaya boona nibamanya engeso zange ezi naakuliiremu okuruga omu buto, omu bantu ab'ihanga lyange n'omu Yerusaalemu.
44026005	Bakaba nibammanya okuruga ira kandi basobora kukigumya hati, kakuba nibenda, nkooku ndi Mufalisaayo anyakukuraatira ekitebe ekirukukira ebindi byona kuhikya engeso z'ediini yaitu.
44026006	Hati nyemeriire hanu ninjunanwa habw'okunihira Ruhanga eki yaraganiize baisenkuruitwe,
44026007	kandi n'enganda zaitu ikumi na ibiri eki zirukunihira kutunga obu baba nibeehayo kuramya Ruhanga ekiro na nyamusana. Waitu, habw'okunihira oku nikyo Abayudaaya barukunjunaanira.
44026008	Baitu inywe habwaki mutarukwikiriza Ruhanga nkooku asobora kuhumbuura abafiire?
44026009	“Na nyowe nyenka nkaba ninyikiririza kimu nkooku nsemeriire kucwa amagezi goona kurwanisa ibara lya Yesu owa Nazareeti.
44026010	Nukwo naakozire Yerusaalemu. Nakwasa abaikiriza baingi omu nkomo habw'obusobozi obu naheebwaga banyakatagara abakuru. Tikiri eki kyonka, baitu obu bakaba nibacwerwa omusango gw'okufa, na nyowe nkakisagika.
44026011	Emirundi nyingi nabafubiraga omu masorrokaniro goona, nkalengaho kubahambiriza nukwo beehakane enyikiriza yabo. Nkabakwatirwa muno ekiniga, nukwo kubahiiganiriza nimbakurata n'omu mbuga ez'amahanga agandi.”
44026012	“Omu kubakurata omu mbuga z'amahanga, nkaba ningenda Damasiko, mpairwe obusobozi kandi ntumirwe banyakatagara abakuru.
44026013	Omu ihangwe obu nkaba ningenda, Waitu, nkarora ekyererezi nikiruga omwiguru, nikimuliikana okukira izooba, kyayaka kyanyehinguliriza nyowe n'abo aba nkaba ningenda nabo.
44026014	Itwena twagwa hansi, nubwo naahuliire iraka nirinnyeta omu Ruhebburaayo liti: ‘Saulo, Saulo noompiiganiriza ki? Nooyesaaliza wenka kusamba ha mihunda.’
44026015	Namukaguza nti: ‘Niiwe oha, Waitu?’ MUKAMA yangarukamu ati: ‘Ninyowe Yesu ou orukuhiiganiza.
44026016	Hati nu imuka, oyemerre. Eki ngenderiire kukubonekera nukwo kukukoma ompeereze kandi obe kaiso ow'okugumya nkooku ondozire, n'ow'okugumya ebindi ebi ndikweyolekeramu.
44026017	Ndaakujuna abantu ab'ihanga lyawe, nkwihe n'omu mikono y'Abanyamahanga nambere ndukwija kukutuma,
44026018	obaigule amaiso, baruge omu mwirima, baije omu musana; baruge omu busobozi bwa Sitaani, beehongere Ruhanga, kandi habw'okunyikiriza baganyirwe ebibi kandi batunge ekiikaro hamu n'abo abayeziibwe.’ ”
44026019	“Nahabweki nu, Agutamba Agiripa, okubonekerwa oku okw'omwiguru ntakwigalirize,
44026020	baitu nkabanza kukurangirra aba Damasiko, nakusoborra aba Yerusaalemu n'ab'omu Buyudaaya yoona, kandi n'Abanyamahanga, nimbateererra beegarukemu, bagaruke hali Ruhanga, nibakora ebikorwa ebisemeriire abeegarukiremu kwo.
44026021	Eki nikyo Abayudaaya bankwatiire ndi omunju ya Ruhanga, baalengaho kunnyita.
44026022	Baitu habw' okukonyerwa Ruhanga, nikyo kinyemeriize hanu n'okuhika hati, nimmanyisa abakuru n'abato nkooku ntaina kindi eki ndukwegesa kwihaho abarangi na Musa ebi baarangire ngu, nibiija kubaho:
44026023	Kristo nkooku asemeriire kubonabonesibwa, kandi habw'okusangwa ali w'okubanza okuhumbuuka omu bafu, nuwe alimanyisa ab'ihanga linu n'Abanyamahanga boona omusana nkooku gwaizire omunsi.”
44026024	Paulo obu akaba naakyayetonganirra ati, Fesito yamugambira n'iraka likooto ati: “Paulo ohunguutukire, amagezi gaawe amaingi gaija kukunaga iraro.”
44026025	Baitu Paulo yamugarukamu ati: “Oweekitiinisa Fesito, tingwire iraro; baitu nimbaza amazima kandi ebihikire.
44026026	Omukama Agiripa, ebigambo ebi abimanyireho, kandi nimmubaliza ntaina eki ndukutiina; habwokuba ningumiza kimu ebi byona nkooku arukubyetegereza, tibiri bintu ebyakoliirwe omu nsita.
44026027	Agutamba Agiripa, noikiriza eby'abarangi? Nyowe nimmanya nkooku orukubiikiriza.”
44026028	Agiripa nukwo kugarukamu Paulo ati: “Mara iwe noogonza kumpindura Mukristo omu kasumi kake!”
44026029	Nandiki Paulo ati: “Obu karaaba kali kasumi kake rundi kaingi, baitu nyowe eki ndukusaba Ruhanga, tihali habwawe wenka, baitu na boona abarukumpurra ha kiro kya hati, mube nka nyowe--kwihaho muleke kubohwa omu njegere zinu.”
44026030	Nubwo omukama yaimukire, hamu n'omulemi omukuru na Bereniike, n'abandi boona abakaba baikaliire nabo.
44026031	Obu baamazire kuturuka aheeru, baatandika kugambirangana bati: “Omusaija onu taina eki akozire ekisemeriire kumwisa rundi kumutaisa omu nkomo.”
44026032	Agiripa yagambira Fesito ati: “Omuntu onu akusoboire kulekerwa, kakuba atarajuliire hali Kaisaali.”
44027001	Obu kyamazire kugumibwa nkooku turukwija kugwerra omu meeri twambuke kugenda Itale, Paulo n'abanyankomo abandi baabakwasa omukuru w'abaserikale arukwetwa Yuliyo, ow'omu ihe lya Agusito.
44027002	Twataaha omu meeri enyakuruga Aduramiti, ekaba eri haihi kwimukya kugenda ha myogo enyakuli ha musa gw'Asiya. Twagwerra omu nyanja, twina Alisitaako Omunyamakedoni ayarugire Teesalonika.
44027003	Ekiro ekyakurasireho twahika Sidooni; oku Yuliyo yagirra Paulo embabazi yamwikiriza kubungira enganjani ze, bamuhumuze.
44027004	Obu twarugire oku twagwerra omu nyanja, twagenda nitukiikira ekizinga Kipuro habw'okwehugura omuyaga ogukaba gututurukire omumaiso.
44027005	Twacwanganiza enyanja nituraba ha rubaju rwa Kilikiya na Panfiiliya, twahika Miira, orubuga rwa Likiya.
44027006	Oku nuho mukuru w'abaserikale yasangire emeeri enyakuruga Alekizanderiya neegenda Itale, yagitutamu.
44027007	Tukamara ebiro bingi nitugenda mpora, twahika haihi na Kunido, tuli mu bulemeezi habw'omuyaga kutatwikiriza kweyongera omumaiso, nukwo kukwata omuhanda ogwa ha ifo y'ekizinga Kureete, twairirra omukono gw'enyanja ogurukwetwa Salumoone.
44027008	Twagenda nagwo gwonka tukyali omu bulemeezi, okuhika obu twahikire ekiikaro nambere harukwetwa Emyogo Emirungi, haihi n'orubuga rwa Lasaaya.
44027009	Ebiro bingi nkooku bikaba bifiire busa, kandi n'orugendo rutandikire kuba rw'akabi, n'ebiro by'okusiiba bikaba bihoire, Paulo nukwo kubahabura ati:
44027010	“Bakama bange, nkooku ndukurora, orugendo runu nirwija kubamu akabi n'okufeerwa kwingi. Titurukwija kufeerwa ebintu n'emeeri byonka, baitu n'obwomeezi bwaitu.”
44027011	Baitu Mukuru w'abaserikale yayesiga omurungiki w'emeeri na mukama wayo okukira ebya Paulo yagambire.
44027012	Kandi na habw'omwogo kutaba murungi kumarramu ebiro by'obutiti, abaingi baasiima kurugamu n'okweyongera omu nyanja, nibanihira nkooku barukusobora kuhika Foinike, omwogo gwa Kureete oguroleriire hagati y'obukiizi bw'emoso n'obw'obulyo obwa Burugaizooba, bamarreyo ebiro by'obutiti.
44027013	Akayaga aka ha bukiizi bw'obulyo obu kaatiire mpora, baateekereza ngu, baatungire eki babaire nibagonza, baabohorra ebinyakusibika emeeri, baatandika kugenda nibakeetera Kureete nibeebinga omusa.
44027014	Baitu omu kanya kake haija ihunga ly'amaani erirukwetwa ery'obukiizi obwa Burugaizooba, lyateera niriruga ha kizinga.
44027015	Emeeri obu yatangirwe omuyaga, etarukusobora kugwolekera, na itwe twajwaha, twagireka. Omuyaga nugwo gwatutwara gwonka.
44027016	Twagenda nitukiikira akazinga akarukwetwa Kauda. Obu twamazire kutalibana muno tukasobora kutabura akaato kaitu:
44027017	kandi obu baamazire kukataahya omu meeri, baalengaho emeeri yoona kugibohesa emiguha, nibagigyehinguliriza. Habw'okutiina kukwatira omu musenyi gw'enkungu ya Siriti, baasirimura amatanga agarukutwara emeeri nukwo batwarwe omuyaga gwonka.
44027018	Obu twatengeesiibwe muno ihunga, ha kiro ekyakurasireho baatandika kwiha ebintu omu meeri n'okubinaga omu nyanja.
44027019	Kandi ha kiro kya kasatu ky'ihunga baanaga ebimu ha bintu ebigendesa emeeri.
44027020	Obu twamazire ebiro bingi tutakyarora izooba noobu zaakuba enyunyuuzi, kandi ihunga lingi nirituteera, tukaba tutakyanihira kukira.
44027021	Obu haahingwireho ebiro bataina eki baliire, Paulo yabeemerra hagati naagamba ati; “Basaija inywe, kakuba mwampuliriize, timwakurugire Kureete, mukaizirwa akabi kanu n'okufeerwa okurukwingana aho.
44027022	Hati nimbateererra, mugume emitima! Tiharukwija kufa muntu n'omu omuli inywe, kwihaho emeeri yonka.
44027023	Habwokuba ekiro kinu kyonyini mpikirweho malaika wa Ruhanga ou ndamya kandi arukuntunga.
44027024	Malaika yagamba ati: ‘Paulo, otatiina; oli w'okwemerra omumaiso ga Kaisaali, kandi habwawe Ruhanga naija kulinda abo boona abali na iwe omu meeri.’
44027025	Nukwo nu basaija inywe, mugume emitima. Nyowe ninyesiga Ruhanga, kandi mazimakwo ebintu nibiija kuhikirra nkooku ngambiirwe.
44027026	Baitu tuli b'okunagwa ha kizinga.”
44027027	Ha kiro ekya ikumi na bbina ky'ihunga, obu tukaba nitukyayenjeera omu Nyanja Adiriya, omu bwire bw'itumbi abalimba baatandika kuteekereza ngu, haroho ensi ei bali haihi kuhikaho.
44027028	Baalenga okuhama kw'amaizi, baasanga ziri mita makumi ana. Obu bairiire kake omumaiso, baagaruka baalenga, baasanga ziri mita makumi asatu.
44027029	Habw'okutiina kuhuumira emyandara, baasumurra ebisibika emeeri bbina, baabisibikira ha kiso ky'enyuma eky'emeeri. Baategereza obwire kukya.
44027030	Abalimba obu bakaba nibagonza kweyiba kuruga omu meeri, bamazire n'okusirimura akaato omu nyanja, nibasisana nk'abarukugonza kusirimura ebirukusibika emeeri ha kiso ky'omumaiso,
44027031	nubwo Paulo yagambiire mukuru w'abaserikale n'abaserikale be ati: “Abantu abo obu bataikale omu meeri, timurukwija kukira.”
44027032	Abaserikale nukwo kusara emiguha y'akaato, baakaleka kaagenda.
44027033	Obwire obu bukaba buli haihi kukya, Paulo yabeesengereza, boona balyeho ebyokulya, naagamba ati: “Kiro kya hati nikyo kya ikumi na bbina muli omu mwetunturo, mutaina eki murukulya.
44027034	Nahabweki nimbeesengereza mulyeho akookulya, kabagarremu amaani, habwokuba tiharoho kasoke akaraabura ha mitwe yanyu inywena.”
44027035	Obu yamazire kugamba eki, yakwata omugaati, yasiima Ruhanga omumaiso ga boona, yagucwamu, yatandika kulya.
44027036	Boona baagarukwa omutima omunda, baalya ebyokulya. (
44027037	Itwena abakaba bali omu meeri, tukaba tuli bantu bikumi bibiri nsanju na mukaaga.)
44027038	Obu baamazire kwiguta, baakeehya obulemeezi bw'ebintu baanaga engano yoona omu nyanja.
44027039	Obwire obu bwakiire, bakaba batamanyirre nsi ei baahikireho, baitu bakarora omukono gw'enyanja oguroho omwogo gw'omusenyi. Ha mukono ogu nuho baayenda kuhikiza emeeri, obu kyakubaire nikisoboka.
44027040	Baanaga ebisibika emeeri, baabisiga omu nyanja. Omu kasumi nuko kamu baasumurra emiguha ei ekaba ebohere engahi enyakurungika. Baahanika itanga ery'omumaiso nukwo omuyaga gubatwale ha mwogo.
44027041	Baitu obu baahikire nambere engezi z'amaizi zirukutangatanganira, emeeri yatwarwa, engezi yabahikya nambere amaizi gatahamire, kandi ekiso eky'omumaiso kyataaha omu musenyi, kyakwatiramu. Ekiso ky'enyuma kyacwacwanwa amaani g'ebigonzi ebirukwehuura.
44027042	Nubwo abaserikale baahanwire amagezi ag'okwita abanyankomo, hataakubaho n'omu arukuziha akacwa;
44027043	baitu omukuru w'abaserikale, habw'okugonza kujuna Paulo, yabatanga kukora eki bakaba bategekere. Yaragira abarukumanya kuziha babanze beenage omu nyanja, nukwo bazihe bahike ha bwerre,
44027044	kandi abandi bagendere ha mbaaho rundi ha bicweka by'emeeri. Nukwo kyabaire kiti, boona baakira, baahika ha bwerre.
44028001	Obu twamazire kukira, nubwo twamanya ekizinga eki nkooku kyayetwaga Melita.
44028002	Abantu baamwo bakatukunira kurungi muno. Baatutangirra itwena, kandi habw'enjura kutandika kugwa n'obwire kuba bw'obutiti, baatuhembera omurro.
44028003	Paulo akaba asenyere ekiganda ky'enku, yakita ha murro; baitu habw'ekibabu kyagwo, hahurumukamu encwera, yamwezinga ha mukono.
44028004	Enzaarwa ez'omu kizinga eki obu baarozire nerengiija ha mukono gwe, baagambirangana bati: “Nyabura inywe omusaija onu mwisi w'abantu. Noobu araaba atabukire enyanja, baitu encwa ya Ruhanga ey'amazima temwikirize kwikaraho.”
44028005	Baitu Paulo, enjoka yagikunkumurra omu murro atahikirweho kabi koona.
44028006	Abantu baalindirra nibateekereza ngu, naija kuzimba rundi aragwa hansi akanguke; baitu obu baamazire kulindirra omwanya mukooto, batarozire kabi koona akamubaireho, baatandika kuteekereza kundi, baagira ngu, mucwezi.
44028007	Haihi n'ekiikaro eki, hakaba haroho ebibanja by'omunyoro omukuru w'ekizinga eki, ibara lye Pubuliyo. Akatutangirra kandi yatukunira muno okumara ebiro bisatu.
44028008	Omu kasumi ako, ise Pubuliyo akaba abyamire omu kitabu, arwaire omuswija n'ensese. Paulo yagenda kumubungira. Obu yamazire kumusabira, yamutaho emikono, yamukiza.
44028009	Eki obu kyabaireho, abarwaire abandi ab'omu kizinga eki nabo baija baakizibwa.
44028010	Abantu baayo bakatuha ebisembo bingi, kandi obu twayeteekaniize kugwerra omu meeri, baatuboherra na byona ebi tukaba nitwetaaga.
44028011	Obu haahingwireho ameezi asatu, tukaihwayo emeeri eyarugire Alekizanderiya ei ekaba emazire ebiro by'obutiti omu kizinga eki, eroho ekisisani ky'Aboojo Abarongo omumaiso gaayo.
44028012	Obu twahikire Sirakuuse, twamarayo ebiro bisatu.
44028013	Twarugayo nitwekiisa omusa gw'enyanja, twahika Reegiyo. Obu haahingwireho ekiro kimu, haimuka omuyaga ogw'obukiizi bw'obulyo, kandi ha kiro kya kabiri twahika Puteyoli,
44028014	nambere twasangire ab'oruganda abaatusabire kumara nabo ebiro musanju. Hanyuma twairrayo, twahika Rooma.
44028015	Ab'oruganda ab'oku obu baahuliire nkooku tuhikireyo, baija baatutangaana ha Katale ka Apio na ha ntangatangano ya Ngonyo Isatu. Paulo obu yarozire ab'oruganda yasiima Ruhanga, yagarukwamu amaani.
44028016	Obu twahikire Rooma, Paulo yaikirizibwa kweraaza mbere arukwenda, aina omuserikale ayamulindaga.
44028017	Obu haahingwireho ebiro bisatu, Paulo akeeta abeebembezi b'Abayudaaya, beesorooze. Obu baamazire kwesorooza yabagambira ati: “Bagenzi bange, noobu ndaaba ntaina eki nasobiize abantu rundi ntacwire engeso z'abaisenkuru itwe, baitu nabwo nkakwatirwa Yerusaalemu naaheebwayo omu mikono y'Abarooma.
44028018	Obu baamazire kuntonganiza, baasanga ntaina musango gw'okunnyisa, baayenda kundekera.
44028019	Baitu Abayudaaya obu baayangire, nyowe nukwo kujurra hali Kaisaali, noobu ndaaba ntaina eki ndukwenda kunyegerra abantu ab'ihanga lyange.
44028020	Nahabweki nikyo nsabiire kubarora n'okubaza na inywe. Ningira Abaisirairi eki baikara bategeriize, nikyo kintaisize omu njegere zinu.”
44028021	Nabo baamugarukamu bati: “Itwe titukatungaga bbaruha ezirukuruga Buyudaaya ezirukukugambaho, noobu yakuba omuntu w'owaitu araizire kutusoborra rundi kutugambira ekibi kyona hali iwe.
44028022	Baitu nitwenda iwe wenka otusoborre ebyawe. Ekitebe eki, eki tukimanyaho nkinu: hoona nikigambwaho kubi.”
44028023	Obu baamazire kumuraganiza ekiro ekindi, baingi omuli bo bakaija omunju ye nambere akaba naagoonya ha kiro eki. Yabasoborra ebye okuruga nyenkya kuhika rwebagyo, naabamanyisa eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga, kandi naalengaho kubaikirizisa Yesu naasigikira omu Biragiro bya Musa n'omu by'abarangi.
44028024	Abamu bakaikiriza ebi yabagambiire, abandi baayanga.
44028025	Kandi bbo nkooku batarasoboire kwikirraniza, baayahukana, Paulo amazire kubamanyisa ekintu kimu ati: “Mwoyo Ahikiriire akahikya obu yagambiire baisenkuru inywe naakirabya omu Isaaya omurangi ati:
44028026	‘Hikaho abantu abo, obagambire oti: Okuhurra mulihurra, baitu timulyetegereza; okurora mulirora, baitu timulihweza.
44028027	Habwokuba emitima y'abantu banu egumangaine, n'amatu gaabo nigahurra kubi, n'amaiso gaabo bagazibiriize. Habw'amaiso gaabo okutarora, n'amatu gaabo okutahurra, n'emitima yabo okuteetegereza nikyo baayangiire okumpindukira nkabakiza.’
44028028	Mukimanye nu, okujunwa kunu okwa Ruhanga nkooku kuhairwe Abanyamahanga nabo. Bbo nibaija kuhurra.” [
44028029	Obu yamazire kugamba ebi, Abayudaaya baarugaho, nibateezangana empaka.]
44028030	Paulo akamarayo emyaka ebiri yoona, naayesasurra ebyetaago bye byona, kandi yatangirraga boona abaijaga kumubungira,
44028031	naabarangirra obukama bwa Ruhanga kandi naayegesa bwerebwere ebya MUKAMA Yesu Kristo hataroho arukumutanga.
45001001	Nyowe Paulo, omuheereza wa Yesu Kristo, ayayesirwe kuba mukwenda, ayasoroirwe kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi agaaraganiziibwe Ruhunga.
45001002	Abarangi be bakabanza kugarangirra ira omu Bihandiiko ebirukwera.
45001003	Nugo Makuru Amarungi agarukubaza ha Mwana we ayazairwe omu mubiri ali mwijukuru wa Daudi,
45001004	baitu habw'okwera kw'omwoyo gwe na habw'okuhumbuuka omu bafu akamanyisibwa nkooku ali Mwana wa Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona. Ogu nuwe Yesu Kristo MUKAMA waitu,
45001005	ou twatungiiremu omugisa n'obukwenda obw'okurangirra ab'omu mahanga goona okworoba okurukuruga omu kumwikiriza.
45001006	Na inywe muli omuli abo abaayesirwe kufooka ba Yesu Kristo.
45001007	Inywe inywena abagonzibwa ba Ruhanga abali Roma, abaayesirwe kuba bantu ba Ruhanga: Nimbagondeza omugisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
45001008	Eky'okubanza ninsiima Ruhanga wange omu Yesu Kristo habwanyu inywena; habwokuba okwikiriza kwanyu nikuranganwa omunsi yoona.
45001009	Ningira Ruhanga ou mpeereza n'omwoyo gwange gwona nindangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'Omwana we, nuwe kaiso wange nkooku mbaijuka butoosa omu kusaba kwange.
45001010	Obu, ninsaba Ruhanga kakuba akisiima, mbahikeho nambere muli.
45001011	Habwokuba ningonza muno kubarora, nukwo nsobole kubaleetera ekisembo ky'omwoyo ekiraabagumya.
45001012	Kandi na itwe tusobole kugumyangana omu kwikiriza kwaitu: okwange n'okwanyu.
45001013	Bagenzi bange, ningonza mumanye nkooku nagondeze kwija nambere muli emirundi nyingi, mbatungemu abaikiriza nkooku nabatungire omu Banyamahanga abandi; baitu okuhika hati nkyaina ebintangire.
45001014	Nyowe nkyaina ibanja ery'okuhikaho Abagiriiki n'ab'amahanga agandi agateegesiibwe, ab'amagezi omuli bo n'abadoma.
45001015	Na inywe abali Rooma, nyina ekihika eky'okubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi.
45001016	Kandi nyowe, Amakuru Amarungi tindukugakwatirwa nsoni: nugo maani ga Ruhanga aganyakujuna weena arukwikiriza, okubandiza ha Bayudaaya okuhika na ha Bagiriiki.
45001017	Habwokuba omu Makuru Amarungi omu, nuho harukusuukulirwa obuhikiriire oburuga hali Ruhanga, oburaba omu kwikiriza kandi nibuheebwa abarukwikiriza; nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ogu anyakuhikiriire alyomeera habw'okwikiriza,”
45001018	Obukaya bwa Ruhanga butandikire kuzooka niburuga omwiguru, nibuhikaho abantu abatatiina Ruhanga kandi ababi ababuutikira amazima habw'obubi bwabo.
45001019	Byona ebi basobora kumanyaho Ruhanga nibabyetegereza, habwokuba Ruhanga akabibooleka.
45001020	Okuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi, omulingo gwe ogutarorwa, nubwo busobozi bwe obutahwaho hamu n'obwaruhanga bwe, byetegererezibwa omu bintu ebi yahangire. Nahabweki tibaina ky'okwekwasa kyona.
45001021	Noobu baraaba baamanyire Ruhanga, baitu batamutemu kitiinisa kandi batamusiime nkooku asemeriire. Ebiteekerezo byabo bikabahabisa kandi amagezi gaabo agaturumu gaswekererwa omwirima.
45001022	Abaayeyesire abanyamagezi, nubo bafookere badoma.
45001023	Bakaleka kuramya Ruhanga atafa, baatandika okuramya ebisisani ebirukusisana abantu abafa, rundi ebinyonyi, rundi ebisoro, rundi ebyekurra.
45001024	Nikyo Ruhanga yabahweriiremu, emitima yabo ekeemaliza ha bubi, bakakora bonka na bonka ebihemura emibiri yabo.
45001025	Ningira bakaleka amazima agarukumanyisa Ruhanga baatamu ebisuba, baaramya kandi baaheereza ebihangwa okukira Omuhangi, anyakuheebwa ekitiinisa ebiro byona! Amiina.
45001026	Nikyo Ruhanga yabalekiire balemwe okwegomba okurukuswaza. Bakazi baabo bakaleka emibiri yabo eki yahangiirwe, baagikoza eki etarahangiirwe.
45001027	Abasaija nabo bakaleka kuteerana n'abakazi baatandika kwanjukiranganaho, nibakora ebikorwa eby'obuhemu n'abasaija bataahi baabo, baayereetera bonka ekifubiro ekisemeriire obugwagwa bwabo.
45001028	Habw'okwanga kwikiriza Ruhanga, nikyo nawe yabalekiire baikale n'omutima oguramaire n'engeso ez'obugwagwa.
45001029	Baijura engeso embi zoona: obubi, okwegomba okubi, hamu n'itima. Baijwire ihali, obwisi, enkungani, obugobya, n'enobi. Baaba ngambigambi,
45001030	bahangirizi, abanoba Ruhanga, beereme, abeekuliriza, abenyumiza, abaserra obubi, abatahurra bazaire baabo,
45001031	badoma, abateesigwa, abataganyira, n'abatagira mbabazi.
45001032	Abo noobu baraaba nibamanya ekiragiro kya Ruhanga ekigamba ngu, abakora ebintu nk'ebi basemeriire kufa, tibagarukira ha kubikora kwonka, baitu basagika n'abandi abarukubikora.
45002001	Muntu iwe, noobu oraaba noosisa ota, toina ky'okwekwasa kyona obu ocwera mugenzi waawe omusango. Obu omucwera omusango, oba noogwesingisa wenka, habwokuba iwe kicwa, ebintu ebi orukukora nibyo bimu mali.
45002002	Tumanyire Ruhanga nkooku ahikya okusingisa omusango abantu abakora ebibi nk'ebi.
45002003	Muntu iwe, obu ocwera omusango abo abakora ebintu nk'ebi, kandi kunu na iwe nibyo orukukora, noogira ngu, olitabuka encwa ya Ruhanga?
45002004	Rundi noogaya embabazi ze enyingi, okugumiisiriza kwe n'obukwata-mpora bwe? Tomanyire embabazi za Ruhanga nkooku zikuleetera okwegarukamu?
45002005	Baitu habw'okukadadara n'okuteegarukamu okw'omutima gwawe, nooyeyahurra ekifubiro ekiribaho ha kiro kiri, nambere encwa ya Ruhanga ey'amananu eryolekerwa.
45002006	Habwokuba alisasura buli muntu naarorra ha bikorwa bye.
45002007	Abo abagonza kutunga ekitiinisa, okusiimwa, n'okutafa, nibagumiisiriza omu kukora ebirungi, Ruhanga alibaha obwomeezi obutahwaho.
45002008	Abandi ab'empaka kandi abatoorobera mazima, baitu aboorobera obubi, alibooleka ekiniga n'obukaya.
45002009	Buli muntu anyakukora ebibi alihikwaho omuhito n'enaku nyingi, okubandiza ha Muyudaaya okuhika na ha Mugiriiki.
45002010	Baitu weena anyakukora ebirungi aliheebwa ekitiinisa, alisiimwa, kandi alitunga obusinge, okubandiza ha Muyudaaya okuhika na ha Mugiriiki,
45002011	habwokuba Ruhanga tasoroora.
45002012	Boona abasiisire batarukumanya Biragiro, balihwerekerra batarukujunaanirwa ha Biragiro. Kandi boona abaasiisire nibamanya Ebiragiro, omu Biragiro numwo balicwererwa omusango.
45002013	Abanyakuhurra Ebiragiro kwonka, tibali bo bahikiriire omumaiso go Ruhanga, baitu abanyakukora Ebiragiro ebi bigamba, nubo balyetwa bahikiriire.
45002014	Abanyamahanga abataina Biragiro, obu baraaba bakora Ebiragiro ebi bigamba habw'amagezi gaabo, bbo bonka beefookera bakwasi b'Ebiragiro, noobu baraaba bataina Biragiro.
45002015	Booleka Ebiragiro ebi birukuragira nkooku bihandiikirwe omu mitima yabo. Emitima yabo nayo eba neekigumya, kandi ebiteekerezo byabo ebitarukwikirraniza biba nibibanyegerra rundi nibibaihaho omusango
45002016	ha kiro eki nambere Ruhanga alicwerraho abantu omusango gw'ebi baakozire omu nsita, naaraba omu Kristo Yesu, nkooku kisangwa omu Makuru Amarungi aganatumirwe kurangirra.
45002017	Baitu iwe obu oraaba nooyeyeta Muyudaaya, nooyesiga Ebiragiro nooyenyumiza kuba wa Ruhanga
45002018	noomanya ebi arukwenda kandi noosiima ebirukukira oburungi, habw'okwegesibwa Ebiragiro,
45002019	iwe obu oraaba noogumya nkooku oli munanasi w'abafu b'amaiso, noomulikira abo abali omu mwirima,
45002020	muhabuzi w'abataina magezi, mwegesa w'abaana, habwokuba noomanya amagezi n'amazima agali omu Biragiro, -
45002021	kandi iwe anyakwegesa abandi, toyeyegesa? Iwe anyakuteererra abantu okutaiba, oiba?
45002022	Iwe anyakutanga abandi kusiihana, osiihana? Iwe anyakunuga embandwa, onyaga ota ebiri omu mabandiro?
45002023	Iwe anyakwenyumiriza omu Biragiro, ogaya ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga noocwa Ebiragiro?
45002024	Habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Ibara lya Ruhanga nirijumwa omu Banyamahanga habwanyu.”
45002025	Kyamazima okusarwa nikugasa obu oraaba noohikiriza Ebiragiro; baitu obu orukucwa Ebiragiro, okusarwa kwawe kusisana n'okutasarwa.
45002026	Nukwo nu omuntu atasazirwe, kakuba ahikiriza Ebiragiro ebi birukugamba, noobu araaba atasazirwe, baitu talibarwa nk'asazirwe?
45002027	Habweki, abo abatasazirwe mubiri baitu nibahikiriza Ebiragiro, balisingisa omusango inywe abarukucwa Ebiragiro kandi kunu mwina ebyahandiikirwe omu Biragiro kandi musazirwe.
45002028	Habwokuba Omuyudaaya nyakabara tali ogu arukurorwa ha bya haruguru, n'okusarwa kw'amazima tikiri kintu kya haruguru ha mubiri.
45002029	Omuyudaaya nyakabara nuwe Muyudaaya omunda; kandi n'okusarwa okw'amazima kuli omu mutima, kintu ky'omwoyo tikiri ky'Ebiragiro ebyahandiikirwe. Kandi omuntu ogu tasiimwa abantu, baitu asiimwa Ruhanga.
45003001	Hati abandi Omuyudaaya naabakiza ki? Rundi okusarwa kwina mugaso ki?
45003002	Nikigasa muno omu miringo etali emu. Eky'okubanza Abayudaaya nubo baakwasiibwe ebigambo bya Ruhanga.
45003003	Abamu noobu baraaba batarabaire beesigwa, baitu itwe tugambe ki? Obuteesigwa bwabo buratanga Ruhanga kuba mwesigwa?
45003004	Nikikafuuhe! Ruhanga aikara ali w'amazima abantu boona noobu baraaba bali banyabisuba, nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Leka ebigambo byawe byoleke nkooku oli w'amazima, nukwo osinge obu baba nibakucwera omusango.”
45003005	Obubi bwaitu obu buraaba nibwoleka obwinganiza bwa Ruhanga, turagamba ki? Ngu Ruhanga tali mwinganiza kutufubira? [Nyowe nimbaza nk'omuntu buntu.]
45003006	Naakake konka! Ruhanga obu araaba atali mwinganiza, ensi asobora ata kugicwera omusango?
45003007	Ebisuba byange obu biraaba nibyongera kwoleka amazima ga Ruhanga kandi nibimwongera ekitiinisa, habwaki ninkyacwerwa omusango nk'omusiisi?
45003008	Habwaki tutakora ebibi nukwo harugemu ebirungi? - abantu abamu nkooku batuhangirra ngu, nukwo twegesa. Abo, omusango gwabo nigubasinga kurungi.
45003009	Hati nu tugambe tuta? Itwe Abayudaaya twina eki turukukiza abandi? Nangwa, naakake konka; habwokuba mmazire kugamba ngu, abantu boona, Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki, balemwa ekibi,
45003010	nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Tiharoho ahikiriire, nangwa noobwakuba omu;
45003011	tiharoho arukwetegereza, tiharoho arukuserra Ruhanga.
45003012	Boona bakahaba, baasiisikarra hamu, tiharoho arukukora kurungi, nangwa noobwakuba omu.”
45003013	“Emimiro yabo bituuro ebyesamiriire, endimi zabu bazibiihisa ebisuba.” “Ebigambo byabo nibisaaliza nk'obusegwe bw'encwera.”
45003014	“Akanwa kaabo kaikara nikakondereza kandi nikahangirra.”
45003015	“Ebigere byabo bibanguhya kugenda okuseesa esagama,
45003016	hoona ha bakagenda bahwerekereza kandi baleeta obujune,
45003017	kandi omuhanda oguleeta obusinge tibagumanyire.”
45003018	“Ruhanga tibamutiina.”
45003019	Hati nitumanya ngu, byona Ebiragiro ebi bigamba, bikwata abo abarukulemwa Ebiragiro, nukwo akanwa koona kabumbwe kandi ensi yoona Ruhanga agicwere omusango.
45003020	Omumaiso ge busaho muntu n'omu alyeetwa muhikiriire habw'okuhikya ebiri omu Biragiro; habwokuba omu Biragiro nuho tumanyira ekibi.
45003021	Baitu hati Ruhanga ayolekere obuhikiriire obutarukuruga omu Biragiro, kandi Ebiragiro n'abarangi nibabijurra.
45003022	Nubwo obuhikiriire Ruhanga obu aha abo abarukwikiriza Yesu Kristo, kandi obuheebwa boona abamwikiriza. Habwokuba busaho mbaganizo:
45003023	ningira boona bakasiisa, balemwa kuhika ha kitiinisa kya Ruhanga,
45003024	baitu habw'embabazi ze bakaheerwa busa obuhikiriire, Kristo Yesu obu yatucungwire.
45003025	Nuwe ogu Ruhanga ou yahaireyo ali ndehwa, aseese esagama ye kuleherra abamwikiriza. Eki akakikora nukwo ayoleke obuhikiriire bwa Ruhanga, ayagumiisirize naayebwa ebibi ebyakozirwe ira;
45003026	nukwo omu busumi bunu tumanye nkooku ahikiriire, kandi ahikiriza weena anyakwikiriza Yesu.
45003027	Hati okwenyumiza kwaitu nikugasa ki? Kwa busa. Habwaki? Nikusigikira ha bikorwa byaitu? Nangwa, baitu ha kwikiriza kwaitu.
45003028	Itwe nitugumya tuti: Okwikiriza nukwo kuhikiriza omuntu, baitu tikuli kukora ebirukuragirwa Ebiragiro.
45003029	Obu, Ruhanga aba Ruhanga w'Abayudaaya bonka? Kandi tali Ruhanga w'Abanyamahanga? Ego, nabo wabo.
45003030	Ruhanga nkooku ali omu, aliha abasazirwe obuhikiriire habw'okwikiriza kwabo, n'abatasazirwe abubahe habw'okwikiriza kwabo.
45003031	Hati nu Ebiragiro turabidibya habw'okwikiriza kunu? Nikikafuuhe! Baitu tubigumye bugumya.
45004001	Hati nu turagamba ki hali Abburahamu, isenkuru itwe ow'omubiri?
45004002	Abburahamu obu araaba yahikiriziibwe ebi yakozire, yakubaire n'eky'okwenyumirizaaho; baitu ateenyumize omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
45004003	Kandi Ebyahandiikirwe nibigamba ki? Nibigira biti: “Abburahamu akaikiriza Ruhanga, eki kikamuhaisa obuhikiriire.”
45004004	Ningira omusaara gw'omuntu anyakukora omulimo tigwetwa kisembo, gwetwa ibanja eri asemeriire kusasurwa.
45004005	Baitu ogu atarukwesiga ebi arukukora, kyonka naayesiga Ruhanga anyakweza n'abo abatamutiina, okwikiriza kwe kwetwa buhikiriire.
45004006	Daudi nawe nukwo ahaisaniza ati omugisa oguheebwa omuntu Ruhanga ou ayeta muhikiriire, kandi kunu ataina ebi akozire, naagamba ati:
45004007	“B'omugisa abo abaganyirwa ensobi zaabo, kandi bakaihwaho ebibi byabo!
45004008	W'omugisa omuntu MUKAMA ou atalibarra bibi bye.”
45004009	Omugisa gunu guba gw'abasazirwe bonka, rundi n'abatasazirwe? Itwe tugamba tuti: Okwikiriza kwa Abburahamu kukamwesa muhikiriire.
45004010	Eki kikabaho di? Amazire kusarwa rundi atakasazirwe? Kitamwese muhikiriire amazire kusarwa nangwa, baitu atakasazirwe.
45004011	Okusarwa kwe kakaba karorwaho ak'okugumya obuhikiriire obu yatungire habw'okwikiriza atakasazirwe. Ekyagenderiirwe nukwo kumufoora isenkuru boona abaikiriza batasazirwe, nabo bakabarwa kuba bahikiriire.
45004012	Kandi abe isenkuru w'abasazirwe, abatagarukiire ha kusarwa kwonka baitu abahondera ekirale eky'okwikiriza, isenkuru-itwe Abburahamu oku akaba ainakwo atakasazirwe.
45004013	Ruhanga okuraganiza Abburahamu n'abaijukuru be nkooku baligweterwa ensi, kutaruge omu kuhikya Ebiragiro, baitu kukaruga omu buhikiriire obu baahairwe habw'okwikiriza kwabo.
45004014	Abakwasi b'Ebiragiro obu baraaba bali nubo b'okugwetwa, buli okwikiriza tikwina mugaso, n'okuraganiza oku kwa busa.
45004015	Ningira Ebiragiro bimanyisa abantu, Ruhanga nkooku ali w'obukaya, kandi Ebiragiro nambere bitali, tihabaho n'okubicwa.
45004016	Nikyo obuhikiriire burugira omu kwikiriza, nukwo ebyaraganiziibwe bisigikire ha mbabazi za Ruhanga, biheebwe abaijukuru ba Abburahamu boona-tibali bakwasi b'Ebiragiro bonka, baitu n'abo abaikiriza nk'Abburahamu; habwokuba nuwe isenkuru itwe itwena,
45004017	nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Nkufoire isenkuru amahanga maingi.” Eki Abburahamu akakiraganizibwa Ruhanga ou yaikiriize, nuwe Ogu anyakuhumbuura abafu kandi anyakuhanga ebintu ebikaba bitaroho.
45004018	Abburahamu akaikiriza, naanihira ebitakunihiirwe ngu, alifooka isenkuru amahanga maingi, nkooku yagambiirwe ati: “Abaijukuru baawe nukwo baliba baingi bati.”
45004019	Noobu yarozire ahoireyo, habwokuba akaba ahikize emyaka nka kikumi ey'obukuru, kandi yarora mukazi we Saara ali ngumba, baitu ebi bitamugaruukirize omu kwikiriza.
45004020	Atagurukagurukye eki Ruhanga yamuraaganiize, baitu akeeyongera okugumira omu kwikiriza kwe, naahaisaniza Ruhanga,
45004021	ananukiire kimu nkooku Ruhanga akaba naasobora kukora eki yaraganiize.
45004022	Nikyo okwikiriza kwe “kwamweseze muhikiriire.”
45004023	Baitu ebigambo ebirukugamba biti: “Kukamwesa muhikiriire”, bitahandiikwe habwe wenka,
45004024	baitu bikahandiikwa na habwaitu. Na itwe tulyetwa bahikiriire: itwe abaikiriza Ogu ayahumbwire Yesu MUKAMA waitu omu bafu.
45004025	Yesu ogu ayaisirwe habw'ebibi byaitu kandi yahumbuurwa, nukwo atwegarukanganisemu na Ruhanga.
45005001	Nahabweki, nkooku tuhikirizibwa okwikiriza, twina obusinge na Ruhanga habwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo,
45005002	ou twarabiremu okuhika ha mbabazi zinu ezi turumu. Nikyo turukukyanganukira, nitunihira okubagana ha kitiinisa kya Ruhanga.
45005003	Kandi tikiri eki kyonka, baitu nitukyanganuka n'omu kusaasa kwaitu, nitumanya omu kusaasa nkooku harugamu okugumiisiriza;
45005004	omu kugumiisiriza harugamu obumanzi, kandi obumanzi burugwamu okunihira.
45005005	Kandi itwe titurukunihirra busa, habwokuba Mwoyo Ahikiriire ou twahairwe, akaseesa engonzi za Ruhanga omu mitima yaitu.
45005006	Obu tukaba tukyali baceke, akasumi konyini obu kaahikire, Kristo akatufeera, itwe abatatiina Ruhanga.
45005007	Weza, nikiremeera omuntu kufeera ahikiriire. Rundi kwikiriza kwehayo habw'ow'engeso nungi.
45005008	Baitu omuli eki, Ruhanga nuho ayolekera nkooku atugonza, habwokuba obu tukaba tukyali basiisi, Kristo akatufeera.
45005009	Hati nu, nkooku tweziibwe esagama ye, alitujunira kimu okufubirwa Ruhanga.
45005010	Habwokuba obu tukaba tukyali banyanzigwa ba Ruhanga, tukagarukanganamu nawe habw'okufa kw'Omwana we. Hati, obu twagarukangainemu, obwomeezi bwo tibuliikiraho kutujuna.
45005011	Tikiri eki kyonka, baitu nitwesiima omu Ruhanga habwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo ayatugarukanganiisizemu.
45005012	Habweki ekibi nkooku kyaizire omunsi habw'omuntu omu, kandi kyaleeta okufa; nukwo orufu rwahikire ha bantu boona, habwokuba boona bakasiisa.
45005013	Mazima ebibi bikaba biri omunsi Ebiragiro bitakatairweho; baitu mbere hatali Biragiro, ebi bakora tibyetwa bibi.
45005014	Kandi orufu rwalemaga abantu okuruga hali Adamu okuhika hali Musa; nangwa rwalemaga n'abatarasiisire, Adamu nkooku yasiisire. Kandi Adamu ogu akaba ali kisisani ky'ogu ow'akaba ali w'okwija.
45005015	Baitu ekisembo Ruhanga eki agabira busa tikisisana kibi kya Adamu. Habwokuba ekibi ky'omuntu omu, obu kiraaba kyaleetiire baingi okufa, baitu embabazi za Ruhanga n'ekisembo ekiheriirwe busa eky'omuntu omu Yesu Kristo tibyakukizire muno kubaleetera omugaso?
45005016	Kandi ekisembo eki ekya busa tikirukusisana n'ebyarugire omu kibi ky'omuntu ogu omu. Ningira omusango ogwacwirwe habw'ekibi eki ekimu, gukarugwamu okusingwa; baitu ekisembo ekya busa, ekigabwa abantu bamazire kukora ebibi bingi, kiihaho omusango.
45005017	Orufu obu ruliba rwalemere habw'ekibi ky'omuntu ogu omu, abo abagirirwa embabazi ezihinguraine, kandi abaheriirwe busa ekisembo eky'obuhikiriire, balikira muno kulema omu bwomeezi obw'ebiro n'ebiro habw'omuntu ali omu Yesu Kristo.
45005018	Ekibi ky'omuntu omu nkooku kyasingisize abantu boona omusango, n'ekikorwa ekihikiire kimu ky'omuntu omu nukwo kyaihireho boona omusango, nikibatungisa obwomeezi.
45005019	Ningira abaingi nkooku baafookere basiisi habw'obutahurra bw'omuntu omu, n'abaingi nukwo baliba bahikiriire habw'obuhulizi bw'omuntu omu.
45005020	Ebiragiro obu byaizire, bikakanyisa emisango; baitu emisango ha yayeyongiire kukanya, nuho n'embabazi za Ruhanga zaakizire kukanya muno.
45005021	Habweki, ekibi nkooku kyalemere nikireeta orufu, n'embabazi za Ruhanga nazo nukwo irirema niireeta obuhikiriire, niihikya abantu omu bwomeezi obutahwaho habwa Yesu Kristo MUKAMA waitu.
45006001	Hati tugambe ki? Twikale nitusiisa, nukwo embabazi za Ruhanga ikanye?
45006002	Nikikafuuhe! Itwe abaarugire mu bibi tusobora tuta kugaruka kubiikaramu?
45006003	Timurukumanya itwe itwena abaabatiziibwe omu Kristo Yesu tukafa, nkooku twabatiziibwe nukwo tufe nawe?
45006004	Habweki obu twabatiziibwe tukafa, twaziikwa hamu nawe; nukwo Kristo nkooku yahumbwirwe omu bafu habw'ekitiinisa kya Ise, na itwe tusobole okugendera omu bwomeezi obuhyaka.
45006005	Obu turaaba twateeraniziibwe nawe omu kufa nk'okwe, mazima tuliteeranizibwa nawe omu kuhumbuuka nk'okwe.
45006006	Tumanyire engeso zaitu eza ira nkooku zaabambirwe hamu nawe ha musaraba, nukwo omubiri ogukora ebibi guhwerekerre; na itwe tuleke kugaruka kulemwa ebibi obundi.
45006007	Ningira ogu ayafiire, aba atakyalemwa bibi.
45006008	Na itwe obu turaaba twafiire hamu na Kristo, nitwikiriza nkooku tulyomeera hamu nawe.
45006009	Habwokuba nitumanya Kristo obu yakahumbwirwe omu bafu, taligaruka kufa; n'orufu tirukyamulema.
45006010	Okufa oku yafiire, akafa ha kibi omurundi gumu, yamara; baitu obwomeezi obu aina, - naayomezibwa Ruhanga.
45006011	Nukwo na inywe mwebale nk'abaarugire omu bibi, kandi abarukwomeera omu Ruhanga habwa Kristo Yesu.
45006012	Habweki mutaikiriza bibi kulema emibiri yanyu enyakufa, mukatwalirizbwa okwegomba kwayo.
45006013	Engingo ez'emibiri yanyu mutaziikiriza kukora ebibi, mukaifoora bintu eby'okubakoza ebibi, baitu mwehe Ruhanga nk'abantu abaihirwe omu kufa, baataahibwa omu bwomeezi; kandi engingo zanyu muzihe Ruhanga nk'ebintu eby'okubakoza ebirungi.
45006014	Ebibi tibiribalema, habwokuba timurukulemwa Biragiro, baitu nimulemwa embabazi za Ruhanga.
45006015	Nukwo kugamba, twikalege nitusiisa, habwokuba titurukulemwa Biragiro baitu embabazi za Ruhanga? Nikikafuuhe!
45006016	Kinu nakyo timurukukimanya? Kakuba nimweha omuntu nk'abairu abahurra, muba kwo bairu b'ogu ou muhurra: rundi bairu b'ekibi ekitwara omu kufa, rundi bairu b'obuhulizi obuhikya ha kwezibwa.
45006017	Baitu Ruhanga asiimwe, habwokuba inywe, ira abakaba bali bairu b'ekibi, hati mufookere bahulizi n'omutima gwona, mwahika ha rulengo orw'enyegesa ei mwahairwe,
45006018	kandi obu mwaihirwe omu bibi, mwaffoka bairu b'obuhikiriire.
45006019	Nimbaza nk'omuntu buntu, habw'obuceke bw'obuhangwa bwanyu. Habwokuba engingo zanyu ira nkooku mwazikoleze eby'ensoni n'obubi obuhinguraine, hati nu muzite ha buhikiriire obuleeta okwezibwa.
45006020	Obu mukaba muli bairu b'ebibi, mukaba mutaina bukwatane n'eby'obuhikiriire.
45006021	Baitu nu, karungi ki aka mwaihire omu bintu ebirukubakwasa ensoni biro binu? Ekiruga omu bintu ebi nukwo kufa.
45006022	Baitu hati nkooku mwihirwe omu bibi, mwafooka bairu ba Ruhanga, oburungi obu murukutunga nukwo okwezibwa, kandi ekiruga omu kwezibwa oku nubwo bwomeezi obutahwaho.
45006023	Habwokuba empeera y'ebibi, nukwo kufa; baitu ekisembo Ruhanga eki agabira busa, nubwo bwomeezi obutahwaho omu Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu.
45007001	Beene baitu, timurukumanya Ebiragiro nkooku birema omuntu akyali mwomeezi? - nimbaliza abo abarukumanya Ebiragiro.
45007002	Nukwo kiti, omukazi omuswerwa, Ekiragiro kimuboha hali iba obu aba akiri mwomeezi; baitu iba obu afa, nubwo asumururwa ha Kiragiro eki.
45007003	Nukwo nu, kakuba aswerwa omusaija ondi, kunu iba akiri mwomeezi, obu ayetwa musiihani. Baitu kakuba iba afa, buli takyalemwa Kiragiro eki; kandi kakuba aswerwa omusaija ondi, tayetwa musiihani.
45007004	Na inywe bagenzi bange, nukwo mwafiire muti ha Biragiro omu mubiri gwa Kristo, mutungwe ondi ayahumbwirwe omu bafu, kandi itwena tusobole kukorra Ruhanga ebirungi.
45007005	Obu tukaba nitukyahondera eby'omubiri, okwegomba kwaitu okubi okwasisiimurwaga Ebiragiro kwakorraga omu ngingo zaitu, nukwo tukole ebibi ebireeta orufu.
45007006	Baitu hati tukaihwaho Ebiragiro, tumazire kuleka ebi ebyatwikaize omu bwiru, nukwo tuheereze tutarukuhondera Ebiragiro ebyahandiikirwe ira, baitu nituheereza twina bwomeezi obuhyaka obuleetwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
45007007	Hati nu tugambe ki? Tuti: Ebiragiro nibyo bireeta ebibi? Mahano! Kakuba bitarabaire Biragiro, ebibi tinkubimanyire. Kakuba Ebiragiro bitaragambire biti: “Otalyegomba kubi”, tinakusoboire kumanya ekyetwa okwegomba okubi.
45007008	Baitu ebibi obu byataahiriire omu Kiragiro eki, byanyimukyamu okwegomba okw'emiringo yoona. Nambere hatali Biragiro, buli ebibi biba bifiire.
45007009	Nyowe kara nkaba ndi mwomeezi hataroho Biragiro; baitu Ebiragiro obu byaizire, ebibi byanjunaanwa, nyowe naafa.
45007010	Ekiragiro eki ekikaba kiri ky'okundeetera obwomeezi, kikandugiramu orufu.
45007011	Habwokuba ebibi obu byataahiriire omu Kiragiro, bikangobeza kandi byanyitira omu Kiragiro eki.
45007012	Habweki, Ebiragiro nibyera, n'Ekiragiro ky'okuteegomba kubi nakyo nikyera, nibihika kandi birungi.
45007013	Hati nu, ebirungi nibyo byanyisire? Nangwa! Ebibi nibyo byanyisire nibiraba omu birungi nukwo ebibi bizooke nkooku biri bibi, kandi habw'okutaahirra omu Kiragiro, bihinguraniire kimu obubi.
45007014	Tumanyire Ebiragiro nkooku biri by'omwoyo; baitu nyowe ndi w'omubiri, ayaguliirwe omu bwiru bw'ebibi.
45007015	Ebikorwa byange byonyini tindukubyetegereza. Habwokuba ebi ngonza, tibiri nibyo nkora; baitu ekintu kyonyini eki nnoba, nikyo nkora.
45007016	Hati nu, obu ndaaba ninkora ebi ntarukugonza, buli ninyikiriza Ebiragiro nkooku birukwetaagwa.
45007017	Nahabweki, takyali nyowe arukubikora, baitu nibikorwa ebibi ebiikara omuli nyowe.
45007018	Habwokuba mmanyire omuli nyowe nkooku hatarumu karungi na kamu, nukwo kugamba: omu mubiri gwange. Noobu ngonza kukora ebihikire, baitu ndemwa kubikora.
45007019	Ebirungi ebi ngonza, timbikora; baitu ebibi ebi ntagonza, nibyo nkora.
45007020	Habweki, obu ndaaba nkora ebi ntagonza, takyali nyowe anyakubikora, baitu bikorwa ebibi ebinyakwikara omuli nyowe.
45007021	Na nyowe nsanga kinu kinfookiire kiragiro. Obu ngonza kukora ebihikire, ebibi bimba haihi.
45007022	habwokuba omu mutima gwange ninsiima Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga,
45007023	baitu omu ngingo zange nimpurramu ekiragiro ekindi, ekirukurwanisa ekiragiro ekiri omu mutima gwange, nikinfoora munyankomo w'ekiragiro ky'ebibi ebiikara omu ngingo zange.
45007024	Imira nyowe! Ka mboine! Omubiri gunu ogw'okufa, nooha aligunjuna?
45007025	Ruhanga asiimwe arukutujunira omu Yesu Kristo MUKAMA waitu! Hati nu, nyowe habwange nkwata Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga n'amagezi gange, baitu omu mubiri gwange mpondera ekiragiro ky'ebibi.
45008001	Aho nu, abo abali omu Kristo Yesu, tibakyaina musango hati.
45008002	Habwokuba ebihaburo ebya Mwoyo Ahikiriire anyakuleeta obwomeezi oburukuraba omu Kristo Yesu bikambohorra ha kiragiro ky'ebibi n'orufu.
45008003	Habwokuba Ebiragiro, ebi bitarasoboire kukora habw'obuceke bw'omubiri, Ruhanga akabikora naatuma Omwana we nyabwe aina omubiri nk'ogwaitu ogukora ekibi, gube kyonzira habw'ekibi. Kandi omu mubiri ogu nuho ekibi yakisingisiize omusango.
45008004	Nukwo tuhikiririze kimu Ebiragiro ebi birukuragira, itwe abatahondera eby'omubiri, baitu abahondera ebya Mwoyo.
45008005	Abo abahondera eby'omubiri, emitima yabo bagita ha by'omubiri, baitu abo abahondera ebya Mwoyo, emitima yabo bagita ha bya Mwoyo.
45008006	Okuta omutima ha by'omubiri kurugwamu okufa; baitu okuta omutima ha bya Mwoyo kurugwamu obwomeezi n'obusinge.
45008007	Habwokuba omutima oguhondera ebi omubiri gugonza, guba munyanzigwa wa Ruhanga; tigworobera Biragiro bya Ruhanga, mazimakwo tigusobora.
45008008	Kandi abo abalemwa omubiri tibasobora kusiimwa Ruhanga.
45008009	Baitu Mwoyo wa Ruhanga obu araaba naikara kwo omuli inywe, timuli omu mubiri, baitu omu Mwoyo. Weena ataina Mwoyo wa Kristo, ogu tali muntu we.
45008010	Kristo obu araaba ali omuli inywe, buli omubiri gufiire habw'ebibi, baitu omwoyo gwawe gwomeezibwa habw'obuhikiriire.
45008011	Mwoyo w'Ogu ayahumbwire Yesu omu bafu, obu araaba naikara omuli inywe, Ogu ayahumbwire Yesu, alyomeeza n'emibiri yanyu enyakufa, habwa Mwoyo we anyakwikara omuli inywe.
45008012	Nukwo nu beene baitu, twina ibanja eritali ly'omubiri, ngu tukuraatire eby'omubiri
45008013	obu muraaba nimukuraatira eby'omubiri mulifa; baitu obu muraaba nimucwa ebikorwa ebibi by'omubiri habwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, mulyomeera.
45008014	Ningira boona abeebemberwa Mwoyo wa Ruhanga, baba baana ba Ruhanga.
45008015	Na inywe mutaheebwe mutima ogw'obwiru ogw'okubagarra omu butiini; baitu mukaheebwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire ayabafoire baana, anyakutugambisa ati: “Abba, Isiitwe!”
45008016	Mwoyo ogu wonyini nuwe arukutumanyisa hamu n'omutima gwaitu, nkooku tuli baana ba Ruhanga.
45008017	Kandi obu turaaba tuli baana, buli tuli bagwetwa. Bagwetwa ba Ruhanga abagweterwa hamu na Kristo, kakuba tubona emihito hamu nawe, nukwo tusobole kuheebwa ekitiinisa hamu nawe.
45008018	Ninteekereza nti: Emihito y'akasumi kanu tesemeriire kulengesanizibwa n'ekitiinisa eki tulisuukulirwa.
45008019	Habwokuba ebihangwa byona biikara bitegeriize n'ekihika okwolekwa kw'abaana ba Ruhanga.
45008020	Ningira ebihangwa eby'omunsi bikaba bitakusobora kukora nkooku byakwegondiize; hatali habwabyo, baitu habw'Ogu ayabitegekere ati-nukwo biikale bitegeriize ebiriija.
45008021	Habwokuba ebihangwa ebi nabyo birisumururwa omu bwiru obw'okujunda, bitunge obugabe obw'ekitiinisa obw'abaana ba Ruhanga.
45008022	Nitumanya ebihangwa byona nkooku biikara nibisinda kandi nibisaasa nk'ebirukurumwa kuzaara okuhika na hati.
45008023	Tibiri bihangwa byonka, baitu na itwe abaahairwe Mwoyo nk'omuganuro ogw'okubanza, nitusinda omu nda yaitu, tutegeriize kuhindurwa baana, nubwo emibiri yaitu yoona ericungurwa.
45008024	Kandi okunihira oku nukwo twajuniirwemu. Ningira okunihira ebirukurorwa, oku tikuba kunihira kwo. Nooha anihira ebi arukurora?
45008025	Baitu obu turaaba nitunihira ebi tutarukurora, mazimakwo tubitegereza tugumire.
45008026	Mwoyo nukwo atukoonyere ati mu buceke bwaitu; habwokuba titumanyire kusaba nkooku tusemeriire; baitu Mwoyo wenka atutonganirra hali Ruhanga, naasinda omu mulingo ogutagambwa.
45008027	Ogu anyakwekebiija emitima y'abantu naamanya Mwoyo ebi arukugenderra; habwokuba Mwoyo atonganirra abantu be, Ruhanga nkooku arukusiima.
45008028	Tumanyire ngu, omu buli kintu Ruhanga eki akora, agenderramu oburungi bw'abo abamugonza, abeetwa entegeka ye nkooku eri.
45008029	Habwokuba abo aba yamanyire ira, batakabaireho, nubo yakomere basisane Omwana we, nukwo Omwana asobole kuba muzigaijo omu bagenzi be abaingi.
45008030	Kandi abo aba yakomere batakabaireho, nubo yayesire; n'abo aba yayesire, nubo yahaire obuhikiriire; n'abo aba yahaire obuhikiriire, nubo yahaisize ekitiinisa.
45008031	Hati nu, ebi turabigambaho ki? Ruhanga obu araaba atwemeriireho, nooha aliturwanisa?
45008032	Ogu ataraganyiire Omwana we nyabwe, baitu yamuhayo habwaitu itwena, alyangira ki okutuha ebintu byona hamu nawe?
45008033	Nooha alijunaana abakome ba Ruhanga? Ruhanga nuwe anyakubaihaho omusango.
45008034	Ow'okubacwera omusango nooha? Ni Kristo Yesu ayafiire, yagaruka yahumbuurwa omu bafu, anyakuli ha mukono gw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga, nuwe arukututonganirra kwo!
45008035	Nooha alitwihaho engonzi za Kristo? Eriba mihito, bujune, kuhiiganizibwa, njara, okugenda busa, akabi akandi rundi empirima?
45008036	Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ekiro kyona twitwa habwawe; nitusisanizibwa nk'etaama ez'okwitwa.”
45008037	Nangwa, omu bintu ebi byona nitusingurra kimu habw'Ogu ayatugondeze.
45008038	Nyowe ningumiza kimu nti: Busaho kintu na kimu noobu rwakuba rufu, rundi bwomeezi, abamalaika rundi emyoyo emibi, ebintu ebiroho rundi ebiriija,
45008039	noobu byakubaire ebya ha iguru rundi eby'okuzimu, rundi ekintu ekindi kyona ekyahangirwe ekirisobora kutwihaho engonzi za Ruhanga na Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu.
45009001	Nimbaza amazima omu Kristo, tindukubiiha. Omutima gwange nigumanywa Mwoyo Ahikiriire
45009002	nkooku gwijwire obujune bwingi n'obusaalizi obutaina h'okugarukira.
45009003	Naakugondeze nyowe nkyenwe kandi mbaganizibwe na Kristo habwa bagenzi baitu, n'ab'oruganda rwaitu.
45009004	Nubo Abaisirairi abaayesirwe kuba baana ba Ruhanga, abaahairwe ekitiinisa n'endagaano, abaakwasibwe Ebiragiro n'emikoro ey'okuramya, n'ebyaraganiziibwe.
45009005	Omuli bo nuho haarugire baisenkuru itwe, kandi omu ihanga lyabo nuho haazairwe Kristo, nuwe Ruhanga anyakulema byona, anyakukugizibwa ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
45009006	Kinu tikirukumanyisa ngu, Ruhanga eki yaraganiize kikalema kuhikirizibwa, nangwa! Habwokuba boona abaazairwe omu Isirairi, tibali Baisirairi;
45009007	kandi boona tibali bagwetwa b'Abburahamu, habw'okuzaarwa nk'abaijukuru. Baitu kikahandiikwa kiti: “Omu Isaaka nuho haliruga abagwetwa baawe.”
45009008	Eki nikimanyisa ngu, abaana ba Abburahamu abaazairwe omu mubiri, tibali nubo baana ba Ruhanga; baitu abaazairwe, Ruhanga amazire kukora endagaano na Abburahamu, nubo bagwetwa kwo.
45009009	Habwokuba ekyaraganiziibwe kikagamba kiti: “Omwaka ogurukwija ndigaruka mbarole omu kasumi nka kanu, kandi Saara aliba azaire omwana w'obwojo.”
45009010	Tikiri eki kyonka, baitu na Rebbeka, obu akaba aina enda ey'abarongo ey'omusaija ogu omu, nuwe isenkuru itwe Isaaka,
45009011	noobu bakaba batakazairwe kandi batakakozire kintu ekirungi rundi ekibi, baitu entegeka ya Ruhanga ey'okukoma ou yasiimire, ekeeyongera omumaiso. Hatali habw'ebi baakozire, baitu habw'enkoma ya Ruhanga.
45009012	Rebbeka akagambirwa ati: “Isingoma aliheereza Kato.”
45009013	Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Yakobbo nkamugonza, baitu Esau nkamwanga.”
45009014	Hati turagamba ki? Ngu Ruhanga tagira bwinganiza? Nikikafuuhe!
45009015	Uwe akagambira Musa ati: “Ndiganyira ou ndukugonza kuganyira, kandi ngirre embabazi ou ndukugonza kugirra embabazi.”
45009016	Habweki tikirukurugirra ha kugonza kw'omuntu rundi ha bwekambi bwe, baitu kirugirra ha mbabazi za Ruhanga.
45009017	Habwokuba omu Bihandiiko ebirukwera Ruhanga akagambira Faraaho ati: “Nkwimukize, ningenderra okukwolekeramu obusobozi bwange, nukwo ibara lyange lirangirirwe omunsi yoona.”
45009018	Habweki nu, Ruhanga aganyira weena ou agonza kuganyira, kandi agumanganiza omutima ogwa weena ou agoza gugumangane.
45009019	Hati nu nimwija kunkaguza muti: “Habwaki Ruhanga naakyajunaana abantu habw'ensobi zaabu? Kandi nooha asobora kwanga kukora Ruhanga eki arukwenda?”
45009020	Baitu si niiwe oha iwe omuntu arukugarukamu Ruhanga? Ekinaga kirikaguza omubumbi wakyo kiti: “Habwaki wambumbire oti?”
45009021	Omubumbi w'ekinaga, ibumba taliinaho busobozi, omu kitonge kimu ky'ibumba kubumbamu ekibindi eky'emikoro ey'ekitiinisa rundi ekindi ekikwatirwamu ebintu ebya buli kiro?
45009022	Ruhanga obu araaba naagonza okwoleka ekiniga kye n'okumanyisa obusobozi bwe, nikiita ki Uwe kugumiisiriza habw'embabazi ze enyingi ebibindi ebimukwasa ekiniga ebi yabumbiire kuhwerekerezibwa?
45009023	Akagenderra kwoleka ekitiinisa kye ekingi ha bibindi ebimukwasa embabazi, ebi yateekaniriize ekitiinisa okuruga ira.
45009024	Ebibindi ebi niitwe aba yayesire, atatwihe omu Bayudaaya bonka, baitu n'omu Banyamahanga.
45009025	Nikyo Ruhanga yagambiire omu kitabu kya Hoseya ati: “Abo abakaba batali bantu bange, ndibeeta ‘ihanga lyange’. N'omukazi akaba atarukugonzibwa, ndimweta ‘kiganzi’.”
45009026	“Kandi omu kiikaro kyonyini nambere bagambiriirwe bati: ‘Timuli bantu bange’, nuho balyeterwa ‘Baana ba Ruhanga omwomeezi’.”
45009027	Kandi Isaaya akatokera haiguru obu yabaliize hali Isirairi ati: “Omuhendo gw'abaana ba Isirairi noobu guraaba nigwingana omusenyi gwa ha nyanja, baitu abake abalisigaraho nubo balijunwa;
45009028	habwokuba MUKAMA talikeerereza kufubira abantu n'amaani.”
45009029	Kandi na Isaaya akakiranga ati: “Kakuba MUKAMA ow'amahe ataratusigiire ruzaaro, twakubaire nka Sodomu, twakusisaine nka Gomora.”
45009030	Hati turagamba ki? Tumanyire obuhikiriire obusigikira ha kwikiriza nkooku bwahikireho Abanyamahanga abatarabwekambiire;
45009031	baitu Abaisirairi abaayekambiire obuhikiriire obusigikira ha Biragiro, bbo bakalemwa kuhikiriza Ebiragiro ebi.
45009032	Habwaki? Habwokuba obuhikiriire batabwekambiire nibasigikira ha kwikiriza, baitu bakasigikira ha bikorwa byabo. Gamba bakaterwa ibaale eritabaijura,
45009033	nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Dora nimbyara ibaale omu Siyoni, ibaale eriritabaijura abantu, omwandara ogulibanaga; kandi weena anyakumwikiriza, talikwatwa nsoni.”
45010001	Beene baitu, omutima gwange eki gurukwenda, kandi eki ndukusabira Abaisirairi hali Ruhanga, nikyo kinu: bajunwe.
45010002	Ningumya nkooku bagonza kwo Ruhanga, baitu tibakabaire kwetegereza.
45010003	Habw'okutamanya obuhikiriire oburuga hali Ruhanga na habw'okuserra okweteeraho obuhikiriire bwabo nyabwabo, bateeteho obu oburuga hali Ruhanga.
45010004	Habwokuba omu Kristo nuho Ebiragiro bihikirizibwa, nukwo weena arukumwikiriza ahikirizibwe.
45010005	Musa akahandiika naagamba ati: Omuntu anyakwekambira obuhikiriire oburukusigikira ha Biragiro, nubwo bulimuhaisa obwomeezi.
45010006	Baitu obuhikiriire oburukusigikira ha kwikiriza tibukutanga kugamba omu mutima gwawe oti: “Nooha alitemba omu iguru?” [Nukwo aiheyo Kristo].
45010007	Rundi oti: “Nooha alisirimuka okuzimu?” [Nukwo aihe Kristo omu bafu].
45010008	Kandi Ebyahandiikirwe byonyini bigamba biti: Ekigambo kikuli haihi, kikuli ha munwa, n'omu mutima gwawe. [Nikyo kigambo eky'okwikiriza ekitwegesa].
45010009	Kakuba oyatura n'akanwa kaawe oti: Yesu aba MUKAMA, okaikiriza n'omutima gwawe Ruhanga nkooku yamuhumbwire omu bafu, alijunwa.
45010010	Omuntu aikiriza Kristo n'omutima gwe, nukwo ahikirre; kandi ayatura Kristo n'akanwa ke, nukwo ajunwe.
45010011	Ebyahandiikirwe bigamba biti: “Weena anyakumwikiriza, talikwatwa nsoni.”
45010012	Habwokuba tiharoho mbaganizo ha Muyudaaya n'Omugiriiki: MUKAMA ogu omu, aba MUKAMA wa boona, kandi oburungi bwe abugabira boona abamukunga.
45010013	Ningira: “Weena anyakwamirra MUKAMA alijunwa.”
45010014	Baitu abantu basobora bata kwamirra ogu ou bataraikiriize? Kandi n'okwikiriza ou batakahurrahoga? Kandi barahurra bata, hataroho murangirize?
45010015	Kandi bbo bararangirra bata, batatumirwe? Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ka birungi ebigere by'abarukurangirra Amakuru Amarungi!”
45010016	Baitu boona abaagahuliire, batagateho mutima, nangwa. Isaaya nkooku yagambire ati: “Ai MUKAMA, nooha ayaikiriize ebi twamurangiire?”
45010017	Nahabweki okwikiriza kuruga omu bigambo ebi tuhurra, kandi ebigambo ebi tuhurra biruga omu kurangirra Kristo.
45010018	Leka nyowe nkaguze nti: Abaisirairi batahurre? Mazimakwo bakahurra, habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Iraka lyabo likahulirwa abantu boona, n'ebigambo byabu bikahika ha mitaano y'ensi.”
45010019	Ninyongera kukaguza nti: Ihanga lya Isirairi litabyetegereze? Baitu Musa ti nuwe ayabandize kubahabura ati: “Ndibakwasa ihali hali abo abatakabaire ihanga; ndibakwasa ekiniga hali ihanga eritaina magezi.”
45010020	Kandi Isaaya nikyo agambira atarukutiina ati: “Nkazoorwa abo abataranserwire; nkeeyoleka abo abatarankaguliriize.”
45010021	Baitu hali Isirairi naagamba ati: “Ekiro kyona emikono yange nkaikara ngitegiire abantu entahurra kandi abeemi.”
45011001	Hati kankaguze nti: Ruhanga akanagira kimu abantu be? Nikikafuuhe! Na nyowe nyenka ndi Mwisirairi, mwijukuru w'Abburahamu, ow'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini.
45011002	Ruhanga atange bantu be aba yamanyire ira. Timurukwijuka Ebihandiiko ebirukwera ebi bigamba hali Eriya, obu yanyegeriire Abaisirairi hali Ruhanga?
45011003	Ati: “Ai MUKAMA, abarangi baawe babaisire, amatambiro gaawe bagasesire. Nyowe nyenka ninyowe nsigaireho, kandi na nyowe nibenda kunyita.”
45011004	Baitu Ruhanga akamugarukamu ki? Akamugira ati: “Nyesaagisiizeho abantu kasanju abatarateeriize embandwa Baali amaju.”
45011005	Kandi n'omu kasumi kanu, hakyaroho abake abasigaireho abaakomerwe habw'embabazi za Ruhanga.
45011006	Obu baraaba baakomerwe habw'embabazi, okukomwa kwabo tikukyasigikira ha bikorwa byabo. Kakuba kusigikira ha baakozire, buli embabazi za Ruhanga iba itakyali mbabazi.
45011007	Hati nu, tugambe ki? Abaisirairi bakalemwa kutunga obuhikiriire obu baaserwire. Abaakomerwe nubo baabutungire; baitu abandi, emitima yaabo yagumangana,
45011008	nkookukyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ruhanga akabaha emitima erukusununuka, amaiso agatarukurora, kandi amatu agatarukuhurra n'okuhika hati.”
45011009	Daudi nawe akagamba ati: “Ekiihuro kyabo leka kibafookere mutego, kiriba, buhya, kandi kifubiro kyabo.
45011010	Amaiso gaabo gaswekwe omwirima, nukwo baleme kuhweza, kandi baikale bagemerwe enaku ebiro byona.”
45011011	Nikyo ndukukaguliza nti: Bakatabaijuka nk'abarukwija kugwa? Naakake konka! Okusobya kw'Abaisirairi kukaleetera Abanyamahanga kujunwa. Nukwo kujunwa okwakwasize Isirairi ihali.
45011012	Ensobi zaabo obu iraaba niireetera abantu omugisa, n'okusiisa kwabo obu kuraaba nikuleetera Abanyamahanga embabazi; okwegarukamu kw'Abaisirairi boona tikulirugwamu emigisa erukukiraho muno?
45011013	Hati nimbaza na inywe Abanyamahanga, habwokuba ndi mukwenda hali Abanyamahanga. Nimpaisaniza obuheereza bwange,
45011014	nukwo nkwase ihali Abayudaaya bataahi bange, kandi njune abamu omuli bo.
45011015	Okwangwa kwabo obu kuraaba kwaleetiire baingi okugarukanganamu na Ruhanga, okutangirirwa kwabo kulibaleetera ki? Tikulibahumbuura omu bafu?
45011016	Ensaano ey'omuganuro enyakuhongwa, obu eba eyeziibwe, buli n'ekiihuro kyona kyeziibwe; kandi ekikoro obu kiba nikyera, n'amataagi nago buli nigeera.
45011017	Amataagi agamu obu garaaba gaakoonoirweho, na iwe omunono ogw'omuti oliva ogw'omu kisaka, okagarurwa omu kiikaro kyago, nukwo oliisibwe hamu nago ebirukuruga omu kiikaro kyago, nukwo oliisibwe hamu nago ebirukuruga omu mihama yagwo,
45011018	otenyumiriza ha mataagi ago. Kakuba oyenyumiza, ijuka nkooku atali iwe anyakukwatiriire ekikoro, baitu ekikoro nikyo kikwatiriire iwe.
45011019	Osobora kugamba oti: “Amataagi, eki gaakoonolirweho, nukwo nyowe kugarurwa omu kiikaro kyago.”
45011020	Eki ky'amazima. Gakanogorwaho habw'okutaikiriza kwago, baitu iwe ekikwemeriize otarukutengeeta, nukwo kwikiriza kwawe. Habweki leka kwekuza, baitu oikale nootiina.
45011021	Ruhanga obu araaba ataraganyire mataagi gonyini agaameriireho, na iwe talikuganyira.
45011022	Habweki nu, oyetegereze embabazi kandi n'obukaya bwa Ruhanga. Obukaya bwe hali abo abagwire, n'embabazi ze hali iwe, kakuba oziikaramu. Kakuba kitabakwo, na iwe olicwibwaho.
45011023	Nangwa na bali, obu baraaba batarukugumira omu butaikiriza bwabo, baligarurrwa ha muti; habwokuba Ruhanga aina obusobozi obw'okwongera kubagarramu.
45011024	Iwe obu oraaba wacwirwe ha muti ogw'oliva ogw'omu kisaka ogwayemereze, wagarurwa ha muti gw'oliva ogw'omu kisaka ogwayemereze, wagarurwa ha muti gw'oliva ogwabyairwe abantu kandi ogutarayemereze, amataagi agazairweho tigalikira muno kugarurwa ha muti nambere gaarugire?
45011025	Bagenzi bange, ninyenda mukenge kirungi ensita enu, muleke kwebara nk'abamagezi: abamu omu Baisirairi bagumangaine kandi baliikara nibagumangana okuhika Abanyamahanga boona obu balitutaahamu.
45011026	Obu nubwo Abaisirairi nabo balijunwa, nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Omujuni aliruga Siyoni, ihanga lya Yakobbo aliihiremu kimu okutatiina Ruhanga.”
45011027	“Egi eriba ndagaano yange nabo, obu ndibaihaho ebibi byabo.”
45011028	Okurorra ha Makuru Amarungi, bbo baba banyanzigwa ba Ruhanga, nukwo inywe musobole okugaikiriza; baitu okurorra ha kukomwa, bbo baba nganzi habw'abaisenkurubo.
45011029	Ningira Ruhanga obu ayeta rundi agaba, tayeyijukya.
45011030	Nka inywe ira oku mukaba mweremiire Ruhanga, baitu hati mugiriirwe embabazi habw'obwereme bwa bali.
45011031	Nabo hati bafookere beereme, nukwo bagiriirwe embabazi nk'ezi mwagiriirwe.
45011032	Ningira abantu boona Ruhanga akabeeta abeemi, nukwo boona abagirre embabazi.
45011033	Haa! Amagezi ga Ruhanga, n'okumanya kwe ka bihinguraine obwingi! Encwa ye k'etarukwetegerezibwa, n'emihanda ye k'etarukukengwa!
45011034	“Nooha aramanyire ebiteekerezo bya MUKAMA? Nooha si aramuhanuliire?”
45011035	“Nooha aramuhaire ekisembo nukwo nawe agarulirwe?”
45011036	Ebintu byona biruga omuli Uwe, biraba omuli Uwe, kandi bigarukira omuli Uwe. Aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
45012001	Nahabweki bagenzi bange, nimbeesengereza habw'embabazi za Ruhanga, muheyo emibiri yanyu nk'ekyonzira ekyomiire, ekirukwera kandi ekirukusiimwa Ruhanga. Obu nubwo muba nimuramya Ruhanga omu mazima.
45012002	Muleke kwesisaniza n'ab'ensi enu, baitu muhinduke, nimugarurwa buhyaka omu biteekerezo byanyu, nukwo mugumye Ruhanga ebi agonza: nibyo ebirungi, ebisiimwa, kandi ebihikiire kimu.
45012003	Habw'omugisa ogu nahairwe, ninteererra buli omu omuli inywe, aleke kweteekerezaaho muno okukira nkooku ali, baitu ayeteekerezeho nkooku ali omu mazima, buli omu naarorra ha kwikiriza Ruhanga oku yamuhaire.
45012004	Omu mubiri gumu nkooku twinamu ebicweka bingi, kandi ebicweka ebi byona bitarukukora mulimo gumu,
45012005	nukwo kiti na itwe. Noobu turaaba tuli baingi, baitu tuli mubiri gumu omu Kristo; kandi buli omu kicweka kya mugenzi we.
45012006	Nkooku twina ebisembo ebitarukusisana okurorra ha migisa ei twahairwe, katubyekonyeze. Obu kuraaba kuli kuranga, turange niturorra ha kwikiriza kwaitu.
45012007	Obu buraaba buli buheereza, tuheereze. Ogu arukwegesa, ate omutima ha kwegesa kwe.
45012008	Ogu arukuhabura, ahabule kwo; ogu arukugaba, agabe n'obwenda; ogu arukukoonyera, akoonyere n'obwekambi; kandi arukukora eby'embabazi, abikole n'okusemererwa.
45012009	Engonzi zanyu zibe z'amazima. Munobe ekibi, mugumire ha kirungi.
45012010	Mugonzangane nk'ab'oruganda oku bagonzangana; omu kuhangana ekitiinisa buli omu akizeho mugenzi we.
45012011	Mwekambe, muleke kuba bagara, muheereze MUKAMA n'omutima ogwijwire engonzi.
45012012	Mukyanganuke omu kunihira kwanyu, mugumiisirize omu mihito, musabe obutalekerra.
45012013	Muhe abantu ba Ruhanga ebi barukwetaaga, mutangirre kandi mukunire abagenyi.
45012014	Musabire omugisa abo abanyakubahiiga; mubasabire omugisa, baitu muleke kubakondereza.
45012015	Mukyanganuke n'abo abarukukyanganuka, murre n'abo abarukurra.
45012016	Mwikale mwina omutima gumu; muleke kwekuliriza, mweteerane n'abo abataina kitiinisa, muleke kwemanyaho amagezi.
45012017	Weena anyakukora kubi, mutamuhoora nzigu, baitu muteho omutima okukora boona eki barukweta ekirungi.
45012018	Obu kiraaba nikisoboka, mwikarane na boona mu businge nkooku murukusobora.
45012019	Abagonzibwa, mutalyehorra inywenka enzigu, baitu eki mukirekere encwa ya Ruhanga; habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Okuhoora enzigu kwange, ninyowe ndihoora; MUKAMA nukwo agamba.”
45012020	Na handi kigamba kiti: “Omunyanzigwa waawe obu arumwa enjara, muhe ebyokulya; obu akwatwa iroho, muhe ekyokunywa; habwokuba obu okora oti, oba noomusingisa omusango.”
45012021	Mutalisingurwa obubi, baitu inywe obubi mubusinguze oburungi.
45013001	Buli muntu weena ayorobere abalemi abarukumulema, habwokuba tiharoho busobozi na bumu rundi buli burugire hali Ruhanga; kandi abalemi abaroho bakateebwaho Ruhanga.
45013002	Habweki, ogu anyakweremera abalemi, aba ayeremiire ekyatairweho Ruhanga. Kandi abeereme abo, beereetera omusango.
45013003	Habwokuba abalemi tibatiinisa bantu abakora kurungi, baitu batiinisa abakora kubi. Iwe nooyenda kutatiina ow'obusobozi? Hati nu, kora ebirungi, nukwo nawe akusiime.
45013004	Ningira uwe muheereza wa Ruhanga arukukora habw'oburungi bwawe. Baitu kakuba okora kubi, otiine; habwokuba ekitara takihagatiirra busa. Nuwe muheereza wa Ruhanga ow'okufubira anyakukora kubi.
45013005	Nahabweki omuntu asemeriire kworoba, tikuli habw'okwetantara obukaya bwa Ruhanga kwonka, baitu na habw'okuhaburwa omutima gwe eki gumugambira.
45013006	Nikyo muheera emisoro, habwokuba abalemi baheereza ba Ruhanga, abarukukora omulimo agw'okusorooza emisoro.
45013007	Musasule boona ebi barukubatonga: abarukusorooza omusoro, mugubahe; abarukutonga obusuuru, mububahe; ab'okutiinwa, mubatiine; ab'ekitiinisa, mubahe ekitiinisa.
45013008	Mutaliba n'ibanja ha muntu weena, okwihaho ibanja ery'okugonzangana; habwokuba ogu anyakugonza mutaahi we, aba ahikiriize Ebiragiro.
45013009	Nibyo Ebiragiro ebigamba biti: “Otalisiihana, otaliita, otaliiba, otalyegomba kubi” n'ebiragiro ebindi, byona bifunzibwa omu kigambo ekirukugamba kiti: “Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.”
45013010	Anyakwina egonzi takora kubi mutaahi we; nahabweki engonzi nizo ihikiriza Ebiragiro.
45013011	Okwongera hali eki, mumanyire akasumi nkooku kali haihi kandi kahikiire kimu, inywe kusisiimuka omu turo; habwokuba okujunwa, hati kutwiriire haihi okukira nambere twabandize kwikiriza.
45013012	Obwire buli haihi kukya, n'izooba liri haihi kuturuka. Habweki, tuleke ebikorwa eby'omwirima, tukwate eby'okurwanisa omu musana.
45013013	Tukole kurungi nk'abali omu musana, tutarukurarraana omu magenyi kandi tutarukutamiira, tutarukusiihana n'okukora eby'obugwagwa, tutarukukungana n'okugirrangana ihali.
45013014	Baitu MUKAMA Yesu Kristo nuwe mufoole ngabu yanyu, muleme emibiri yanyu, ereke kukora ebi erukwegomba.
45014001	Omuntu ow'okwikiriza okuke mumutangirre, baitu mutarukuteezangana empaka ha biteekerezo bye.
45014002	Omuntu omu aikiriza nkooku asobora kulya buli kintu kyona, baitu ondi ow'okwikiriza kuke alya emikubi yonka.
45014003	Ogu arukulya buli kintu aleke kugaya atarukulya buli kintu kandi atarukulya buli kintu nawe aleke kucwera omusango ogu arukubirya; habwokuba Ruhanga amazire kumutangirra.
45014004	Niiwe oha arukucwera omuheereza w'ondi omusango? Obu araaba naayemerra rundi naagwa, nikimanywa mukama we wenka. Kandi alikwatirirwa, habwokuba mukama we aina obusobozi obw'okumwemereza.
45014005	Omuntu omu, ekiro kimu akyeta kikuru kukira ebindi; kunu ondi, ebiro byona abinganiza. Leka buli omu ayecweremu wenka.
45014006	Ogu anyakukuza ekiro, akikuza habw'okuhaisa MUKAMA ekitiinisa. N'ogu anyakulya buli kintu, nawe alya habw'okuhaisa MUKAMA ekitiinisa, habwokuba alya nasiima Ruhanga; n'ogu atalya kintu, akizira habw'okuhaisa MUKAMA ekitiinisa, kandi nawe asiima Ruhanga.
45014007	Busaho n'omu ayeyomeeza, kandi busaho ayefeera.
45014008	Obu twomeera, twomeezibwa MUKAMA; kandi obu tufa, nabwo tufeera MUKAMA. Nukwo nu, obu twomeera rundi tufa, tuli ba MUKAMA.
45014009	Eki nikyo Kristo yaferiire kandi yahumbuuka, nukwo asobole kuba MUKAMA wa boona: aboomiire n'abafiire.
45014010	Habwaki ocwera mugenzi waawe omusango? Rundi habwaki ogaya mugenzi waawe? Ningira itwena tulyemerra omumaiso g'ekitebe kya Ruhanga ekicwerwaho emisango;
45014011	nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Mukama agamba ati: Ninyowe Atahwaho, kandi buli muntu alinteereza amaju, orulimi rwa buli omu rulihaisaniza Ruhanga.”
45014012	Habweki, buli omu omuli itwe alyetonganirra hali Ruhanga.
45014013	Habweki, tutongera kucwerangana emisango, baitu tucwemu kutagaruka kuleetera mugenzi waitu ekyesiitazo rundi ekindi kyona ekirukwekiika omu muhanda gwe.
45014014	Mmanyire kandi ningumiza kimu omu MUKAMA Yesu nkooku hataroho kintu na kimu eky'omuziro habwakyo; baitu kiba ky'omuziro hali ogu anyakuteekereza ngu, ky'omuziro.
45014015	Iwe eki orukulya, obu kiraaba nikikora kubi mugenzi waawe, obu muba mutakyagonzangana. Otaikiriza eki orukulya kuhwerekereza ogu Kristo ou yaferiire.
45014016	Nahabweki, iwe eki orukweta kirungi otakireetereza okugambwaho kubi.
45014017	Habwokuba obukama bwa Ruhanga tibiri byokulya rundi byokunywa, baitu nukwo okuhikirra, okuteekaana, n'okusemererwa oku tuheebwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
45014018	Ogu anyakuheereza ati Kristo, nuwe asemeza Ruhanga kandi asiimwa abantu.
45014019	Hati nu, ka twekambire ebireeta obusinge n'ebirukwombeka ekitebe ky'abaikiriza.
45014020	Muleke kusiisa omulimo gwa Ruhanga habw'ebyokulya. Mazimakwo ebintu byona birungi, baitu ekibi nukwo omuntu okusiitaza abandi habw'eki arukulya.
45014021	Haakire okutalya nyama, rundi okutanywa marwa, rundi okutakora kintu kyona ekirukwesiitaza mugenzi waawe.
45014022	Okwikiriza oku oinakwo, oikale nakwo nikumanywa iwe na Ruhanga. W'omugisa ogu atarukwetuntuza obu aba naakora ebi arukuteekereza ngu bihikire.
45014023	Baitu ogu anyakugurukyagurukya, kakuba alya, omusango gwamusinga; habwokuba eki akora takikora habw'okwikiriza; ningira kyona ekitaruga omu kwikiriza kiba kibi.
45015001	Itwe abaina amaani, tusemeriire okugumiisiriza obuceke bw'abataina maani, tutarukuserra eby'okwesemeza itwenka.
45015002	Leka buli omu omuli itwe aserre ebirukusemeza mutaahi we habw'okumugasira n'okumugumya.
45015003	Habwokuba Kristo ataserre ebirukumusemeza wenka; baitu nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ebijumo by'abo abaakujumire, bikahikaho nyowe.”
45015004	Byona ebyahandiikirwe ira, bikahandiikwa kutwegesa, nukwo tutunge okunihira habw'okugumibwa n'okwekambisibwa Ebihandiiko ebi ebirukwera.
45015005	Ruhanga, endugirro y'amaani gaitu kandi anyakutwekambisa, abahe okwikarana mwina omutima gumu, nimusisana Kristo Yesu.
45015006	Nukwo inywena hamu musobole kunyumiza Ruhanga, Ise MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, n'iraka limu.
45015007	Habweki mujwahukirrangane nka Kristo oku yabajwahukiriire, nukwo Ruhanga aheebwe ekitiinisa.
45015008	Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Kristo akafooka muheereza w'abasazirwe, abanze ayoleke amazima ga Ruhanga, naagenderra kugumya ebyaraganiziibwe baisenkuru itwe,
45015009	nukwo hanyuma asoboze Abanyamahanga kuhaisaniza Ruhanga habw'embabazi ze, nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Habweki ndikuhaisaniza omu Banyamahanga, kandi nzine eby'okukukugiza.”
45015010	Handi kigamba kiti: “Inywe Abanyamahanga mukyanganuke hamu n'abantu be”;
45015011	Kandi kiti: “Muhaisanize Atahwaho Abanyamahanga inywena, n'abantu boona bamuhaisanize.”
45015012	Na Isaaya ayongera ati: “Omwijukuru wa Yese aliija, aliimuka okulema Abanyamahanga; kandi Abanyamahanga nuwe baligiramu obwesige.”
45015013	Ruhanga endugirro y'okunihira kwaitu abaijuze omuhimbo gwona n'obusinge ebireetwa okwikiriza, nukwo habw'obusobozi bwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, okunihira kwanyu kusaagane muno.
45015014	Bagenzi bange, mmanyiire kimu inywena nkooku mwijwire engeso nungi, nimwetegerereza kimu, kandi nimusobora n'okuhaburangana.
45015015	Baitu haroho ebintu ebimu ebi mbahandiikiire n'obumanzi, mbandiize kubaijukya embabazi Ruhanga ezi yangiriire
45015016	nkooku zaanfoire muheereza wa Kristo Yesu hali Abanyamahanga. Kandi obuheereza obu mbakorra, nukwo kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi aga Ruhanga. Abanyamahanga nabo basobole kufooka kyonzira ekirukusiimwa Ruhanga, kimazire kwezibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
45015017	Nahabweki omu Kristo Yesu nyina eki ndukusigikiraho okwenyumiza habw'omulimo gwange ogu nkorra Ruhanga.
45015018	Habwokuba tindikisura okubazaaho ekindi kyona, okwihaho Kristo ebi yakoliire omuli nyowe okuleetera Abanyamahanga okworobera Ruhanga omu bigambo byange n'omu bikorwa byange,
45015019	habw'amaani g'ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano ebyakozirwe, na habw'amaani ga Mwoyo Ahikiriire. Nikyo narangiririire kimu Amakuru Amarungi aga Kristo okuruga Yerusaalemu okuhikira kimu Iliiriko.
45015020	Eki naayendaga muno nukwo kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi, hatali omu biikaro nambere ibara lya Kristo lyagambirweho, ntaliikara kwombeka ha musingi ogw'omuntu ondi,
45015021	baitu kibe nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Balirora ou batakagambirwahoga, kandi balyetegereza ou batakahurrahoga.”
45015022	Eki nikyo kyantangire okwija owanyu buli kasumi.
45015023	Baitu hati nkooku ntakyaina h'okukora omulimo omu bicweka binu, kandi nkooku mmazire emyaka nyingi nyina ekihika kwija kubarora,
45015024	ninihira kubarora obu ndiba nindabaho okugenda Sipaini, nkamara na inywe ebiro bike, nukwo mumboherre omu rugendo rwange.
45015025	Baitu hati ninyija kugenda Yerusaalemu, nintwarra abantu ba Ruhanga eby'okubakoonyera.
45015026	Habwokuba aba Makedoni n'ab'Akaaya bakaikiriza okusorooza ebintu eby'okukoonyera abanaku abali omu baikiriza ba Yerusaalemu.
45015027	Eki bakakikora n'okusemererwa, kandi mazimakwo babainaho ibanja. Abanyamahanga obu baraaba babagaine n'Abayudaaya ha birungi byabo eby'omwoyo, nabo basemeriire kubakoonyera n'ebintu byabo eby'omubiri.
45015028	Obu ndimara eki, mmazire n'okubaha ebyasoroziibwe, ndibarabaho ningenda Sipaini.
45015029	Nimmanya obu ndibahikaho, ndiija nyina emigisa yoona eya Kristo.
45015030	Bagenzi bange, nimbeesengereza habwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, na habw'engonzi za Mwoyo, mwekambe hamu na nyowe munsabire hali Ruhanga,
45015031	nukwo ntabuke abataikiriza abali Buyudaaya, kandi ebyokukoonyera ebi ndukutwara Yerusaalemu bisiimwe abarukwera.
45015032	Nukwo Ruhanga obu alisiima, nsobole kwija owanyu n'omuhimbo, kandi ngarukwemu amaani obu ndiba ndi na inywe.
45015033	Ruhanga, endugirro y'obusinge, aikale na inywe inywena. Amiina.
45016001	Munyaanya-itwe Foibe, omuheerezakati ow'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza ba Kenkereya ngugwo, niimubakwasa.
45016002	Mumutangirre omu Mukama nkooku kisemeriire abantu ba Ruhanga. Mumukoonyere omu byona ebi arukubeetaagaho, habwokuba abaire mukoonyezi w'abaingi kandi na nyowe nyenka akankoonyera.
45016003	Mundamukize Pirisika n'Akwila, abakozi bagenzi bange omu kuheereza Kristo Yesu,
45016004	abaayehaireyo okutemwaho ebikya habw'okujuna obwomeezi bwange. Abantu abo tali nyowe nyenka arukubasiima, baitu nibasiimwa ebitebe byona eby'abaikiriza eby'omu Banyamahanga.
45016005	Mundamukize n'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza abeesorooleza omunju yabo. Mundamukize munywani wange Epaineto, ayabandize kuhindukira Kristo omu Asiya.
45016006	Mundamukize Mariya ayabatalibaniire muno.
45016007	Mundamukize Anderoniko na Yuniya ab'oruganda rwange kandi abanyankomo aba nkaba nkwasirwe nabo; bantu barangwa ibara omu bakwenda kandi nubo bambandize kwikiriza Kristo.
45016008	Mundamukize Ampulyato, munywani wange omu MUKAMA.
45016009	Mundamukize Urubano, omukozi mugenzi waitu omu kuheereza Kristo, hamu na Sitaaki munywani wange.
45016010	Mundamukize Apele arukusiimwa habw'okuheereza Kristo n'obwesige. Mundamukize ab'omu ka y'Arisitobulo.
