45016011	Mundamukize na Herodiyoni ow'oruganda rwange. Mundamukize abantu ba MUKAMA abanyakuli omunju ya Narikiiso.
45016012	Mundamukize abakozi ba MUKAMA: Tirifeena na Tirifoosa. Mundamukize enganjani yange Paasa ayakoliire MUKAMA n'amaani.
45016013	Mundamukize Ruufo enganzi ya Mukama, mundamukize na nyina ayanfookiire mau.
45016014	Mundamukize Asinkurito, Fulegooni, Herume, Patiroba, Heruma, n'ab'oruganda abanyakuli hamu nabo.
45016015	Mundamukize Filoologo, Yuliya, Nerehu na munyaanya, kandi na Olimpa n'abantu ba Ruhanga boona abali hamu nabo.
45016016	Maramukyangane n'omwoyo omurungi nimugwangana omu kifuba. Ebitebe byona eby'abaikiriza Kristo nibabaramukya.
45016017	Bagenzi bange nimbeesengereza, mwerinde abo abarukwimukiriza empaka n'obulemeezi ebirukuhakaniza enyegesa ezi mwayegesiibwe; mubeetantale.
45016018	Habwokuba abantu abarukusisa bati, tibaheereza MUKAMA waitu Kristo, baitu baheereza enda zaabo; kandi babiihabiiha emitima y'abantu abataina magezi n'ebigambo byabo ebirungi kandi eby'akasiigo.
45016019	Obuhulizi bwanyu burangaanwa hoona, nikyo ndukwesiimira habwanyu. Ninyenda mube b'amagezi ha birungi kandi abatarukumanya bibi.
45016020	Nubwo Ruhanga, endugirro y'obusinge, alyanguha kusasangurra Sitaani hansi y'ebigere byanyu. Omugisa gwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo gube na inywe.
45016021	Timoteo, omukozi mugenzi wange, nabaramukya. Lukiyo, Yasooni, na Sosiipateri ow'oruganda rwange nabo nibabaramukya.
45016022	Nyowe Teretiyo, kihandiika ebbaruha enu, nimbaramukiza omu MUKAMA.
45016023	Gaayo arukundaaza kandi arukukunira ekitebe kyona eky'abaikiriza, naabaramukya. Erasito omukeeto w'orubuga na mugenzi waitu Kwarito nibabaramukya.
45016024	[Embabazi za MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo zikale na inywe inywena. Amiina.]
45016025	Ekitiinisa kibe hali Ogu arukusobora kubaha amaani ag'okukuraatira Amakuru Amarungi aga ndangirramu Yesu Kristo. Omu Makuru ago nuho hasuukulirwa ensita eyaserekerwe okuruga ira na ira,
45016026	baitu hati eyolekerwe kandi yamanyisibwa amahanga goona omu Bihandiiko by'abarangi, Ruhanga nkooku yaragiire, nukwo amahanga ago gaikirize kandi gahurre.
45016027	Ruhanga ow'amagezi goona, Uwe wenka aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro n'ebiro habwa Yesu Kristo! Amiina.
46001001	Nyowe Paulo, ayayesirwe kuba omukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, Ruhanga nkooku yagondeze, na mugenzi waitu Soositene,
46001002	nituhandiikira inywe ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza ruhanga abali Korinto, inywena abaayezibwe Kristo Yesu, baayetwa kuba bahikiriire, hamu n'abo boona abikiriza MUKAMA Yesu Kristo abe MUKAMA waabo kandi waitu.
46001003	Nitubagondeza embabazi n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
46001004	Obutoosa ninsiima Ruhanga habwanyu, habw'embabazi ze ezi yabagiriire omu Kristo Yesu,
46001005	habwokuba omuli uwe nuho mwaihire byona. Byona ebi mwegesa n'ebi mumanya.
46001006	Byona ebi twabeegeseze hali Kristo bimazire kugumibwa omuli inywe.
46001007	Nahabweki tiharoho kisembo kyona eky'omwoyo eki mutaina, mukyategeriize okugaruka kwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
46001008	Nuwe alibagumya okuhika ha mpero, musangwe mutaina musango ha kiro MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo eki aliiziramu.
46001009	Ruhanga ayabeesire kuteerana n'Omwana we Yesu Kristo MUKAMA waitu, aba mwesigwa.
46001010	Bagenzi bange, nimbeesengereza omu ibara lya MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, inywe mwikirranize, haleke kubaho okwebaganizaamu; baitu muteerane nimugamba kamu kandi nimwikirraniza.
46001011	Habwokuba abantu ab'owa Kilowe bammanyisize nkooku mwina empaka, bagenzi bange.
46001012	Eki ndukwoleka nikyo kinu: buli omu omuli inywe naagamba ati: “Nyowe ndi wa Paulo”, rundi: “Nyowe ndi w'Apolo”, ondi ati: “Nyowe ndi wa Keefa”, n'ondi ati: “Nyowe ndi wa Kristo.”
46001013	Mara Kristo abaganizibwamu? Paulo nuwe yabambirwe ha musaraba habwanyu? Rundi mukabatizibwa omu ibara lya Paulo?
46001014	Ninsiima Ruhanga habwokuba ntabatize n'omu omuli inywe, okwihaho Kirisipo na Gaayo,
46001015	haleke kubaho arukagamba ngu, mukabatizibwa omu ibara lyange.
46001016	(Egokwo, nkabatiza n'eka ya Sitefana. Okwihaho abo, tindukumanya obu haraaba haroho ondi weena ou nabatiize.)
46001017	Habwokuba Kristo atantume kubatiza; baitu akantuma okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi, ntarukubaza ebigambo eby'amagezi g'ensi, omusaraba gwa Kristo guleke kwihwaho obusobozi.
46001018	Isomo ly'omusaraba hali abarukuhwerekerra kiba ky'obudoma; baitu hali itwe abarukujunwa, nugo maani ga Ruhanga.
46001019	Habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Ndihwerekereza amagezi g'ab'amagezi, kandi ndimaraho okwetegereza kw'abarukwetegereza.”
46001020	Ow'amagezi araha? Omwegesa w'ebiragiro araha? Kalimpaka ow'obusinge bunu araha? Amagezi g'ensi Ruhanga atagafoole budoma?
46001021	Okuruga kara, Ruhanga nkooku yategekere, ab'ensi bakalemwa kumumanya habw'amagezi gaabu amaingi; baitu Ruhanga akasiima abaikiriza kubajunisa enyegesa yaitu ey'obudoma.
46001022	Habwokuba Abayudaaya bagonza ebihuniriza, kandi Abagiriiki baserra eby'amagezi,
46001023	baitu itwe twegesa Kristo ayabambirwe ha musaraba, Abayudaaya eki beeta kyesiitazo kandi Abanyamahanga eki beeta obudoma.
46001024	Baitu hali abo abarukwetwa Bayudaaya, noobu baraaba bali Bagiriiki, Kristo nuwe maani ga Ruhanga kandi magezi ge.
46001025	Habwokuba obudoma bwa Ruhanga bukira amagezi g'abantu; kandi n'obuceke bwa Ruhanga bukira amaani g'abantu.
46001026	Nahabweki bagenzi bange, mwijuke okwetwa kwanyu. Bake omuli inywe abakaba nibabarwa omu b'amagezi ab'ensi, noobwakubaire ab'obusobozi, rundi ab'enganda enkuru;
46001027	baitu Ruhanga akakoma abadoma b'ensi nukwo aswaze ab'amagezi. Ruhanga akakoma enceke z'ensi nukwo aswaze ab'amaani.
46001028	Akakoma abatali b'ekitiinisa, abarukugaywa omu nsi, n'abakaba batali b'omugaso, nukwo adibye abakaba bali b'omugaso;
46001029	haleke kubaho omuntu arukwenyumiza omu maiso ga Ruhanga.
46001030	Ruhanga nuwe ndugirro y'obwomeezi bwanyu omu Kristo Yesu ou yafoire magezi gaitu, buhikiriire bwaitu, kwera kwaitu n'okucungurwa kwaitu.
46001031	Nukwo kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ogu arukwenyumiza, leka ayenyumirize omu MUKAMA.”
46002001	Bagenzi bange, obu naizire owanyu, ntaije nimbarangirra ensita za Ruhanga omu bigambo ebi mutasobora kwetegereza.
46002002	Habwokuba nkamalirra kutamanya kindi kyona omuli inywe, kwihaho Yesu Kristo, ogu ayambambirwe ha musaraba.
46002003	Obu nahikire owanyu nkazooka ndi muceke, ninkyatiina, kandi nintukumira.
46002004	Orubazo rwange n'okwegeza kwange bikaba bitali by'amagezi ag'okusoonasoona abantu; baitu byayolekaga amaani ga Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
46002005	Nukwo okwikiriza kwanyu kuleke kusigikira ha magezi g'abantu, baitu kusigikire ha maani ga Ruhanga.
46002006	Inywe abagumire omu kwikiriza, twina amagezi ag'okubacwera, noobu garaaba gatali g'obusinge bunu rundi g'abalemi ab'obusinge bunu abali b'okuhwaho.
46002007	Baitu itwe tumanyisa ensita ya Ruhanga kandi amagezi ge agaserekerwe, niyo ntegeka Ruhanga ei yataireho kutuhaisa ekitiinisa amahanga goona gatakahangirwe.
46002008	Busaho mulemi n'omu ow'obusinge bunu aragyetegeriize. Kakuba baagyetegeriize, tibaakubambire ha musaraba MUKAMA ow'ekitiinisa.
46002009	Baitu kikahandiikwa kiti: “Eriiso ebi litakaroraga, n'okutu ebi kutakahurraga, kandi n'ebitakataahaga omu mutima gw'omuntu, nibyo Ruhanga yateekaniriize abarukumugonza.”
46002010	Ebi, Ruhanga akabitusuukururra omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire, Habwokuba Mwoyo atindura buli kintu kyona noobu ziraaba ziri nsita za Ruhanga.
46002011	Muntu ki arukumanya ebiteekerezo by'ondi, kwihaho omutima gwa mukama wabyo? Nukwo kiti, busaho arukumanya ebiteekerezo bya Ruhanga kwihaho Mwoyo wa Ruhanga.
46002012	Itwe, tutaheebwe mwoyo w'ensi enu, baitu tukaheebwa Mwoyo anyakuruga hali Ruhanga, nukwo twetegereze ebisembo Ruhanga ebi yatugabiire.
46002013	Ebi nibyo tusoborra omu bigambo ebitaruga omu magezi g'abantu, baitu ebi twegesibwa Mwoyo. Abo abaina Mwoyo, tubasoborra amagezi ga Mwoyo.
46002014	Baitu omuntu ataina Mwoyo tatunga bisembo bya mwoyo wa Ruhanga. Abyeeta by'obudoma kandi tasobora kubyetegereza, habwokuba byetegerezibwa abaina mwoyo.
46002015	Anyakwina Mwoyo ayetegereza byona, baitu uwe tayetegerezibwa muntu weena.
46002016	“Nooha aramanyire ebiteekerezo bya MUKAMA, nooha si aramuhanuliire?” Baitu itwe tuteekereza ebiteekerezo bya Kristo.
46003001	Bagenzi bange, nyowe nkaba ntarukusobora kubeegesa nk'abantu abarukulemwa omwoyo, baitu nk'abarukulemwa omubiri, kandi abaana abato omu Kristo.
46003002	Nkabanywisa amata, bitali byokulya ebigumire; habwokuba mukaba mutakahikire kubirya: kandi na hati hoona timukahikire, ningira nimukyalemwa omubiri.
46003003	Obu muraaba mukyaina ihali n'empaka, timukyalemwa omubiri, nimukora nk'abantu kwonka?
46003004	Omu, obu agamba ati: “Nyowe ndi wa Paulo”, n'ondi ati: “Nyowe ndi w'Apolo”, muba mutakyali bantu kwonka?
46003005	Hati Apolo nuw'oha? Na Paulo nuw'oha? Bbo baheereza abaabaleetiire okwikiriza, buli omu MUKAMA nkooku yamuhaire.
46003006	Nyowe nkabyara, Apolo yaitirra amaizi, baitu Ruhanga nuwe akuza.
46003007	Nahabweki arukubyara n'arukwitirira tibali b'omugaso, kwihaho Ruhanga wenka anyakukuza.
46003008	Arukubyara n'arukwitirra nibainganaingana, kandi buli omu alisasurwa naalengerwa ha mulimo ogu yakozire.
46003009	Habwokuba tuli bakozi abarukukorra hamu na Ruhanga; inywe muli musiri gwa Ruhanga. Muli kyombeko kya Ruhanga.
46003010	Na nyowe nk'omwombeki ow'amagezi, habw'ekisembo Ruhanga yampaire, nkataho omusingi, ondi yagwombekaho. Leka buli muntu arukugwombekaho ayegendereze.
46003011	Habwokuba busaho musingi ogundi omuntu ogu asobora kutaho, kwihaho gunu ogwatairweho, nuwe Yesu Kristo.
46003012	Ha musingi ogu kakuba omuntu aimukizaho ekyombeko kya zaabbu, efeeza, amabaale g'omuhendo, emiti, obunyansi, rundi embuba
46003013	omulimo gwa buli omu gulirorwa; habwokuba omurro gw'Ekiro kya ha mpero gulyoleka omulimo gwa buli omu nkooku guli.
46003014	Ekyombeko omuntu eki yayombekere ha musingi obu kitaligwa, uwe alitunga empeera.
46003015	Baitu mukama w'ekyombeko ekirihya, alifeerwa; noobu alijunwa, baitu aliba nk'anyakurabire omu murro.
46003016	Timurukumanya nkooku muli Nju ya Ruhanga kandi Mwoyo wa Ruhanga nkooku aikara omuli inywe?
46003017	Weena anyakuhwerekereza Enju ya Ruhanga, nawe Ruhanga alimuhwerekereza; habwokuba Enju ye neeyera, kandi Enju egi ninywe.
46003018	Haleke kubabo weena arukwebiiha, obu haraaba haroho omuli inywe arukweyeta ow'amagezi omu businge bunu, leka afooke mudoma, nukwo hanyuma abe w'amagezi.
46003019	Habwokuba amagezi g'ensi enu, Ruhanga ageeta budoma. Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti:
46003020	“MUKAMA naamanya ebiteekerezo by'abanyamagezi nkooku bitarumu mugaso.”
46003021	Nahabweki haleke kubaho omuntu arukwenyumiriza omu bikorwa by'abantu. Habwokuba ebintu byona byanyu,
46003022	noobu araaba ali Paulo, rundi Apolo, rundi Keefa, rundi ensi yoona, rundi obwomeezi, rundi okufa, rundi ebiroho, rundi ebiriija, byona byanyu;
46003023	na inywe muli ba Kristo: kandi Kristo wa Ruhanga.
46004001	Inywe musemiriire kutumanya nkooku tuli baheereza ba Kristo kandi bakeeto b'ensita za Ruahanga.
46004002	Kandi ekikuru hali abakeeto nukwo okuba beesigwa.
46004003	Inywe kuncwera omusango rundi kugucwerwa Enkurato z'abantu, tinkifaaho muno. Na nyowe nyenka tinyecwera musango.
46004004	Timmanyire kintu eki ndukujunaanwa, baitu eki tikiri nikyo ekirukunyihaho musango. MUKAMA nuwe ancwera omusango.
46004005	Nahabweki mutalicwa emisango obwire butakahikire, MUKAMA atakagarukire, nuwe alimulika ebintu ebiserekerwe omu mwirima hati, kandi alyata ensita z'omutima. Obu nubwo Ruhanga alisiima buli muntu nkooku kimusemeriire.
46004006	Bagenzi bange, binu byona mbyebalizeeho kandi mbibalizeeho Apolo nukwo bibagasire. Na inywe mutwegereho mutarukuhingura ha Byahandiikirwe, haleke kubaho omuli inywe arukwenyumiza ngu, naagonza omukwenda omu kandi naagaya ondi.
46004007	Kiki eki orukukiza abandi? Kandi kiki eki oina eki otarahairwe? Obu oraaba wakihairwe, nooyenyumiriza ki nk'atarakihairwe?
46004008	Inywe timwina ekirukubabura! Mutungire byona ebi murukwenda! Mufookere balemi tutabakonyiire! Kakuba mwalemerekwo, twakusemiriirwe, na itwe twakulemere na inywe.
46004009	Baitu ningira ngu, itwe abakwenda Ruhanga akatuta enyuma y'abandi boona, nk'abantu abaacweriirwe omusango ogw'okufa, habwokuba tufookere eky'okusungwa ensi yoona, nitusungwa abamalaika n'abantu.
46004010	Itwe tuli basema habwa Kristo, baitu inywe muli b'amagezi omu Kristo. Itwe tuli baceke, baitu inywe muli b'amaani. Inywe nimuheebwa ekitiinisa, baitu itwe nitugaywa.
46004011	Okuhika na hati niturumwa enjara kandi twina iroho, tujwaire obutengo, nituterwa entomi, kandi titwina bwikaro,
46004012	nitutalibana, nitwekorra itwenka n'emikono yaitu. Obu batujuma, itwe tubasabira omugisa; obu batuhiiganiza, itwe tugumiisiriza;
46004013	obu batuhangirra, itwe tubagarukamu n'obuculeezi; n'okuhika hati tufookere ekinugwa omunsi kandi ekitagasa omu byona.
46004014	Binu byona timbihandiikire kubaswaza, baitu nimbahabura nk'abaana bange abagonzibwa.
46004015	Noobu muraaba mwina abarukubahabura baingi omu Kristo, baitu timwina baisiinywe baingi. Habwokuba ninyowe nafookere isiinywe omu Kristo Yesu habw'okubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi.
46004016	Nahabweki nimbeesengereza, mukwate engeso zange.
46004017	Nikyo nabatumiireho Timoteo, omwana wange omugonzibwa kandi omwesigwa omu MUKAMA, abaijukye emikorre yange omu Kristo, nkooku ndukugyegesa hoona omu bitebe by'abaikiriza.
46004018	Abamu nibeehemba nibagira ngu, owanyu tindukwijayo.
46004019	Baitu owanyu ndiijayo bwango, MUKAMA obu aliba agondeze; obu nubwo ndimanya abarukwehemba ebi barukukora, hatali ebi barukugamba bugamba.
46004020	Habwokuba obukama bwa Ruhanga tibuba omu bigambo bugambo, baitu buba omu bikorwa.
46004021	Nimwenda ki? Nyije n'omwigo, rundi nyije n'omutima gw'engonzi n'obuculeezi?
46005001	Nikigambwa ngu, mwina orwanju, kandi orwanju orw'omulingo ogutarukusangwa n'omu bakafiiri; habwokuba omusaija naateerana na muka-ise.
46005002	Kandi inywe nimwenyumiza! Timusemeriire kuganya? Omuntu ayakozire eki, asendwe.
46005003	Noobu ndaaba ntali na inywe oku, baitu tuli hamu omu mwoyo. Kandi na inywe, omuntu ayakozire ekibi eki, mmazire ira kumucwera omusango omu ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu.
46005004	Obu murabaga musorrokaine, ndaabaga na inywe mu mwoyo, nyina amaani ga MUKAMA waitu Yesu.
46005005	Omuntu ogu mumuheyo hali Sitaani, omubiri gwe guhwerekerre, nukwo omwoyo gwe gujunwe ha kiro kya MUKAMA Yesu.
46005006	Nimwenyumiririza busa. Timurukumanya ekitumbisa ekike nkooku kitumbisa ihyanga lyona?
46005007	Mwihemu ekitumbisa eky'obubi, nukwo mube mugaati omuhyaka ogutarumu kitumbisa ekya ira. Habwokuba Kristo, Omwana gw'Entaama ogw'Okuhingurwaho kwaitu, akatambwa.
46005008	Nahabweki katusemeze ekiro kikuru eky'obugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho, tutaina kitumbisa ekya ira, noobu kyakuba ekitumbisa eky'itima n'obubi, baitu twina omugaati ogutatumbisiibwe, ogutarumu kamogo kandi gw'amananu.
46005009	Omu bbaruha yange nkabahandiikira nimbatanga kwikara n'abasiihani;
46005010	baitu ntagambe kwahukanira kimu n'abasiihani ab'omunsi munu abataikiriza, rundi ab'omukoijo, rundi abasuma, rundi abarukuramya abacwezi. Obu kyakubaire kiri kiti, mwakurugire omunsi munu.
46005011	Baitu eki nabahandiikiire nukwo kubatanga okwikara n'omuntu omwikiriza obu araaba ali musiihani, rundi w'omukoijo, rundi arukuramya embandwa, rundi omujumi, rundi omutamiizi, rundi omusuma-omuntu nk'ogu n'okulya mutalirya nawe.
46005012	Nyowe ninfaayo ki okucwera omusango abatali omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza? Abanyakuli omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza tinubo musemeriire kucwera omusango?
46005013	Ruhanga nuwe acwera omusango abatali omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza. Kikahandiikwa kiti; “Omuntu omubi mumubinge, abarugemu.”
46006001	Omuntu omu omuli inywe obu araaba aina eki arukujunaana mugenzi we, tikimukwasa nsoni kumunyegerra omu maiso g'abacwi b'emisango ab'ensi, kukira kumunyegerra omumaiso g'abarukwikiriza?
46006002	Timurukumanya abantu ba Ruhanga nkooku nubo balicwera ensi omusango? Kandi inywe obu muraaba muli b'okucwera ensi omusango, muraalemwa muta kucwa emisango enke nk'egi?
46006003	Timurukumanya nkooku tulicwera bamalaika omusango? Kandi emisango ey'ensi enu timwakugicwire kukiraho?
46006004	Obu muraaba mwina emisango nk'egi, habwaki mugitwarra abantu abakira kugaywa ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, nubo bagicwe?
46006005	Kinu ninkigamba kubakwasa ensoni. Kisoboka kita omuli inywe kuburamu muntu ow'amagezi arukusobora kuramura bagenzi be?
46006006	Baitu abaiseemu nibanyegerrangana, kandi nibanyegerrangana ha batali baikiriza.
46006007	Kunyegerrangana omu nkurato ez'ensi nikyoleka nkooku mulemerwe. Habwaki mutagumiisiriza kukorwa kubi? Habwaki mutaikiriza kugobezibwa?
46006008	Baitu inywe inywenka mukora kubi kandi mugobeza noobu baakuba bagenzi banyu.
46006009	Timurukumanya abagobya nkooku bataligwetwa omu bukama bwa Ruhanga? Muleke kubiihwabiihwa. Abanjuki, abaramya embandwa, abasiihani, abakuuhya,
46006010	abasuma, ab'omukoijo, abatamiizi, abajumi, rundi abanyagi tibaligwetwa omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
46006011	Abamu omuli inywe nukwo mukaba muli muti. Baitu mukoogebwa, mwayezibwa, mwaihwaho omusango omu ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu Kristo n'omu Mwoyo wa Ruhanga waitu.
46006012	Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Ebintu byona ninyikirizibwa kubikora”, baitu tibiri byona ebirukugasa. “Ebintu byona ninyikirizibwa kubikora”, baitu tinyina na kimu eki ndukwemarraho.
46006013	“Ebyokulya bikategekerwa enda, kandi enda yategekerwa ebyokulya” baitu byombi: enda n'ebyokulya, Ruhanga alibihwerekereza. Omubiri gutahangirwe obusiihani, baitu gukahangirwa MUKAMA, kandi MUKAMA waitu nuwe MUKAMA w'omubiri.
46006014	Ruhanga ayahumbwire MUKAMA waitu, na itwe alituhumbuura n'obusobozi bwe.
46006015	Timurukumanya emibiri yanyu nkooku eba bicweka by'omubiri gwa Kristo? Hati ebicweka by'omubiri gwa Kristo ndabifoora nta bicweka by'omubiri gwa malaaya? Nikikafuuhe!
46006016	Timurukumanya ngu, omusaija anyakuteerana n'omukazi malaaya, bombi baba mubiri gumu? Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ababiri abo bafooke mubiri gumu.”
46006017	Kandi anyakuteerana na MUKAMA aba mwoyo gumu nawe.
46006018	Mwetantale obusiihani. Ebibi ebindi byona omuntu ebi akora tibisiisa mubiri gwe; baitu anyakusiihana asiisa omubiri gwe gwonyini.
46006019	Timurukumanya omubiri gwanyu nkooku guli Nju ya Mwoyo Ahikiriire anyakuli omuli inywe, Ruhanga ou yabahaire? Timuroho habwanyu inywenka;
46006020	mukagurwa omuhendo mukooto. Nahabweki muhe Ruhanga ekitiinisa omu mibiri yanyu.
46007001	Okugarukamu ebi mwampandikiire: kirungi omusaija kutakwatakwata mukazi.
46007002	Baitu habw'okwerinda ekyohyo ky'obusiihani buli musaija abe na mukazi we, kandi na buli mukazi abe namusaija we.
46007003	Omusaija asemeriire kuteerana na mukazi we, n'omukazi nukwo akole ati iba.
46007004	Habwokuba omukazi talema mubiri gwe wenka, baitu gulemwa iba. Omusaija nawe talema mubiri gwe wenka, baitu gulemwa mukazi we.
46007005	Muleke kwimangana, rundi buli mwikirraniize habw'akasumi, nukwo mwemarre ha kubaza na Ruhanga; baitu hanyuma mugaruke muteerane, Sitaani taikara kuboohya habw'obuceke bwanyu.
46007006	Kinu nkigambire nimbahabura, tikiri kiragiro.
46007007	Naakugondeze boona baikale nkooku ndi; baitu buli omu aina ekisembo Ruhanga eki yamuhaire, omu ky'omulingo gumu n'ondi ky'omulingo gundi.
46007008	Abataswire n'abataswirwe, hamu n'abafaakati nimbagambira nti: Kyakubaire kirungi baikale nka nyowe oku ndi.
46007009	Baitu obu baraaba batarukosobora kwerinda, baswere rundi baswerwe. Kirungi kuswera rundi kuswerwa okukira kutuntuzibwa okwegomba kw'omubiri.
46007010	Abaswire n'abaswirwe nimbaragira, tali nyowe baitu nimuragirwa MUKAMA: omukazi aleke kwahukana na iba
46007011	(baitu obu araaba ayahukaine nawe, aikale ataswirwe; kitali eki agarukanganemu na iba) kandi omusaija atalibinga mukazi we.
46007012	Abandi, ebi ndukubagambira byange, tibiri bya MUKAMA: Omukristo weena obu aba aina omukazi atarukwikiriza Ruhanga, omukazi ogu akacwamu kwikara nawe, aleke kumubinga.
46007013	Kandi omukazi weena obu aba aina iba atarukwikiriza Ruhanga, iba akacwamu kwikara nawe, omukazi ogu atalyahukana na iba.
46007014	Habwokuba omusaija atarukwikiriza Ruhanga ayezibwa habwa mukazi we, kandi omukazi atarukwikiriza Ruhanga ayezibwa habwa iba. Kakuba kitarabaire kiti, abaana banyu tibakweziibwe; baitu hati beezibwe.
46007015	Omu ha babiri atarukwikiriza Ruhanga, obu araaba naagonza kwahukana, leka ayahukane. Omu kintu nk'eki, omusaija omukristo rundi omukazi omukristo baba batakyabohwa; habwokuba Ruhanga akatweta twikale omu businge.
46007016	Mukazi iwe noomanya ota nkooku otalijuna baro? Na iwe musaija, noomanya ota nkooku otalijuna mukazi wawe?
46007017	Leka buli muntu aikale omu mulingo MUKAMA ogu yamuteekaniriize, kandi Ruhanga ogu yamwetiiremu. Nukwo nyegesa nti ebitebe byona eby'abaikiriza Ruhanga.
46007018	Haroho omuntu ayayesirwe amazire kusarwa? Aleke kwesisaniza nk'atarasazirwe. Haroho omuntu ayayesirwe atakasazirwe? Aleke kwegomba kusarwa.
46007019	Okusarwa n'okutasarwa tikwina mugaso, baitu ekikuru nukwo kukwata ebiragiro bya Ruhanga.
46007020	Buli muntu aikale omu mulingo ogu yayetiirwemu.
46007021	Okaba oli mwiru obu wayesirwe? Tikiri kigambo. Baitu obu oraaba noosobora kutunga obugabe, haakire obutunge. Habwokuba MUKAMA ou yayesire ali mwiru, nuwe MUKAMA aha obugabe.
46007022	Nikyo kimu, n'ogu ou yayesire ali w'obugabe, afooka mwiru wa Kristo.
46007023	Mukagurwa omuhendo mukooto; muleke kuba bairu b'abantu.
46007024	Nahabweki bagenzi bange, leka buli muntu aikale omumaiso ga Ruhanga omu mulingo ogu yayetiirwemu.
46007025	Ebirukukwata ha bataswire n'abataswirwe, tinyina kiragiro kya MUKAMA. Baitu nimbahabura nk'omuntu ou musemeriire kwesiga habw'embabazi MUKAMA yangiriire.
46007026	Obu ndukurora obulemeezi obuli omumaiso, ninteekereza: kirungi omuntu aikale nkooku ali.
46007027	Okateeranizibwa n'omukazi? Leka kwahukana nawe. Tokaswire mukazi? Leka kuswera.
46007028	Baitu kakuba oswera nooba otakozire kibi. Kandi omwisiki kakuba aswerwa, nawe aba atakozire kibi. Baitu abarukuswerangana balibona obulemeezi omunsi munu; eki naakugondeze kukibajuna.
46007029	Bagenzi bange, eki ndukubagambira nkinu: akasumi akaatairweho kaagenda nikairra haihi. Okuruga hati abaina abakazi baikale nk'abatainabo;
46007030	n'abo abarukuganya baikale nk'abatarukuganya; n'abarukusemererwa baikale nk'abatarukusemererwa; n'abarukusuubura baikale nk'abataina by'okusuubura;
46007031	kandi abarukukozesa ebintu by'ensi, baleke kubimarraho omutima. Habwokuba omulingo gw'ensi nkooku eri nigwija kuhwaho.
46007032	Tindukwenda mwikale nimutuntura. Ataina mukazi ata omutima ha bya MUKAMA, kukora ebi araasiima;
46007033	baitu omusaija aina omukazi ata omutima ha by'ensi, kukora ebiraasiimwa mukazi we,
46007034	nahabweki omutima gwe guli hanu na hali. Kandi omukazi ataswirwe rundi omwisiki empikirre atunturra ebya MUKAMA nkooku araikara asemiire omu mubiri n'omu mwoyo; baitu omukazi anyakuswirwe atunturra eby'ensi, kukora ebiraasiimwa iba.
46007035	Kinu ninkibagambira habw'okubagasa, tindukugenderra kubaboha, baitu kubooleka ekirukukira oburungi, nukwo muheereze MUKAMA n'omutima gumu.
46007036	Omusaija ataswire arukuhurra nkooku atarukusobora kwerinda omwisiki ou arukukora nawe kandi tarukusobora kulema omubiri gwe, akole ekihikire. Haakire baswerangane, eki tikiri kibi.
46007037	Baitu weena anyakwina omutima ogugumire, ataina ekirukumuhambiriza kuswera, naalema omubiri gwe kandi acwiremu wenka kutamuswera, naaba akozire kurungi.
46007038	Nahabweki obu aswera omwisiki ogu akora kurungi, kandi obu atamuswera aba akizireho kukora kurungi.
46007039	Omukazi abohwa hali iba, omusaija atakafiire. Iba kakuba afa, omukazi aina obugabe kuswerwa omusaija weena ou agondeze, baitu omu MUKAMA.
46007040	Nyowe nkooku ndukurora, kakuba aikara nkooku ali kyakukizire oburungi. Kandi ninteekereza nti: Na nyowe nyebembirwe Mwoyo wa Ruhanga.
46008001	Ebirukukwata ha byokulya ebihongiirwe embandwa, ebi itwena nitubimanya habwokuba “Twina amagezi”, nkooku murukugamba. Baitu “Amagezi” ago galeeta emyehembo; okugonza nukwo kwombeka.
46008002	Anyakuteekereza ngu, aina eki amanyire, aba atakamanyire nkooku kimusemeriire.
46008003	Baitu anyakugonza Ruhanga, nuwe amanywa Ruhanga.
46008004	Hati nu, ha kulya ebihongiirwe embandwa, nitumanya “embandwa nkooku zitarohokwo”, kandi “Tiharoho Ruhanga ondi, kwihaho omu wenka.”
46008005	Noobu haraaba haroho abarukwetwa baruhanga omwiguru rundi omu nsi mazimakwo haroho bingi ebirukwetwa “baaruhanga” rundi “embandwa”,
46008006	baitu habwaitu haroho Ruhanga omu, Isiitwe, endugirro yaitu kandi ey'ebintu byona, na MUKAMA omu Yesu Kristo nambere ebihangwa byona byarugire, na itwe nambere twiha obwomeezi.
46008007	Baitu amagezi ago, boona tibainago. Abamu, habw'okumanyiira embandwa, nibakyalya ebyokulya ebihongerwe; kandi emitima yabo habw'okusangwa eri miceke eyesiitara.
46008008	Ebyokulya tinibyo bitusiimisa Ruhanga. Okutalya ebyokulya tikitufeereza kantu, kandi okulya tikitwongeraho kantu.
46008009	Kyonka mwerinde, obugabe bwanyu butaliikara kwesiitaza abaceke.
46008010	Kakuba omuntu naakurora, iwe arukwetegereza, oikaliire omu kibbali noolya, kandi asangirwe ali muceke omu mutima gwe, nawe tarukwija kutwalirizibwa okulya ebihongiirwe embandwa?
46008011	Nukwo habw'amagezi gaawe, mugenzi waitu omuceke Kristo ou yafeeriire, ahwerekerra.
46008012	Kusiisa oti bagenzi bawe noosiitaza emitima yabo emiceke, oba okozire ekibi hali Kristo.
46008013	Nahabweki ebyokulya obu biraaba nibireetereza mugenzi wange kugwa, nyowe tindirya nyama ebiro byona, ndeke kunaga mugenzi wange omu kibi.
46009001	Tindi w'obugabe? Tindi mukwenda? Ntarole Yesu Mukama waitu?
46009002	Tali nyowe ayabakulize omu MUKAMA? Ha bandi noobu ndaaba ntali mukwenda, baitu hali inywe ndi mukwenda; habwokuba muli kyokurorraho ky'obukwenda bwange omu MUKAMA.
46009003	Okwetonganirra kwange hali abo abarukunkaguza nukwo kunu:
46009004	Tituli b'okuheebwa ebyokulya n'ebyokunywa?
46009005	Titurukwikirizibwa kugenda n'omukazi munyaanyaitwe omu Yesu nk'abakwenda abandi, n'abagenzi ba MUKAMA na Keefa oku bakora?
46009006	Rundi nyowe na Baranaba niitwe itwenka abaragirwa kwekorra eby'okutukoonyera?
46009007	Nooha akora obuserikale, akeegurra byona ebi arukwetaaga? Nooha abyara orugonjo, atalya ha biruga omu rugonjo oru? Nooha aliisa igana, atanywa ha mata gaalyo?
46009008	Nimugira binu nimbigambisibwa obusobozi bwange? Ebiragiro nabyo tinukwo bigamba biti?
46009009	Kikahandiikwa omu Biragiro bya Musa kiti: “Omuntu arukukugesera, aikirizibwa kutwara ha buro.” Aho nimugira Ruhanga naagamba ha bagesi bonka?
46009010	Tarukukigamba hali itwe itwena? Eki kikahandiikwa habwaitu, habwokuba omulimi alima naanihira kutunga, kandi omugesi agesa naanihira kutwaraho ebi arukugesa.
46009011	Itwe obu turaaba twabasigiremu eby'omwoyo, nikiremeera kubatungamu eby'okukoonyera omubiri?
46009012	Abandi obu baraaba babainaho obusobozi obu, kandi itwe turaasura ki? Noobu turaaba twina obusobozi obu, tutabukozese; baitu tukagumiisiriza byona nukwo tuleke kutanga Amakuru Amarungi aga Kristo.
46009013	Timurukumanya abo abakora omunju ya Ruhanga nkooku balya ha by'omu Nju ya Ruhanga? N'abo abaheereza ha Itambiro nkooku balya ha byonzira ebihongerwe?
46009014	Na MUKAMA waitu nukwo yaragiire ati: Abo abarangirra Amakuru Amarungi, baliisibwege ha by'Amakuru Amarungi.
46009015	Baitu nyowe tinkakozesaaga busobozi obu, kandi binu timbihandiikire nukwo mubinkorre. Haakire nfe, hatabaireho muntu anyihaho kinu eki ndukwenyumirizaamu.
46009016	Obu ndaaba nindangirra Amakuru Amarungi, eki tikirukundeetera kwenyumiza. Habwokuba ogu nugwo mulimo gwange mali. Ninkanyagwe kakuba ntarangirra Amakuru Amarungi!
46009017	Kakuba ngarangirra nkyegondiize nyenka, empeera yange nimba ngitungire; kakuba ngarangirra nk'ayatumirwe, buli mba ninkora omulimo ogu nakwasiibwe.
46009018	Obu, empeera yange neeha? Niyo enu: Nukwo kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi ntarukuheebwa kantu kandi ntarukukozesa busobozi obu nahairwe Makuru Amarungi.
46009019	Noobu ndaaba ntarukulemwa muntu weena, nkeefoora mwiru wa boona, nukwo mpindule baingi kukiraho.
46009020	Omu Bayudaaya nkeefoora nk'Omuyudaaya nukwo mpindule Abayudaaya. Hali abarukulemwa Ebiragiro bya Musa nkeefoora nk'arukulemwa Ebiragiro-kandi kunu tibirukundema-nukwo mpindule abarukulemwa Ebiragiro.
46009021	Hali abo abatarukulemwa Biragiro, nkaba ndi nk'atarukulemwa Biragiro-tikuli kugamba ngu, tindemwa Biragiro bya Ruhanga, baitu ndemwa ebiragiro bya Kristo nukwo mpindule abatarukulemwa Biragiro.
46009022	Omu baceke nkeefoora muceke, nukwo mpindule abaceke. Nkeesisaniza abantu boona omu bintu byona, nukwo nsobole kujuna abamu omuli bo.
46009023	Ebi byona mbikora habw'Amakuru Amarungi, nukwo na nyowe mbaganeho emigisa yago.
46009024	Timurukumanya omu mpaka z'okwiruka kaliitango, abairuki boona nkooku bairuka kwo; baitu anyakutunga ekisembo aba omu? Nahabweki mwiruke, nukwo mukitunge.
46009025	Buli muzaani ayemanyiiza kwetanga omu bintu byona. Eki, bakikora habw'okutunga ekondo erukuhwaho, baitu itwe tutunga ekondo etarukuhwaho.
46009026	Na nyowe tinyiruka ntaina eki ndukugenderra, kandi tinteera ntomi nk'arukuteera amasa;
46009027	baitu nsaalize omubiri gwange, kandi ngulema, nukwo obu ndimara kurangirra abandi, ntaliija kubarwa nk'atahikire.
46010001	Bagenzi bange ningonza mwijuke baisenkuruitwe nkooku baayebemberwaga Ekicu omwirungu, kandi boona nkooku baarabire omu Nyanja,
46010002	kandi boona nkooku baabatiriziibwe omu kicu eki n'omu Nyanja bakwataniize na Musa.
46010003	Kandi bakalya ekyokulya ky'embaganiza
46010004	boona bakanywa n'amaizi ag'embaganiza. Bbo baanywaga ha mwandara ogu ogwagendaga nabo, kandi Omwandara ogu akaba ali Kristo.
46010005	Noobu kiraaba kyabaire kiti, baitu baingi omuli bo batasiimwe Ruhanga kandi bakahwerekerezibwa omwirungu.
46010006	Hati ebi byona by'okutuhabura, tuleke kwegomba ebibi abaisenkuru itwe nkooku baakozire.
46010007	Muleke kuramya embandwa nk'abamu omuli bo oku baakozire. Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Abantu bakaikarra kulya n'okunywa, kandi baimuka kucekeca.”
46010008	tuleke kweha obusiihani nk'abamu omuli bo oku baakozire, haafa abantu emitwaro ebiri n'enkumi isatu kiro kimu.
46010009	Tuleke kujwahya MUKAMA nk'abamu omuli bo oku baakozire, baahwerekerizibwa enjoka;
46010010	kandi tuleke kuhyema nk'abamu omuli bo oku baakozire baamarwaho Omuhwerekereza.
46010011	Hati ebi byona bikabaho nk'ekyokurorraho, kandi byahandiikwa kwegesa itwe abaroho biro binu ebya ha mpero.
46010012	Nahabweki arukuteekereza nkooku ayemeriire, ayerinde atagwa.
46010013	Busaho kyohyo ekirabaiziire ekitahikaho abantu boona. Ruhanga mwesigwa, taliikiriza ebyohyo ebibahinguraine kubahikaho, baitu omu kwohebwa nk'oku alibaha amagezi ag'okisingura nukwo musobole okugumiisiriza.
46010014	Bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, mwetantale kuramya embandwa.
46010015	Nimbahabura nk'abantu abarukwetegereza. Inywe mwecweremu inywenka amazima g'eki ndukugamba.
46010016	Ekikopo eki tusabira omugisa, tinukwo okubagana ha sagama ya Kristo? Omugaati ogu tucwamu, tinukwo okubagana ha mubiri gwa Kristo?
46010017	Omugaati nkooku guli gumu, na itwe abaingi tuba mubiri gumu, habwokuba itwena tubagana ha mugaati gumu.
46010018	Mwetegereze emirwa y'Abaisirairi: abalya ebyonzira ebihongerwe, tinubo abaina obukwatane na Ruhanga anyakuramibwa?
46010019	Obu, nimba ningamba ki? Nimugira ngamba nti: Ebihongiirwe embandwa nakyo kintu kiri aho? Rundi nti: Embandwa erohokwo?
46010020	Nangwa, eki ndukugamba nikyo kinu: Abakafiiri ebi bahonga, babihongera embandwa, tibabihongera Ruhanga. Tindukugonza inywe mweteerane n'embandwa.
46010021	Timusobora kunywa ha kikopo kya MUKAMA, kandi na ha nkooba y'embandwa. timusobora kulya ha kiihuro kya MUKAMA kandi na ha buro bw'embandwa.
46010022	Obu, MUKAMA titurukumwendereza? Niitwe turukumukiza amaani?
46010023	“Ebintu byona nibiikirizibwa”, baitu tibiri byona by'omugaso. “Ebintu byona nibiikirizibwa”, baitu tibiri byona birukugumya ekitebe.
46010024	Buli muntu aleke kweserurra ebye, baitu aserre n'ebirukugasira mutaahi we.
46010025	Kyona ekitundwa omu katale k'enyama mukirye n'omutima gumu, mutarukugurukyagurukya.
46010026	Habwokuba: “ensi n'ebigirumu byona bya MUKAMA”.
46010027	Kakuba omu ha baikiriza Ruhanga abaraaliza ha bugenyi, mukaikiriza kugendayo, mulye kyona eki babasemberiize mutarukugurukyagurukya.
46010028	(Baitu omuntu kakuba naabamanyisa ati: “Ekintu kinu kihongerwe”, muleke kukirya, tihali habwanyu baitu habw'ogu abamanyisize.
46010029	Eki tindukukigamba habw'oburungi bw'emitima yanyu, baitu habw'oburungi bw'omutima gw'ogu.) Mara habwaki nyigamira ebiteekerezo by'omuntu ondi?
46010030	Obu ndaaba nindya ninsiima Ruhanga, nimpyemererwa ki habw'ekindukulya mmazire kusiima?
46010031	Nukwo nu, obu muraabaga nimulya rundi ninumywa rundi nimukora ebintu ebindi byona, mubikolege habw'okuhaisa Ruhanga ekitiinisa.
46010032	Mutalibiihiza Abayudaaya, rundi Abagiriiki, rundi ebitebe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga.
46010033	Mukole nka nyowe oku ndengaho kukyanganura abantu boona omu buli kintu eki nkora, ntarukuserra eby'okungasira nyenka, baitu eby'okugasira abaingi nukwo bajunwe.
46011001	Munkuraatire nka nyowe oku nkuraatira Kristo.
46011002	Nimbasiima habwokuba nimunyijuka omu buli kintu kyona, kandi nimukwata ebigambo byange nkooku nabibeegeseze.
46011003	Baitu ninyenda mwetegereze Kristo nkooku ali mutwe gwa buli muntu weena. Omutwe gw'omukazi nuwe iba, kandi omutwe gwa Kristo nuwe Ruhanga.
46011004	Omusaija weena arukusaba rundi arukuranga ebya Ruhanga aswekeriire omutwe gwe, ahemura Kristo.
46011005	Kandi omukazi arukusaba rundi arukuranga ataswekeriire omutwe gwe, nawe ahemura iba-nk'omukazi anyakuramya amwire omutwe gwe, nawe ahemura iba-nk'omukazi anyakuramya amwire omutwe gwe.
46011006	Kakuba omukazi ayanga kweswekerra, haakire asale isoke rye; baitu okusara isoke rundi kulimwa obu kiraaba nikimuhemura, kirungi ayeswekerre.
46011007	Omusaija, uwe tasemeriire kuswekerra omutwe gwe, habwokuba nuwe kisisani kandi kitiinisa kya Ruhanga; baitu omukazi aba kitiinisa kya iba.
46011008	(Habwokuba omusaija Ruhanga atamwihe omu mukazi, baitu omukazi nuwe yaihirwe omu musaija.
46011009	Kandi omusaija atahangirwe mukazi, baitu omukazi nuwe yahangiirwe omusaija.)
46011010	Nahabweki omukazi asemeriire kuswekerra omutwe gwe, habw'abamalaika abaroho.
46011011	(Baitu omu ntegeka ya MUKAMA waitu, omukazi taikaraho hataroho musaija; omusaija nawe taikaraho hataroho mukazi.
46011012	Omukazi nkooku yaihirwe omu musaija, omusaija nawe hati azaarwa omukazi; kandi bombi baruga hali Ruhanga.)
46011013	Na inywe mwecweremu inywenka, nikihika omukazi kusaba Ruhanga ateeswekeriire omutwe?
46011014	Obuhangwa bwonka tiburukwoleka okukuza muno isoke nkooku kihemura omusaija?
46011015	Baitu omukazi kulikuza kiba kitiinisa kye. Habwokuba akaheebwa isoke limuswekerre.
46011016	Obu haraaba haroho omuntu arukwenda kuteera empaka, itwe titwina kindi eki tumanyire, noobu haakuba omu bitebe ebindi by'abaikiriza Ruhanga.
46011017	Hali binu ebi ndukubahabura, tindukubasiima, habwokuba okwesorooza kwanyu tikurugwamu oburungi baitu kurugwamu obubi.
46011018	Eky'okubanza, obu musorrokana nk'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga, mpurra nkooku mwebaganizaamu. Eki na nyowe obundi nkiikiriza.
46011019	Ego okwebaganizaamu kusemeriire kubeho omuli inywe, nukwo ab'a mazima bamanywe.
46011020	Obu mwesorooza, ekiihuro kya MUKAMA tinikyo muba nimulya.
46011021	Habwokuba obu muba nimulya, buli muntu alya ebyokulya bye atalinzire abandi, kandi omu aba naarumwa enjara, ondi atamiire.
46011022	Mahano! Timugira maju ag'okuliiramu n'ag'okunyweramu? Rundi nimugaya ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, nimuswaza muti abataina kantu? Mbagambe ki? Mbasiime? Nangwa, tindukubasiima.
46011023	Habwokuba ebi nahairwe MUKAMA, na nyowe nibyo nabeegeseze nti: MUKAMA Yesu ha kiro eki yagoberiziibweho, akakwata omugaati,
46011024	obu yamazire kusiima, yagucwamu naagamba ati: “Gunu nugwo mubiri gwange oguraaheebwayo habwanyu. Kinu mukikolege okunyijuka.”
46011025	Omu mulingo nugwo gumu obu baamazire kulya, yakwata ekikopo nagamba ati: “Ekikopo kinu nikyo kiragaano ekihyaka eky'esagama yange. Kinu mukikolege, obu muraakanywaga, munywege nimunyijuka.”
46011026	Bwona obu muraalyaga omugaati gunu mukanywa ha kikopo kinu, muraamanyisaaga okufa kwa MUKAMA okuhika obu aliija.
46011027	Nahabweki weena araalyaga omugaati gunu, rundi akanywa ha kikopo kya MUKAMA atasemeriire, alisingwa omusango ogw'okusiisa omubiri gwa MUKAMA n'esagama ye.
46011028	Nukwo nu, buli muntu ayerole atakaliire ha mugaati ogu kandi atakanywire ha kikopo eki.
46011029	Habwokuba weena anyakulya kandi akanywa atarukwetegereza mubiri gwa MUKAMA, ayeriira kandi ayenywera wenka omusango.
46011030	Baingi omuli inywe nikyo barukucekera kandi nikyo barukurwarra, kandi abamu bafiire.
46011031	Kakuba twecwera itwenka omusango omu mazima, titwakugucweriirwe MUKAMA.
46011032	Baitu MUKAMA obu atucwera omusango, atufubira; nukwo tuleke kusingwa omusango hamu n'ab'ensi.
46011033	Nahabweki bagenzi bange, obu muraayesoroozaaga kulya, mulindanganege
46011034	omuntu weena obu araabaga naarumwa enjara, alyege omuka ye-okwesorooza kwanyu kutaliikara kurugwamu emisango. Ebindi ndibibamanyisa obu ndiija.
46012001	Bagenzi bange, ninyenda mumanye ebirukukwata ha bisembo ebigabwa mwoyo Ahikiriire.
46012002	Mumanyire ngu, obu mukaba mukyali bakafiiri, mwatwarwaga embandwa ezitagamba, nizo zaabahabisaaga.
46012003	Nahabweki ningonza mumanye nkooku hataroho muntu n'omu aragambisiibwe Mwoyo wa Ruhanga ati: “Yesu akyenwe!” Kandi busaho muntu asobora kugamba ati: “Yesu nuwe MUKAMA”, rundi buli akigambisibwe Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
46012004	Haroho ebisembo eby'emiringo nyingi, baitu Mwoyo Ahikiriire ali omu;
46012005	kandi haroho obuheereza bw'emiringo nyingi, baitu MUKAMA ali omu;
46012006	Kandi haroho emirimo ey'emiringo nyingi, baitu Ruhanga ali omu anyakukozesa ebisembo ebi byona omu boona.
46012007	Kandi buli omu Mwoyo amuha ekisembo eky'okugasira boona.
46012008	Omu, Mwoyo amuha kubaza eby'amagezi; ondi Mwoyo ogu omu, amuha okwetegerezesa abandi.
46012009	Ondi Mwoyo amuha okwikiriza, ondi amuha ekisembo ky'okutamba endwara.
46012010	Ondi Mwoyo amuha okukora ebyamahano, ondi okuranga ebya Ruhanga, ondi amagezi g'okwahurana emyoyo emirungi n'emibi, ondi ekisembo ky'okubaza endimi nyingi nkooku Mwoyo aba amuhaire, kandi ondi kusoborra amakuru g'endimi ezi.
46012011	Ebi byona bikorwa Mwoyo ogu omu, anyakugabira buli muntu nkooku agonza.
46012012	Omubiri nkooku guli gumu, gwina n'ebicweka bingi, kandi ebicweka ebi byona noobu biraaba biri bingi, baitu guba mubiri gumu, na Kristo nawe nukwo ali ati,
46012013	Habwokuba itwena tukabatizibwa mwoyo omu, twafooka mubiri gumu-Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki, abairu n'ab'obugabe-itwena tukanywisibwa ha mwoyo omu.
46012014	Habwokuba omubiri tigugira kicweka kimu, baitu bingi.
46012015	Kakuba ekigere nikigamba kiti: “Nyowe habw'okutaba mukono, habweki tindi kicweka ky'omubiri,” eki tikikitanga kuba kicweka ky'omubiri.
46012016	Kandi okutu kakuba nikugamba kuti: “Nyowe habw'okutaba liiso, habweki tindi kicweka ky'omubiri,” eki tikikutanga kuba kicweka ky'omubiri.
46012017	Kakuba omubiri gwona gwabaire liiso, omuntu yakuhuliriire nkaha? Kakuba omubiri gwona gwabaire kutu, omuntu yakukagiire nkaha?
46012018	Baitu nkooku kiri, Ruhanga akateekaniza ebicweka by'omubiri, buli kimu yakiha ekiikaro kyakyo nkooku yagondeze.
46012019	Ebicweka byona kakuba byabaire kicweka kimu, omubiri gwakurugire nkaha?
46012020	Na hati ebicweka biri bingi, baitu omubiri guli gumu.
46012021	Eriiso tirisobora kugambira omukono liti: “Tindukukwetaaga”; rundi omutwe kugambira ebigere guti: “Tindukubeetaaga”.
46012022	Baitu ebicweka by'omubiri ebizooka nk'ebitaina maani, nibyo bikira kwetaagwa.
46012023	Kandi ebicweka by'omubiri ebibarwa nk'ebitaina kitiinisa, nibyo tukira kuha ekitiinisa. Kandi ebicweka byaitu ebitukwasa ensoni, nibyo tukira kujweka;
46012024	baitu ebicweka byaitu ebikira oburungi, tibyetaaga kujwekwa. Ruhanga, omubiri nukwo yagutegekere ati: Ebicweka ebitaina kitiinisa nibyo aha ekitiinisa okukira ebindi,
46012025	nukwo omu mubiri haleke kubamu okutaikirraniza, baitu ebicweka byona bikoonyerangane.
46012026	Ekicweka kimu kakuba kisaasa, byona bisaasira hamu. Ekicweka kimu kakuba kiheebwa ekitiinisa, byona bisemerererwa hamu.
46012027	Hati nu inywe muli mubiri gwa Kristo, buli omu kicweka kyagwo.
46012028	Ruhanga, omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza, akabanza kutamu abakwenda, yagarraho abarangi, yayongeraho ebeegesa, hanyuma abakozi b'ebyamahano, yataho n'abakiza endwara, n'abakoonyezi, n'abalemi, n'abarukubaza endimi ezitali zimu.
46012029	Abo boona bakwenda? Boona barangi? Boona beegesa? Boona bakora ebyamahano?
46012030	Boona baina ebisembo by'okutamba endwara? Boona babaza endimi? Boona basoborra amakuru g'endimi?
46012031	Baitu mute emitima yanyu ha kuserra ebisembo ebirukukira oburungi. Nanyowe ninyija kubooleka omuhanda ogurukukirra kimu endi yoona.
46013001	Noobu nkubaza endimi z'abantu n'ez'abamalaika, baitu ntaina kugonza ninsisana ekide ekirukugamba rundi enjogera ezirukujaara.
46013002	Noobu nkuba nyina obusobozi bw'okuranga ebya Ruhanga, kandi ninyetegereza ensita ze zoona, nyina n'amagezi goona; noobu naakuba nyina okwikiriza kwona okw'okwihaho ensozi kunu ntaina kugonza, tindi kantu.
46013003	Noobu naakugabira abanaku byona ebi nyinabyo, noobu naakuhayo omubiri gwange kwokebwa, kunu ntaina kugonza, tingasirwa kantu.
46013004	Okugonza kugumiisiriza kandi kugira embabazi; okugonza tikugira ihali noobu kwakuba kwenyumiza;
46013005	tikwehaisa kandi tikugira kiniga. Okugonza tikweserurra ebyakwo; tikubiihirwa, tikwikaza nzigu ha mutima;
46013006	tikusiima ebitahikire, baitu kusiima ebihikire.
46013007	Okugonza kugumira byona, kwikiriza byona, kunihira byona, kugumiisiriza byona.
46013008	Okugonza tikuhwaho. Oburangi, bwo bulihwaho; okubaza endimi, nakwo kulihwaho; n'okumanya kulihwaho.
46013009	Habwokuba okumanya kwaitu kuke, kandi n'oburangi bwaitu nabwo tibuhikire;
46013010	ebihikire obu biriija, ebitahikire birihwaho.
46013011	Obu nkaba ndi mwana naabazaaga nk'omwana, naateekerezaaga nk'omwana, naacwamuga nk'omwana; baitu obu nakuzire, naleka eby'obuto.
46013012	Hati niturorra omu ndolerwamu, tutarukuhweza kurungi; baitu omu kasumi ako, tuliroranganira kimu. Hati nimmanyaho ekicweka; baitu omu kasumi ako, ebi ndibyetegerereza kimu, nyowe nkooku nyetegererezibwe kimu.
46013013	Habweki nihaikaraho bisatu: okwikiriza, okunihira, n'okugonza; baitu ekirukukira byona nukwo kugonza.
46014001	Mute omutima ha ngonzi, kandi mugondeze kimu ebisembo ebigabwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, okukira muno eky'oburangi.
46014002	Habwokuba anyakubaza endimi, tabaza na bantu, baitu abaza na Ruhanga. Busaho muntu amwetegereza, kandi eby'ensita ebi agamba abigambisibwa Mwoyo.
46014003	Baitu anyakuranga ebya Ruhanga, aba naagambira abantu eby'okubagumya, okubatamu amaani, n'okubahuumuza.
46014004	Anyakubaza endimi ayegasira wenka; baitu anyakuranga, aba naagasira ekitebe ky'abaikiriza.
46014005	Inywena ningonza mubaze endimi, baitu eki ndukukira kugonza, murange ebya Ruhanga. Ogu anyakuranga, w'ekitiinisa okukira arukubaza endimi, rundi buli haroho ondi arukusoborra, nukwo ekitebe ky'abaikiriza kigasirwe.
46014006	Hati bagenzi bange, obu ndiija owanyu nimbaza endimi, ndibagasira ki kakuba ntabooleka ebimu ebi nasuukulirwe, ebi nkudukumanya, ebi ndukuranga, rundi ebi ndukwegesa?
46014007	Ebintu ebiteerwa, nk'endere rundi endongo, ebintu ebitaina bwomeezi, kakuba bitaahukanizaamu maraka gaabyo, omuntu alimanya ata ekirukuteerwa?
46014008	Kandi engwara kakuba egamba iraka eritarukuhulirwa kurungi, muntu ki arayeteekaniza kuramaga?
46014009	Na hali inywe nukwo kiri kiti, kakuba mubaza omu ndimi ezitarukwetegerezibwa, omuntu araakenga ata? Muliba nimubaliza omuyaga.
46014010	Mazimakwo omunsi yoona harumu endimi nyingi ezitarukusisana, kandi busaho na rumu orutaina makuru;
46014011	baitu kakuba ntamanya amakuru g'orulimi, mba ndi munyaihanga hali ogu arukubaza, nawe aba ali munyaihanga hali nyowe.
46014012	Na hali inywe nukwo kiri kiti: Nkooku murukwegomba ebisembo ebigabwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, mwitanire muno ebi ebirukugasira ekitebe ky'abaikiriza.
46014013	Nahabweki ogu arukubaza endimi, asemeriire kusaba Ruhanga, nukwo aheebwe obusobozi bw'okusoborra ebi arukubaza.
46014014	Kakuba nsaba Ruhanga omu ndimi, omwoyo gwange gusaba, baitu amagezi gange tigagasirwa.
46014015	Hati nkole ki? Ndaasaba omu mwoyo n'omu magezi; kandi ndaazina omu mwoyo n'omu magezi.
46014016	Obu oraaba noosiima Ruhanga omu mwoyo honka, omuntu atarukwikiriza asobora ata kukugarukamu: “Amiina”, habw'ebi osiiimire?
46014017	Mazimakwo osobora kuba noosiima kurungi, baitu ondi tarukugasirwa.
46014018	Nyowe ninsiima Ruhanga, habwokuba inywena nimbakira kubaza endimi;
46014019	baitu nabwo omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza naakugondeze kubaza ebigambo bitaano n'amagezi gange, nukwo nsobole kwegesa abandi, okukira kubaza ebigambo omutwaro omu rulimi orutarukwetegerezibwa.
46014020	Bagenzi bange, muleke kuteekereza nk'abaana, baitu muteekereze nk'abakuru; kyonka ha bibi musisane abaana bato.
46014021	Omu Biragiro bya Musa kikahandikwa kiti: “Abantu banu ndibagambirra omu ndimi ezitamanyirwe n'omu kanwa k'abanyamahanga; baitu nabwo tibalimpuliriza. Nukwo MUKAMA agambire ati.”
46014022	Endimi, zo karorwaho k'okukoonyera abatarukwikiriza, baitu tikali k'okukoonyera abaikiriza. Kandi okuranga ebya Ruhanga karorwaho k'okukoonyera abaikiriza, baitu tikali habw'abatarukwikiriza.
46014023	Kakuba ekitebe kyona eky'abaikiriza byesorooza, boona bakabaza endimi, abantu ab'aheeru rundi abatarukwikiriza bakataahamu, tibarukwija kugamba ngu, mugwire iraro?
46014024	Baitu boona kakuba baba nibaranga ebya Ruhanga, kandi omuntu atarukwikiriza rundi ow'aheeru akataahamu, ebigambo byabu byona bimurumiriza kandi bimusingisa omusango,
46014025	ensita ez'omu mutima gwe isuukurwa; nubwo alijuumara ha nsi, aramye Ruhanga, kandi ayatule nkooku mwinakwo Ruhanga.
46014026	Bagenzi bange, hati tukole tuta? Obu mwesorooza hamu, omu aimukya ekizina, ondi ayegesa, ondi asuukulirwa, ondi abaza endimi, ondi asoborra ebigambirwe. Ebi byona bikorwe habw'okugasira abaikiriza.
46014027	Obu haraaba haroho abarukubaza endimi, leka babe babiri bonka okutahingura ha basatu, nabwo bahangane embu; kandi habeho omu arukusoborra.
46014028	Obu haraaba hataroho arukusoborra, ayaakubalize aculeere omu iramizo, abyegambirre omu mutima gwe kandi abaze na Ruhanga.
46014029	Muleke abarangi babiri rundi basatu nubo babaze, abandi beetegereze ebigambirwe.
46014030	Kakuba habaho ondi anyakusuukulirwe ekigambo, ogu anyakubaire naabaza aculeere.
46014031	Inywena nimusobora kuranga nimuhonderana, boona nukwo beege kandi bafooke beekambi.
46014032	Mulimo gw'abarangi kutegeka emyoyo y'abarangi.
46014033	Habwokuba Ruhanga taba Ruhanga anyakuburanganiza, baitu aba w'obusinge. Nkooku kikorwa omu maramizo goona ag'abaikiriza,
46014034	abakazi baculeerege omu kwesorooza kw'abantu ba Ruhanga; habwokuba tibarukwikirizibwa kubaza, baitu beebundaaze, Ebiragiro nkooku bigamba.
46014035	Obu haraaba haroho eki barukugonza kumanya, bakaguzeege baibabo bamazire kutaaha. Habwokuba ky'ensoni omukazi kubaliza omu kwesorooza kwaitu.
46014036	Haa! Nimugira ngu, ekigambo kya Ruhanga kikaruga omuli inywe? Nandiki niinywe kyahikireho inywenka?
46014037	Obu haraaba haroho omuntu arukuteekereza nkooku ali murangi rundi aina ebisembo ebindi bya Mwoyo Ahikiriire, leka aikirize ebi ndukubahandiikira nkooku kiri kiragiro kya MUKAMA.
46014038	Kandi weena atarukwikiriza eki, nawe Ruhanga tarukumwikiriza.
46014039	Nahabweki bagenzi bange, mwegombe muno ekisembo ky'okuranga ebya Ruhanga, baitu okubaza endimi nakwo mutakutanga;
46014040	kyonka byona bikorwe kurungi kandi nibihonderangana.
46015001	Bagenzi bange, hati ka mbaijukye Amakuru Amarungi aga nabarangiriire, aga mwaikiriize kandi na hati aga mugumiremu,
46015002	nugo agabajuna kakuba mugaikiriza kurungi. Kitali eki, buli nimwikiririza busa.
46015003	Ekikuru eki nabandize kubooleka, na nyowe eki nahairwe, nikyo kinu: Kristo akafa habw'ebibi byaitu nk'Ebyahandiikirwe oku bigamba,
46015004	akaziikwa kandi yahumbuurwa haahingwireho ebiro bisatu, nk'Ebyahandiikirwe oku bigamba,
46015005	akabonekera Keefa, hanyuma yabonekera ikumi n'omu.
46015006	Yagaruka yabonekera bagenzi baitu abarukukira ha bikumi bitaano omurundi gumu; baingi omuli bo na hati bakyaroho, abandi noobu baliba baafire.
46015007	Akongera yabonekera Yakobbo, hanyuma yabonekera abakwenda boona.
46015008	Ha kumalirra akabonekera nyowe arukubakira obuto.
46015009	Ningira ninyowe w'okumalirra omu bakwenda, atasemeriire n'okwetwa mukwenda, habwokuba nkahiiganiza ebitebe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga.
46015010	Baitu embabazi za Ruhanga nizo zampikize nambere ndi, kandi embabazi ezi yangiriire itafe busa. Nangwa, nyowe nkakora muno okukira abakwenda boona, noobu araaba atali nyowe ayakozire, baitu embabazi za Ruhanga eziri omuli nyowe, nizo zaakozire.
46015011	Noobu araaba ali nyowe ayakozire, rundi abakwenda abandi, baitu ebi nibyo turangirra kandi na inywe nibyo mwaikiriize.
46015012	Hati Kristo obu araaba naarangirirwa nkooku yahumbuukire omu bafu, abamu omuli inywe basobora bata kugamba ngu, okuhumbuuka kw'abafu tikuroho?
46015013	Baitu okuhumbuuka kw'abafu obu kuraaba kutaroho, buli Kristo nawe atahumbuuke;
46015014	kandi obu araaba atarahumbuukire, okurangirra kwaitu kwa busa, kandi okwikiriza kwanyu nakwo kwa busa.
46015015	Aho nituzooka tuli babiihi b'ebisuba, habwokuba tukagumya Ruhanga nkooku yahumbwire Kristo, kandi kunu atamuhumbuule obu kiraaba kiri ky'amazima kugamba ngu, abafu tibahumbuuka.
46015016	Abafu obu baraaba batahumbuuka, buli Kristo nawe atahumbuuke.
46015017	Kristo obu araaba atarahumbwirwe, okwikiriza kwanyu kwa busa, kandi mukyali omu bibi byanyu.
46015018	N'abo abaafeeriire omu Kristo bakahwerekerra.
46015019	Obu turaaba twayesigire Kristo omu bwomeezi bunu bwonka, buli tuli bantu b'okuganyirwa okukira abandi boona.
46015020	Baitu mananukwo Kristo akahumburwa omu bafu, nuwe muzigaijo gw'abaafiire.
46015021	Okufa nkooku kwaizire habw'omuntu omu, okuhumbuuka kw'abafu nakwo nukwo kwaizire habw'omuntu omu.
46015022	Boona nkooku bafa habw'Adamu, boona nukwo balyomeera habwa Kristo.
46015023	Baitu buli muntu omu rubu rwe; Kristo nuwe muzigaijo, nukwo hakurateho abe obu aligaruka.
46015024	Obu alikamara kukwasa Ruhanga ise obukama, amazire n'okuhwerekereza obulemi bwona, obusobozi bwona n'amaani goona, obu nubwo empero erihika.
46015025	Habwokuba Kristo asemeriire kuhangiriza okuhika obu alikarubatirra abanyanzigwa be boona.
46015026	Kandi omunyanzigwa wa ha mpero ow'okuhwerekerezibwa, nuwe Rufu.
46015027	“Ningira Ruhanga akamuha kulemera kimu byona.” Baitu nambere kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Nuwe alema ebintu byona”, nikimanywa kurungi Ogu ayamuhaire kulema byona nkooku atabalirwamu.
46015028	Kandi obu alimara kuheebwa byona abireme, Omwana nawe nubwo aliremwa ogu ayamuhaire kulema byona, nukwo Ruhanga abe byona omu boona.
46015029	Abafu obu baraaba batahumbuuka, abantu bagenderra ki kubatizibwa habw'abafu? Obu baraaba batahumbuuka, habwaki abantu babatizibwa habwabu?
46015030	Na nyowe ningenderra ki kwenaga omu kabi buli kasumi?
46015031	Bagenzi bange, nimbarahira habw'okwenyumiza oku mbainaho omu Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu: Nyowe nfa buli kiro!
46015032	Kakuba nyebuga, nkooku abantu bakora: “Nkarwanisa enyamaiswa ndi Efeeso”, baitu nikingasira ki? Abafu obu baraaba batahumburwa, “Leka tulye, tunywe, habwokuba nyenkya tuli b'okufa.”
46015033	Muleke kubiihwabiihwa: “Okuteerana n'ababi nikusiisa engeso enungi.”
46015034	Mweteere, mulekere aho okusiisa. Habwokuba abamu omuli inywe tibarukumanya Ruhanga. Eki nkigambire kubakwasa ensoni.
46015035	Baitu omuntu asobora kukaguza ati: “Abafu babuumbuurwa bata? Kandi baliija baina mubiri gwa mulingo ki?”
46015036	Mudoma iwe! Embibo ei osiga temera, rundi buli ebandize kufa.
46015037	Kandi ei osiga tikiri nikyo ekimera ekiribaho, baitu osiga orujuma kwonka; rundi rw'engano rundi embibo endi.
46015038	Baitu Ruhanga aruha omubiri nkooku agonza, kandi buli rujuma aruha omulingo gwarwo.
46015039	Habwokuba emibiri yoona tesisana, baitu haroho omubiri gumu ogw'abantu, ogundi gw'ebisoro, ogundi gw'enyonyi, n'ogundi gw'encu.
46015040	Haroho emibiri ey'omwiguru kandi haroho n'ey'omunsi; baitu ekitiinisa eky'ey'omwiguru kindi, kandi n'ekitiinisa eky'emibiri ey'omunsi nakyo kindi.
46015041	Okujwa kw'izooba kundi, kandi n'okujwa kw'okwezi kundi, n'okw'enyunyuuzi nakwo kundi. Kandi n'okujwa kw'enyunyuuzi ezi, nakwo tikwingana.
46015042	N'okuhumbuuka kw'abafu nukwo kuli kuti. Omubiri oguziikwa guba gw'okujunda, kandi oguhumburwa tiguli gw'okujunda.
46015043	Guziikwa guhoiremu amaani, guhumburwa gwina amaani.
46015044	Omubiri guziikwa guli mubiri gw'obuntu, gulihumburwa guli mubiri gw'omwoyo. Obu haraaba haroho omubiri ogw'obuntu, buli haroho n'ogw'omwoyo.
46015045	Nukwo kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Adamu ow'okubanza akahangwa yaba muntu mwomeezi”; Adamu ow'okumalirra yaba mwoyo ogwomeeza.
46015046	Obwomeezi obw'omwoyo tinubwo bubanza, baitu habanza obw'omubiri; nukwo hakurataho obw'omwoyo.
46015047	Omuntu ow'okubanza akaruga omwitaka, ali cuucu kwonka; omuntu owa kabiri akaruga omwiguru.
46015048	Omuntu ow'omu cuucu nkooiku akaba ali, n'ab'omu nsi nukwo bali; kandi ow'omwiguru nkooku ali, n'ab'omwiguru nukwo bali bati.
46015049	Itwe nkooku twasisaine Adamu ayarugire omu cuucu, nukwo tulisisana na Kristo ayarugire omu iguru.
46015050	Bagenzi bange ka mbagambire kinu: omubiri n'esagama tibisobora kugweterwa obukama bwa Ruhanga, n'ekijunda tikisobora kugweterwa ekitajunda.
46015051	Hati ka mbamanyise ensita enu: itwena titulifa, baitu itwena tulihindurwa,
46015052	omu kanya kake nk'ak'eriiso likoimezaamu, engwara eya ha mpero obu erigamba. Habwokuba engwara erigamba, abafu balihumburwa batakyagaruka kufa, na itwe tulihindurwa.
46015053	Aho omubiri ogurukujunda, gulijwara ogutajunda, kandi omubiri gunu ogufa, gulijwara ogutafa.
46015054	Ogurukujunda ogu, obu guliba gujwaire ogutajunda, kandi ogurukufa gujwaire ogutafa, nubwo Ekyahandiikirwe kirihikirra ekirukugamba kiti: “Orufu rusingwirwe, rwahwerekerezibwa.”
46015055	“Rufu iwe, obusinguzi bwawe buraha? Rufu iwe, obusaalizi bw'omubuli gwawe buraha?”
46015056	Omubuli gw'Orufu nikyo ekibi, kandi amaani g'ekibi gasigikira ha Biragiro.
46015057	Ruhanga asiimwe anyakutuha obusinguzi naaraba omu MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
46015058	Nahabweki bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, mugume, mutatengatengeeta, kandi obutoosa mweyongere kukora omulimo gwa MUKAMA, mumanye ngu, obu murukumukorra, obwekambi bwanyu tibuli bwa busa.
46016001	Ebirukukwata ha bisembo eby'okukoonyera abaikiriza, na inywe mukole nkooku naragiire ebitebe by'abaikiriza ab'omu Galatiya.
46016002	Ha kiro ekibanza buli wiiki, omuntu weena omuli inywe aiheho eki arukusobora ha bintu ebi atungire, akyahule, nukwo ebisembo bisoroozibwe kara ntakaizireyo.
46016003	Obu ndihika, ndituma abamu aba mulisiima, bagenda n'ebbaruha, batwale ebisembo byanyu Yerusaalemu.
46016004	Obu mulirora nikihika nyowe kugenda, ndigenda nabo.
46016005	Ndibabungira obu ndiba mmazire kuraba Makedoni, habwokuba oku nuho ndukwenda kuleetwa.
46016006	Obundi ndisobora kumara na inywe ebiro bike, rundi kumarrayo ebiro by'obutiti, nukwo mumboherre ha ndiba ningenda hoona.
46016007	MUKAMA obu aligonza, ninihira kumara na inywe ebiro bike, habwokuba tindukwenda kubarora nk'arukubahungukira kwonka.
46016008	Baitu ninyija kwikara ndi Efeeso okuhika ha kiro eky'obugenyi bwa Pentikooti,
46016009	habwokuba mbaire ntungire omugisa mukooto ogw'okukorra hanu eby'omugaso bingi, kyonka haroho baingi abarukumparana.
46016010	Timoteho obu aliija oku, mumujwahukirre kandi mukorrane nawe kurungi, habwokuba naakora omulimo gwa MUKAMA nka nyowe.
46016011	Nahabweki hatabaho arukumugaya; mumukoonyere, amale orugendo rwe n'obusinge, agaruke nambere ndi; habwokuba nyowe n'ab'oruganda boona tumutegeriize.
46016012	Kandi mugenzi waitu Apolo, nkamwesengereza muno ababungire hamu n'ab'oruganda abandi baitu abaire atakagondeze. Aliija obu alitunga omwanya.
46016013	Mwikale nimurora, mugumire omu kwikiriza kwanyu, mube bantu manzi kandi ab'amaani.
46016014	Byona ebi murukukora, mubikolege nimugonzangana.
46016015	Hati nu, bagenzi bange, mumanyire ngu, eka ya Sitefana niyo yabandize kuhinduka omu Akaaya kandi bakeehayo kuheereza abaikiriza;
46016016	nimbateererra muhege ekitiinisa abantu nk'abo, hamu n'abakozi abandi bataahi baitu.
46016017	Nkasemererwa habw'okwija kwa Sitefana na Fotunato n'Akaiko, habwokuba bakakora ebi mwakubaire mukozire muroho;
46016018	ningira bakahumuuza omwoyo gwange n'ogwanyu. Abantu nk'abo mubahege ekitiinisa.
46016019	Ebitebe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga ab'omu Asiya babaramukize. Akwila na Pirisika, hamu n'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza abeesorooleza omunju yabo babaramukize muno omu MUKAMA.
46016020	Ab'oruganda boona babaramukize. Muramukyangane nimugwangana omu kifuba nk'abantu ba Ruhanga.
46016021	Nyowe Paulo, okuramukya kunu nkwehandikiire nyenka n'omukono gwange.
46016022	Obu haraaba haroho weena atarukugonza MUKAMA, ogu akyenwe. Ija, Ai MUKAMA!
46016023	Embabazi za MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo ziikale na inywe.
46016024	Inywena nimbagonza omu Kristo Yesu. Amiina.
47001001	Nyowe Paulo, Ruhanga ou yasiimire mba mukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, na Timoteho mugenzi waitu, nituhandiikira ekitebe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga abali Korinto, hamu n'abantu ba Ruhanga boona abali omu Akaaya yoona.
47001002	Nitubagondeza emigisa n'obusinge obwa Ruhanga Isiitwe na MUKAMA Yesu Kristo.
47001003	Akugizibwe Ruhanga, Ise MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, Isiitwe ow'embabazi kandi Ruhanga omuhuumuza.
47001004	Nuwe Ogu anyakutuhuumuza omu bujune bwaitu bwona, nukwo na itwe tusobole kuhuumuza abandi abali omu bujune bw'emiringo yoona, nitubahuumuza Ruhanga nkooku yatuhuumwize.
47001005	Okubonabonesibwa kwa Kristo nkooku kwasaagire hali itwe, nukwo okuhuumuzibwa kwaitu omu Kristo kwasaagire kuti.
47001006	Itwe obu tubona enaku, twibona nukwo inywe muhuumuzibwe kandi mujunwe. Kandi obu tuhuumuzibwa, tuhuumuzibwa habwanyu nukwo mutunge amaani agarukuleeta okugumiisiriza enaku, nk'ezaitu ezi tugumiisiriza.
47001007	Nikyo tubeesigira muno, nitumanya inywe nkooku murukubonabonesibwa hamu na itwe, nukwo mulihuumuzibwa hamu na itwe.
47001008	Ab'oruganda, nitugonza inywe mumanye emihito ei twaboine omu Asiya; habwokuba ekatukiza muno amaani, yatutereburra kimu, titwanihira kukira.
47001009	Mazimakwo tukateekereza ngu, tusingirwe omusango gw'okufa. Ningira eki kikabaho tuleke kweyesiga itwenka, baitu twesige Ruhanga anyakuhuumbura abafu.
47001010	Nuwe yatujunire akabi k'okufa, kandi nuwe alitujuna. Nuwe turukwesiga nkooku araikaraga naatujuna.
47001011	Na inywe mutukoonyerege nimutusabira. Nukwo omugisa tuheebwa habw'okusaba kw'abaingi, abandi baingi baligusiimira Ruhanga habwaitu.
47001012	Okwenyumiza kwaitu nkunu, kandi omutima gwange nigugumya ngu, omunsi munu, n'okukira muno omuli inywe, tukakora ebihikire nitubooleka engeso nungi kandi ez'amazima eziruga hali Ruhanga; tutarukwesiga magezi g'ensi, baitu embabazi za Ruhanga.
47001013	Na hati titurukubahandiikira kindi, kwihaho ebi murukusobora kusoma mukeetegereza. Kandi ninihira nimwija kwetegerereza kimu,
47001014	nkooku mwayetegeriizeho ekicweka. Nukwo na inywe mulisobora kwehaisa habwaitu, nka itwe oku tulyehaisa habwanyu ha kiro ky'okwija kwa MUKAMA Yesu.
47001015	Obu namazire kwetegereza ebi byona, nkacwamu kubanza kubabungira nukwo mwongere kusemererwa obwa kabiri.
47001016	Nkagonza kubabungira obu nkaba ningenda Makedoni kandi mbaleetweho nindugayo. Nukwo na inywe mumboherre ningenda Buyudaaya.
47001017	Obu nagondeze kukora nti, nimugira nkaba nyina emitima ebiri? Rundi ebi nteegeka kukora, mbitegeka nk'omuntu kwonka, arukugamba ati: Ego, kandi omu kacu kake ati: Nangwa?
47001018	Nindahira Ruhanga w'amazima, ekigambo eki tubagambira tikiri Ego na Nangwa.
47001019	Habwokuba Omwana wa Ruhanga Yesu Kristo, nyowe, Silivano na Timoteho, ou twabatebiize, akaba atali Ego na Nangwa; baitu omuli uwe obutoosa ekigambo kya Ruhanga kiba Ego.
47001020	Ningira omuli uwe, byona Ruhanga ebi yaraganiize biba Ego. Nikyo tugambira tuti: Amina, nituraba omuli uwe habw'okuhaisa Ruhanga ekitiinisa.
47001021	Ruhanga nuwe atugumya itwena: itwe hamu na inywe, kandi nuwe yatutumire;
47001022	akatutaho akarorwaho, kandi yatuha Mwoyo we mu mitima yaitu, abe mukwato gw'ebi atwahuliire.
47001023	Baitu Ruhanga nuwe kaiso wange, ekyantangire kugaruka oku nukwo kubaganyira.
47001024	Itwe tuleke kwefoora balemi b'okwikiriza kwanyu; baitu nitukora hamu na inywe nukwo musemererwe habwokuba omu kwikiriza kwanyu mwikara mugumire.
47002001	Nikyo nacweriiremu kutagaruka kubabungira ndeke kubatuntuza.
47002002	obu ndabatuntuza, mara nibaha abarandeetera omuhimbo? Ogu ou ntuntwize?
47002003	Kandi nikyo nabahandiikiriire, nukwo obu ndiija, ndeke kubiihizibwa abo abaakubaire nibandeetera omuhimbo. Habwokuba nkagumya nti: okusemererwa kwange kuliba kusemererwa kwanyu inywena.
47002004	Nkabahandiikira nyina obujune bwingi n'obusaasi omu mutima, kandi n'amaizi maingi omu maiso, ntarukugenderra kubatuntuza, baitu okubooleka nkooku mbagonza muno.
47002005	Obu haraaba haroho ayakozire ekirukusaaliza, atasaalize nyowe nyenka, baitu akabasaaliza inywena.
47002006	Omuntu nk'ogu, ekifubiro eki yahairwe abaingi, nikimumara.
47002007	Haakire mwakumuganyiire mumuhuumuza, nukwo aleke kutereburwa obujune obuhinguraine.
47002008	Nikyo ndukubeesengerereza nti: Mugaruke mumwoleka engonzi.
47002009	Nikyo nahandiikiire ningenderra okubalenga, mmanye obu muraaba nimuhurra omu byona.
47002010	Weena ou muganyira, na nyowe mmuganyira. Kandi obu haraaba haroho eki naaganyiire, nkakiganyira habwanyu, omumaiso ga Kristo,
47002011	nukwo tutange Sitaani kutusingura; habwokuba emitego ye tugimanyire.
47002012	Obu nahikire Turoha kurangirrayo Amakuru Amarungi ga Kristo, oku nkasanga orwigi runkinguliirwe kukora omulimo gwa MUKAMA.
47002013	Baitu omutima gwange gutahuumule habw'okutasangayo mugenzi wange Tito. Nukwo kubaraga, nayongera nagenda Makedoni.
47002014	Baitu Ruhanga asiimwe, anyakutusinguza butoosa omu Kristo, kandi naakorra omuli itwe kurarangya hoona amakuru ag'okumumanya, amakuru agarukuboya nk'omugaju.
47002015	Habwokuba hali abantu abarukujunwa n'abandi abarukuhwerekerra, itwe tuli mugaju gwa Kristo ogurukuboyera Ruhanga.
47002016	Hali abo abarukuhwerekerra, tuli kijunde ky'orufu ekirukwita; baitu hali abo abarukujunwa, tuli kiboya ky'obwomeezi ekirukwomeeza. Nooha asemeriire omulimo ogu?
47002017	Itwe titurukusisana nk'abaingi, ababungya ekigambo kya Ruhanga kukiihamu amagoba; baitu tuli bantu beesigwa, abaatumirwe Ruhanga, kandi twegeseza omumaiso ge nk'abaheereza ba Kristo.
47003001	Hati twagaruka kwehaisa itwenka? Nitwetaaga ebbaruha ez'okuturanga hali inywe, rundi inywe kutuha ez'okuturanga ahandi, nkooku abandi barukuzeetaaga?
47003002	Inywe inywenka niinywe bbaruha yaitu ey'okuturanga, ehandiikirwe omu mitima yanyu, erukumanywa kandi erukusomwa abantu boona.
47003003	Kandi inywe muli bbaruha ya Kristo ei twakwasiibwe, ebbaruha eterahandiikirwe na bwino, baitu eyahandiikirwe Mwoyo wa Ruhanga omwomeezi; hatali ha bibbali by'amabaale, baitu ha mitima y'abantu.
47003004	Obu nubwo obwesige obu twina hali Ruhanga omuli Kristo.
47003005	Itwe titurukwemarra. Titurukusobora kugamba ngu, ekintu kyona nikiruga hali itwe; baitu okwemara kwaitu kuruga hali Ruhanga,
47003006	ayatusoboize kuba baheereza b'Endagaano Empyaka, etarahandiikirwe omu nyuguta, baitu eyahandiikirwe omu myoyo yaitu; habwokuba enyuguta ita, baitu Omwoyo gwomeeza.
47003007	Endagaano eya ira eyasarwirwe ha mabaale, obu eraaba yaizire n'ekitiinisa kingi, ekyatangire Abaisirairi kurora amaiso ga Musa habw'okumulikana kwago, kandi kunu ekaba neija kuhwaho,
47003008	endagaano empyaka enyakuleetwa Mwoyo teriija n'ekitiinisa ekirukukiraho?
47003009	Nahabweki endagaano eyasingisize omusango obu eraaba yaizire n'ekitiinisa, endagaano erukwihaho omusango esemeriire kugikirra kimu ekitiinisa.
47003010	Mazimakwo endagaano eyaizire ira n'ekitiinisa hati tekyainakyo, habwokuba kikamarwaho ekitiinisa ekindi ekirukukikiraho.
47003011	Endagaano enyakuhwaho obu eraaba yatungire ekitiinisa kyayo, egi etarukuhwaho esemeriire kutunga ekirukukiraho obwingi.
47003012	Itwe abaina okunihira nk'oku, nikyo twegeseza n'obumanzi.
47003013	Tituli nka Musa ayayeswekeriire ha maiso, nukwo Abaisirairi baleke kurora ekitiinisa kye nkooku kyagendaga nikikeeha.
47003014	Mara emitima yabu ekagumangana; n'okuhika hati obu basoma Endagaano ya ira, ekisweko nk'eki kiroho kandi tikibaruga ha maiso, habwokuba omu Kristo wenka nuho kiihirwaho.
47003015	Nangwa n'okuhika hati ebya Musa obu bisomwa, ekisweko eki kiikara kiswekere emitima yabu;
47003016	baitu omuntu obu ahindukira MUKAMA, ekisweko eki kiihwaho.
47003017	Hati MUKAMA ogu nuwe Mwoyo, kandi nambere hali Mwoyo wa Ruhanga, nuho haba obusinge.
47003018	Na itwe itwena obu turaaba niturora ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA n'amaiso agataswekerwe, tuhindurwa kusisana nawe, nituruga omu ktiiinisa ekimu, nitutaaha omu kindi ekirukukiraho; kandi eki kikorwa MUKAMA anyakuli Mwoyo.
47004001	Nahabweki itwe abaahairwe obuheereza bunu habw'embabazi za Ruhanga, titurukuterebuka.
47004002	Tukanga ebirukukwasa ensoni n'ebirukukorwa omu nsereko. Tituli bagobya, tituhindahindura ekigambo kya Ruhanga, baitu amazima tugooleka bbwa, nukwo abantu boona batusiimire omu mitima yabo omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
47004003	Amakuru gaitu Amarungi noobu garaaba gaswekeriirwe, baitu gaswekeriirwe habw'abo boona abarukuhwerekerra.
47004004	Nubo abo abatarukwikiriza, habwokuba omukuru w'ensi enu aswekeriire emitima yabo, nukwo abatange kurora omusana ogw'Amakuru Amarungi ag'ekitiinisa kya Kristo, anyakuli kisisani kya Ruhanga.
47004005	Itwe titwegambaho itwenka, baitu turangirra Yesu Kristo nkooku ali MUKAMA, kandi itwe tuli baheereza banyu habwe.
47004006	Ruhanga ayagambire ati: “Leka omusana gujwere omu mwirima,” nuwe yamulikire omu mitima yaitu, yatuha kwoleka abantu ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga ekyazookere omu Kristo.
47004007	Baitu itungo eri, itwe twinalyo omu bibindi by'ibumba habw'okwoleka obusobozi obuteerengwa nkooku buli bwa Ruhanga, tibuli bwaitu.
47004008	Tugosirwe embaju zoona, baitu titufunziibwe; tusobiirwe, baitu tirurukuterebuka.
47004009	Tuhiiganizibwe, baitu titunagiriziibwe; tutiirwe hansi, baitu tituhwerekereziibwe.
47004010	Obutoosa tugenda twina okufa kwa Yesu omu mibiri yaitu, nukwo obwomeezi bwe nabwo buzookere omu mibiri yaitu.
47004011	Itwe obu tuba tukyali boomeezi, butoosa tuba mu kabi k'okufa habwa Yesu, nukwo obwomeezi bwe buzookere omu mibiri yaitu erukufa.
47004012	Nahabweki orufu rukorra omuli itwe, baitu obwomeezi omuli inywe.
47004013	Itwe nkooku twina omwoyo gumu ogw'okwikiriza nk'ogwa Daudi ayahandiikire ati: “Nkaikiriza, nikyo nabaliize.” Na itwe nitwikiriza, nikyo turukubaliza.
47004014	Nitumanya ogu ayahumbwire MUKAMA Yesu omu bafu nkooku alituhumbuura hamu nawe, nukwo itwena atuhikye nambere ali.
47004015	Habwokuba byona biroho habwanyu. Kandi emigisa ya Ruhanga nkooku erukugenda neekanya omu bantu abarukweyongera obwingi, nukwo emigisa ye ekanyise eti okusiima kwaitu, kandi Ruhanga aheebwe ekitiinisa.
47004016	Nahabweki titurukuterebuka. Omubiri gwaitu noobu guraaba nigujunda, baitu omwoyo gwaitu gugaruka buhyaka buli kiro.
47004017	Omuhito gunu omuke ogw'akasumi kake nigututeekaniriza ekitiinisa ekitahwaho kandi ekitainganwa.
47004018	Itwe titurukuta maiso ha bintu ebirukurorwa, baitu tugata ha bintu ebitarukurorwa; habwokuba ebirukurorwa bihwaho, baitu ebitarukurorwa tibihwaho.
47005001	Nitumanya ngu, orusiisira oru turukwikaramu omu nsi obu ruliseeswa, tulinda ekyombeko ekindi Ruhanga eki alituha. Niyo nju etombekerwe mikono, baitu ey'omwiguru kandi ey'ebiro n'ebiro.
47005002	Kyamazima, omu mubiri gunu nitusinda, nitwegomba kujwekwa omubiri gwaitu ogw'omwiguru.
47005003	Obu tuliba tumazire kugujwara, tutalisangwa tuli busa.
47005004	Obu tuba tukyali omu rusiisira runu, tusinda habw'omwetunturo, tutarukwenda kujuurwa nangwa, baitu nitwenda kwongerwaho ekijwaro ekindi, nukwo ekijwaro kinu ekirukufa kisobole kuhigiza kiri ekirukwomeera.
47005005	ayatutekaniriize ekintu eki nuwe Ruhanga, ayatuhaire mwoyo, abe mukwato gwaitu gw'ebi ebirukwija.
47005006	Eki nikyo kitugumya omutima butoosa; nitumanya ngu, obu tuba tukyali owaitu omu mubiri, tuba tuli hara na MUKAMA.
47005007	itwe tugenda nitwikiriza kwonka, tutarukurora bwerebwere.
47005008	Twikara tugumize omutima, baitu twakugondeze kwahukana n'omubiri gunu, nukwo tugende twikale na MUKAMA.
47005009	Nahabweki, noobu turaaba tukyali omu mubiri rundi tugurugiremu, baitu tugenderrege kumusemereza.
47005010	Habwokuba itwena tulizooka omumaiso g'ekitebe kya Kristo eky'okucweraho emisango, nukwo buli omu asasurwe habw'ebirungi rundi ebibi ebi yakozire akyali omu mubiri ogu.
47005011	Itwe habw'okumanya MUKAMA nkooku ali w'okutiinwa, nikyo twekambisiza abantu; baitu Ruhanga nuwe arukumanya nkooku tuli, kandi ninihira na inywe, emitima yanyu eki neekimanya.
47005012	Titurukugaruka kweyumiza hali inywe, baitu nitubaha obulyo bw'okwenyumiza habwaitu, nukwo musobole kugarukamu abo abarukwenyumiza ha bya haruguru, ebitali by'omu mutima omu nda.
47005013	Itwe obu turaaba tuhungutukire, tuhungutukire habwa Ruhanga; obu turaaba tuteekaine, tuteekaine habwanyu.
47005014	Habwokuba engonzi za Kristo zituhambiriza, kandi nitugumiza kimu: omu nkooku yaferiire boona, nahabweki boona bakafa.
47005015	Kandi akafeera boona nukwo abarukwomeera babe batakyayomeera habwabu bonka, baitu boomere habw'ogu ayabaferiire kandi ayabahumbuukire.
47005016	Nahabweki, okuruga hati titukyatonda muntu weena habw'obuzaale bw'omubiri. Noobu turaaba twamanyire Kristo omu buzaale bw'omubiri, baitu hati titukyamumanya tuti.
47005017	Ningira omuntu weena obu aikara omu Kristo, aba kihangwa kihyaka. Ebya kara biba bihoire, aho byona bifookere bihyaka.
47005018	Ebi byona biruga hali Ruhanga ayatwegaruliire naaraba omu Kristo, yatuha obukwenda obw'okugarukanizaamu abantu na Ruhanga.
47005019	Nukwo kugamba: omu Kristo, Ruhanga akeegarurra abali omunsi, atakyabajunaaniza ebibi byabu; na itwe akatukwasa obukwenda obu obw'okugarukanisaamu.
47005020	Hati tuli ngabwa za Kristo, Ruhanga naateererra abantu naaraba omuli itwe. Nikyo turukubeesengerereza omu ibara lya Kristo, mugarukanganemu na Ruhanga.
47005021	Ogu ataramanyire kibi, Ruhanga akamufoora kibi habwaitu; nukwo omuli uwe tubagane ha buhikiriire bwa Ruhanga.
47006001	Itwe abarukukora hamu nawe, nitubeesengereza muleke kutungira busa embabazi za Ruhanga.
47006002	Ningira nuwe arukugamba ati: “Nkakuhuliiriza omu kasumi akasemeriire, kandi naakukoonyera hakiro ky'okujunirwaho.” Nkako akasumi akasemeriire; kandi kinu nikyo kiro ky'okujunirwaho.
47006003	Titurukwenda kutalibaniza omuntu weena, omulimo gwaitu guleke kusangwamu ensobi yoona;
47006004	baitu omu byona nitweyoleka nk'abaheereza ba Ruhanga. Nitugumiisiriza muno: omu kubonabonesibwa, omu bulemeezi, omu mihito,
47006005	omu kuteerwa enkoba, omu nkomo, omu kwimukirirwa, omu kutalibana, omu kuraara ha muro, n'omu kurumwa enjara.
47006006	Tuli baheereza ba Ruhanga omu kwerinda, omu kumanya, omu kugumiisiriza, omu mbabazi, omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire, omu kugonzangana okutarumu bugobya,
47006007	omu kubaza amazima, n'omu maani ga Ruhanga; tukwasire eby'okurwanisa eby'obuhikiriire omu mukono gw'obulyo n'ogw'emoso.
47006008	Tuli baheereza be omu kuheebwa ekitiinisa n'omu kugaywa, omu kugambwaho kubi n'omu kugambwaho kurungi. Nitubarwa nk'abagobya, kunu tuli b'amazima;
47006009	nk'abatamanyirwe, kunu nitumanywa kurungi; nk'abarukufa, kunu tuli boomeezi; nk'abafubiirwe, kunu titwisirwe;
47006010	nk'abali omu bujune, kunu nitusemererwa; nk'abanaku, kunu nituguudahaza baingi; nk'abataina kantu, kandi kunu twina byona.
47006011	Bakorinto inywe, tubabaliize bbwa; tubanjuruliire emitima yaitu.
47006012	Itwe tutabatangire kutwehikya, baitu ebiteekerezo byanyu nibyo bibatangire kutwehikya.
47006013	Nimbahana nk'abaana bange, na inywe emitima yanyu mugyanjurre nkooku tubanjuruliire ogwaitu.
47006014	Muleke kuteerana n'abatarukwikiriza. obuhikiriire bwina bukwatane ki n'obubi? Rundi ekyererezi n'omwirima biina bukwatane ki?
47006015	Kristo aina bukwatane ki embandwa Beliyaali? Rundi arukwikiriza ateerana ata n'atarukwikiriza?
47006016	Enju ya Ruhanga ikirraniza eta n'ibandiro? Itwe tuli Nju ya Ruhanga omwomeezi; nkooku Ruhanga yagambire ati: “Ndabaikaramuga nimbagenderamu. Ndiba Ruhanga wabu, kandi bbo baliba bantu bange.
47006017	Nikyo Ruhanga arukugambira ati: Mubarugemu, mubeecwaho, kandi mutalikwataho kintu kyona ekitasemeziibwe. Nubwo na nyowe ndibatangirra.
47006018	Ndiba isiinywe, na inywe muliba batabani bange n'abahara bange; MUKAMA w'obusobozi bwona nukwo arukugamba ati.”
47007001	Abagonzibwa, nkooku twina ebyaraganiziibwe ebi, katwoge oburofu bwona obw'omubiri n'obw'omwoyo, tube bahikiriire mali, tutiine Ruhanga.
47007002	Mutatiina kutwanjururra emitima yanyu. tiharoho muntu n'omu ou twakozire kubi, tiharoho n'omu ou twasiisire, tiharoho n'omu ou twagobiize.
47007003	Kinu tindukukigamba kubacwera omusango, habwokuba mbagambiire ira nkooku mutuli ha mutima; tuliba tuli hamu omu kufa rundi omu kwomeera.
47007004	Nimbeesiga muno; nimunyehuliza muno; mumpumwize muno. Noobu turaaba twina enaku ezirukwingana ki, baitu nyina omuhimbo ogutagambwa.
47007005	Nangwa noobu twahikire Makedoni, emibiri yaitu etahuumule naakake, baitu twabonaga enaku embaju zoona-aheeru bwabaga bulemu, omu nda butiini.
47007006	Baitu Ruhanga anyakuhuumuza abasobirwe, akatuhuumuza habw'okwija kwa Tito.
47007007	Tikuli kwija kwe kwonka, baitu n'okuhuumuzibwa oku mwamuhuumwizemu. Akatutebeza ekihika kyanyu, okuganya kwanyu, n'obwekambi mwayolekere habwange. Bikanyongera kusemererwa.
47007008	Noobu ndaaba nababihiize habw'ebbaruha ei nabahandiikiire, tindukukyeijukya. Nkabanza kukyeijukya, habwokuba nindora ebbaruha egi ekabasaaliza okumara akasumi kake.
47007009	Baitu hati ninsemererwa, tihali habw'okusaalizibwa kwanyu, baitu okusaalizibwa oku mwatungire kukabaleetera okwegarukamu. Inywe mukasaalizibwa nka Ruhanga oku yagondeze; itwe titwina eki twabaferiize.
47007010	Okusaalirwa Ruhanga nkooku agonza kuleeta okwegarukamu okurukuhikya ha kujunwa, kandi okusaalirwa oku timukweijukya; baitu okusaalirwa kw'ensi enu kurugwamu okufa.
47007011	Hati nu murole okusaalirwa oku Ruhanga yabagondiize nkooku kwabeekambisiize: nkooku mwataireho muno omutima okwetonganirra, nkooku mwasaalirwe, oku mwatiinire, oku mwagizire ekihika, oku mwayekambiire, oku mwafubire abaasobeze! Omuli ebi byona mukeeyoleka nkooku mutaina musango omu bigambo ebi nabahandiikiire.
47007012	Nahabweki obu ndaaba nabahandiikiire, ntabahandiikire habw'ogu ayasobeze, rundi habw'ogu ou baasobezeho; baitu nkabahandiikira nukwo mbooleke obwekambi obu mwatugiriire nkooku Ruhanga abwetegeriize.
47007013	Eki nikyo kyatuhuumwize. Tikuli okuhuumuzibwa kwaitu oku kwonka, baitu tukeeyongera kusemererwa muno habw'okurora omuhimbo gwa Tito, habwokuba inywena mukamugarra omutima omu nda.
47007014	Obu ndiba nnamwolekere nkooku ndukwesiima habwanyu, eki kitankwase nsoni. Ningira buli kintu kyona eki twabahaisizeho kyali ky'amazima, n'okwehaisa kwaitu omu maiso ga Tito nikweyoleka nkooku kuli kw'amazima.
47007015	Omutima gwe gwona guhweriire hali inywe obu arukwijuka obuhulizi bwanyu, n'oku mwamutangiriire nimutiina kandi numutukumira.
47007016	Na nyowe ninsemererwa habwokuba nimbeesigira kimu.
47008001	Bagenzi baitu, nitugonza mumanye emigisa ya Ruhanga eyahairwe ebitebe by'abaikiriza abali Makedoni.
47008002	Obu bakaba nibalengesebwa emihito nyingi, okusemererwa kwabu kukeeyongera, kwabaleetera okugaba muno kandi kunu obunaku bwabu bukaba buhinguraine.
47008003	Kinu ninkigumya: bakagaba nkooku baasoboire n'omutima gumu, n'okukiza baakizaaho.
47008004	Baatusabaga nibatwesengereza tubaikirize nabo bakoonyere abantu ba Ruhanga
47008005	eki bakakikora nkooku tukaba tutarukunihira, habwokuba bakabanza kwekwasa MUKAMA, kandi na itwe baatwekwasa habwa Ruhanga.
47008006	Nikyo twasabiire Tito amalirize omuli inywe omulimo ogu ogw'embabazi, ogu akaba atandikire.
47008007	hati nkooku muli kurungi mu byona, omu kwikiriza, omu kugamba kamu, omu kumanya, omu kwekamba kwona, n'omu kutugonza, nukwo mwekambire muno okuhikiriza ekikorwa eki eky'embabazi.
47008008	Eki tindukukigamba nk'arukubahambiriza, baitu ningenderra kubooleka obwekambi bw'abandi, nukwo mmanye okugonza kwanyu obu kuraaba kuli kw'amazima.
47008009	Inywe nimumanya embabazi za MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo. Noobu araaba yabaire ali muguuda, baitu habwanyu akafooka munaku, nukwo obunaku bwe bubafoole baguuda.
47008010	Kandi omu kikorwa kinu eky'embabazi nimbahabura nti: kirungi mumalirize eki mwatandikire omwaka oguhoire, muleke kumara gakora kwonka baitu mukole n'engonzi.
47008011	Mukatandika kara nimwenda kukoonyera, mweyongere mumalirize n'ebi mutungire.
47008012	Omuntu obu aikiriiza okukoonyera, nikihika ogu okukozesa ebi ainabyo, hatali ebi ataina.
47008013	Tindukugamba ngu, abandi banguhirwe, inywe mulemererwe.
47008014	Baitu habw'obwinganiza: ebyanyu ebi musaagisize omu kasumi kanu, bikoonyere bali; kandi nabo ebi balisaagisa bikoonyere inywe, nukwo habeho okwinganaingana.
47008015	Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ayasoroize bingi, atasaagise bingi; kandi ayasoroize bike, ataseege.”
47008016	Ruhanga asiimwe ayatairemu Tito omutima ogw'okubatunturra nk'ogwange.
47008017	Akaikiriza kwija, tihali itwe kumusaba kwonka, baitu habw'okwehayo kwe. Uwe wenka akacwamu kwija owanyu.
47008018	Kandi nitumutuma hamu na mugenzi waitu arukumanywa muno omu bitebe byona by'abaikiriza, nukwo arangirreyo Amakuru Amarungi.
47008019	Tikiri eki kyonka, baitu akomerwe ebitebe by'abaikiriza kugendaga na itwe omu mulimo ogu ogw'embabazi. Omulimo ogu turukukora habw'okuhaisa MUKAMA ekitiinisa n'okwoleka omutima omurungi ogu twinagwo.
47008020	Kandi na itwe turagirwa kwerinda, tihaikara kubaho arukutubazaaho kubi habw'ebisembo ebi ebingi ebi turukurolerra.
47008021	Ningira eki turukugenderra nukwo kukora ebirukusiimwa, hatali omu maiso ga Ruhanga honka, baitu n'omu maiso g'abantu boona.
47008022	Kandi hamu nabo nitutuma mugenzi waitu ondi ou twalengeseze emirundi nyingi, twarora ali mwekambi omu bingi; baitu hati mwekambi kukira nkooku akaba ali, habwokuba naabeesiga muno.
47008023	Mara Tito, nuwe mugenzi wange ou ndukukora nawe okubaheereza; kandi bagenzi baitu abo boona, nubo batumirwe ebitebe by'abaikiriza, kandi nubo bahaisa Kristo ekitiinisa.
47008024	Nahabweki mubooleke ebirukugumya engonzi zanyu kandi mwoleke nkooku turukwenyumiza habwanyu, nukwo ebitebe byona by'abaikiriza bisobole kukimanya.
47009001	Tikirukunyetaagisa kubahandiikira ha by'okukoonyera abantu ba Ruhanga,
47009002	habwokuba nimmanya nkooku mwikara mweteekaniize kukikora. Nikyo ndukubeehaisizaamu omu Bamakedoni nimbagambira nti: Abaakaaya bamazire omwaka beeteekaniize kukoonyera. Kandi obwekambi bwanyu nubwo bwekambisize baingi omuli bo.
47009003	Nimbatumira bagenzi baitu banu, nukwo okwehaisa kwaitu habwanyu omu kukoonyera abaikiriza kuleke kufa busa, baitu babasange mweteekaniize nkooku nabagambiire.
47009004	Abamakedoni abamu bataikara kwija na nyowe bakabasanga muteeteekaniize, tukahemuka-nangwa na inywe mukahemuka-kandi kunu tukabeesiga muno.
47009005	Nikyo naroliire nikyetaagwa kusaba bagenzi baitu banu baije owaanyu ntakaizire, bateekanize kara ekisembo kyanyu eki mwaraganiize ira. Kisangwe kiteekaniziibwe, kitali ky'okuhambirizibwa, baitu habw'okwehayo kwanyu.
47009006	Eki ndukugamba nkinu: anyakusiga bike, aligesa bike; kandi anyakusiga bingi, aligesa bingi.
47009007	Buli muntu leka agabe nkooku acwiremu omu mutima gwe, atarukubalirra rundi atarukuhambirizibwa; habwokuba Ruhanga asiima omuntu omwenda.
47009008	Inywe, Ruhanga naasobora kubaha emigisa ya buli mulingo, nukwo mwikale nimutunga byona ebi murukwetaaga, kandi nimwija kusaagisaho eby'okukoonyera buli mulimo gwona omurungi.
47009009	Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Agaba n'obwenda, kandi agabira abaseege; obuhikiriire bwe bwikaraho ebiro byona.”
47009010	Ogu anyakuha omusigi embibo, akamuha n'ebyokulya, na inywe alibaha embibo yanyu kandi agyeze. Asobole n'okukanyisa ebikorwa by'obwenda ebi mukora.
47009011	Nimwija kuguudahara omu byona habw'obwenda bwanyu bwingi obulireetera Ruhanga okusiimwa habwaitu.
