47009012	Ningira okugabira abaseege tikurukukoonyera abantu ba Ruhanga bonka, baitu kukoonyera baingi okusiima Ruhanga.
47009013	Habw'okukora omulimo ogu ogw'embabazi mukaguhikya, mulihaisa Ruhanga ekitiinisa nimujurra kandi nimwikiriza Amakuru Amarungi ga Kristo. Kandi mulimuhaisa ekitiinisa habw'obwenda bwanyu omu bintu mwabagabiire n'ebi mwahaire abandi boona.
47009014	Nabo baraabatahoga omutima nibabasabira habw'embabazi nyingi za Ruhanga ezikora omuli inywe.
47009015	Ruhanga asiimwe habw'ekisembo kye ekitagambwa.
47010001	Nyowe Paulo, ou murukuteekereza nyeculeeza obu mba na inywe, kandi mba manzi obu mba ndi hara, habw'obuculeezi n'embabazi za Kristo,
47010002	nimbeesengereza nti: obu ndiija oku ndeke kwoleka amaani aga nakugondeze kwoleka abo abarukuteekereza ngu, nitukora nk'ab'ensi enu oku bakora.
47010003	Noobu turaaba tuli omunsi, baitu titurukurwana nk'ab'ensi.
47010004	Eby'okurwanisa by'obulemu bwaitu tibiri by'abantu, baitu by'amaani ga Ruhanga agahwerekereza ebigo ebigumire.
47010005	Itwe tumaraho empaka zoona hamu n'ekintu ekindi kyona eky'okwekuliriza ekirukutanga abantu kumanya Ruhanga, kandi tugarra ebiteekerezo byona eby'abantu hali Kristo.
47010006	Inywe obu mulikamara kumworobera, nubwo na nyowe ndyeteekaniza kufubira buli ntahurra yoona.
47010007	Murole ebibali omu maiso. Omuntu weena obu araaba naagumya nkooku ali wa Kristo, aijuke na itwe tuli ba Kristo nkawe.
47010008	Noobu ndaaba nimpinguranizaaho kwehaisa habw'obusobozi MUKAMA obu yatuhaire kubagumya n'okubombeka, butali bw'okubahwerekereza, eki tikyankwase nsoni.
47010009	Nyowe tinaakugondeze kusisana nk'arukubatiinisiriza n'ebbaruha zange zinu.
47010010	Habwokuba abamu nibagamba bati: “Ebbaruha ze zigumire kandi z'amaani, baitu omu nzooka ye muceke, n'emigambire ye busamu kantu.”
47010011	Abarukugamba bati, leka bamanye ebi tuhandiika omu bbaruha tutaroho, nibyo tukora turoho.
47010012	Itwe titurukwenda kwebara rundi kwerengesaniza n'abandi abarukwehaisa bonka. Bbo obu balengangana kandi bakeerengesaniza bonka, baba bataina eki barukwetegereza.
47010013	Baitu itwe titurukwija kwehaisa kukira ha rulengo Ruhanga yatutaireho. Omu rulengo oru, na inywe nuho muli.
47010014	Itwe titurukuhinguza ha rulengo oru, nk'abatarabahikireho. Ningira niitwe twabandize kubahikaho, twabaleetera Amakuru Amarungi ga Kristo.
47010015	Titurukuhinguraniza kwehaisa habw'emirimo eyakozirwe abandi; baitu nitunihira ngu, okwikiriza kwanyu nkooku kurukweyongera, n'okurangaanwa kwaitu omuli inywe nakwo kulyeyongera muno.
47010016	Nukwo tusobole kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi omunsi eza hara ohingwire owaanyu, tutarukwehaisa habw'emirimo eyakozirweyo omuntu ondi.
47010017	Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Anyakuhaisa, leka ahaisanize MUKAMA.”
47010018	Omuntu anyakwehaisa tali uwe asiimwa, baitu ogu anyakuhaisibwa MUKAMA.
47011001	Naakugondeze mungumiisirize omu budoma bwange obuke. Mbeesengeriize mungumiisirize!
47011002	Ihali mbakwatiire, lirungi nk'erya Ruhanga; habwokuba nkabasweza Kristo nukwo mbaheyo nk'omugole empikirre anyakuswirwe omusaija omu.
47011003	Baitu nintiina, enjoka nkooku yabiihabiihire Eva n'obugobya bwayo, ebiteekerezo byanyu nabyo nibiija kuhabisibwa mukaruga omu kweheera kimu Kristo.
47011004	Kakuba haija omuntu akabeegesa Yesu ondi, atali ogu ou twabeegeseze, rundi mukatunga mwoyo ondi ou mutaratungire kara, rundi mukaikiriza amakuru agaahukaine hali aga mwaikiriize kara, timwakubiikirize ahonaaho?
47011005	Nyowe ninteekereza nti: abakwenda rurangaanwa tibaina eki barukunkiza naakake.
47011006	Noobu ndaaba ntabaza kurungi, baitu amagezi nyinago, kandi ebintu byona nkabibasoborra kurungi.
47011007	Nyowe nkasobya obu nayebundaize nukwo inywe munyumizibwe, rundi obu nabarangiriire Amakuru Amarungi ga Ruhanga mutaina eki mwansaswire?
47011008	Ebitebe ebindi by'abaikiriza nkabamaraho ebyabo, nukwo mpeereze inywe.
47011009	Obu nkaba ndi na inywe ntaina kantu, busaho n'omu ou naleetiire bulemeezi, baitu ebi nkaba ninyetaaga nkabiheebwa bagenzi baitu abaarugire Makedoni. Nahabweki nkeerinda kandi ndyerinda kutabajwahya omu mulingo gwona.
47011010	Kanjurre amazima ga Kristo aga nyinago nti: Busaho n'omu alintanga kwehaisa omunsi za Akaaya.
47011011	Kandi eki nsobora kukigamba ntarukubagonza? Ruhanga amanyire nkooku ndukubagonza.
47011012	Baitu eki ndukukora hati nikyo ndiikara ninkora, nukwo ncwe abo abarukugonza kwehaisa ngu, omulimo ogu barukukora nugwo gumu n'ogwaitu.
47011013	Nangwa, abantu nk'abo tubeeta bakwenda b'ebisuba, bakozi ngobya, nibeefoora nk'abakwenda ba Kristo.
47011014	Eki kireke kutuhuniriza, habwokuba na Sitaani wenka ayefoora nka malaika w'omusana.
47011015	Nahabweki tikirukuhuniriza kurora abaheereza be nibeefoora nk'abaheereza b'obuhikiriire. Empero yaabo eringana ebikorwa ebi barukukora.
47011016	Ningaruka kugamba nti: Muleke kuteekereza ngu, ndi mudoma. Nangwa, noobu muraaba nimunteekereza muti, baitu mungumiisirize nk'omudoma, nukwo nyehaisizeeho kake.
47011017	(Eki ndukwija kugamba, tindukukigambisibwa obusobozi bwa MUKAMA, baitu ninkigamba nk'omudoma arukugumya ngu, aina eky'okwehaisaniza.
47011018	Abaingi nkooku beehaisa nibasigikira ha by'ensi enu, na nyowe ka nyehaise nti.)
47011019	Inywe muba b'amagezi, nikyo abadoma mubagumiisiririza n'okusemererwa!
47011020	Mumanyire kugumiisiriza omuntu noobu abafoora abairu, rundi abanyaga, rundi abazindiriza, rundi abeehulirraho, rundi abateera empi.
47011021	Ebi nimbigamba nk'anyakwina ensoni, habwokuba itwe tutasobole kubigumira. Baitu ebireetera omuntu weena obumanzi obw'okwehaisa; kambaze nk'omudoma-na nyowe nibyo birukundeetera kwehaisa.
47011022	Bbo Bahebburaayo? Na nyowe nukwo ndi. Bbo Baisrairi? Na nyowe nukwo ndi. Bbo baijukuru ba Abburahamu? Na nyowe nukwo ndi.
47011023	Bbo baheereza ba Kristo? Na nyowe nukwo ndi kandi nimbakira; kambaze nk'omugu w'iraro, nimbakira omu kukora muno, nimbakira omu kubohwa omu nkomo emirundi nyingi, omu kuteerwa enkoba ezitarukubarwa, n'omu kabi k'okufa emirundi nyingi.
47011024	Emirundi etaano Abayudaaya bakanteera enkoba asatu na mwenda.
47011025	Nkateerwa emiigo kasatu, nateerwa amabaale omurundi gumu. Emeeri naagenderamuga ekacweka emirundi esatu: naagwa omu nyanja naasiibamu kandi naaraaramu.
47011026	Emirundi nyingi omu ngendo zange nkagwa omu kabi k'ebisaaru, akabi k'abanyagi, akabi omu bantu ab'ihanga lyange, akabi omu Banyamahanga, akabi omu rubuga, akabi omu irungu, akabi omu nyanja, akabi omu bagenzi baitu ab'ebisuba;
47011027	omu kutalibana n'omu kulemererwa, omu kuraara ha muro emirundi nyingi, omu njara n'iroho, omu kuburwa ebyokulya emirundi etali emu, n'omu mbeho ntaina eky'okwefubika.
47011028	Noobu ndaaba ntagambire bindi, haroho n'ebirukundemeera buli kiro, kukira muno okutunturra ebitebe byona by'abaikiriza.
47011029	Nooha aceka, nyowe ntacekere? Nooha ayesiitazibwa, nyowe ntabiihirwe?
47011030	Obu ndaaba ndi w'okwehaisa, kanyehaise habw'ebintu ebyoleka obuceke bwange;
47011031	Ruhanga, kandi Ise MUKAMA Yesu, anyakuhaisanizibwa ebiro byona, naamanya nkooku ntarukubiiha.
47011032	Omu Damasiko omulemi omukuru ow'Omukama Areeta akataho abalinzi orubuga Damasiko nukwo ankwate.
47011033	Baitu abaikiriza bakanta omu kisombero, bandabya omu idirisa, bansirimurra ha kisika ky'orubuga, naacwa omu mikono ye.
47012001	Nyowe kimpikiriire okwehaisa, noobu ndaaba ntarukukutungamu kantu. Leka nyongere kubagambira MUKAMA ebi yansuukuliire omu kubonekerwa.
47012002	Nimmanya omuntu anyakwikiriza Kristo, ayatwairwe omu iguru lya kasatu, hati haahingwireho emyaka ikumi n'ena-rundi akaba aina omubiri rundi atainagwo, tindukumanya. Ruhanga nuwe arukumanya.
47012003	Kandi nimmanya omuntu ogu nkooku yatwairwe omu Kiikaro ky'Okuhiirwa-rundi akaba aina omubiri rundi atainagwo, tindukumanya. Ruhanga nuwe arukumanya.
47012004	Akahurrayo ebigambo omuntu ebi atasobora kwatura kandi omuntu ebi atasobora kusubirra.
47012005	Leka nyehaise habw'omuntu ogu, baitu habwange tindukwija kwehaisa, kwihaho omu buceke bwange.
47012006	Noobu ndatandika kwehaisa, baitu eki tikyanteere obudoma, habwokuba ninyija kubaza amazima. Nangwa kankireke, tihaikara kubaho omuntu arukunteekerezaho ebirukukira ebi arukundoramu, rundi ebi arukumpurraho.
47012007	Baitu okuntanga kwehaisa muno habw'ebingi ebi naasuukuliirwe, nkacumitwa ihwa omu mubiri, liri nk'omukwenda wa Sitaani ow'okumbonesa, ntaliija kuhinguraniza omu kwehaisa.
47012008	Nkeesengereza MUKAMA emirundi esatu, lindugeho;
47012009	baitu uwe yangarukamu ati: “Obukonyezi bwange nibukumara, habwokuba amaani gange gahikirizibwa omu buceke bw'abantu.” Nikyo ndukwesiimira muno okwehaisaniza omu buceke bwange, nukwo amaani ga Kristo gasobole kwikara omuli nyowe.
47012010	Habwa Kristo, nikyo ndukusemererwa omu buceke, omu kujumwa, omu kulemererwa, omu kuhiiganizibwa, n'omu mihito; habwokuba obu mba muceke, nubwo ngira amaani.
47012011	Mazimakwo mbalize nk'omudoma! Niinywe mukimpambiriize, habwokuba niinywe mwakubaire nimumpaisa. Noobu ndaaba ntali kantu, baitu abakwenda abo rurangaanwa tibaina eki barukunkiza naakake.
47012012	Ebikorwa by'omukwenda ow'amazima nkabikorra omuli inywe ninyehayo muno. Nkabakorramu ebirukuhuniriza, ebyamahano, hamu n'ebikorwa by'amaani.
47012013	Ebitebe ebindi by'abaikiriza tukabakorra karungi ki aka tutarabakoliire inywe? Rundi nyowe habw'okutabasaba kantu? Ensobi egi muginganyire!
47012014	Gunu nugwo omurundi gwa kasatu nyeteekaniize kwija owaanyu. Tindukwijayo kubaleetera obulemeezi, habwokuba tindukuserrayo ebyanyu, baitu ninserra inywe. Ningira abaana tibasemeriire kwahurra abazaire eby'okubakoonyera, baitu abazaire nubo baahurra abaana.
47012015	Nyowe ndihayo ebyange n'okusemererwa kandi nyeheyo nyenka habw'emyoyo yanyu. Baitu nyowe habw'okubagonza muno, nikyo murasigikiraho kungonza kake?
47012016	Mukaikiriza nkooku ntarabaleetiire bulemeezi, baitu nimugamba ngu, nkaba ndi ncwangya kandi nkabagobeza.
47012017	Hali abo aba nabatumireho, haroho ou nayekonyiize okubagobeza?
47012018	Nkeesengereza Tito kwija oku, namutuma kugenda na mugenzi waitu onu. Kandi Tito aina eki yabagobiize? Tutakoze omwoyo gumu? Tutakwate ekirale kimu?
47012019	Na hati hoona nimukyateekereza ngu, tubaire nitwetonganirra omu maiso ganyu? Abagonzibwa, byona ebi turukubaza tubibaliza omu maiso ga Ruhanga, nkooku Kristo yakubibaliize habw'okubombeka.
47012020	Eki ndukutiina nukwo kwija nkabasanga mwina engeso ezi ntarukwenda, kandi na inywe mukansanga nyina engeso ezi mutaakwenzire; tihaikara kubayo enkungani, ihali, ekiniga, okwegonza, okuhangiira, okugambisibwa, okwetumbura, n'okujagaraza abantu.
47012021	Nintiina ngu, obu ndigaruka kwija, Ruhanga wange alimbundaaza omu maiso gaanyu, nukwo na nyowe ndirirre baingi omuli abo abaakozire kara ebibi, kandi abaayangire okwegarukamu obubi bwabu, obusiihani, n'orwanju ebi baakozire.
47013001	Gunu guraaba murundi gwa kasatu nyowe okwija owaanyu. Haroho nambere kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Buli musango gusemeriire kugumibwa abakaiso babiri rundi basatu.”
47013002	Abo abaakozire kara ebibi nkabahabura, hamu n'abandi boona. Hati noobu ndaaba ntaliyo, nimbahabura nkooku naakozire omu kubunga kwange okwa kabiri nti: Obu ndigaruka obundi, tindukwija kubaganyira
47013003	habwokuba mwikara nimwenda ekihuniriza ekiraagumya Kristo nkooku arukubaliza omuli nyowe. Uwe takwata mpora, baitu abakwasa amaani.
47013004	Akabambwa ali muceke, baitu hati ayomiire habw'amaani ga Ruhanga. Na itwe tuli baceke omuli uwe, baitu omu kubaheereza, naija kutwomeeza habw'amaani ga Ruhanga.
47013005	Mwekebere inywenka, murole obu muraaba mukyagumiire omu kwikiriza kwanyu. Mwerengese inywenka. timurukumanya Yesu Kristo nkooku ali omuli inywe? Rundi buli, ekirengeso kibasingire!
47013006	Ninihira nimwija kwetegereza itwe nkooku tutasingirwe.
47013007	Baitu nitusaba Ruhanga mutakora kibi na kimu. tikuli kugamba ngu, itwe tukasinga ekirengeso, baitu inywe mukole ebihikire, itwe noobu turaaba nitusisa abasingirwe.
47013008	Titurukusobora kuhakaniza amazima, kwihaho nitugarwanirra.
47013009	Itwe nitusemererwa obu tuba baceke, baitu inywe mukaba b'amaani. eki turukusaba, inywe mube bahikiriire.
47013010	Binu mbibahandiikiire ntakabahikireho, nukwo obu ndiija ndeke kwolekera kimu obusobozi obu nahairwe MUKAMA obw'okubagumya n'okwombeka, baitu butali obw'okubahwerekereza.
47013011	Nimmalirra nimbaraga bagenzi bange, mugoroobe. Mwegarukemu. Ebi mbagambiire mubiteho omutima, mwikirranize, mwikale n'obusinge. Obu nubwo Ruhanga ow'engonzi kandi ow'obusinge aliikara na inywe.
47013012	Muramukyangane nimugwangana omu kifuba. Abantu ba Ruhanga boona nibabaramukya.
47013013	Embabazi za MUKAMA Yesu Kristo, okugonza kwa Ruhanga, n'okuteerana hamu kwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire biikalege na inywe inywena.
48001001	Nyowe Paulo omukwenda-ataratairweho bantu noobu kwakuba kutumwa omuntu, baitu ayakomerwe Yesu Kristo na Ruhanga Ise ayamuhumbwire omu bafu
48001002	na bagenzi baitu boona aba ndi nabo, nituhandiikira ebitebe by'abaikiriza abali Galatiya:
48001003	Nitubagondeza omugisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo,
48001004	ayayehaireyo kutujuna ebibi byaitu naatwiha omu businge bunu obubi nkooku Ruhanga Isiitwe yagondeze.
48001005	Ruhanga ogu aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro n'ebiro Amiina.
48001006	Nimpunirra kurora nimuruga bwango hali Ogu ayabeesire habw'embabazi za Kristo, nimwikiriza amakuru agandi.
48001007	Tikuli kugira ngu, haroho amakuru amarungi agandi, baitu haroho abamu abarukubatuntuza kandi nibenda kuramaza Amakuru Amarungi aga Kristo.
48001008	Kakuba itwe, rundi malaika anyakuruga omu iguru akabarangirra amakuru agandi agatali ago aga twabarangiriire kara, ogu akyenwe.
48001009	Nkooku twabagambiire kara, na hati nikyo ndukwongera kubagambira nti: Kakuba omuntu abarangirra amakuru amarungi agatali ago aga mwaikiriize, ogu akyenwe.
48001010	Mara nyowe ninserra kusiimwa abantu Ruhanga? Rundi si ningenderra abantu basiime ebi ndukukora? Obu naakubaire ninkyakora ebirukusiimwa abantu, tinaakubaire muheereza wa Kristo.
48001011	Nahabweki bagenzi bange, ninyenda mumanye ngu, Amakuru Amarungi aga narangiriire tigarugire mu bantu.
48001012	Nyowe ntagaheebwe muntu kandi ntageegesebwe, baitu nkagasuukulirwa Yesu Kristo.
48001013	Na inywe mukahurra eby'obwomeezi bwange obwabandize, nkyali omu diini ey'Ekiyudaaya: nkooku naahiiganiize muno ekitebe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga, ninyekamba kukihwerekeeza.
48001014	Kandi nkeeyongera muno omu diini ey'Ekiyudaaya, nakira baingi omu bantu ab'ihanga lyange aba nainganaga nabo emyaka, nkeekambira muno emirwa ey'abaisenkuru itwe.
48001015	Baitu ayansoroire ntakazairwe, yanyeta habw'embabazi ze,
48001016	akasiima okunsuukurra Omwana we, nukwo nsobole kumurangirra omu Banyamahanga, nteehanuuze abantu,
48001017	kandi ntagende Yerusaalemu kwehanuuza hali abo abambandize kuba bakwenda; baitu nkagenda Arabiya, hanyuma nagaruka Damasiko.
48001018	Obu haahingwireho emyaka esatu, nagenda Yerusaalemu kurora Keefa, namara nawe ebiro ikumi na bitaano.
48001019	Ntarole n'omu ha bakwenda abandi kwihaho Yakobbo, mugenzi wa Mukama waitu.
48001020	(Omuli ebi ndukubahandiikira, nindahira omu maiso ga Ruhanga nkooku ntarukubiiha bisuba!)
48001021	Nubwo naagenda omu bicweka bya Siriya na Kilikiya.
48001022	Obu, ebitebe by'abaikiriza Kristo ab'omu Bayudaaya bakaba batakandoraga;
48001023	kyonka bakahurra abantu nibagamba bati: “Ogu ayatuhiiganizaaga, hati nuwe arukurangirra enyikiriza ei yalengahoga ira kuhwerekereza.”
48001024	Nukwo bbo kukugiza Ruhanga habwange.
48002001	Kandi obu haahingwireho emyaka ikumi n'ena, nkagaruka Yerusaalemu hamu na Baranaba, naatwara na Tito.
48002002	Ekyantwaireyo nukwo kusuukururwa, nasoborra abakwenda Amakuru Amarungi aga ndangirra Abanyamahanga (nagasoborra omu nsita kandi omu maiso g'abo abakaba bali baarangaanwa muli bo) ntaikara kuba nk'arukwirukira busa rundi ayairukiire busa.
48002003	Kandi na Tito ou nkaba nyinawe, atahambirizibwe kusarwa noobwakubaire yali Mugiriiki.
48002004	Baitu eky'okusarwa kikaleetwa bagenzi baitu ab'ebisuba abaatutaahiremu tutamanyire, batate obugabe bwaitu obu twina omu Kristo Yesu, nukwo batugarre omu bwiru.
48002005	Abo tutaboorobere naakake konka, nukwo amazima g'Amakuru Amarungi gasobole kulindwa habwanyu gatahindukire.
48002006	Kandi hali abo abakaba bali baarangaanwa omuli bo, (okurangaanwa kwabu oku nyowe ntakufeeho, habwokuba Ruhanga tasoroora)-ningamba nti: Abo abakaba nibarangaanwa muli bo tibaina eki baayongiireho kumpabura.
48002007	Kimu kyonka bakamara kwetegereza nkooku nakwasiibwe Amakuru Amarungi kugarangirra abatasazirwe, nka Petero oku yagakwasiibwe habw'abasazirwe.
48002008	(Ningira ogu ayasoboize Petero okuhikya obukwenda ha basazirwe, nuwe yasoboize nyowe kubuhikya ha Banyamahanga.)
48002009	Yakobbo, Keefa, na Yohaana abakaba bamanyirwe nkooku bali nyomyo z'ekitebe, obu baayetegeriize omugisa ogu nahairwe, bakaikirraniza na nyowe nibagamba ngu, itwe na Baranaba tugende omu Banyamahanga, kandi bbo bagende omu basazirwe.
48002010	Kyonka eki baatuteeriire nukwo kwijuka abanaku, eki na nyowe nikyo natahoga omutima kukora.
48002011	Baitu Keefa obu yahikire Antyokiya nkamuhakaniza nimmugambira burole, habwokuba akazooka asobeze muno.
48002012	Abantu abamu abaatumirwe Yakobbo obu bakaba batakaizire, uwe yalyaga n'Abanyamahanga. Baitu obu bamazire kwija, yayehinya, yabeecwaho habw'okutiina ab'ekitebe ky'abasazirwe.
48002013	Abayudaaya abandi nabo bakahondera obucwangya bwe; nangwa na Baranaba yabagenderamu.
48002014	Baitu obu naboine batarukugendera ha mazima ag'Amakuru Amarungi, nagambira Keefa omumaiso g'abo boona nti: “Baitu iwe Omuyudaaya, obu oraaba noohondera engeso z'Abanyamahanga otarukukora nk'Omuyudaaya, osobora ota kuhambiriza Abanyamahanga kuhondera engeso ez'Abayudaaya?”
48002015	Itwe abaasazirwe, tuli Bayudaaya nyakabara, tituli Banyamahanga abasiisi.
48002016	Kandi tumanyire omuntu nkooku atahikirizibwa kworobera Ebiragiro, baitu ahikirizibwa okwikiriza Yesu Kristo; kandi na itwe tukaikiriza Yesu Kristo, nukwo tuhikirizibwe Ruhanga habw'okwikiriza Kristo, hatali kworobera Ebiragiro. Ningira busaho muntu alihikirizibwa okworobera Ebiragiro.
48002017	Nangwa na itwe noobu turaaba nitwekambira okuhikirra habw'okwikiriza Kristo, nabwo tukyali basiisi. Nukwo kugamba ngu, Kristo nuwe muleesi w'ebibi? Nikikafuuhe!
48002018	Nyowe kakuba ningaruka hati kwombeka ebi naseesire ira, buli ninkigumya nkooku nkaba ncwire Ebiragiro.
48002019	Habwokuba omu Biragiro nkaba nfiire; gamba Ebiragiro nibyo byanyisire, nukwo nyongere nyomeere hali Ruhanga.
48002020	Nkabambwa ha musaraba hamu na Kristo; takyali nyowe arukwomeera, baitu Kristo nuwe arukwomerra omuli nyowe. Kandi obwomeezi obu nyinabwo hati omu mubiri, nyinabwo habw'okwikiriza Omwana wa Ruhanga ayangondeze kandi yayehayo habwange.
48002021	Tindukwija kunagaija mbabazi za Ruhanga; habwokuba obuhikiriire obu buliba bwarabire omu Biragiro, buli Kristo akafeera busa.
48003001	Inywe Abagalatiya abadoma! Nooha ayabarogere? Inywe abayolekerwe bwerebwere Kristo nkooku yabambirwe ha musaraba!
48003002	Kambakaguze kimu kyonka: Mukaheebwa Mwoyo habw'okuhikiriza Ebiragiro rundi habw'okwikiriza Amakuru Amarungi aga mwahuliire?
48003003	Muli badomakwo? Mukatandika omu Mwoyo, hati nimwija kumalirra omu mubiri?
48003004	Ebingi byona ebi mwarabiremu, mukabigumiisiririza busa? Obu kiraaba kiri kiti, mazimakwo mukagumiisiririza busa.
48003005	Ruhanga anyakubaha Mwoyo kandi akakorra ebyamahano omuli inywe, ebi si abibakorra nukwo muhikirize Ebiragiro rundi Amakuru Amarungi aga mwahuliire?
48003006	Abburahamu nawe nukwo “yaikiriize ati Ruhanga, kandi kyamubalirwa kuba muhikiriire.”
48003007	Nahabweki nimurora abaikiriza nkooku nubo bali baana b'Abburahamu.
48003008	Kandi Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera obu byarangire kara nkooku Ruhanga alihikiriza Abanyamahanga habw'okwikiriza, byamanyisa Abburahamu, Amakuru Amarungi ganu gatakabaireho, nibigamba biti: “Omuli iwe amahanga goona numwo galiheerwa omugisa.”
48003009	Nukwo kiti abo abaina okwikiriza baheebwa omugisa nk'ogwa Abburahamu ayaikiriize ira.
48003010	Boona abeesiga okworobera Ebiragiro, bali b'okukyenwa; habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Weena atakwata byona ebihandiikirwe omu kitabu kyebiragiro kandi akabihikya ogu akyeenwe!”
48003011	Baitu nikizookera kimu nkooku hataroho muntu ahikirra omumaiso ga Ruhanga habw'Ebiragiro; habwokuba: “Ogu anyakuhikirizibwa okwikiriza, nuwe alyomeera.”
48003012	Ebiragiro tibisigikira ha kwikiriza: “Habwokuba ogu anyakuhikiriza Ebiragiro, nibyo birimwomeeza.”
48003013	Baitu Kristo akatucungura yatwiha omu mukyeno gw'Ebiragiro obu yafookere mukyenwa habwaitu habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Weena anyakuhanikwa ha muti, buli akyenerwe.”
48003014	Eki kikakorwa kiti, nukwo omu Kristo Yesu omugisa gw'Abburahamu gusobole kuhikaho Abanyamahanga, na itwe habw'okwikiriza tusobole kutunga Mwoyo ou twaraganiziibwe.
48003015	Bagenzi bange, kambahe ekyokurorraho ekya buli kiro. Tiharoho anyakudibya engwetano y'omuntu noobwakubaire kugyongeraho, emazire kuteebwaho omukono.
48003016	Nukwo ebyaraganiziibwe, Ruhanga akabiraganiza Abburahamu n'omwijukuru we. Hatali kugamba ngu: “N'abaijukuru”, nk'abaingi; baitu nikigamba hali omu, kiti: “N'omwijukuru waawe.” Ogu nuwe Kristo.
48003017	Eki ndukumanyisa nikyo kinu: Ebiragiro ebyaizire haahingwireho emyaka bikumi bbina n'asatu, tibirukudibya endagaano Ruhanga ei yagumize ira, kandi tibirukuburanganiza ekyaraganizibwe.
48003018	Habwokuba obugwetwa, obu buraaba buroho habw'Ebirago, nibuba butakyali bw'endagaano; baitu Ruhanga akabuheera Abburahamu omu ndagaano.
48003019	Hati nu, Ebiragiro bikateerwaho ki? Bikateebwaho habw'okusiisa kw'abantu, okuhika omwijukuru ayahairwe endagaano egi, obu aliija. Kandi Ebiragiro ebi bikarangirirwa bamalaika nibaraba omu muteeraniza (nuwe Musa).
48003020	Omuteeraniza abaho habw'abaingi, baitu Ruhanga ali omu.
48003021	Aho nu Ebiragiro nibihakaniza Ruhanga ebi yaraganiize? Naakake konka. Kakuba twahairwe Ebiragiro ebisobora kwomeeza, mazimakwo obuhikiriire bwakurugure omu Biragiro.
48003022	Baitu Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera, ebi byona bikabibarra omu bwiru bw'ekibi, nukwo eki ekyaraganiziibwe habw'okwikiriza Yesu Kristo, kiheebwe abo abamwikiriza.
48003023	Nukwo nu, okwikiriza obu kukaba kutakaizire, tukaba nitulemwa Ebiragiro. Tukaikara nitulemwa tuti okuhika okwikiriza obu kwatusuukuliirwe.
48003024	Habweki, Ebiragiro bikatulinda okuhika Kristo obu yaizire, nukwo tusobole kuhikirizibwa okwikiriza.
48003025	Baitu hati okwikiriza obu kwizire, titukyalemwa omulinzi ogu owa ira;
48003026	habwokuba inywena muli baana ba Ruhanga omu Kristo Yesu habw'okwikiriza.
48003027	Baingi omuli inywe nkooku mwabatiziibwe omu Kristo, hati nimusisanira kimu Kristo omu ngeso ze.
48003028	Tihakyaroho Muyudaaya rundi Mugiriiki, tihakyaroho mwiru rundi ow'obugabe, tihakyaroho musaija rundi omukazi; habwokuba inywena muli kimu omu Kristo Yesu.
48003029	Obu muraaba muli ba Kristo, muli baijukuru b'Abburahamu, bagwetwa nkooku endagaano erukugamba.
48004001	Eki ndukugenderra nkinu: omugwetwa, obu aba akiri mwana muto, taina eki akiza omwiru, kandi kunu nuwe aliba mukama w'ebintu byona.
48004002	Baitu aikara naaroleererwa abaleezi n'abakuza okuhika ha kasumi ise yataireho.
48004003	Na itwe nukwo tuli tuti. Obu tukaba tuli abaana bato, twalemwaga embandwa za kara ez'ensi.
48004004	Baitu akasumi obu kaahikire, Ruhanga yatuma Omwana we, ayazairwe omukazi. Akazaarwa naalemwa Ebiragiro,
48004005	nukwo acungule abo abaalemwaga Ebiragiro, tusobole kufoorwa baana b'omu ka ya Ruhanga.
48004006	Kandi itwe, habw'okuba baana, Ruhanga akatuma Mwoyo wa Mwana we omu mitima yaitu nayamirra ati: “Abba! Isiitwe!”
48004007	Nahabweki tokyali mwiru, baitu oli mwana, kandi nkooku oli mwana, buli oli mugwetwa, nukwo Ruhanga naija kukuha ebi ayaahurra abaana be.
48004008	Kara obu mukaba mutamanyire Ruhanga, mwali bairu b'ebitaroho;
48004009	baitu hati nkooku murukumanya Ruhanga kandi nawe naabamanya, musobora muta kugarukira embandwa eza ira ezitaina maani kandi ensungamirizi? Nimwenda kwefoora bairu baazo obwakabiri?
48004010	Inywe abarukuta omutima ha biro, ha meezi, ha busumi, na ha myaka!
48004011	Ninsaalirwa kurora nkooku, natalibaniire busa habwanyu.
48004012	Bagenzi bange nimbeesengereza, mube nka nyowe; habwokuba na nyowe nkeefoora nka inywe. Timwina kabi aka mwankoliire.
48004013	Kandi mukimanyire kurungi ngu, endwara yange egi, niyo yandeeteriize kubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi omurundi gw'okubanza.
48004014	Endwara egi noobu eraaba yabatalibaniize, baitu mutannuge kandi mutanyekanase. Kyonka mukanjwahukirra nka malaika wa Ruhanga, rundi nka Kristo Yesu wonyini.
48004015	Okusemererwa oku mwagizire omu mitima yanyu kukagya nkaha? Nyowe ningumya nti: Mwakubaire mweihiremu amaiso ganyu mugampa, kakuba kyasobokere.
48004016	Mara hati nfookere munyanzigwa wanyu habw'okubagambira amazima?
48004017	Abantu abo babahaahira kwonka, baitu tibabagondeza birungi. Benda kubaanyahukanizaho, nukwo na inywe mubagonze.
48004018	Kirungi kugonzebwa abantu habw'ebi murukukora, baitu leka babagonze butoosa, hatali kubasoonasoona obu mba ndi na inywe bwonka.
48004019	Niinywe baana bange, aba ngarukire kusaalirirwa nk'omukazi arukuzaara, okuhika Kristo obu araatondeka omuli inywe.
48004020	Naakugondeze kuba na inywe hati, nukwo mpingiseho emigambire yange, habwokuba nintuntura muno habwanyu.
48004021	Inywe abarukwenda kulemwa Ebiragiro, kinu mukingambire: Timuhurra Ebiragiro ebi bigamba?
48004022	Ningira kikahandiikwa kiti: Abburahamu akaba aina abatabani babiri: omu akamuzaara ha muzaana, ondi yamuzaara ha mukazi ow'obugabe.
48004023	Baitu omwana w'omuzaana akazaarwa habw'endagaano eyakozirwe Ruhanga.
48004024	Amakuru g'ekyokurorraho eki nugo ganu: abakazi abo ababiri nibamanyisa endagaano ibiri. Omukazi omu akaruga ha rusozi Sinai, yazaara abaana b'obwiru; nuwe Hagari.
48004025	Habwokuba Sinai nurwo rusozi oruli omunsi ya Arabbiya; kandi Hagari naasisanizibwa na Yerusaalemu orw'ebiro binu, na hati ali omu bwiru hamu n'abaana be'
48004026	Baitu Yerusaalemu orw'omwiguru, nurwo mukazi w'obugabe kandi nurwo nyinaitwe.
48004027	Nimwijuka nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Kyanganuka iwe engumba, etazaara; haguka, otoke iwe atakakwatwaga bisa eby'okuzaara; habwokuba omukazi ayanagaizirwe aina abaana baingi okukira anyakwikara na musaija we.”
48004028	Hati bagenzi bange, na itwe tuli baana abaaraganizibwe nka Isaaka.
48004029	Baitu oli ayazairwe habw'okwegomba kw'omubiri omu kasumi kali, nkooku yahiiganiize ondi ayazairwe habwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, na hati hoona nukwo kiri.
48004030	Ebihandiko Ebirukwera bigamba bita? Bigamba biti: “Binga omuzaana n'omwana we, habwokuba omwana w'omuzana taligwetwa hamu n'omwana w'omukazi ow'obugabe.”
48004031	Habweki bagenzi bange, tituli baana b'omuzaana, baitu tuli b'omukazi ow'obugabe.
48005001	Kristo akatwiha omu bwiru yatuha obugabe; nahabweki mugume, muleke kugaruka omu kikoligo ky'obwiru.
48005002	Hati nyowe Paulo nimbagambira nti: Kakuba musarwa, Kristo taina eki alisobora kubagasira.
48005003	Ninyongera kukigumya nti: Weena anyakwikiriza kusarwa, asemeriire kukwata Ebiragiro byona.
48005004	Baitu inywe abarukugonza kuhikirizibwa Ebiragiro, nimwebaganiza hali Kristo, mwaruga ha mbabazi ze.
48005005	Kandi itwe abarukwikiriza, tutegereza kandi tunihira kutunga obuhikiriire oburukuleetwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
48005006	Obu tuba tuli omu Kristo Yesu, okusarwa n'okutasarwa tikwina mugaso. Eky'omugaso nukwo kwikiriza okurukukozesibwa engonzi.
48005007	Mukaba nimugenda kurungi! Hati nooha ayabatangire kworobera amazima?
48005008	Okubiihabiihwa oku kutaruge hali ogu ayabeesire, nangwa.
48005009	Mwijuke ekitumbisa ekike nkooku kirukutumbisa ihyanga lyona.
48005010	Nimbeesiga omu Mukama nkooku mutarukwija kwikiriza ebindi ebitali byange. Kandi ogu arukubatuntuza, noobu araaba ali ata, baitu alicwerwa omusango.
48005011	Hati bagenzi bange, kakuba mba ninkyayegesa abantu kusarwa nkooku njunaanwa, habwaki bakyampiiganiza? Baitu obu kiraaba kiri kiti, enyegesa yange ey'omusaraba gwa Kristo eba etakyali nkonge.
48005012	Nyowe naakugondeze abo abarukubatuntuza beegoole bonka!
48005013	Bagenzi bange, inywe mukateerwa obugabe; kyonka obugabe bwanyu mutabufoora byekwaso by'okukora omubiri ebi gugonza, baitu muherezangane omu ngonzi.
48005014	Ningira Ebiragiro byona bihikirizibwa omu kiragiro ekigamba kiti: “Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.”
48005015	Baitu obu muraaba nimunenangana kandi nimulyangana, mwerinde mutamaranganaho.
48005016	Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Mugendege nimwebemberwa Mwoyo Ahikiire, muleke kutwalirizibwa omubiri ebi gwegomba.
48005017	Ebi omubiri gwegomba birwanisa Mwoyo, kandi Mwoyo ebi agonza birwanisa omubiri. Ebi byombi birwanisangana, nukwo mutasobora kukora ebi mwakugondeze.
48005018	Kakuba mwebemberwa Mwoyo, buli muba mutakyalemwa Biragiro bya Musa.
48005019	Ebikorwa by'omubiri nibyeyoleka, nibyo binu: obusiihani, eby'obuhemu, orwanju,
48005020	okuramya abacwezi, oburogo, enkungani obunyanzigwa, ihali, ekiniga, okwegonza, empaka, okweyahuranamu,
48005021	itima, obutamiizi, ebisimba by'obutamiizi, n'ebindi ebirukusisana biti. Nimbahabura nkooku nabahabwire kara, abo abakora ebintu nk'ebi, tibaligweterwa bukama bwa Ruhanga.
48005022	Baitu ebirungi ebinyakuzooka omu muntu anyakwina Mwoyo nibyo binu: engonzi, okusemererwa, obusinge, okugumiisiriza, embabazi, oburungi, obwesigwa,
48005023	obuculeezi n'okwetanga. Ebintu nk'ebi tibiina kiragiro ekirukubitanga.
48005024	Abantu ba Kristo Yesu, bakabamba ha musaraba omubiri gwabo n'okwegomba kwagwo okubi, hamu n'amairu gaagwo.
48005025	Obu turaaba nitwomeezibwa Mwoyo, leka nuwe atwebembere mu byona.
48005026	Baitu tuleke kwekuliriza, kwenderezangana, n'okugirrangana ihali.
48006001	Bagenzi bange, kakuba omuntu agwa omu nsobi, inywe abaina Mwoyo Ahikiriire mumwimukye n'omutima gw'embabazi. Mwerinde, na inywe timwikara kwohebwa muti.
48006002	Mujunangane obulemeezi bwanyu, nukwo muhikirize Ekiragiro kya Kristo.
48006003	Kakuba omuntu ayebara kuba w'omugaso, kandi kunu talikwo, aba naayebiiha.
48006004	Baitu leka buli omu ayekebiije ebikorwa bye, nukwo abe n'obulyo obw'okwenyumiza, hatali kwenyumiriza hali mutaahi we.
48006005	Habwokuba buli omu alyetweka omugugu gwe.
48006006	Leka ogu arukwega ekigambo kya Kristo, abagane ebirungi bye byona n'ogu arukumwegesa.
48006007	Muleke kubiihwabiihwa; Ruhanga tateburwa. Kyona omuntu eki asiga, nikyo aligesa.
48006008	Habwokuba ogu anyakusiga omu mubiri gwe, omu numwo aligesa okufa; baitu ogu anyakusiga omu Mwoyo wa Ruhanga, omu Mwoyo numwo aligesa obwomeezi obutahwaho.
48006009	Tuleke kugarukirra omu kukora ebirungi, habwokuba akasumi obu kalihika tuligesa, kusangwa tutaterebuka.
48006010	Nukwo nu, obu tukyaina omwanya, tukorre abantu boona ebirungi, kandi okukira muno abo ab'oruganda orw'abaikiriza.
48006011	Murole nkooku ndukubahandiikira omu nyuguta enkooto n'omukono gwange nyenka.
48006012	Abo abagonza okwezookesa kurungi omu by'omubiri, nubo babahambiriza kusarwa. Eki bagenderra kiri kimu kyonka ngu, baleke kuhiiganizibwa habw'omusaraba gwa Kristo.
48006013	Nangwa n'abaasazirwe abo bonyini nabo tibahikiriza Ebiragiro bya Musa; baitu bagonza inywe musarwe, nukwo basobole kwenyumiriza habw'emibiri yanyu.
48006014	Nikikafuuhe nyowe kwenyumiza, ntenyumiriize omu musaraba gwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, ogwaleetiire ensi kubambwa habwange, na nyowe kubambwa habwayo.
48006015	Okusarwa rundi okutasarwa tikwina mugaso, baitu eky'omugaso nukwo kufooka kihangwa ekihyaka.
48006016	Obusinge n'embabazi bibe hali boona abarukuhondera eki mbahabwire, nubo Abaisirairi ba Ruhanga.
48006017	Okuruga hati haleke kubaho n'omu arukuntuntuza; habwokuba nyowe nyina enkojo za Yesu ha mubiri gwange.
48006018	Bagenzi bange, omugisa gwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo gwikale na inywe. Amiina.
49001001	Nyowe Paulo, Omukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, Ruhanga nkooku yasiimire, nimpandiikira abantu abeesigwa ba Ruhanga abahindukiire Kristo omu Efeeso.
49001002	Nimbagondeza emigisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali MUKAMA Yesu Kristo.
49001003	Ahaisanizibwe Ruhanga, Ise MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, ayatuheeriire omu Kristo emigisa yoona ey'omwoyo enyakuruga omwiguru.
49001004	Ruhanga akatukomera omu Kristo ensi etakahangirwe, tube barukwera kandi abataina kamogo omumaiso ge.
49001005	Habw'okutugonza akatukoma kara tufooke baana be omu Kristo Yesu, entegeka ye nkooku ekaba eri.
49001006	Eki akakikora nukwo tusiime embabazi ze ez'ekitiinisa ezi yatugiririire busa omu Mugonzibwa we.
49001007	Omuli uwe numwo tucungulirwa habw'okufa kwe, tuganyirwa ensobi zaitu habw'embabazi ze enyingi
49001008	ezi yatugiriire.
49001009	Omu magezi goona n'omu kwetegereza kwona Ruhanga akatumanyisa entegeka ei yasiimire, niyo nsita ei yatwolekiire omu Kristo.
49001010	Kandi niyo entegeka ey'okuteeraniza ebintu byona omu Kristo: eby'omwiguru n'eby'omu nsi, akasumi obu kalihika.
49001011	Itwe Abayudaaya abaabandize kunihira omu Kristo, tukasoroorwa, twakomwa,
49001012	ka twikale nituhaisaniza ekitiinisa ky'ogu anyakuhikiriza byona, Ruhanga nkooku ategeka kandi asiima.
49001013	Na inywe Abanyamahanga abaahuliire ekigambo eky'amazima, nugo Amakuru Amarungi ag'okujunwa kwanyu omuli uwe, mukaikiriza, mwateebwaho emanyikirizo ya Myoyo Ahikiriire ayaraganiziibwe.
49001014	Mwoyo ogu nuwe musimbo ogw'obugwetwa bwaitu okuhika obu tulibutunga, nukwo ekitiinisa kye kihaisanizibwe.
49001015	Nahabweki obu mpuliire nkooku murukwikiriza MUKAMA Yesu kandi nkooku murukugonza abaikiriza boona,
49001016	tindukulekerra kusiima Ruhanga habwanyu, nimbaijuka omu kusaba kwange.
49001017	nukwo Ruhanga wa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, Isiitwe ow'ekitiinisa abahe omwoyo ogw'amazima n'ogw'okwetegereza ebyasuukwirwe, nukwo mumumanye.
49001018	Obu alimara kumulikira emitima yanyu musobole kumanya amakuru ag'okunihira oku yabeetiire n'obwingi obw'obugwetwa obw'ekitiinisa obu yaraganiize abantu be,
49001019	n'amaani ge agatalengwa agarukukorra omuli itwe abaikiriza. Nugo gamu n'amaani ge
49001020	aga yayolekiire omu Kristo, obu yamuhumbwire omu bafu, yamwikaliza ha mukono ogw'obulyo omu biikaro eby'omwiguru.
49001021	Oku nuho Kristo ategekera ebitebe byona eby'abamalaika abakuru, n'ab'obusobozi, ab'amaani n'abalemi, rundi ekikubyo ekindi kyona, tihali omu biro binu byonka, baitu n'omu biro ebiriija.
49001022	Ebintu byona Ruhanga akabita hansi y'ebigere bye, kandi yamufoora mutwe gw'ekitebe kyona ky'abaikiriza.
49001023	Ekitebe eki nugwo mubiri gwe, okuhikirra kwa Kristo anyakuhikiriza byona omu boona.
49002001	Kandi na inywe akabomeeza bu mukaba mufeeriire omu nsobi n'omu bibi,
49002002	ebi mwakoraga ira nimuhondera emihanda y'ensi enu, nimukuraatira omukuru ow'emyoyo emibi ey'omu mwanya gw'iguru, hati nugwo mwoyo ogurukukorra omu baana entahurra.
49002003	Ira na itwe tukaba tubarumu nitukuraatira okwegomba okw'omubiri, nitukora ebi ebyegombwa omubiri n'ebiteekerezo byaitu. Nahabweki omu buzaaranwa tukaba tuli bantu b'okukyenwa Ruhanga nk'abandi boona.
49002004	Baitu Ruhanga ow'embabazi nyingi, habw'engonzi ezitagambwa ezi yatugondezeemu,
49002005	noobu tukaba tuferiire omu nsobi zaitu, baitu akatwomeeza hamu na Kristo, (embabazi ze nizo zaabajunire).
49002006	Akatuhumbuura nawe, yatwikaliza hamu omu biikaro eby'omu iguru,
49002007	nukwo omu businge obuliija asobole kwoleka obwingi bw'embabazi ze habw'ebirungi ebi arukutukorra omu Kristo Yesu.
49002008	Inywe mukaikiriza mwajunwa habw'embabazi za Ruhanga. Eki mutakyekorre inywenka, baitu kisembo kya Ruhanga.
49002009	Atakibahe habw'ebi mwakozire, haleke kubaho arukwenyumiza.
49002010	Habwokuba nuwe yatubumbire. Tukahangirwa omu Kristo Yesu nukwo tukole ebikorwa ebirungi Ruhanga ebi yategekere kara. Nibyo twikalege nitukora.
49002011	Habweki, inywe Abanyamahanga omu buzaarwa, mwijuke abo abaakozirweho kara omukoro ogw'okusarwa omubiri nkooku baabeetaga abatasazirwe.
49002012	Kandi mwijuke omu kasumi ako nkooku mukaba mutaina Kristo, mwahukaine n'oruganda rwa Isirairi, mutaina bukwatane n'endagaano ezaaraganizibwe, mutaina kunihira kandi mutaina Ruhanga omu nsi enu.
49002013	Baitu hati, habwa Kristo Yesu, inywe abakaba bali hara muno, esagama ye ebairiize haihi,
49002014	habwokuba nuwe businge bwaitu, ayatufoire itwembi Abayudaaya n'Abanyamahanga kuba omu. Kandi nuwe yaseesire ekisiika eky'obunyanzigwa ekyatubaganizaaga.
49002015	Akahayo omubiri gwe okudibya Ebiragiro n'ebindi ebyatairweho, nukwo omu Banyamahanga n'omu Bayudaaya ahangemu omuntu omuhyaka, kandi omuli uwe abakaba bali babiri abafoole muntu omu, naagarra ati obusinge,
49002016	Kandi itwembi atugarukanganizemu na Ruhanga, tube mubiri gumu habw'omusaraba nambere yahwerekeriize obunyanzigwa.
49002017	Akaija yarangirra obusinge hali inywe abakaba bali hara, na hali abo abakaba bali haihi;
49002018	habwokuba itwembi abaina Mwoyo omu, turaba omu Kristo kuhika hali Isiitwe.
49002019	Nukwo nu, timukyali banyamahanga rundi bagonyi, baitu muli abaikazi hamu n'abantu ba Ruhanga boona, kandi muli b'omuka ya Ruhanga.
49002020	Muli kicweka ky'ekyombeko ekirukwombekwa ha musingi gw'abakwenda n'abarangi. Kristo Yesu niryo ibaale erikuru ery'obugumizo bw'enju.
49002021	Omuli uwe nuho ekyombeko kyona kiteeranirizibwa kifooka Enju erukwera ya Ruhanga, nambere MUKAMA asinga.
49002022	Omuli uwe, na inywe numwo mwombekiirwe omunju nambere Ruhanga aikara hamu na Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
49003001	Nahabweki, nyowe Paulo omunyankomo wa Kristo Yesu habwanyu Abanyamahanga
49003002	ningumya mumanyire nkooku nahairwe obukeeto bw'embabazi za Ruhanga ezi nakwasiibwe habwanyu.
49003003	Nkamanyisibwa ensita egi omu kusuukulirwa, nkooku ndugire kubasoborra omu bigufu.
49003004	Obu muraabisoma nimwija kumanya nkooku nyetegeriize ensita ya Kristo.
49003005	Niyo nsita etaramanyirwe bantu ab'akasumi akandi, nkooku hati Mwoyo Ahikiriire agisuukuliire abakwenda be abarukwera n'abarangi.
49003006	Nukwo kugamba ngu, Abanyamahanga nabo bali bagwetwa hamu na itwe, bicweka by'omubiri gumu, nibabagana ebyaraganiziibwe Kristo Yesu omu Makuru Amarungi,
49003007	Ekisembo eky'embabazi Ruhanga ezi yangiriire, habw'amaani ge agarukukorra omuli itwe, nikyo kyanfoire muheereza w'Amakuru Amarungi ago.
49003008	Nyowe obu ndaaba ndi w'okumalirra omu bantu be boona, baitu nkaheebwa omugisa ogw'okumanyisa Abanyamahanga ebirungi byona ebya Kristo, ebirungi ebitakira kwetegerezibwa.
49003009	N'okumanyisa abantu boona entegeka ey'ensita ye eyaserekerwe kuruga kara omu Ruhanga, ayahangire byona.
49003010	Nukwo hati abamalaika abalemi n'ab'obusobozi abali omu biikaro eby'omwiguru basobora kurorra ha kitebe ky'abaikiriza amagezi goona aga Ruhanga.
49003011	Eki akakitegeka kuruga kara koona kandi yakihikiririza omu Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu,
49003012	ou tutungiramu obumanzi n'obwesige obutuhikya hali Ruhanga habw'okwikiriza.
49003013	Nukwo nu, nimbasaba muleke kuterebuka habw'emihito ei ndukubona habwanyu, emihito egi neebahaisa ekitiinisa.
49003014	Habw'obulyo obu, ninteereza Isiitwe amaju
49003015	nambere haruga enganda zoona ez'omwiguru n'omunsi,
49003016	kandi nimmusaba habw'ekitiinisa kye ekingi emitima yanyu agigumye n'amaani ga Mwoyo we.
49003017	Nukwo Kristo ogu aikale omu mitima yanyu habw'okumwikiriza Na inywe obu mulikamara kuhamira kimu kandi mukagumibwa omu ngonzi,
49003018	nubwo mulisobora okwetegereza hamu n'abahikiriire boona: obugazi, obura okugenda ha iguru, n'okuhama kw'engonzi ze.
49003019	Ego, kandi n'okumanya engonzi za Kristo ezitasobora kwetegerezibwa magezi g'abantu, nukwo mwijurre kimu Ruhanga.
49003020	Ogu anyakusobora kukora bingi kukira byona ebi tumusaba rundi ebi tuteekereza,
49003021	aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro byona omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza n'omu Kristo Yesu, ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
49004001	Habweki, nyowe omunyankomo habwa MUKAMA, nimbeesengereza: mube n'engeso ezinyakusemeriire omulimo ogu mwayetiirwe,
49004002	nimwebundaaza muno kandi nimuculeera, nimugumiisiriza kandi nimuganyirangana habw'engonzi,
49004003	nimutaho omutima kugumya obumu bwa Myoyo Ahikiriire anyakututeeraniza omu businge.
49004004	Haroho omubiri gumu na Mwoyo omu, nkooku mwina okunihira kumu oku mwayetiirwe.
49004005	MUKAMA ali omu, enyikiriza eri emu, okubatiza kumu.
49004006	Ruhanga nuwe omu kandi Ise boona, anyakukira boona, anyakukora omu boona kandi anyakuli omu boona.
49004007	Baitu buli omu omuli itwe akaheebwa ebisembo nkooku Kristo omu mbabazi ze yamulengiire.
49004008	Nikyo kyagambiirwe kiti: “Obu yatembere omwiguru, akeebembera ihe ly'abo aba yaihire omu bunyagwa, kandi yabaha ebisembo.”
49004009	(Okugamba ngu: “Akatemba”, nikimanyisa ki? Tikirukumanyisa ngu, nawe akabanza kusirimuka okuzimu?
49004010	Ogu ayasirimukire, nuwe omu ayatembere yahingura iguru lyona nukwo aijule hoona hoona.)
49004011	Ebisembo bye akabigaba ati: Abamu babe bakwenda, abamu barangi, abamu barangirizi b'Amakuru Amarungi, abamu baliisa kandi beegesa.
49004012	Ebi nibyo bisembo abaikiriza ebi beetaaga habw'omulimo ogw'obuheereza nukwo bombeke omubiri gwa Kristo
49004013	okuhika itwena obu tulikatunga enyikiriza emu n'okumanya Omwana wa Ruhanga, tukakura kuhika ha bukuru bwonyini obw'orulengo oruhikire orw'obukuru bwa Kristo.
49004014	Nukwo tulekere aho kuba baana abarukutwarwa hanu na hali, abarukuzongazongibwa omuyaga ogwa buli nyegesa enyakuruga omu bukurungutaniza obw'abantu n'omu bucwangya bwabu obw'ebisuba.
49004015	Baitu katubaze aby'amazima ebinyakurumu engonzi. Nukwo tukule omu miringo yoona, tube nk'ogu anyakuli omutwe, nuwe Kristo,
49004016	anyakuteeraniza kandi yasumiikaniza buli rugiga rwona omubiri oru rwahairwe. Nahabweki buli rugiga obu ruba nirukora kurungi, omubiri gukura kandi nigwombekwa omu ngonzi.
49004017	Hati kinu ninkigamba kandi ninkigumya omu MUKAMA nti: Mutongera kwikara nk'Abanyamahanga oku baikara, omu biteekerezo byabu ebitaina mugaso.
49004018	Amagezi gaabu gaswekeriirwe omwirima kandi baahukaniziibwe ha bwoomeezi bwa Ruhanga habw'obutamanya obu bainabwo, obunyakuruga omu kugumangana kw'emitima yabu.
49004019	Bakagumangana baayeheera kimu obusiihani, nibeegomba kukora ekibi kya buli mulingo.
49004020	Inywe, Kristo mutamwege muti,
49004021	rundi buli mukalemwa kumwetegereza kurungi obu mwayegesiibwe amazima agali omu Yesu.
49004022	Mucwe engeso zanyu eza ira ezi mwinazo ezisiisirwe okwegomba okubi okurukuhabisa.
49004023	Mufooke bahyaka omu biteekerezo byanyu n'omu mitima yanyu.
49004024	Mube n'obwomeezi obuhyaka Ruhanga obu arukubahangamu oburukuzookwamu obuhikiriire obw'amazima n'oburukwera.
49004025	Nahabweki mufuuhize kimu ebisuba, buli muntu abazeega amazima na mutaahi we, habwokuba tuli bicweka by'omubiri gumu.
49004026	Kakuba mukwatwa ekiniga, nwerinde mutaasiisa; mutalinaga izooba mukyaina ekiniga.
49004027	Kandi muteeretereza Sitaani mukamuha omwanya ogw'okuboohya.
49004028	Omusuma alekere aho kwiba. Haakire akozese emikono ye emirimo y'omugaso, nukwo asobole n'okugabira abaseege.
49004029	Ekigambo kyona ekibi kitaliruga omu kanwa kanyu. Mubazeege ebirungi byonka ebirukwombeka n'ebirukuhikaana n'ekintu eki muroho, nukwo kireetere omugisa abo abakihurra.
49004030	Kandi muleke kurumya Mwoyo Ahikiriire wa Ruhanga, habwokuba nuwe manyikirizo ei mwatairweho kwoleka nkooku muli ba Ruhanga okuhika ha kiro ky'okucungurwa.
49004031	Obunyanzigwa bwona, ekiniga, okubiihirwa, obwogo, okuhangirra n'itima lyona bibarugiremu kimu.
49004032	Mugirranganege embabazi, mube benda, muganyiranganege nkooku Ruhanga yabaganyiriire omu Kristo.
49005001	Nukwo nu, mwesisanizeege Ruhanga nk'abaana be abagonzibwa.
49005002	Mweyongere kugonzangana, Kristo nkooku yatugondeze, yayehayo habwaitu ali kihongwa ekirukuboya kurungi kandi kyonzira hali Ruhanga.
49005003	Baitu obusiihani, obugwagwa bwona, rundi okwegomba okubi tibisemeriire okugambwaho omuli inywe, habwokuba ebi tibisemeriire abantu ba Ruhanga.
49005004	Muleke embazo mbi, rundi embazo ez'obudoma, rundi ez'okusandaara okutahikire. Ebi byona tibibasemeriire.
49005005	Kinu mukimanyiire kimu, nkooku hataroho musiihani, rundi omugwagwa, rundi omwegombi (anyakufoora itungo lye embandwa y'okuramya) arukwija kugwetwa omu bukama bwa Kristo na Ruhanga.
49005006	Mutaikiriza muntu weena kubabiihabiiha n'ebigambo ebitarumu nsa, habwokuba ebi nibyo Ruhanga asigikiraho kukayukira abantu abatamuhurra.
49005007	Nahabweki muleke kuteerana nabo;
49005008	habwokuba ira mukaba muli omu mwirima, baitu hati muli omu musana gwa MUKAMA; mugendege nk'abaana b'omusana.
49005009	(Nambere hali musana nuho hasangwa ebirungi byona, ebihikire kandi eby'amazima.)
49005010	Mwekambire kumanya MUKAMA ebi arukugonza.
49005011	Muteetaba omu bikorwa by'omwirima ebitaina mugaso, baitu mubyoleke bwere bwere.
49005012	Habwokuba ebi bakora omu nsita, bikwasa ensoni n'okubibazaaho;
49005013	baitu ekintu kyona ekirukuturukibwa omu musana kizooka; habwokuba kyona ekizooka kifooka omusana.
49005014	Nikyo kyagambiirwe kiti: “Sisiimuka iwe anyakugwijagiire, kandi ohumbuuke omu bafu, nubwo Kristo araakumulikira.”
49005015	Nahabweki mwerinde muno ebi murukukora, mutaba nk'abantu abataina magezi, baitu mube b'amagezi.
49005016	Mukozese kurungi obusumi obu mwinabwo habwokuba ebiro binu bibi.
49005017	Nukwo nu muleke kuba badoma, baitu mwetegereze MUKAMA ebi arukwenda.
49005018	Kandi muleke kutaamira amarwa, habwokuba galeeta okwenagiriza; baitu mwijule Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
49005019	Nambere mwesorooleza, muzinire hamu zabbuli, ebizina, n'eby'okuhaisaniza Ruhanga, nimuzinira MUKAMA kandi nimumukugiza n'emitima yanyu yoona.
49005020	Obutoosa n'omu byona musiimege Ruhanga Isiitwe, nimujurra ibara lya MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
49005021	Mworoberangane habw'okutamu Kristo ekitiinisa.
49005022	Baanyinabwenge, muhurrege baiba-inywe nkooku muhurra MUKAMA.
49005023	Habwokuba nyineeka nuwe mutwe gwa nyinabwenge nka Kristo oku ali mutwe gw'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, nugwo omubiri gwe, kandi nuwe Mujuni wakyo.
49005024	Ekitebe ky'abaikiriza nkooku kiremwa Kristo, nukwo na banyinabwenge balemwege bati baibabo omu byona.
49005025	Baanyinamaka mugonzeege bakazi banyu nka Kristo oku yagondeze ekitebe kye, yayehayo habwakyo,
49005026	nukwo asobole kukihikiriza amazire kukisemeza naakyogya n'amaizi ago hamu n'ekigambo ky'omurwa ogu.
49005027	nukwo akyereetere omu kitiinisa, kitaina kabara noobu gwakuba mugonya, rundi ekindi nk'eki; kiikale kiri kirukwera kandi kitaina kamogo.
49005028	Abasaija nabo nukwo basemeriire kugonza bakazi baabo nkooku bagonza emibiri yabo yonyini. Ogu anyakugonza mukazi we, buli aba ayegondeze wenka.
49005029	Busaho muntu aranobere omubiri gwe; baitu aguliisa kandi agurolerra muno nkooku Kristo arolerra ekitebe ky'abaikiriza.
49005030	Na itwe tuli bicweka by'omubiri gwe.
49005031	“Nikyo omusaija araalekeraga ise na nyina agumire hali mukazi we, kandi ababiri abo bafooke mubiri gumu.”
49005032	Enu niyo nsita nkuru, ei ndukugamba nti: Neemanyisa Kristo n'ekitebe kye.
49005033	Nukwo nu, buli omu omuli inywe agonze mukazi we nkooku ayegonza wenka, kandi n'omukazi atemuga iba ekitiinisa.
49006001	Abaana muhurrege abazaire banyu habwa MUKAMA, habwokuba kihikire.
49006002	“Otiinege sso na nyoko” eki nikyo kiragiro ky'okubanza ekyayongiirweho okunihiza ngu:
49006003	“Noija kuba kurungi n'okugundagunda omu nsi.”
49006004	Na inywe baise-baana muleke kubiihiza abaana banyu, baitu mubooroole omu ngeso nungi nimubeegesa ebya MUKAMA.
49006005	Abairu muhurrege bakama banyu ab'omunsi munu, nimutiina kandi nimwebundaaza n'omutima gumu nk'abarukuhurra Kristo.
49006006	Eki muleke kukikora obu baba babataireho eriiso, nk'abarukwenda kusiimwa abantu, baitu mukikole nk'abairu ba Kristo, nimukora Ruhanga ebi agonza n'omutima gumu.
49006007	Muheereze n'obwekambi nk'abarukukorra MUKAMA hatali bantu.
49006008	Kandi muheereze nimumanya ngu, buli kirungi kyona omuntu eki akora nikyo MUKAMA alimusasurra, noobu araaba ali mwiru rundi w'obugabe.
49006009	Na inywe bakama b'abairu nukwo mubakole muti, muleke kubakanga, mumanye ngu, MUKAMA waabo kandi owaanyu ali omwiguru kandi tasoroora.
49006010	Eky'okumalirra mube b'amaani omu MUKAMA, nimugumibwa obusobozi obw'amaani ge.
49006011	Mujwale eby'okurwanisa byona ebya Ruhanga, nukwo musobole kwemera obugobya bwa Sitaani.
49006012	Itwe titurukurwanisa abantu abaina omubiri n'esagama, baitu niturwanisa amahe ag'emyoyo emibi agali omu biikaro ebya ha iguru, emyoyo ey'abakuru, ey'ab'obusobozi, n'ey'abarukulema ensi enu ey'omwirima.
49006013	Habweki mukwate eby'okurwanisa byona ebya Ruhanga, nukwo musobole kwemera ebiribaho ha kiro ekibi, kandi obu mulimara kukora byona, mwemerre mugumire.
49006014	Nahabweki, mwemerre mwetegere amazima omu nda, kandi mujwaire ha kifuba obuhikiriire nk'ekizibaho ky'ekyoma.
49006015	Mujwale enkaito omu bigere byanyu, mweteekaniize okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'obusinge.
49006016	Okukira byona, mukwate engabu y'okwikiriza ei musobora kuzimisa emyambi yoona ey'Omubi erukwaka omurro.
49006017	Mujwale enkofiira ey'ekyoma ey'okujunwa, kandi mukwate n'empirima eya Mwoyo Ahikiriire, nikyo kigambo kya Ruhanga.
49006018	Obutoosa musabege nimwesengereza Ruhanga okubakoonyera, kandi nimusabira omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire. Eki mukikolege obutalekerra, nimusabira abaikiriza boona,
49006019	kandi na nyowe munsabirege, nukwo ntunge ebi ndaagamba obu ndaabaga nindangirra n'obumanzi ensita ey'Amakuru Amarungi,
49006020	aga ndi ngabwa yago, mboherwe omu njegere; nukwo nsobole kugarangirra n'obumanzi nkooku kinsemeriire.
49006021	Tikiko mugenzi waitu omugonzibwa kandi omuheereza omwesigwa omu MUKAMA araabamanyisa byona; nukwo mumanye nkooku ndi, n'ebi ndukukora.
49006022	Nikyo mmutumiire, mumanye nkooku tuli, kandi abagarre omutima omu nda.
49006023	Obusinge n'engonzi hamu n'okwikiriza ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwa na MUKAMA Yesu Kristo bibe hali ab'oruganda boona.
49006024	Kandi Ruhanga agirre embabazi boona abagonza MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo n'engonzi ezitafa.
50001001	Nyowe Paulo na Timoteho, abaheereza ba Kristo Yesu, nituhandiikira abantu ba Ruhanga boona aba Filipi abali omu Kristo Yesu, hamu n'abaroleerezi n'abaheereza bunyu.
50001002	Nitubagondeza emigisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
50001003	Obu mbaijuka bwona, nsiima Ruhanga wange.
50001004	Kandi omu kusaba kwange kwa butoosa mbasabira inywena nyina omuhimbo.
50001005	Nyikara nimbasiima habw'okunkoonyera okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi okuruga ha kubanza okuhika na hati.
50001006	Kandi ngumiza kimu nti: Ruhanga ayatandikire omulimo omurungi omuli inywe, aligumaliriza ha Kiro Yesu Kristo nambere aligarukira.
50001007	Nyowe kimpikiriire okubateekerezaaho nti inywena. Ningira mbaikaza ha mutima, habwokuba inywena mubagana na nyowe ha migisa Ruhanga ei yampaire, obu mba ndi omu nkomo hanu rundi nindwanirra Amakuru Amarungi kandi ningagumya.
50001008	Ruhanga nuwe kaiso wange, amanyire nkooku mbainaho ekihika, nimbagonza nka Kristo Yesu oku abagonza.
50001009	Kandi eki ndukusaba nkinu: engonzi zanyu zigende nizeeyongera muno omu kumanya n'omu kwetegereza kwona,
50001010	nukwo musobole kusiima ebirukukirra kimu oburungi kandi muhike ha Kiro kya Kristo musemiire kandi mutaina kamogo,
50001011	mwijwire abikorwa by'obuhikiriire ebireetwa Yesu Kristo, nukwo muhaise Ruhanga ekitiinisa kandi mumunyumize.
50001012	Bagenzi bange, ninyenda mumanye ebyambaireho nkooku byakonyiire kwo kurarangya Amakuru Amarungi.
50001013	Kandi ekyarugiremu nukwo abaserikale abarukulinda ekikaali n'abandi boona kumanya nkooku naboherwe habwa Kristo.
50001014	Okukwatwa kwange kunu kukaleetera baingi muno omu bagenzi baitu kwesiga MUKAMA, bakeeyongera muno obumanzi obw'okwegesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga batarukutiina.
50001015	Mazimakwo abamu barangirra Kristo habw'ihali n'okuhakana; baitu abandi bamurangirra n'omutima murungi.
50001016	Abo bakikora habw'engonzi, nibamanya nkooku nakwasirwe habw'okurwanirra Amakuru Amarungi.
50001017	Baitu bali, barangirra Kristo habw'okurwanirra orubaju rwabu, hatali habw'amazima; kandi nibagenderra kunyongera obusaalizi ndi hanu omu nkomo
50001018	Hati, eki nikiita ki? Ekikuru kiri kimu kyonka, Kristo arangirirwe omu miringo yoona: rundi omu kwesisaniriza, rundi omu mazima. Ogu nugwo muhimbo gwange.
50001019	Ego, kandi ndaikaraga n'omuhimbo, habwokuba mmanyire okusaba kwanyu n'obukoonyezi bwa Mwoyo wa Yesu Kristo nkooku birindugiramu okutaisurwa.
50001020	Eki nikyo ndukutegereza n'ekihika kingi, kandi nikyo ndukunihira, nkooku ntalikwatwa nsoni naakake, baitu habw'obumanzi bwingi obu nyinabwo hati, kandi obu nabaire nabwo kara koona, Kristo araaheebwaga ekitiinisa omu mubiri gwange, nkyayomiire rundi nfire.
50001021	Habwange okwomeera ni Kristo, kandi okufa nugo magoba.
50001022	Okwikara omu mubiri gunu, obu kuraaba nikundugiramu okukora eby'omugaso, nabwo eki ndaakomaho kindemere.
50001023	Ebintu ebi ebibiri bindemeseze. Nyowe ekinakugondeze nukwo kuruga omunsi, ngende nyikale na Kristo; habwokuba eki nikyo kirukukiraho oburungi.
50001024	Baitu okwikara omu mubiri gunu, nikyo kirukukira kubagasira inywe.
50001025	Eki nkimanyiire kimu, nahabweki ninyija kwikara n'okwongera kuba nainywe, nukwo mweyongere omu kwikiriza n'omu kusemererwa.
50001026	Kandi obu ndigaruka kwija owaanyu, eki kiribakoonyera muno okuhaisa Kristo Yesu ekitiinisa.
50001027	Kyonka enyikara yanyu esemeriire kuhikaana n'Amakuru Amarungi ga Kristo, nukwo obu ndiija kubarora, rundi ntaizireyo, nsobole kuhurra nkooku mugumire mwina omwoyo gumu n'ebiteekerezo bimu, nimwekambira hamu habwokuba mukaikiriza Amakuru Amarungi,
50001028	mutarukutiinisibwa kintu kyona ekirukuleetwa abanyazigwa banyu. Eki nikiija kwolekera kimu bbo nkooku balihwerekerra, baitu inywe nkooku mulijunwa; kandi eki kiriruga hali Ruhanga.
50001029	Habwokuba mutaheebwe mugisa gw'okwikiriza Kristo kwonka, baitu n'ogw' okubonabonesibwa habwe,
50001030	nimurwana obulemu oburukusisana buli, obu mwarozire nindwana, kandi obu murukuhurra ninkyarwana na hati.
50002001	Nukwo nu, obu haraaba haroho okugumyangana omu Kristo, okwimukyangana okuleetwa engonzi, n'okukwataniza omu Mwoyo, rundi okuganyira n'okugirrangana enbabazi,
50002002	munyijuze omuhimbo mwina ebiteekerezo bimu, n'engonzi ez'omulingo gumu, nimwikirraniza omu byona n'omutima gumu.
50002003	Mutalikora kintu kyona habw'okwegonza rundi okwekuliriza, baitu mwebundaaze, nimumanya abandi nkooku barukubakira oburungi.
50002004	Buli omu hali inywe aleke kuta omutima hali ebi arukugonza wenka, baitu agute na ha birukugonzibwa abandi.
50002005	Omwoyo Kristo Yesu ogu akaba ainagwo, nugwo musemeriire kuba nagwo.
50002006	Uwe nobu araaba yasisanaaga Ruhanga, baitu okwingana kwe na Ruhanga atakire kukufaho.
50002007	Akeemaramu ekitiinisa yayefoora mwiru, yazaarwa nk'abantu.
50002008	Habw'okuzaarwa nk'omuntu, akeebundaaza kandi yaba muhulizi, kuhika ha kufa, nangwa n'okufa okwa ha musaraba.
50002009	Nikyo Ruhanga yamunyumiriize, yamuruka ibara erirukukira agandi goona.
50002010	Nukwo boona abanyakuli omu iguru, n'ab'omunsi, n'ab'okuzimu, obu bahurra ibara lya Yesu, bateeze amaju,
50002011	kandi buli rulimi rwatule Yesu Kristo nkooku ali Mukama, nukwo Ruhanga Ise aheebwe ekitiinisa.
50002012	Habweki, bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, nkooku mwabaire bahulizi kara, na hati nukwo mube, hatali kumpurra obu mba ndoho, baitu mukire kumpurra obu mba ntaroho, mwekambire okujunwa kwanyu nimutina kandi nimutukumira.
50002013	Habwokuba Ruhanga naakorra omuli inywe, naabakoonyera okugonza n'okuhikiriza ebi asiima.
50002014	Mukole ebintu byona mutarukutontorroma kandi mutarukuteera mpaka,
50002015	nukwo mube abataina musango kandi abeezibwe; abaana ba Ruhanga abataina kamogo hagati y'abantu ab'obusinge bunu oburamaire kandi obuhabire aba murukwakiramu nk'enyunyuuzi ezirukwakira ab'omu nsi,
50002016	nimugumiza kimu ebigambo by'obwomeezi. Nukwo ha Kiro kya Kristo nsobole kwenyumiza nkooku ntarairukiire busa, kandi ntaratalibaniire busa.
50002017	Esagama yange noobu eraaba eri y'okuseeswa ha kyonzira ekiruhongwa-nukwo okwikiriza kwanyu kweyongere, baitu ninsemererwa kandi ninkyanganuka hamu na inywe inywena.
50002018	Na inywe nukwo musemererwe muti kandi mukyanganuke hamu na nyowe.
50002019	Ninihira omu MUKAMA Yesu kubatumira bwango Timoteho, nukwo omutima gungwe omu nda mmazire kumanya amakuru g'owaanyu.
50002020	Tinyina ondi weena amwingana mu kutunturra muno obwomeezi bwanyu.
50002021	Abandi boona beeserurra ebyabu, bitali bya Yesu Kristo.
50002022	Baitu omugaso gwa Timoteho mugumanyire, habwokuba omu by'Amukuru Amarungi tukaheereza hamu nk'omwana oku arukukoonyera ise.
50002023	Nikyo ndukunihirra kumutuma ahonaaho, obu ndakarora ebyange nambere biraagarukira;
50002024	kandi ninyesiga MUKAMA ngu, na nyowe nyenka ndiija oku bwango.
50002025	Hati nyetegeriize nkooku kirukwetaagwa kubatumira Epafurodito mugenzi wange, omukozi kandi omuserikale nyakyaitu; nuwe mukwenda wanyu arukumpa ebi ndukwetaaga;
50002026	habwokuba inywena, abaire abainaho ekihika, kandi omutima gukamusarra kumanya nkooku mwahuliire eby'endwara ye.
50002027	Akarwarakwo mali, kake afe. Baitu Ruhanga akamugirra embabazi, atazigirre uwe wenka baitu na nyowe, nukwo obujune obu nyina buleke kunyongerwaho.
50002028	Nikyo ndukuteeraho muno omutima kumubatumaho, mukyanganuke habw'okugaruka kumurora, kandi na nyowe omutima gungaruke omunda.
50002029	Habweki, mumutangirre omu MUKAMA n'omuhimbo gwona; kandi abantu nk'abo mubatemuga ekitiinisa.
50002030	Ningira akaba ali haihi n'okufa habw'omulimo gwa Kristo, naahayo obwomeezi bwe okuhikiriza inywe ebi mwakunkolire.
50003001	Eky'okumalirra bagenzi bange, mukyanganuke omu MUKAMA. Na hati tikirukunjwahya kubahandiikira ebintu ebirukusisana na biri. Na inywe nikibaleetera obusinge.
50003002	Mwerinde embwa ezi! Mwerinde enkozi z'ebibi! Mwerinde abo abasara omubiri!
50003003	Itwe tuli abasazirwe b'amazima, Mwoyo nuwe atuhabura nkooku turaaramya Ruhanga. Okwenyumiza kwaitu kuli omu Kristo Yesu. Titwesiga emikoro ya ha mubiri.
50003004	Noobu baakujuliire emikoro egi, baitu nyowe tinyina eki ndukutiina. Obu buraaba buli bulyo obw'okwesiga emikoro ya ha mubiri, nooha araabunkiza?
50003005	Nkasarwa ha kiro kya munaana, ndi Omunyaisirairi, ow'oruganda rwa Benyamiini, Omuhebburaayo ayazairwe Abahebburaayo, kandi omu kukuraatira Ebiragiro, ndi Mufalisaayo.
50003006	Nkooleka obwekambi bwange nimpiiganiza ekitebe ky'abaikiriza. Omu kuhikirra okurukusigikira ha Biragiro, tinyina musango.
50003007	Ebirungi byona ebi natungire, nkabyeta kuferwa habwa Kristo.
50003008	Mazimakwo, ebintu byona nimbirora nk'ebitaina mugaso obu mbirengesaniza n'oburungi obw'okumanya Kristo Yesu MUKAMA wange. Habwe nkaikiriza kuferwa ebintu byona kandi mbirora nk'ebitaina mugaso, nukwo ntunge Kristo,
50003009	kandi nyikale omuli uwe. Tinkyaserra obuhikiriire bwange habwange obusigikira ha Biragiro, kwihaho obu oburukuleetwa okwikiriza Kristo. Nubwo obuhikiriire oburukuruga hali Ruhanga kandi oburukuleetwa okwikiriza kwaitu.
50003010	Eki ndukwenda nukwo kumanya Kristo n'okumanya amaani g'okuhumbuuka kwe, mbagane nawe omu kubonabonesibwa kwe, nsisane nawe n'omu kufa kwe.
50003011	Nukwo obu kiraaba nikisoboka, na nyowe mpike ha kuhumbuuka omu bafu.
50003012	Tindukugamba ngu, eki mmazire kukitunga; rundi ngu, mmazire kuhikirra; baitu ninyekamba kukyetungira, Kristo Yesu nkooku yanyetungire.
50003013	Bagenzi bange, tindukugira ngu, eki nkakyetungira; kwihaho eki ndukukora kiri kimu kyonka: nukwo kwebwa ebindi enyuma n'okwitanira ebindi omumaiso,
50003014	ninyekamba kuhika ha kigendererwa, nukwo ntunge empeera ey'omwiguru Ruhanga ei yanyetiire omu Kristo Yesu.
50003015	Abo abeetwa abakuru omuli itwe, nukwo tusemeriire kuteekereza tuti. Obu haba haroho ekintu eki murukuteekereza okundi, nakyo Ruhanga naija kukibasuukurra.
50003016	Kyonka nambere tuhikire, muho tugendere tutarukugarukirra.
50003017	Bagenzi bange mwikirranize kandi munkuraatire. Itwe nkooku tuli kyokurorraho kyanyu, mwetegereze abo abarukukora nka itwe.
50003018	Habwokuba baingi omu Baisirairi abo, aba nabagambiireho emirundi nyingi, na hati aba ndukubagambira ntaireho n'okurra, baikara bali banyanzigwa b'omusaraba gwa Kristo.
50003019	Empero yabo nukwo okuhwerekerra; ruhanga waabo niyo enda, kandi beenyumiriza ha bintu ebirukubahemura, emitima yabo bagimaliza ha bintu by'ensi.
50003020	Baitu itwe, obwikaro bwaitu buli omwiguru, nambere haliruga Omujuni, MUKAMA Yesu Kristo ou turukulindirra.
50003021	Nuwe alihindura emibiri yaitu etaina kitiinisa, esisane nk'ogwe ogw'ekitiinisa habw' amaani agamusoboza kulema ebintu byona.
50004001	Habweki nu, bagenzi bange, aba ngonza kandi aba nyinaho ekihika, okusemererwa kwange kandi ekondo yange, mugumire muti hali MUKAMA, inywe enganzi zange.
50004002	Ninyesengereza Evodiya na Sintike, baikirranize omu MUKAMA.
50004003	Kandi na iwe mugenzi wange mali, ninkusaba okoonyere abakazi abo, habwokuba tukatalibanira hamu okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi, kandi nimbabara na Kelementi n'abakozi abandi bagenzi bange ab'amabara gaabu gali omu kitabu eky'obomeezi.
50004004	Mukyanganukege omu MUKAMA obutoosa; ningaruka kugamba nti: Mukyanganuke.
50004005	Okugumiisiriza kwanyu kumanywe abantu boona. Ningira MUKAMA ali haihi kugaruka.
50004006	Mutaharaza omutima habw'ekintu kyona, baitu omu buli kintu mwikale nimumanyisa Ruhanga ebi murukwetaaga, nimumusaba, nimumwesengereza kandi nimumusiima.
50004007	Obusinge bwa Ruhanga obuhinguraine okwetegereza kwona, bulirinda emitima yanyu n'ebiteekerezo byanyu omu Kristo Yesu.
50004008	Eky'okumalirra, bagenzi bange, byona eby'amazima, byona eby'ekitiinisa, byona eby'obulyo, byona ebirukwera, byona ebirungi, byona ebirukusiimwa nibyo muteekerezeho, hamu n'engeso enungi n'ebindi ebisemeriire kunyumizibwa.
50004009	Ebi mwanyegereho, ebi mwanyihireho, ebi mwampuliireho, n'ebi mwandozireho, nibyo mukolege; kandi Ruhanga ow'obusinge araikaraga na inywe.
50004010	Ninkyanganuka muno omu MUKAMA, habwokuba mulinzirwe mwagaruka mwanyijuka. Mazimakwo mukaba muntaireho omutima, baitu mukaba mutakatungire mwanya.
50004011	Tikuli kugira ngu, eki ninkigambisibwa obuburwa, habwokuba nkeega okwenihira omu mulingo gwona ogu mbamu.
50004012	Nimmanya kukeeherwa ebintu n'okubisaagirirwa; omu buli kintu n'omu miringo yoona nkeega amagezi ag'okwekoonyera: omu mweru n'omu njara, omu itungo n'omu bunaku.
50004013	Ninsobora kukora byona habw'Ogu anyakumpa amaani.
50004014	Baitu mukakora kurungi kunyirukirra omu muhito gwange.
50004015	Na inywe Abafilipi nimumanya ngu, obu natandikire kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi ninduga Makedoni, hatabeho kitebe ky'abaikiriza na kimu ekyayeteeraine na nyowe omu kurolerra entaahya n'enturukya ya sente, okwihaho inywe inywenka.
50004016	Noobu nkaba ndi Teesalonika, mwantwekerega eby'okunkoonyera.
50004017	Tikuli kugira ngu, ninserra ebisembo; baitu ninserra amagoba Ruhanga aga alibongeramu.
50004018	Nyowe, emperra yange mmazire kugitunga kandi nsaagisizeho! Ntungire ebirukumara habwokuba Epafurodito amazire kumpa ebisembo ebi mwantwekiire, nikyo kihongwa ekirukuboya kurungi kandi ekyonzira ekirukusiimwa Ruhanga kandi eki agonza.
50004019	Ruhanga wange alibaha byona ebi murukwetaaga nk'obwingi bw'obwenda bwe omu Kristo Yesu oku buli.
50004020	Ekitiinisa kibe hali Ruhanga Isiitwe ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
50004021	Mundamukize abantu ba Ruhanga boona omu Kristo Yesu. Bagenzi bange aba nyinabo hanu, nibabaramukya.
50004022	Abantu ba Ruhanga boona nibabaramukya, muno muno ab'omu kikaali kya Kaisaali.
50004023	Emigisa ya MUKAMA Yesu Kristo ikale n'emyoyo yanyu.
51001001	Nyowe Paulo, Ruhanga ou yagondeze mbe mukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, hamu na Timoteho mugenzi waitu,

52003010	Tukataho muno omutima kusaba nyamusana n'ekiro, nukwo tusobole kurorangana twongerereze ebirukubura omu kwikiriza kwanyu.
52003011	Nitusaba Ruhanga waitu kandi Isiitwe wonyini, hamu na MUKAMA waitu Yesu, batwebembere batuhikye owaanyu.
52003012	Kandi MUKAMA abongere okugonzangana muno, n'okugonza abantu boona, nka itwe oku tubagonza,
52003013	nukwo asobole kugumya emitima yanyu, mwemerre omu maiso ga Ruhanga kandi Isiitwe nimwera kandi mutaina kamogo ha kiro MUKAMA waitu obw'aliija aina abahikiriire be boona.
52004001	Eky'okumalirra, bagenzi bange, nitubeesengerereza kandi nitubateererra omu ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu tuti: nkooku mwatwegiireho okuba n'engeso enungi n'okukora ebisiimwa Ruhanga, mweyongere muno, kukira nkooku murukukora hati.
52004002	Mumanyire ebiragiro ebi twabahaire habwa MUKAMA Yesu.
52004003	Ningira kinu nikyo Ruhanga agonza: mube abarukwera, mwetantale obusiihani.
52004004	Buli omu omuli inywe amanye okulema omubiri gwe gwikale nigwera kandi gwina ekitiinisa;
52004005	mutatwarwa okwegomba okw'omubiri nk'abakafiiiri abatamanya Ruhanga.
52004006	Nukwo haleke kubaho muntu weena anyakusobeza mugenzi we akamusiisira oburungi bwe obu, habwokuba MUKAMA nuwe muhoozi w'enzigu omuli ebi byona, nkooku twabahabwire kara nitubakomeetereza.
52004007	Ningira Ruhanga atatwetere eby'obugwagwa, baitu akatwetera oburukwera.
52004008	Weena anyakugaya enyegesa enu, tagaya muntu, baitu agaya Ruhanga anyakubaha Mwoyo we Ahikiriire.
52004009	Baitu ha kigambo ky'okugonza ab'oruganda, timurukwetaaga muntu n'omu kubahandiikira, habwokuba inywe inywenka Ruhanga akabeegesa okugonzangana;
52004010	kandi mazimakwo nimugonza ab'oruganda boona abali omu Makedoniya. Baitu nitubateererra bagenzi baitu, mweyongere muno okukora muti.
52004011	Muteho omutima kwikara mutaina bwogo, mwekambire emirimo yanyu, kandi mukole n'emikono yanyu nkooku twabahabwire,
52004012	nukwo abantu b'aheeru babahe akitiinisa, kandi mwemale inywenka mutarukukwatirirwa muntu n'omu.
52004013	Bagenzi bange, tirurukwenda inywe okutamanya ha by'abaagwijagiire nukwo muleke kusaalirwa nk'abandi abataina kunihira oku basaalirwa.
52004014	Baitu obu turaaba nitwikiriza Yesu nkooku yafiire kandi yahumbuuka, nukwo n'abo abaagwijagiriire omu Yesu, Ruhanga alibaleeta hamu nawe obu aligaruka.
52004015	Ka tubaijukye MUKAMA ngu, itwe aboomire abaliba baroho MUKAMA haaligarukira, titulibanza abo abaagwijagiire.
52004016	Habwokuba MUKAMA wonyini alisirimuka naaruga omwiguru, naaragira n'iraka ery'obusobozi, na mukuru wa bamalaika aliba naayamirra, kandi n'engwara ya Ruhanga eriba neegamba. Nubwo abaafeeriire omu Kristo balibanza kuhumbuuka.
52004017	Hanyuma na itwe aboomiire abaliba bakyaroho, tulitwarwa hamu nabo omu bicu okutangirra MUKAMA omu mwanya; nukwo tuliikara tuti nawe ebiro byona.
52004018	Nahabweki muhuumuzangane n'ebigambo ebi.
52005001	Bagenzi bange, eby'obusumi n'emyaka timurukwetaaga kubihandiikirwa.
52005002	Habwokuba inywe inywenka nimumanya kurungi ekiro eky'okugaruka kwa MUKAMA kiriija nk'omusuma oku aija omu bwire bw'ekiro.
52005003	Abantu obu baba nibagamba bati: “Haroho obusinge n'okuteekaana”, nubwo bahikwaho okuhwerekerra okwa bwango nkooku ebisa bihikaho omukazi anyakwina enda, kandi tihalibaho ow'alitabuka.
52005004	Inywe bagenzi bange, timuli omu mwirima, ekiro eki kubahikaho nk'omusuma.
52005005	Habwokuba inywena muli baana b'omusana kandi muli baana b'ekyerezi; tituli b'ekiro rundi b'omwirima.
52005006	Nukwo nu, tuleke kugwijagira abandi nkooku bakora; baitu twikale niturora kandi tuleke kutamiira.
52005007	Ningira abo abagwijagira, bagwijagira ekiro, kandi n'abo abatamiira, batamiira ekiro.
52005008	Baitu itwe nkooku tuli baana b'omusana, tuleke kutamiira, twekingire ha kifuba engabu y'okwikiriza n'okugonza, kandi ha mutwe tuteho enkofiira y'okunihira okujunwa.
52005009	Ningira Ruhanga atatuteereho kufubirwa, baitu akatuteeraho kujunwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo,
52005010	ayatufeeriire nukwo twomere hamu nawe, obu tuba niturora rundi tugwijagiire.
52005011	Habweki muhuumuzangane kandi mugumyangane nkooku murukukora hati.
52005012	Bagenzi bange nitubeesengereza, mutemu ekitiinisa abo abarukukora omuli inywe, abeebembezi kandi abahabuzi banyu omu MUKAMA,
52005013	kandi mubahe ekitiinisa kingi nimubagonza habw'omulimo babakorra. Mwikarane n'obusinge.
52005014	Bagenzi bange nitubateererra, muhabule abagara, mugumye abataina maani omu mutima, mukonyere abaceke. Kandi abo boona mubagumiisirize.
52005015	Mwerinde, haleke kubaho n'omu omuli inywe arukuhoora enzigu habw'obubi obu akoliirwe; baitu obutoosa mulengeho okukorrangana oburungi n'okubukorra abandi boona.
52005016	Musemererwege obutoosa,
52005017	musabege obutalekerra,
52005018	musiime Ruhanga omu byona ebinyakubaho; habwokuba eki nikyo Ruhanga abagondeza omu Kristo Yesu.
52005019	Muleke kubundiika Mwoyo Ahikiriire,
52005020	muleke kugaya eby'oburangi;
52005021	baitu mwetegereze buli kintu, kandi mugumire ha birungi.
52005022	Mwetantale ekibi ky'omulingo gwona.
52005023	Ruhanga, MUKAMA ow'obusinge, abeereze kimu. Emitima yanyu, emyoyo yanyu, n'emibiri yanyu ikale kurungi etaina kamogo okuhika ha kiro eky'okugaruka kwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
52005024	Ruhanga ayabeesire aba mwesigwa kandi alihikiriza ebi yaraganiize.
52005025	Bagenzi bange, mutusabire!
52005026	Muramukye ab'oruganda boona n'omwoyo omurungi nimubagwa omu kifuba.
52005027	Nimbateererra omu ibara lya MUKAMA, ebbaruha enu esomerwe ab'oruganda boona.
52005028	Embabazi za MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo ziikale na inywe.
53001001	Nyowe Paulo, hamu na Silivaano na Timoteho, nituhandiikira ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza aba Teesalonika abali omu Ruhanga Isiitwe na MUKAMA Yesu Kristo:
53001002	Nitubagondeza omugisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na MUKAMA Yesu Kristo.
53001003	Bagenzi bange, kituhikiriire okusiima Ruhanga habwanyu nkooku kisemeriire, habwokuba okwikiriza kwanyu nikweyongera muno kandi n'okugonzangana kw'omuntu n'omugenzi we nakwo nikweyongera.
53001004	Nahabweki itwe nitubenyumirizaaho omu bitebe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga habw'okuguma kwanyu n'okwikiriza kwanyu omu kuhiiganizibwa oku kwona n'omu mihito ei murukugumiisiriza.
53001005	Eki nikyo kirukwoleka encwa ya Ruhanga ey'obulyo, nukwo inywe musobole kusangwa musemeriire obukama bwa Ruhanga obu murukubonera enaku hati.
53001006	Habwokuba Ruhanga naarora nkooku kiri ky'obwinganiza okubonesa abo abarukubabonesa;
53001007	kandi na inywe abanyakubonesibwa, okubahuumuza hamu na itwe. Ebi biribaho MUKAMA Yesu obu alizooka naaruga omwiguru, aina baamalaika be ab'obusobozi nibaizira omu murro
53001008	ogurukufubira abo abatarukumanya Ruhanga, hamu n'abo abatoorobera Amakuru Amarungi aga MUKAMA waitu Yesu.
53001009	Baliheebwa ekifubiro eky'okuhwerekerra okw'ebiro n'ebiro, n'okubingwa omu maiso ga MUKAMA n'omu kitiinisa eky'obusobozi bwe,
53001010	obu aliija ha kiro kiri okuheebwa ekitiinisa omu bahikiriire be n'okuhuniriza boona abaikiriize, habwokuba amakuru twabatebiize, mukagaikiriza.
53001011	Eki nikyo tubasabira obutoosa, nukwo Ruhanga waitu ababarre omu basemeriire eki yabeetiire, kandi ahikirize n'obusobozi bwe ebirungi byona ebi mwayecweriire kukora n'ebi murukukora habw'okwikiriza.
53001012	Nukwo MUKAMA waitu Yesu anyumirizibwe omuli inywe, na inywe munyumirizibwe omuli uwe, nk'embabazi za Ruhanga waitu n'eza MUKAMA Yesu Kristo okuziri.
53002001	Bagenzi bange, ha kigambo eky'okugaruka kwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo n'okusorrokana kwaitu kumutangirra, nitubeesengereza
53002002	muleke kucwekwa enkizi rundi kukangwa ebintu byona ebirukumanyisa ngu, ekiro kya MUKAMA kihikire; noobu byakuleetwa abarangi b'ebisuba, rundi orugambo rw'abantu, rundi ebbaruha erukusisana nk'erugire hali itwe.
53002003	Mutaliikiriza muntu n'omu kubabiihabiiha omu mulingo gwona. Ekiro eki tikirukwija kuhika obwemi butakacwekere, kandi Omwemi atakoolekerwe. Nuwe ogu ow'okuhwerekerra,
53002004	anyakuhakaniza kyona ekyetwa ruhanga rundi ekiramibwa. Naayenyumiriza kukira byona, nukwo aikarre omunju ya Ruhanga naayeyeta Ruhanga.
53002005	Timurukwijuka eki nkooku nakibagambiire obu nkaba nkyali na inywe?
53002006	Ekimutangire kuzooka hati, mukimanyire; nukwo asobole kwolekwa akasumi ke obu kalihika.
53002007	Habwokuba obwemi bukatandika ira, nibukora omu nsita; baitu Kristo anyakubutanga, araikaraga naabutanga okuhika obu alikaihwaho.
53002008	Obu nubwo Omwemi alizooka, kandi MUKAMA Yesu alimwisa orwoya orw'akanwa ke, amuhwerekereze n'okumuliikana okw'okwija kwe.
53002009	Omwemi ogu aliija omu busobozi bwa Sitaani, aina amaani ag'okukora ebihuniriza ebirukuhabisa, n'ebyamasano,
53002010	hamu n'ebindi byona ebirisobora kuhabisa abo abali b'okuhwerekerra, habwokuba bakanga kugonza amazima agaakubajunire.
53002011	Nikyo Ruhanga abalekera bahabisibwa, baikirize ebisuba ebi.
53002012	Nukwo boona abataraikiriize amazima, baitu baasiima obubi, bacwerwe omusango, gubasinge.
53002013	Bagenzi bange abagonzibwa MUKAMA, kituhikiriire kusiima Ruhanga butoosa habwanyu, habwokuba okuruga kara na kara Ruhanga akabakomera okujunwa, mwezibwe Mwoyo Ahikiriire kandi mwikirize amazima.
53002014	Eki nikyo yabeetiire naayekoonyeza okurangirra kwaitu okw'Amakuru Amarungi, nukwo musobole kubagana ha kitiinisa kya MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
53002015	Nahabweki bagenzi bange mugume, mukwatire kimu byona ebi twabeegeseze na kanwa kaitu rundi ebi twabahandiikiire.
53002016	MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo wonyini, na Ruhanga Isiitwe ayatugondeze, yatuha ekihuumuro eky'ebiro n'ebiro n'okunihira okugumire habw'embabazi ze,
53002017	ahuumuze emitima yanyu kandi abagumye omu birungi byona ebi mukora n'ebi mugamba.
53003001	Eky'okumalirra bagenzi bange, mutusabire, nukwo ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanguhe kuraranga hoona kandi kisingule, nkooku kyasingwire omuli inywe;
53003002	na itwe tusobole kutabuka abantu ababi kandi engumangani, habwokuba boona tibaina okwikiriza.
53003003	Baitu MUKAMA mwesigwa; alibaha amaani kandi abajune Omubi.
53003004	Nitubeesiga omu MUKAMA, habwokuba nimukora kandi mulyongera kukora ebintu ebi turukubaragira.
53003005	MUKAMA aterekereze emitima yanyu omu ngonzi za Ruhanga n'omu kugumiisiriza kwa Kristo.
53003006	Bagenzi bange, nitubaragira omu ibara lya MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, mwecweho ow'oruganda weena atarukwenda kukora emirimo kandi atarukukuraatira engeso ezi twabamanyize.
53003007	Inywe inywenka mumanyire nkooku musemeriire kutukuraatira. Obu tukaba tuli na inywe tukaba tutali bagara,
53003008	tutaliire busa ebyokulya by'omuntu weena, baitu twatalibanaga, twajwahaga kandi twakoraga nyamusana n'ekiro, nukwo tuleke kulemeera omuntu n'omu omuli inywe.
53003009	Tikuli kugamba ngu, tukaba tutaina bulyo obw'okubikolerwa, baitu tukagonza kubaha ekyokurorraho omu ngeso zaitu, eki muraakuraatira.
53003010	Obu tukaba tuli na inywe, tukabaha ekiragiro ekirukugamba ngu: Atarukwenda kukora, aleke kulya.
53003011	Habwokuba nituhurra abamu omuli inywe nkooku bali bagara, beetaahya omu by'abandi, tibagira eki bakora.
53003012	Abantu nk'abo nitubaragira kandi nitubateererra omu MUKAMA Yesu Kristo, bakole emirimo yabo hataroho bwogo, beetungire ebyokulya byabo nyabwabu.
53003013	Ab'oruganda, mutajwaha omu kukora ebirungi.
53003014	Kakuba habaho arukwanga kukwata ebi turukugamba omu bbaruha enu, omuntu ogu mumwetegereze, mutongera kukorrana nawe, nukwo akwatwe ensoni.
53003015	Muleke kumurora nk'omunyanzigwa, baitu mumuhabule nka mugenzi wanyu.
53003016	MUKAMA w'obusinge wonyini, abahe obusinge obusumi bwona n'omu bintu byona. MUKAMA abe nainywe inywena.
53003017	Okuraga kunu nkwehandiikire nyenka n'omukono gwange: Ninyowe Paulo. Kanu nuko karorwaho omu bbaruha zange zoona; nukwo mpandiika nti.
53003018	Embabazi za MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo ziikalege na inywe inywena.
54001001	Nyowe Paulo, omukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, ayakomerwe kandi natumwa Ruhanga ayatujunire na Kristo Yesu okunihira kwaitu,
54001002	Ninkuhandiikira iwe Timoteho, omwana wange mali omu kwikiriza: Ninkugondeza emigisa, embabazi, n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu.
54001003	Oikaleyo Efeeso nkooku nakuteereriire obu nkaba ningenda Makedoniya, nukwo otange abantu abamu, baleke kwegesa enyegesa endi.
54001004	Baleker'aho n'okwemarra ha nganikyo ez'okwehangahanga, baleker'aho n'okurondooza eby'obwijukuru obutaina nambere bugarukira, ebirugwamu empaka, baitu bitarukumanyiza abantu engeso enungi ezirukuleetwa okwikiriza.
54001005	Kandi kunu itwe eki turukugenderra omu nyegesa zaitu, nizo ngonzi eziruga omu mutima ogusemiire n'omu biteekerezo ebihikire, n'omu kwikiriza okutarumu obugobya.
54001006	Abantu abamu abanyakuruga hali ebi, bahabira omu mpaka ezitaina makuru,
54001007	bagonza kufooka beegesa b'ebiragiro, kunu tibarukwetegereza ebi barukwegesa rundi ebi barukugumya.
54001008	Kyonka itwe tumanyire Ebiragiro nkooku biri birungi, kakuba omuntu abihondera omu mulingo oguhikire.
54001009	Baitu kinu nikyo kisemeriire kwetegerezibwa: Ebiragiro tibiteebwaho habw'abarukukora kurungi, baitu biteebwaho habw'abeemi n'entahurra, habw'abatatiina Ruhanga n'abasiisi, habw'abatata mutima ha diini, n'abasiisa ebya Ruhanga, habw'abaita baisebo rundi banyinabo, na habw'abaisi b'abantu abandi,
54001010	habw'abasiihani, abakuuhya, n'ababuza abantu, habw'ababiiha ebisuba n'abarahira ebisuba, n'ekindi kyona ekirukuhakaniza enyegesa enyakuhikire.
54001011	Egi niyo nyegesa erukwikirraniza n'Amakuru ago Amarungi kwo aga Ruhanga anyakuhaisanizibwa, nyowe aga nakwasiibwe.
54001012	Ninsiima Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu ayampaire amaani ag'okukora omulimo gunu, habwokuba akarora nkooku ndi mwesigwa nukwo kunkoma kumuheereza,
54001013	kara noobu ndiba namujumire, namuhiiganiza, kandi naamubazaaho kubi; baitu akangirra embabazi habwokuba ebi nkabikozesibwa obutamanya, ntakaikiriize.
54001014	MUKAMA waitu akangirra embabazi nyingi, yampa okwikiriza n'engonzi ebi tutunga omu Kristo Yesu.
54001015	Ekigambo kinu ky'amananu kandi kisemeriire kwikiririzibwa kimu, ekirukugamba kiti: Kristo Yesu akaija omunsi okujuna abasiisi. Kandi omuli abo, ninyowe ow'okubanza.
54001016	Baitu eki nagiririrwe embabazi nikyo kinu: omuli nyowe omusiisi ow'okubanza, Yesu Kristo ayolekeremu okugumiisiriza kwe okutaina h'okugarukira, kube kyokurorraho ha bandi abarukwija kumwikiriza, basobole kutunga obwomeezi obutahwaho.
54001017	Ruhanga omu wenka, MUKAMA ow'ebiro n'ebiro, atafa kandi atarorwa, ahaisanizibwe kandi aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro n'ebiro! Amiina.
54001018	Binu nibyo ndukukuteererra mwana wange Timoteho. Bihikaana n'ebi abarangi baakugambireho kara. Leka na hati bikuhe amaani ag'okurwana kurungi,
54001019	ogumye okwikiriza, omutima gwawe nkooku gukuhabura. Abantu abamu habw'okutafaaho omutima ebi gurukubahabura, bakafeerwa okwikiriza kwabo.
54001020	Omuli abo nuho hali Himenaayo na Alekizanda, aba nalekiire Sitaani, nukwo beege kutajuma Ruhanga.
54002001	Eky'okubanza, nimbateererra nti; Musabire abantu boona, nimubeesengereza, nimubatonganirra, kandi nimubasiimira.
54002002	Musabire abakama n'abalemi boona, nukwo twikale tuteekaine, twina obusinge, nitutiina Ruhanga kandi nitwoleka engeso nungi omu byona.
54002003	Eki kirungi kandi nikisiimwa Ruhanga ayatujunire.
54002004	Nuwe anyakugonza abantu boona bajunwe kandi bamanye amazima.
54002005	Ningira haroho Ruhanga omu, kandi n'omuteeraniza omu, nuwe muntu Yesu Kristo anyakuteeraniza Ruhanga n'abantu,
54002006	Ayayehaireyo kuba ndehwa ya boona, kandi eki akakikora akasumi kaakyo obu kahikire.
54002007	Eki nikyo nakomiirwe mbe murangirizi kandi mukwenda okwegesa Abanyamahanga eby'okwikiriza n'eby'amazima (na hati nimbaza amananu, tindukubaza bisuba).
54002008	Ekindi eki ndukwenda, abasaija beebemberege okusaba omu biikaro byona, baimukize kurungi emikono yabo, bataina kiniga rundi enkungani.
54002009	Kandi ninyenda abakazi bajwale ebyokujwara ebisemeriire kandi ebibahikire, batasibire isoke, noobwakuba kujwara eby'ezaabbu, eruuru, rundi ebijwaro by'omuhendo mwingi;
54002010	baitu bejweke ebikorwa ebirungi nkooku kisemeriire abakazi abarukutiina Ruhanga.
54002011	Omu kasumi ak'okwegesibwa, omukazi aikale aculire kandi naayebundaaza.
54002012	Tindukwikiriza mukazi kwegesa rundi kutegeka abasaija; baitu aikale aculiire.
54002013	Ningira Adamu nuwe yabandize kubumbwa, nukwo haakurataho Eva.
54002014	Kandi Adamu atabiihabiihwe, baitu omukazi nuwe yabiihabiihirwe, yagwa mu kibi.
54002015	Kyonka omukazi alijunwa habw'okuzaara abaana, kakuba agumire omu kwikiriza, aina engonzi, oburukwera, hamu n'engeso nungi.
54003001	Ekigambo kinu ky'amananu: Omuntu weena obu ayenda obukuru bw' oburoleerezi, aba ayegombere omulimo murungi muno.
54003002	Habweki omuroleerezi asemeriire kuba muntu ataina kyona eki arukujunaanwa; musaija anyakuswire omukazi omu, omwerinzi, omwetegereza, ateekaine, w'amakune, kandi anyakusobora kwegesa.
54003003	Atali mutamiizi, atarukujumbuutuka baitu mukwata mpora. Muntu atarukukungana kandi atarukwemarra ha sente.
54003004	Asemeriire kulema kurungi eka ye naayegesa abaana be kumuhurra n'okumutamu ekitiinisa omu byona.
