54003005	Omuntu obu atamanya kulema kurungi eka ye, asobora ata kurolerra akitebe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga?
54003006	Asemeriire kuba muntu anyakumazire omwanya ahindukiire Kristo, taikara kwekuliriza muno akasingwa omusango ogwasingire Sitaani.
54003007	Kandi asemeriire kuba muntu arukusiimwa n'abantu ab'aheeru, kuba kitaba kwo naija kujumwa kandi agwe omu mutego gw'Omwohi.
54003008	Abaheereza nabo basemeriire kuba bantu b'omutima ogugumire, abatali b'enkuru ibiri, abatarukunywa muno marwa, n'abataina mukoijo gw'ebintu.
54003009	Basemeriire kulinda ensita z'okwikiriza n'omutima gumu.
54003010	Baitu nabwo, babanze balengesebwe. Kakuba bazooka nkooku bahikire, batandike obuheereza bwabu.
54003011	Abaheerezakati nabo basemeriire kuba b'omutima ogugumire kandi abatarukugeya. Babe beerinzi kandi beesigwa omu byona.
54003012	Abaheereza babe n'omukazi omu, baleme kurungi abaana babo hamu n'eka yabo;
54003013	habwokuba abo abahikya kurungi obuheereza bwabo, beetungira ibara lirungi kandi abantu baabeesiga muno habw'okugumya okwikiriza oku baina omu Kristo Yesu.
54003014	Ninihira kwija owaanyu bwango, baitu nkuhandiikire binu,
54003015	kakuba nkererwa, nukwo osobole kumanya engeso abantu ezi basemeriire kuba nazo omu ka ya Ruhanga. Niryo iramizo lya Ruhanga omwomeezi, enyomyo kandi orugo orw'amazima.
54003016	Na itwe leka twatule eby'ensita eby'enyikiriza yaitu nkooku biri bikuru mali. Nibyo ebirukugamba biti: Akafooka muntu, yagumibwa Mwoyo Ahikiire, yarorwa bamalaika, yarangirirwa omu mahanga, yaikirizibwa ab'omunsi yoona, yatwarwa omu iguru n'ekitiinisa.
54004001	Mwoyo Ahikiire nagamba bbwa ngu, omu biro eby'omumaiso abamu balinaga okwikiriza, nibahabisibwa emyoyo ey'ebisuba n'enyegesa za Sitaani,
54004002	nibahabisibwa obugobya bw'ababiihi b'ebisuba abaina emitima egumangaine kandi esiiriziibwe Sitaani.
54004003	Nubo abo abatanga abantu okuswerangana, baziza ebyokulya Ruhanga ebi yahangire kuliibwa abo abamwikiriza. Nubo abo abamanyire amazima kandi ababirya n'okusiima.
54004004	Kyona Ruhanga eki yahangire kiba kirungi kandi tihakubaireho ekirukuzirwa kakuba kiriibwa n'okusiima;
54004005	habwokuba nikiba kyeziibwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga hamu n'okusaba.
54004006	Timoteho, obu olihabura oti ab'oruganda boona, oliba muheereza murungi owa Kristo Yesu anyakuta omutima ha by'okwikiriza n'eby'enyegesa enungi ei wakuraatiire.
54004007	Oyecwereho kimu enganikyo ezitali za Ruhanga kandi ez'obudoma. Wemanyiize kutiina Ruhanga.
54004008	Okwemanyiiza omu by'omubiri, noobu kuraaba nikugasa; baitu okutiina Ruhanga nikukirra hara omugaso; habwokuba oina eki orukunihira kutanga omu bwomeezi bunu n'omu bwomeezi obuliija.
54004009	Ekigambo eki kya mananu kandi kisemeriire kwikiririzibwa kimu.
54004010	Habwokuba eki nikyo turukutalibanira kandi nikyo turukwekambira. Ningira okunihira kwaitu kwona tukutaire hali Ruhanga Omwomeezi, Omujuni w'abantu boona, okukira muno ow'abaikiriza.
54004011	Ebigambo binu obyegese kandi obiteererre.
54004012	Hatabaho n'omu arukukugaya habw'okuba musigazi, baitu obe kyokurorraho ha baikiriza omu kubaza, omu ngeso, omu kugonza, omu kwikiriza, n'omu burukwera bw'omutima.
54004013	Taho omutima okusomera abantu Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera, okubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi n'okubeegesa okuhika obu ndiija.
54004014	Otanagaija ekisembo kya Mwoyo eki wahairwe habw'ebigambo abarangi bakugambireho, abakuru obu baakutaireho emikono.
54004015	Emirimo egi yoona ogyekambire, ogiteho muno omutima, nukwo boona barole nkooku orukugenda omu maiso.
54004016	Engeso zaawe ozeegendereze kandi oyetegereze n'enyegesa yawe; ogigumireho. Obu olikora oti, nubwo olyejuna kandi ojune n'abarukukuhurra.
54005001	Otalicoomera musaija mukuru, baitu omuhabulege nkooku waakuhabwire sso. Abasigazi obakole kurungi nka bagenzi baawe,
54005002	abakazi bakuru obakorre ebirungi nk'ebi wakukoliire nyoko, kandi abaisiki nka banyanyoko, omu burukwera bwona.
54005003	Abafaakati nyakabara, obatemuga ekitiinisa.
54005004	Omufaakati obu araaba aina abaana rundi abaijukuru, abaana abo leka babanze beetegereze ediini ebi erukubaragira kukorra ab'oruganda rwabo, n'ebi basemeriire kugarurra bazaire baabo; habwokuba eki nikyo Ruhanga arukusiima.
54005005	Omufaakati nyakabara, ataina kiroleererwa, okunihira kwe kwona akutaire hali Ruhanga, aikara naayesengereza kandi naasaba ekiro na nyamusana.
54005006	Baitu omufaakati anyakwenagiriza, asisana nk'afiire, noobu araaba akyali mwomeezi.
54005007	Eki okibasoborre nukwo baleme kuba n'ebi barukujunaanwa.
54005008	Kakuba habaho omuntu ataina eki arukukorra ab'obuzaale bwe, okukira muno ab'oruganda rwe mali, aba anagiire kimu okwikiriza, kandi aba ali mubi okukira ogu atakaikirizaaga.
54005009	Anyakuhandiikwa nk'omufakaati nuwe ogu anyakuhikize emyaka nkaaga y'obukuru, ayaswirweho omusaija omu,
54005010	kandi amanyirwe habw'ebikorwa ebirungi ebi akora, nk'ayayoroire kurungi abaana, ayakuniire abagenyi, ayanaabisize abantu ba Ruhanga ebigere, ayahumwize abali omu mihito, kandi ayayeheerireyo kimu okukora kurungi omu byona.
54005011	Baitu abafaakati abato otabaikiriza; habwokuba omubiri obu gubalemesa, gubaiha hali Kristo, bagonza kugaruka kuswerwa.
54005012	Nukwo beeretera omusango habw'okutahikiriza ekiragaano kyabo eki baabandiize kuragaana na Kristo.
54005013	Tikiri eki kyonka, baitu bataahirirwa n'obugara, batandika kwenjeera, nibaruga munu nibataaha muli. Tibuli bugara bwonka, nibabaza ebi bataakubaliize.
54005014	Nahabweki naakugondeze abafaakati abato baswerwe, bazaale abaana, barolerre amaka gaabo, nukwo abanyanzigwa baleke kubona obwiho obw'okutubazaaho kubi.
54005015	Ningira abamu omuli bo bakahaba ira, nibakuraatira Sitaani.
54005016	Omuntu weena arukwikiriza, obu araaba aina abanyabuzale be abafaakati, abakoonyere; ekitebe ky'abaikiriza kireke kwetweka obulemeezi obu, nukwo kisobole kukoonyera abafaakati nyakabara.
54005017	Abakuru abarukwebembera kurungi, leka baheebwe ekitiinisa okukira abandi, muno muno abo abarukukora omulimo ogw'okurangirra n'okwegesa.
54005018	Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera bigamba biti: “Omuntu arukukugesira, aikirizibwa kutwara ha buro.” kandi biti: “Omukozi asemeriire empeera ye.”
54005019	Otaliikiriza eki barukujunaana omukuru w'ekitebe, rundi buli nikigumibwa abakaiso babiri rundi basatu.
54005020	Kandi abo abanyakulemera omu kibi, obahane omumaiso ga boona, nukwo abandi baikale nibatiina.
54005021	Ninkuteererra omumaiso ga Ruhanga, n'aga Yesu Kristo, n'aga bamalaika abataraterebukire, ebiragiro binu obikwase boona atarukusoroora, nookora byona omu bwinganiza.
54005022	Otalyanguhiriza okutaho abantu emikono, kandi oleke kwetaba omu bibi by'omuntu ondi; oikalege n'omutima ogurukwera.
54005023	Otongera kunywa amaizi gonka, baitu onywehoga n'otwarwa tuke habw'enda yawe na habw'endwara yawe enyakwikara niimuka.
54005024	Ebibi eby'abamu bizooka bwango, byeyoleka batakacweriiwe musango, baitu eby'abandi bizooka haahingwireho akasumi.
54005025	Ebikorwa ebirungi nabyo nukwo bizooka bwango biti; noobu biba bitakazookere, baitu tibisobora kwikara biserekerwe.
54006001	Boona abali omu bwiru, bamanye bakama baabo nkooku basemeriire kuheebwa ekitiinisa, nukwo ibara lya Ruhanga n'enyegesa yaitu bireke kugaywa.
54006002	Abairu abaina bakama baabo abaikiriza, baleke kubagaya ngu, boona b'oruganda rumu; baitu babaheereze kurungi okukiraho habwokuba abo abarukugasirwa omulimo gwabo nubo abaikiriza kandi abagonzibwa. Ebi nibyo obeegese kandi obateererre.
54006003	Baitu kakuba habaho arukwegesa ebitali ebi rundi atarukwikirraniza n'ebigambo ebihikire ebya MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo n'enyegesa erukwikirraniza n'enyikiriza yaitu.
54006004	aba ahinguraniize akwekuliriza, kandi taina eki amanyire. Aina n'omutima omubi ogw'okuhakaniza n'okuteera empaka ha bigambo ebizaara ihali, okwahukana, okuhangirra, okuteekerezaho kubi abantu,
54006005	n'okuteeza empaka abantu abaina ebiteekerezo ebiramaire kandi abataina mazima, abarukuteekereza ngu, ediini nugwo muhanda ogw'okuguudahara.
54006006	Nukwo, ediini erumu itungo lingi, baitu hali abo abaikara nibasiima ebi bainabyo.
54006007	Omunsi tukaijamu tutaina kantu, kandi tuligirugamu tutarukutwara kantu;
54006008	baitu obu tuba twina ebyokulya n'ebyokujwara, leka ebi bitumale.
54006009	Abo abarurukira itungo bagwa omu kwohebwa n'omu mutego, batwalirizibwa okwegomba okutali kumu, okutarumu bwetegereza kandi okuleeta akabi, kukadikiza abantu omu kuhwerekerra, bakahwaho.
54006010	Ningira omukoijo gw'omulingo ogu nugwo gwaihire abamu ha kwikiriza kwabu, emitima yabo baagireetera enaku nyingi.
54006011	Baitu iwe, omuntu wa Ruhanga, ebi byona obiirukege; omutima gwawe gwona ogute ha buhikiriire, ha kutiina Ruhanga, okwikiriza, okugonza okugumiisiriza na ha kukwata mpora.
54006012	Rwana masaija obulemu bw' okwikiriza; ogumire ha bwomeezi obutahwaho obu wayetiirwe kandi obu wayatwire kurungi noorahira omumaiso g'abakaiso baingi.
54006013	Hati nu, ninkuteererra omu maiso ga Ruhanga anyakwomeeza ebintu byona, n'omumaiso ga Kristo Yesu ayayatuliire kimu omumaiso ga Ponsiyo Pilaato nkooku ali kaiso ow'amazima,
54006014	ohonderege eki nakuragiire, otaina kamogo kandi otaina eky'orukujunaanwa, okuhika MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo obu alizooka.
54006015	Okuzooka kunu, omu kasumi kakwo, Rutakirwa wenka nuwe alikumanyisa. Nuwe MUKAMA w'abakama kandi Omulemi w'abalemi.
54006016	Ogu wenka nuwe atafa kandi aikara omu musana ogutahikwaho, atakarorwahoga kandi atasobora kurorwa muntu n'omu. Aheebwe ekitiinisa kandi ahangirize ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
54006017	Abaguuda ab'omunsi munu, obahabule baleke kwehurra, n'okuta emitima yabo ha itungo eritaikaraho; baitu bagite hali Ruhanga anyakutuheera kimu byona ebitusemeza.
54006018	Abantu abo basemeriire kukora kurungi; bakole ebikorwa ebirungi bingi, babe benda kandi bagabe n'omutima gumu.
54006019	Oku nukwo kweyombekera omusingi ogugumire ogw'ebiro ebiriija, nukwo basobole kutunga obwomeezi, nubwo bwomeezi obuhikire kwo.
54006020	Mwana wange Timoteho, linda eki wakwasiibwe. Wetentale orubazo orutarumu kutiina Ruhanga, n'empaka abantu abamu ezi beeta magezi, kandi kunu tikirikwo.
54006021	Habwokuba abamu obu bahondera amagezi ago bahabira kimu, nibaruga omu muhanda ogw'okwikiriza. Embabazi za Ruhanga ziikale na iwe.
55001001	Nyowe Paulo, Ruhanga ou yakomere kuba mukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, okurangirra obwomeezi obwaraganiziibwe obu tutungira omu Kristo Yesu,
55001002	ninkuhandiikira, iwe Timoteho omwana wange omugonzibwa: Ninkugondeza emigisa, embabazi, n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu.
55001003	Ninsiima Ruhanga ou mpeereza n'omutima gumu, nka baisenkurunyowe oku baakozire, obu nkwijuka bwona omu kusaba kwange.
55001004	Obu nyijuka okurra kwawe, nyegomba kukurora ekiro na nyamusana, nukwo nsemerererwe kimu.
55001005	Ninyijuka okwikiriza kwawe okw'amananu, okwikiriza okwatandikiire omu nyokwenkuru Loyisi na nyoko Ehuniike, kandi hati ningumya na iwe oinakwo.
55001006	Nikyo ndukukwijukiza kwimukya buhyaka ekisembo kya Ruhanga ekiri omuli iwe, eki waatungire obu nakutaireho emikono.
55001007	Ningira Ruhanga atatuhe mutima ogw'obutiini, baitu akatuha ogw'amaani, ogw'engonzi, kandi ogw'okwetanga.
55001008	Nukwo nu, otakwatwa ensoni okujurra MUKAMA waitu, noobwakuba nyowe omunyankomo we. Kandi na iwe ikiriza okubonesibwa habw'Amakuru Amarungi, nookonyerwa amaani ga Ruhanga.
55001009	Nuwe ayatujunire kandi yatweta kuba bantu be, atarukusigikira ha bikorwa byaitu, baitu naasigikira ha ntegeka ye na ha mbabazi ezi yatugiriire ira omu Kristo Yesu.
55001010	Kandi na hati azoolekiire omu kwija kw'Omujuni waitu Kristo Yesu, ayahwerekeriize, yayolekera obwomeezi obutahwaho omu Makuru Amarungi.
55001011	Amakuru Amarungi ago, nugo nakomiirwe kuranga, ndi mukwenda kandi mwegesa,
55001012	kandi hati nikyo ndukubonera nti enaku. Baitu tindukukwatwa nsoni, habwokuba nimmanya ou naikiriize, kandi ningumya nkooku asobora kulinda ekisembo eki yankwasize okuhika ha Kiro kiri.
55001013	Na iwe ikara ohondere ekyokurorraho ky'ebigambo ebirungi ebi nakugambiire, ogumire omu kwikiriza n'omu kugonza ebinyakuli omu Kristo Yesu.
55001014	Ekirungi eki wahairwe, kirinde nookonyerwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire anyakwikara omuli itwe.
55001015	Omanyire boona abali omu Asiya, nkooku bandugireho. Omuli abo nuho hali Fiijelo na Herumojene.
55001016	MUKAMA agirre embabazi eka ya Onesiiforo habwokuba akampuumuza emirundi nyingi, atankwatirwe nsoni ndi hanu omu njegere,
55001017	n'obu yahikire Rooma akanserra aina ekihika, yanzoora.
55001018	MUKAMA amuhe kugirirwa embabazi ha Kiro eki! Na iwe omanyire kurungi byona ebi yankoliire ndi Efeeso.
55002001	Hati iwe, mwana wange, ba w'amaani habw'obukoonyezi bwa Kristo Yesu.
55002002	Ebi nakugambiire omumaiso g'abakaiso baingi, obikwase abantu abeesigwa, abalisobora kwegesa n'abandi.
55002003	Na iwe nk'omuserikale omurungi owa Kristo Yesu, gumira okubonabona kwawe.
55002004	Tiharoho muserikale anyakuli ha mulimo gwe anyakwetaba omu bigambo by'abatali barwani, habwokuba naagenderra kusiimwa ayamukomere.
55002005	Omuzaani w'empaka taheebwa kondo, rundi buli naahondera ebiragiro by'okuzaana.
55002006	Omulimi omwekambi nuwe asemerra kubanza kuganura ebyokulya ebi ayereze.
55002007	Weetegereze ebi ndukugamba, habwokuba MUKAMA naija kukukoonyera kukenga byona.
55002008	Ijuka Yesu Kristo ayahumbuukire omu bafu kandi mwijukuru wa Daudi, nkooku kyarangirwe omu Makuru Amarungi aga nabatebiize.
55002009	Amakuru Amarungi ago nugo ndukubonabonera, mboherwe omu njegere nk'omuntu enkozi y'ebibi. Baitu ekigambo kya Ruhanga tikibohwa.
55002010	Habweki ngumiisiriza byona habw'abakomerwemu, nukwo nabo batunge okujunwa n'ekitiinisa eky'ebiro n'ebiro omu Kristo Yesu.
55002011	Ekigambo kinu ky'amazima ekirukugamba kiti: Obu turaaba twafiire hamu nawe, buli tulyomeera hamu nawe;
55002012	obu turaaba nitugumiisiriza hamu nawe, buli tulirema hamu nawe; obu turaaba nitumwehooga, nawe alitwehooga.
55002013	Noobu turaaba tutali beesigwa, baitu Uwe aikara ali mwesigwa, habwokuba tasobora kwehakaniza.
55002014	Ebi oikalege noobibaijukya, kandi obateererre omumaiso ga MUKAMA: beerinde empaka ezitaleeta karungi, baitu zihwerekereza abazihurra.
55002015	Wekambe okweyoleka oli muntu kwo arukusiimwa Ruhanga, omukozi atarukukwatwa nsoni, arukwegesa kurungi ekigambo ky'amazima.
55002016	Werinde embazo ezitarumu kutiina Ruhanga, habwokuba nizongera kuhabisa abantu,
55002017	kandi ebigambo byabo bigenda nibirya nk'ekookoro. Omuli abo nuho hali Himenaayo na Fileeto,
55002018	abaahabire amazima nibagamba ngu, okuhuumbuka kukahingura ira. Nukwo bajuumika okwikiriza okw'abantu abamu.
55002019	Baitu omusingi gwa Ruhanga ogugumire gwikaraho, guroho emanyikirizo erukugamba eti: “MUKAMA, abe naabamanya”, kandi eti: “Weena anyakwatura ibara lya MUKAMA, aruge omu bubi.”
55002020	Omunju enkooto tihabamu bikwato ebya zaabbu n'efeeza byonka, baitu habamu ebibaizirwe n'ebibumbirwe. Ebimu biba by'emirimo ey'ekitiinisa, ebindi by'emirimo etali y'ekitiinisa.
55002021	Omuntu kakuba ayeihaho byona ebitali birungi; obu, alifooka kikwato ky'omulimo gw'ekitiinisa, kintu ekyeziibwe kandi ekirukugasira nyineeka, kiteekaniziibwe okukora omulimo gwona omurungi.
55002022	Habweki oyetantale okwegomba kubi okw'obusigazi, oyemarre ha buhikiriire, ha kwikiriza, ha kugonza, na ha businge, nookwataniza n'abo abeeta ibara lya MUKAMA, baina omutima ogurukwera.
55002023	Wecwereho kimu empaka ez'obudoma ezitaina makuru; na iwe omanyire nkooku izaara enkungani.
55002024	Omuheereza wa MUKAMA tasemerra kuba muntu w'enkungani, baitu aba munyambabazi ha buli muntu weena, mwegesa murungi kandi anyakugumiisiriza,
55002025	omuntu arukuhana mpora abarukumuteeza empaka. Rundi Ruhanga asobora kubaha kwegarukamu kandi bakamanya amazima,
55002026	nukwo basobole kutabuka emitego Sitaani ei yabakwatiiremu, bakole ebi Ruhanga yagondeze.
55003001	Baitu kinu okyetegereze: omu biro ebya ha mpero, halibaho obuzibu obw'akabi.
55003002	Habwokuba abantu balyegonza, balirurukira sente, balyekuliriza, balyekunika, balijuma abandi, tibaliihurra bazaire baabo, baliba ntasiima, abatafaaho buhikiire,
55003003	abataina mbabazi, abataganyira, abahangirra, abaseesaseesa ebyabo, abatiinisa abandi, abanoba oburungi,
55003004	baliba ngobya, ntabiganya, abahingurana okwekuza, bantu abagonza okwesemeza bonka okukira kugonza Ruhanga,
55003005	nibahikiriza emikoro y'ediini baitu nibanga obusobozi bwayo. Abantu nk'abo obeetantale!
55003006	Omuli abo nuho hali abataaha amaju bakahamba abakazi abataina maani g'omutima, abalemeriirwe ebibi byabu kandi abarukutwarwa okwegomba okwa buli mulingo.
55003007	Abakazi abalihuliriza buli mwegesa, baitu batarukusobora kumanya amazima.
55003008	Abantu ba ira Yane na Yambere nkooku baahakaniize Musa, abasaija banu nabo nukwo barukuhakaniza amazima--nubo bantu abaramaire ebiteekerezo kandi okwikiriza kwabo kw'obugobya.
55003009	Baitu tibalihika hara, habwokuba obudoma bwabo bulimanywa boona, nk'obw'abasaija bali ababiri.
55003010	Baitu iwe Timoteho, hati omazire kwetegereza enyegesa yange, eki ndukugenderra omu bwomeezi bwange, okwikiriza kwange, okugumiisiriza kwange, engonzi zange, okuguma kwange,
55003011	okuhiiganizibwa kwange n'okubonesibwa kwange. Noomanya ebyangweriire omu Antyokiya, Ikoniyo, na Lisitura; okuhiiganizibwa kwona oku naagumiisiriize! Baitu ebi byona MUKAMA akabinjuna.
55003012	Mazimakwo boona abarukwenda kukuza obwomeezi baahairwe Ruhanga nibakuraatira Kristo Yesu, bali b'okuhiiganizibwa.
55003013	Omu kasumi ako abantu enkozi z'ebibi kandi engobya balyeyongera kuba babi, nibabiiha abandi kandi nabo nibabiihwa.
55003014	Baitu iwe ogumire hali ebi wayegere kandi ebi waikiririize kimu, noomanya ayabikwegeseze.
55003015	Okuruga omu buto, Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera bikakumanyisa ebisobora kukuhabura bikakuhikya ha kujunwa okuleetwa okwikiriza Kristo Yesu.
55003016	Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera byona bihandiikisibwa Ruhanga, kandi bigasa omu kwegesa eby'amazima, omu kuhana abahabire, okuhabura, n'okutendeka abantu omu buhikiriire,
55003017	nukwo omuntu wa Ruhanga azooke nkooku ayegesebwa kwo, aina byona ebirukwetaagwa okukora omulimo gwona omurungi.
55004001	Ninkuteererra omumaiso ga Ruhanga n'aga Kristo Yesu ow'alicwera omusango aboomiire n'abafiire, ninkurahiza okugaruka kwe n'obukama bwe:
55004002	Rangirra ekigambo, kyekambire omu busumi obusemeriire n'obutasemeriire. Hwitura, hana kandi teererra; otaterebuka omu kugumiisiriza n'omu kwegesa.
55004003	Halibaho akasumi abantu obu balyanga kuhurra enyegesa ey'amazima, habw'okugira amatu agarukubanulirra, balyesorooleza abeegesa abarukubeegesa ebi barukwenda.
55004004	Balyanga kuhurra amazima, baburanganire omu nganikyo z'okwehangahanga.
55004005	Baitu iwe otalitengeeta, gumiisiriza emihito, kora omulimo ogw'omugambizi ow'Amakuru Amarungi, ohikirize kurungi obuheereza bwawe.
55004006	Habwokuba nyowe ndi haihi n'okutambwa; obwire bwange obw'okuruga omunsi buhikire.
55004007	Nyowe nkarwana masaija, empaka z'okwiruka nzimazire, okwikiriza nkugumize.
55004008	Okuruga hati nsigaize okutunga ekondo ey'obuhikiriire eyanteekaniriziibwe--MUKAMA, omucwi w'emisango omwinganiza, ei alimpa ha Kiro kiri. Taligiha nyowe nyenka, baitu na boona abaataire omutima ha kugaruka kwe.
55004009	Kora kyona eki orukusobora ompikeho bwango.
55004010	Habwokuba Deema anyakugonza ensi enu enyakuroho, akandugaho yagenda Teesalonika. Kereseke akagenda Galatiya, Tito yagenda Dalamatiya.
55004011	Luka wenka nuwe nsigaire nawe. Yeta Maliko, oije nawe; habwokuba nangasira muno omu gw'obuheereza.
55004012	Tikiko nkamutuma Efeeso.
55004013	Obu oliba noija, oleete omwegereko ogu nasigire Turoha mba Karipo. Ondeetere n'ebitabu, baitu okukira muno eby'emizingo y'empu.
55004014	Alekizanda, omuheesi w'emiringa, akankora kubi muno; MUKAMA alimusasura habw'ebi yakozire.
55004015	Na iwe omwerinde, habwokuba enyegesa yaitu akagihakaniriza kimu.
55004016	Omu kwetonganirra kwange okw'okubanza, busaho n'omu ayansagikire; boona bakandugaho. Hati ninsaba baleke kukijunaanwa!
55004017	Baitu MUKAMA akanyemerraho, yampa amaani ag'okurangirirra kimu ekigambo kye, nukwo Abanyamahanga boona basobole kukihurra. Na nyowe nukwo natabukire nti akanwa k'entale.
55004018	MUKAMA alintabura akabi koona kandi alinjuna, antwale omu bukama bwe obw'omwiguru. Ekitiinisa kibe hali Uwe, ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
55004019	Ondamukize Pirisika n'Akwila n'ab'omuka ya Onesiifooro.
55004020	Erasito akasigara Korinto, Turofimo nkamusiga Mileeto arwaire.
55004021	Lengaho oku orukusobora kwija obusumi bw'obutiti butakahikire. Yubulo, Pudensi, Liino, Klaudiya n'ab'oruganda boona bakuramukize.
55004022	MUKAMA aikale n'omwoyo gwawe. Embabazi za Ruhanga ziikale na inywe.
56001001	Nyowe Paulo, omuheereza wa Ruhanga kandi omukwenda wa Yesu Kristo, ayatumirwe okugumya okwikiriza kw'abantu abaakomerwe Ruhanga n'okubamanyisa amazima g'ediini,
56001002	amazima agasobora kubaleetera obwomeezi obutahwaho, Ruhanga atabiiha, obu yanihiize okuruga kara,
56001003	kandi omukasumi akahikire obu yayolekere omu kigambo kye, Ruhanga anyakutujuna, eki yankwasize kurangirra;
56001004	ninkuhandiikira iwe Tito, omwana wange mali omu kwikiriza itwena oku tukuraatira: Ninkugondeza embabazi n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na Kristo Yesu Omujuni waitu.
56001005	Eki nakusigiire Kureete, nkenda ohikirize byona ebitarakozirwe, n'okukoma abakuru omu buli rubuga, nkooku nakuragiire,
56001006	Okome omuntu ataina eki barukumuhyemera, omusaija ayaswire omukazi omu, kandi aina abaana abarukwikiriza. Muntu atarukurangwaho ngeso mbi kandi atali ntahurra.
56001007	Omuroleerezi nkooku ali omukeeto wa Ruhanga, asemeriire kuba ataina eki barukumuhyemera; tasemeriire kwemanyaho muno rundi kubiihirwa bwango. Atali mutamiizi, omunyakiniga, rundi arukururukira ebintu;
56001008	baitu abe w'amakune, engonzi y'oburungi, arukwerema wenka, mwinganiza, ata omutima ha bya Ruhanga, kandi muntu arukwerinda.
56001009	Asemeriire kugumira ha bigambo eby'amazima nkooku yabyegesiibwe, nukwo asobole kusoborra abantu omu nyegesa enungi kandi asingule abarukugihakaniza.
56001010	Haroho abantu baingi entahurra, abarukubaza ebitarumu, engobya, okukira muno ab'omu kitebe ky'abasazirwe.
56001011	Abo basemeriire kuculeezibwa, habwokuba nibajuumika amaka maingi, nibeegesa ebi batasemeriire kwegesa, nukwo beetungire sente.
56001012	Omu hali bo, omurangi waabu nyakabara, akagira ati: “Abakureete obutoosa babiiha ebisuba, nyamaiswa mbi, b'omukoijo kandi bagara.”
56001013	Kandi binu ebi yagambire by'amazima. Nahabweki Abakureete obacoomere n'amaani, nukwo bafooke bagumu omu kwikiriza.
56001014	Baleke kuta omutima ha nganikyo ez'okwehangahanga ez'Abayudaaya, rundi ha nyegesa ez'abantu abarukwanga amazima.
56001015	Hali abasemiire, ebintu byona bisemera; baitu hali abasiisikaire n'abatarukwikiriza, busaho ekisemera; habwokuba emitima yabu yonyini n'ebiteekerezo byabu bikasiisikara.
56001016	Bagamba ngu, bamanyire Ruhanga, baitu omu bikorwa byabu bamwanga. Bali bantu abanugwa, ntahurra, abatasobora kukora akantu koona akarungi.
56002001	Baitu iwe Tito, oyegese ebirukuhikaana n'enyegesa ey'amazima.
56002002	Teererra abagurusi babe beegendereza, beekambi, b'amagezi, bagumu omu kwikiriza, omu kugonza n'omu kugumiisiriza.
56002003	Abakaikuru, nabo bateererre nkooku otereriire abagurusi. Babe n'engeso ezisemeriire abaikiriza, baleke kuhangirra, abantu kulemwa etamiiro; baitu beegese ebirungi,
56002004	nukwo batendeke abakazi abato okugonza baibabo n'abaana baabu.
56002005	Babeegese kuba abarukwetegereza, abatarukusiihana, babe bakazi abanyakutegeka amaka gaabu, banyambabazi kandi abarukworobera baibabo, nukwo ekigambo kya Ruhanga kireke kugaywa.
56002006	Abasigazi nabo obeekambise, beege kwetanga.
56002007	Omu byona ebi okora, weyoleke oli kyokurorraho, eky'ebikorwa ebirungi, kandi omu nyegesa yaawe weyoleke oli w'amazima kandi w'amaani.
56002008	Oyegese ebigambo ebihikire kandi ebitasobora kugaywa, nukwo arukukuhakaniza akwatwe ensoni, aburwe ekibi eki arukutugambaho.
56002009	Gambira abairu bahurre bakama baabu, kandi baboorobere omu byona, batarukubateeza mpaka.
56002010	Baleke kwekomakoma ebintu, baitu boolekere kimu obwesigwa obw'amazima, nukwo omu byona basobole kuhaisa ekitiinisa enyegesa ya Ruhanga Omujuni waitu.
56002011	Habwokuba embabazi za Ruhanga zizookere omu nsi kujuna abantu boona,
56002012	zaatwegesa okwanga obukafiiri n'okuteegomba eby'ensi, twikale tuli beerinzi, b'amananu, nitutiina Ruhanga omu nsi munu,
56002013	tutegeriize okutunga eki twanihizibwe. Nukwo okuzooka okw'ekitiinisa okwa Ruhanga waitu Rutakirwa kandi n'Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo,
56002014	ayayehaireyo habwaitu okutucungura, naatwiha omu bubi bwona kandi naayeyereza abantu be, nubo abo abeekambira okukora ebirungi.
56002015	Ebintu ebi, obirangirre. Kandi oteererre abantu baawe noohana n'obusobozi bwona. Otaikiriza muntu n'omu kukugaya.
56003001	Abantu baawe obaijukye okworobera abalemi n'ab'obusobozi. Obeegese okubahurra beeteekanize okukora omulimo gwona omurungi.
56003002	Baleke kubazaaho kubi muntu weena. Beerinde enkungani, babe baculeezi, kandi booleke abantu boona amakune agahikire.
56003003	Habwokuba na itwe kara tukaba tuli basema, ntahurra, bantu abahabire, abarukulemwa okwegomba okubi n'okwegonza kwa buli mulingo. Twaikaraga omu itima n'ihali, nitunobwa abantu kandi nitunobangana.
56003004	Baitu embabazi za Ruhanga Omujuni waitu n'engonzi ze ha bantu obu zaazookere,
56003005	yatujuna. Hatali habw'oburungi bw'ebi twakozire, baitu habw'embabazi ze. Akatwogya tuzaarwe obwa kabiri kandi tufooke bahyaka omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
56003006	Mwoyo ogu Ruhanga akamutuseesiraho atarukubalirra, naamurabya omu Yesu Kristo Omujuni waitu,
56003007	nukwo embabazi ze ituhikirize, tufooke bagwetwa abarukunihira kutunga obwomeezi obutahwaho.
56003008	Ebigambo ebi by'amazima. Ebigambo ebi, ninyenda obiteho amaani, nukwo abo abaikiriize Ruhanga bateho omutima okukora ebikorwa ebirungi. Ebigambo ebi birungi kandi nibigasira abantu.
56003009	Baitu oyetantale empaka ez'obudoma n'okurondereza eby'obuzaale. Oyetantale okukungana n'okuhakaniza ensoborra z'Ebiragiro, habwokuba ebi tibiri by'omugaso kandi tibirumu nsa.
56003010	Omuntu arukkuteeza empaka, obu omara kumuhabura omurundi gumu rundi ebiri, omuleke;
56003011	noomanya omuntu arukukora ati nkooku amazire kuhaba kandi asiisire. Nawe wenka naayesingisa omusango.
56003012	Obu ndikutumira Aritemisi rundi Tikiko, okole kyona eki orukusobora okumpikaho bwango, onsange Nikopoli, habwokuba oku nuho ncwiremu kumara ebiro by'obutiti.
56003013	Okole kyona eki orukusobora kuboherra Zeena Looya hamu n'Apolo omu rugendo rwabu. Ocwe goona batunge ebi barukwetaaga.
56003014	Abantu baitu leka beege okukora ebikorwa ebirungi, nukwo batungise bagenzi baabu ebi barukwetaaga, baleke kwikara kwonka bataina mugaso.
56003015	Boona aba ndi nabo nibakuramukya. Na iwe oturamukize boona abanyakutugonza, abaturukuteerana nabo omu kwikiriza. Embabazi za Ruhanga zikale na inywe inywena.
57001001	Nyowe Paulo, omunyankomo habwa Kristo Yesu, na Timoteho mugenzi waitu, Nitukuhandiikira iwe Fileemoni omugonzibwa kandi omukozi mugenzi waitu,
57001002	na Afiya munyaanya-itwe, na Arikipo omuserikale mugenzi waitu, n'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza abeesorooleza omu nju yaawe:
57001003	Nitubagondeza emigisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali MUKAMA Yesu Kristo.
57001004	Obutoosa obu nkwijuka omu kusaba kwange, nsiima Ruhanga wange.
57001005	Habwokuba mpurra ha kugonza n'okwikiriza ebi orukwoleka MUKAMA Yesu na bantu be boona.
57001006	Kandi ninsaba ngu, okukwataniza n'abandi omu kwikiriza kunu kwongere kukukengesa ebirungi byona ebi twatungire omu Kristo.
57001007	Mugenzi wange, engonzi zaawe zindetiire omuhimbo kandi zimpuumwize, habwokuba oruhurwire emitima y'abantu ba Ruhanga.
57001008	Nukwo nu, noobu ndaaba ntarukutiina kukuragira omu Kristo okukora ekirukwetagwa,
57001009	baitu habw'engonzi nyina eki ndukukusaba, nyowe Paulo omukwenda kandi omu kasumi kanu omunyankomo habwa Kristo Yesu.
57001010	Ninkwesengereza habw'Oneesimo, ou nfoire mwana wange ndi omu nkomo. (
57001011	Kara akaba atarukukugasira, baitu hati omu mazima naakugasira muno, kandi na nyowe naangasira.)
57001012	Ngugwo mmukugaruliire nk'arukukugarurra omutima gwange gwonyini.
57001013	Naakugondeze kwikara nawe, ampeereze omu kiikaro kyawe, nkyali omu nkomo habw'Amakuru Amarungi.
57001014	Baitu mmaliriire kutakora kintu na kimu otaikiriize, nukwo oburungi bwawe buleke kuba bw'akagemo, baitu bube bw'okwegondeza wenka.
57001015	Rundi nikyo yakurugiireho kumara akaanya kake, nukwo osobole kugarukanganira kimu nawe,
57001016	atakyali mwiru, baitu naakiraho. Afookere ow'oruganda omugonzibwa, okukira muno hali nyowe, kiraasura ki hali iwe, arukwikara nawe omu mubiri n'omu MUKAMA.
57001017	Obu oraaba nonyeta mutaahi waawe, omujwahukirre nkooku waakujwahukiriire nyowe.
57001018	Obu araaba yakusobiize rundi aina ibanja lyawe lyona, olitonge nyowe.
57001019	Nyowe Paulo, kinu ninyija kukihandiika nyenka n'omukono gwange nti: Ibanja eri ndirisasura--tindukwenda n'okukwijukya nkooku onyinaho ibanja, kandi ibanja eri niiwe wonyini.
57001020	Nukwo mugenzi wange, ninyenda onkoonyere omu MUKAMA. Ohuumuze omutima gwange nk'omunyaruganda omu Kristo.
57001021	Habw'okwesiga nkooku oli muhulizi, nkuhandiikire nimmanya nti: Oraakora ebindukukugamba, n'okubikizaaho obikizeeho.
57001022	Kandi ekindi, onteekanirize h'okuraara. Habw'okusaba kwanyu ninihira kulekerwa, mbagarukire.
57001023	Epafura, omunyankomo mutaahi wange omu Kristo Yesu, naakuramukya.
57001024	Mariko, Aristariko, Deema, na Luka abakozi bagenzi bange, nabo nibakuramukya.
57001025	Embabazi za MUKAMA Yesu Kristo zikale na iwe.
58001001	Ira Ruhanga yabalizaaga baisenkuruitwe omu miringo nyingi kandi etarukusisana, naaraba omu barangi;
58001002	baitu omu biro binu ebirukumalirra, itwe atugambiriire omu Mwana, ou yataireho abe mugwetwa w'ebintu byona, kandi omuli uwe nuho yahangirre ensi.
58001003	Nuwe kwangasana kw'ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga, kandi kisisani kyonyini eky'obwaruhanga bwe, iguru n'ensi abihangiize n'ekigambo kye ky'obusobozi. Obu yamazire kukora eky'okwogyaho ebibi, yaikarra omwiguru ha mukono gw'obulyo ogwa Ruteerengwa,
58001004	naakirra kimu bamalaika obukuru, nk'ibara yarukirwe oku lirukukira agaabo ekitiinisa.
58001005	Malaika ki Ruhanga ou aragambire ati: “Iwe oli Mwana wange, nakuzaara kiro kya hati”? Rundi ati: “Nyowe ndiba Ise, nawe abe Mwana wange”?
58001006	Kandi obu yaleesire omuzigaijo omunsi akagamba ati: “Bamalaika ba Ruhanga boona bamuramye.”
58001007	Ha bamalaika, Ruhanga akagamba ati: “Nuwe arukuhindura bamalaika miyaga, kandi abaheereza be ndimi z'omurro.”
58001008	Baitu ha Mwana agamba ati: “Ai Ruhanga ekitebe kyawe, kiikaraho ebiro n'ebiro, omwigo ogw'obwinganiza nugwo mwigo ogw'obukama bwawe.
58001009	Okagonza obuhikiriire, wanoba obubi; nikyo Ruhanga, Ruhanga wawe yakusorooliire, yakuha ekitiinisa kukira bataahi baawe.”
58001010	Kandi ati: “Ai MUKAMA, omu kubanza niiwe wataireho omusingi gw'ensi, kandi iguru, mulimo gw'engaro zawe;
58001011	ebi birihwaho, baitu Iwe olisigaraho, byona birikura nk'ekijwaro,
58001012	olibikuba nk'esuuka, kandi birihindurwa nkooku bahindura ekijwaro. Baitu Iwe tohinduka, kandi emyaka yawe terihwaho.”
58001013	Malaika ki ou aragambire ati: “Ikarra ha mukono gwange ogw'obulyo, okuhika abanyanzigwa baawe obu ndibafoora akatebe k'ebigere byawe”?
58001014	Bamalaika boona teri myoyo erukuheereza Ruhanga? Enyakutumwa kuheereza abo abali b'okujunwa?
58002001	Nikyo tusemeriire kuta muno omutima hali ebi twahuliire, tutaikara kubirugaho.
58002002	Baitu Ebiragiro ebyagambirwe bamalaika, obu biriba byabaire by'amaani gati, nukwo weena atarukubihondera rundi atarukubihurra akaheebwa ekifubiro ekimusemeriire,
58002003	itwe tulitabuka tuta obu tulinagaija okujunwa okurukwingana aho? MUKAMA nuwe yabandize kukuturangirra, hanyuma abo abaamuhuliire nabo bakatumanyisa okujunwa oku.
58002004	Ruhanga nawe yakugumyaga n'oburorwaho, ebihuniriza, n'ebyamahano ebitali bimu, hamu n'ebisembo bya Mwoyo Ahikiriire ebi agaba nkooku agonza.
58002005	Bamalaika tibali nubo Ruhanga yahaire obusobozi bw'okulema ensi erukugenda kwija, ei turukubazaaho.
58002006	Haroho nambere kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Omuntu kintu ki, Iwe kumwijuka, rundi omwana w'omuntu, Iwe kumutaho omutima?
58002007	Okamumaza akaanya, atakaingaine bamalaika; wagaruka wamujweka ekondo y'ekitiinisa n'ey'okutiinwa,
58002008	wamuha okulema ebintu byona; byona okabita omu mikono ye.” Ruhanga obu yamuhaire okulema ebintu byona, taina na kimu eki ataramuhaire okulema. Baitu kuhika hati, titukarozire ebintu byona nibimuhurra.
58002009	Kwihaho Yesu ogu ayamazire akaanya atakaingaine bamalaika, hati nitumurora ajwaire ekondo ey'ekitiinisa kandi ey'okutiinwa eyamurugiire omu kufa oku yarabiremu; nukwo, habw'embabazi za Ruhanga, akaba naasobora kufa habw'abantu boona.
58002010	Ruhanga anyakuhanga kandi anyakwikazaaho ebintu byona, obu yagondeze kutaahya abantu baingi omu kitiinisa kye, akaba asemeriire kubanza kuhikiriza ogu ayabaleetiire okujunwa naamurabya omu busaalizi.
58002011	Habwokuba ogu anyakweza, aina obuzaale bumu n'abo abanyakwezibwa. Nikyo atakwatirwa nsoni kubeeta bagenzi be,
58002012	naagamba ati: “Ebikubyo byawe ndibirangirra bagenzi bange, ndikunyumiza omu kitebe hagati.”
58002013	Na handi ati: “Ruhanga ndamwesiga.” Kandi ati: “Dora ndi hanu, hamu n'abantu Ruhanga aba yampaire.”
58002014	Nahabweki abaana ab'oruganda rumu nkooku basisaniza omubiri n'esagama, na Yesu nukwo yayefoire muntu nka bo, nukwo habw'okufa kwe asobole kuhwerekereza ogu anyakulema orufu, nuwe Sitaani,
58002015	n'okujuna abo boona abaamazire obwomeezi bwabo omu bwiru bw'okutiina orufu.
58002016	Mazimakwo bamalaika tibali nubo yaizire kujuna, baitu akaija kujuna baijukuru ba Abburahamu.
58002017	Habweki kikamuhikirra kusisana bagenzi be omu buli kintu, nukwo asobole kufooka nyakatagara omukuru, ow'embabazi kandi omwesigwa omu kuheereza Ruhanga, aleherre abantu habw'ebibi byabo.
58002018	Uwe wenyini nkooku yabonabonesiibwe kandi yayohebwa, nikyo arukusoborra kukoonyera abo abarukwohebwa.
58003001	Nahabweki ab'oruganda abarukwera, inywe abaayesirwe kubagana obwomeezi obw'omwiguru, mute ebiteekerezo byanyu hali Yesu omukwenda wa Ruhanga kandi nyakatagara omukuru ow'enyikiriza yaitu.
58003002	Akaba ali mwesigwa hali Ogu ayamutaireho, nka Musa nawe oku yabaire mwesigwa omunju ya Ruhanga yoona.
58003003	Baitu Yesu akaba asemeriire kuheebwa ekitiinisa kingi okukira Musa, omwombeki w'enju nkooku aheebwa akitiinisa okukira enju enyakwombekwa. (
58003004	Habwokuba buli nju yoona egira anyakugyombeka, baitu omwombeki w'ebintu byona nuwe Ruhanga.)
58003005	Musa akaba ali mwesigwa omu nju ya Ruhanga nk'omuheereza kandi kaiso w'okugumya ebintu Ruhanga akaba ali w'okusoborra hanyuma;
58003006	baitu Kristo akaba ali mwesigwa omunju ya Ruhanga nk'omutabani. Na itwe tuli nju ya Ruhanga obu turaaba nitugumiza kimu obwesige bwaitu kandi nitwenyumiza habw'ebi tunihira kutunga.
58003007	Nikyo Mwoyo Ahikiriire yagambiire ati: “Kiro kinu obu murahurra iraka lye,
58003008	mutagumanganiza emitima yanyu nk'abaanyemiire omwirungu ha kiro kyabo eky'okulengesibwa,
58003009	nambere baisenkuru inywe baanjwahisize, kunu bakaba bamazire emyaka makumi ana nibarora ebi ndukukora.
58003010	Nikyo nabiihiriirwe ab'obusinge bunu, nagamba nti: ‘Obutoosa bahaba omu biteekerezo byabo; kandi tibamanyire mihanda yange’
58003011	Nikyo narahiriire nyina ekiniga nti: ‘Tibali b'okutaaha omu buhuumuro bwange.’ ”
58003012	Bagenzi bange mwegendereze, tihaikara kubaho omu omuli inywe arukugira omutima mubi, ogutarukwikiriza, ogurukutwaliriza okuruga hali Ruhanga omwomeezi.
58003013	Baitu muhanangane buli kasumi. Obu muba mukyaina “akasumi”, haleke kubaho n'omu omuli inywe agumanganizibwa obugobya bw'ekibi.
58003014	Kakuba tugumiza kimu obwesige bwaitu obwabandize, tukabuhikya ha mpero, nitwija kubagana ha birungi bya Kristo.
58003015	Nikyo kyahandiikiirwe kiti: “Kiro kinu obu murahurra iraka lye, mutagumanganiza emitima yanyu nk'abaanyemiire.”
58003016	Nibaha abo abaahuliire, bakagaruka baayema? Tinubo abo boona abaarugire Misiri beebembiirwe Musa?
58003017	Kandi nibaha aba yabiihiriirwe okumara emyaka makumi ana? Tinubo abo abasiisire, kandi emitumbi yabo yagaramirana omwirungi?
58003018	Nibaha aba yarahiriire ngu, tibali b'okutaaha omu buhuumuro bwe? Tinubo abo abaayemere?
58003019	Habweki niturora nkooku baalemerwe kutaaha habw'okutaikiriza kwabo.
58004001	Nahabweki obu hakyaroho okunihira okw'okutaaha omu buhuumuro bwa Ruhanga, twerinde tihaikara kubaho omu hali inywe arukusangwa alemerwe kubutaahamu.
58004002	Na itwe Amakuru Amarungi tukagahurra nka bo oku baagahuliire, baitu ebigambo ebi baahuliire bitabagasire, habwokuba abaabihuliire bakasangwa bataina kwikiriza.
58004003	Itwe abaikiriize, tulitaaha omu buhuumuro obu, obu yabalizeho ati: “Nikyo narahiriire nyina ekiniga nti: ‘Tibali b'okutaaha omu buhuumuro bwange.’ ” Kandi kunu emirimo ye yoona ekaba ehoire okuruga obu yahangire ensi.
58004004	Haroho na handi omu Byahandiikirwe nambere yabalize ha kiro kya musanju ati: “Ruhanga akahuumura ha kiro kya musanju, amazire emirimo ye yoona.”
58004005	Aho nuho yasigikiire kugamba ati: “Tibali b'okutaaha omu buhuumuro bwange.”
58004006	Hakabaho abo abaabandize kuhurra Amakuru Amarungi, baalemwa kutaaha omu buhuumuro bwa Ruhanga habw'obutaikiriza bwabo; baitu haroho abandi ab'okubutaaha.
58004007	Nikyo Ruhanga yateerireho akasumi akarukwetwa “Kiro kinu”, naabaliza omu Daudi haahingwireho emyaka nyingi, omu bigambo ebi naruga kujurra nti: “Kiro kinu obu murahurra iraka lye, mutagumanganiza emitima yanyu.”
58004008	Kakuba Yoswa yahikize Abaisirairi omu buhuumuro obu, Ruhanga tiyaakugarukire kubazaho kiro ekindi.
58004009	Nukwo nu, hakyaroho ekihuumuro ekirukusisa ekya Sabbato, ekyahuliirwe abantu ba Ruhanga,;
58004010	kandi weena anyakutaaha omu buhuumuro bwa Ruhanga aleka emirimo ye, Ruhanga nkooku yalekere eye.
58004011	Nahabweki, katwekambe okutaaha omu buhuumuro obu, haleke kubaho n'omu arukunagwa obutaikiriza nk'obu.
58004012	Habwokuba ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyomiire kandi nikikora; kitoire okukira empirima ey'amoogi abiri. Kicumita nikitaaha omunda okubaganiza omutima n'omwoyo, okubaganiza engiga n'omusoina. Kyetegereza ebiteekerezo by'omuntu n'entegeka y'omutima gwe.
58004013	Busaho kihangwa na kimu ekiserekerwe amaiso ga Ruhanga, byona nibirorwa kurungi kandi bisuukuliirwe amaiso g'Ogu ou turukwija kwetonganaho.
58004014	Obu turaaba twina nyakatagara omukuru ayatembere omwiguru, nuwe Yesu Omwana wa Ruhanga, katugumire ha enyikiriza yaitu.
58004015	Habwokuba titwina nyakatagara omukuru atarukusobora kuganya na itwe omu buceke bwaitu; baitu twina ogu ayayohiibwe omu miringo yoona nka itwe, kyonka tiyasiisa.
58004016	Aho nu, katwirre haihi ekitebe kya Ruhanga ow'embabazi tutarukutiina, nukwo tusobole kuganyirwa n'okutunga emigisa ey'okutukoonyera omu bwire obu turukugyetaagiramu.
58005001	Nyakatagara omukuru weena anyakukomwa omu bantu, ateebwaho kumarra abantu ebyabo ebiina obukwatane na Ruhanga, okuhonga ebisembo, n'okutamba ebyonzira habw'ebibi byabo.
58005002	Naasemerra kukwata mpora abatarukwetegereza n'abahabire, habwokuba nawe aina obuceke nk'abo.
58005003	Nahabweki kimuhikiriire kutamba ekyonzira habw'ebibi bye wenka, na habw'ebibi by'abandi.
58005004	Kandi busaho n'omu ayeha wenka obukuru obu, baitu ayetwa Ruhanga, nk'Arooni oku yayesirwe.
58005005	Kristo nawe ateekuze wenka nukwo afooke nyakatagara omukuru baitu akateebwaho Ogu ayamugambireho ati: “Iwe oli mwana wange, nkuzaire kiro kya hati.”
58005006	Na handi naagamba ati: “Iwe oli nyakatagara ebiro byona, ow'omu mulingo gwa Melikizedeki.”
58005007	Yesu, obu akaba ali omunsi, akasaba kandi akeesengereza naayamuza kandi narra amaizi, nayamirra Ogu ow'akaba naasobora kumujuna orufu; kandi Ruhanga akamuhurra habw'okwebundaaza omumaiso ge.
58005008	Noobu araaba yabaire Mwana wa Ruhanga, baitu okubonabonesibwa kwe kukamwegesa kuba muhulizi.
58005009	Obu yamazire kuhikirizibwa, yafooka ndugirro ey'okujunwa okutalihwaho habw'abo boona abamuhurra;
58005010	ningira Ruhanga akamurangirra nkooku ali nyakatagara omukuru, ow'omu mulingo gwa Melikizedeki.
58005011	Hali nyakatagara ogu, twina bingi eby'okubazaaho, baitu kigumire kubisoborra, habwokuba biro binu mufookere abatarukwetegereza bwango.
58005012	Omu kasumi kanu, noobu muraaba musemeriire kufooka beegesa b'abandi, nabwo nimwetaaga ondi ow'okubeegesa buhyaka engiga enkuru ez'ekigambo kya Ruhanga. Nimwetaaga amata, baitu bitali byokulya ebirukuguma.
58005013	Weena arukukuzibwa amata, takeetegeriize kurungi enyegesa enyakutuhikya ha kuhikirra, habwokuba akyali mwana.
58005014	Baitu ebyokulya ebirukuguma, biba by'abantu bakuru abamanyiire okwahurana oburungi n'obubi.
58006001	Nahabweki tulekere aho kwegesa engiga enkuru ez'enyegesa za Kristo ezi twabandiizeho, baitu tugende ha nyegesa ez'abantu abakuru, tutagaruka kutaho omusingi ogw'okuhindukira Ruhanga, rundi ogw'okuzira ebikorwa byaitu ebifiire.
58006002	Tulekere aho kwegesa ha mirwa y'okwezibwa, ha kuteebwaho emikono, ha kuhumbuuka kw'abafu, n'okucwerwa omusango okwa ha mpero.
58006003	Ebi tulibibazaaho Ruhanga obu alisiima.
58006004	Abo abaarugire ha kwikiriza basobora bata kugarurwa ha kuzira obwa kabiri? Haroho abamu abaamazire kujwerwa omusana gwa Ruhanga, abaaroleze ha burungi bwa Ruhanga, abaabagaine ha Mwoyo Ahikiriire
58006005	kandi abaakengere oburungi obw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'eby'amaani eby'ebiro ebirukwija.
58006006	Abo obu bagwa bakaruga ha nyikiriza yabo, tikisoboka kubagarra bakeegarukamu obwa kabiri, habwokuba bbo bonka beebambira Omwana wa Ruhanga ha musaraba kandi bamukwasa ensoni.
58006007	Bali nk'itaka Ruhanga eri aha mugisa nalinagira enjura emirundi nyingi nukwo limereze abalimi ebimera ebirungi.
58006008	Baitu obu limeza amahwa n'amatojo, liba litakyaina mugaso, liri haihi kukyenwa; empero yalyo, nukwo kwokebwa.
58006009	Noobu turaaba nitubaza tuti, baitu inywe abagonzibwa, nimumanya ebyanyu birungi okukiraho, kandi biraabahikya ha kujunwa.
58006010	Ruhanga mwinganiza, tarukwija kwebwa ebikorwa byanyu n'engonzi ezi mwayolekere habwe nimuheereza abantu ba Ruhanga nkooku murukukora hati.
58006011	Kandi nitwenda buli omu omuli inywe ayoleke obwekambi nk'obu okuhika ha mpero, nubwo ebi arukunihira kutunga birihikirizibwa.
58006012	Muleke kuturumuka, baitu mukuraatire abo abagwetiirwe ebyaraganiziibwe habw'okwikiriza n'okugumiisiriza kwabo.
58006013	Ruhanga, obu yaraganiize Abburahamu, habw'okutabaho ondi arukumukira obukuru ow'okurahira, akeerahira wenka,
58006014	naagamba ati: “Mazimakwo ndikuha omugisa kandi nkukanyise.”
58006015	Aho Abburahamu, obu yamazire kugumiisiriza, akatunga eki yaraganiziibwe.
58006016	Mazimakwo abantu barahira ogu arukubakira ekitiinisa kandi okurahira kubamara empaka zaabo zoona.
58006017	Ruhanga nawe obu yagondeze kunanurra kimu abagweterwa endagaano nkooku atahindura ntegeka ye, akagigumya n'ekirahiro.
58006018	Nukwo habw'ebintu ebi ebibiri ebitahinduka: entegeka ye n'ekirahiro nambere Ruhanga atasoborra kubiiha bisuba, itwe abaamwebingire tusobora kugarurwamu omutima nitunihirra kimu kutunga ebi yaturaganiize.
58006019	Okunihira oku twinakwo kuli nk'enyomyo egumire kandi etarukutengeeta enyakusibikwaho omwoyo. Nukwo okunihira okurukututaahya omu kiikaro ekirukwera omu nda, enyuma y'enyigamo,
58006020	nambere Yesu yagenzire habwaitu naatwebembera, amazire kufooka nyakatagara omukuru ow'ebiro n'ebiro ow'omulingo gwa Melikizedeki.
58007001	Melikizedeki ogu, omukama wa Saleemu kandi nyakatagara wa Ruhanga Rutakirwa, akaitirana Abburahamu naaruga ha bulemu nambere baitiire abakama, yamusabira omugisa.
58007002	Nubwo Abburahamu yamubaganiriizeeho ekicweka ekya ikumi ekya byona ebi yanyagire. Amakuru g'okubanza ag'ibara Melikizedeki nganu: omukama w'obuhikiriire, kandi lyongera limanyisa omukama wa Saleemu, amakuru gaakyo: omukama w'obusinge.
58007003	Omu Byahandiikirwe tibatwoleka ise rundi nyina, noobwakubaire obuzaale bwe. Tibooleka myaka ye nambere yabandiize noobwakubaire nambere agarukira; baitu bamusisaniza Omwana wa Ruhanga; aikara ali nyakatagara ebiro byona.
58007004	Murole omuntu ogu nkooku ali w'ekitiinisa! Isenkuru itwe Abburahamu akamuha ekicweka kimu ekya ikumi ky'eminyago yoona.
58007005	N'abaijukuru ba Leevi, abo abatunga omulimo ogw'obunyakatagara, baikirizibwa omu Biragiro okwihaho abantu bagenzi baabo ekicweka kya ikumi, kandi kunu nabo baijukuru ba Abburahamu.
58007006	Baitu omusaija ogu ataina buzaale nabo, Abburahamu akamuha kimu kya ikumi kandi yasabira omugisa Abburahamu ogu, Ruhanga ou yaragaine nawe.
58007007	Na hati kimanyirwe kurungi omukuru nuwe asabira omuto omugisa.
58007008	Biro binu ekicweka ekya ikumi kitungwa banyakatagara abanyakufa, baitu omu biro kya Melikizedeki kikatungwa nyakatagara ogu ou kyahandiikirweho ngu, tarukwija kufa.
58007009	Omuntu asobora kugamba ngu, Omuleevi ogu, hati anyakutunga ekicweka ekya ikumi, nawe akakiha nyakatagara ogu naaraba omu Abburahamu,
58007010	habwokuba akaba akyali mu sagama ya Abburahamu isenkuru obu yaitiraine Melikizedeki.
58007011	Hati nu obuhikiriire obu buraaba bwatungiirwe omu bunyakatagara bw'Abaleevi (nambere abantu baaheeriirwe Ebiragiro), bulyo ki obwakwetaagisize nyakatagara ondi ow'arukuruga omu rukarra rwa Melikizedeki, atali ow'omu rukarra orurukwetwa: “orw'Arooni”?
58007012	Ningira obu habaho empinduka omu bunyakatagara, buli n'omu Biragiro hasemeriire kubamu empinduka.
58007013	Kandi ogu arukugambwaho ebi byona, akaba atali w'oruganda orwarugwamuga muntu n'omu ow'okuheereza ha itambiro.
58007014	Kimanyirwe kurungi MUKAMA waitu nkooku yarugire omu ruganda rwa Yuda, kandi Musa taina na kimu eki yagambire ha bunyakatagara oburukuruga omu ruganda oru.
58007015	Eki nikigumibwa kurungi obu harukwija nyakatagara ondi arukusisana Melikizedeki ogu
58007016	ayafookere nyakatagara atarukusigikira ha migenzo y'obuzarranwa, baitu anyakusigikira ha busobozi obw'obwomeezi obutali bw'okuhwaho.
58007017	Habwokuba kikamuhandiikwaho kiti: “Iwe oli nyakatagara obusinge bwona, ow'omu mulingo gwa Melikizedeki.”
58007018	Ha rubaju rumu entegeka eyabandize ekaihwaho habw'obuceke n'obutagasa bwayo,
58007019	(habwokuba Ebiragiro bitaleete kuhikirra kwona); baitu ha rubaju orundi haizire okunihira okurukukira oburungi kandi okurukusobora kutwiriza haihi na Ruhanga.
58007020	Kandi eki kitakorwe hataroho ekirahiro.
58007021	Abo abaabandize kuba banyakatagara, bakaheebwa obukuru bwabo hataroho kurahira; baitu Yesu, uwe akabuheebwa n'ekirahiro ekirukugamba kiti: “MUKAMA akarahira kandi talyeijukya eki yarahiire ati: Oli nyakatagara obusinge bwona.”
58007022	Eki nikyo kyafoire Yesu okuba mwema w'endagaano erukukira oburungi.
58007023	Baanyakatagara abaabandize bakaba bali baingi nibahonderangana, habwokuba orufu rwabaihaga ha mulimo gwabu.
58007024	Baitu Yesu aikara ali nyakatagara obusinge bwona kandi obunyakatagara bwe bw'oruteekerro, tibugweterwa ondi.
58007025	Habweki ebiro byona asobora kujuna abo abeebinga Ruhanga nibaraba omuli uwe, habwokuba abaho okubatonganirra obutoosa.
58007026	Aho nu kikaba nikisemerra itwe kutunga nyakatagara omukuru nk'ogu, ahikiriire, ataina kabi noobu kakubaire kabara, asoroirwe omu basiisi, anyumiziibwe okukira eby'omu iguru byona.
58007027	Uwe tarukwetaaga kuhonga ebyonzira buli kiro nk'abanyakatagara abo abaabandize: rundi habw'ebibi bye, rundi habw'eby'abandi. Eki akakikora omurundi gumu yamara, obu yayehongere wenka.
58007028	Mazimakwo Ebiragiro bikataho abantu abaceke babe banyakatagara abakuru; baitu anyakutairweho ekirahiro ekyahozirwe hanyuma, nuwe Mwana anyakuhikiriziibwe obusinge bwona.
58008001	Ekikuru omuli ebi turukugamba nikyo kinu: Twina nyakatagara omukuru anyakwikaliire ha mukono ogw'obulyo ogw'Ekitebe ky'Anyakusinga omwiguru,
58008002	omuheereza ow'omu kiikaro ekirukwera kandi ow'omu heema nyakabara etarasimbirwe bantu, baitu eyasimbirwe MUKAMA.
58008003	Buli nyakatagara mukuru weena ateebwaho kuhonga ebisembo n'okutamba ebyonzira; nahabweki nyakatagara waitu ogu nawe asemeriire kugira eky'okuhonga.
58008004	Kakuba abaire akyali omu nsi, tiyaakubaire nyakatagara mukuru naakake, habwokuba haroho banyakatagara abandi abarukuhonga ebisembo Ebiragiro nkooku bituragira.
58008005	Omu byona ebi bakora bahondera ekyokurorraho kandi ekisisani ky'ebi ebikorwa omu kiikaro ekirukwera eky'omwiguru. Habwokuba Musa, obu akaba ayeteekanize kwemereza eheema, Ruhanga akamuhabura naagamba ati: “Taho omutima okukora ebintu byona noohondera ekisisani eki wayolekerwe ha rusozi.”
58008006	Kya mazima kugamba ngu, Kristo akaheebwa obuheereza oburukukira obwa ira ekitiinisa, habwokuba nuwe muteeraniza wa Ruhanga n'abantu omu ndagaano erukukiraho oburungi, enyakukoliirwe ha byaraganiziibwe ekirukukira oburungi.
58008007	Kakuba endagaano eyabandize etarabairemu nsobi, tihaakubaireho bulyo obw'okukora eya kabiri.
58008008	Baitu Ruhanga akarora abantu be nkooku basobeze, nukwo kugira ati: “MUKAMA akagamba ati: ‘Akasumi kalihika nkole endagaano empyaka na bantu ba Israiri n'oruganda rwa Yuda.
58008009	Endagaano etarukusisana n'eri ei nakozire n'abaisenkurubo ha kiro eki nabakwasire ha mukono nimbaiha omunsi ya Misiri. Bbo batagumire ha ndagaano yange, nikyo na nyowe nabaihiireho omutima.’
58008010	MUKAMA naayongera ati: Enu niyo ndagaano ei ndiragaana n'abantu ba Isirairi: ebiro ebi obu birihwaho ndita ebiragiro byange omu biteekerezo byabo, mbihandiike omu mitima yabo; kandi ndiba Ruhanga wabo, nabo babe bantu bange.
58008011	Abantu tibalyegesangana rundi omuntu kuhabura mugenzi we ati: ‘Manya MUKAMA’. Habwokuba boona balimmanya, okubandiza h'arukukira obuto omuli bo okuhika h'arukukirra kimu obukuru.
58008012	Na nyowe ndibaganyira obubi bwabo, kandi ebibi byabu tindigaruka kubiijuka. ”
58008013	Ruhanga obu arukubaza ha ndagaano empyaka, buli naadibya eya ira. Ningira kyona ekidiba kikakura, kiba kisigaize kuhwaho.
58009001	Endagaano eya ira nayo ekaba ina emigenzo ey'okuramya, hamu n'ekiikaro kyayo ekirukwera omunsi.
58009002	Hakaba haroho eheema. Omu rwemo rwayo orw'omu maiso nuho haikaraga ekikondo ky'etaara, emeeza, hamu n'omugaati ogw'Empongano. Orwemo oru rwayetwaga Ekiikaro Ekirukwera.
58009003	Enyuma y'enyigamo eya kabiri hakaba haliyo orwemo orwayetwaga Ekiikaro Ekirukwera ky'ebirukwera,
58009004	rurumu ekiswa kya zaabbu eky'okwoterraho omugaju, n'esanduuko ey'endagaano ehunzirwe zaabbu embaju zoona, nambere haikaraga ekibindi kya zaabu ekirumu maanu, omwigo gw'Arooni ogwarokiire, kandi ebibbali by'amabaale ag'endagaano.
58009005	Haruguru yayo haroho bamalaika ab'ekitiinisa ab'ekihanda ky'Abakerubbi, basiikiriize ekiikaro ky'okuganyirraho. Ebintu ebi byona, hati titusobora kubitondogorra.
58009006	Ebi obu byamazire kuteekanizibwa biti, banyakatagara baikaraga nibataaha omu rwemo orw'okubanza, nibakoramu emirwa yabo.
58009007	Baitu omu rwemo orwa kabiri hataahamuga omukuru w'abanyakatagara wenka, kandi yataahamuga omurundi gumu omu mwaka gwona, naatwara esagama ei yahayoga habwe na habw'ebibi by'abantu.
58009008	Omu ntegeka ezi ibiri, Mwoyo Ahikiriire naayoleka omuhanda ogurukutaaha omu kiikaro ekirukwera nkooku gutakabaire kukingurwa, orwemo orw'okubanza rukyaroho.
58009009	(Nurwo rumanyisa obusinge oburoho.) Entegeka egi nkooku ekaba eri, haaheebwayo ebisembo n'ebyonzira ebikaba bitarukusobora kuhikiriza omutima gw'omuntu arukuramya.
58009010	Nukwo kugamba, emirwa egi yakwataga ha byokulya, na ha byokunywa, na ha kunaaba okw'okweyeza okutali kw'omulingo gumu. Niyo mirwa eyatairweho kulinda emibiri yaitu okuhika ha kasumi ak'okugarra byona buhyaka obu kalihika.
58009011	Baitu Kristo obu yaizire ali nyakatagara omukuru ow'ebirungi ebiri by'okwija, akakingura enyigamo y'eheema erukukira obukuru n'obuhikiriire (etarakozirwe mikono y'abantu. Nukwo kugamba etali y'ensi enu).
58009012	Akataaha omu Kiikaro Ekirukwera ky'ebirukwera omurundi gumu yamara. Atatwalemu sagama y'embuzi rundi ey'enyana, baitu akatwara esagama ye yonyini, nukwo yatutungiire ati okucungurwa okutalihwaho.
58009013	Abantu abasiisi okubamiisira esagama y'embuzi, n'ey'enimi, rundi iju ery'ekyonzira ky'enyana, obu kuraaba nikweza omubiri,
58009014	esagama ya Kristo ayarabire omu Mwoyo Atahwaho kwehayo hali Ruhanga ataina kamogo, terikira muno kweza emitima yanyu okugiiha omu bikorwa ebifiire, nukwo muheereze Ruhanga Atafa!
58009015	Nahabweki Kristo nuwe muteeraniza ow'Endagaano Empyaka, nukwo abo abanyakwetwa, batunge obugwetwa obutahwaho obwaraganiziibwe. Okufa kwe okwabaireho nukwo kwabacungwire omu bibi ebi baakozire bakyali omu ndagaano eyabandize.
58009016	Okugweta tikubaho batakagumize ngu, kigweta afiire.
58009017	Batandika kugweta okurugirra ha kufa kwe, habwokuba okugweta tikubaho kigweta akyayomiire.
58009018	Noobwakubaire endagaano eyabandize ekagumibwa nihaseeswa esagama.
58009019	Musa obu yamazire kumanyisa abantu boona ebi baaragiirwe omu Biragiro, yakwata esagama ey'enyana n'ey'embuzi, hamu n'amaizi, naakozesa ebyoya by'entaama erukugaajuka n'akati ak'okumiisa, yamiisira ekitabu ky'endagaano n'abantu boona,
58009020	naagamba ati: “Enu niyo sagama ey'endagaano Ruhanga ei yabaragiire kuhondera.”
58009021	Kandi omu mulingo nugwo gumu yamiisira eheema n'ebikwato byona ebikozesibwa omu kuramya.
58009022	Mazimakwo omu Biragiro bya Musa haihi ebintu byona byezibwa, n'esagama kandi nambere hatali kuseesa sagama, tiharoho kuganyirwa ebibi.
58009023	Nahabweki ebintu ebirukusisana eby'omwiguru byasemerraga kwezibwa n'emirwa ey'okuseesa esagama; baitu ebintu byonyini eby'omwiguru, byo bisemerra kwezibwa n'ebyonzira ebirukukira binu oburungi.
58009024	Habwokuba Kristo atataahe omu Kiikaro Ekirukwera ekyakozirwe emikono y'abantu kandi ekirukusisana eky'omu iguru, baitu akataaha omu iguru lyonyini, nukwo azooke omu maiso ga Ruhanga kututonganirra.
58009025	Baitu uwe ateetaage kwikara naayehonga nk'omukuru wa banyakatagara oku ataaha omu Kiikaro Ekirukwera ky'ebirukwera buli mwaka, naahonga esagama etali ye nyabwe.
58009026	Kakuba kyabaire kiti, yakwikaire naabonabonesibwa okuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi. Baitu akasumi ako, obu kahoireho, akazooka omurundi gumu yamara, nukwo aiheho ebibi naayehonga wenka.
58009027	Kandi abantu boona nkooku baateerirweho okufa omurundi gumu, hanyuma bakacwerwa omusango,
58009028	Kristo nawe akatambwa omurundi gumu nayetweka ebibi by'abaingi, kandi alizooka obwakabiri atarukwizirra ebibi, baitu kujuna abo abamutegeriize n'ekihika.
58010001	Ebiragiro bya Musa tibirukutwoleka ebirungi byonyini ebirukugenda kwija, baitu kisisani kyabyo. Ebiragiro eby'emigenzo ey'okuhonga ebyonzira buli mwaka, tibisobora kweza abo abanyakuramya.
58010002	Ebiragiro obu biraaba byasoboire kubeeza, ebyonzira ebi tibyakulekiirwe kutambwa? Abanyakuramya obu baraaba baayeziibwe omurundi gumu baamara, tibaakwongiire kwemanyaho ebibi.
58010003	Baitu okuhonga ebyonzira ebi buli mwaka kuba nikwijukya abantu ebibi byabo.
58010004	Habwokuba esagama ey'enimi n'ey'embuzi tesobora kwihaho bibi.
58010005	Kristo obu yaizire omunsi, nikyo yagambiire ati: “Ebyonzira n'ebihongwa tobyenda, baitu okanteekaniriza omubiri,
58010006	Ebihongwa ebyokeze kandi ebiheebwayo habw'ebibi tobyetaaga.
58010007	Na nyowe nukwo kugira nti: ‘Ai Ruhanga, dara nyowe, nyizire kukora ebi orukwenda’, nkooku kyampandiikirweho omu kitabu ky'Ebiragiro.”
58010008	Aho nambere yagambiire ati: “Toyenda kandi toyetaaga byonzira n'ebihongwa, noobu byakubaire ebihongwa ebyokeze kandi ebiheebwayo habw'ebibi” (ebi nibyo bihongwa ebisangwa omu Biragiro),
58010009	akongera yagamba ati: “Dara nyowe, nyizire kukora ebi orukwenda.” Kristo nukwo yadibize ati ebyonzira eby'okubanza, agumye ekyonzira ekye,
58010010	Kandi Kristo habw'okukora Ruhanga ebi yayenzire, itwe tukeezibwa omubiri gwe ogwahongerwe omurundi gumu kyahwa.
58010011	Buli nyakatagara ayemerra buli kiro naakora omulimo gwe, aikara naahonga ebyonzira ebi ebitasobora kwihaho bibi.
58010012	Baitu Kristo obu yamazire kuhonga ekyonzira kimu eky'ebiro byona habw'ebibi, yaikarra ha mukono gw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga.
58010013	Okuruga obu, aikara naategereza okuhika abanyanzigwa be Ruhanga obu alibafoora akatebe k'ebigere bye.
58010014	Omu kuhonga ekyonzira ekimu eki, abo aba ayeza akabahikiriza ebiro byona.
58010015	Mwoyo Ahikiriire nawe naatunanura. Okubanza akagira ati:
58010016	“MUKAMA akagamba ati: Akasumi ako obu kalihwaho, enu niyo ndagaano ei ndiragaana nabo: Ndita Ebiragiro byange omu mitima yabo, kandi mbihandiike omu biteekerezo byabo.”
58010017	Kandi yayongera ati: “Tindigarukira kwijuka ebibi byabo n'ensobi zabo.”
58010018	Ebibi obu bimara okuganyirwa, haba hatakyaroho kubihongerra.
58010019	Habweki ab'oruganda, nitunihira okutaaha Ekiikaro Ekirukwera habw'esagama ya Yesu,
58010020	nituraba omu muhanda omuhyaka ogu yatutemiire kandi oguraba omu nyigamo eyomiire, nugwo mubiri gwa Kristo.
58010021	Itwe abaina nyakatagara omukuru arukurolerra Enju yoona ya Ruhanga,
58010022	katwirre Ruhanga haihi twina omutima ogw'amazima n'okwikiriza okugumire. Emitima yaitu emazire kusemezibwa, erugire omu biteekerezo ebibi, kandi emibiri yaitu eyogiibwe n'amaizi amarungi,
58010023	katugumire ha kunihira oku twinakwo tutarukutengeta, habwokuba Ruhanga ayaraganiize, mwesigwa.
58010024	Katurole nkooku tusobora kwekambisangana omu ngonzi n'omu bikorwa ebirungi,
58010025	tutarukuba bagara omu kwesorooza kusaba, abamu nkooku bakora; baitu twimukyangane, okukira muno obu murukurora Ekiro nikirra haihi.
58010026	Kakuba twongera kusiisa, kunu tumazire kumanya amazima, haba hatakyaroho kyonzira eky'okwihaho ebibi;
58010027	baitu haba haroho kulindirra n'obutiini omusango ogulicwibwa n'ekibabu ky'omurro ogulimarraho kimu abeemi.
58010028	Omuntu anyakucwa Ebiragiro bya Musa obu arumurizibwa bakaiso babiri rundi basatu, aitwa hatali kuganyirwa.
58010029	Nimuteekereza omuntu ayagayire Omwana wa Ruhanga, yafurungura esagama ey'endagaano eyamwereze, yabiihiza Mwoyo ow'embabazi, ogu alitunga ekifubiro ekirukwinganaha?
58010030	Ningira nitumanya ayagambire ati: “Okuhoora enzigu kwange, ninyowe ndihoora.”
58010031	Kintu kya mahano okugwa omu mikono ya Ruhanga omwomeezi.
58010032	Mwijuke ebiro ebyahingwire obu mwamazire kumulikirwa, mukabanza kurwana n'amaani nimugumiisiriza emihito.
58010033	Obundi n'obundi mukeemerezibwa omu maiso g'abantu, babajume kandi babasaalize. Obundi mwabalirwaga omuli abo abaajumirwe bati.
58010034	Habwokuba mwagirraga abanyankomo embabazi, mwaikirizaaga n'omutima gumu kunyagwa ebintu byanyu, ningira mukaba nimumanya nkooku mwina itungo erirukukiraho oburungi kandi eritahwaho.
58010035	Nahabweki muleke kusiisa obwesige bwanyu obulibarugiramu empeera enkooto.
58010036	Nimwetaaga kugumiisiriza, nukwo mukole Ruhanga ebi agonza kandi mutunge ebi yaraganiize.
58010037	Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Hasigaire akasumi kake, ogu arukwija aije, kandi tarukwija kukerererwa;
58010038	omuheereza wange omwesigwa aligumira ha kwikiriza, baitu obu aligaruukirra, omwoyo gwange tigulimusiima.”
58010039	Itwe tituli omuli abo abagaruukirra bakahwerekerra, baitu tuli omuli abo abaina okwikiriza, bakajuna emyoyo yabo.
58011001	Okwikiriza nukwo kurukugumya ebintu ebinihirwa, kandi kurukutunanura ha bintu ebitarorwa.
58011002	Okwikiriza oku nukwo kwaleetiire abantu aba ira okusiimwa Ruhanga.
58011003	Okwikiriza kukatukengesa ensi nkooku yahangirwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga. Nahabweki ebirukurorwa bikahangwa nibiihwa omu bitarukurorwa.
58011004	Habw'okwikiriza, kwe akahongera Ruhanga ekyonzira ekyasiimirwe okukira ekya Kaini, nikyo yasiimirwe yabalirwa omu bahikiriire. Eki Ruhanga akakigumya naikiriza ebi yamuhongiire. Kandi Abeli ogu, noobu aliba yafiire, baitu habw'okwikiriza kwe naakyatwegesa na hati.
58011005	Habw'okwikiriza, Enoka akatwarwa omwiguru atafiire; kandi atagaruke kuzooka habwokuba Ruhanga nuwe yamutwaire. Obu akaba atakatwairwe, akasiimwa Ruhanga nkooku kyahandiikirwe.
58011006	Nambere hatali kwikiriza, omuntu tasobora kusiimwa Ruhanga. Weena anyakwirra haihi Ruhanga asemeriire kumwikiriza nkooku aroho kandi aheera abo abamuserra.
58011007	Habw'okwikiriza, Noha obu yahabwirwe Ruhanga namwoleka ebirukwija kubaho, akahurra kurungi, yakora eryato erikooto ery'okujuna eka ye. Habw'okwikiriza kwe, akasingisa ensi omusango, yafooka mugwetwa w'obuhikiriire obuleetwa okwikiriza.
58011008	Habw'okwikiriza, Abburahamu akahurra obu yayesirwe okuruga owaabu agende omunsi ei ekaba naija kuheebwa. Akaimukya orugendo atarukumanya h'arukugenda.
58011009	Habw'okwikiriza akaikara omunsi ei yaraganiziibwe ali nk'omunyaihanga omunsi egi, yararaaga omu heema nka Isaaka na Yakobbo oku baakozire, nubo abaagwetirwe hamu nawe ebyaraganiziibwe.
58011010	Akaba naategereza orubuga orwina emisingi egumire, orwayombekerwe kandi orwakozirwe Ruhanga.
58011011	Habw'okwikiriza, Saara akasobora kutwara enda noobwakubaire akaba ahingwize emyaka ey'okuzaara, habwokuba akaikiriza ogu ayamuraganiize nkooku ali mwesigwa.
58011012	Habweki omusaija ogu omu, ow'akaba ahoireyo ati, akarugwamu abaijukuru baingi abarukwingana enyunyuuzi eza haiguru, kandi abali nk'omusenyi ogutarukubarwa ogwa ha musa gw'enyanja.
58011013	Abo boona bakafa nibaikiriza batakatungire ebyaraganiziibwe, baitu bamazire kubirebera hara n'okubigirra ekihika, nibeemanya nkooku bali banyamahanga kandi bazaahisiibwe omunsi.
58011014	Ningira abarukwemanya bati nibooleka nkooku barukuserra obuzaarwa bwabo.
58011015	Kakuba baajuzire ensi ei baarugiremu, baakusoboire kugarukayo.
58011016	Baitu bbo nibeegomba ensi erukukiraho oburungi, niyo ey'omwiguru. Nahabweki Ruhanga tarukukwatwa nsoni kwetwa Ruhanga wabu, habwokuba nuwe yabateekaniriize orubuga.
58011017	Habw'okwikiriza, Abburahamu obu yalengerwe, akahayo Isaaka. Nukwo kugamba, ogu ow'akaba ahairwe endagaano akaikiriza okutamba omwana we omu wenka
58011018	ayagambirweho ati: “Isaaka nuwe alikurugiramu abaijukuru.”
58011019	Abburahamu akagumya Ruhanga nkooku asobora kuhumbuura abantu noobu baraaba bafiire; nikyo Abburahamu yagaruliriirwe omwana we, nk'anyakurugire omu bafu.
58011020	Habw'okwikiriza, Isaaka akasabira Yakobbo na Esau emigisa akasumi kayo katakahikire.
58011021	Kandi habw'okwikiriza, Yakobbo obu akaba ali haihi kufa, abaana boona ba Yosefu akabasabira omugisa ainamire ha ntuli y'omwigo gwe naaramya Ruhanga.
58011022	Habw'okwikiriza, Yosefu obu akaba ali haihi kufa, akaranga Abaisirairi nkooku baliruga omunsi ya Misiri kandi yaragira omulingo balimuziikamu.
58011023	Habw'okwikiriza, Musa obu yazairwe, abazaire be bakamuserekera ameezi asatu. Habw'okurora omwana ali murungi, batatiine kiragiro ky'omukama w'ensi egi.
58011024	Habw'okwikiriza, Musa obu yakuzire, akanga kwetwa mutabani wa muhara wa Faraaho,
58011025	yasiima kukorwa kubi hamu n'abantu ba Ruhanga, okukira okwegondeza omu kusemererwa kw'ekibi okumara akacu kake.
58011026	Akateekereza okujumwa habwa Kristo nkooku kiri ky'omuhendo okukira obuguuda bwona obwa Misiri. Omutima gwe akaba agutaire ha mpeera ei aliheebwa.
58011027	Habw'okwikiriza akaruga Misiri atarukutiina kiniga ky'omukama wayo; akagumira kimu nk'arukurora Ruhanga Atazooka.
58011028	Habw'okwikiriza akataho obugenyi bw'okuhingurwaho yamiisira emiryango esagama, nukwo Omuhwerekereza ow'abaana b'emizigaijo aleke kukoraho Abaisirairi akabi.
58011029	Habw'okwikiriza, abantu bakacwanganiza Enyanja Erukutukura nk'abarukurubata ha bwerre; baitu Abamisiri obu baalengereho kukora bati, amaizi gakabaita.
58011030	Habw'okwikiriza, ebisiika by'orubuga Yeriko bikagwa bimazire kugotwa kumara ebiro musanju.
58011031	Habw'okwikiriza, Rahaabbu malaaya ataitwe hamu n'abeemi abo, habwokuba akakunira entasi.
58011032	Hati ebindi ngambe ki? Tinyina kasumi ak'okubazaaho Gidyoni, Baraki, Samusooni, Yefuta, Daudi, Samwiri n'abarangi
58011033	abo abaasingwire abakama abatali bamu habw'okwikiriza, baakora ebihikire nikyo baatungire Ruhanga ei yaraganiize, baigara akanwa k'entale,
58011034	baaraaza omurro ogurukumekuka, baatabuka empirima ez'obwogi, obuceke bwabo bwabarugiramu amaani, baafooka manzi omu bulemu, baabinga amahe ag'abanyamahanga.
58011035	Abakazi baagarulirwa abaabu abaahumbukire omu bafu. Abamu bakacanzibwa baayanga kulekerwa, nukwo basobole kuhumbuurwa bataahe omu bwomeezi oburukukiraho oburungi.
58011036	Abamu bakaswahirizibwa baateerwa enkoba, hamu n'okubohwa omu njegere n'okuteebwa omu nkomo.
58011037	Bakabateeza amabaale, bakasarwamu habiri n'emisumeeno, bakabaisa empirima; baagendaga bajwaire ebisaato by'entaama n'eby'embuzi, bali mpwerwa, nibabonabonesibwa, nibakorwa kubi
58011038	ensi bakaginuga habwokuba etabasemerre baajeerajeeraga omu marungu n'omu nsozi, nibaikara omu maingira n'omu maina g'ensi.
58011039	Abo boona noobu baraaba baasiimirwe habw'okwikiriza kwabo, baitu batatunge ebyaraganiziibwe,
58011040	habwokuba Ruhanga akaba atuteekaniriize kara ekintu ekirukukira oburungi, nukwo itwena tuhikiririzibwe hamu.
58012001	Habweki nu, nkooku twehinguliriziibwe ekitibe ky'abakaiso abo boona, na itwe tweiheho ekintu kyona ekirukututanga, n'ekibi kyona ekirukutuboha; kandi twiruke n'okugumiisiriza kalitango enyakutairweho omu maiso gaitu.
58012002	Amaiso tugahangire Yesu omutembuzi kandi omuhikiriza ow'okwikiriza kwaitu. Habw'okusemererwa oku akaba naarora omumaiso yagumiisiriza omusaraba, yagaya ensoni zaagwo, kandi hati asingire ha mukono ogw'obulyo ogw'ekitebe ky'obukama bwa Ruhanga.
58012003	Muteebwa ogu ayagumiisiriize enobi erukwinganaho abasiisi ei baamugiriire, nukwo muleke kujwaha n'okugwa ensazi.
58012004	Omu kurwanisa ebibi, timukabaire kugumisiiriza kuhika ha kuseesa esagama yanyu.
58012005	Kandi obu, mweberwe Ruhanga eki arukubahabura nk'abaana be naagamba ati: “Mwana wange, otagaya okuhana kwa MUKAMA, kandi otaterebuka obu akufubira.
58012006	Habwokuba MUKAMA ou agonza, nuwe ahana; kandi ou ayeta mwana we, nuwe ateera.”
58012007	Okufubirwa kurugwamu okugumiisiriza. Ruhanga abarolerra nk'abaana; kandi mwana ki atafubirwa ise?
58012008	Obu muraaba mutarukufubirwa boona nkooku bafubirwa, buli muli bitwekano, timuli baana kwo.
58012009	Kandi na itwe tukaba twina baisiitwe ab'omunsi abaatufubiraga, twabatamuga ekitiinisa. Titwakukizire muno kuhurra Omuzaire w'emyoyo yaitu, nukwo tukoomera?
58012010	Habwokuba baisiitwe ab'omunsi baatufubiraga okumara akasumi kake nkooku baagonzaaga; baitu Ruhanga atufubira nukwo tube barungi kandi tubagane ha buhikiriire bwe.
58012011	Omu kasumi kanu, okufubirwa kwona nikutusaaliza kwonka, titurukukusiima; baitu abaakuliire omu kufubirwa kunu, kulibarugiramu ebikorwa eby'obuhikiriire n'obusinge.
58012012	Habweki mugumye emikono yanyu erukuteba n'amaju ganyu amaceke.
58012013	Mutemere ebigere byanyu emihanda eterekeriire; nukwo omuli inywe arukucumbagira aleke kuhendekeramu, baitu akire.
58012014	Mwekambe okuba n'obusinge n'abantu boona, kandi mwitanire obuhikiriire, habwokuba nambere butali, tiharoho alirora Ruhanga.
58012015	Mwerinde, hatabaho n'omu arukusubwa obukoonyezi bwa Ruhanga. Hataikara kumera omuli inywe “ekimera ekirukusarra” kikaleeta obutwa oburukurwaza baingi.
58012016	Hatabaho omusiihani rundi arukugaya ebya Ruhanga, nk'Esau ayatunzire obugwetwa bwe habw'ekiihuro ekimu.
58012017	Baitu hanyuma obu yagondeze okugarulirwa omugisa, akangirirwa nkooku murukumanya. Noobu araaba yagusabire narra, baitu atatunge kasumi ak'okwegarukamu.
58012018	Inywe mwijuke nkooku mutairiire haihi orusozi oruroho omurro ogurukwaka, omwirima, ekibunda, ekiyaga,
58012019	iraka ery'engwara, kandi n'iraka eryagambire ebigambo ebyakangire abaabihuliire bayesengereza ngu, haleke kubaho ebigambo ebindi ebiribagambirwa.
58012020	Habwokuba batasobole kwemera ekiragiro ekyatairweho, ekirukugamba kiti: “Buli kihangwa kyona, noobu kyakubaire ekisoro, kakuba nikirra haihi n'orusozi, kiraaterwa amabaale.”
58012021	Mazimakwo ebi baarozire bikaba nibitiinisa muno, nukwo Musa kugamba ati: “Nintukumira habw'obutiini.”
58012022	Baitu hati inywe muhikire ha rusozi Siyoni, na ha rubuga rwa Ruhanga Atafa, Yerusaalemu orw'omwiguru orunyakurumo bamalaika abatarukubarwa abeesoroliize ha bugenyi.
58012023	Mwizire ha rusorrokano orw'emizigaijo eyahandiikirwe omwiguru, muhikire hali omucwi w'emisango Ruhanga owa boona, na hali emyoyo y'abarungi abahikiriziibwe.
58012024	Muhikire hali Yesu omuteeraniza wa Ruhanga n'abantu omu ndagaano empyaka, na ha sagama ye eyaseesekere erukwamirra kukira esagama y'Abeli.
58012025	Mwegendereze, muleke kwanga kuhuliriza Ruhanga arukubaza. Abaayangire kuhuliriza ogu ayabahabwire ali ha rusozi, obu baliba bataratabukire, kiraasura ki itwe kakuba twanga kuhuliriza anyakuhabura naayema omu iguru?
58012026	Obu nubwo iraka lye lyatengeseze ensi; baitu hati araganiize ati: “Ninyija kugaruka kutengesa ensi; teri nsi yonka, baitu n'iguru.”
58012027	Obu yagambire ati: “Ninyija kugaruka kutengesa ensi”, akaba naamanyisa ebihangwa ebyatengesiibwe nkooku birihwaho, nukwo ebitasobora kutengesibwa biikaleho.
58012028	Nahabweki, tusiime Ruhanga habw'okutuha obukama obutasobora kutengesibwa, kandi tumuramye nkooku kimusemeriire nitumuha ekitiinisa kandi nitumutiina,
58012029	habwokuba Ruhanga waitu murro kahwerekereza.
58013001	Mwikalege nimugonzangana nk'ab'oruganda.
58013002	Muteho omutima okukunira abagenyi. Omu kukora eki, abamu bakakunira abamalaika batabamanyire.
58013003	Mwijuke abo abali omu nkomo, nk'abagirumu hamu nabo. Mwijuke n'abo abarukukorwa kubi, habwokuba na inywe mwina omubiri nka bo.
58013004	Abantu boona obuswezi babutemu ekitiinisa, n'ekitabu ky'abaswerangaine kiikale kitasiitaziibwe; habwokuba abanjuka n'abasiihana, Ruhanga alibacwera omusango.
58013005	Omutima gwanyu muleke kugumaliza ha sente. Mwenihire n'ebi mwinabyo, habwokuba Ruhanga akagamba ati: “Tindikurugaho kandi tindikuhemukira.”
58013006	Nikyo turukugambira tutarukugurukyagurukya tuti: “MUKAMA nuwe mukonyezi wange, tinditiina; kiki omuntu eki asobora kunkora?”
58013007	Mwijuke abeebembezi banyu, abo abaabeegeseze ekigambo kya Ruhanga; mwetegereze ebyarugire omu bwomeezi bwabo, mwikirize nkooku baikiriize.
58013008	Yesu Kristo tahinduka nkooku akaba ali ijo, nukwo ali hati, kandi nukwo aliba ebiro byona.
58013009	Muleke kuhabisibwa enyegesa ezitali zimu ezirukuruga hanu na hali; kirungi omutima gugumibwe embabazi za Ruhanga kukira emizizo y'ebyokulya etaragasiire abo abaagihondiire.
58013010	Itwe twina itambiro abo abaheereza omu heema eri batarukwikirizibwa kulyaho kihongwa kyalyo.
58013011	Habwokuba emitumbi ey'ebisoro enyakurugwamu esagama nyakatagara omukuru ei atwara omu kiikaro ekirukwera kuba kihongwa habw'ekibi, emitumbi egi eyokezibwa aheeru y'orusiisira.
58013012	Yesu nawe akabonabonera aheeru y'orubuga, nukwo ayeze abantu n'esagama ye.
58013013	Habweki tuturuke, tumusange aheeru y'orusiisira, twikirize kujumwa habwe.
58013014	Habwokuba hanu titwina bwikaro, baitu nituserra obwikaro oburukwija.
58013015	Nahabweki twikale nituhongera Ruhanga ekyonzira eky'okumukugiza nitukirabya omu Yesu, nikyo kyonzira ky'abo abamwikiriize.
58013016	Mutebwa kukorra abantu ebirungi n'okubagana ebi mwinabyo, habwokuba ebyonzira nk'ebi nibyo Ruhanga asiima.
58013017	Muhurre abeebembezi banyu kandi muboorobere; habwokuba nibarolerra emyoyo yanyu nk'abantu abaligijunaanwa. Eki bakikole n'okusemererwa bataina mutima mubi; kitali eki, ebi barukubakorra tibirukwija kubagasira.
58013018	Mutusabire, habwokuba nitumanya nkooku twina omutima oguteekaine. Nitwenda byona kubihikya kurungi.
58013019	Ninyongera kubeesengereza: munsabire muno, nukwo mbagarulirwe bwango.
58013020	Ruhanga ow'obusinge, ayahumbwire omu bafu MUKAMA waitu Yesu, omuliisa ow'entaama omukuru, ayagumize endagaano etahwaho naaseesa esagama ye,
58013021	abahe ebirungi byona ebi murukwetaaga kuhikya ebi agonza, nukwo akorre omuli inywe ebi arukusiima, naabirabya omu Yesu Kristo anyakusemeriire kuheebwa ekitiinisa ebiro byona. Amiina.
58013022	Ab'oruganda, nimbeesengereza, ebigambo byange eby'okubahabura mubiikirize n'omutima gumu, habwokuba mbifundize.
58013023	Nimbamanyisa mugenzi waitu Timoteho nkooku alekiirwe. Obu alimpikaho bwango, ndija nawe tubarole.
58013024	Mundamukize abeebembezi banyu n'abantu ba Ruhanga boona. Ab'oruganda, enzaarwa za Itale nibabaramukwa.
58013025	Omugisa gwa Ruhanga gwikale na inywe inywena. Amina.
59001001	Nyowe Yakobbo, omuheereza wa Ruhanga kandi owa MUKAMA Yesu Kristo, nimbaramukya inywe ab'enganda ikumi na ibiri abaararangiire omu mahanga.
59001002	Bagenzi bange, obu muraahikwahoga emihito etali y'omulingo gumu, mugiitanire n'okusemererwa.
59001003	Okulengwa kw'okwikiriza kwanyu kurugwamu okuguma.
59001004	Kandi muleke okuguma oku kuhikirize omulimo gwakwo, nukwo musobole kufooka abahikiriire kandi abagumire omu by'omutima mutaina ekirukubaburaho.
59001005	Omuli inywe obu haraaba haroho anyakubuzirwe amagezi, agasabe Ruhanga anyakugabira abantu boona atarukubalirra kandi atarukweijukya, mazimakwo aligaheebwa.
59001006	Baitu asabe aina okwikiriza kandi atarukugurukyagurukya, habwokuba anyakugurukyagurukya asisana ekigonzi ky'enyanja ekinyakutwarwa kandi ekinyakucundwacundwa omuyaga.
59001007	Anyakugurukyagurukya aleke kuteekereza ngu, omuntu ow'emitima ebiri kandi ow'atagumire omu ngeso ze zoona
59001008	aina eki alitunga hali MUKAMA.
59001009	Muleke mugenzi wanyu omunaku ayesiime, Ruhanga obu amunyumiza,
59001010	kandi omuguuda ayesiime Ruhanga obu amubundaaza, habwokuba abaguuda balihwaho nk'orwakyo rw'ebimera.
59001011	Izooba obu lituruka liina ekibabu kyalyo ekisiiriiza kandi ekihotokya ebimera, orwakyo rwabyo rukunkumuka n'oburungi bwabyo buhwaho. Omuntu omuguuda nawe nukwo alihwaho ati, nakyaserra itungo.
59001012	W'omugisa omuntu ogu anyakugumiisiriza omu kwohebwa, habwokuba obu alimara kusingura, aliheebwa ekondo ey'obwomeezi Ruhanga ei yaraganiize abamugonza.
59001013	Omuntu obu ayohebwa aleke kugira ati: “Nyohiibwe Ruhanga”, habwokuba Ruhanga tayohebwa kukora ebibi, kandi tayohya muntu n'omu;
59001014	baitu buli muntu ayohebwa obu abiihwabiihwa kandi atwalirizibwa okwegomba kwe okubi.
59001015	Hanyuma okwegomba obu kumara kwija, kuzaara ekibi; kandi ekibi obu kimara kukura, kirugwamu kufa.
59001016	Bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, muleke kubiihwabiihwa.
59001017	Ekintu kyona ekirungi n'ekisembo kyona ekihikire biruga omu iguru hali Kazooba Nyamuhanga, atahindahinduka kandi tali nk'ekituuru ekigenda nikiihwaho.
59001018	Akacwamu kutufoora baana be natwoleka enyegesa ye ey'amazima, nukwo tube omuganuro gw'ebi yahangire.
59001019	Bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, kinu mukimanye: omuntu weena ahurre bwango, baitu atanguhiriza kubaza rundi kukwatwa ekiniga,
59001020	habwokuba anyakwina ekiniga tarukwija kuhika ha buhikiriire Ruhanga obu ayenda.
59001021	Nahabweki mweiheho obubi bwona n'engeso mbi zoona. mwikirize n'obuculeezi ekigambo Ruhanga eki yataire mu mitima yanyu ekirukusobora kubajuna.
59001022	Baitu ekigambo eki mukite omu nkora, mutali nk'abarukukihurra kwonka, mukebiihabiiha.
59001023	Omuntu obu ahurra ekigambo atakihikiriize, asisana nk'anyakwerorra omu ndolerwamu.
59001024	Obu ayerora, agenda, kandi ahonaaho ayebwa nkooku arukusisana.
59001025	Baitu ogu arukwetegereza Ebiragiro ebihikire, nibyo ebiragiro ebitwiha mu bwiru, akabyekambira, atali muhulizi arukwebwa baitu mukozi arukukora, nuwe aliheebwa omugisa omu ebi arukukora.
59001026	Kakuba habaho arukuteekereza nkooku ali muntu w'ediini, kandi kunu tarukulema rulimi rwe, baitu nayebiihabiiha, ediini y'omuntu ogu busamu kantu.
59001027	Ediini nyakabara kandi etaina kamogo omumaiso ga Ruhanga Isiitwe niyo enu: kusuura enfuuzi n'abafaakati abali omu mihito, n'okwerinda okusiiswa ensi.
59002001	Bagenzi bange, inywe abarukwikiriza MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, MUKAMA w'ekitiinisa, muleke kusoroora omu bantu.
59002002	Kakuba haija omuntu anyakujwaire empeta eza zaabbu hamu n'ebijwaro ebirungi, ataaha nambere mwesoroliize; hakaija n'omunaku anyakujwaire obutengo,
59002003	mukata omutima hali ogu anyakujwaire kurungi, mukamugamba muti: “Weza ikarra hanu”; kandi omunaku mukamugambira muti: “Yemerra hali”, rundi muti: “Ikarra hansi aho ha bigere byange”,
59002004	obu, nimuba mutasoroire mu bantu, mukacwamu mutaina bwinganiza?
59002005	Bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, mutege amatu! Ruhanga akakoma abanaku ab'omunsi babe baguuda omu kwikiriza kandi bagwetwa b'obukama obu yaraganiize abo abamugonza.
59002006	Baitu inywe, omunaku ogu, mumugayire. Kandi abaguuda tinubo babaita kubi? Tinubo babacunda nibabatwara omu kooti?
59002007	Tinubo abajuma ibara eri ery'ekitiinisa inywe Abakristo eri mwarukirwe?
59002008	Kakuba muhikiriza kwo ekiragiro ekikuru, Ebyahandiikirwe nkooku birukugamba biti: “Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka”, obu mukora kurungi.
59002009	Baitu obu musoroora, buli mukozire ekibi kandi Ekiragiro kibasingisa omusango, mwafooka basiisi.
59002010	Habwokuba weena anyakulemwa kukwata ekintu kimu ekiri omu Biragiro, aba asingirwe omusango gw'okutahikya Ebiragiro byona.
59002011	Ningira Ogu ayagambire ati: “Otalisiihana”, nuwe yagambire ati: “Otaliita”. Kakuba otasiihana baitu okaita, buli ocwire Ebiragiro byona.
59002012	Nahabweki mubazeege kandi mukolege nk'abantu abalicwerwa omusango, nk'Ebiragiro ebitwiha omu bwiru oku bitegeka.
59002013	Ataraagizire mbabazi, alicwerwa omusango ogutarumu mbabazi; habwokuba embabazi zimuganyiza omusango.
59002014	Bagenzi bange, nikigasa ki omuntu kugamba ngu, aina okwikiriza, baitu ataina ebi arukukora? Okwikiriza oku kusobora kumujuna?
59002015	Kakuba mugenzi wanyu omusaija rundi omukazi aba naajwara ebitahikire kandi ataina byokulya ebya buli kiro,
59002016	baitu omu omuli inywe akamugambira ati: “Genda n'obusinge, otagate kandi oigute”, atamuhaire ebi omubiri gurukwetaaga, eki nikigasa ki?
59002017	Habweki, okwikiriza kwonka obu kuraaba kutarumu bikorwa, kuba kufiire.
59002018	Baitu haroho asobora kugamba ati: “Iwe oina okwikiriza, na nyowe nyina ebikorwa.” Hati nu onyoleke okwikiriza kwawe okutarumu bikorwa, na nyowe habw'ebi nkora, ndakwoleka okwikiriza kwange.
59002019	Oikiriize Ruhanga nkooku ali omu, kandi ohikya kwo. Nangwa n'amasitaani eki gakiikiriza n'okukankana nigakankana.
59002020	Mutaahi wange, iwe omudoma, nooyenda bakwoleka okwikiriza okutarumu bikorwa nkooku kutarukugasa?
59002021	Ebikorwa tinibyo byahikiriize isenkuru itwe Abburahamu obu yahaireyo omutabani Isaaka ha itambiro?
59002022	Aho noorora, okwikiriza kukagendera hamu n'ebikorwa bye, kandi okwikiriza kukahikirizibwa ebi yakozire.
59002023	Nahabweki Ekyahandiikirwe kikahikirizibwa ekirukugamba kiti: “Abburahamu akaikiriza Ruhanga, kandi eki kyamurugiramu obuhikiriire”; yayetwa nganjani ya Ruhanga.
59002024	Aho nuho murukurorra omuntu nkooku ahikirizibwa ebikorwa, kutali kwikiriza kwonka.
59002025	Nikyo kimu Rahabbu, omunyarwanju ogu, nawe akahikirizibwa ebikorwa obu yakuniire entasi yabaragirra omuhanda gundi.
59002026	Omubiri ogutarumu mwoyo nkooku guba gufiire, n'okwikiriza okutarumu bikorwa nukwo kuba kufiire kuti.
59003001	Bagenzi bange, haleke kubaho baingi omuli inywe abarukugonza kwefoora beegesa b'abandi, habwokuba nimumanya itwe abarukwegesa nkooku tulicwerwa omusango ogurukukira ogw'abandi.
59003002	Ningira itwena tusobya emirundi nyingi. Kandi omuntu kakuba atasobya omu bigambo abaza, ogu aba ahikiriire kandi asobora kulema omubiri gwe gwona.
59003003	Itwe tuta ebyoma omu kanwa k'embaraasi nukwo zitworobere, tulema emibiri yazo yoona, tuzitwara nambere turukwenda.
59003004	Murole n'emeeri; noobu ziba ziri nkooto zita, kandi niitwarwa emiyaga y'amaani, baitu zirungikwa engahi entaito muno hoona omurungiki h'arukwenda.
59003005	Orulimi narwo kacweka kataito k'omubiri, baitu rwenyumiriza ha bintu ebikuru. Ka kyamahano okurora ekibira ekikooto nikyokebwa akarro kake!
59003006	Orulimi narwo ruba murro. Omu bicweka by'omubiri orulimi niyo ndugirro y'ebibi byona, rusiisa omubiri gwona, rurugwamu omurro ogukwokya obuhangwa bwaitu bwona; kandi orulimi oru rucumika omurro ogu rwiha okuzimu Nyabuyonga.
59003007	Buli mulingo gw'ebisoro, n'ebinyonyi, n'ebyekurra, n'encu ez'omu nyanja bisobora kulemwa kandi bikalemwa ira abantu;
59003008	baitu tiharoho muntu asobora kulema orulimi ruba bubi obutahuumura, rwijwire obusegwe obwita.
59003009	Nurwo tweyambisa kukugiza MUKAMA Isiitwe, kandi turukyenesa abantu abaahangirwe omu nsisana ya Ruhanga.
59003010	Omu kanwa ako konyini harugamu okukugiza n'okukyena. Bagenzi bange, eki tikisemeriire kuba kiti.
59003011	Ensoro emu esobora kurugwamu amaizi amarungi n'amabi?
