59003012	Nyabura inywe, omutini gusobora kwana ebijuma eby'omuti Oliva, rundi omuzaabbibbu kwana eby'omutini? Amaizi g'ekisura nago tigasobora kurugwamu amarungi.
59003013	Nooha omuli inywe anyakwina amagezi n'okwetegegereza? Leka akigumye n'engeso ze enungi n'ebikorwa ebi akora n'obuculeezi obunyakurumu amagezi.
59003014	Baitu omu mitima yanyu obu muraaba mwinamu ihali lingi rundi okwegonza, muleke kwenyumiza n'okusereka amazima.
59003015	Amagezi nk'ago tigaruga omwiguru, baitu garuga omunsi; tigali g'abantu baitu g'Omwohi.
59003016	Nambere hali ihali n'okwegonza, nuho haba okutaikirraniza, hamu n'ebikorwa ebibi byona.
59003017	Baitu amagezi agaruga omwiguru, eky'okubanza gaba marungi, gongera galeeta obusinge n'obuculeezi, gaikiriza eby'obulyo, gaijwire embabazi, garugwamu ebikorwa ebirungi, tigasoroora mu bantu kandi tigarumu bugobya.
59003018	Okuhikirra niryo igesa ly'embibo ezabyairwe kurungi abantu abaserra obusinge.
59004001	Kiki ekireeta amalemu n'empaka omuli inywe? Tikuli kwegomba okubi okurukurwanira omu bicweka by'emibiri yanyu?
59004002	Inywe mwegomba ebintu; baitu obu mulemwa kubitunga, mwikiriza n'okwita abandi. mwegomba eby'abandi, baitu obu mulemwa kubitunga, nubwo mucwa obulemu kandi murwana. Ekibatanga kutunga, habwokuba timubisaba Ruhanga.
59004003	Kandi obu musaba mutaheebwa, habwokuba musabire kubi. Mukaba nimwenda kubimarra omu kwegomba kwanyu okubi.
59004004	Ha! Bantu inywe abateesigwa! Timurukumanya okuganjana n'ensi nkooku nubwo obunyanzigwa hali Ruhanga? Nahabweki weena anyakugonza kuganjana n'ensi, ayefoora muzigu wa Ruhanga.
59004005	Rundi nimuteekereza ngu, Ekyahandiikirwe kigambira busa ekirukugira kiti: “Omwoyo Ruhanga ogu yatutairemu, tarukwenda kugwegarurra?”
59004006	Baitu emigisa ei atuha neekiraho, nikyo kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Abeekuza, Ruhanga abahakaniza; baitu abeebundaaza abaha emigisa.”
59004007	Nahabweki mworobere Ruhanga; murwanise Omwohi, nawe naija kubarugaho.
59004008	Mwirre haihi Ruhanga, nawe alibairra haihi. Inywe abasiisi munaabe engaro zanyu, na inywe ab'emitima ebiri, mugisemeze.
59004009	Mutuntule, muganye, kandi murre. Enseko zanyu ifooke kurra, n'okusemererwa kwanyu kufooke bujune.
59004010	Mwebundaaze omumaiso ga MUKAMA, nawe alibanyumiza.
59004011	Bagenzi bange, muleke kubazanganaho kubi. Anyakubazaaho kubi mugenzi we, rundi anyakumucwera omusango, buli nabazaaho kubi Ekiragiro kikuru eky'engonzi kandi nakigaya. Kakuba ogaya Ekiragiro ekikuru, buli torukukihikya, baitu oyefoire mukama wakyo.
59004012	Haroho omu wenka anyakutaho Ebiragiro kandi aba mukama wabyo. Nuwe ogu arukusobora kujuna n'okuhwerekereza. Baitu iwe niiwe oha arukucwera mugenzi waawe omusango?
59004013	Muhurre inywe abanyakugamba muti: “Hati rundi nyenkya turaagenda omu rubuga nanka, tumaleyo omwaka nitusuubura, nukwo twiheyo amagoba”,
59004014	kunu mutarukumanya ebiraabaho nyenkya. Obwomeezi bwanyu kintu ki? Muli nk'ekiho ekinyakuzooka akacu kake, hanyuma kikakya.
59004015	Haakire mugambe muti: “MUKAMA obu alisiima, na itwe tuba tukyaroho, turaakora kinu na kiri.”
59004016	Baitu hati nimwemanyaho muno, nikyo murukwenyumiriza. kandi okwenyumiza nk'oku kuba kubi.
59004017	Weena anyakumanya eki asemeriire kukora baitu akalemwa kukikora, eki kimufookera kibi.
59005001	Hati nu inywe abaguuda, murre kandi muteere empamo habw' enaku erukwija kubaizira.
59005002	Itungo lyanyu hati lijunzire, n'ebijwaro byanyu biriirwe enkugutu.
59005003	Ezaabbu yanyu n'efeeza bimomere, kandi obumomi bwabyo bulibasingisa omusango, nibulya emibiri yanyu nk'omurro. Itungo eri mwayahwire, liribahindukira omu biro bya ha mpero.
59005004	Mwetegereze, empeera mwagobiize abakozi abaagesire emisiri yanyu neeyamuza; kandi emikungo y'abagesi ehulirwe MUKAMA w'amahe.
59005005	Mukaikara omunsi nimwejaahiika kandi nimusemererwa; mukalya, mwaiguta nkooku mwagondeze omu biro abahikiriire ebi baitiirwemu.
59005006	Mukasingisa omusango omuntu ahikiriire kandi mwamwita; kunu nuwe ogu atarabarwanisize.
59005007	Habweki bagenzi bange, mugumiisirize okuhika MUKAMA obu aliija. Murole omulimi, alindirra omusiri gwe kurugwamu ebirimwa by'omugaso. Agumiisiriza okuhika obu gugwerwa enjura ey'itoigo n'ey'irumbi.
59005008	Na inywe mugumiisirize. Mutaterebuka habwokuba MUKAMA amaliize kuhika.
59005009	Bagenzi bange, muleke kunyegerrangana, mutaikara kujunaanwa mumaiso g'omucwi w'emisango; habwokuba na hati ali ha irembo nategereza.
59005010	Bagenzi bange, ekyokurorraho eky'okugumiisiriza n'okubonabona nubo abarangi abaabalize omu ibara lya MUKAMA.
59005011	Mumanye ngu, abaagumiisirize tubeeta bahiirwa. Mukahurra Yobu nkooku yagumiisiriize kandi mwarora Mukamu nkooku yamulinzire. Abakwo munyambabazi kandi muganyizi.
59005012	Baitu bagenzi bange, ekikuru muno: mutalirahira iguru noobu yaakuba ensi, rundi endahiro endi yoona. Ekigambo kyanyu: Ego, kiikale kiri: Ego; kandi ekigambo kyanyu: Nangwa, kiikale kiri: Nangwa, nukwo muleke kusingwa omusango.
59005013	Omuli inywe obu haraaba haroho anyakwina obulemeezi, asabe. Obu haraaba haroho arukusemererwa, azine eby'okukugiza Ruhanga.
59005014	Omuli inywe obu haraaba haroho anyakurwaire, leka ayete abakuru ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, bamusabire nibamusiiga amagita omu ibara lya MUKAMA;
59005015	kandi okusaba oku okunyakurumu okwikiriza nikwija kukiza omurwaire, na MUKAMA naija kumwimukya. Obu araaba yakozire ebibi, araabiganyirwa.
59005016	Nahabweki mwaturrangane ebibi byanyu, musabirangane nukwo mukire. Okusaba kw'omuntu ahikiriire kwina amaani kandi nikugasa muno.
59005017	Eriya akaba ali muntu nka itwe, baitu akasaba ataireho omutima ngu, enjura ereke kugwa, kandi enjura yamara emyaka esatu n'ameezi mukaaga etarukugwa ha nsi.
59005018	Kandi akagaruka yasaba, iguru lyanaga enjura, n'ensi yameza ebimera byayo.
59005019	Bagenzi bange, obu haraaba haroho omuli inywe omuntu anyakuhabire, yaruga ha mazima, kandi hakabaho arukumugarra,
59005020	ogu amanye nkooku weena anyakugarra omusiisi, akamwiha omu nsobi ei yahabiiremu, alijuna omwoyo gw'omusiisi ogu, kandi ebibi ebitabarwa biriswekerwa.
60001001	Nyowe Petero, omukwenda wa Yesu Kristo, nimpandiikira inywe abaazaahire mwararangira omu mahanga ga Ponto, Galatiya, Kapadokiya, Asiya na Bitiniya.
60001002	Inywe abaakomerwe mwasororwa Ruhanga Isiitwe, mwayezibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire nukwo mworobere Yesu Kristo kandi mumiisirwe esagama ye: Emigisa n'obusinge byeyongere omuli inywe.
60001003	Ruhanga, Ise MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, akugizibwe, Habw'embabazi ze enyingi tukazaarwa buhyaka, twatunga okunihira okugumire habw'okuhumbuuka omu bafu okwa Yesu Kristo;
60001004	kandi twatunga obugwetwa obutahwaho, obutasiisikara, kandi obutacucuka Ruhanga obu atwahuliire omwiguru.
60001005	Habw'okwikiriza, inywe nimulindwa amaani ga Ruhanga kandi alibajuna ha kiro kya ha mpero nambere alisuukurra entegeka ye.
60001006	Eki kibaleetere okusemererwa, noobu muraaba muli b'okubona enaku hati okumara akaanya kake.
60001007	Okubona enaku kuligumya amazima ag'okwikiriza kwanyu nkooku kuli kw'omuhendo okukira zaabbu enyakusobora kusiisikara, kunu neesemezibwa omurro. Okwikiriza kwanyu okw'amazima nikwija kubaleetera ekitiinisa, okusiimwa, n'okunyumizibwa Yesu Kristo obu aliboneka.
60001008	Noobu muraaba mutakamubonaga, baitu nimumugonza. Noobu muraaba mutarukumurora hati, baitu nimumwikiriza kandi nimukyanganuka n'okusemererwa okutagambwa.
60001009	Ekiruga omu kwikiriza kwanyu, nukwo kujuna emyoyo yanyu.
60001010	Abarangi abaarangire eby' embabazi za Ruhanga ezi mukaba nimwija kugirirwa mu biro binu, bakaserra muno kandi baakaguliiriza ha kujunwa kunu.
60001011	Bakakaguliiriza ha muntu rundi ha kasumi Mwoyo wa Kristo aka yagenderiire obu yaboolekere okubonesibwa kwa Kristo n'ekitiinisa ekirihonderaho.
60001012	Bakasuukulirwa Ruhanga nkooku ebi bakaba batarukubiranga habwabu baitu habwanyu. Ebi nibyo ebigambo ebi mwegesebwa hati abo abarukubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi, nibakoonyerwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire ayatumirwe yaruga omwiguru. Kandi ebi nibyo bamalaika nabo beegomba kwetegereza.
60001013	Habweki nu, mugumye emitima yanyu kandi mwerinde. Okunihira kwanyu kwona mukute ha mbabazi ezi muligirirwa ha kusuukurwa kwa Yesu Kristo.
60001014	Nk'abaana abahulizi, muleke kusisana nkooku mukaba muli obu mwalemwaga okwegomba okubi okw'obutamanya bwanyu obwa ira.
60001015	Baitu Ruhanga ayabeesire nkooku ahikiriire, na inywe mube bahikiriire omu ngeso zanyu zoona.
60001016	Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Mube bahikiriire, habwokuba nyowe mpikiriire.”
60001017	Omu kusaba kwanyu, obu muraaba nimweta Ruhanga Isiinywe, kandi nuwe anyakucwera buli omu omusango atarukusoroora, nasigikira ha bikorwa ebi yakozire, mwikale nimutiina kukora kubi ebiro byona by'okuzaahibwa kwanyu.
60001018	Nimumanya nkooku mwacungwirwe, mwaruga omu ngeso ezitaina mugaso ezi mwaijukwire baisenkuru inywe, mutacungurwe n'ebintu ebihwaho, nk'efeeza na zaabbu,
60001019	baitu mukacungurwa esagama ey'omuhendo eya Kristo, erukusisana ey'omwana gw'entaama ogutaina kamogo rundi kabara.
60001020	Kristo ogu, Ruhanga akamukoma kara ensi etakahangirwe, yayolekwa habwanyu omu biro binu eby'okumalirra.
60001021	Habwe, nimwikiriza Ruhanga ayamuhumbwire omu bafu, yamuha ekitiinisa. Nahabweki, okwikiriza n'okuhihira kwanyu bigumirege hali Ruhanga.
60001022	Hati nkooku mumazire okweza emyoyo yanyu habw'okworobera amazima, kandi nimugonza ab'oruganda n'omutima gumu, mwekambire kugonzangana n'emitima yanyu yoona.
60001023	Mukazaarwa buhyaka, mutarukuruga omu mbibo enyakucweka, baitu nimuruga omu mbibo etacweka habw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga ekyomeeza kandi ekiikaraho;
60001024	habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Kyona ekyetwa omuntu kisisana obunyansi, n'ekitiinisa kyona eky'omuntu kisisana orwakyo orw'obunyansi. Obunyansi buhotoka, orwakyo rukunkumuka;
60001025	baitu ekigambo kya MUKAMA kiikaraho ebiro byona.” kandi ekigambo eki, nugo Makuru Amarungi aga mwarangiriirwe.
60002001	Nahabweki, muleke itima lyona n'obugobya bwona, muleke obuteesigwa, ihali n'okuhangirra kwona.
60002002	Abaana enkerembe abaakazarwa juba nkooku beetaaga amata ag'omubiri, na inywe mwetaaga amata amarungi ag'omwoyo, nukwo gabakuze, gabahikye ha kujunwa;
60002003	habwokuba “Muroleze ha burungi bwa MUKAMA”, nkooku kyahandiikirwe.
60002004	Mwije hali ogu. Nuwe ibaale eryomeezi, ibaale abantu eri baayangire; baitu eryakomerwemu Ruhanga kandi ery'omuhendo.
60002005	Na inywe mube nk'amabaale agoomeezi, agombekerwemu enju ey'omwoyo, mube abanyakatagara abarukwera, nukwo mutambe ebyonzira eby'omwoyo, ebyonzira ebirukusiimwa Ruhanga omu Yesu Kristo.
60002006	Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera nibigamba biti: “Dara, nimbyara omu Siyoni ibaale ery'obugumizo, ibaale eryakomerwe kandi ery'omuhendo. Weena anyakumwikiriza, talikwatwa nsoni.”
60002007	Habweki, hali inywe abaikiriza, ibaale eri, ly'omuhendo; baitu habw'abo abataikiriza: “Ibaale lyonyini abombeki eri baayangire, niryo lyafookere bugumizo bw'enju.”
60002008	Kyayongera kiti: “Lyaba ibaale eriritabaijura abantu, kandi mwandara ogulibanaga”; batabaijuka habwokuba tiboorobera kigambo, nkooku Ruhanga yakibategekiire.
60002009	Baitu inywe muli ruganda orukomerwemu, orwina abanyakatagara b'oruganda rwa MUKAMA, ihanga erirukwera, bantu ba Ruhanga mali, nukwo mumanyise ebikorwa ebirukuhuniriza eby'Ogu ayabeesire, yabaiha omu mwirima yabataahya omu musana gwe ogw'amahano.
60002010	Ira mukaba mutali bantu be, baitu hati muli bantu ba Ruhanga. ira mukaba mutagiriirwe mbabazi, baitu hati muzigiriirwe.
60002011	Abagonzibwa, nimbeesengereza nk'abantu abali mu mahanga kandi abaazaahire, mwetantale okwegomba okw'omubiri okurukurwanisa emyoyo yanyu.
60002012	Mugire engeso nungi omu Banyamahanga, noobu baraaba nibabeeta nkozi z'ebibi, baitu leka barole ebirungi ebi mukora, nukwo bakugize Ruhanga ha kiro eki aliiziramu.
60002013	Habwa MUKAMA, mworobere ab'obusobozi boona abarukubalema, noobu araaba ali Kaisaali, habwokuba nuwe mukuru,
60002014	rundi abalemi abakuru abatumirwe Kaisaali kufubira abo abanyakukora kubi, n'okusiima abo abanyakukora kurungi.
60002015	Ningira Ruhanga kinu nikyo agonza, inywe okukora ebihikire, nukwo muculeeze obutamanya bw'abadoma.
60002016	Mube bantu b'obugabe, baitu obugabe bwanyu mutabufoora byekwaso by'okusiisa; kyonka mwikale muli baheereza ba Ruhanga.
60002017	Abantu boona mubatemuga ekitiinisa. Mugonzeege ab'oruganda. mutiinege Ruhanga. Kandi Kaisaali mumuhe ekitiinisa.
60002018	Inywe abaheereza b'abantu, mworobere bakama banyu nimubatamu ekitiinisa kyona. Mutoorobera ab'embabazi rundi ab'amakune bonka, baitu n'abanyamwaga.
60002019	W'omugisa ogu anyakugumiisiriza enaku ezi bamuboneseza busa habwa Ruhanga.
60002020	Karungi ki aka mutunga obu mugumiisiriza kuteerwa habw'okukora kubi? Baitu obu mugumiisiriza kusaalizibwa habw'okukora kurungi, nimwija kusiimwa Ruhanga.
60002021	Ningira eki nikyo mwayetiirwe, habwokuba Kristo nawe akabonesibwa habwanyu, yabasigira ekyokurorraho, nukwo na inywe muhondere ekirale kye.
60002022	Uwe atakole kibi; akanwa ke katabemu bugobya.
60002023	Obu yajumirwe, atajume; obu yabonesiibwe, atakange abaamuboneseze; baitu akeesiga Ruhanga anyakucwa emisango omu bwinganiza.
60002024	Kristo wonyini, omu mubiri gwe akeetweka ebibi byaitu yabihikya ha musaraba, nukwo tuzirre kimu ekibi, kandi twemarre ha buhikiriire. Ebihuta bye nibyo byabakirize.
60002025	Habwokuba mukaba muhabire nk'entaama, baitu hati muhabukire, mwagaruka hali Omuliisa kandi Omuroleerezi w'emyoyo yanyu.
60003001	Na inywe banyinabwenge, muhurrege ba iba-inywe, nukwo abamu mulibo noobu baraaba batarukwikiriza kigambo kya Ruhanga, baitu bahindurwe engeso zanyu enungi, mutaina eki murukubagambira,
60003002	obu barora engeso zanyu enungi ezirumu kutiina Ruhanga.
60003003	Oburungi bwanyu buleke kuba ha bintu ebirukuzooka, nimusiba isoke, nimwekunisa na zaabbu, nimujwara ebirukwandaara;
60003004	baitu oburungi bwanyu bube bw'omunda omu mitima yanyu, nk'ekintu eky'omuhendo ekiikaraho, nugwo omwoyo gw'embabazi kandi omuculeezi, omwoyo ogw'omuhendo mali omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
60003005	Abakazi abahikiriire aba ira abaanihiraga omu Ruhanga, nabo nukwo baayecumaga bati, kandi baahurraga baibabo,
60003006	nka Saara oku yahurraga Abburahamu, naamweta mukama we. Hati na inywe muli bahara be obu muraaba nimukora ebihikire, mutarukwikiriza kintu na kimu kubakanga.
60003007	Na inywe banyinamaka, mwikale n'abakazi banyu nimubataho omutima kandi nimubatamu ekitiinisa, habwokuba bbo b'amaani make. Baitu bagweterwa hamu na inywe ekisembo kya Ruhanga eky'obwomeezi. Obu muraakora muti, tiharukwija kubaho kintu kyona ekirukutanga okusaba kwanyu.
60003008	Eky'okumalirra, inywena mube n'omwoyo gumu, mugirrangane embabazi, mugonze ab'oruganda, mugire omutima ogurukworoba kandi ogurukwebundaaza.
60003009	Muleke kugarurrana obubi rundi okujumangana; baitu musabirangane omugisa. Ningira eki nikyo Ruhanga yabeetiire, nukwo abahe omugisa.
60003010	Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Ogu anyakugonza obwomeezi n'okutunga obusinge, atange orulimi rwe kubaza ebibi, n'akanwa ke akatange kubaza eby'obugobya;
60003011	ayetantale ebibi, akole ebirungi; aserre obusinge kandi abwitanire.
60003012	Habwokuba amaiso ga MUKAMA gaikara garoleriire abahikiriire, kandi amatu ge agatega okusaba kwabo. Baitu amaiso ga Ruhanga gakimba abo abakora kubi.”
60003013	Nooha asobora kubakora kubi obu muraaba nimwekambira okukora ebirungi?
60003014	Noobu muraaba nimubonesibwa habw'obuhikiriire, muliheebwa omugisa. Abantu abo mutabatiina kandi mutaharaza omutima,
60003015	baitu muhe Kristo ekitiinisa mu mitima yanyu, abe MUKAMA wanyu. Mwikalege mweteekaniize okusoborra kurungi buli muntu anyakubakaguza ha kunihira oku mwinakwo;
60003016	baitu nabwo mukikole muli baculeezi nimuha Ruhanga ekitiinisa. Kandi mwikale mwina omutima omurungi, nukwo abo abarukubaza kubi ha ngeso enungi ezi mwina habw' okuhondera Kristo, obu baraabajumaga bakwatwe ensoni.
60003017	Haakire mubonabonesibwe habw'okukora ebirungi, Ruhanga obu araaba naakisiima, hatali okubonesibwa habw'okukora ebibi.
60003018	Kristo akafa habw'ebibi omurundi gumu yamara. Ahikiriire akafeera abatahikiriire, nukwo asobole kutuhikya hali Ruhanga. Omubiri gwe bakagwita baitu omwoyo gwe Ruhanga akagwomeeza.
60003019	Omwoyo ogu nugwo yagendiiremu kurangirra emyoyo y'abaafiire ei ekaba eri omu nkomo.
60003020	Nubo abantu abatarahuliire kara, Ruhanga obu akaba abagumiisiriize omu biro bya Noha, eryato erikooto obu likaba nirikorwa, abantu abake, nka munaana bonka eri baajunirwemu okutaitwa amaizi.
60003021	Ekyokurorraho eki nikisisana okubatizibwa okurukujuna inywe. Okubatizibwa oku tikiri kintu ekirukwogya iko ha mubiri, baitu nukwo okusaba kwaitu, Ruhanga atuhe omutima ogwezire habw'okuhumbuuka kwa Yesu Kristo.
60003022	Nuwe ogu ayagenzire omwiguru, ali ha mukono ogw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga, naalema ebitebe bya bamalaika, eby'ab'obusobozi, n'eby'amaani.
60004001	Kristo nkooku yabonabonesiibwe omu mubiri, na inywe mwikale mwina omutima ogugumire nk'ogwe, habwokuba weena anyakubonabonesibwa omu mubiri, alekeraho kukora ebibi,
60004002	nukwo amale ebiro ebimusigaire akyaina omubiri atarukulemwa okwegomba kubi okw'abantu, baitu naalemwa entegeka ya Ruhanga.
60004003	Omu biro ebyahingwire mukamara akasumi kaingi nimukora ebi Abanyamahanga basiima. Mukaikara omu busiihani, omu kworobera okwegomba kubi okw'omubiri, omu tamiiro, omu magenyi amabi, omu bididi ebirumu ebitamiiza, n'omu kuramya abacwezi.
60004004	Hati Abanyamahanga nibahunirra okurora mutarukuteerana nabo omu ngeso mbi nk'ezi kandi nikyo barukubajumira.
60004005	Baitu bbo balyetonganira hali Ogu anyakweteekaniza kucwera omusango aboomiire n'abafiire.
60004006	Eki nikyo Amakuru Amarungi gaarangiriirwe na hali abantu abaafiire. Noobu baraaba baamazire kucwerwa omusango omu mubiri nk'abantu boona, baitu balisobora kuhika ha bwomeezi bwa Ruhanga omu myoyo yabo.
60004007	Empero ya byona eri haihi; nahabweki mwikale nimwerinda kandi muteekaine nukwo musobole kubaza na Ruhanga.
60004008	Okukira byona mwikale nimugonzangana, habwokuba engonzi iswekerra ebibi bingi.
60004009	Mugirranganege amakune mutaina kahyeme.
60004010	Buli omu nkooku yahairwe ekisembo, mubikozese kukoonyera abandi nk'abakeeto ba Ruhanga abarungi abaahairwe ebisembo ebitarukusisana.
60004011	Weena anyakubaza, abaze Ruhanga ebi amusuukuliire. Weena anyakuheereza, aheereze n'amaani Ruhanga aga amuhaire; nukwo omu byona Ruhanga akugizibwe omu Yesu Kristo, anyakwina ekitiinisa n'obulemi ebiro byona. Amiina.
60004012	Abagonzibwa, muleke kuhunirizibwa ebirengeso eby'amaani ebirukubagwera, mukaba nk'abagweriirwe ihano.
60004013	Baitu musemererwe muno habw'okubagana ha kubonesibwa kwa Kristo, nukwo ekitiinisa kye obu kirisuukurwa, mulikyanganuka kandi musemererwe.
60004014	Kakuba babajuma habw'okwikiriza Kristo, muli b'omugisa, habwokuba Mwoyo ow'ekitiinisa, Mwoyo wa Ruhanga aikara hali inywe.
60004015	Baitu hatabaho n'omu omuli inywe arukubonabonesibwa habw'obwisi, habw'obusuma, habw'okukora kubi, rundi habw'okwetaahya mu by'abandi.
60004016	Kakuba omuntu abonabonesibwa habw'okuba Mukristo, aleke kukwatwa ensoni; baitu akugize Ruhanga habw'okwetwa ibara eri.
60004017	Ningira akasumi ak'okucwa omusango kahikire. Okucwa omusango nikubandiza ha bantu ba Ruhanga, Obu kuraaba nikubandiza hali itwe, abo abataikiriza Amakuru Amarungi ga Ruhanga baliba bata?
60004018	Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Omuntu ahikiriire obu araaba atarukwanguhirwa muno kujunwa, leero atarukutiina Ruhanga n'omusiisi baliba bata?”
60004019	Nahabweki abo ababonabonesibwa nkooku Ruhanga agonza, baikale nibakora ebirungi, kandi obwomeezi bwabo babukwase Omuhangi omwesigwa.
60005001	Nahabweki ninteererra abakuru omuli inywe, nyowe omukuru nyakyabu, kaiso w'okubonesibwa kwa Kristo kandi arukubagana ha kitiinisa ekirukwija kusuukurwa:
60005002	Murolerre igana lya Ruhanga eri mwakwasiibwe, mulirolerre mutarukuhambirizibwa, baitu nimugonza; mutarukukorra empeera, baitu nimuheereza n'omuhimbo.
60005003	Mutalemesa ireme abo aba murukurolerra, baitu mube kyokurorraho ekirungi hali igana.
60005004	Kandi Omuliisa omukuru obu alizooka, muliheebwa ekondo ey'ekitiinisa etacucuka.
60005005	Na inywe abasigazi mworobere abakuru. Inywena mwekambire kuheerezangana nimwebundaaza, buli omu omu rubu rwe; habwokuba: “Ruhanga ahakaniza abeekuliiriza; baitu abeebundaaza, abaha omugisa.”
60005006	Nahabweki mwebundaaze mwikirize kulemwa obusobozi bwa Ruhanga, nukwo akasumi obu kalihika asobole kubanyumiza.
60005007	Okutuntura kwanyu kwona mukumukwase, habwokuba abataho omutima.
60005008	Mwerinde kandi mwikale nimurora. sitaani, omuzigu wanyu, naarabanganamu nk'entale erukubbukura, neeserra ou eraajunjubura.
60005009	Mumwangirre, mugumiire omu kwikiriza kwanyu, nimumanya bagenzi banyu ab'omunsi yoona nkooku bahikwaho okubonesibwa nk'okwanyu.
60005010	Kandi obu muliba mumazire kubonesibwa akacu kake, Ruhanga ow'embabazi nyingi, ayabeetiire ekitiinisa kye ekitahwaho omu Kristo, alibahuumuza, alibagumya, kandi alibongera amaani.
60005011	Obulemi bwikale nawe ebiro byona. Amiina.
60005012	Mbahandiikiire ebbaruha enu engufu, ninkoonyerwa Siraasi ou ndukumanya nkooku ali w'oruganda omwesigwa. Nimbateererra kandi nimbamanyisa enyegesa enu nkooku erumu embabazi za Ruhanga ez'amazima; mugigumiremu.
60005013	Ekitebe ky'abaikiriza abali Bbabbulooni, akyakomerwe Ruhanga nka inywe, nikibaramukya. Omwana wange Mariko nawe naabaramukya.
60005014	Muramukyangane nimugwangana omu kifuba n'engonzi. Obusinge bwikale na inywe inywena abali omu Kristo!

61001002	Omugisa n'obusinge bikanye omuli inywe nkooku murukugenda nimweyongera kumanya Ruhanga n'okumanya Yesu MUKAMA waitu.
61001003	MUKAMA waitu ogu, habw'amaani ge ag'obwaruhanga, akatuha ebirungi byona ebirukukwatana n'obwomeezi obuhyaka kandi n'okuheereza Ruhanga; yabituheera omu kumanya Ogu ayatwesire kubagana ha kitiinisa kye n'oburungi bwe.
61001004	Ebi nibyo yatuheeriremu endagaano ze ez'omuhendo kandi enkuru, nukwo habwazo musobole kukira obubi obw'omunsi obuleetwa okwegomba okubi, kandi mubagane ha bwaruhanga bwe.

61001007	ha kutiina Ruhanga mwongereho okugirrangana embabazi nk'ab'oruganda, kandi ha kugirrangana embabazi nk'ab'oruganda mwongereho n'engonzi.
61001008	Kakuba muba n'ebirungi ebi byona kandi bikeeyongera kukanya, nibiija kubatambira obugara rundi okutaba b'omugaso bibaleetere kumanyira kimu MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
61001009	Weena ataina ebirungi nk'ebi, aba mufu w'amaiso, arora ebimuli haihi byonka, kandi aba ayeberwe nkooku yayogiibweho ebibi bye ebya ira.
61001010	Habweki bagenzi bange, mweyongere okwekamba nukwo mwoleke boona nkooku mwayesirwe kandi mwakomerwe. Kakuba mukora muti, timurukwija kugwa;
61001011	kandi muliheebwa obugabe bw'okutaaha omu bukama obutahwaho obwa MUKAMA kandi Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo.
61001012	Nahabweki ndaatahoga omutima obutoosa okubaijukya ebirungi ebi, noobu muraaba mubimanyire kandi mugumire omu mazima aga mwahairwe.
61001013	Ninteekereza nikihika okubeekambisa mbibaijukye ntakafiire,
61001014	habwokuba nyetegeriize ndi haihi kufa, MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo nkooku yammanyisize.
61001015	Ninyija kutaho omutima kubaijukyaga ebirungi binu akasumi koona, noobu ndiba mmazire kufa.
61001016	Obu twabamanyisize ha busobozi na ha kwija kwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, tutakuraatire ebigambo eby'okwehangahanga, baitu tukaba baakaiso abaayeroliire ekitiinisa kye,
61001017	habwokuba Ruhanga Ise obu yamunyumiize namuha ekitiinisa, hakahulirwa iraka eryarugire omu Kitiinisa Kikuru kya Ruhanga, nirigamba liti: “Onu nuwe Mwana wange omugonzibwa ou nsiima muno.”
61001018	Iraka eri tukalihurra niriruga omwiguru, habwokuba tukaba tuli nawe ha rusozi orurukwera.
61001019	Nubwo ebyarangirwe abarangi byayongiire kugumibwa Ruhanga. Na inywe muraakora kurungi eki kukitaho omutima, abantu nkooku bata omutima ha taara erukwakira omu mwirima okuhika obwire kukya, n'enyunyuuzi ey'omu rukyakya ekaimuka omu mitima yanyu.

61001021	ningira tihakabahoga oburangi omuntu obu arayatwire wenka, baitu abantu bagambisibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire kwatura ebigambo ebyarugire hali Ruhanga.
61002001	Abarangi b'ebisuba nkooku baimukire omwihanga lya Isirairi, n'abeegesa b'ebisuba nukwo baliimuka bati omuli inywe, babataahyemu mpora mpora obuhakani oburukuhwerekereza, nangwa n'okwehakana MUKAMA wabu ayabacungwire. Baayereetera bonka okuhwerekerra okwa bwango.
61002002	Baingi balihondera engeso zaabo z'orwanju kandi bagayise abantu omuhanda gw'amazima.
61002003	Habw'omukoijo gwabo balibaihaho sente nibabeegesa ebigambo eby'obugobya. Omusango gukabasinga ira kandi tigukarugahoga. Ekifubiro kyabu kiikara nikibategereza.
61002004	Ruhanga ataganyire bamalaika obu baasiisire, baitu yabanaga omu kiinongoro ky'omurro, yababohera okuzimu omu mwirima kasira, baikaleyo okuhika obu balicwerwa omusango.
61002005	Kandi ataganyire abantu aba ira n'ensi yabo obu yaleesire okusandaara kw'amaizi omunsi y'abo abatatiina Ruhanga, baitu akajuna Noha ayateereriire abantu bahikirre.
61002006	Kandi Ruhanga akookya embuga za Sodomu na Gomora yazifoora iju, yaisingisa omusango ogw'okuhwerekerra, zibe kyokurorraho ky'abo abaliba batarukutiina Ruhanga.
61002007	Baitu yajuna Looti, omuntu omurungi ow'akaba atuntuziibwe muno orwanju rw'abantu ababi.
61002008	(Ningira omuntu omurungi ogu, ebi yarozire n'ebi yahuliire obu yabaikaramuga nibakora ebitahikire, byasaalizaga omutima gwe omurungi buli kiro.)
61002009	Ebi byona bitwoleka Ruhanga nkooku amanyire kujuna abamutiina, akabaiha omu mitalibano; amanyire n'okwikaza ababi ha kifubiro okuhika ha kiro eky'okucwerwa omusango;
61002010	kandi okukira muno abo abeemarra ha kwegomba okubi okw'emibiri yabo, kandi abarukugaya obusobozi bwa Kristo. Abeegesa b'ebisuba abo, bantu bahoole kandi ntahurra, tibatiina n'okujuma bamalaika ab'ekitiinisa,
61002011	kandi kunu bamalaika noobu baraaba nibabakiraho amaani n'obusobzi, tibabahyemera kandi tibabajunaana musango omumaiso ga MUKAMA.
61002012	Baitu abasiisi abo basisana ebisoro ebitaina magezi, ebisoro ebirukulemwa obuhangwa bwabyo, ebyazaalirwe kutegwa n'okwitwa. Bajuma ebintu ebi batarukumanya, bali b'okuhwerekerezibwa nk'ebisoro ebi,
61002013	basaalizibwa kubi habw'ebibi ebi baakozire. Eki barukweta kusemererwa, nugo amagenyi ga nyamusana. Abantu abo bitonyezi ebibi kandi bumogo omu kitebe kyanyu, nibeegondeza omu obubi bwabo, babagobeza noobu muba nimulya nabo.
61002014	Amaiso gaabo gaijwire obusiihani, tibaniha kibi. Batwaliriza abantu abaina emitima etagumire, kandi emitima yabo ekamanyirra omukoijo. Baana bakyenwa!
61002015	Bakaruga omu muhanda oguterekeriire, baahaba, baatoma omuhanda ogwa Balaamu, mutabani wa Behori, ayagondeze kwetungira ebisembo ebyarugire omu kukora ebitahikire,
61002016	baitu yacoomerwa habw'ekibi kye. Endogoyi etagamba, ekabaza n'iraka nk'ery'omuntu, yamaraho iraro ly'omurangi ogu.

61002020	Baitu obu bamara kutabuka obubi bw'ensi, habw'okumanya MUKAMA waitu kandi Omujuni Yesu Kristo, bakagaruka kubwetabamu kandi bukabasingura. Enyikara yabo eya hanyuma efooka mbi okukira ey'okubanza.
61002021	Kyakubaire kirungi kakuba abantu abo bataramanyire omuhanda ogw'obuhikiriire, okukira kumara kugumanya, bakagurugaho kandi baaleka ebiragiro ebirukwera ebi baahairwe.
61002022	Kibahikireho nk'orufumo rw'amazima orugamba ruti: “Embwa egarukira ebitanaki byayo”; kandi: “Empunu obu emara kwogebwa, egaruka kwekulingura omu saabu.”
61003001	Abagonzibwa, enu niyo bbaruha eya kabiri ei mbahandiikiire, kandi omu bbaruha ezi zombi nindengaho kubaijukya n'okusisiimura emitima yanyu ey'amananu.
61003002	Ninyenda mwijuke ebyarangirwe abarangi abahikiriire, hamu n'ebiragiro bya MUKAMA kandi Omujuni ebi mwagambiirwe abakwenda.
61003003	Eky'okubanza, kinu mukyetegereze: omu biro ebya ha mpero, abasekerezi baliija nibasekereza, kandi nibatwalirizibwa okwegomba kw'emibiri yabu,
61003004	nibagamba bati: “Akaraganiza kwija, hati araha? Okuruga baisenkuru itwe obu baafiire, ebintu byona biikaire nkooku bikaba biri ensi neehangwa.”
61003005	Kandi bakangira kimu Ekyahandiikirwe ekirukugamba ngu: Ira muno iguru likabaho habw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga; kandi ngu: N'ensi ekahangwa yaihwa omu maizi kandi yatebwaho kugabaganiza.
61003006	Ekyarugiremu, amaizi ago nugo gaasandaire gahwerekereza ensi ei ekaba eroho omu kasumi ako.
61003007	Kandi habw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga eki kyonyini, iguru n'ensi ebiroho hati byahuliirwe omurro, byahwiirwe okuhika ha kiro eky'okucwa omusango n'okuhwerekereza abantu abatatiina Ruhanga.
61003008	Abagonzibwa, muteebwa ekigambo kinu ekirukugamba ngu: Hali MUKAMA ekiro kimu kiri nk'emyaka rukumi, kandi emyaka rukumi eri nk'ekiro kimu.
61003009	MUKAMA takerererwa okuhikiriza ebi yaraganiize, abantu abamu nkooku bateekereza; baitu inywe nabagumiisiriza, tarukugonza muntu n'omu ahwerekerre, baitu boona beegarukemu.
61003010	Kandi ekiro kya MUKAMA kiriija nk'omusuma. Obu nubwo iguru lirihwaho n'okuhinda kwingi, n'ebyalihangirwemu biryagibwa omurro, kandi ensi na byona ebigirumu birisiirira.
61003011	Ebintu ebi byona obu biraaba biri by'okuhwaho biti, inywe musemeriire kuba bantu ba mulingo ki? Musemeriire kuba bantu abarukwera kandi abarukutiina Ruhanga omu bwomeezi bwanyu,
61003012	mutegeriize kandi nimwegomba ekiro eky'okwija kwa Ruhanga; habwokuba ha kiro eki, iguru liricumikwa omurro lihwerekereziibwe, n'ebyalihangirwemu byagibwe omurro.
61003013	Baitu itwe nitutegereza iguru erihyaka n'ensi empyaka nambere abahikiriire baikara, nkooku yaraganiize.
61003014	Habweki abagonzibwa, ebi nkooku mubyetegeriize, mwekambe nukwo MUKAMA abasange mutaina kabara rundi kamogo, baitu mwina obusinge.
61003015	Kandi mumanye nkooku tulijunwa okugumiisiriza kwa MUKAMA waitu. Na Paulo, mugenzi waitu omugonzibwa, nukwo yabahandiikiire, naahondera amagezi aga yahairwe.
61003016	Eki nukwo yakisoboroire ati, nkooku akora omu bbaruha ze zoona. Omuli zo harumu ebintu ebimu ebitarukwetegerezibwa bwango, abasema kandi abaceke ebi bahingisa nkooku bahingisa Ebyahandiikirwe ebindi, bikabarugiramu okuhwerekerra.
61003017	Habweki inywe abagonzibwa, binu nkooku mwabimanya kara, mwerinde, mutaikara kuhabisibwa ensobi ez'abeemi abo, mukaruga nambere mugumiire.
61003018	Baitu mweyongere omu mbabazi n'omu kumanya MUKAMA waitu kandi Omujuni Yesu Kristo. Ekitiinisa kibe hali uwe, hati n'ebiro byona. Amiina.
62001001	Nitubahandiikira ha bya Kigambo ky'obwomeezi ow'akaba aroho kuruga okubanza, ou twahuliireho, ou twarozire n'amaiso gaitu, kandi ou twayetegeriize twamukwataho n'engaro zaitu.
62001002	Obwomeezi obu bukoolekwa, twaburora, tuli bakaiso babwo; kandi na inywe nitubarangirra obwomeezi obu obutahwaho, obukaba buli owa isiitwe, baitu hati butwolekerwe.
62001003	Eki twarozire kandi twahuliire, na inywe nikyo turukubarangirra, nukwo musobole kuteerana na itwe; kandi okuteerana kwaitu kuli omu Isiitwe hamu n'Omwana we Yesu Kristo.
62001004	Binu nitubibahandiikira nukwo musobole kusemerererwa kimu.
62001005	Ganu nugo makuru aga twahuliire Omwana we naagamba, kandi nugo turukubarangirra tuti: Ruhanga aba musana kandi omuli Uwe tiharumu mwirima naakake.
62001006	Kakuba tugamba tuti: Nituteerana nawe, kandi kunu nitugendera omu mwirima, buli nitubiiha ebisuba n'engeso zaitu tiziri z'amazima.
62001007	Baitu obu tuba nitugendera omu musana, Uwe nkooku ali musana, buli na itwe tuteeraine hamu, kandi esagama y'Omwana we Yesu etwogyaho buli kibi kyona.
62001008	Kakuba tugamba tuti: Titwina kibi, buli nitwebiiha itwenka kandi tuba tutali b'amazima.
62001009	Kakuba twatura ebibi byaitu, Ruhanga aba mwesigwa kandi mwinganiza, naija kubituganyira atwogyeho ebitahikire byona.
62001010	kakuba tugamba tuti: Titukasiisaga, tuba nitumufoora mubiihi w'ebisuba kandi n'ekigambo kye tikiri omuli itwe.
62002001	Baana bange, binu nimbibahandiikira nukwo muleke kukora ebibi; baitu omuntu weena obu araakora ekibi, amanye nkooku twina omutonganirizi anyakwikara na Isiitwe, nuwe Yesu Kristo omwinganiza.
62002002	Nuwe ndehwa y'ebibi byaitu, kandi tibiri byaitu byonka, baitu n'eby'ensi yoona.
62002003	Obu turaaba nitukwata ebiragiro bye, nikyo kirukugumya nkooku tumumanyire.
62002004	Ogu anyakugamba ati: “Mmumanyire”, kunu tarukukwata biragiro bye, mubiihi w'ebisuba, kandi taina mazima.
62002005	Baitu weena anyakuhondera ekigambo kye, ogu nuwe agonzakwo Ruhanga. aho nuho turukugumiza nkooku tuli omu Ruhanga:
62002006	anyakugamba ngu, aikara omu Ruhanga, asemeriire kuraba omu muhanda Kristo ogu yarabiremu.
62002007	Abagonzibwa, Ekiragiro ndukubahandiikira tikiri kihyaka, baitu kiragiro kikuru eki mukaba mwina kara. Ekiragiro eki ekikuru niyo nyegesa ei mwahuliire.
62002008	Baitu nabwo nimbahandiikira ekiragiro ekihyaka, kandi amazima gaakyo nigazookera omu Kristo n'omuli inywe, habwokuba omwirima nigugenda kuhwaho, kandi omusana ogw'amazima gutandikire kujwa.
62002009	Anyakugamba ngu, ali omu musana, kunu naanoba ow'oruganda, ogu aba akyali omu mwirima.
62002010	Anyakugonza mugenzi we, aikara omu musana, kandi tiharoho ekiramwesiitaza.
62002011	Baitu anyakunoba mugenzi we aba ali omu mwirima; kandi omwirima ogu nugwo agenderamu. Tamanya nambere arukugenda, habwokuba omwirima gumwisire amaiso.
62002012	Baana bange, nimbahandiikira habwokuba ebibi byanyu bibaganyirwe habwa Yesu.
62002013	Inywe baise-baana, nimbahandiikira habwokuba mumanyire Ogu ayabaireho okuruga kara. Inywe abasigazi, nimbahandiikira habwokuba musingwire Omubi ogu. Na inywe abaana, nimbahandiikira habwokuba Isiitwe nimumumanya.
62002014	Inywe baise-baana, nimbahandiikira habwokuba mumanyire Ogu ayabaireho okuruga kara. Na inywe abasigazi, nimbahandiikira habwokuba muli b'amaani, ekigambo kya Ruhanga kiikara omuli inywe, kandi musingwire Omubi.
62002015	Muleke kugonza ensi, noobu byakuba ebintu ebigirumu. Omuntu weena obu agonza ensi, buli aba atarukugonza Isiitwe.
62002016	Habwokuba byona ebirukusangwa omunsi tibiri bya Isiitwe baitu by'ensi, kandi nibyo binu: okwegomba okubi okw'omubiri, okwegomba okubi okw'amaiso, n'okwenyumiza ha itungo.
62002017	Ensi na byona ebyegombwamu bihwaho; baitu ogu anyakukora Ruhanga ebi agonza, aikaraho ebiro n'ebiro.
62002018	Baana bange, akasumi ak'okumalirra kahikire. Mukahurra ngu, arukurwanisa Kristo naija. Na hati abarukurwanisa Kristo baizire baingi; eki nikyo kirukutumanyisa akasumi kandi nkooku kali k'okumalirra.
62002019	Abantu abo bakaruga omuli itwe, kunu bakaba batali baitu, kakuba babaire baitu, bakwikaire na itwe; baitu bakaturugaho, nukwo kimanywe boona nkooku batali b'ekitebe kyaitu.
62002020	Baitu inywe mukakomwa Ahikiriire Ogu, kandi inywena nimumanya amazima.
62002021	Mu kubahandiikira, tindukugenderra kugamba ngu, timumanyire amazima, baitu nimugamanya, kandi nimumanya ebisuba nkooku bitasobora kuruga mu mazima.
62002022	Nooha arukubiiha ebisuba? Tinuwe ogu arukuhakana Yesu nkooku ali Kristo? Arukurwanisa Kristo, nuwe ogu arukuhakana Ruhanga na Ise mwana.
62002023	Busaho n'omu anyakwanga Mwana akaikiriza Ise. Ogu anyakwikiriza Mwana, buli aikiriza na Ise.
62002024	Eki mwahuliire okuruga omu kubanza, nikyo mugumye. Eki mwahuliire okuruga kara kakuba mukigumya, obu nubwo muliikara omu Mwana n'omuli Ise.
62002025	Kandi Kristo eki yaturaganiize nikyo kinu: obwomeezi obutahwaho.
62002026	Binu nimbibahandiikira kubahabura hali abo abarukugonza kubahabisa.
62002027	Baitu Mwoyo ogu, Kristo ou yabahaire, aikara omuli inywe, kandi timurukwetaaga muntu ondi weena ow'okubeegesa; habwokuba Mwoyo ou mwahairwe, abeegesa buli kintu. Okwegesa kwe kw'amazima, tikuli kw'ebisuba. Habweki mwikale omu Kristo, nkooku Mwoyo yabeegeseze.
62002028	Hati nu, baana bange, mwikale omuli uwe, nukwo obu alizooka tusangwe tugumire, tuleke kumwehinyaho tukwasirwe ensoni obu aliija.
62002029	Obu muraaba nimumanya Kristo nkooku ahikiriire, nimumanya weena anyakukora ebihikire nkooku azairwe Ruhanga.
62003001	Murole Isiitwe nkooku yatugondeze, itwe okwetwa baana ba Ruhanga, kandi nukwo tuli. Nikyo ensi etarukutumanyira, habwokuba nawe etamumanye.
62003002	Abagonzibwa, hati tuli baana ba Ruhanga; tikikamanyirwe nkooku tuliba, baitu nitumanya Kristo obu alizooka, nitwija kumusisana habwokuba tulimurora nkooku ali.
62003003	Kandi weena arukumwesiga, ayeyeza, Kristo nkooku yayeziibwe.
62003004	Weena anyakukora ekibi, aba n'omusango ogw'okucwa Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga, habwokuba kukora ekibi nukwo kucwa Ebiragiro.
62003005	Mumanyire Kristo eki yaiziriire, nukwo kwihaho ebibi, kandi omuli uwe tiharumu kibi.
62003006	Busaho n'omu anyakwikara omuli uwe akyakora ekibi; kandi weena anyakukora ekibi buli takamubonaga kandi takamumanyaga.
62003007	Baana bange, mutaikiriza muntu n'omu kubahabisa! Ogu anyakukora ebihikire, nawe ahikiriire nka Kristo oku ahikiriire.
62003008	Ogu anyakukora ekibi, aba wa sitaani; habwokuba Sitaani akakora ebibi kuruga kara. Ekyaleesire Omwana wa Ruhanga, nukwo kuhwerekereza byona sitaani ebi akora.
62003009	Busaho n'omu ayazairwe Ruhanga aikara naakora ebibi ningira obwomeezi bwa Ruhanga bwikara omuli uwe, kandi tasobora kukora ekibi habwokuba akazaarwa Ruhanga.
62003010	Aho abaana ba Ruhanga n'abaana ba Sitaani nuho bamanyirwa: Weena anyakukora ekitahikire, tali wa Ruhanga kandi ogu atagonza mugenzi we, nawe tali wa Ruhanga.
62003011	Ekigambo eki mwahuliire okuruga kara nikyo kinu: Tugonzangane.
62003012	Tuleke kusisana Kaini ow'akaba ali w'Omubi, kandi yaita mugenzi we. Akamwitira ki? Habwokuba ebikorwa bye bikaba biri bibi, baitu eby' owanyina bikaba biri birungi.
62003013	Bagenzi bange, kitabahuniriza okurora ensi neebanoba.
62003014	Itwe tumanyire nkooku twarugire omu rufu, twataaha omu bwomeezi, habwokuba nitugonza bagenzi baitu. Ogu atagira ngonzi, aikara afiire.
62003015	Weena anyakunoba mugenzi we aba mwisi, kandi nimumanya nkooku hataroho mwisi anyakwina obwomeezi obutahwaho omuli uwe.
62003016	Aho nuho turukumanyira engonzi nkooku ziri, habwokuba Kristo akahayo obwomeezi bwe habwaitu; na itwe kituhikiriire kuhayo obwomeezi bwaitu habwa bagenzi baitu.
62003017	Kakuba omuntu aba atungire ebintu by'ensi, kandi akarora mugenzi we aina eki arukwetaaga, akanga kumugirra embabazi, ogu asobora ata kugira ngu, naagonza Ruhanga?
62003018	Baana bange, okugonza kwaitu kuleke kuba kw'akalimi rundi kwa ha minwa, baitu kuzooke omu bikorwa n'omu mazima.
62003019	Aho nuho turaamanyira nkooku tuli b'amazima, kandi emitima yaitu nkooku eriteekana omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
62003020	Emitima yaitu noobu etujunaana eta, baitu twikale nitumanya Ruhanga nkooku ali mukuru kukira omutima ebi gurukutujunaana, kandi naamanya ebintu byona.
62003021	Abagonzibwa, kakuba emitima yaitu etatucwera musango, buli titwina eky'okutiina omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
62003022	Kyona eki tumusaba akituha, habwokuba tukwata ebiragiro bye kandi tukora ebi asiima.
62003023	Kinu nikyo kiragiro kye ekigamba kiti: Kituhikiriire okwikiriza Omwana we Yesu Kristo kandi na itwe okugonzangana, Kristo nkooku yaturagiire.
62003024	Boona abakwata Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga baikara omuli Kristo nawe aikara omuli bo. Mwoyo ou yatuhaire, nuwe atumanyisa Kristo nkooku aikara omuli itwe.
62004001	Abagonzibwa, muleke kwikiriza buli mwoyo, baitu emyoyo mugyetegereze, nukwo mumanye obu eraaba neeruga hali Ruhanga; habwokuba abarangi baingi ab'ebisuba bararangire omunsi.
62004002	Aho nuho muraamanyira Mwoyo wa Ruhanga: Weena arukurangirra Yesu Kristo nkooku yazairwe omu mubiri, buli aina omwoyo oguruga hali Ruhanga.
62004003	Baitu weena atarukurangirra Yesu, buli taina mwoyo oguruga hali Ruhanga. Ogu nugwo mwoyo gw'ogu arukurwanisa Kristo, ou mwahuliireho nkooku arukwija, kandi ahikire ira omunsi.
62004004	Baana bange, inywe muli ba Ruhanga, kandi abarangi abo ab'ebisuba, mubasingwire; habwokuba Mwoyo anyakuli omuli inywe nuwe mukuru okukira oli ayaizire omunsi kurwanisa Kristo.
62004005	Bbo b'ensi enu, habwokuba ebi barukugamba by'ensi, kandi ensi ebahuliriza.
62004006	Itwe tuli ba Ruhanga. Weena arukumanya Ruhanga atuhuliriza, kandi atali wa Ruhanga tatuhuliriza. aho nuho tumanyira omwoyo ogw'amazima n'omwoyo ogurukuhabisa.
62004007	Abagonzibwa, tugonzangane; habwokuba engonzi ziruga hali Ruhanga. Ogu anyakwina engonzi, aba azairwe Ruhanga kandi amanyire Ruhanga.
62004008	Ogu ataina ngonzi tamanya Ruhanga, habwokuba Ruhanga nuwe ngonzi.
62004009	Kinu nikyo kyayolekere engonzi za Ruhanga hali itwe: akatuma omunsi Omwana we omu wenka, nukwo atwomeeze.
62004010	Kandi engonzi ezindukugamba nizo zinu: tukuli kugira ngu niitwe twagondeze Ruhanga, baitu nuwe yatugondeze, nukwo kutuma Omwana we abe ndehwa y'ebibi byaitu.
62004011	Abagonzibwa, Ruhanga obu araaba yatugondeze ati, na itwe kituhikiriire kugonzangana.
62004012	Tiharoho muntu araboine Ruhanga; baitu obu tuba nitugonzangana, Ruhanga aikara omuli itwe, kandi engonzi ze zihikirirra kimu omuli itwe.
62004013	Aho nuho tumanyira nkooku twikara omu Ruhanga, nawe nkooku aikara omuli itwe habwokuba akatuha Mwoyo we wonyini.
62004014	Tukarora kandi twagumya nkooku Isiitwe yatumire Omwana we kuba Mujuni w'ensi.
62004015	Weena anyakwatura Yesu nkooku ali Mwana wa Ruhanga, Ruhanga aikara omuli uwe, nawe aikara omu Ruhanga.
62004016	Nahabweki, nitumanya kandi nitwikiriza Ruhanga nkooku atugonza. Ruhanga nuwe ngonzi, kandi ogu anyakwikara omu ngonzi, aikara omu Ruhanga na Ruhanga aikara omuli uwe.
62004017	Ekirukwoleka engonzi nkooku ihikirizibwa omuli itwe nukwo kwikara twina obwesige ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, habwokuba enyikara yaitu omunsi munu, niyo emu n'eya Kristo.
62004018	Engonzi tiigira butiini. Engonzi z'amazima ibinga obutiini bwona habwokuba anyakutiina, aba naatiina ekifubiro; nukwo kugamba, aba ataina ngonzi ezihikire.
62004019	Itwe tugonza habwokuba Ruhanga nuwe yabandize kutugonza.
62004020	Kakuba habaho arukugamba ati: “Ningonza Ruhanga”, kandi kunu naanoba mugenzi we, ogu mubiihi w'ebisuba; habwokuba atarukugonza mugenzi we ou arukurora, tasobora kugonza Ruhanga ou atakaroraga.
62004021	Kandi kinu nikyo kiragiro Kristo eki yatuhaire ekigamba kiti: Ogu anyakugonza Ruhanga, agonzeege na mugenzi we.
62005001	Buli muntu anyakwikiriza Yesu nkooku ali Kristo, aba mwana wa Ruhanga; kandi weena anyakugonza Isemwana, agonza n'omwana we.
62005002	Kinu nikyo tumanyiraho nkooku tugonza abaana ba Ruhanga: obu tuba nitugonza Ruhanga kandi nitukwata ebiragiro bye.
62005003	Habwokuba okugonza Ruhanga nukwo kukwata ebiragiro bye. Kandi ebiragiro bye tibirukulemeera.
62005004	Weena anyakuzairwe Ruhanga asingura ensi, kandi ekisingura ensi nukwo okwikiriza kwaitu.
62005005	Baitu anyakusingura ensi nooha? Tinuwe ogu anyakwikiriza Yesu nkooku ali Mwana wa Ruhanga?
62005006	Yesu Kristo akaija naaraba omu maizi ag'okubatizibwa n'omu sagama y'okufa kwe. Ataije omu maizi gonka, baitu akaija omu maizi n'omu sagama.
62005007	Kandi Mwoyo nuwe kaiso w'okukigumya, habwokuba Mwoyo nuwe mazima.
62005008	Haroho obwakaiso busatu: Mwoyo, amaizi, n'esagama; kandi ebisatu ebi biikirraniza.
62005009	Obu turaaba nitwikiriza obwakaiso bwa bantu, obwakaiso bwa Ruhanga nibukiraho obukuru; kandi obwakaiso bwa Ruhanga nubwo bunu: akajuliirra Omwana we.
62005010	Weena anyakwikiriza Omwana wa Ruhanga, aba aina obwakaiso omu mutima gwe. Ogu atarukwikiriza, afoora Ruhanga mubiihi w'ebisuba, habwokuba taikiriza bwakaiso Ruhanga obu yahaire ha Mwana we.
62005011	Kandi obwakaiso nubwo bunu: Ruhanga akatuha obwomeezi obutahwaho, kandi obwomeezi obu buli omu Mwana we.
62005012	Anyakwina Mwana buli aina obwomeezi; baitu ataina Mwana wa Ruhanga taina n'obwomeezi obu.
62005013	Binu nimbihandiikira inywe abarukwikiriza Omwana wa Ruhanga, nukwo mumanye nkooku mwina obwomeezi obutahwaho.
62005014	Kandi bunu nubwo bwesige obu tumwinaho: kakuba tusaba ekintu kyona nkooku asiima, atuhurra.
62005015	Kandi obu turaaba nitumanya nkooku atuhurra omu kyona eki tumusaba, nitumanya nkooku tuli b'okutunga ebi tumusabire.
62005016	Kakuba omuntu weena arora mugenzi we naakora ekibi ekitarukurugwamu orufu, amusabire, nukwo Ruhanga amuhe obwomeezi. Eki nikikwata hali abo abatakora kibi ekirukurugwamu rufu. Haroho ekibi ekirukwita; tindukugamba eki nikyo omuntu asemeriire kusaba Ruhanga akimujune.
62005017	Okusobya kwona kiba kibi, baitu haroho ekibi ekitali ky'okwita.
62005018	Tumanyire weena ayazairwe Ruhanga nkooku atakyakora kibi; baitu Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga, amulinda kandi Omubi tasobora kumukwataho.
62005019	Tumanyire nkooku tuli ba Ruhanga, kandi ensi yoona nkooku erukulemwa Omubi.
62005020	Kandi nitumanya Omwana wa Ruhanga nkooku yaizire, yatuha okwetegereza nukwo tumanye Ruhanga owamazima; kandi ow'amazima; Ogu nuwe twikaramu habwokuba tuli omu Mwana we Yesu Kristo. Ogu nuwe Ruhanga ow'amazima, kandi nuwe bwomeezi obutahwaho.
62005021	Baana bange, mwerinde embandwa.
63001001	Nyowe omukuru, nindamukya Omugole ayakomerwe Ruhanga, hamu n'abaana be aba ngonza omu mazima. Tali nyowe nyenka arukubagonza, baitu na boona abamanyire amazima.
63001002	Ninkuramukya habw'amazima agali omuli itwe kandi agalitwikaramu ebiro byona:
63001003	Emigisa, embabazi, n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali Yesu Kristo Omwana we, biikalege na itwe omu mazima n'omu ngonzi.
63001004	Nkasemererwa muno okurora abamu ha baana baawe nibahondera amazima nkooku twaragiirwe Ruhanga Isiitwe.
63001005	Hati nu, ninkwesengereza Mugole wange, ntali nk'arukukuhandiikira ekiragiro ekihyaka, baitu eki kyonyini eki twahuliire okuruga kara ekirukugamba ngu, tugonzangane.
63001006	Kandi okugonza nukwo kunu: itwe okukwata ebiragiro bya Ruhanga. Kinu nikyo ekiragiro eki mwahuliire okuruga omu kubanza, ekirukugamba kiti: Mwikale mwina engonzi.
63001007	Abarukubiihabiiha abantu bakanyire omunsi, nubo abo abatarukwikiriza Kristo nkooku yafookere muntu. Weena anyakugamba ati, nuwe mubiihi w'ebisuba kandi munyanzigwa wa Kristo.
63001008	Mwerinde, mutaikara kufeerwa ebi mwakoliire, baitu mutunge empeera enyakuhikire.
63001009	Omuntu weena anyakwekiza ha nyegesa ya Kristo, taba wa Ruhanga; kandi ogu anyakugumira ha nyegesa ye, aina bombi: Isiitwe na Mwana.
63001010	Kakuba omuntu aija nambere muli atarukwegesa nyegesa enu, mutalimutaahya omunju, n'okumuramukya mutalimuramukya.
63001011	Ogu anyakumuramukya buli ateeraine nawe omu bikorwa bye ebibi.
63001012	Noobu ndaba nyina bingi eby'okubahandiikira, tindukwenda kukozesa orupapura na bwino, baitu ninihira kwija kubarora n'okubaza na inywe niturorangana, nukwo okusemererwa kwaitu kuhikirre.
63001013	Abaana b'owanyoko ayakomerwe Ruhanga, nibakuramukya.
64001001	Nyowe omukuru, ninkuhandiikira iwe Gaayo, enganzi yange, ou ngonza omu mazima.
64001002	Omugonzibwa, ninsaba byona bikugendere kurungi, kandi obe mwomeezi omu mubiri nkooku oli kurungi omu mwoyo.
64001003	Nkasemererwa muno abamu ha bagenzi baitu obu baizire bammanyisa nkooku orukwekambira amazima kandi noogahondera kwo.
64001004	Busaho ekisobora kundeetera omuhimbo okukira kuhurra abaana bange nkooku barukuhondera amazima.
64001005	Omugonzibwa, obu okoonyera ab'oruganda, munomuno abagenyi abatamanyirwe, obu nookora ekintu eky'obwesigwa.
64001006	Kandi abo nubo abaamanyisize ekitebe kyona ky'abaikiriza ha ngonzi zawe. Kyakubaire kirungi kwongera kubaboherra omu rugendo rwabo omu mulingo ogusiimwa Ruhanga ou oheereza.
64001007	Bakaimukya orugendo oru habwa Kristo kandi bataikirize kutwara akantu koona abakafiiri aka bakaba nibagonza kubaha.
64001008	Habweki tusemeriire kugumya abantu nk'abo, nukwo tusobole kubakoonyera ha mulimo ogw'okurarangya amazima.
64001009	Nyowe nyina ebi naahandikiire ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, baitu Diyoterefe anyakugonza kwebembera boona, taikiriza ebi ndagira.
64001010	Habweki obu ndiija, ndibaijukya ebi akora nantebya kubi. Tagarukira hali eki kyonka, baitu ayanga n'okujwahukirra ab'oruganda, nangwa naatanga n'abo abagonza kubajwahukirra, kandi ababinga omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza.
64001011	Omugonzibwa, otakuratira abarukukora ebibi, baitu okuratire abarukukora ebirungi. Ogu anyakukora ebirungi, nuwe wa Ruhanga; kandi anyakukora ebibi, takaroraga Ruhanga.
64001012	Demeetiriyo, abantu boona bamubazaaho kurungi, kandi n'amazima nago nigamuheera obwakaiso. Na nyowe ninkigumya, kandi mumanyire obwakaiso bwange nkooku buli bw'amazima.
64001013	Mbaire nyina bingi eby'okubahandiikira, baitu tindukwenda kubihandiikisa akacumu na bwino.
64001014	Ninihira kubarora bwango, nukwo tubaze niturorangana.
64001015	Obusinge bube na iwe. Banywani baitu nibakuramukya. Ondamukize banywani baitu, buli omu.
65001001	Nyowe Yuda, omuheereza wa Yesu Kristo kandi mugenzi wa Yakobbo, nimpandiikira abo abaayesirwe, abagonzibwa omu Ruhanga Isiitwe, kandi abaalinzirwe habwa Yesu Kristo:
65001002	Embabazi, obusinge, n'engonzi byeyongere omuli inywe.
65001003	Abagonzibwa, habw'ekihika kingi eki mbaire nakyo eky'okubahandiikira ebirukukwata ha kujunwa kwaitu, ndozire nikyetaagwa muno okubahandiikira nimbateererra: murwanirre enyikiriza abantu ba Ruhanga ei baahairwe omurundi gumu, kyahwa.
65001004	Habwokuba haroho abantu abamu abaatutaahiremu tutarukumanya. Nubo abo abaarangirweho ira nkooku balisingwa omusango. Bali bantu abatatiina Ruhanga, abahindura embabazi za Ruhanga waitu nibaifoora byekwaso by'okukora eby'obusiihani, baayanga Omulemi waitu omu wenka kandi MUKAMA Yesu Kristo.
65001005	Ebi noobu muraaba mwabimanyire ira, baitu hati ningonza kubaijukya nkooku MUKAMA, ayajunire abantu be naabaiha omunsi Misiri, akongera yahwerekereza abo abataramwikiriize.
65001006	Na bamalaika abataralinzire rukarra rw'obukuru bwabo bakaruga omu kiikaro kyabo, akabaikaza omu mwirima kasira, baboherwe omu njegere ezi batalirugamu okuhika ha kiro kikuru eky'okucwererwaho omusango;
65001007	nk'ab'omu Sodomu na Gomora n'embuga ezindi ezaaherraineho oku baayetabwire omu busiihani n'omu rwanju orutali rw'obuhangwa, bakafubirwa omu murro ogutahwaho, babe kyokurorraho kyaitu.
65001008	Omu mulingo nugwo gumu, abantu abo basiisa emibiri yabu, nibatwalirizibwa ebirooto byabo, bagaya obusobozi bwa Ruhanga kandi bajuma ab'ekitiinisa ab'omu iguru.
65001009	Noobwakubaire Mikairi, omukuru wa baamalaika, obu akaba naahakaniza Sitaani, akamuteeza empaka ha by'omubiri gwa Musa, atagonze kumucwera omusango naamugaya, baitu akamugambira ati: “Leka MUKAMA wenka nuwe akuhane.”
65001010	Baitu abantu banu bagaya kyona eki batarukwetegereza, kandi batwalirizibwa ebintu ebi bamanyire habw'obuhangwa bwabo nk'enyamaiswa ezitaina magezi, kandi nibyo bibahwerekereza.
65001011	Balikibona! Habwokuba bakwasire omuhanda gwa Kaini, beenaga omu nsobi eya Balaamu habw'okwetungira amagoba, kandi bahwerekererra omu bwemi bwa Koora.
65001012	Nubo abo abasiisa amagenyi ganyu ag'engonzi habwokuba bakora ebintu bya buli mulingo bataina nsoni, nibeefaaho bonka. Bali nk'ebicu ebitarumu njura, ebirukutwarwa omuyaga; rundi nk'emiti etaana bijuma omu kasumi kaabyo, eyafiire yaleka, kandi yasindukira kimu.
65001013	Bali nk'ebigonzi by'enyanja erukusikuka, nibarugwamu esaabu n'orwondo. Bali nk'enyunyuuzi ezirukwenjeera, abaayahuliirwe okwikara omu mwirima kasira ebiro byona.
65001014	Abo nubo Enoka ow'omu bwijukuru bwa musanju okuruga h'Adamu yarangireho naagamba ati: “Kinu mukyetegereze, MUKAMA naija n'abahikiriire be obuhumbe n'obuhumbe
65001015	kucwera abantu boona omusango, n'okugusingisa abo abatatiina Ruhanga habw'ebibi byona ebi baamukozire omu mulingo mubi, na habw'ebigambo ebibi abasiisi abatatiina Ruhanga ebi baamubalizeeho.”
65001016	Abo nubo ntontorromi, bahyemi, abalemwa okwegomba kwabo okubi, abeehaahira n'ebigambo bingi, bantu abanwekanweka abandi, nukwo bagire eki babaihaho.
65001017	Baitu inywe abagonzibwa, kibahikiriire kwijuka abakwenda ba MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo ebi baarangire.
65001018	Bakabagambira bati: “Omu biro bya ha mpero halibaho abasekerezi abatatiina Ruhanga, abalemwa okwegomba kwabu okubi.”
65001019	Abo nubo abaleetereza okwebaganizaamu, bantu b'ensi abataina Mwoyo wa Ruhanga.
65001020	Baitu inywe, abagonzibwa, mugumire kandi mweyongere ha nyikiriza yanyu erukwera muno; musabirege omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
65001021	Mwikale omu ngonzi za Ruhanga, mutegereze obwomeezi obutahwaho MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo obu alibaha habw'embabazi ze.
65001022	Abo abarukugurukyagurukya, mubahwitule;
65001023	abandi mubajune, nimubasahura omu murro; n'abandi mubagirre embabazi, baitu nimwegendereza, nangwa munobe n'ekijwaro ekisiisirwe ebibi byabo eby'orwanju.
65001024	Ekitiinisa, obukuru, obulemi n'obusobozi bibe hali Ogu arukusobora kubalinda mutagwa, akabahikya omu maiso g'ekitiinisa kye mutaina kamogo kandi mukyanganukire.
65001025	Ebi byona biheebwe Ruhanga omu wenka anyakutujuna naaraba omu Yesu Kristo MUKAMA waitu ayabaireho ira lyona, anyakuroho hati, kandi ow'alibaho ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
66001001	Kunu nukwo okusuukururwa Ruhanga oku yahaire Yesu Kristo kwoleka abaheereza be, bamanye ebikaba nibiija kubaho bwango. Binu akabimanyisa naatuma malaika hali omuheereza we Yohaana,
66001002	ayahandiikire byona ebi yaboine naajurra ebigambo bya Ruhanga n'obwakaiso bwa Yesu.
66001003	W'omugisa anyakusoma ebigambo binu eby'okuranga, kandi b'omugisa abo abanyakuhurra n'abanyakukwata ebihandiikirwe omu kitabu kinu; habwokuba akasumi kali haihi kuhika.
66001004	Nyowe Yohaana nimpandiikira ebitebe musanju eby'abaikiriza ebiri omu Asiya: Nimbagondeza omugisa n'obusinge ebinyakuruga hali Ogu anyakubaho, ayabaireho, kandi ow'okwija, n'ebinyakuruga hali emyoyo musanju enyakwikara omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama bwe,
66001005	kandi ebinyakuruga hali Yesu Kristo kaiso omwesigwa ayabandize kuhumbuuka omu bafu, kandi anyakulema abakama b'ensi. Ogu anyakutugonza, ayatwihire omu bibi byaitu naatucunguza esagama ye,
66001006	yatufoora bukama kandi banyakatagara ba Ruhanga Ise, aheebwe ekitiinisa n'obusobozi ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
66001007	Ngugwo naizira omu bicu, kandi buli riiso lirimurora, n'abo abaamucumisire balimurora; kandi enganda zoona ez'omunsi zirimuterra empamo. Egokwo. Amiina.
66001008	Mukama Ruhanga agamba ati: “Ninyowe Ntandiko, ninyowe Mpeero.” Anyakubaho, ayabaireho, kandi ow'okwija, Kamara-byona.
66001009	Nyowe Yohaana mwene wanyu, anyakubagana na inywe omu Yesu: emihito n'okugumiisiriza ebitutungisa obukama, nkaba ndi omu kizinga ekirukwetwa Patimo, nkwatirweyo habw'okurangirra ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'okumanyisa abantu ebya Yesu.
66001010	Ha kiro kya Mukama, obu natemberwe Mwoyo, enyuma yange nahurra iraka likooto nk'ery'engwara,
66001011	nirigamba liti: “Ebi orukurora bihandiike omu kitabu, obitwekere ebitebe musanju by'abaikiriza abali: Efeeso, Sumiruna, Perugamo, Tiyatiira, Saadisi, Filadelufiya na Layodikeeya.”
66001012	Nubwo nakubuutukire kurora ow'akaba naabaza na nyowe. Obu nakubuutukire, narora ebikondo musanju eby'etaara, bya zaabbu;
66001013	hagati y'ebikondo ebi nkarora omu arukusisana Omwana w'omuntu, ajwaire ekanzu eraihire, ayeteegere omu kifuba omweko gwa zaabbu;
66001014	omutwe gwe n'isoke rye bikaba nibyera ti nk'ebyoya by'entaama njeru, nibyera nk'ebirika. Amaiso ge gakaba nigaaka nk'endimi z'omurro;
66001015	ebigere bye bikaba nibisisana omulinga oguzigwire, ogusemereziibwe omu kyoto; kandi iraka lye likaba nirisisana nk'iraka ery'amaizi amaingi agarukuhirra;
66001016	omu mukono gwe ogw'obulyo akaba akwasire enyunyuuzi musanju, omu kanwa ke haarugamu empirima etoire ey'amoogi abiri, kandi amaiso ge gakaba nigangasana nk'izooba erirukujwa n'amaani.
66001017	Obu namurozire, nagwa ha bigere bye nasisana nk'anyakufiire. Baitu yantaho omukono gwe gw'obulyo, naampuumuza ati: “Otatiina, ninyowe ow'okubanza, owa ha mpero,
66001018	kandi hati nyomiire. Nkafa, baitu okuruga hati ndaikaraga ndi mwomeezi ebiro byona, kandi nyina ebisumuruzo by'Orufu n'eby'Okuzimu.
66001019	Handiika ebi orukurora, ebinyakuroho hati kandi ebiribaho hanyuma.
66001020	Amakuru agaserekerwe ag'enyunyuuzi musanju ezi orozire omu mukono gwange ogw'obulyo, n'ag'ebikondo musanju eby'etaara eza zaabbu nugo ganu: enyunyuuzi musanju imanyisa bamalaika ab'ebitebe musanju by'abaikiriza, kandi ebikondo musanju eby'etaara bimanyisa ebitebe ebi byonyini.”
66002001	“Handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ab'Efeeso noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'Ogu anyakukwasire enyunyuuzi musanju omu mukono gwe gw'obulyo, kandi anyakugendera hagati y'ebikondo musanju ebya zaabbu. Naagira ati:
66002002	“Nyowe mmanyire ebikorwa byawe, okwekamba kwawe, n'okugumiisiriza kwawe; kandi mmanyire nkooku otasobora kugumiisiriza ababi, baitu okutegereza abo abanyakweyeta bakwenda kunu tibalibo kwo, wasanga bali b'ebisuba.
66002003	Mmanyire nkooku orukugumiisiriza muno, nooyemera bingi habwange kandi tojwaha.
66002004	Baitu eki ndukukujunaana nkinu: tokyaina engonzi ezi okaba oinazo okubanza.
66002005	Nukwo nu, ijuka ha warugiriire kugwa; oyegarukemu, okole ebi wakoraga okubanza. Obu otaakole oti, ndikuhikaho, ekikondo ky'etaara yawe nkiihe omu kiikaro kyakyo, rundi buli oyegarukiremu.
66002006	Ekirungi eki ndukukusiimaho nkinu: noonoba ebikorwa by'ekitebe ky'Abanikola
66002007	Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe ky'abaikiriza. Anyakusingura ndimwikiriza kulya ha muti ogw'obwomeezi ogunyakuli omunsi ya Ruhanga ey'okuhiirwa.”
66002008	“Kandi handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Sumiruna noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'ow'okubanza kandi owa ha mpero, ayafiire kandi yahumbuuka. Naagira ati:
66002009	“Mmanyire omuhito gwawe n'obunaku bwawe (kunu oli muguuda); kandi mmanyire ebihangirro by'abo abeeyeta Bayudaaya, kunu tibalibo kwo, baitu isorrokaniro lya Sitaani.
66002010	Otatiina ebi orukwija kubonabona. Hurra nu, Omwohi amaliriire kuta omu nkomo abamu omuli inywe, nukwo mulengesibwe. Nimwija kumara ebiro ikumi nimubonesibwa. Mugume okuhika ha kufa, nubwo na nyowe ndibaha ekondo ey'obwomeezi.
66002011	Ogu anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe by'abaikiriza. Anyakusingura, okufa okwa kabiri tikwina eki kulimukoraho.”
66002012	“Kandi handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Perugamo noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'Ogu anyakwina empirima enyakutoire ey'amoogi abiri. Naagira ati:
66002013	“Mmanyire h'oikara, oku nuho hali ekitebe eky'obukama bwa Sitaani; baitu iwe okyagumiire ha ibara lyange kandi oteehooge nkooku orukunyikiriza, noobu haakubaire omu biro by'Antipa, kaiso wange omwesigwa, ayaitiirwe owaanyu oku nambere Sitaani aikara.
66002014	Baitu nyina ebigambo bike ebi ndukubajunaana: oku mwinayo abantu abamu abarukwikiriza enyegesa za Balaamu ayahabwire Balaki kwesiitaaza abaana ba Isirairi, nukwo balye ebyokulya ebihongiirwe abacwezi kandi beemarre ha busiihani.
66002015	Kandi mwina n'abamu abarukuhondera enyegesa ez'Abanikola.
66002016	Hati nu mwegarukemu. Kakuba muteegarukamu, ninyija kubahikaho bwango, abo boona mbarwanise n'empirima ey'akanwa kange.
66002017	“Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe by'abaikiriza. Anyakusingura, ndimuha byokulya ebiserekerwe, niyo maanu; kandi ndimuha ibaale erirukwera erihandiikirweho ibara erihyaka eritamanyirwe muntu n'omu, okwihaho ogu anyakulirukirwe.”
66002018	“Handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Tiyatiira noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'Omwana wa Ruhanga, anyakwina amaiso agarukwaka nk'endimi z'omurro, kandi ebigere ebirukusisana omulinga oguzigwire. Naagira ati:
66002019	“Mmanyire ebikorwa byawe, engonzi zawe, okwikiriza kwawe, obuheereza n'okugumiisiriza kwawe; kandi nimmanya ebikorwa ebi orukukora hati nkooku birukukira ebyabandize.
66002020	Baitu kinu nikyo ndukukujunaana: n'okyaikiriza omukazi ogu Yezabeeli, arukweyeta murangikati, nuwe ahabisa abaheereza bange kandi naabeegesa kwemarra ha busiihani n'okulya ebihongiirwe embandwa.
66002021	Nkamuha akasumi ak'okwegarukamu, baitu akanga kuleka obusiihani bwe.
66002022	Hati nu ninyija kumuleetera endwara emuzingike, kandi abo abasiihana nawe ndibaleetera emihito nyingi, rundi buli balekere ebi arukukora;
66002023	kandi n'abaana be ndibaita. Nukwo ebitebe byona eby'abaikiriza bimanye nkooku ali nyowe arukwetegereza ebiteekerezo n'emitima; kandi buli omu omuli inywe ndimuha ebisemeriire ebikorwa bye.
66002024	“Baitu abandi abasigaireho, inywe abali Tiyatiira abatarukuhondera nyegesa egi, abatakeegere abandi eri beeta ifubo lya Sitaani, nyowe nimbagambira nti: Tindukwija kubongeraho bulemeezi obundi.
66002025	Kyonka mugumize kimu eki mwinakyo okuhika obu ndiija.
66002026	Ow'aliba asingwire kandi ahikiriize ebi ndukwenda okuhika ha mpero, ndimuha obusobozi obw'okulema amahanga,
66002027	nyowe nkooku naabuhairwe Isenyowe. Aligalemesa omwigo ogw'ekyoma, agasasangule nk'omubumbi oku asasangura ebinaga.
66002028	Kandi ndimuha enyunyuuzi ey'omu rukyakya (nuwe Kristo).
66002029	Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe by'abaikiriza.”
66003001	“Handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Saadisi noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'Ogu anyakwina emyoyo musanju eya Ruhanga n'enyunyuuzi musanju. Naagira ati: “Mmanyire ebikorwa byawe, oyetwa mwomeezi kandi kunu ofiire!
66003002	Sisiimuka, ogumye ebi okyasigaize, biri haihi kuhwaho; habwokuba nindora ebikorwa byawe nkooku bitarukuhika omu maiso ga Ruhanga wange.
66003003	Hati nu oijuke ebi wahairwe n'ebi wahuliire; nibyo ogumye, kandi oyegarukemu. Obu otasisiimuke ndiija nk'omusuma, kandi tolimanya kasumi aka ndikuhikiraho.
66003004	Omu Saadisi okyainamu abake abatarasiisire bijwaro byabo. Baligenda na nyowe bajwaire ebirukwera, habwokuba bakisemeriire.
66003005	Ogu anyakusingura, nukwo alijwara ati ebijwaro ebirukwera, kandi ibara lye tindiriragaza omu kitabu eky'obwomeezi; baitu ndimuranga omumaiso ga Isenyowe n'ag'obwomeezi; baitu ndimuranga omumaiso ga Isenyowe n'ag'abamalaika be.
66003006	Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe eby'abaikiriza.”
66003007	“Handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Filadelufiya noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'Ogu Ahikiriire, ow'amazima kandi anyakwina ekisumuruzo kya Daudi. Nuwe ogu anyakukingura hatarukubaho n'omu anyakukinga; kandi anyakukinga hatarukubaho n'omu anyakukingura. Naagira ati:
66003008	“Mmanyire ebikorwa byawe. Dora ntaire omu maiso gaawe orwigi orukingwirwe, orutasobora kukingwa muntu n'omu. mmanyire nkooku oina amaani make, baitu nabwo okakwata ekigambo kyange kandi otanyehooge.
66003009	Ab'omu isorrokaniro lya Sitaani, abeeyeta Bayudaaya kunu tibalibo kwo, nibabiiha kwonka--ndabahambiriza baije bagwe ha bigere byawe, nukwo bamanye nkooku nakugondeze.
66003010	Habwokuba okakwata ekigambo kyange ekirukuhabura kiti: Gumiisiriza; nikyo na nyowe ndikulindira omu kasumi ak'okwohebwa okuliizira ensi yoona, okulenga abo abarukwikara omunsi.
66003011	Ninyija bwango; gumiza kimu eki oinakyo, tihaikara kubaho akunyagaho ekondo yawe.
66003012	Ogu anyakusingura, ndimufoora nyomyo omunju ya Ruhanga wange, taligirugamu naakake. Ndimuhandiikaho ibara lya Ruhanga wange n'ibara ly'orubuga rwa Ruhanga wange nurwo Yerusaalemu oruhyaka orusirimuka niruruga omw'iguru mba Ruhanga wange Mmuhandiikeho n'ibara lyange erihyaka.
66003013	Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe eby'abaikiriza.”
66003014	“Handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Laodikeya noogamba oti: ‘Binu nibyo bigambo by'Ogu arukwetwa “Kibekwo”, kaiso omwesigwa kandi ow'amazima, endugirro ya byona Ruhanga ebi yahangire. Naagira ati:
66003015	“‘Mmanyire ebikorwa byawe: torukufuka kandi torukwokya. Haakire waakufukire rundi waakwokeze!
66003016	Baitu habw'okusangwa oli kooyakooya, torukufuka kandi torukwokya, ninyija kukutanaka, onduge omu kanwa!
66003017	Ningira niiwe arukugamba oti: Ndi muguuda, ebintu nibinyizira kurungi, tinyina eki ndukwetaaga; kandi kunu torukumanya nkooku oli munaku, w'okuganyirwa, museege, kihimbaara, kandi noogenda busa.
66003018	Nahabweki ninkuhabura: onguleho zaabbu enyakusemeziibwe omurro, nukwo obe muguuda. Onguleho n'ebijwaro ebirukwera, bikuswekerre, bikwiheho ensoni ez'okurorwa noogenda busa; kandi onguleho omubazi ogw'okuta omumaiso, nukwo orole.
66003019	Abo aba ngonza, mbahana kandi mbafubira; nahabweki wekambe kandi oyegarukemu.
66003020	Hurra nu, nyemeriire ha rwigi ninyeranga; omuntu weena obu ahurra iraka lyange akakingura orwigi, ninyija kutaahamu, mmuhikeho, nukwo tulye hamu.
66003021	Ogu anyakusingura, ndimwikiriza aikarre na nyowe ha kitebe kyange eky'obukama, nka nyowe oku nasingwire, naikarra na Isenyowe ha kitebe kye eky'obukama.
66003022	Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe eby'abaikiriza.’”
66004001	Ebi obu byahoire, nkaimukya amaiso narora orwigi rukingwirwe omu iguru! Kandi iraka nabandize kuhurra, nirigamba nk'ery'engwara, lyangambira liti: “Temba, oije hanu, nkwoleke ebiraabaho, binu bimazire kurugaho.”
66004002	Ahonaaho naijwaho Mwoyo, narora ekitebe ky'obukama kiteekaniziibwe omu iguru, kiikaliirweho omuntu.
66004003	Kandi Ogu ow'akaba akiikaliireho, akaba naayengeengeta nk'amabaale ag'omuhendo aganyakwetwa yasipi na saarudiyo; kandi ekitebe eki kikaba kyehinguliriziibwe omuhangazima ogurukusisana ibaale ly'omuhendo erinyakwetwa simaragido.
66004004	Ekitebe eki kikaba kyehinguliriziibwe ebitebe ebindi makumi abiri na bbina. Kandi ha bitebe ebi hakaba haikaliireho abakuru makumi abiri na bbana, bajwaire ebijwaro ebirukwera, baina ekondo za zaabbu ha mitwe yabo.
66004005	Omu kitebe eky'obukama haarugamu emirabyo erukumulikya, okubbaruka kw'enkuba n'okuhinda. Omumaiso gaakyo hakaba haroho etaara musanju ezirukwaka, ezirukumanyisa emyoyo musanju eya Ruhanga.
66004006	Omumaiso g'ekitebe eki hakaba haroho ekirukusisana nk'enyanja ey'ekirahule erukumuliikana nka kirisitaalo. Okwehinguliriza ekitebe, ha buli rubaju, hakaba haroho ebihangwa bbina ebyomeezi, biijwire amaiso embaju zoona, omu maiso n'enyuma.
66004007	Ekihangwa ekyomeezi eky'okubanza kikaba nikisisana entale; ekya kabiri kikaba nikisisana enimi; ekya kasatu, ha maiso kikaba nikisisana omuntu; kandi ekya kana kikaba nikisisana isamba kaharruka.
66004008	Ebihangwa ebi ebbina ebyomeezi, buli kimu kikaba kiina amapapa mukaaga, biina amaiso embaju zoona, aheeru n'omu nda; kandi nyamusana n'ekiro nibizina obutalekerra biti: “Ahikiriire, Ahikiriire, Ahikiriire, Mukama Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona, ayabaireho, anyakubaho, kandi ow'okwija!”
66004009	Buli kasumi ebihangwa ebyomeezi ebi obu byahaisanizaaga, obu byakugizaaga, kandi obu byasiimaga Ogu anyakwikaliire ha kitebe ky'obukama, Ogu anyakubaho ebiro byona,
66004010	nubwo abakuru amakumi abiri na bbana baajuumaraga omu maiso g'Ogu anyakusingire ha kitebe, kandi baramya Ogu anyakwomeera ebiro byona. Ekondo zaabbu bazinaga hansi omumaiso g'ekitebe nibazina bati:
66004011	“MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, niiwe osemeriire kuheebwa ekitiinisa, okukugizibwa, n'obusobozi, habwokuba niiwe wahangire byona; bikahangwa kandi bikabaho nkooku wagondeze.”
66005001	Omu mukono ogw'obulyo gw'Ogu anyakusingire ha kitebe ky'obukama, nkaroramu omuzingo gw'ekitabu oguhandiikirwe embaju zombi, oguboherwe emanyiikirizo musanju;
66005002	kandi narora malaika ow'amaani naarangirra n'iraka likooto ati: “Nooha asemeriire kwanjurra omuzingo n'okucwa emanyiikirizo zagwo?”
66005003	Baitu hatabeho n'omu omwiguru, rundi omunsi, rundi okuzimu ayasoboire kwanjurra omuzingo n'okugusoma.
66005004	Na nyowe nkarra muno habw'okuburwaho n'omu ow'akaba asemeriire kwanjurra omuzingo n'okugusoma.
66005005	Nubwo omu ha bakuru yangambiire ati: “Leka kurra; orole Entale ey'orunganda rwa Yuda, Ekikoro kya Daudi, asingwire. Nahabweki uwe asobora kwanjurra omuzingo n'okubambura emanyiikirizo zagwo musanju.”
66005006	Hagati y'ekitebe ky'obukama n'ebihangwa bbina ebyomeezi, n'omu bakuru abo hagati, nkarora Omwana gw'Entaama ayemeriire, naasisana nk'anyakutambirwe, aina amahembe musanju n'amaiso musanju, agarukumanyisa emyoyo musanju Ruhanga ei yatumire omunsi yoona.
66005007	Yagenda yaiha omuzingo omu mukono ogw'obulyo ogw'Ogu ow'akaba asingire ha kitebe ky'obukama.
66005008	Obu yamazire kutwara omuzingo, ebihangwa ebbina ebyomeezi n'abakuru amakumi abiri na bbana baajuumara omumaiso g'Omwana gw'entaama, buli omu akwasire endongo n'ebibindi bya zaabbu ebiijwire omugaju, nubwo bumanyisa okusaba kw'abahikiriire.
66005009	Baazina ekizina ekihyaka nibagamba bati: “Niiwe osemeriire kutwara omuzingo n'okubambura emanyiikirizo zagwo, habwokuba okaitwa, wacungurra Ruhanga abantu n'okufa kwawe, noobaiha omu buli ruganda, buli ngambo, omu bantu boona n'omu mahanga goona.
66005010	Wabafoora bukama kandi banyakatagara ba Ruhanga waitu, nubo balirema omunsi.”
66005011	Omu kubonekerwa kwange nahurra amaraka ga bamalaika baingi batarukusobora kubarwa, beehinguliriize ekitebe ky'obukama, n'ebihangwa ebyomeezi, n'abakuru abo.
66005012	Boona nibagamba n'iraka likooto bati: “Mwana gw'Entaama ayatambirwe asemeriire kuheebwa obusobozi, obuguuda, amagezi, amaani, okunyumizibwa, ekitiinisa n'okukugizibwa!”
66005013	Kandi nkahurra ebihangwa byona ebiri omwiguru, omunsi, okuzimu, n'omu nyanja na byona ebinyakugirumu nibigamba biti: “Ogu anyakusingire ha kitebe ky'obukama, hamu n'Omwana gw'Entaama, bakugizibwe, banyumizibwe, baheebwe ekitiinisa n'obusobozi ebiro n'ebiro!”
66005014	Kandi ebihangwa ebbina ebyomeezi byagamba biti: “Nukwo kibe kiti!” Abakuru baajuumara ha nsi, baaramya.
66006001	Nubwo narozire Omwana gw'Entaama naabambura emanyiikirizo ey'okubanza ha manyikirizo musanju, kandi nahurra ekimu ha bihangwa ebbina ebyomeezi nikigamba n'iraka nk'ery'okuhinda kw'enkuba kiti: “Rugayo!”
66006002	Narora embaraasi rweru, etemberwe omuntu akwasire obuta; yaheebwa ekondo, yaramaga kusingura kandi yasingurra kimu.
66006003	Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya kabiri, nahurra ekihangwa ekyomeezi ekya kabiri nikigamba kiti: “Rugayo!”
66006004	Haarugayo embaraasi endi rugaaju. Ow'akaba agitembere yaikirizibwa kwiha obusinge omunsi, nukwo abantu baitangane; kandi yaheebwa empirima enkooto.
66006005	Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya kasatu, nahurra ekihangwa ekyomeezi ekya kasatu nikigamba kiti: “Rugayo!” Narora embaraasi rwozi. Ow'akaba agitembere akwasire minzaani omu ngaro ze;
66006006	nahurra ekirukusisana iraka niryema hagati y'ebihangwa bbina abyomeezi, nirigamba liti: “Endengo ey'engano erukwera ebe mpeera y'ekiro kimu; baitu amagita n'amarwa obikwate mpora!”
66006007	Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya kana, nahurra iraka ery'ekihangwa ekyomeezi ekya kana nirigamba liti: “Rugayo!”
66006008	Narora embaraasi rubuubi. Ow'akaba agitembere, ibara lye nuwe Rufu, kandi Kuzimu emuhondiire; byaheebwa obusobozi ha kimu kya kana eky'ensi, okukiisa empirima, kiihe, ebidanda, n'enyamaiswa ez'omunsi.
66006009	Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya kataano, narora hansi y'itambiro emyoyo y'abo abaisirwe habw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga, na habw'obwakaiso obu baahaire;
66006010	baatoka n'iraka likooto bati: “Ai Kamarabyona, ahikiriire kandi ow'amazima, olimara kasumi ki otakacweriire musango abo abaikara omunsi, kandi olibahoora di enzigu habw'esagama yaitu?”
66006011	Nubwo buli omu omuli bo yahairwe ekanzu erukwera, kandi baagambirwa kwongera kuhuumuraho akasumi, okuhika omuhendo ogw'abaheereza bagenzi baabo na bataahi baabo ab'okwitwa nka bo obu gulikahika.
66006012	Omu kubonekerwa kwange, Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya mukaaga, haabaho omusisa ogw'amaani; izooba lyaraara, lyasisana orugoye orurukwiragura, okwezi kwona kwatukura nk'esagama,
66006013	enyunyuuzi eza haiguru zaaragalika hansi, nk'omuti omutini oku guragalikya ebijuma byagwo omu bwire bwa kasambura obu gutengesibwa ihunga;
66006014	iguru lyahwaho nk'omuzingo ogukubirwe, buli rusozi na buli kizinga byaihururwa omu biikaro byabyo.
66006015	Nubwo abakama b'ensi n'abantu ab'ekitiinisa, engabwa ez'amahe, abaguuda, ab'amaani kandi buli muntu: omwiru n'ow'obugabe baayeserekere omu maingira n'omu mabaale ag'omu nsozi;
66006016	baataagira ensozi n'amabaale ago bati: “Mutugwere, mutusereke amaiso g'Ogu anyakusingire ha kitebe ky'obukama; kandi mututabule ekiniga ky'Omwana gw'Entaama;
66006017	habwokuba ekiro kikuru eky'okucweraho omusango kihikire, nooha asobora kukyemera?”
66007001	Ebi obu byahoire, nkarora bbana beemeriire ha mbaju ina ez'ensi, nibatangirayo emiyaga ena ey'ensi, haleke kubaho omuyaga ogurukuteera omunsi, ha nyanja rundi ha muti gwona.
66007002	Nagaruka narora malaika ondi naatemba naaruga Buruga-izooba, akwasire emanyiikirizo ya Ruhanga omwomeezi, yayeta n'iraka likooto bamalaika abbana abakaba bahairwe obusobozi obw'okukora kubi ensi n'enyanja,
66007003	naagamba ati: “Mutakora kubi ensi, enyanja noobu yakuba emiti, okuhika obu turakamara okuta emanyiikirizo ha buso bw'abaheereza aba Ruhanga waitu.”
66007004	Kandi nahurra omuhendo gw'abatairweho emanyiikirizo, baahikaga akasiiriira kamu, obukumi bbuna mu nkumi ina, abaarugire omu buli ruganda orw'Abaisirairi.
66007005	Ab'omu ruganda rwa Yuda abatairweho emanyiikirizo kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Rubbeeni, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Gadi, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri;
66007006	ab'omu ruganda rw'Aseeri, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Nefutaali, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Manaasse, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri;
66007007	ab'omu ruganda rwa Simyoni, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Leevi, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Isaakaari, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri;
66007008	ab'omu ruganda rwa Zebbuluni, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Yosefu, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini abatairweho emanyiikirizo, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri.
66007009	Ebi obu byahoire, narora ekitebe kikooto eky'abantu, omuntu aba ataakusoboire kubara, abaarugire omu mahanga goona, omu nganda zoona, omu bantu boona n'omu ngambo zoona beemeriire omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama, n'omumaiso g'Omwana gw'Entaama, bajwaire ekanzu ezirukwera, bakwasire omu ngaro amataagi g'enkindo,
66007010	nibatokera haiguru n'iraka likooto bati: “Okujuna nikuruga hali Ruhanga waitu anyakusingire ha kitebe ky'obukama, na hali Omwana gw'Entaama!”
66007011	Kandi bamalaika abakaba beemeriire beehinguliriize ekitebe ky'obukama, beehinguliriize n'abakuru, n'ebihangwa bbina ebyomeezi, baajuumara omu maiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama, baaramya Ruhanga,
66007012	nibagamba bati: “Nukwo kibe kiti! Ruhanga waitu anyumiziibwe kandi aheebwe ekitiinisa, amagezi, okusiimwa, okukugizibwa, obusobozi n'amaani obusinge bwona! Amiina.”
66007013	Nubwo omu hali abakuru yankagwize ati: “Banu abajwaire ekanzu ezirukwera nibaha, kandi barugire nkaha?”
66007014	Nyowe namugarukamu nti: “Waitu, niiwe orukumanya.” Nandiki uwe ati: “Banu nubo abo abaarugire omu mihito mingi; baayogya ekanzu zabo, baazeereza omu sagama ey'Omwana gw'Entaama.
66007015	Nikyo barukwemererra omumaiso g'ekitebe ekya Ruhanga, nibamuheereza omunju ye nyamusana n'ekiro; kandi Ogu anyakusingire ha kitebe ky'obukama, alibasangirra n'ekitiinisa kye.
66007016	Tibaligaruka kurumwa njara, noobwakubaire kukwatwa iroho; tibaliteerwa musana, noobu kyakubaire ekibabu kyagwo.
66007017	Habwokuba Omwana gw'Entaana anyakwemeriire omu maiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama, aliba muliisa wabo, alibeebembera abahikye ha nsoro ez'amaizi ag'obwomeezi; kandi Ruhanga alibasusura amaizi goona ag'omumaiso gabo.”
66008001	Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya musanju, haabaho okuculeera omu iguru okumara nk'ekicweka ky'esaha.
66008002	Nubwo narozire bamalaika musanju abeemerra omumaiso ga Ruhanga baaheebwa engwara musanju.
66008003	Haija malaika ondi yayemerra haihi n'itambiro, aina ekiswa kya zaabbu; yaheebwa emigaju nyingi ey'okwotera hamu n'eby'okusaba kw'abahikiriire ebikaba biri ha itambiro lya zaabbu omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama;
66008004	kandi omwika gw'omugaju gwaimuka omu maiso ga Ruhanga hamu n'eby'okusaba kw'abahakiriire, byona byaruga omu mukono gwa malaika ogu.
66008005	Aho malaika yakwata ekiswa kya zaabbu, yakiijuza omurro ogwa ha itambiro, yakihungura omunsi; enkuba zaabbaruka, emirabyo yamulikya, haabaho n'omusisa.
66008006	Nubwo bamalaika musanju abakaba baina engwara musanju, baayeteekaniza kuziteera.
66008007	Malaika ow'okubanza yateera engwara ye, haazooka orubaale n'omurro bitabwirwemu esagama, byagwa omunsi; kimu kya kasatu eky'ensi kyamekuka, n'ekimu kya kasatu eky'emiti n'obunyansi, byona byahya.
66008008	Malaika owa kabiri yateera engwara ye, ekintu ekirukusisana orusozi orukooto orurukwaka omurro, kyagwa omu nyanja.
66008009	Kimu kya kasatu eky'enyanja kyafooka sagama, n'ekimu kya kasatu eky'ebihangwa ebyomeezi ebiri omu nyanja kyafa, kandi kimu kya kasatu eky'emeeri kyahwerekerezibwa.
66008010	Malaika owa kasatu yateera engwara ye, enyunyuuzi enkooto yaruga omu iguru, neeyaka nk'ekimuli, yagwa ha kimu kya kasatu eky' ebisaaru na ha maziba.
66008011	Ibara ly'enyunyuuzi egi, niyo Nyakusarra. Kimu kya kasatu eky'amaizi gasarra pe, gaita abantu baingi, habwokuba gakaba gasaaliire.
66008012	Malaika owa kana yateera engwara ye, kimu kya kasatu eky' izooba kyateerwa, hamu n'ekimu kya kasatu eky'okwezi, na kimu kya kasatu eky'enyunyuuzi. Ekyarugiremu: kimu kya kasatu eky'ekyererezi kyabyo kyaswekwa omwirima, omusana gukamara kimu kya kasatu ky'ekiro gutarukujwa. Okwezi n'enyunyuuzi nabyo byamara kimu kya kasatu ky'ekiro bitarukujwa.
66008013	Aho narora kandi nahurra isamba erikaba nirihurruka omu burangasa, niryamuza n'iraka likooto liti: “Ziribabona, ziribabona, ziribabona abaliba bali omunsi engwara ezindi isatu obu zirigamba, bamalaika abasatu ezi bali haihi kuteera!”
66009001	Malaika owa kataano yateera engwara ye, narora enyunyuuzi eyarugire omwiguru, yagwa hansi; enyunyuuzi egi yaheebwa ekisumuruzo eky'omunwa ogw'ekiina ekitaina h'okugarukira,
66009002	yakingura omunwa gw'ekiina eki. Omu munwa gwakyo haarugamu omwika ogurukusisana ogw' ekikoomi. Izooba n'oburangasa byaswekwa omwika ogwarugire omu munwa gw'ekiina.
66009003	Omu mwika ogu haarugamu enzige, zaija omunsi, zaaheebwa obusobozi obw'okwokya abantu nk'enge ez'omunsi.
66009004	Zaatangwa kukora kubi obunyansi bw'omunsi, n'ekimera kyona ekibisi rundi omuti gwona; baitu ikaheebwa obusobozi hali abo bonka abataina manyikirizo ya Ruhanga ha buso bwabo.
66009005	Ikaikirizibwa kubacanza okumara ameezi ataano, hatali kubaita; kandi okwokya kwazo kukaba nikusisana nk'okw'enge obu eyokya omuntu.
66009006	Omu meezi ago ataano, abantu baliserra orufu baitu tibalirubona; balyegomba kufa, nakwo kulibairuka.
66009007	Omu nzooka, enzige ezi ikaba niisisana nk'embaraasi ezitegekiirwe obulemu. Ha mitwe yazo hakaba haroho ebirukusisana ekondo za zaabbu; amaiso gaazo gasisanaga nk'amaiso g'abantu.
66009008	Ebyoya byazo byasisanaga nk'isoke ly'abakazi, kandi amaino gaazo gali nk'ag'entale.
66009009	Zikaba ziina ebigaragamba ebirukusisana ekyoma eky'okwekingira ha kifuba, okuhuuma kw'amapapa gaazo kwasisanaga okuhuuma kw'ebigaali bingi ebirukusikwa embaraasi ezirukwiruka enziriga nizigenda ha bulemu.
66009010	Zikaba ziina emikira enyakwina emibuli nk'ey'enge, kandi omu mikira yazo nuho hali obusobozi bw'okucanza abantu okumara ameezi ataano.
66009011	Ziina omukama arukuzirema, nuwe malaika ow'ekiina ekitaina h'okugarukira; omu Ruhebburaayo, ibara lye nuwe Abadooni, kandi omu Rugiriiki ayetwa Apolyoni (amakuru gaalyo Omuhwerekereza).
66009012	Omuhito ogw'okubanza guhoire, hati hakyasigaire emihito endi ebiri.
66009013	Nubwo malaika owa mukaaga yatiire engwara ye, kandi nahurra iraka erirukuruga omu mbaju ina ez'itambiro erya zaabbu erinyakuli omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
66009014	Iraka lyagambira malaika owa mukaaga, ow'akaba aina engwara, liti: “Lekera bamalaika abbana abaabohiirwe ha kisaaru ekikooto Efuraate.”
66009015	Bamalaika abbana baalekerwa, nubo abakaba bategekiirwe esaaha, ekiro, okwezi n'omwaka ogw'okwitiramu kimu kya kasatu eky'abantu.
66009016	Omuhendo ogw'amahe ogw'abarwanira ha mbaraasi gwahikaga obukaikuru bikumu bibiri; omuhendo gwabo nkaguhurra.
66009017	Omu kwolekwa kwange, nukwo narozire nti embaraasi n'abakaba bazitembere: bakaba bajwaire ebyoma eby'okwekingira ha kifuba eby'erangi nk'ey'omurro rundi ey'ibaale ery'omuhendo ey'erangi ya bbururu, n'ey'obuganga; kandi emitwe y'embaraasi ekaba neesisana emitwe y'entale, omu kanwa kaazo haarugamu omurro, omwika n'obuganga.
66009018	Enfu ezi isatu nizo zaisire kimu kya kasatu eky'abantu: omurro, omwika, n'obuganga ebyarugire omu kanwa k'embaraasi ezi.
66009019	Habwokuba obusobozi bw'embaraasi buli omu kanwa kaazo n'omu mikira yazo; emikira yazo ina emitwe erukusisana enjoka, kandi niyo zeekonyeza kutema abantu.
66009020	Abantu abaasigaireho, abataraisirwe nfu ezi, bateegarukemu ebikorwa ebi baakozire n'emikono yabo, noobu kwakuba kuleka kuramya emizimu n'embandwa ebyaheesirwe omu zaabbu, omu feeza, omu mulinga rundi ebyabaizirwe omu mabaale n'omu miti, ebintu ebitasobora kurora rundi kuhurra rundi kurubata.
