66009021	Kandi bateegarukemu obwisi bwabo, oburogo bwabo, obusiihani bwabo, n'obusuma bwabo.
66010001	Aho narora malaika ondi ow'amaani naasirimuka naaruga omu iguru, ali omu kicu, n'omuhangazima guli haruguru y'omutwe gwe. Ha maiso ge nigangasana nk'izooba, amaguru ge gali nk'enyomyo z'omurro.
66010002	Omu mukomo gwe akwasire akazingo k'ekitabu akasuukwirwe. Okuguru kwe okw'obulyo yakuta ha nyanja, kandi okw'obumoso yakuta ha bwerre.
66010003	Yayamirra n'iraka likooto nk'entale erukubbuukura. Obu yayamiriire, enkuba musanju zaagamba.
66010004	Enkuba omusanju obu zaamazire kugamba, nkaba nyeteekaniize kuhandiika, baitu nahurra iraka erirukuruga omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Enkuba musanju, ebi zaagamba obiculerre, otabihandiika.”
66010005	Malaika ou naboine ayemeriire ha nyanja na ha bwerre, omukono gwe ogw'obulyo yagwimukya haiguru,
66010006	yarahira Ogu anyakwomeera ebiro byona, ayahangire iguru, ensi, anyanja, n'ebinyakubirumu byona, naagamba ngu, tihakyaroho kukeerereza okundi,
66010007	baitu omu biro malaika owa musanju ebi aliterramu engwara, nubwo Ruhanga alihikiriza entegeka ye ey'ensita nkooku yagambiire abarangi abamuheereza.
66010008	Nubwo iraka eri nahuliire niriruga omwiguru, lyayongera lyangambira liti: “Genda oihe akazingo k'ekitabu ekyanjurwirwe omu ngaro za malaika anyakwemeriire ha nyanja na ha bwerre.”
66010009	Nagenda hali malaika ogu, namusaba ampe akazingo k'ekitabu. Uwe yangarukamu ati: “Nkako, kakwate okalye; nikaija kukuruma omu nda, baitu omu kanwa karakunurra nk'obwoki.”
66010010	Akazingo ako nakaiha omu mukono gwa malaika nakalya; omu kanwa kange kakaba nikanura nk'obwoki, baitu obu namazire kukalya, narumwa omu nda.
66010011	Malaika yangambira ati: “Osemeriire kugaruka kuranga ebiriizira abantu ab'enganda nyingi, amahanga, engambo, n'abakama.”
66011001	Hanyuma naheebwa oruti orw'okulengesa, orurukusisana orubango; haabaho ayandagiire ati: “Imuka, olenge Enju ya Ruhanga n'itambiro, kandi obale abo abaramizaamu;
66011002	baitu otalenga ezigati ey'aheeru y'Enju egi; yo ogireke, habwokuba ehairwe Abanyamahanga kandi balirubaatirra orubuga orurukwera okumara ameezi makumi ana n'abiri.
66011003	Kandi abakaiso bange ababiri ndibaha obusobozi obw'okuranga okumara ebiro rukumi rumu omu bikumi bibiri n'enkaaga, baliranga bajwaire ebiguniya.”
66011004	Abakaiso abo niyo emiti ey'oliva, n'ebikondo bibiri eby'etaara ebinyakuli omu maiso ga MUKAMA w'ensi yoona.
66011005	Kakuba habaho weena arukubakora kubi, omurro gulibaruga omu kanwa, gumaleho abanyanzigwa baabo. Kakuba habaho weena arukubakora kubi, nawe nukwo ali w'okwitwa ati.
66011006	Baina obusobozi obw'okukinga iguru, nukwo enjura ereke kugwa omu biro ebi balimara nibaranga. Kandi baina obusobozi ha maizi okugahindura sagama, n'okuleeta omunsi buli muhito gwona ha bakagondiize hoona.
66011007	Obu balikamara kuha obwakaiso bwabu, ekinyamaiswa ekinyakuruga omu kiina ekitaina h'okugarukira kiribarwanisa, kibasingule, kibaite;
66011008	kandi emitumbi yabu erigaraamirra omu ikuute ery'orubuga orukuru nambere MUKAMA wabo yabambiirwe ha musaraba, orubuga orusisanizibwa Sodomu na Misiri.
66011009	Abantu aba buli mulingo, buli ruganda, buli ngambo, n'aba buli ihanga emitumbi yabo baligihanga amaiso okumara ebiro bisatu n'ekicweka, batarukwikiriza eziikwe omu kituuro.
66011010	Kandi abo abaliba bali omunsi balibeebugira, balisemererwa kandi balitwekerangana ebisembo, habwokuba abarangi abo ababiri baabatuntuzaaga muno.
66011011	Baitu obu haahingwireho ebiro bisatu n'ekicweka, orwoya orw'obwomeezi orwarugire hali Ruhanga rukabataahamu, baayemerra; n'abo boona abaababoine baatiina muno.
66011012	Nubwo abakaiso abo ababiri baahuliire iraka likooto erirukuruga omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Mutembe, mwije hanu!” Baatemba omu iguru, bali omu kicu, abanyanzigwa baabo nibabarora.
66011013	Kandi omu kasumi ako haabaho omusisa ogw'amaani, kimu kya ikumi eky'orubuga kyagwa; abantu kasanju baitwa omusisa, kandi abaasigaireho baatina muno, baakugiza Ruhanga ow'omwiguru.
66011014	Omuhito ogwa kabiri guhoire, hati ogwa kasatu gumalize kwija.
66011015	Nubwo malaika owa musanju yatiire engwara ye, omu iguru haahulirwa amaraka makooto agaagambire gati: “Obukama bw'ensi buhindukire, bwaba bwa MUKAMA waitu n'Ogu ou yaseesireho amagita (nuwe Kristo), kandi alirema ebiro byona.”
66011016	Abakuru amakumi abiri na bbana abanyakwikarra ha bitebe byabu omu maiso ga Ruhanga baajuumara, baamuramya,
66011017	nibagamba bati: “Nitukusiima MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona, anyakuroho kandi ayabaireho, habwokuba oyegaruliire obusobozi bwawe, wajuumura engoma.
66011018	Amahanga gakabiihirwa muno, hati akasumi kawe kahikire ak'okugafubira: abafiire okucwerwa omusango, n'abaheereza baawe okuheebwa empeera, nubo abarangi n'abahikiriire n'abo abakutiina, abato n'abakuru kandi nuko kasumi ak'okumaraho abahwerekereza ensi.”
66011019	Aho Enju ya Ruhanga ey'omwiguru yakingurwa, kandi esanduuko ey'endagaano yazooka omu Nju ye; haabaho emirabyo, okuhinda kw'amaani, okubbaruka kw'enkuba, omusisa n'orubaale rwingi.
66012001	Kandi haazooka omwiguru ekintu ekirukuhuniriza muno: omukazi ajwaire izooba, okwezi kuli hansi y'ebigere bye, kandi ha mutwe ajwaire ekondo ey'enyunyuuzi ikumi na ibiri.
66012002	Omukazi ogu akaba akulize, naataaga habw'okurumwa ebisa, ali omu busaalizi obw'okuzaara.
66012003	Kandi omwiguru haazooka ekirukuhuniriza ekindi; nikyo ekijoka ekikooto ekirukutukura, ekiina emitwe musanju, amahembe ikumi, n'ekondo musanju ha mitwe yakyo.
66012004	Omukira gwakyo gwasingorra kimu kya kasatu eky'enyunyuuzi ez'omwiguru, gwazinaga hansi. Ekijoka kyayemerra omumaiso g'omukazi ow'akaba ali haihi kuzaara, nukwo kisonsomere omwana we naakyamuzaara ati.
66012005	Yazaara omwana w'obwojo ow'akaba ali w'okulema amahanga goona naagalemesa omwigo ogw'ekyoma, baitu omwana we yasahurwa, yatwarwa omba Ruhanga na ha kitebe eky'obukama bwe.
66012006	Omukazi yairukira omwirungu nambere Ruhanga akaba amuteekaniriize ekiikaro h'asobora kuroleererwa kurungi okumara ebiro rukumi bibiri n'enkaaga.
66012007	Nubwo obulemu bwacwekere omwiguru, Mikairi na bamalaika be baarwana n'ekijoka; kandi ekijoka na bamalaika baakyo baarwana,
66012008	baitu baasingurwa, kandi tibaagaruka kutunga kiikaro omu iguru.
66012009	Ekijoka eki kikooto kyahungurwa hansi, niyo enjoka egi eya ira enyakwetwa Omwohi kandi Sitaani, anyakubiihabiiha ensi yoona--yahungurwa omunsi hamu na bamalaika be.
66012010	Kandi nahurra iraka erikooto omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Hati okujuna, amaani, n'obukama bwa Ruhanga waitu hamu n'obusobozi obwa Kristo we biizire, habwokuba omulegi wa bagenzi baitu, anyakubalega hali Ruhanga waitu nyamusana n'ekiro, abingirwe omwiguru.
66012011	Bamusingwize okufa kw'Omwana gw'Entaama n'obwakaiso bw'amananu obu bamuheriire; batataatirre bwomeezi bwabo, nangwa baikiriza n'okumufeera.
66012012	Nahabweki, semererwa iwe iguru, na inywe abaliikaramu! Baitu ziribabona inywe ensi n'enyanja, habwokuba Omwohi abaiziiremu aina ekiniga kingi, kandi amanyire nkooku asigaize akasumi kake!”
66012013	Ekijoka obu kyarozire nkooku kihungwirwe omunsi, kyaronza omukazi ayazaire omwana omwojo.
66012014	Baitu omukazi akaheebwa amapapa abiri ag'isamba erikooto, nukwo asobole kwiruka ekijoka, agende omu irungu, omu kiikaro nambere akaba naija kuroleerererwa okumara akasumi akali nk'emyaka esatu n'ekicweka.
66012015	Ekijoka eki kyabooga ekisaaru ky'amaizi maingi, nikigaiha omu kanwa kaakyo, gahondere omukazi, nukwo entunga yago emutwale hara;
66012016	baitu ensi yakoonyera omukazi agu, yayesama, yamira ekisaaru ekyaboogerwe ekijoka.
66012017	Nubwo ekijoka kyabiihiriirwe omukazi, kyagenda kurwanisa oruzaaro rwe orwasigaireho, nubo abo abakwata Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga kandi abajurra Yesu.
66012018	Nubwo ekijoka kyayesimbire ha musa gw'enyanja.
66013001	Nyowe nkaba nyemeriire ha musa gw'enyanja; kandi narora ekinyamaiswa nikiimuka omu nyanja kiina amahembe ikumi, emitwe musanju, ekondo ikumi ha mahembe gaakyo, kandi ha mitwe yakyo hahandiikirweho ibara erirukujuma Ruhanga.
66013002	Ekinyamaiswa eki narozire, kikaba nikisisana engo, ebigere byakyo nibisisana eby'edubu, akanwa kaakyo nikasisana ak'entale. Ekijoka kyakiha amaani gaakyo, n'ekitebe kyakyo eky'obukama, n'obusobozi bwakyo obwingi.
66013003	Ogumu ha mitwe yakyo gukaba nigusisana ogwina ekihuta ekirukusobora kukiita, baitu ekihuta eki ekyakusoboire kukiita, kyakira; kandi abantu boona ab'ensi bahondera ekinyamaiswa bahuniriire.
66013004	Abantu baaramya ekijoka eki, habwokuba obusobozi bwakyo kikabuha ekinyamaiswa, kandi baaramya n'ekinyamaiswa nibagamba bati: “Nooha arukusisana ekinyamaiswa, kandi nooha asobora kukirwanisa?”
66013005	Ekinyamaiswa eki kyaheebwa akanwa k'okugamba ebigambo eby'okwekuliriza n'eby'okujuma Ruhanga, kandi kyaikirizibwa okukozesa obusobozi bwakyo okumara ameezi amakumi ana n'abiri.
66013006	Kyayesamya akanwa kaakyo kubaza eby'okujuma Ruhanga, nikijuma ibara lye, n'ekiikaro eki aikaramu, n'abo abaikara omwiguru.
66013007	Kandi kyaikirizibwa okurwanisa abantu ba Ruhanga n'okubasingura. Kyaheebwa obusobozi ha nganda zoona, ha bantu boona, ha ngambo zoona, na ha mahanga goona.
66013008	Kandi boona abaikara omunsi baliramya ekinyamaiswa eki. Nubo abo ab'amabara gaabo gatarahandiikiirwe okuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi omu kitabu eky'obwomeezi eky'Omwana gw'Entaama ayatambirwe.
66013009	Anyakwina okutu, ahurre:
66013010	Ogu ow'okunyagwa, anyagwe omu bwiru; ogu anyakwisa empirima, nawe aitwe n'empirima. Aho nuho harukwetaagirwa okwikiriza n'okugumiisiriza okw'abantu ba Ruhanga.
66013011	Nubwo narozire ekinyamaiswa ekindi ekyakununukire omu itaka; kiina amahembe abiri nk'entaama, kyabaza nk'ekijoka.
66013012	Kyakozesa obusobozi bwona obw'ekinyamaiswa eky'okubanza, na kiri kikiroleeriire. Kyahambiriza ensi n'abagirumu kuramya ekinyamaiswa eky'okubanza ekyakizire ekihuta kyakyo eky'okukiita.
66013013	Kyakora ebirukuhuniriza, kyaragira omurro guruge omwiguru gugwe hansi, abantu nibarora.
66013014	Ebihuniriza ebi kyaikiriziibwe kukora omu maiso g'ekinyamaiswa eky'okubanza bikahabisa abo abaikara omunsi. Kikabaragira kukora ekisisani eky'okunyumirizaaho ekinyamaiswa eki ekyahutaaziibwe empirima, baitu kyagaruka kyayomeera.
66013015	Kyaikirizibwa kuhuuha orwoya omu kisisani eki ky'ekinyamaiswa, nukwo kisobole kubaza; kandi kyaikirizibwa n'okwita abo abarukwanga kuramya ekisisani eky'ekinyamaiswa.
66013016	Kyahambiriza boona, abato n'abakuru, abaguuda n'abanaku, ab'obugabe n'abairu, bateebweho akarorwaho ha mukono ogw'obulyo rundi ha buso,
66013017	nukwo haleke kubaho n'omu asobora kugura n'okutunda, rundi buli aina akarorwaho ako, niryo ibara ly'ekinyamaiswa, rundi enamba y'ibara lyakyo.
66013018	Eki kintu ky'okwetegereza: arukwetegereza ayezorre amakuru ag'enamba y'ekinyamaiswa eki, habwokuba nayo namba y'abantu. Enamba yakyo, rukaaga mu nkaaga, na mukaaga.
66014001	Nubwo narozire Omwana gw'Entaama ayemeriire ha rusozi Siyoni, hamu n'abantu akasiiriira kamu mu bukumi bbuna n'enkumi ina, abakaba bahandiikirwe ha buso ibara lye n'ibara lya Ise.
66014002	Kandi nahurra iraka erirukuruga omwiguru, nirisisana okuhirra okw'amaizi maingi kandi okugamba okw'enkuba ez'amaani. Iraka eri nahuliire likaba nirisisana nk'ery'abateezi b'endongo abarukuteera endongo zaabbu,
66014003	bakaba nibazina ekizina ekihyaka omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama, n'omu maiso g'ebihangwa bbina ebyomeezi, n'omu maiso g'abakuru abo. Busaho n'omu ayasoboire kukwata ekizina eki, okwihaho abantu akasiiriira kamu mu bukumi bbuna n'enkumi ina abaacungwirwe omunsi.
66014004	Nubo abo abatarayesiisire n'abakazi, habwokuba batamanye bakazi; abo nubo bahondera Omwana gw'Entaama hoona h'akagenda; nubo abaacungwirwe omu bantu, bali munganuro gwa Ruhanga n'ogw'Omwana gw'Entaama.
66014005	Omu kanwa kaabu hatasangwemu bisuba, habwokuba tibaina kamogo.
66014006	Hanyuma narora malaika ondi naahurruka omu mwanya, aina Amakuru Amarungi agatalihwaho ag'okurangirra abo abaikara omunsi, ag'okurangirra amahanga goona, enganda zoona, ab'engambo zoona, n'abantu boona;
66014007	yagamba n'iraka likooto ati: “Mutiine Ruhanga kandi mumukugize, habwokuba akasumi ke ak'okucwa omusango kahikire; kandi muramye Omuhangi w'iguru n'ensi, enyanja n'ensoro zoona z'amaizi.”
66014008	Haakurataho malaika ondi, owa kabiri, ayagaambire ati: “Rugwire Bbabbulooni orubuga rukuru! Rugwire oru orwatamiize amahanga goona n'obubi obw'obusiihani bwarwo!”
66014009	Malaika ondi owa kasatu yabakurataho naagamba n'iraka likooto ati: “Kakuba omuntu weena aramya ekinyamaiswa eki n'ekisisani kyakyo, kandi akateebwaho akarorwaho ha buso rundi ha mukono,
66014010	nawe alinywa empotole ey'ekiniga kya Ruhanga, enyakwiturwirwe omu kikopo kye. Alibonabonesibwa omurro n'obuganga oburukwokya, bamalaika abahikiriire n'Omwana gw'Entaama baroleriire.
66014011	Omwika ogw'okubonesibwa kwabo guliikara nigucuuka ebiro n'ebiro; kandi abo abaramya ekinyamaiswa n'ekisisani, kyakyo hamu n'abanyakwina akarorwaho ak'ibara lyakyo, tibaligira kihuumuro nyamusana n'ekiro.”
66014012	Aho nuho harukwetaagirwa okugumiisiriza kw'abahikiriire. Nubo abo abakwata Ebiragiro bya Ruhangga kandi abaikiriza Yesu.
66014013	Kandi nahurra iraka erirukuruga omu iguru nirigamba liti: “Handiika oti: Okuruga hati, baina omugisa abafu abaraafeeraga omu MUKAMA.” Kandi Mwoyo naakigumya ati: “Mazimakwo baina omugisa, hati bahuumule, baleke emirimo yabu, habwokuba ebikorwa byabu bagenda nabyo!”
66014014	Nubwo narozire ekicu ekirukwera, kiikaliirweho omu arukusisana omwana w'omuntu, ajwaire ha mutwe ekondo ya zaabbu, akwasire omu ngaro enoijoro enyakutoire.
66014015	Malaika ondi yaruga omu Nju ya Ruhanga naayeta n'iraka likooto Ogu anyakwikaliire ha kicu naagamba ati: “Kwata enoijoro yawe ogese, habwokuba akasumi ak'okugesa kahikire, ebyokugesa by'ensi byeriire kimu.”
66014016	Nubwo Ogu anyakwikaliire ha kicu yahungya enoijoro ye omunsi, yagesa ensi.
66014017	Malaika ondi yaruga omu Nju ya Ruhanga ey'omwiguru, nawe akaba akwasire enoijoro enyakutoire.
66014018	Kandi malaika ondi yaruga ha itambiro, nuwe malaika anyakwina obusobozi ha murro, yayera n'iraka likooto Ogu anyakukwasire enoijoro enyakutoire naagamba ati: “Kwata enoijoro yawe osale ebijuma by'emizabbibbu ey'omunsi habwokuba byengere.”
66014019	Nubwo malaika yahungya enoijoro ye omunsi, yasoroza ebijuma by'emizaabbibbu y'omunsi, yabinaga omu ndeeba enkooto ey'ekiniga kya Ruhanga.
66014020	Ebijuma byajungirwa omu ndeeba aheeru y'orubuga oru, byarugwamu esagama nyingi, yatuuma kuhika ha sentimita kikumi mu ataano, yagera kukira ha kilomita bikumi bibiri mu kyenda.
66015001	Nubwo narozire omwiguru ekyamahano ekindi ekikuru kandi ekirukuhuniriza. Nubo bamalaika musanju abaina emihito musanju ey'okumalirra, habwokuba ekiniga kya Ruhanga niyo kirukugarukiraho.
66015002	Kandi nkarora ekintu ekirukusisana enyanja ey'ekirahule etabwirwemu omurro, n'abo abaasingwire ekinyamaiswa n'ekisisani kyakyo n'enamba y'ibara lyakyo beemeriire ha rubaju rw'enyanja ey'ekirahule, bakwasire omu ngaro endongo za Ruhanga.
66015003	Bakaba nibazina ekizina kya Musa omuheereza wa Ruhanga n'eky'Omwana gw'Entaama nibagamba bati: “Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona, ebikorwa byawe bikuru kandi bihuniriza! Ai MUKAMA ow'obusinge bwona, emihanda yawe ehikire kandi y'amazima!
66015004	Ai MUKAMA nooha atalikutiina kandi atalikunyumiza? Niiwe wenka Ahikiriire. Amahanga goona galiija gakuramye, habwokuba encwa yaawe ey'obulyo, hati eyolekerwe.”
66015005	Ebi obu byahoire, nkarora omwiguru Enju ya Ruhanga erumu eheema y'obwakaiso ekingwirwe,
66015006	haarugamu bamalaika musanju baina emihito musanju kandi bajwaire ekanzu eza bafuta enungi erukunekaneka, beetegere omu kifuba emyeko ya zaabbu.
66015007	Kandi ekimu ha bihangwa ebbina ebyomeezi kyaha bamalaika musanju ebibindi musanju ebya zaabbu ebiijwire ekiniga kya Ruhanga anyakwomeera ebiro byona.
66015008	Enju yaijura omwika ogwarugire omu kitiinisa kya Ruhanga n'omu maani ge, kandi busaho n'omu ayasoboire kugitaaha okuhika emihito musanju eya bamalaika musanju obu yahoire.
66016001	Nubwo nahuliire iraka erikooto eryarugire omu Nju ya Ruhanga ey'omwiguru, nirigambira bamalaika omusanju liti: “Mugende museese omunsi ebibindi musanju eby'ekiniga kya Ruhanga.”
66016002	Malaika ow'okubanza yagenda yaseesa omunsi ebiri omu kibindi kye, abantu abakaba baina akororwaho ak'ekinyamaiswa kandi abaaramize ekisisani kyakyo baacweka ebihooya ebibi ebirukununka.
66016003	Malaika owa kabiri yaseesa omu nyanja ebiri omu kibindi kye, enyanja yafooka nk'esagama y'omuntu afiire, kandi buli kintu ekyomeezi ekikaba kiri omu nyanja kyafa.
66016004	Malaika owa kasatu yaseesa ebiri omu kibindi kye omu bisaaru n'omu maziba, byafooka sagama.
66016005	Nahurra malaika anyakurolerra amaizi ago naagamba ati: “Niiwe Ahikiriire, anyakuroho kandi ayabaireho, encwa yawe enu y'obulyo.
66016006	Habwokuba abantu bakaseesa esagama y'abarukwera n'abarangi, hati na Iwe obahaire esagama, niyo banywe. Niyo basemeriire!”
66016007	Kandi nahurra iraka erirukuruga ha itambiro nirigamba liti: “Ego, MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona, encwa yawe y'amazima kandi y'obulyo!”
66016008	Malaika owa kana yaseesa ebiri omu kibindi kye ha izooba, lyaikirizibwa okusiiriiza abantu n'ekibabu kyalyo.
66016009	Abantu baasiirizibwa ekibabu eky'amaani, kandi baakondereza ibara lya Ruhanga anyakwina obusobozi ha mihito egi, bateegarukemu kandi baayanga kumuha ekitiinisa.
66016010	Malaika owa kataano nawe yaseesa ebiri omu kibindi kye ha kitebe ky'obukama eky'ekinyamaiswa. Obukama bwakyo bwaswekwa omwirima; abantu baayeruma endimi habw'okuhururwa
66016011	baakondereza Ruhanga ow'omu iguru habw'okuhururwa oku n'ebihooya ebi bacwekere, baitu bateegarukemu ebi baakozire.
66016012	Malaika owa mukaaga yaseesa ebiri omu kibindi kye ha kisaaru ekikooto Efuraate. Amaizi gaakyo gaayomera kimu, nukwo hateekanizibwe omuhanda abakama abarukuruga Burugaizooba ogu basobora kurabamu.
66016013	Kandi narora emyoyo emibi esatu, erukusisana ebikere, neeruga omu kanwa k'ekijoka, omu kanwa k'ekinyamaiswa, n'omu kanwa k'omurangi ow'ebisuba.
66016014	Egi niyo myoyo ya Sitaani enyakukora ebihuniriza, enyakugenda omu bakama ab'ensi zoona kubasorooza baije ha bulemu ha kiro kikuru ekya Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona.
66016015	(“Dora, ninyija nk'omusuma! W'omugisa ogu anyakwikara naarora, akalina ebijwaro bye, nukwo aleke kugenda busa, abantu bakamurora enjuuro!”)
66016016	Emyoyo egi yasorooleza abakama omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa omu Ruhebburaayo: Aramagedoni.
66016017	Malaika owa musanju yaseesa omu mwanya gw'iguru ebiri omu kibindi kye. Iraka likooto lyaruga ha kitebe ky'obukama ekiri omu Nju ya Ruhanga nirigamba liti: “Kihoire!”
66016018	Haakurataho emirabyo, okuhinda kw'amaani, okubbaruka kw'enkuba, n'omusisa gw'amaani ogutakabahoga abantu baakaba kubaho omu nsi. Omusisa ogu gukaba gw'amaani muno.
66016019	Orubuga orukuru rwayahukanizibwa omu bicweka bisatu, n'embuga enkuru ez'amahanga zaagwa, zaahwerekerra, baitu Ruhanga ateebwe Bbabbulooni, yaijuka orubuga oruranganwa kurunywisa ekikopo kyona ekiijwire empotole ey'ekiniga kye.
66016020	Ebizinga byona byamirwa, n'ensozi zoona zaabura;
66016021	kandi orubaale orw'amabaale amakooto againa obulemeezi obwa kilo makumi ataano buli limu, rwaruga omwiguru rwateera abantu, kandi baakondereza Ruhanga habw'omuhito ogw'orubaale ogwabatiinisize muno.
66017001	Nubwo omu ha bamalaika omusanju abakaba baina ebibindi musanju, yaizire yangambira ati: “Rugayo, nkwoleke omusango ogucwerirwe malaaya rurangaanwa, nurwo rubuga oruli hagati y'ebisaaru bingi.
66017002	Nuwe ayasiihaine n'abakama b'ensi; kandi abantu abaikara omunsi baatamiizibwa obubi bw'obusiihani bwe.”
66017003	Malaika yantwara omwirungu ndi omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire, narora omukazi aikaliire ha kinyamaiswa rugaaju, ekinyakwijwire amabara maingi agarukujuma Ruhanga, kiina emitwe musanju n'amahembe ikumi.
66017004	Omukazi akaba ajwaire ekijwaro eky'erangi ya kahuukya n'erukutukura tukutuku, ayekunisize n'ezaabbu, amabaale g'omuhendo n'eruuru. Omu ngaro akwasire ekikopo kya zaabbu ekiijwire ebinugwa n'obubi obw'obusiihani bwe.
66017005	Ha buso bwe hahandiikirweho ibara eritarukumanywa makuru nirigamba liti: “Babbulooni orubuga orukuru, kizaara abamalaaya n'ebinugwa eby'ensi yoona.”
66017006	Kandi narora omukazi atamiire esagama ey'abantu ba Ruhanga n'ey'abakaiso abaferiire Yesu. Obu narozire omukazi ogu nkahunirra muno;
66017007	nukwo malaika ogu kunkaguza ati: “Kiki ekirukukuhuniriza? Kankwatire ensita ey'omukazi ogu kandi n'ey'ekinyamaiswa eki atembere eky'emitwe musanju n'amahembe ikumi.
66017008	Ekinyamaiswa eki orozire, kikaba kiroho, hati tikiroho, baitu nikiija kugaruka nikiruga omu kiina ekitaina h'okugarukira, nukwo kigende kihwerekereziibwe. Kandi abantu abaikara omunsi, ab'amabara gaabu batarahandiikirwe omu kitabu eky'obwomeezi ensi yakaaba kuhangwa, balihunirra kurora ekinyamaiswa eki, habwokuba kikaba kiroho, hati tikiroho, baitu nikiija kugaruka.
66017009	“Kinu nikikengwa omuntu ow'amagezi: emitwe musanju neemanyisa ensozi musanju omukazi ezi aikaliireho;
66017010	kandi neemanyisa abakama musanju: abataano halibo bakafa, omu aroho, kandi ondi takaizire; baitu obu aliija, aliikaraho akasumi kake.
66017011	Kandi ekinyamaiswa ekikaba kiroho, ekitaroho hati, nuwe mukama owa munaana, baitu naabalirwa omu bali omusanju kandi naija kuhwerekerezibwa.
66017012	“Amahembe ikumi ag'orozire nigamanyisa abakama ikumi abatakabaire kuteera engoma, baitu nibaija kulemera hamu n'ekinyamaiswa eki kumara esaaha emu yonka.
66017013	Abo bakaikirraniza, baacwa amagezi ag' okukwasa ekinyamaiswa eki amaani gaabo n'obusobozi bwabo.
66017014	Balirwanisa Omwana gw'Entaama, baitu uwe alibasingura, habwokuba nuwe Mulemi w'abalemi kandi MUKAMA w'abakama. Kandi balisingurwa abo abali hamu nawe, nubo abaayesirwe, abaakomerwe kandi abeesigwa.”
66017015	Malaika yagaruka yangambira ati: “Ebisaaru ebi orozire nambere malaaya aikaliire, nibimanyisa abantu ab'emiringo nyingi, ebitebe by'abantu, amahanga n'engambo nyingi.
66017016	Kandi amahembe ikumi ag'orozire, go hamu n'ekinyamaiswa birinoba malaaya ogu, birimwehindukirra, birimutwara busa, birijunjubura omubiri gwe, birimusiiririza kimu n'omurro,
66017017	habwokuba Ruhanga akakita omu mitima yabo okwikirraniza n'okuhikiriza entegeka ei yamutegekiire, nukwo obusobozi bwabo obw'okulema babuhe ekinyamaiswa okuhika ebigambo bya Ruhanga obu birikahikirizibwa.
66017018	Omukazi ou orozire, nurwo rubuga orukuru orunyakulema abakama b'ensi.”
66018001	Ebi obu byahoire, narora malaika ondi naasirimuka naaruga omwiguru, aina obusobozi bwingi, kandi ensi yayangasana habw'ekitiinisa kye.
66018002	Yayamirra n'iraka ery'amaani ati: “Rugwire Bbabbulooni orubuga rukuru! Rugwire! Rufookere bwikaro bw'emizimu, bwikaro bwa buli mwoyo mubi gwona, bwikaro obwikarwamu buli kinyonyi kyona ekirofu kandi ekirukunobwa;
66018003	habwokuba amahanga goona gatamiire obubi bw'obusiihani bwarwo, kandi abakama ab'ensi basiihaine narwo, n'abasuubuzi ab'ensi baguudahaire habw'itungo erirugire omu rwanju rwarwo.”
66018004	Nubwo nahuliire iraka erindi erirukuruga omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Inywe, bantu bange, muturuke muruge omu rubuga oru, timwikara kwetaba omu bibi byarwo, mukabagana ha mihito yarwo.
66018005	Ebibi byarwo bituumire kuhika ha iguru, kandi Ruhanga aijukire obubi bwarwo.
66018006	Murukole nkooku rwakozire abandi, kandi mururongoole kabiri habw'ebi rwakozire, ekikopo ky'amarwa ag'empotole aga rwabanywisize, inywe murugarurremu kabiri.
66018007	Nkooku rwayenyumiize rwonka kandi rwagira orwanju, na inywe nukwo murusaalize kandi murutuntuze muti. Noobu ruraaba nirugamba omu mutima gwarwo ruti: ‘Nyikaliire nk'Omugo, tindi mufakaati, obujune tibulimpikaho’,
66018008	baitu kiro kimu emihito yarwo eriruhikaho: orufu, okuganya na kiihe, kandi rulyokebwa omurro; habwokuba MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona nuwe arukurucwera omusango.”
66018009	Abakama ab'ensi abaasiihaine kandi abaayanjukire narwo, balirulirirra kandi baruterre empamo obu balirora omwika gwarwo nigucuuka.
66018010	Balyemerra hara, nibatiina kururora nirubonabonesibwa, kandi baligamba bati: “Ai bambi! Ai Bambi! Iwe rubuga orukuru! Iwe Bbabbulooni orubuga orw'amaani! Ekifubiro kyakuhikaho omu saaha emu yonka.”
66018011	Abasuubuzi ab'omunsi nibarulirirra kandi nibarugaragarra, habwokuba busaho n'omu akyayongera kubaguraho bintu byabo:
66018012	zaabbu, efeeza, amabaale g'omuhendo n'eruuru; bafuta enungi eya kahuukya, engoye eza liiri n'ezirukutukura; n'emiti yoona erukuboya kurungi; ebintu byona ebyakozirwe omu masanga, byona ebyabaizirwe omu miti ey'omuhendo, omu mulinga ogw'omuherre, ekyoma ekigumire n'amabaale agarukwangasana;
66018013	eby'okuboyesa ebyokulya, ebirungo, eseeta, omugaju, emyamirro, amarwa, amagita, ensaano enungi n'engano; ente n'entaama; embaraasi n'ebigaali byazo, hamu n'abairu rubaale--nukwo kiti nambere abantu bahingisibwamu ebintu.
66018014	“Amagoba omwoyo gwawe aga gwayegombere, gakurugireho, kandi byona ebi wayekunisaaga hamu n'ekitiinisa kyawe obifeerirwe, toligaruka kubirora!”
66018015	Abasuubuzi ab'ebintu ebi, abaaguudahaziibwe itungo ery'orubuga oru, balyemerra hara, nibatiina kururora nirubonabonesibwa, nibaganya kandi nibarra bati:
66018016	“Ai bambi! Ai bambi! Orubuga orukuru, orwajwaraga bafuta enungi, ey'erangi kahuukya n'erukutukura, orwatonerwe n'ezaabbu, amabaale ag'omuhendo n'eruuru!
66018017	Obuguuda obu bwona buhwerekereziibwe omu saaha emu yonka.” Kandi bakama b'emeeri, n'abo abagenderamu, abalimba n'abo abanyakusuburra ha nyanja baayema hara,
66018018	nibaborooga muno obu baarozire omwika gwarwo nigucuuka, bayekaguza bati: “Rubuga ki orwainganaga orubuga runu orukuru?”
66018019	Baayeseesa ecuucu ha mitwe. Obu, nibaganya, nibarra kandi nibeesaalinga bati: “Ai bambi! Ai bambi! Orubuga orukuru, orwaguudahaize boona abakaba baina emeeri ha nyanja! Ruhwerekereziibwe omu saaha emu.
66018020	Iwe iguru, inywe abahikiriire, abakwenda n'abarangi murwebugire, habwokuba Ruhanga arusingisize omusango habwanyu!”
66018021	Nubwo malaika ow'amaani yakomere ibaale erirukwingana orubengo orukooto, yalihungura omu nyanja naagamba ati: “Bbabbulooni orubuga orukuru nukwo rulinagwa hansi n'amaani ruti, kandi tiruligaruka kuzooka.
66018022	Amaraka g'abateezi b'endongo n'ag'abazini, ag'abateezi b'enseegu hamu n'ag'abateezi b'engwara, tigaligaruka kuhulirwa omuli iwe; kandi omukozi w'omulimo gwona taligaruka kuzooka omuli iwe; n'iraka ery'orubengo tiririgaruka kuhulirwa omuli iwe.
66018023	Kandi ekyererezi eky'etaara tikirigaruka kwakira omuli iwe. Iraka erya kigabura n'erya kigabuka tiririgaruka kuhulirwa omuli iwe. Mazimakwo abasuubuzi bawe bakaba bali bantu barangaanwa omunsi, habwokuba amahanga goona okagabiihabiiha n'oburogo bwawe.
66018024	Kandi omu rubuga oru hakaba haseesekeremu esagama ey'abarangi n'abahikiriire, n'eya boona abaisirwe omunsi.”
66019001	Ebi obu byahoire, nahurra iraka likooto erirukusisana ery'ekitebe ky'abantu baingi abali omwiguru nibazina bati: “Haleluya! Okujuna, ekitiinisa n'obusobozi, byona bya Ruhanga waitu.
66019002	Habwokuba encwa ye y'amazima kandi y'obulyo. Malaaya rurangaanwa ayasiisire ensi n'obusiihani bwe amusingisize omusango kandi amuhoire enzigu habw'esagama y'abaheereza be.”
66019003	Baayongera baayamirra bati: “Haleluya! Omwika ogurukuruga omu rubuga oru guraikaraga nigucuuka ebiro byona.”
66019004	Kandi abakuru amakumi abiri na bbana, hamu n'ebihangwa ebbina ebyomeezi baajuumara hansi, baaramya Ruhanga anyakwikaliire ha kitebe eky'obukama nibagamba bati: “Nukwo kibe kiti. Haleluya!”
66019005	Kandi iraka lyaruga ha kitebe ky'obukama niryamirra liti: “Muhaisanize Ruhanga waitu, inywe inywena abaheereza be, inywe abamutiina abato n'abakuru!”
66019006	Nubwo nahuliire iraka erirukusisana ery'ekitebe ky'abantu baingi, erirukuhirra nk'amaizi amaingi kandi erirukuhinda nk'okubbaruka kw'enkuba z'amaani niritoka liti: “Haleluya! MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu ow'obusobozi bwona ahangiriize.
66019007	Katusemererwe, tukyanganuke kandi tumukugize, habwokuba obugenyi bw'obugole obw'Omwana gw'Entaama buhikire, kandi Omugole we ayeteekaniize;
66019008	akaikirizibwa kujwara bafuta erukunekaneka, erukwera kandi esemiire” habwokuba bafuta erukunekaneka neemanyisa ebikorwa ebirungi eby'abahikiriire.
66019009	Malaika yangambira ati: “Handiika oti: B'omugisa abaraliziibwe ha kiihuro ky'obugenyi bw'obugole obw'Omwana gw'Entaama.” Malaika yayongera ati: “Ebi nibyo bigambo bya Ruhanga ebya mazima.”
66019010	Aho najuumara ha bigere bye kumuramya, baitu yantanga ati: “Otakisura! Nyowe ndi muheereza nka iwe, kandi nk'abagenzi bawe abagumya ebya Yesu. Ramya Ruhanga.” Habwokuba ekisembo kyona eky'okuranga kisigikira ha bwakaiso Yesu obu yahaire.
66019011	Nubwo narozire iguru likingwirwe, haazookayo embaraasi rweru! Ogu ow'akaba agitembere, naayetwa Mwesigwa kandi Mazima, nuwe acwa emisango omu bulyo kandi arwana obulemu omu bwinganiza.
66019012	Amaiso ge nigasisana endimi z'omurro, ha mutwe gwe ajwaire ekondo nyingi, kandi hahandiikirweho ibara eritarukumanywa muntu n'omu kwihaho uwe wenka.
66019013	Ajwaire ekanzu enyakwibikirwe omu sagama, kandi ibara eri bamweta niryo Kigambo kya Ruhanga.
66019014	Ab'amahe ag'omwiguru baamuhondera batembere embaraasi nyingi rweru, bajwaire bafuta erukunekaneka, erukwera kandi esemiire.
66019015	Omu kanwa ke haarugamu empirima enyakutoire ey'okutemesa amahanga, kandi aligalemesa omwigo ogw'ekyoma; abanyanzigwa be alibarubatirirra omu ndeeba ey'ekiniga kya Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona.
66019016	Ha kanzu ye na ha mpirima ye hahandiikirweho ibara: MUKAMA w'abakama kandi Mulemi w'abalemi.
66019017	Aho narora malaika ayemeriire omu izooba, yayeta n'iraka likooto enyonyi zoona eziharruka haiguru omu burangasa ati: “Mwije mwesorooze ha kiihuro ekikuru kya Ruhanga!
66019018	Mwije mulye enyama ey'abakama, ey'engabwa ez'amahe, n'ey'emanzi: enyama ey'embaraasi n'abatembi baazo, n'ey'abantu boona, ab'obugabe n'abairu, abato n'abakuru!”
66019019	Narora ekinyamaiswa eki, n'abakama ab'ensi, n'amahe gaabu ageesoroize kurwanisa Ogu anyakwikaliire ha mbaraasi n'okurwanisa ihe rye.
66019020	Ekinyamaiswa kyahambwa hamu n'omurangi ow'ebisuba ayakozire ebihuniriza omumaiso gaakyo. (Ebihuniriza ebyahabisize abo abatairweho akarorwaho k'ekinyamaiswa n'abo abaaramize ekisisani kyakyo.) Ekinyamaiswa n'omurangi ow'ebisuba byanagwa omu nyanja y'omurro erukwaka n'obuganga bikyali byomeezi.
66019021	Abaasigaireho bakaitwa empirima y'Ogu anyakwikarra ha mbaraasi, niyo mpirima enyakuruga omu kanwa ke; amahungu goona gaalya gaaniha emitumbi yabo.
66020001	Nubwo narozire malaika ondi naasirimuka naaruga omwiguru, akwasire omu ngaro ekisumuruzo eky'ekiina ekitaina h'okugarukira n'orujegere rukooto.
66020002	Yagenda yakwata ekijoka, niyo njoka egi eya ira enyakwetwa Omwohi kandi Sitaani, yamuboha kumara emyaka rukumi,
66020003	yamunaga omu kiina, yakiigarra, yakitaho enkwasi amazire kumwigalirramu, nukwo aleke kwongera kubiihabiiha amahanga, okuhika emyaka rukumi obu erihwa. Obu erihwaho asumururwe akaanya kake.
66020004	Hanyuma narora ebitebe by'obukama, abakaba babiikaliireho nubo abo abaahairwe obusobozi obw'okucwa emisango. Kandi narora emyoyo y'abo abaacwirweho emitwe habw'okujurra Kristo n'ekigambo kya Ruhanga. Nubo abo abatararamize kinyamaiswa rundi ekisisani kyakyo, abakaba batatairweho karorwaho kaakyo ha buso rundi ha mikono yabo. Baahumbuuka, baalema hamu na Kristo kumara emyaka rukumi.
66020005	Abafu abandi batahumbuuke okuhika emyaka egi rukumi obu yahoireho. Oku mukwo okuhumbuuka okw'okubanza.
66020006	W'omugisa kandi ahikiriire anyakubagana ha kuhumbuuka okw'okubanza! Abali nk'abo, okufa okwa kabiri tikubainaho busobozi; baitu baliba banyakatagara ba Ruhanga na Kristo, balirema hamu nawe okumara emyaka rukumi.
66020007	Emyaka rukumi obu erihwa, Sitaani alisumururwa aruge omu nkomo ye,
66020008	alituruka kubiihabiiha Gogu na Magogu, nugo amahanga agali ha mbaju ina ez'ensi agasorooleze obulemu. Omuhendo gw'abantu abo nigwingana omusenyi ogw'enyanja.
66020009	Bakagenda banyaaka ensi yoona, baagota orukande rw'abantu ba Ruhanga n'orubuga orukuru orugonzibwa; baitu omurro gwaruga omwiguru gwabahwerekereza,
66020010	kandi Omwohi ayababiihabiihaga yanagwa omu nyanja erukwaka omurro n'obuganga, nambere hakaba hali ekinyamaiswa n'omurangi ow'ebisuba, kandi nambere balibonabonesezibwa nyamusana n'ekiro ebiro byona.
66020011	Aho narora Ekitebe ky'obukama ekirukwera kandi eky'ekitiinisa n'Ogu ow'akaba akiikaliireho. Ensi n'iguru byairuka byaruga omumaiso ge, byaburra kimu.
66020012	Narora abafu, abakuru n'abato, beemeriire omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama, kandi ebitabu byasuukurwa. Ekitabu ekindi nakyo kyasuukurwa, nikyo kitabu eky'obwomeezi. Abafu baacwerwa omusango habw'ebi ebi baakozire ebyahandiikirwe omu bitabu.
66020013	Enyanja yabooga emitumbi y'abagiferiiremu. Rufu na Kuzimu byagarra abafu abakaba babirumu. Boona baacwerwa omusango habw'ebi baakozire.
66020014	Nubwo Rufu na Kuzimu byanagirwe omu nyanja y'omurro. Kandi enyanja y'omurro, nukwo okufa okwa kabiri.
66020015	Omuntu weena ow'ibara lye litarahandiikirwe omu kitabu ky'obwomeezi yanagwa omu nyanja y'omurro.
66021001	Nubwo narozire iguru erihyaka n'ensi empyaka. Habwokuba iguru ery'okubanza n'ensi ey'okubanza bikaba bihoireho, kandi enyanja ekaba etakyaroho.
66021002	Narora orubuga orurukwera, Yerusaalemu oruhyaka, nirusirimuka niruruga omwiguru hali Ruhanga, ruteekaniziibwe nk' omugole ou bakunisiize iba.
66021003	Kandi nahurra iraka likooto niriruga ha kitebe ky'obukama nirigamba liti: “Hati mumanye Ruhanga nkooku aikara n'abantu be. Aliikara nabo, babe bantu be, nawe wenka aliikara omulibo.
66021004	Alibasusura amaizi goona ag'omu maiso gabo. Orufu tiruligaruka kubaho, noobu kwakuba okuganya, rundi okurra, rundi obusaasi. Habwokuba ebintu ebya kara biriba bihoireho.”
66021005	Ogu ow'akaba asingire ha kitebe eky'obukama yagamba ati: “Hati ebintu byona nimbifoora bihyaka!” Yayongera yagamba ati: “Handiika binu, habwokuba binu bigambo by'okwesiga kandi by'amazima.”
66021006	Nubwo yangambiire ati: “Byona bihikiriziibwe! Ninyowe Alufa na Omega, amakuru gaabyo: Entandiko kandi Empero. Weena anyakukwatwa iroho ndimuha amaizi agatali g'okugura, agarukuruga omu iziba ery'amaizi ag'obwomeezi.
66021007	Weena anyakusingura, bunu nubwo buliba bugwetwa bwe: Ndiba Ruhanga we, kandi uwe aliba mwana wange.
66021008	Baitu abatiini, abataikiriza, abanugwa, abaisi b'abantu, abasiihani, abarogo, abaramya abacwezi n'abanyabisuba boona, omugabo gwabo eriba enyanja erukwaka omurro n'obuganga. Nukwo okufa okwa kabiri.”
66021009	Nubwo haizire omu ha baamalaika omusanju, abakaba baina ebibindi musanju ebiijwire emihito musanju eya ha mpero, yangambira ati: “Ija, nkwoleke Omugole, omukazi w'Omwana gw'Entaama.”
66021010	Yantwara ha rusozi orukooto kandi oruraihire ntemberwe Mwoyo Ahikiriire, yanyoleka orubuga orurukwera, Yerusaalemu, nirusirimuka niruruga omwiguru hali Ruhanga,
66021011	rwina ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga. Okwangasana kwarwo nikusisana ibaale ery'omuhendo omukooto, nirusisana ibaale yasipi, nirwengengeta nka ibaale kristalo.
66021012	Rukaba rwehinguliriziibwe ekigo ekikooto kandi ekiraihire. Kiina amalembo ikumi n'abiri, ha malembo ago haroho bamalaika ikumi na babiri; kandi na ha malembo hahandiikirweho amabara ag'enganda ikumi na ibiri ez'Abaisirairi.
66021013	Ha Burugaizooba amalembo asatu, bukiizi bw'emoso amalembo asatu, bukiizi bw'obulyo amalembo asatu, na Bugwa-izooba amalembo asatu.
66021014	Ekigo ky'orubuga oru kikaba kiina amabaale g'omusingi ikumi n'abiri agahandiikirweho amabara ikumi n'abiri ag'abakwenda ikumi na babiri ab'Omwana gw'Entaama.
66021015	Malaika ayabalize na nyowe, akaba aina orubango orwa zaabbu orw'okulengesa orubuga, amalembo gaarwo n'ebisiika byarwo.
66021016	Orubuga oru rukaba rwina embaju ina ezirukwingana, obura bwarwo bwainganaga n'obugazi bwarwo. Orubuga yarulengesa orubango, rwahikya kilomita enkumi ibiri n'ebbina; obura, obugazi n'obwemi bwarwo nibwingana.
66021017	Malaika yayongera yalenga ekisiika kyarwo, kyahikya mita nkaaga oburaiha, abantu nkooku baalenga.
66021018	Ekisiika kikombekwa na mabaale g'omuhendo agarukwetwa yasipi, baitu orubuga rukombekwa na zaabbu yonyini, erukumuliikana nk'ekirahule.
66021019	Emisingi ey'ekisiika ky'orubuga ekaba etonerwe n'amabaale ag'omuhendo aga buli mulingo. Omulingo ogw'okubanza, niryo ibaale yasipi, erya kabiri saafiro, erya kasatu kalukeedoni, erya kana simaragido,
66021020	erya kataano sarudoni, erya mukaaga saarudiyo, erya musanju kirisoolito, erya munaana beerilo, erya mwenda topaazi, erya ikumi krisoopuraso, erya ikumi na limu yasinto, erya ikumi n'abiri ametisito.
66021021	amalembo ikumi n'abiri, nugo amabaale ag'eruuru ikumi n'ibiri, buli irembo lyombekerwe n'eruuru emu yonka; kandi ikuute ery'orubuga likaba likozirwe na zaabbu yonyini, erukumuliikana nk'ekirahule.
66021022	Omu rubuga oru ntarolemu Nju ya Ruhanga, habwokuba MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona n'Omwana gw'Entaama nubo Nju ya Ruhanga y'orubuga oru.
66021023	Kandi orubuga oru tirurukwetaaga izooba rundi okwezi eby'okurujwera, habwokuba ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga nikyo kyererezi kyarwo kandi Omwana gw'Entaama niyo taara yarwo.
66021024	Amahanga galigendera omu kyererezi kyarwo; kandi abakama b'ensi baliruleetamu ekitiinisa kyabo.
66021025	Amalembo gaarwo tigalikingwa nyamusana omurundi na gumu; kandi oku, obwire tibwairege.
66021026	Baliruleetamu ekitiinisa ky'amahanga n'itungo lyago.
66021027	Baitu ekintu kyona ekitasemiire tikirirutaahamu, noobwakubaire omuntu weena anyakukora ekirukunugwa rundi eby'obugobya; baitu halitaahamu abo bonka abaahandiikirwe omu kitabu eky'obwomeezi eky'Omwana gw'Entaama.
66022001	Nubwo malaika yanyolekere ekisaaru eky'amaizi ag'obwomeezi, ekirukwangasana nk'ibaale kristaalo, ekirukugera nikiruga ha kitebe ky'obukama ekya Ruhanga n'eky'Omwana gw'Entaama,
66022002	nikiraba hagati y'ikuute ery'orubuga orukuru. Ha buli rubaju orw'ekisaaru hakaba haliyo emiti y'obwomeezi enyakwina ebijuma byayo by'emiringo ikumi n'ebiri, enyakwana ebijuma buli kwezi; kandi ebikoora byayo bikaba biri by'okutambira abantu ab'amahanga.
66022003	Omu rubuga oru tihaligaruka kuzookamu kintu kyona ekikyenerwe, baitu haraikaramuga ekitebe ky'obukama ekya Ruhanga n'eky'Omwana gw'Entaama, kandi abaheereza be balimuramya.
66022004	Balirora amaiso ge, kandi ibara lye liriba ha buso bwabo.
66022005	Obwire tibuligaruka kwira; tibalyetaaga kererezi ky'etaara rundi izooba, habwokuba MUKAMA Ruhanga nuwe araabamulikiraga kandi balirema ebiro byona.
66022006	Hanyuma malaika yangambira ati: “Ebigambo binu by'okwesiga kandi by'amazima. MUKAMA Ruhanga anyakuha abarangi omwoyo ogw'okuranga, atumire malaika we ayoleke abaheereza be ebiri haihi kubaho.”
66022007	Kandi Yesu yagamba ati: “Hati nu, ndi haihi kwija. W'omugisa ogu arukukwata ebigambo ebyarangirwe ebiri omu kitabu kinu.”
66022008	Nyowe Yohaana, ninyowe ayahuliire kandi ayarozire ebintu ebi. Obu nabihuliire kandi mbirozire, najuumara ha bigere bya malaika ayabinyolekere kumuramya;
66022009	baitu yantanga ati: “Otakisura! Nyowe ndi muheereza nka iwe kandi nka bagenzi bawe abarangi, kandi nk'abo abakwata ebigambo ebiri omu kitabu kinu. Ramya Ruhanga!”
66022010	Kandi yanteererra ati: “Ebigambo ebyarangirwe ebiri omu kitabu kinu otabiculerra, habwokuba akasumi kabyo kali haihi kuhika.
66022011	Arukukora kubi, leka akole kubi, arukusiisa, leka asiise; arukukora ebihikire, leka abikole; kandi arukwera, ayeyongere omu burukwera.”
66022012	Yesu yagamba ati: “Dora ndi haihi kwija. Nyina empeera ey'okusasura buli omu habw'ebi yakozire.
66022013	Ninyowe Alufa na Omega, amakuru gaakyo: Ow'okubanza kandi Nw'okumalirra, Entandiko kandi Empero.”
66022014	B'omugisa abo aboogya ebijwaro byabu bakabyeza, nukwo baikirizibwe kulya ha bijuma by'emiti y'obwomeezi n'okutaaha orubuga orukuru nibaleetwa omu malembo.
66022015	Aheeru yarwo haikarayo embwa, abarogo, abasiihani, abaisi b'abantu, abaramya abacwezi na boona abagonza kandi abaikaliza eby'obugobya.
66022016	“Nyowe Yesu, nkutumiire malaika wange akumanyise binu, nukwo bigasire ebitebe by'abaikiriza. Ninyowe kikoro kandi mwijukuru ow'oruganda rwa Daudi, enyunyuuzi erukwangasana ey'omu rukyakya.”
66022017	Mwoyo Ahikiriire n'Omugole nibagamba bati: “Rugayo.” Kandi weena arukuhurra, leka agambe ati: “Rugayo.” Kandi wena anyakukwasirwe iroho, leka aije; na weena arukwetaaga, leka anywe amaizi ag'obwomeezi agatarukugurwa.
66022018	Nyowe Yohaana, nimpabura weena arukuhurra ebigambo ebyarangirwe ebiri omu kitabu kinu: Kakuba omuntu abyongeraho, Ruhanga alimwongeraho emihito enyakusoboroirwe omu kitabu kinu.
66022019	Kandi omuntu kakuba abikeehyaho, Ruhanga talimwikiriza kuhika ha muti ogw' obwomeezi n'omu rubuga orurukwera, ebisoboroirwe omu kitabu kinu.
66022020	Ogu arukugumya binu naagamba ati: “Mazimakwo ndi haihi kwija.” Nukwo kibe! Ija MUKAMA Yesu!
66022021	Embabazi za MUKAMA Yesu ziikale n'abantu be boona. Amiina.
